anya-e0103n:31_0: 1. Svāyaṃ visuddhimaggo yaṃ suttapadaṃ nissāya paṭṭhapīyati, taṃ tāva nikkhipitvā
anya-e0103n:31_1: tassa nidānādiniddhāraṇamukhena nānappakārato atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:31_2: āraddhaṃ. Dhammaṃ saṃvaṇṇentena hi ādito tassa nidānaṃ vattabbaṃ, tato payojanaṃ
anya-e0103n:31_3: piṇḍattho padattho sambandho adhippāyo codanā sodhanaṃ vattabbaṃ. Tathā ceva ācariyena
anya-e0103n:31_4: paṭipannaṃ. Ettha hi bhagavantaṃ kirātiādi desanāya nidānapayojananiddhāraṇaṃ, visuddhimaggaṃ
anya-e0103n:31_6: kiṃ sīlantiādi codanā, tato paraṃ sodhanaṃ, samādhipaññākathāsupi eseva nayo. Kasmā
anya-e0103n:31_7: panettha vissajjanagāthā ādimhi nikkhittā, na pucchāgāthā. Pucchāpubbikā hi vissajjanāti?
anya-e0103n:31_8: Vuccate – tadatthassa maṅgalabhāvato, sāsanassa ādikalyāṇādibhāvavibhāvanato, bhayādiupaddavanivāraṇena
anya-e0103n:32_0: Etthāha – kasmā panāyaṃ visuddhimaggakathā vatthupubbikā āraddhā, na satthuthomanāpubbikāti?
anya-e0103n:32_1: Vuccate – visuṃ asaṃvaṇṇanādibhāvato. Sumaṅgalavilāsinīādayo viya hi dīghanikāyādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:32_2: nāyaṃ visuṃ saṃvaṇṇanā, na pakaraṇantaraṃ vā abhidhammāvatārasumatāvatārādi viya.
anya-e0103n:32_3: Tāsaṃyeva pana sumaṅgalavilāsinīādīnaṃ visesabhūtā. Tenevāha “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:32_4: Atha vā thomanāpubbikāpi cāyaṃ kathā na vatthupubbikāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sāsane hi vatthukittanaṃ
anya-e0103n:32_5: na loke viya kevalaṃ hoti, sāsanasampattikittanattā pana satthu aviparītadhammadesanābhāvavibhāvanena
anya-e0103n:32_6: satthuguṇasaṃkittanaṃ ulliṅgantameva pavattati. Tathā hi vakkhati “ettāvatā tisso
anya-e0103n:32_7: sikkhā”tiādi. Sotāpannādibhāvassa ca kāraṇanti ettha hi ādi-saddena sabbasakadāgāmianāgāmino
anya-e0103n:32_8: viya sabbepi arahanto saṅgayhanti vibhāgassa anuddhaṭattā. Tena tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ
anya-e0103n:32_9: nibbedhabhāgiyā sīlādayo idha “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādivacanena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:32_10: Tiṇṇampi hi nesaṃ carimabhave visesato saṃsārabhayikkhaṇaṃ, yathāsakaṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n:32_11: samathavipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanapaṭipatti ca samānāti. Atha vā “so
anya-e0103n:32_12: imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti sādhāraṇavacanena sātisayaṃ, niratisayañca taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanaṃ
anya-e0103n:32_13: gahitaṃ. Tattha yaṃ niratisayaṃ savāsanappahānatāya. Tena satthu pahānasampadā kittitā
anya-e0103n:32_14: hoti, tannimittā ñāṇasampadā ca. Tadubhayena nānantarikatāya ānubhāvasampadādayopīti.
anya-e0103n:32_15: Evampi thomanāpubbikāyaṃ kathāti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā thomanāpubbikā evāyaṃ kathāti
anya-e0103n:32_17: saṃvaṇṇanāya āraddhattā. Sā panāyaṃ yasmā pucchantassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ byākaraṇasamatthatāya
anya-e0103n:32_18: vibhāvanavasena pavattitā, āciṇṇañcetaṃ ācariyassa yadidaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammānukūlaṃ
anya-e0103n:32_19: saṃvaṇṇanārambhe satthu abhitthavanaṃ. Tasmā iminā kāraṇena evamettha thomanā pavattitāti.
anya-e0103n:32_20: Thomanākārassa vuccamānassa kāraṇaṃ uddharantena paṭhamaṃ vissajjanagāthaṃ nikkhipitvā
anya-e0103n:32_21: tassā nidānacodanāmukhena pucchāgāthaṃ sarūpato ca atthato ca dassetvā tassā pucchāya
anya-e0103n:32_23: katā. Tenāha “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādi. Tattha gāthāya attho parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n:33_1: Tathā hesa “ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccatī”tiādīsu hetumhi āgato.
anya-e0103n:33_2: “Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu
anya-e0103n:33_3: anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā”tiādīsu parisamāpane.
anya-e0103n:33_4: “Iti vā iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiatthe. “Māgaṇḍiyoti
anya-e0103n:33_5: tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti
anya-e0103n:33_6: byañjanaṃ abhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye. “Iti kho, bhikkhave, sappaṭibhayo
anya-e0103n:33_7: bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito. Saupaddavo bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito. Saupasaggo bālo,
anya-e0103n:33_8: anupasaggo paṇḍito”tiādīsu pakāre. “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:33_9: satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṃ, kiṃpaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā
anya-e0103n:33_10: jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya”ntiādīsu avadhāraṇe, sanniṭṭhāneti attho. “Atthīti
anya-e0103n:33_11: kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, natthīti kho, kaccāna, ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu nidassane.
anya-e0103n:33_12: Idhāpi nidassane daṭṭhabbo, pakāretipi vattuṃ vaṭṭateva. Paṭhamo pana iti-saddo parisamāpane
anya-e0103n:33_13: daṭṭhabbo. Hīti avadhāraṇe. Idanti āsannapaccakkhavacanaṃ yathādhigatassa suttapadassa abhimukhīkaraṇato.
anya-e0103n:34: Vuttanti ayaṃ vutta-saddo saupasaggo, anupasaggo ca vappanavāpasamīkaraṇakesohāraṇajīvitavuttipamuttabhāvapāvacanapavattitaajjhesanakathanādīsu dissati. Tathā hi ayaṃ –
anya-e0103n:36: Vuttānaṃ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhatī”ti. –
anya-e0103n:37_0: Ādīsu vappane āgato. “No ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu aṭṭhadantakādīhi vāpasamīkaraṇe.
anya-e0103n:37_1: “Kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu kesohāraṇe. “Pannalomo paradattavutto migabhūtena
anya-e0103n:37_2: cetasā viharatī”tiādīsu jīvitavuttiyaṃ. “Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto
anya-e0103n:37_3: abhabbo haritatthāyā”tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve. “Yesamidaṃ etarahi porāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:37_4: mantapadaṃ gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samihita”ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite. Loke pana
anya-e0103n:37_5: “vutto guṇo vutto pārāyano”tiādīsu ajjhesane. “Vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatā ‘dhammadāyādā
anya-e0103n:37_6: me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā’ti”ādīsu kathane. Idhāpi kathane eva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:37_7: Tasmā “iti hi evameva idaṃ suttaṃ desita”nti yathānikkhittaṃ gāthaṃ desitabhāvena
anya-e0103n:38_0: Kasmāti hetumhi nissakkaṃ. Panāti vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ. Ubhayenāpi kāraṇaṃ pucchati.
anya-e0103n:38_1: Etanti yathāvuttaṃ suttapadaṃ paccāmasati. Vuttanti pucchānimittaṃ. Tadatthassa attano
anya-e0103n:38_2: buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānataṃ upādāya “ida”nti vatvā puna bhagavatā bhāsitākāraṃ sandhāya
anya-e0103n:38_3: “eta”nti vuttaṃ. Sakalena panānena vacanena desanāya nidānaṃ jotitaṃ hoti. Parato
anya-e0103n:38_4: tassā desakadesakālapaṭiggāhake vibhāvetuṃ “bhagavantaṃ kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:38_5: kirāti anussavanatthe nipāto. Tena vuccamānassatthassa anu anu suyyamānataṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0103n:38_6: Rattibhāgeti rattiyā ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse, majjhimayāmeti adhippāyo. Vessavaṇādayo viya
anya-e0103n:38_7: apākaṭanāmadheyyattā aññataro. Devo eva devaputto. Saṃsayasamugghāṭatthanti vicikicchāsallasamuddharaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:38_8: pucchīti yojanā. “Saṃsayasamugghāṭattha”nti ca iminā pañcasu pucchāsu ayaṃ vimaticchedanāpucchāti
anya-e0103n:38_9: dasseti. Yena atthena taṇhā “jaṭā”ti vuttā, tameva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “jāliniyā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:38_10: vuttaṃ. Sā hi aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritappabhedo attano avayavabhūto eva jālo etissā
anya-e0103n:39_0: Idānissā jaṭākārena pavattiṃ dassetuṃ “sā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rūpādīsu ārammaṇesūti
anya-e0103n:39_2: Heṭṭhupariyavasenāti kadāci rūpārammaṇe kadāci yāva dhammārammaṇe kadāci dhammārammaṇe
anya-e0103n:39_3: kadāci yāva rūpārammaṇeti evaṃ heṭṭhā, upari ca pavattivasena. Desanākkamena cettha
anya-e0103n:39_4: heṭṭhupariyatā daṭṭhabbā. Kadāci kāmabhave kadāci rūpabhave kadāci arūpabhave kadāci
anya-e0103n:39_5: vā arūpabhave…pe… kadāci kāmabhaveti evamettha heṭṭhupariyavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:39_6: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvattā aparāparuppatti ettha saṃsibbananti
anya-e0103n:39_7: āha “punappunaṃ uppajjanato”ti. “Saṃsibbanaṭṭhenā”ti idaṃ yena sambandhena jaṭā viyāti
anya-e0103n:39_8: jaṭāti jaṭātaṇhānaṃ upamūpameyyatā, taṃdassanaṃ. Ayaṃ hettha attho – yathā jālino
anya-e0103n:39_9: veḷugumbassa sākhā, kosasañcayādayo ca attanā attano avayavehi saṃsibbitā vinaddhā
anya-e0103n:39_10: “jaṭā”ti vuccanti, evaṃ taṇhāpi saṃsibbanasabhāvenāti, “saṃsibbitaṭṭhenā”ti vā pāṭho,
anya-e0103n:39_11: attanāva attano saṃsibbitabhāvenāti attho. Ayaṃ hi taṇhā kosakārakimi viya attanāva
anya-e0103n:39_12: attānampi saṃsibbantī pavattati. Tenāha bhagavā “rūpataṇhā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
anya-e0103n:39_13: etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisatī”tiādi. Ime sattā “mama
anya-e0103n:39_14: ida”nti pariggahitaṃ vatthuṃ attanibbisesaṃ maññamānā abbhantarimaṃ karonti. Abbhantarattho
anya-e0103n:39_15: ca antosaddoti sakaparikkhāre uppajjamānāpi taṇhā “antojaṭā”ti vuttā. Pabbajitassa
anya-e0103n:40_0: “Attā”ti bhavati ettha abhimānoti attabhāvo, upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ. Sarīranti keci.
anya-e0103n:40_1: Mama attabhāvo sundaro, asukassa viya mama attabhāvo bhaveyyāti vā ādinā sakaattabhāvādīsu
anya-e0103n:40_2: taṇhāya uppajjamānākāro veditabbo. Attano cakkhādīni ajjhattikāyatanāni. Attano,
anya-e0103n:40_3: paresañca rūpādīni bāhirāyatanāni. Paresaṃ sabbāni vā, saparasantatipariyāpannāni
anya-e0103n:40_4: vā cakkhādīni ajjhattikāyatanāni. Tathā rūpādīni bāhirāyatanāni. Parittamahaggatabhavesu
anya-e0103n:40_5: pavattiyāpi taṇhāya antojaṭābahijaṭābhāvo veditabbo. Kāmabhavo hi kassacipi kilesassa
anya-e0103n:40_7: anto”ti ca vuccati. Tabbipariyāyato rūpārūpabhavo “bahiddhā, bahī”ti ca. Tenāha bhagavā
anya-e0103n:40_9: ca anekabhedabhinnampi taṇhaṃ jaṭābhāvasāmaññena ekanti gahetvā “tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya
anya-e0103n:40_10: jaṭāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana “pajā”ti vuttasattasantānapariyāpannā eva hutvā punappunaṃ
anya-e0103n:40_11: taṃ jaṭentī vinandhantī pavattatīti āha “jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā”ti. Tathā hi paramatthato
anya-e0103n:40_12: yadipi avayavabyatirekena samudāyo natthi, ekadeso pana samudāyo nāma na hotīti avayavato
anya-e0103n:40_13: samudāyaṃ bhinnaṃ katvā upamūpameyyaṃ dassento “yathā nāma veḷujaṭādīhi…pe… saṃsibbitā”ti
anya-e0103n:40_14: āha. Imaṃ jaṭanti sambandho. Tīsu dhātūsu ekampi asesetvā saṃsibbanena tedhātukaṃ
anya-e0103n:40_15: jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ. Tenassā mahāvisayataṃ, vijaṭanassa ca sudukkarabhāvamāha. “Vijaṭetuṃ
anya-e0103n:40_16: ko samattho”ti iminā “vijaṭaye”ti padaṃ sattiatthaṃ, na vidhiādiatthanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:41_0: Evaṃ “antojaṭā”tiādinā puṭṭho pana assa devaputtassa imaṃ gāthamāhāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:41_1: “Edisova imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjeyyā”ti satthāraṃ guṇato dassento “sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:41_2: Tattha sabbadhammesūti atītādibhedabhinnesu sabbesu ñeyyadhammesu. Appaṭihatañāṇacāroti
anya-e0103n:41_3: anavasesañeyyāvaraṇappahānena nissaṅgacārattā navihatañāṇapavattiko. Etena tīsu kālesu
anya-e0103n:41_4: appaṭihatañāṇatāvibhāvanena ādito tiṇṇaṃ āveṇikadhammānaṃ gahaṇeneva tadekalakkhaṇatāya
anya-e0103n:41_5: tadavinābhāvato ca bhagavato sesāveṇikadhammānampi gahitabhāvo veditabbo. Dibbanti
anya-e0103n:41_6: kāmaguṇādīhi kīḷanti laḷanti, tesu vā viharanti, vijayasamatthatāyogena paccatthike
anya-e0103n:41_8: voharanti, puññātisayayogānubhāvappattāya jutiyā jotanti, yathādhippetañca visayaṃ
anya-e0103n:41_9: appaṭighātena gacchanti, yathicchitanipphādane ca sakkontīti devā. Atha vā devanīyā
anya-e0103n:41_10: taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti gamanīyā, abhitthavanīyā vā,
anya-e0103n:41_11: sobhāvisesayogena kamanīyāti vā devā. Te tividhā – sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti.
anya-e0103n:41_12: Bhagavā pana niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānagatapañcavidhamāravijayicchānipphattiyā
anya-e0103n:41_16: appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti gamanīyato,
anya-e0103n:41_17: abhitthavanīyato, bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya
anya-e0103n:41_18: ṭhitattā tesaṃ devānaṃ seṭṭho uttamo devoti devadevo. Sabbadevehi pūjanīyataro devoti
anya-e0103n:41_19: vā, visuddhidevabhāvassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa vā adhigatattā aññesaṃ devānaṃ
anya-e0103n:42_0: Aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sakkānaṃ, mahābrahmānañca guṇābhibhavanato adhiko
anya-e0103n:42_1: atisayo atirekataro vā sakko brahmā cāti sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. Ñāṇappahānadesanāvisesesu
anya-e0103n:42_2: sadevake loke kenaci avikkhambhanīyaṭṭhānatāya kutocipi utrastābhāvato catūhi vesārajjehi
anya-e0103n:42_3: visāradoti catuvesārajjavisārado. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato
anya-e0103n:42_4: ime dhammā anabhisambuddhāti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā…pe… vesārajjappatto viharāmī”ti.
anya-e0103n:42_5: Ṭhānāṭhānañāṇādīhi dasahi ñāṇabalehi samannāgatattā dasabaladharo. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:42_6: “idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato, aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:42_7: Yaṃ kiñci ñeyyaṃ nāma, tattha sabbattheva anāvaṭañāṇatāya anāvaraṇañāṇo. Tañca sabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:42_8: samantato sabbākārato hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato dassanasamatthena ñāṇacakkhunā
anya-e0103n:42_9: samannāgatattā samantacakkhu, sabbaññūti attho. Imehi pana dvīhi padehi pacchimāni
anya-e0103n:42_10: dve asādhāraṇañāṇāni gahitāni. Bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:43_0: Ettha ca “sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro”ti iminā tiyaddhāruḷhānaṃ pucchānaṃ bhagavato
anya-e0103n:43_1: byākaraṇasamatthatāya dassitāya kiṃ devatānampi pucchaṃ byākātuṃ samattho bhagavāti
anya-e0103n:43_2: āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṃ “devadevo”ti vuttaṃ. Devānaṃ atidevo sakko devānamindo
anya-e0103n:43_3: devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjeti, “tato imassa ko viseso”ti cintentānaṃ tannivattanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:43_4: “sakkānaṃ atisakko”ti vuttaṃ. Sakkenapi pucchitamatthaṃ sanaṅkumārādayo brahmāno
anya-e0103n:43_5: vissajjenti, “tato imassa ko atisayo”ti cintentānaṃ tannivattanatthaṃ “brahmānaṃ
anya-e0103n:43_6: atibrahmā”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ cassa viseso catuvesārajjadasabalañāṇehi pākaṭo jātoti
anya-e0103n:43_7: dassanatthaṃ “catu…pe… dharo”ti vuttaṃ. Imāni ca ñāṇāni imassa ñāṇadvayassa adhigamena
anya-e0103n:43_8: saheva siddhānīti dassanatthaṃ “anāvaraṇañāṇo samantacakkhū”ti vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ
anya-e0103n:43_10: Evametesaṃ padānaṃ gahaṇe payojanaṃ, anupubbi ca veditabbā. Yaṃ panetaṃ pacchimaṃ
anya-e0103n:43_11: anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇanti ñāṇadvayaṃ, taṃ atthato abhinnaṃ. Ekameva hi taṃ
anya-e0103n:43_12: ñāṇaṃ visayapavattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvidhā katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:43_14: nissaṅgacāramupādāya “anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntipi vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato
anya-e0103n:44_0: 2. Mahante sīlakkhandhādike esī gavesīti mahesi, bhagavā. Tena mahesinā. Vaṇṇayantoti
anya-e0103n:44_1: vivaranto vitthārento. Yathābhūtanti aviparītaṃ. Sīlādibhedananti sīlasamādhipaññādivibhāgaṃ.
anya-e0103n:44_2: Sudullabhanti aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjitena navamena khaṇena laddhabbattā suṭṭhu dullabhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:44_3: Sīlādisaṅgahanti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahaṃ. Ariyamaggo hi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito
anya-e0103n:44_4: sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena, na tayo khandhā ariyamaggena nippadesattā. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0103n:44_5: “na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā; tīhi
anya-e0103n:44_6: ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito”ti. Kilesacorehi
anya-e0103n:44_8: ujuṃ. Sabbesaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ māraṇavasena gamanato pavattanato, nibbānassa magganato,
anya-e0103n:44_9: nibbānatthikehi maggitabbato ca maggaṃ. Visuddhiyāti nibbānāya, visuddhibhāvāya vā, arahattāyāti attho.
anya-e0103n:45_0: Yathābhūtaṃ ajānantāti evaṃ sīlavisuddhiādivisuddhiparamparāya adhigantabbo evarūpo
anya-e0103n:45_1: evaṃkiccako evamatthoti yāthāvato anavabujjhantā. Sakalasaṃkilesato, saṃsārato ca
anya-e0103n:45_2: suddhiṃ vimuttiṃ kāmenti patthentīti suddhikāmā. Api-saddo sambhāvane. Tena na kevalaṃ
anya-e0103n:45_3: sīlamattena parituṭṭhā, atha kho visuddhikāmāpi samānāti dasseti. Idhāti imasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:45_4: sāsane. Bhāvanāya yuttapayuttatāya yogino vāyamantāpi visuddhiṃ uddissa payogaṃ parakkamaṃ
anya-e0103n:45_5: karontāpi upāyassa anadhigatattā visuddhiṃ nādhigacchantīti yojanā. Tesanti yogīnaṃ.
anya-e0103n:45_7: pāmojjakaro, yogīnaṃ pana sātisayaṃ pamodahetūti āha “tesaṃ pāmojjakaraṇa”nti. Bāhirakanikāyantaraladdhīhi
anya-e0103n:45_9: attano apassayabhūtaṃ nikāyaṃ dasseti. Desanānayanissitanti dhammasaṃvaṇṇanānayasannissitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:45_10: Ettha ca “tesaṃ pāmojjakaraṇa”ntiādinā sabbasaṃkilesamalavisuddhatāya visuddhiṃ nibbānaṃ
anya-e0103n:45_11: patthentānaṃ yogīnaṃ ekaṃsena tadāvahattā pāmojjakaro ñāṇuttarehi sammāpaṭipannehi
anya-e0103n:45_12: adhiṭṭhitattā suṭṭhu sammā visuddhavinicchayo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ kathāmaggoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:45_13: Sakkaccaṃ me bhāsato sakkaccaṃ nisāmayathāti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:46_0: Ettha ca “imissā dāni gāthāyā”ti iminā visuddhimaggabhāsanassa nissayaṃ, “kathitāya
anya-e0103n:46_1: mahesinā”ti iminā tassa pamāṇabhāvaṃ, “yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ sīlādibhedana”nti iminā
anya-e0103n:46_3: iminā payojanaṃ, “vaṇṇayanto atthaṃ, suvisuddhavinicchayaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ desanānayanissitaṃ,
anya-e0103n:46_4: sakkacca”nti ca iminā karaṇappakāraṃ dassetvā “visuddhikāmā sabbepi, nisāmayatha
anya-e0103n:46_5: sādhavo”ti iminā tattha sakkaccasavane sādhujane niyojeti. Sādhukaṃ savanapaṭibaddhā hi sāsanasampatti.
anya-e0103n:47_1: abhiruciṃ uppādetīti padatthato visuddhimaggaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha visuddhī”tiādi
anya-e0103n:47_2: āraddhaṃ. Tattha tatthāti yadidaṃ “visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissa”nti ettha visuddhimaggapadaṃ
anya-e0103n:47_3: vuttaṃ, tattha. Sabbamalavirahitanti sabbehi rāgādimalehi, sabbehi saṃkilesamalehi
anya-e0103n:47_4: ca virahitaṃ vivittaṃ. Tato eva accantaparisuddhaṃ, sabbadā sabbathā ca visuddhanti
anya-e0103n:47_5: attho. Yathāvuttaṃ visuddhiṃ maggati gavesati adhigacchati etenāti visuddhimaggo.
anya-e0103n:47_6: Tenāha “maggoti adhigamūpāyo vuccatī”ti. Visuddhimaggoti ca nippariyāyena lokuttaramaggo
anya-e0103n:47_7: veditabbo, tadupāyattā pana pubbabhāgamaggo, tannissayo kathāpabandho ca tathā vuccati.
anya-e0103n:48_0: Svāyaṃ visuddhimaggo satthārā desanāvilāsato, veneyyajjhāsayato ca nānānayehi desito,
anya-e0103n:48_1: tesu ayameko nayo gahitoti dassetuṃ “so panāya”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha katthacīti
anya-e0103n:48_2: kismiñci sutte. Vipassanāmattavasenevāti avadhāraṇena samathaṃ nivatteti. So hi tassā
anya-e0103n:48_3: paṭiyogī, na sīlādi. Matta-saddena ca visesanivattiatthena savisesaṃ samādhiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0103n:48_4: So upacārappanābhedo vipassanāyānikassa desanāti katvā na samādhimattaṃ. Na hi khaṇikasamādhiṃ
anya-e0103n:48_5: vinā vipassanā sambhavati. Vipassanāti ca tividhāpi anupassanā veditabbā, na aniccānupassanāva.
anya-e0103n:48_6: Na hi aniccadassanamattena saccābhisamayo sambhavati. Yaṃ pana gāthāyaṃ aniccalakkhaṇasseva
anya-e0103n:48_7: gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, taṃ yassa tadeva suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tādisassa vasena.
anya-e0103n:48_8: Sopi hi itaraṃ lakkhaṇadvayaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā sammasitvā visesaṃ adhigacchati,
anya-e0103n:49_0: Sabbe saṅkhārāti sabbe tebhūmakasaṅkhārā, te hi sammasanīyā. Aniccāti na niccā addhuvā
anya-e0103n:49_1: ittarā khaṇabhaṅgurāti. Paññāyāti vipassanāpaññāya. Passati sammasati. Atha pacchā
anya-e0103n:49_2: udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ uppattiyā uttarakālaṃ. Nibbindati dukkheti tasmiṃyeva aniccākārato
anya-e0103n:49_3: diṭṭhe “sabbe saṅkhārā”ti vutte tebhūmake khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte dukkhe nibbindati
anya-e0103n:49_4: nibbidāñāṇaṃ paṭilabhati. Esa maggo visuddhiyāti esa nibbidānupassanāsaṅkhāto virāgādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:50_0: Jhānapaññāvasenāti samathavipassanāvasena. Jhānanti cettha vipassanāya pādakabhūtaṃ
anya-e0103n:50_1: jhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Yamhīti yasmiṃ puggale. Jhānañca paññā cāti etthāyamattho – yo
anya-e0103n:50_2: puggalo jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā taṃ ussukkāpeti. Sa ve nibbānasantiketi
anya-e0103n:50_3: so byattaṃ nibbānassa samīpe ekantato nibbānaṃ adhigacchatīti.
anya-e0103n:51_0: Kammanti maggacetanā. Sā hi apacayagāmitāya sattānaṃ suddhiṃ āvahati. Vijjāti sammādiṭṭhi.
anya-e0103n:51_1: Sīlanti sammāvācākammantā. Jīvitamuttamanti sammāājīvo. Dhammoti avasesā cattāro
anya-e0103n:51_2: ariyamaggadhammā. Atha vā kammanti sammākammantassa gahaṇaṃ. “Yā cāvuso visākha,
anya-e0103n:51_3: sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti vacanato.
anya-e0103n:51_4: Vijjāti sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Dhammoti samādhi “evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto
anya-e0103n:51_5: ahesu”ntiādīsu viya. Taggahaṇeneva “yo cāvuso visākha, sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati,
anya-e0103n:51_6: yo ca sammāsamādhi, ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti vacanato sammāvāyāmasatīnampi
anya-e0103n:51_7: gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sīlanti sammāvācājīvānaṃ. Jīvitamuttamanti evarūpassa ariyapuggalassa
anya-e0103n:51_8: jīvitaṃ uttamaṃ jīvitanti evamettha aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:52_0: Sīlādivasenāti sīlasamādhipaññāvīriyavasena. Sabbadāti samādānato pabhuti sabbakālaṃ.
anya-e0103n:52_1: Sīlasampannoti catupārisuddhisīlasampadāya sampanno samannāgato. Paññavāti lokiyalokuttarāya
anya-e0103n:52_2: paññāya samannāgato. Susamāhitoti taṃsampayuttena samādhinā suṭṭhu samāhito. Āraddhavīriyoti
anya-e0103n:52_3: akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya paggahitavīriyo.
anya-e0103n:52_4: Pahitattoti nibbānaṃ patipesitattatāya kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhacitto. Oghanti
anya-e0103n:53_0: Ekāyanoti ekamaggo. Maggapariyāyo hi idha ayana-saddo, tasmā ekapathabhūto ayaṃ,
anya-e0103n:53_1: bhikkhave, maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti attho. Ekaṃ vā nibbānaṃ ayati gacchatīti
anya-e0103n:53_2: ekāyano, ekena vā gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivekaṭṭhena ayitabbo paṭipajjitabboti ekāyano,
anya-e0103n:53_3: ayanti tenāti vā ayano, ekassa seṭṭhassa bhagavato ayanoti ekāyano, tena uppāditattā,
anya-e0103n:53_4: ekasmiṃ vā imasmiṃyeva dhammavinaye ayanoti ekāyano. Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādimalehi,
anya-e0103n:53_5: abhijjhāvisamalobhādiupakkilesehi ca sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya visujjhanatthāya. Yadidanti
anya-e0103n:53_6: nipāto, ye imeti attho. Pubbe saraṇalakkhaṇena maggaṭṭhena ca maggoti vuttasseva
anya-e0103n:53_8: ettha ādi-saddena appamādābhiratiādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo. Appamādābhiratiādivasenāpi
anya-e0103n:56_0: 4. Tatrāti tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ. Upari vuccamānā gāthāya vitthārasaṃvaṇṇanā niddesapaṭiniddesaṭṭhāniyā,
anya-e0103n:56_1: tato saṃkhittatarā atthavaṇṇanā uddesaṭṭhāniyāti āha “ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā”ti. Yathāuddiṭṭhassa
anya-e0103n:56_2: hi atthassa niddesapaṭiniddesā sukarā, subodhā ca hontīti. Sīle patiṭṭhāyāti ettha
anya-e0103n:56_3: sīleti kusalasīle. Yadipi “katame ca, thapati, akusalā sīlā”tiādīsu akusalā dhammāpi
anya-e0103n:56_4: sīlanti āgatā. Vuccamānāya pana cittapaññābhāvanāya adhiṭṭhānāyogyatāya kiriyasīlānampi
anya-e0103n:56_5: asambhavo, kuto itaresanti kusalasīlamevettha adhippetaṃ. Sīlaṃ paripūrayamānotiādīsu
anya-e0103n:56_6: paripūrayamānoti paripālento, parivaḍḍhento vā, sabbabhāgehi saṃvaranto, avītikkamanto
anya-e0103n:56_7: cāti attho. Tathābhūto hi taṃ avijahanto tattha patiṭṭhito nāma hoti. “Sīle”ti hi
anya-e0103n:56_8: idaṃ ādhāre bhummaṃ. Patiṭṭhāyāti duvidhā patiṭṭhā nissayūpanissayabhedato. Tattha
anya-e0103n:56_9: upanissayapatiṭṭhā lokiyā, itarā lokuttarā abhinditvā gahaṇe. Bhinditvā pana gahaṇe
anya-e0103n:56_10: yathā lokiyacittuppādesu sahajātānaṃ, purimapacchimānañca vasena nissayūpanissayapatiṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:56_11: sambhavati, evaṃ lokuttaresu heṭṭhimamaggaphalasīlavasena upanissayapatiṭṭhāpi sambhavati.
anya-e0103n:56_12: “Patiṭṭhāyā”ti ca padassa yadā upanissayapatiṭṭhā adhippetā, tadā “saddhaṃ upanissāyā”tiādīsu
anya-e0103n:56_13: viya purimakālakiriyāvasena attho veditabbo. Tenāha “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ
anya-e0103n:56_14: vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti. Yadā pana nissayapatiṭṭhā adhippetā, tadā
anya-e0103n:56_15: “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādīsu viya samānakālakiriyāvasena attho veditabbo. Sammāvācādayo
anya-e0103n:56_16: hi attanā sampayuttānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ sahajātavaseneva nissayapaccayā hontīti.
anya-e0103n:57_0: Narati netīti naro, puriso. Yathā hi paṭhamapakatibhūto satto, itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:57_1: puri ucce ṭhāne seti pavattatīti “puriso”ti vuccati, evaṃ nayanaṭṭhena “naro”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:57_2: Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ netuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, pageva itaro
anya-e0103n:57_3: itarāsaṃ. Narena yogato, narassa ayanti vā nārī, itthī. Sāpi cettha kāmaṃ taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanasamatthatā
anya-e0103n:57_4: atthi, padhānameva pana sattaṃ dassento “naro”ti āha yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
anya-e0103n:57_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avibhāgena puggalapariyāyo ayanti dassetuṃ “naroti satto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:57_6: Sapaññoti vipākabhūtāya saha paññāya pavattatīti sapañño. Tāya hi ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n:57_7: santānavasena bahulaṃ pavattamānāya ayaṃ satto savisesaṃ “sapañño”ti vattabbataṃ
anya-e0103n:57_8: arahati. Vipākapaññāpi hi santānavisesanena bhāvanāpaññuppattiyā upanissayo hoti
anya-e0103n:57_9: ahetukadvihetukānaṃ tadabhāvato. Sampajaññasaṅkhātāya ca taṃtaṃkiccakārikāya paññāya
anya-e0103n:57_10: vasena “sapañño”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nipaka-saddena pārihārikapaññā
anya-e0103n:57_12: kammajāya tihetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ paññāyāti evaṃ tihetuka-saddo paṭisandhi-saddena
anya-e0103n:57_13: sambandhitabbo, na paññā-saddena. Na hi paññā tihetukā atthi. Paṭisandhito pabhuti
anya-e0103n:57_14: pavattamānā paññā “paṭisandhiyaṃ paññā”ti vuttā taṃmūlakattā, na paṭisandhikkhaṇe pavattā eva.
anya-e0103n:58_0: Cinteti ārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti cittaṃ, samādhi. So hi sātisayaṃ upanijjhānakicco.
anya-e0103n:58_1: Na hi vitakkādayo vinā samādhinā tamatthaṃ sādhenti, samādhi pana tehi vināpi sādhetīti.
anya-e0103n:58_2: Paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena paccayehi citaṃ, tathā santānaṃ cinotītipi cittaṃ, samādhi.
anya-e0103n:58_3: Paṭhamajjhānādivasena cittavicittatāya, iddhividhādicittakaraṇena ca samādhi cittanti
anya-e0103n:58_4: vināpi paropadesenassa cittapariyāyo labbhateva. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana citta-saddo viññāṇe
anya-e0103n:58_5: niruḷhoti katvā vuttaṃ “cittasīsena hettha samādhi niddiṭṭho”ti. Yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi
anya-e0103n:58_6: jānātīti paññā. Sā yadipi kusalādibhedato bahuvidhā. “Bhāvaya”nti pana vacanato bhāvetabbā
anya-e0103n:58_7: idhādhippetāti taṃ dassetuṃ “vipassana”nti vuttaṃ. “Bhāvaya”nti ca idaṃ paccekaṃ
anya-e0103n:58_8: yojetabbaṃ “cittañca bhāvayaṃ, paññañca bhāvaya”nti. Tayidaṃ dvayaṃ kiṃ lokiyaṃ,
anya-e0103n:58_9: udāhu lokuttaranti? Lokuttaranti daṭṭhabbaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesato. Taṃ hi bhāvayamāno
anya-e0103n:58_10: ariyamaggakkhaṇe taṇhājaṭaṃ samucchedavasena vijaṭetīti vuccati, na lokiyaṃ. Nānantariyabhāvena
anya-e0103n:58_11: panettha lokiyāpi gahitāva honti lokiyasamathavipassanāya vinā tadabhāvato. Samathayānikassa
anya-e0103n:58_12: hi upacārappanāppabhedaṃ samādhiṃ itarassa khaṇikasamādhiṃ, ubhayesampi vimokkhamukhattayaṃ
anya-e0103n:58_13: vinā na kadācipi lokuttarādhigamo sambhavati. Tenāha “samādhiñceva vipassanañca bhāvayamāno”ti.
anya-e0103n:58_14: Tattha yadā lokiyā samathavipassanā adhippetā, tadā “bhāvaya”nti idaṃ bhāvanākiriyāya
anya-e0103n:58_15: hetubhāvakathanaṃ, bhāvanāhetūti attho. Taṃbhāvanāhetukā hi vijaṭanakiriyāti. Yadā
anya-e0103n:58_16: pana lokuttarā adhippetā, tadā kevalaṃ vattamānabhāvaniddeso. Tadubhayabhāvanāsamakālameva
anya-e0103n:59_0: “Ātāpī nipako”ti idaṃ yathāvuttabhāvanāya upakārakadhammakittanaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa
anya-e0103n:59_1: hi vīriyaṃ sati sampajaññanti ime tayo dhammā bahūpakārā. Vīriyūpatthaddhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:59_2: satisampajaññānupālitaṃ na paripatati, upari ca visesaṃ āvahati. Patiṭṭhāsiddhiyā
anya-e0103n:59_3: cettha saddhāsiddhi, saddhūpanissayattā sīlassa, vīriyādisiddhiyā ca. Na hi saddheyyavatthuṃ
anya-e0103n:59_4: asaddahantassa yathāvuttavīriyādayo sambhavanti, tathā samādhipi. Yathā hi hetubhāvato
anya-e0103n:59_5: vīriyādīhi saddhāsiddhi, evaṃ phalabhāvato tehi samādhisiddhi. Vīriyādīsu hi sampajjamānesu
anya-e0103n:59_6: samādhi sampannova hoti asamāhitassa tadabhāvato. Kathaṃ panettha satisiddhi? Nipakaggahaṇato.
anya-e0103n:59_7: Tikkhavisadabhāvappattā hi sati “nepakka”nti vuccati. Yathāha “paramena satinepakkena
anya-e0103n:59_8: samannāgato”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “nepakkaṃ paññā”ti ayamattho dassito. Taggahaṇeneva
anya-e0103n:59_9: satipi gahitāva hoti. Na hi sativirahitā paññā atthīti. Apare pana “sapañño”ti imināva
anya-e0103n:59_10: pārihārikapaññāpi gayhatīti “nipako”ti padassa “sato”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Yadipi kilesānaṃ
anya-e0103n:59_11: pahānaṃ ātāpanaṃ, taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva. Ātappasaddo viya pana ātāpasaddo
anya-e0103n:59_12: vīriyeyeva niruḷhoti āha “ātāpīti vīriyavā”ti. Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:59_13: abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā
anya-e0103n:59_14: vuccati, na aññe dhammā. Ātāpīti cāyamīkāro pasaṃsāya, atisayassa vā dīpako. Vīriyavāti
anya-e0103n:59_15: vā-saddopi tadattho eva daṭṭhabbo. Tena sammappadhānasamaṅgitā vuttā hoti. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:59_17: ādito vīriyārambhoti katvā, paritāpanaggahaṇena nikkamaparakkamadhātuyo sabbaso paṭipakkhato
anya-e0103n:59_18: nikkhantataṃ, uparūpari visesappattiñca upādāya. Nipayati visoseti paṭipakkhaṃ, tato
anya-e0103n:59_19: vā attānaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako, sampajāno. Kammaṭṭhānassa pariharaṇe niyuttāti pārihārikā.
anya-e0103n:60_0: Abhikkamādīni sabbakiccāni sātthakasampajaññādivasena paricchijja netīti sabbakiccapariṇāyikā.
anya-e0103n:60_1: Kammaṭṭhānassa vā uggaho paripucchā bhāvanārambho manasikāravidhi, tattha ca sakkaccakāritā
anya-e0103n:60_2: sātaccakāritā sappāyakāritā nimittakusalatā pahitattatā antarāasaṅkoco indriyasamattapaṭipādanā
anya-e0103n:60_3: vīriyasamatāpādanaṃ vīriyasamatāyojananti evamādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kiccānaṃ pariṇāyikā
anya-e0103n:60_4: sabbakiccapariṇāyikā. Bhayaṃ ikkhatīti bhikkhūti sādhāraṇato bhikkhulakkhaṇakathanena
anya-e0103n:60_5: paṭipattiyāva bhikkhubhāvo, na bhikkhakabhinnapaṭadharādibhāvenāti dasseti. Evaṃ
anya-e0103n:60_6: hi katakiccānaṃ sāmaṇerādīnaṃ, paṭipannānañca apabbajitānampi saṅgaho kato hoti.
anya-e0103n:60_7: Idha pana paṭipajjanakavasena attho veditabbo. Bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti vā
anya-e0103n:60_8: bhikkhu. So imaṃ vijaṭayeti yo naro sappañño sīle patiṭṭhāya ātāpī nipako cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:60_9: paññañca bhāvayanti vutto, so bhikkhu imaṃ taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭayeti sambandho. Idāni
anya-e0103n:60_10: tampi vijaṭanaṃ veḷugumbavijaṭanena upametvā dassetuṃ gāthāya yathāvutte sīlādidhamme
anya-e0103n:60_11: “iminā ca sīlenā”tiādinā paccāmasati. Tattha yasmā yogāvacarasantānagatā nānākkhaṇikā
anya-e0103n:60_12: missakā sīlādidhammā gāthāya gahitā, tasmā te ekaccaṃ gaṇhanto “chahi dhammehi samannāgato”ti
anya-e0103n:60_13: āha. Na hi te cha dhammā ekasmiṃ santāne ekasmiṃ khaṇe labbhanti. Yasmā ca puggalādhiṭṭhānena
anya-e0103n:60_14: gāthā bhāsitā, tasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānameva upamaṃ dassento “seyyathāpi nāma puriso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:60_15: Tattha sunisitanti suṭṭhu nisitaṃ, ativiya tikhiṇanti attho. Satthassa nisānasilāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:60_16: nisitatarabhāvakaraṇaṃ, bāhubalena cassa ukkhipananti ubhayampetaṃ atthāpannaṃ katvā
anya-e0103n:60_17: upamā vuttāti tadubhayaṃ upameyye dassento “samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ…pe… paññāhatthena
anya-e0103n:60_18: ukkhipitvā”ti āha. Samādhiguṇena hi paññāya tikkhabhāvo. Tenāha bhagavā “samāhito
anya-e0103n:60_19: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti. Vīriyañcassā upatthambhakaṃ paggaṇhanato. Vijaṭeyyāti vijaṭetuṃ
anya-e0103n:60_20: sakkuṇeyya. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya hi vattamānāya yogāvacaro taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭetuṃ
anya-e0103n:60_21: samattho nāma. Vijaṭanaṃ cettha samucchedavasena pahānanti āha “sañchindeyya sampadāleyyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:60_22: Dakkhiṇaṃ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo, aggo ca so dakkhiṇeyyo cāti aggadakkhiṇeyyo, aggā
anya-e0103n:60_23: vā dakkhiṇā aggadakkhiṇā, taṃ arahatīti aggadakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0103n:61_0: 5. Tatrāti tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ. Ayanti “naro”ti ca “bhikkhū”ti ca vutto yogāvacaro. Puna
anya-e0103n:61_1: tatrāti tassaṃ paññāyaṃ. Assāti bhikkhuno. Kattari cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, anenāti attho.
anya-e0103n:61_2: Karaṇīyaṃ natthi visesādhānassa tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya abhāvato. Tenāha “purimakammānubhāveneva
anya-e0103n:61_3: hissa sā siddhā”ti. Tenāti yoginā. Bhāvanāyaṃ satatapavattitavīriyatāya sātaccakārinā.
anya-e0103n:61_4: Paññāvasenāti yathāvuttanepakkasaṅkhātapaññāvasena. Yaṃ kiñci kattabbaṃ, tassa sabbassa
anya-e0103n:61_5: sampajānavaseneva karaṇasīlo, tattha vā sampajānakāro etassa atthi, sampajānassa
anya-e0103n:61_6: vā asammohassa kārako uppādakoti sampajānakārī, tena sampajānakārinā. Atrāti assaṃ
anya-e0103n:61_7: gāthāyaṃ. Sīlādisampādane vīriyassa tesaṃ aṅgabhāvato taṃ visuṃ aggahetvā “sīlasamādhipaññāmukhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:62_0: “Visuddhimaggaṃ dassetī”ti avibhāgato desanāya piṇḍatthaṃ vatvā puna taṃ vibhāgato
anya-e0103n:62_1: dassetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ettāvatāti ettakāya desanāya. Sikkhāti sikkhitabbaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:62_2: sikkhā. Sikkhanaṃ cettha āsevanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sīlādidhammehi saṃvaraṇādivasena āsevanto
anya-e0103n:62_3: te sikkhatīti vuccati. Sāsananti paṭipattisāsanaṃ. Upanissayo balavakāraṇaṃ. Vajjanaṃ
anya-e0103n:62_4: anupagamanaṃ. Sevanā bhāvanā. Paṭipakkhoti pahāyakapaṭipakkho. Yadipi gāthāyaṃ “sīle”ti
anya-e0103n:62_5: sāmaññato vuttaṃ, na “adhisīle”ti. Taṃ pana taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanassa patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ adhippetanti
anya-e0103n:62_6: āha “sīlena adhisīlasikkhā pakāsitā”ti. Bhavagāmi hi sīlaṃ sīlameva, vibhavagāmi
anya-e0103n:62_7: sīlaṃ adhisīlasikkhā. Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti. Esa nayo sesasikkhāsupi.
anya-e0103n:63_0: Sīlenāti adhisīlasikkhābhūtena sīlena. Taṃ hi anaññasādhāraṇatāya sāsanassa ādikalyāṇataṃ
anya-e0103n:63_1: pakāseti, na yamaniyamādimattaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ, sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti
anya-e0103n:63_2: ca. Kusalānanti maggakusalānaṃ. Kusalānanti vā anavajjānaṃ. Tena ariyaphaladhammānampi
anya-e0103n:63_3: saṅgaho siddho hoti. Sabbapāpassa akaraṇanti sabbassāpi sāvajjassa akiriyā anajjhāpajjanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:63_4: Etena cārittavārittabhedassa sabbassa sīlassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ hoti. Kattabbākaraṇampi
anya-e0103n:63_5: hi sāvajjamevāti. Ādivacanatoti gāthāyaṃ vuttasamādhipaññānaṃ ādimhi vacanato. Ādibhāvo
anya-e0103n:63_6: cassa tammūlakattā uttarimanussadhammānaṃ. Ādīnaṃ vā vacanaṃ ādivacanaṃ. Ādisaddena
anya-e0103n:63_7: cettha “sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, vimutti ca anuttarā”ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:63_9: etena na kevalaṃ sīlassa kalyāṇatāva vibhāvitā, atha kho ādibhāvopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:63_10: Tathā hissa sutte avippaṭisārādīnaṃ vimuttiñāṇapariyosānānaṃ paramparapaccayatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:63_11: Samādhināti adhicittasikkhābhūtena samādhinā. Sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ saṅgahetvā pavattāya
anya-e0103n:63_12: gāthāya ādipadena ādimhi paṭipajjitabbassa sīlassa, tatiyapadena pariyosāne paṭipajjitabbāya
anya-e0103n:63_13: paññāya gahitattā majjhe paṭipajjitabbo samādhi pārisesato dutiyapadena gayhatīti
anya-e0103n:63_14: “kusalassa upasampadātiādivacanato hi samādhi sāsanassa majjhe”ti vuttaṃ, na kusalasaddassa
anya-e0103n:63_16: samādhissa iddhividhādiguṇāvahattaṃ, aggamaggapaññāya adhigatāya yadatthaṃ pabbajati,
anya-e0103n:63_17: taṃ pariyositanti paññā sāsanassa pariyosānaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā “sikkhānisaṃsamidaṃ,
anya-e0103n:63_18: bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati saddhādhipateyyaṃ paññuttaraṃ vimuttisāra”nti. Sakaṃ
anya-e0103n:63_19: cittaṃ sacittaṃ, sacittassa sabbaso kilesānaṃ samucchindanena visodhanaṃ sacittapariyodāpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:63_20: Evaṃ pana paññākicce matthakappatte uttari karaṇīyābhāvato sāsanassa paññuttaratā
anya-e0103n:63_21: veditabbā. Tādibhāvāvahanatoti yādiso iṭṭhesu, lābhādīsu ca anunayābhāvato, tādiso
anya-e0103n:63_22: aniṭṭhesu, alābhādīsu ca paṭighābhāvato. Tato eva vā yādiso anāpāthagatesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu,
anya-e0103n:63_23: tādiso āpāthagatesupīti tādī. Tassa bhāvo tādibhāvo, tassa āvahanato. Vātenāti vātahetu.
anya-e0103n:63_24: Na samīratīti na calati. Na samiñjantīti na phandanti, kuto calananti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:64_0: Tathāti yathā sīlādayo adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ pakāsakā, tathā tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayassāti
anya-e0103n:64_1: tesaṃ pakāsanākārūpasaṃhārattho tathā-saddo. Yasmā sīlaṃ visujjhamānaṃ satisampajaññabalena,
anya-e0103n:64_2: kammassakatañāṇabalena ca saṃkilesamalato visujjhati pāripūriñca gacchati, tasmā
anya-e0103n:64_3: sīlasampadā sijjhamānā upanissayasampattibhāvena satibalaṃ, ñāṇabalañca paccupaṭṭhapetīti
anya-e0103n:64_4: tassā vijjattayūpanissayatā veditabbā sabhāgahetusampādanato. Satinepakkena hi pubbenivāsavijjāsiddhi,
anya-e0103n:64_7: tatiyavijjāsiddhi. Puretaraṃ siddhānaṃ samādhipaññānaṃ pāripūriṃ vinā sīlassa āsavakkhayañāṇūpanissayatā
anya-e0103n:64_8: sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavehi dīpetabbā. Samādhipaññā viya abhiññāpaṭisambhidānaṃ sīlaṃ
anya-e0103n:64_9: na sabhāgahetūti katvā vuttaṃ “na tato para”nti. “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti
anya-e0103n:64_10: vacanato samādhisampadā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo. Paññā viya paṭisambhidānaṃ samādhi
anya-e0103n:64_11: na sabhāgahetūti vuttaṃ “na tato para”nti. “Yogā ve jāyate bhūrī”ti vacanato pubbayogena,
anya-e0103n:64_14: visesassa abhāvato, tassā ca paṭisambhidāpabhedassa ekantikakāraṇato heṭṭhā viya
anya-e0103n:64_15: “na tato para”nti avatvā “na aññena kāraṇenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:65_0: Ettha ca “sīlasampattiñhi nissāyā”ti vuttattā yassa samādhivijambhanabhūtā anavasesā
anya-e0103n:65_1: cha abhiññā na ijjhanti, tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena na samādhisampadā atthīti.
anya-e0103n:65_2: Satipi vijjānaṃ abhiññekadesabhāve sīlasampattisamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā gahitā.
anya-e0103n:65_3: Yathā hi paññāsampattisamudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva
anya-e0103n:65_4: ijjhanti, maggakkhaṇe eva tāsaṃ paṭilabhitabbato, evaṃ sīlasampattisamudāgatā tisso
anya-e0103n:65_5: vijjā samādhisampattisamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhantīti
anya-e0103n:65_6: maggādhigameneva tāsaṃ adhigamo veditabbo. Paccekabuddhānaṃ, sammāsambuddhānañca
anya-e0103n:65_8: Vinayasuttābhidhammesu sammāpaṭipattiyā tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayatāpi yathāvuttavidhinā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:66_0: Sampannasīlassa kāmasevanābhāvato sīlena paṭhamantavivajjanaṃ vuttaṃ. Yebhuyyena
anya-e0103n:66_1: hi sattā kāmahetu pāṇātipātādivasenāpi asuddhapayogā honti. Jhānasukhalābhino kāyakilamathassa
anya-e0103n:66_2: sambhavo eva natthīti samādhinā dutiyantavivajjanaṃ vuttaṃ jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyattā.
anya-e0103n:66_3: Paññāyāti maggapaññāya. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi ekaṃsato ariyamaggova majjhimā paṭipatti
anya-e0103n:66_4: nāma. Evaṃ santepi lokiyapaññāvasenapi antadvayavivajjanaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:67_0: Sīlaṃ taṃsamaṅgino kāmasugatīsuyeva nibbattāpanato catūhi apāyehi vimuttiyā kāraṇanti
anya-e0103n:67_1: āha “sīlena apāyasamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito hotī”ti. Na hi pāṇātipātādipaṭivirati
anya-e0103n:67_2: duggatiparikilesaṃ āvahati. Samādhi taṃsamaṅgino mahaggatabhūmiyaṃyeva nibbattāpanena
anya-e0103n:67_4: hotī”ti. Na hi kāmāvacarakammassa anubalappadāyīnaṃ kāmacchandādīnaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ
anya-e0103n:67_5: jhānaṃ kāmadhātuparikilesāvahaṃ hoti. Na cettha upacārajjhānaṃ nidassetabbaṃ, appanāsamādhissa
anya-e0103n:67_6: adhippetattā. Nāpi “sīleneva atikkamitabbassa apāyabhavassa samādhinā atikkamitabbatā”ti
anya-e0103n:67_7: vacanokāso. Sugatibhavampi atikkamantassa duggatisamatikkamane kā kathāti. Sabbabhavasamatikkamanupāyoti
anya-e0103n:67_8: kāmabhavādīnaṃ navannampi bhavānaṃ samatikkamanupāyo sīlasamādhīhi atikkantāpi bhavā
anya-e0103n:67_9: anatikkantā eva, kāraṇassa apahīnattā. Paññāya panassa suppahīnattā te samatikkantā eva.
anya-e0103n:68_0: Tadaṅgappahānavasenāti dīpālokeneva tamassa puññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena
anya-e0103n:68_1: tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānavasena. Samādhinā vikkhambhanappahānavasenāti upacārappanābhedena
anya-e0103n:68_2: samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahāreneva jalatale sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:68_3: pahānavasena. Paññāyāti ariyamaggapaññāya. Samucchedappahānavasenāti catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ
anya-e0103n:68_4: bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā vuttassa
anya-e0103n:69_0: Kilesānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhoti saṃkilesadhammānaṃ, kammakilesānaṃ vā yo kāyavacīdvāresu
anya-e0103n:69_1: vītikkamo ajjhācāro, tassa paṭipakkho sīlena pakāsito hoti, avītikkamasabhāvattā
anya-e0103n:69_2: sīlassa. Okāsādānavasena kilesānaṃ citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:69_3: Taṃ samādhi vikkhambhetīti āha “samādhinā pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī”ti,
anya-e0103n:69_4: samādhissa pariyuṭṭhānappahāyakattā. Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanato kāraṇalābhe
anya-e0103n:69_5: uppattirahā anusayā, te pana anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhā uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo
anya-e0103n:69_6: satta kilesā veditabbā. Te ariyamaggapaññāya sabbaso pahīyantīti āha “paññāya anusayapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:70_0: Kāyaduccaritādi duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kilesehi vā dūsitaṃ caritanti duccaritaṃ, tameva
anya-e0103n:70_1: yattha uppannaṃ, taṃ santānaṃ saṃkileseti vibādhati, upatāpeti cāti saṃkileso, tassa
anya-e0103n:70_2: visodhanaṃ sīlena tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa. Taṇhāsaṃkilesassa
anya-e0103n:70_3: visodhanaṃ vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkhattā samādhissa, taṇhāya
anya-e0103n:70_4: cassa ujuvipaccanikabhāvato. Diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa visodhanaṃ samucchedavasena pahānaṃ
anya-e0103n:70_5: anusayapaṭipakkhattā paññāya, diṭṭhigatānañca ayāthāvagāhīnaṃ yāthāvagāhiniyā paññāya
anya-e0103n:71_0: Kāraṇanti upanissayapaccayo. Sīlesu paripūrakārīti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtattā
anya-e0103n:71_2: khuddānukhuddakānaṃ āpajjane sahasāva tehi vuṭṭhānena sīlesu yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ paripūraṃ
anya-e0103n:71_3: samatthaṃ karotīti sīlesu paripūrakārī. Tathā sakadāgāmīti “sīlesu paripūrakārī”ti
anya-e0103n:71_4: etaṃ upasaṃharati tathā-saddena. Ete hi dve ariyā samādhipāripanthikānaṃ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ
anya-e0103n:71_5: paññāpāripanthikassa saccapaṭicchādakamohassa sabbaso asamūhatattā samādhiṃ, paññañca
anya-e0103n:71_6: bhāventāpi samādhipaññāsu yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti
anya-e0103n:71_7: samādhismiṃ, paññāya ca mattaso kārino “sīlesu paripūrakārino”icceva vuccanti. Anāgāmī
anya-e0103n:71_8: pana kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ samucchinnattā samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī. Arahā sabbaso sammohassa
anya-e0103n:73_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ mattaso kārī, paññāya
anya-e0103n:73_1: mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni, tāni āpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
anya-e0103n:73_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā. Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni
anya-e0103n:73_3: ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni, tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti ṭhitasīlo ca,
anya-e0103n:73_4: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti
anya-e0103n:73_5: avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu…pe…
anya-e0103n:73_6: so tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti. Sakideva
anya-e0103n:73_7: imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī
anya-e0103n:73_8: hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
anya-e0103n:73_9: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ…pe… anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā. Idha pana, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n:73_10: bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya paripūrakārī.
anya-e0103n:73_11: So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So āsavānaṃ khayā…pe…
anya-e0103n:74_0: “Katha”nti pucchitvā sikkhādike vibhajitvā vuttamevatthaṃ nigametuṃ “eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:74_1: Tattha aññe cāti tayo vivekā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni, tīṇi indriyānīti
anya-e0103n:74_2: evamādayo, sikkhattikādīhi aññe ca guṇattikā. Evarūpāti yādisakā sikkhattikādayo
anya-e0103n:75_0: Ettha hi vivaṭṭasannissitassa sīlassa idhādhippetattā sīlena kāyaviveko pakāsito
anya-e0103n:75_1: hoti, samādhinā cittaviveko, paññāya upadhiviveko. Tathā sīlena adoso kusalamūlaṃ
anya-e0103n:75_2: pakāsitaṃ hoti, titikkhappadhānatāya, aparūpaghātasabhāvatāya ca sīlassa. Samādhinā
anya-e0103n:75_3: alobho kusalamūlaṃ, lobhapaṭipakkhato, alobhapadhānatāya ca samādhissa. Paññāya pana
anya-e0103n:75_4: amohoyeva. Sīlena ca animittavimokkhamukhaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. Adosappadhānaṃ hi sīlasampadaṃ
anya-e0103n:75_5: nissāya dose ādīnavadassino aniccānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, aniccānupassanā ca
anya-e0103n:75_7: Alobhappadhānaṃ hi kāmanissaraṇaṃ samādhisampadaṃ nissāya kāmesu ādīnavadassino dukkhānupassanā
anya-e0103n:75_8: sukheneva ijjhati, dukkhānupassanā ca appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ. Paññāsampadaṃ nissāya
anya-e0103n:75_9: anattānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, anattānupassanā ca suññatavimokkhamukhaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0103n:75_10: sīlena anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. Taṃ hi sīlesu paripūrakārino aṭṭhamakassa
anya-e0103n:75_11: indriyaṃ. Samādhinā aññindriyaṃ. Taṃ hi ukkaṃsagataṃ samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino anāgāmino,
anya-e0103n:75_12: aggamaggaṭṭhassa ca indriyaṃ. Paññāya aññātāvindriyaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. Taduppattiyā
anya-e0103n:75_13: hi arahā paññāya paripūrakārīti. Iminā nayena aññe ca evarūpā guṇattikā sīlādīhi pakāsetabbā.
anya-e0103n:78_0: 6. Evanti vuttappakārena. Anekaguṇasaṅgāhakenāti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ, aññesañca anekesaṃ
anya-e0103n:78_1: guṇānaṃ saṅgāhakena. Sīlasamādhipaññāmukhenāti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādīsu viya
anya-e0103n:78_2: vipassanāmattādimukhena saṅkhepato adesetvā sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desitopi, sattatiṃsāyapi
anya-e0103n:78_3: vā bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ visuddhimaggantogadhattā tattha sīlasamādhipaññā mukhaṃ
anya-e0103n:78_4: pamukhaṃ katvā desitopi. Etena sīlasamādhipaññāsu avasesabodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ sabhāvato,
anya-e0103n:78_5: upakārato ca antogadhabhāvo dīpitoti veditabbaṃ. Atisaṅkhepadesitoyeva hoti sabhāvavibhāgādito
anya-e0103n:78_6: avibhāvitattā. Nālanti na pariyattaṃ na samatthaṃ. Sabbesanti nātisaṅkhepanātivitthārarucīnampi,
anya-e0103n:78_7: vipañcitaññuneyyānampi vā. Saṅkhepadesanā hi saṃkhittarucīnaṃ, ugghaṭitaññūnaṃyeva
anya-e0103n:78_8: ca upakārāya hoti, na panitaresaṃ. Assa visuddhimaggassa. Pucchanaṭṭhena pañhā, kiriyā
anya-e0103n:78_9: karaṇaṃ kammaṃ, pañhāva kammaṃ pañhākammaṃ, pucchanapayogo.
anya-e0103n:79_0: Kiṃ sīlanti sarūpapucchā. Kenaṭṭhena sīlanti kena atthena sīlanti vuccati, “sīla”nti
anya-e0103n:79_1: padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyaṃ nissāya pavattanti attho. Tayidaṃ sīlaṃ sabhāvato, kiccato,
anya-e0103n:79_2: upaṭṭhānākārato, āsannakāraṇato ca kathaṃ jānitabbanti āha “kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti.
anya-e0103n:79_3: Paṭipatti nāma diṭṭhānisaṃse eva hotīti āha “kimānisaṃsa”nti. Katividhanti pabhedapucchā.
anya-e0103n:79_4: Vibhāgavantānaṃ hi sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti. Vodānaṃ visuddhi.
anya-e0103n:79_5: Sā ca saṃkilesamalavimutti. Taṃ icchantena yasmā upāyakosallatthinā anupāyakosallaṃ
anya-e0103n:79_6: viya saṃkileso jānitabboti āha “ko cassa saṃkileso”ti.
anya-e0103n:80_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ, tassa vā pañhākammassa. Vissajjananti vivaraṇaṃ. Pucchito hi attho
anya-e0103n:80_1: avibhāvitattā nigūḷho muṭṭhiyaṃ kato viya tiṭṭhati. Tassa vivaraṇaṃ vissajjanaṃ vibhūtabhāvakāraṇato.
anya-e0103n:80_2: Pāṇātipātādīhīti ettha pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tassa saraseneva
anya-e0103n:80_3: patanasabhāvassa antare eva ativa pātanaṃ atipāto, saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ
anya-e0103n:80_4: pātananti attho, atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto, pāṇaghāto.
anya-e0103n:80_5: Ādisaddena adinnādānādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tehi pāṇātipātādīhi dussīlyakammehi. Viramantassāti
anya-e0103n:80_6: samādānavirativasena, sampattavirativasena ca oramantassa. Vattapaṭipattinti upajjhāyavattādivattakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:80_7: Cetanādayo dhammāti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ pāḷivasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi
anya-e0103n:80_8: vuttaṃ. Tattha cetayatīti cetanā, attanā sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃ ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti
anya-e0103n:80_9: attho. Cetanāya anukūlavaseneva hi taṃsampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇe pavattanti. Cetanā
anya-e0103n:80_10: kāmaṃ kusalattikasādhāraṇā, idha pana sīlacetanā adhippetāti katvā “kusalā”ti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:80_11: Cetasi niyuttaṃ cetasikaṃ, cittasampayuttanti attho. Cetanāya satipi cetasikatte
anya-e0103n:80_12: “cetanā sīla”nti visuṃ gahitattā tadaññameva viratianabhijjhādikaṃ cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ
anya-e0103n:80_13: daṭṭhabbaṃ gobalībaddañāyena. Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro. Yathā akusalā dhammā citte na otaranti,
anya-e0103n:80_14: tathā pidahanaṃ. Avītikkamo vītikkamassa paṭipakkhabhūtā avītikkamavasena pavattacittacetasikā.
anya-e0103n:80_15: Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāmātiādi yathāvuttassa suttapadassa vivaraṇaṃ. Viramantassa
anya-e0103n:80_16: cetanāti viratisampayuttaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ cetanamāha. Pūrentassa cetanāti vattapaṭipattiāyūhinī.
anya-e0103n:80_17: Viramantassa viratīti viratiyā padhānabhāvaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:81_0: Ettha hi yadā “tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā kusalaṃ kāyakamma”ntiādi vacanato
anya-e0103n:81_1: pāṇātipātādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā tabbirativisiṭṭhā cetanā tathāpavattā padhānabhāvena
anya-e0103n:81_2: pāṇātipātādipaṭiviratisādhikā hoti, tadā taṃsampayuttā viratianabhijjhādayo ca cetanāpakkhikā
anya-e0103n:81_3: vā, abbohārikā vāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya cetanāsīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Yadā pana pāṇātipātādīhi
anya-e0103n:81_4: saṅkocaṃ āpajjantassa tato viramaṇākārena pavattamānā cetanāvisiṭṭhā virati, anabhijjhādayo
anya-e0103n:81_5: ca tattha tattha padhānabhāvena kiccasādhikā honti, tadā taṃsampayuttā cetanā viratiādipakkhikā
anya-e0103n:81_6: vā hoti, abbohārikā vāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya cetasikasīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:82_0: Idāni sutte āgatanayena kusalakammapathavasena cetanācetasikasīlāni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:82_1: “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pajahantassāti samādānavasena “ito paṭṭhāya na karissāmī”ti
anya-e0103n:82_2: sampattavatthukānipi anajjhācaraṇena pajahantassa. Satta kammapathacetanāti pāṇātipātādipahānasādhikā
anya-e0103n:82_3: paṭipāṭiyā satta kusalakammapathacetanā. Abhijjhādivasena yaṃ paradāragamanādi karīyati,
anya-e0103n:82_4: tassa pahāyakā anabhijjhādayo sīlanti āha “cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma anabhijjhā…pe… sammādiṭṭhidhammā”ti.
anya-e0103n:82_5: Yathā hi abhijjhābyāpādavasena micchācārapāṇātipātādayo karīyanti, evaṃ micchādiṭṭhivasenāpi
anya-e0103n:82_6: te puttamukhadassanādiatthaṃ karīyanti. Tesañca pajahanakā anabhijjhādayoti. Pātimokkhasaṃvaro
anya-e0103n:82_8: indriyānaṃ ārakkhā, sā ca tathāpavattā satiyeva. Ñāṇasaṃvaro paññā. Khantisaṃvaro
anya-e0103n:82_9: adhivāsanā, sā ca tathāpavattā adosapadhānā khandhā, adoso eva vā. Vīriyasaṃvaro
anya-e0103n:82_11: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n:83_1: vatvā “paññāyete pidhiyyare”ti vacanena sotānaṃ saṃvaro pidahanaṃ samucchedanaṃ ñāṇanti viññāyati.
anya-e0103n:84_0: Idamatthikataṃ manasi katvā yena ñāṇena yoniso paccavekkhitvā paccayā paṭisevīyanti.
anya-e0103n:84_1: Taṃ paccayapaṭisevanampi ñāṇasabhāvattā ettheva ñāṇasaṃvare eva samodhānaṃ saṅgahaṃ
anya-e0103n:84_2: gacchati. Khamati adhivāsetīti khamo. Uppannanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe jātaṃ nibbattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:84_3: Kāmavitakkanti kāmūpasaṃhitaṃ vitakkaṃ. Nādhivāsetīti cittaṃ āropetvā abbhantare
anya-e0103n:84_4: na vāseti. Ājīvapārisuddhipīti buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṃ micchājīvaṃ pahāya anavajjena paccayapariyesanena
anya-e0103n:84_5: sijjhanakaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlampi ettheva vīriyasaṃvare eva samodhānaṃ gacchati
anya-e0103n:84_6: vīriyasādhanattā. Ettha ca yathā ñāṇaṃ taṇhādisotānaṃ pavattinivāraṇato pidahanaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:84_7: saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro ca, parato pavattanakaguṇānaṃ ādhārādibhāvato sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ,
anya-e0103n:84_8: evaṃ khanti anadhivāsanena uppajjanakakilesānaṃ adhivāsanena saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro
anya-e0103n:84_9: ca, khamanahetu uppajjanakaguṇānaṃ ādhārādibhāvato sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ, vīriyaṃ vinodetabbānaṃ
anya-e0103n:84_10: pāpadhammānaṃ vinodanena saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro ca, vinodanahetu uppajjanakaguṇānaṃ
anya-e0103n:84_11: ādhārādibhāvato sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti veditabbaṃ. Yathā pana pātimokkhasīlādi tassa
anya-e0103n:84_12: tassa pāpadhammassa pavattituṃ appadānavasena saṃvaraṇaṃ pidahanaṃ, taṃ upādāya saṃvaro,
anya-e0103n:84_13: evaṃ asamādinnasīlassa āgatavatthuto viramaṇampīti āha “yā ca pāpabhīrukānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0103n:84_14: saṃvarasīlanti veditabba”nti. Na vītikkamati etenāti avītikkamo. Tathāpavatto kusalacittuppādo.
anya-e0103n:85_0: 7. Avasesesu pana pañhesu. Samādhānaṃ saṇṭhapanaṃ. Dussīlyavasena hi pavattā kāyakammādayo
anya-e0103n:85_1: sampati, āyatiñca ahitadukkhāvahā, na sammā ṭhapitāti asaṇṭhapitā vippakiṇṇā visaṭā
anya-e0103n:85_2: ca nāma honti, susīlyavasena pana pavattā tabbipariyāyato saṇṭhapitā avippakiṇṇā
anya-e0103n:85_3: avisaṭā ca nāma honti yathā taṃ okkhittacakkhutā abāhuppacālanādi. Tenāha “kāyakammādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:85_4: susīlyavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho”ti. Etena samādhikiccato sīlanaṃ viseseti. Tassa
anya-e0103n:85_5: hi samādhānaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ avikkhepahetutā. Idaṃ kāyakammādīnaṃ saṇṭhapanaṃ
anya-e0103n:85_6: saṃyamanaṃ. Upadhāraṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ mūlabhāvo. Tathā hissa ādicaraṇādibhāvo vutto.
anya-e0103n:85_7: Tena pathavīdhātukiccato sīlanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. Sā hi sahajātarūpadhammānaṃ sandhāraṇavasena
anya-e0103n:85_8: pavattati. Idaṃ pana anavajjadhammānaṃ mūlādhiṭṭhānabhāvena. Tenāha “kusalānaṃ dhammāna”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:85_9: Tattha kusaladhammā nāma sapubbabhāgā mahaggatānuttarā dhammā. Aññe pana ācariyā.
anya-e0103n:85_10: Siraṭṭhoti yathā sirasi chinne sabbo attabhāvo vinassati, evaṃ sīle bhinne sabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:85_11: guṇasarīraṃ vinassati. Tasmā tassa uttamaṅgaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho. “Siro sīsa”nti vā vattabbe
anya-e0103n:85_12: niruttinayena “sīla”nti vuttanti adhippāyo. Sītalaṭṭho pariḷāhavūpasamanaṭṭho. Tena
anya-e0103n:85_13: ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā niruttinayeneva “sīla”nti vuttanti dasseti. Tathā hidaṃ payogasampāditaṃ
anya-e0103n:85_14: sabbakilesapariḷāhavūpasamakaraṃ hoti. Evamādināti ādi-saddena sayanti akusalā etasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:85_15: sati apaviṭṭhā hontīti sīlaṃ, supanti vā tena vihatussāhāni sabbaduccaritānīti sīlaṃ,
anya-e0103n:85_16: sabbesaṃ vā kusaladhammānaṃ pavesārahasālāti sīlanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:86_0: 8. “Sīlanaṭṭhena sīla”nti pubbe saddatthuddhārena pakāsitopi bhāvattho evāti āha
anya-e0103n:86_1: “sīlanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ tassā”ti. Na hi tassa cetanādibhedabhinnassa anavasesato saṅgāhako
anya-e0103n:86_2: tato añño attho atthi, yo lakkhaṇabhāvena vucceyya. Nanu ca anekabhedasaṅgāhakaṃ
anya-e0103n:86_3: sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ nāma siyā, na visesalakkhaṇanti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “sanidassanattaṃ
anya-e0103n:87_0: Yathā hi nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ visesalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:87_1: tadaññadhammāsādhāraṇato. Na aniccatādi viya, ruppanaṃ viya vā sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:87_2: evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiṃ panetaṃ sanidassanattaṃ nāma? Daṭṭhabbatā cakkhuviññāṇassa
anya-e0103n:87_3: gocarabhāvo. Tassa pana rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ
anya-e0103n:87_4: aññaṃ viya katvā saha nidassanena sanidassananti vuccati. Dhammasabhāvasāmaññena
anya-e0103n:87_5: hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro sabhāvo, so aññaṃ viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto.
anya-e0103n:87_6: Evaṃ hi atthavisesāvabodho hotīti. Atha vā “saha nidassanenā”ti ettha tabbhāvattho
anya-e0103n:88_2: vā sampajjanakaṃ. Lakkhaṇādīsūti lakkhaṇarasādīsu vuccamānesu kiccameva, sampatti
anya-e0103n:88_3: vā rasoti vuccati, na rasāyatanarasādīti adhippāyo. Keci pana “kiccamevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:88_4: tassa itararasato balavabhāvadassanatthanti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, kiccameva,
anya-e0103n:88_5: sampatti eva vā rasoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n:89_0: Soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānanti kāyādīhi sucibhāvena paccupaṭṭhāti. Gahaṇabhāvanti gahetabbabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0103n:89_1: Tena upaṭṭhānākāraṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ, phalaṭṭhena pana avippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:89_2: samādhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Sīlaṃ hi sampatiyeva avippaṭisāraṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti, paramparāya
anya-e0103n:89_3: samādhiṃ. Imassa pana ānisaṃsaphalassa ānisaṃsakathāyaṃ vakkhamānattā idha aggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:89_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci pana phalassa anicchitattā idha aggahaṇanti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:89_5: phalassa anekavidhattā, lokiyādisīlassāpi vibhajiyamānattā. Tathā hi vakkhati “nissitānissitavasenā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:89_6: Yathā pathavīdhātuyā kammādi dūrakāraṇaṃ, sesabhūtattayaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ, yathā ca
anya-e0103n:89_7: vatthassa tantavāyaturivemasalākādi dūrakāraṇaṃ, tantavo āsannakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ sīlassa
anya-e0103n:89_8: saddhammassavanādi dūrakāraṇaṃ, hiriottappamassa āsannakāraṇanti dassento āha “hirottappañca
anya-e0103n:89_9: panā”tiādi. Hirottappe hītiādi tassa āsannakāraṇabhāvasādhanaṃ. Tattha uppajjati
anya-e0103n:91_0: 9. Avippaṭisārādīti ettha vippaṭisārapaṭipakkho kusalacittuppādo avippaṭisāro. So
anya-e0103n:91_1: pana visesato “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me suparisuddhaṃ sīla”nti
anya-e0103n:91_2: attano sīlassa paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattoti veditabbo. Ādi-saddena pāmojjabhogasampattikittisaddādiṃ
anya-e0103n:91_4: Avippaṭisārānisaṃsānīti avippaṭisāruddayāni. Etena avippaṭisāro nāma sīlassa uddayamattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:91_5: saṃvaḍḍhitassa rukkhassa chāyāpupphasadisaṃ. Añño eva panānena nipphādetabbo samādhiādiguṇoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:92_0: Sīlavato sīlasampadāyāti parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā sīlassa sampādanena sīlavato,
anya-e0103n:92_1: tāya eva sīlasampadāya. Appamādādhikaraṇanti appamādakāraṇā. Bhogakkhandhanti bhogarāsiṃ.
anya-e0103n:92_2: Kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchatīti “itipi sīlavā, itipi kalyāṇadhammo”ti sundaro
anya-e0103n:92_3: thutighoso uṭṭhahati, lokaṃ pattharati. Visāradoti attani kiñci garahitabbaṃ upavaditabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:92_4: apassanto vigatasārajjo nibbhayo. Amaṅkubhūtoti avilakkho. Asammūḷhoti “akataṃ vata
anya-e0103n:92_5: me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā vippaṭisārābhāvato, kusalakammādīnaṃyeva ca tadā upaṭṭhānato
anya-e0103n:92_6: amūḷho pasannamānaso eva kālaṃkaroti. Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā,
anya-e0103n:92_7: jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cutito uddhaṃ. Sugatinti sundaraṃ gatiṃ.
anya-e0103n:92_8: Tena manussagatipi saṅgayhati. Sagganti devagatiṃ. Sā hi rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu
anya-e0103n:92_9: aggoti saggo, lokiyati ettha uḷāraṃ puññaphalanti lokoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0103n:93_0: Ākaṅkheyya ceti yadi iccheyya. Piyo ca assanti piyāyitabbo piyacakkhūhi passitabbo
anya-e0103n:93_1: pemaniyo bhaveyyanti attho. Manāpoti sabrahmacārīnaṃ manavaḍḍhanako, tesaṃ vā manena
anya-e0103n:93_2: pattabbo, mettacittena pharitabboti vuttaṃ hoti. Garūti garuṭṭhāniyo pāsāṇachattasadiso.
anya-e0103n:93_3: Bhāvanīyoti “addhā ayamāyasmā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passatī”ti sambhāvanīyo. Sīlesvevassa
anya-e0103n:93_4: paripūrakārīti catupārisuddhisīlesu eva paripūrakārī assa, anūnakārī paripūraṇākārena
anya-e0103n:93_5: samannāgato bhaveyya. “Ādinā nayenā”ti etena “ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno
anya-e0103n:93_6: vipassanāya samannāgato brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti evamādike sīlathomanasuttāgate sattarasa
anya-e0103n:94_0: Idāni na kevalamime eva avippaṭisārādayo, atha kho aññepi bahū sīlānisaṃsā vijjantīti
anya-e0103n:94_1: te dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha sāsaneti imasmiṃ sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇāvahe
anya-e0103n:94_2: satthusāsane. Ācārakulaputtānaṃ yaṃ sīlaṃ vinā patiṭṭhā avaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, tassa
anya-e0103n:94_3: evaṃ mahānubhāvassa sīlassa ānisaṃsānaṃ paricchedaṃ parimāṇaṃ ko vade ko vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyāti
anya-e0103n:94_4: attho. Etena sabbesaṃyeva lokiyalokuttarānaṃ guṇānaṃ sīlameva mūlabhūtanti dassetvā
anya-e0103n:94_5: tato parampi malavisodhanena, pariḷāhavūpasamanena, sucigandhavāyanena, sagganibbānādhigamūpāyabhāvena,
anya-e0103n:94_6: sobhālaṅkārasādhanatāya bhayavidhamanena, kittipāmojjajanena ca sīlasadisaṃ aññaṃ
anya-e0103n:94_7: sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ natthīti dassento “na gaṅgā”tiādikā gāthā abhāsi.
anya-e0103n:95_0: Tattha sarabhūti ekā nadī, “yaṃ loke sarabhū”ti vadanti. Ninnagā vāciravatīti “aciravatī”ti
anya-e0103n:95_1: evaṃnāmikā nadī, vāti sabbattha vā-saddo aniyamattho. Tena avuttā godhāvarīcandabhāgādikā
anya-e0103n:95_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Pāṇanaṭṭhena pāṇīnaṃ sattānaṃ yaṃ malaṃ sīlajalaṃ visodhayati, taṃ malaṃ
anya-e0103n:95_3: visodhetuṃ na sakkuṇanti gaṅgādayo nadiyoti paṭhamagāthāya na-kāraṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:95_4: Hārāti muttāhārā. Maṇayoti veḷuriyādimaṇayo. Ariyanti visuddhaṃ. Sīlasamuṭṭhāno kittisaddo
anya-e0103n:95_5: gandho manoharabhāvato, disāsu abhibyāpanato ca “sīlagandho”ti vutto. So hi paṭivātepi
anya-e0103n:95_6: pavattati. Tenāha bhagavā “satañca gandho paṭivātametī”ti. Dosānaṃ balaṃ nāma vatthujjhācāro,
anya-e0103n:95_7: taṃ tesaṃ kātuṃ adentaṃ sīlaṃ dosānaṃ balaṃ ghātetīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:97_1: viya, pakārattho vā, katippakāraṃ kittakā sīlassa pakārabhedāti attho. Sīlanalakkhaṇenāti
anya-e0103n:98_0: Caranti tena sīlesu paripūrakāritaṃ upagacchantīti carittaṃ, carittameva cārittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:98_1: Vāritato tena attānaṃ tāyanti rakkhantīti vārittaṃ. Adhiko samācāro abhisamācāro,
anya-e0103n:98_2: tattha niyuttaṃ, so vā payojanaṃ etassāti ābhisamācārikaṃ. Ādi brahmacariyassāti
anya-e0103n:98_3: ādibrahmacariyaṃ, tadeva ādibrahmacariyakaṃ. Viramati etāya, sayaṃ vā viramati, viramaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:98_4: vā virati, na viratīti avirati. Nissayatīti nissitaṃ, na nissitanti anissitaṃ. Pariyanto
anya-e0103n:98_5: etassa atthīti pariyantaṃ, kālena pariyantaṃ kālapariyantaṃ, yathāparicchinno vā
anya-e0103n:98_6: kālo pariyanto etassāti kālapariyantaṃ. Yāva pāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ koṭi etassāti āpāṇakoṭikaṃ.
anya-e0103n:98_7: Attano paccayehi loke niyuttaṃ, tattha vā viditanti lokiyaṃ. Lokaṃ uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ.
anya-e0103n:99_0: Paccayato, phalato ca majjhimapaṇītehi nihīnaṃ, tesaṃ vā guṇehi parihīnanti hīnaṃ.
anya-e0103n:99_1: Attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nītanti paṇītaṃ. Ubhinnameva vemajjhe bhavaṃ majjhimaṃ.
anya-e0103n:99_2: Attādhipatito āgataṃ attādhipateyyaṃ. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Taṇhāya, diṭṭhiyā
anya-e0103n:99_3: vā parāmaṭṭhaṃ padhaṃsitanti parāmaṭṭhaṃ. Tappaṭikkhepato aparāmaṭṭhaṃ. Paṭippassaddhakilesaṃ
anya-e0103n:99_4: paṭippassaddhaṃ. Sikkhāsu jātaṃ, sekkhassa idanti vā sekkhaṃ. Pariniṭṭhitasikkhākiccatāya
anya-e0103n:99_6: bhajati, hānabhāgo vā etassa atthīti hānabhāgiyaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Appaparimāṇattā
anya-e0103n:99_8: apariyantaṃ, pārisuddhivantañca sīlaṃ apariyantapārisuddhisīlaṃ. Sabbaso puṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:100_0: 11. Vuttanayenāti “sīlanaṭṭhena sīla”ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttena nayena. Idaṃ kattabbanti
anya-e0103n:100_1: paññattasikkhāpadapūraṇanti idaṃ ābhisamācārikaṃ kattabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti evaṃ
anya-e0103n:100_2: paññattassa sikkhāpadasīlassa pūraṇaṃ. Sikkhāpadasīlaṃ hi pūrento sikkhāpadampi pūreti
anya-e0103n:100_3: pāleti nāma. Sikkhā eva vā sikkhitabbato, paṭipajjitabbato ca sikkhāpadaṃ. Tassa
anya-e0103n:100_4: pūraṇantipi yojetabbaṃ. Idaṃ na kattabbanti paṭikkhittassa akaraṇanti idaṃ duccaritaṃ
anya-e0103n:100_5: na kattabbanti bhagavatā paṭikkhittassa akaraṇaṃ viramaṇaṃ. Caranti tasminti tasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:100_6: sīle taṃsamaṅgino carantīti sīlassa adhikaraṇataṃ vibhāvento tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:100_7: dasseti. Tenāha “sīlesu paripūrakāritāya pavattantī”ti. Vāritanti idaṃ na kattabbanti
anya-e0103n:100_8: paṭikkhittaṃ akappiyaṃ. Tāyantīti akaraṇeneva tāyanti. Tenāti vārittasīlamāha. Vāreti
anya-e0103n:100_9: vā satthā ettha, etena vāti vāritaṃ, sikkhāpadaṃ. Taṃ avikopento tāyanti tenāti vārittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:100_10: Saddhāvīriyasādhananti saddhāya, uṭṭhānavīriyena ca sādhetabbaṃ. Na hi asaddho, kusīto
anya-e0103n:100_11: ca vattapaṭipattiṃ paripūreti, saddho eva satthārā paṭikkhitte aṇumattepi vajje bhayadassāvī
anya-e0103n:101_1: Abhisamācārova ābhisamācārikaṃ, yathā venayikoti adhippāyo. Abhisamācāro ukkaṭṭhaniddesato
anya-e0103n:101_2: maggasīlaṃ, phalasīlañca, taṃ ārabbha uddissa tadatthaṃ tappayojanaṃ paññattaṃ ābhisamācārikaṃ.
anya-e0103n:101_3: Suparisuddhāni tīṇi kāyakammāni, cattāri vacīkammāni, suparisuddho ājīvoti idaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ.
anya-e0103n:101_4: Tattha kāmaṃ ājīvahetukato sattavidhaduccaritato virati sammāājīvoti sopi sattavidho
anya-e0103n:101_5: hoti, sammājīvatāsāmaññena pana taṃ ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Atha vā tividhakuhanavatthusannissayato
anya-e0103n:101_6: micchājīvato viratiṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vutto “ājīvo suparisuddho”ti. Seṭṭhacariyabhāvato
anya-e0103n:101_7: maggo eva brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ, tassa. Ādibhāvabhūtanti ādimhi bhāvetabbataṃ
anya-e0103n:101_8: nipphādetabbataṃ bhūtaṃ pattaṃ ādibhāvabhūtaṃ. Kiñcāpi desanānukkamena sammādiṭṭhi
anya-e0103n:101_9: ādi, paṭipattikkamena pana ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ ādīti. Tassa sampattiyāti ābhisamācārikassa
anya-e0103n:101_10: sampajjanena paripūraṇena ādibrahmacariyakaṃ sampajjati. Yo hi lahukānipi appasāvajjāni
anya-e0103n:101_11: parivajjeti, so garukāni mahāsāvajjāni bahvādīnavāni parivajjessatīti vattabbameva
anya-e0103n:101_12: natthīti. Suttaṃ pana etamatthaṃ byatirekavasena vibhāveti. Tattha dhammanti sīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n:101_13: Taṃ hi upariguṇavisesānaṃ dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:102: Viratisīlassa itarasīlena satipi sampayogādike asammissakatādassanatthaṃ “veramaṇimatta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:103_1: Tattha taṇhācaritena nissayitabbato taṇhāva taṇhānissayo. Tathā diṭṭhinissayo. Diṭṭhicarito
anya-e0103n:103_2: hi asatipi diṭṭhiyā taṇhāvirahe diṭṭhinissitova pavattati. Devoti catumahārājasakkasuyāmādipākaṭadevamāha.
anya-e0103n:103_3: Devaññataroti apākaṭaṃ. Taṇhaṃ eva nissitanti taṇhānissitaṃ. Taṇhāya nissitanti ca
anya-e0103n:103_4: keci vadanti. Tesaṃ “dve nissayā”tiādinā virujjhati. Suddhidiṭṭhiyāti “iti saṃsārasuddhi
anya-e0103n:103_5: bhavissatī”ti evaṃ pavattadiṭṭhiyā, lokuttaraṃ sīlanti adhippāyo. Tassevāti lokuttarasseva
anya-e0103n:104_0: Kālaparicchedaṃ katvāti “imañca rattiṃ, imañca diva”ntiādinā viya kālavasena paricchedaṃ
anya-e0103n:104_1: katvā. Kālaparicchedaṃ akatvā samādinnampi antarāvicchinnaṃ sampattavirativasena
anya-e0103n:104_2: yāvajīvaṃ pavattitampi āpāṇakoṭikaṃ na hotīti dassetuṃ “yāvajīvaṃ samādiyitvā tatheva
anya-e0103n:105_1: rakkhaṇavasena ceva vaḍḍhanavasena ca ñātiaṅgajīvitānaṃ avināsanavasena. Kiṃ so vītikkamissatīti
anya-e0103n:105_2: yo vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti, so kāyavācāhi vītikkamissatīti kiṃ idaṃ, natthetanti
anya-e0103n:106_0: Ārammaṇabhāvena vaṇo viya āsave kāmāsavādike paggharatīti sampayogabhāvābhāvepi sahāsavehīti
anya-e0103n:106_1: sāsavaṃ. Tebhūmakadhammajātanti sīlaṃ tappariyāpannanti āha “sāsavaṃ sīlaṃ lokiya”nti.
anya-e0103n:106_2: Bhavavisesā sampattibhavā. Vinayoti vinayapariyatti, tattha vā āgatasikkhāpadāni.
anya-e0103n:106_4: vā taruṇavipassanā. Nibbidāti nibbidāñāṇaṃ. Tena balavavipassanamāha. Virāgo maggo.
anya-e0103n:106_5: Vimutti arahattaphalaṃ. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccavekkhaṇā. Kathāti vinayakathā. Mantanāti
anya-e0103n:106_8: hoti, paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa ca bhūmi, phalasīlaṃ pana paccavekkhaṇāñāṇasseva bhūmi.
anya-e0103n:107_0: 12. Hīnādhimuttivasena chandādīnampi hīnatā. Paṇītādhimuttivasena paṇītatā. Tadubhayavemajjhatāvasena
anya-e0103n:107_1: majjhimatā. Yatheva hi kammaṃ āyūhanavasena hīnādibhedabhinnaṃ hoti, evaṃ chandādayopi
anya-e0103n:107_2: pavattiākāravasena. So ca nesaṃ pavattiākāro adhimuttibhedenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasakāmatāyāti
anya-e0103n:107_3: kittisilokābhiratiyā, parivāricchāya vā. “Kathaṃ nāma mādiso īdisaṃ kareyyā”ti pāpajigucchāya
anya-e0103n:107_4: ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya. Anupakkiliṭṭhanti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanāhi, aññehi ca upakkilesehi
anya-e0103n:107_7: vimokkhatthāyāti sabbasattānaṃ saṃsārabandhanato vimocanatthāya. Pāramitāsīlaṃ mahābodhisattasīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n:107_8: Yā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā mahābodhiṃ ārabbha pavattā paramukkaṃsagatasoceyyasallekhā
anya-e0103n:108_0: Ananurūpanti asāruppaṃ. Attā eva garu adhipati etassāti attagaru, lajjādhiko. Attādhipatito
anya-e0103n:108_1: āgataṃ attādhipateyyaṃ. Loko adhipati garu etassāti lokādhipati, ottappādhiko. Dhammo
anya-e0103n:108_2: nāmāyaṃ mahānubhāvo ekantaniyyāniko, so ca paṭipattiyāva pūjetabbo. Tasmā “naṃ sīlasampadāya
anya-e0103n:109_0: Parāmaṭṭhattāti parābhavavasena āmaṭṭhattā. Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo hi “imināhaṃ sīlena devo
anya-e0103n:109_1: vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā, iminā me sīlena saṃsārasuddhi bhavissatī”ti pavattassa
anya-e0103n:109_2: sīlaṃ parāmasantiyo taṃ parābhavaṃ pāpenti maggassa anupanissayabhāvakaraṇato. Puthujjanakalyāṇakassāti
anya-e0103n:109_3: puthujjanesu kalyāṇakassa. So hi puthujjanova hutvā kalyāṇehi sīlādīhi samannāgato.
anya-e0103n:109_4: Parāmasanakilesānaṃ vikkhambhanato, samucchindanato ca tehi na parāmaṭṭhanti aparāmaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:109_5: Tassa tassa kilesadarathassa paṭippassambhanato vūpasamanato paṭippassaddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:110_0: Katapaṭikammanti vuṭṭhānadesanāhi yathādhammaṃ katapaṭikāraṃ. Evaṃ hi taṃ sīlaṃ paṭipākatikameva
anya-e0103n:110_1: hoti. Tenāha “taṃ visuddha”nti. “Katapaṭikamma”nti iminā ca “na punevaṃ karissa”nti
anya-e0103n:110_2: adhiṭṭhānampi saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Acchamaṃsaṃ nu kho, sūkaramaṃsaṃ nu kho”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:110_3: vatthumhi vā, “pācittiyaṃ nu kho, dukkaṭaṃ nu kho”tiādinā āpattiyā vā, “mayā taṃ
anya-e0103n:110_4: vatthu vītikkantaṃ nu kho, na nu kho vītikkanta”ntiādinā ajjhācāre vā vematikassa
anya-e0103n:110_5: saṃsayāpannassa. Visodhetabbaṃ yathādhammaṃ paṭikammena. Vimati eva vematikaṃ, tasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:110_6: vematike sati, vimatiyā uppannāyāti attho. Vimati paṭivinetabbāti sayaṃ vā taṃ vatthuṃ
anya-e0103n:110_7: vicāretvā, vinayadhare vā pucchitvā kaṅkhā vinodetabbā. Nikkaṅkhena pana kappiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:110_8: ce kātabbaṃ, akappiyaṃ ce chaḍḍetabbaṃ. Tenāha “iccassa phāsu bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:111: “Catūhi ariyamaggehī”tiādinā maggaphalapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ maggaphalasampayuttaṃ vuttaṃ. Samudāyesu pavattavohārā avayavesupi pavattantīti. Sesanti sabbaṃ lokiyasīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n:112_0: Pakatipīti sabhāvopi. Sukhasīlo sakhilo sukhasaṃvāso. Tena pariyāyenāti pakatiatthavācakatthena.
anya-e0103n:112_1: Ekaccaṃ abyākataṃ sīlaṃ idhādhippetasīlena ekasaṅgahanti akusalassevāyujjamānataṃ
anya-e0103n:112_2: dassetuṃ “tattha akusala”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tathā hi sekkhattikaṃ idha gahitaṃ, idha
anya-e0103n:112_3: na upanītaṃ kusalattikanti adhippāyo. Vuttanayenevāti vutteneva nayena kusalattikaṃ
anya-e0103n:112_4: aggahetvā hīnattikādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ tikānaṃ vasena assa sīlassa tividhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:113_0: 13. Yodhāti yo idha. Vatthuvītikkameti āpattiyā vatthuno vītikkamane ajjhācāre. Kāmasaṅkappādayo
anya-e0103n:113_1: nava mahāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā. Evarūpassāti edisassa. Tassa hi sīlavante anupasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0103n:113_2: dussīle sevantassa tato eva tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanena paṇṇattivītikkame adosadassāvino
anya-e0103n:113_3: micchāsaṅkappabahulatāya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni arakkhato sīlaṃ ekaṃseneva hānabhāgiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:113_4: hoti, na ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ, kuto visesādibhāgiyatā. Sīlasampattiyāti sīlapāripūriyā catupārisuddhisīlena.
anya-e0103n:113_5: Aghaṭantassa uttarīti uttari visesādhigamāya avāyamantassa. Ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ sīlaṃ bhavati
anya-e0103n:113_6: asamādhisaṃvattaniyattā. Sampādite hi samādhismiṃ sīlassa samādhisaṃvattaniyatā nicchiyati.
anya-e0103n:113_7: Samādhatthāyāti samathavasena samādhānatthāya. Nibbidanti vipassanaṃ. Balavavipassanādassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:114_0: Yāni ca sikkhāpadāni nesaṃ rakkhitabbānīti sambandho, tāni pana asādhāraṇapaññattito
anya-e0103n:114_1: aññāni. Nesanti “rakkhitabbānī”ti padaṃ apekkhitvā kattari sāmivacanaṃ, tehi bhikkhūhīti
anya-e0103n:114_2: attho. Sati vā ussāheti ussakkitvā sīlāni rakkhituṃ ussāhe sati. Dasāti sāmaṇerehi
anya-e0103n:114_3: rakkhitabbasīlamāha ghaṭikārādīnaṃ viya. Aṭṭhāti naccādimālādiveramaṇiṃ ekaṃ katvā
anya-e0103n:115_0: Avītikkamoti pañcannaṃ sīlānaṃ avītikkamo. Pakatisīlanti sabhāvasīlaṃ. Tatrūpapattiniyataṃ
anya-e0103n:115_1: hi sīlaṃ uttarakurukānaṃ. Mariyādācārittanti tassa tassa sāvajjassa akaraṇe mariyādabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0103n:115_2: tattha tattha kulādīsu pubbapurisehi ṭhapitaṃ cārittaṃ. Kuladesapāsaṇḍadhammo hi
anya-e0103n:115_3: “ācārasīla”nti adhippetaṃ. Tattha kuladhammo tāva brāhmaṇādīnaṃ amajjapānādi, desadhammo
anya-e0103n:115_4: ekaccajanapadavāsīnaṃ ahiṃsanādi, pāsaṇḍadhammo titthiyānaṃ yamaniyamādi. Titthiyamataṃ
anya-e0103n:115_5: hi diṭṭhipāsena, taṇhāpāsena ca ḍeti pavattati, pāsaṃ vā bādhaṃ ariyavinayassa ḍetīti
anya-e0103n:115_6: “pāsaṇḍa”nti vuccati. “Pakatiyā sīlavatī hotī”ti vacanato bodhisattamātu pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ
anya-e0103n:115_7: paripuṇṇameva. Idaṃ pana ukkaṃsagataṃ bodhisattapitaripi cittuppādamattenapi asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0103n:115_9: Dhammatāsīlanti dhammatāya kāraṇaniyāmena āgataṃ sīlaṃ. Sīlapāramiṃ hi paramukkaṃsaṃ
anya-e0103n:115_10: pāpetvā kucchigatassa mahābodhisattassa sīlatejena guṇānubhāvena bodhisattamātu saraseneva
anya-e0103n:115_11: paramasallekhappattaṃ sīlaṃ hoti. Mahākassapādīnanti ādi-saddena bhaddādike saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:115_12: Te kira suciraṃ kālaṃ suparisuddhasīlā eva hutvā āgatā. Tenāha “suddhasattāna”nti.
anya-e0103n:115_13: Tāsu tāsu jātīsūti sīlavarājamahiṃsarājādijātīsu. Pubbe purimajātiyaṃ siddho hetu
anya-e0103n:115_14: etassāti pubbahetukasīlaṃ. Idaṃ pana pakatisīlādisamādānena vinā avītikkamalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:116_0: Yaṃ bhagavatā evaṃ vuttaṃ sīlanti sambandho. Idhāti vakkhamānasīlaparipūrakassa puggalassa
anya-e0103n:116_2: hetaṃ “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti. Bhikkhūti
anya-e0103n:116_3: tassa sīlassa paripūrakapuggalaparidīpanaṃ. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti idamassa pātimokkhasīle
anya-e0103n:116_6: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idaṃ pātimokkhato acavanabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Samādāyāti
anya-e0103n:116_7: sikkhāpadānaṃ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṃ. Sikkhatīti sikkhāya samaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:116_8: Sikkhāpadesūti sikkhitabbadhammaparidīpanaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n:117_0: Soti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle patiṭṭhitabhikkhu. Tena yādisassa indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ
anya-e0103n:117_1: icchitabbaṃ, taṃ dasseti. Cakkhunāti yato so saṃvaro, taṃ dasseti. Rūpanti yattha
anya-e0103n:117_2: so saṃvaro, taṃ dasseti. Disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhīti saṃvarassa
anya-e0103n:117_3: upāyaṃ dasseti. Yatvādhikaraṇa…pe… anvāssaveyyunti saṃvarassa paṭipakkhaṃ tattha
anya-e0103n:117_4: ādīnavaṃ dasseti. Saṃvarāya paṭipajjatīti pageva satiyā upaṭṭhapetabbataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:117_5: Rakkhati cakkhundriyanti satiyā upaṭṭhāpanameva cakkhundriyassa ārakkhāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:117_6: Cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatīti tathābhūtā satiyevettha saṃvaroti dasseti. Vītikkamassa
anya-e0103n:117_7: vasenāti sambandho. Channaṃ sikkhāpadānanti “ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā asantaṃ abhūtaṃ
anya-e0103n:117_9: sikkhāpadānaṃ. Sāmantajappanādinā tividhena kuhanavatthunā vimhāpanaṃ kuhanā. Attānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:117_10: dāyakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā yathā so kiñci dadāti, evaṃ kathanaṃ lapanā. Nimittaṃ vuccati
anya-e0103n:117_11: paccayadānasaññuppādakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ, tena nimittena carati, nimittaṃ vā karotīti
anya-e0103n:117_12: nemittiko, tassa bhāvo nemittikatā. Gandhādayo viya lābhāya paresaṃ akkosanādinā
anya-e0103n:117_13: nipisatīti nippeso, nippesova nippesiko, tassa bhāvo nippesikatā. Mahicchatāya attanā
anya-e0103n:117_14: laddhalābhena parato lābhapariyesanā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā. Evamādīnanti ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n:117_16: asaṃkiliṭṭho paṭisaṅkhānaparisuddho. Cattāro paccayā paribhuñjīyanti etenāti catupaccayaparibhogo,
anya-e0103n:119_0: 14. Tatrāti tesu pātimokkhasaṃvarādīsu. Ādito paṭṭhāyāti “idha bhikkhū”tiādinā āgatadesanāya
anya-e0103n:119_1: ādito pabhuti. Vinicchayakathāti tattha saṃsayavidhamanena vinicchayāvahā kathā.
anya-e0103n:119_2: Paṭhamassa atthassa sabbasādhāraṇattā asādhāraṇaṃ pabbajitāveṇikaṃ pariyāyaṃ dassento
anya-e0103n:119_4: dassitā hoti. Bhinnapaṭadharādibhāvo ca nāma daliddassāpi niggahitassa hotīti tato
anya-e0103n:119_6: vuttaṃ. Ācārakulaputto vā hi paṭipajjituṃ sakkoti jātikulaputto vā. Sikkhāpadasīlanti
anya-e0103n:119_7: cārittavārittappabhedaṃ sikkhāpadavasena paññattaṃ sīlaṃ. Yoti aniyamaniddeso yo
anya-e0103n:119_8: koci puggalo. Nanti vinayapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ. Tanti puggalaṃ. Mokkheti sahakārikāraṇabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:119_9: Apāye bhavāni āpāyikāni. Ādi-saddena tadaññaṃ sabbasaṃsāradukkhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Saṃvaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:119_10: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ pidahanaṃ. Yena te saṃvutā pihitā honti, so saṃvaro. Yasmā pana
anya-e0103n:119_11: so sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamo vītikkamapaṭipakkhoti katvā, tasmā vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:119_13: pihitakāyavacīdvāro. Tathābhūto ca yasmā taṃ upeto tena ca samaṅgī nāma hoti, tasmā
anya-e0103n:120_0: Aparo nayo – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato, pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato, puññakiriyāya ca
anya-e0103n:120_1: dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya vā
anya-e0103n:120_2: bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti
anya-e0103n:120_3: pātī, maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti pātī, sattasantāno,
anya-e0103n:120_4: cittameva vā. Taṃ pātinaṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ. Cittassa hi vimokkhena
anya-e0103n:120_5: satto “vimutto”ti vuccati. Vuttaṃ hi “cittavodānā visujjhantī”ti, “anupādāya āsavehi
anya-e0103n:120_6: cittaṃ vimutta”nti ca. Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti
anya-e0103n:120_7: pātī, “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi
anya-e0103n:120_8: vuttaṃ. Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:120_9: “Kaṇṭhekāḷo”tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā. Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti
anya-e0103n:120_10: pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttaṃ hi “cittena nīyati loko, cittena parikassatī”ti. Tassa pātino
anya-e0103n:120_11: mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṃ, patati vā etena apāyadukkhe, saṃsāradukkhe cāti pātī,
anya-e0103n:120_12: taṇhādisaṃkileso. Vuttaṃ hi “taṇhā janeti purisaṃ, taṇhādutiyo puriso”ti ca ādi.
anya-e0103n:120_13: Tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ. Atha vā patati etthāti pātīni, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni
anya-e0103n:120_14: āyatanāni. Vuttaṃ hi “chasu loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava”nti. Tato chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato
anya-e0103n:120_15: pātito mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ. Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato
anya-e0103n:120_16: mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ, atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā “patī”ti
anya-e0103n:120_17: vuccati. Muccati etenāti mokkho, patino mokkho tena paññattattāti patimokkho, patimokkho
anya-e0103n:120_18: eva pātimokkhaṃ. Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttenatthena
anya-e0103n:120_19: mokkho cāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkhaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti
anya-e0103n:121_0: Atha vā pa-iti pakāre, atī-ti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti
anya-e0103n:121_1: pātimokkhaṃ. Idaṃ hi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena,
anya-e0103n:121_2: samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ, pati pati mokkhoti vā
anya-e0103n:121_3: patimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho, patimokkho eva pātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:121_4: Mokkhoti vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa paṭibimbabhūtoti patimokkho. Sīlasaṃvaro hi
anya-e0103n:121_5: sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato,
anya-e0103n:121_6: patimokkhoyeva pātimokkhaṃ. Atha vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati, mokkhābhimukhanti vā patimokkhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:121_7: patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evamettha pātimokkha-saddassa attho veditabbo. Iriyatīti
anya-e0103n:121_8: attabhāvaṃ pavatteti. “Viharatī”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0103n:122_0: Tattha kāmaṃ samaṇacāraṃ, samaṇagocarañca dassetuṃ “ācāragocarasampanno”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:122_1: yathā pana maggaṃ ācikkhanto “vāmaṃ muñca, dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā”ti vajjetabbapubbakaṃ
anya-e0103n:122_2: gahetabbaṃ vadeyya, yathā vā sasīsanhānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanasaṃvidhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:122_3: yuttarūpaṃ, evaṃ pahīnapāpadhammassa kalyāṇadhammasamāyogo yuttarūpoti “atthi ācāro,
anya-e0103n:122_4: atthi anācāro”ti dvayaṃ uddisitvā anācāraṃ tāva vibhajituṃ “tattha katamo anācāro”tiādi
anya-e0103n:122_5: vuttaṃ. Tattha kāyiko vītikkamoti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ. Vācasiko vītikkamoti catubbidhaṃ
anya-e0103n:123_0: Evaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlassa vītikkamo dassito. Idāni mānasaṃ anācāraṃ dassetuṃ “sabbampi
anya-e0103n:123_1: dussīlyaṃ anācāro”ti vatvā tattha ekacciyaṃ dassento “idhekacco veḷudānena vā”tiādimāha.
