anya-e0103n:123_2: Tattha veḷudānenāti paccayuppādanatthena veḷudānena. Pattadānādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:123_3: Veḷūti manussānaṃ payojanāvaho yo koci veḷudaṇḍo. Pattaṃ gandhikādīnaṃ gandhapaliveṭhanādiatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:123_4: vā, tālanāḷikerādipattaṃ vā. Pupphaṃ yaṃ kiñci manussānaṃ payojanāvahaṃ. Tathā phalaṃ.
anya-e0103n:123_5: Sinānaṃ sirīsacuṇṇādinhāniyacuṇṇaṃ. Mattikāpi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Dantakaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0103n:123_6: yaṃ kiñci mukhasodhanatthaṃ dantaponaṃ. Cāṭukamyatā attānaṃ dāsaṃ viya nīcaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:123_7: ṭhapetvā parassa khalitavacanaṃ saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṃ. Muggasūpyatāti
anya-e0103n:123_8: muggasūpasamatā saccālikena jīvitakappanaṃ. Yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā
anya-e0103n:123_9: paccanti, katipayā na paccanti, evaṃ saccālikena jīvitakappane bahu alikaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:123_10: appakaṃ saccanti. Paribhaṭatīti paribhaṭo, paresaṃ dārake pariharanto. Paribhaṭassa
anya-e0103n:123_11: kammaṃ pāribhaṭyaṃ, sā eva pāribhaṭyatā, alaṅkaraṇādinā kuladārakapariharaṇassetaṃ
anya-e0103n:123_12: nāmaṃ. Tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ gāmantaradesantarādīsu sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ jaṅghapesanikaṃ.
anya-e0103n:123_14: vā micchājīvena jīvitakappanakakammānaṃ yena kenaci. Buddhapaṭikuṭṭhenāti buddhehi
anya-e0103n:123_15: garahitena paṭisiddhena. Micchājīvenāti na sammāājīvena. Ayaṃ vuccati anācāroti ayaṃ
anya-e0103n:124_0: Gocaraniddesepi paṭhamaṃ agocarassa vacane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:124_1: Gocaroti piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ. Ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ agocaro.
anya-e0103n:124_2: Vesiyā gocaro assāti vesiyāgocaro, mittasanthavavasena upasaṅkamitabbaṭṭhānanti attho.
anya-e0103n:124_3: Vesiyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyo, tā mittasanthavavasena na upasaṅkamitabbā, samaṇabhāvassa
anya-e0103n:124_4: antarāyakarattā, parisuddhāsayassāpi garahahetuto, tasmā dakkhiṇādānavasena satiṃ
anya-e0103n:124_5: upaṭṭhapetvāva upasaṅkamitabbā. Vidhavā vuccanti matapatikā, pavutthapatikā vā. Thullakumārikāti
anya-e0103n:124_6: mahallikā aniviṭṭhakumāriyo, paṇḍakāti napuṃsakā. Te hi ussannakilesā avūpasantapariḷāhā
anya-e0103n:124_7: lokāmisasannissitakathābahulā, tasmā na upasaṅkamitabbā. Bhikkhuniyo nāma ussannabrahmacariyā.
anya-e0103n:124_8: Tathā bhikkhūpi. Tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ visabhāgavatthubhāvato santhavavasena upasaṅkamane
anya-e0103n:124_9: katipāheneva brahmacariyantarāyo siyā, tasmā na upasaṅkamitabbā. Gilānapucchanādivasena
anya-e0103n:124_10: upasaṅkamane satokārinā bhavitabbaṃ. Pānāgāranti surāpānagharaṃ. Taṃ soṇḍajanehi
anya-e0103n:124_11: avivittaṃ hoti. Tattha tehi soṇḍatādivasena na upasaṅkamitabbaṃ brahmacariyantarāyakarattā.
anya-e0103n:124_12: Saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhītiādīsu rājāno nāma ye rajjamanusāsanti. Rājamahāmattā rājissariyasadisāya
anya-e0103n:124_13: issariyamattāya samannāgatā. Titthiyāti viparītadassanā bāhirakaparibbājakā. Titthiyasāvakāti
anya-e0103n:124_14: tesu daḷhabhattā paccayadāyakā. Ananulomikena saṃsaggenāti tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ ananulomikena
anya-e0103n:124_15: paccanīkabhūtena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho viharati, yena brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā sallekhaparihāniṃ vā pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n:125_0: Idāni aparenapi pariyāyena agocaraṃ dassetuṃ “yāni vā pana tānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:125_1: assaddhānīti buddhādīsu saddhāvirahitāni. Tato eva appasannāni, kammakammaphalasaddhāya
anya-e0103n:125_2: vā abhāvena assaddhāni. Ratanattayappasādābhāvena appasannāni. Akkosakaparibhāsakānīti
anya-e0103n:125_3: akkosavatthūhi akkosakāni ceva bhayadassanena santajjanakāni ca. Atthaṃ na icchanti
anya-e0103n:125_4: anatthameva icchantīti anatthakāmāni. Hitaṃ na icchanti ahitameva icchantīti ahitakāmāni.
anya-e0103n:125_5: Phāsu na icchanti aphāsuṃyeva icchantīti aphāsukakāmāni. Yogakkhemaṃ nibbhayaṃ na
anya-e0103n:125_6: icchanti, ayogakkhemameva icchantīti ayogakkhemakāmāni. Bhikkhūnanti ettha sāmaṇerānampi
anya-e0103n:125_7: saṅgaho. Bhikkhunīnanti ettha sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṃ. Sabbesaṃ hi sāsanikānaṃ anatthakāmatādīpanapadamidaṃ
anya-e0103n:125_8: vacanaṃ. Tathārūpāni kulānīti tādisāni khattiyakulādīni. Sevatīti nissāya jīvati.
anya-e0103n:125_9: Bhajatīti upasaṅkamati. Payirupāsatīti punappunaṃ upagacchati. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ
anya-e0103n:125_10: vesiyādiko, rājādiko, assaddhakulādiko ca taṃ taṃ sevantassa tippakāropi ayutto gocaroti
anya-e0103n:125_11: agocaro. Ettha hi vesiyādiko pañcakāmaguṇanissayato agocaro. Yathāha “ko ca, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n:125_12: bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo? Yadidaṃ pañca kāmaguṇā”ti. Rājādiko samaṇadhammassa
anya-e0103n:126_1: udapānabhūtāni bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhikkhunīsaṅghassa ca catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī
anya-e0103n:126_2: viya yathāsukhaṃ ogāhanakkhamāni. Kāsāvapajjotānīti bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhunīnañca nivatthapārutakāsāvānaṃyeva
anya-e0103n:126_3: pabhāhi ekobhāsāni. Isivātapaṭivātānīti gehaṃ pavisantānaṃ, nikkhamantānañca bhikkhubhikkhunīsaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0103n:126_4: isīnaṃ cīvaravātena ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena ca paṭivātāni pavāyitāni
anya-e0103n:127_0: Idāni niddese āgatanayenāpi ācāragocare dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Etthāti etasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:127_1: pātimokkhasīlaniddese. Imināpi nayenāti idāni vuccamānavidhināpi. Saṅghagatoti saṅghasannipātaṃ
anya-e0103n:127_2: gato. Acittīkārakatoti akatacittīkāro, akatagāravoti attho. Ghaṭṭayantoti sarīrena,
anya-e0103n:127_3: cīvarena vā ghaṃsanto. Puratopi tiṭṭhati acittīkārakatoti sambandhitabbaṃ. Ṭhitakopīti
anya-e0103n:127_4: upari tiṭṭhanto viya āsannataraṭṭhāne ṭhitakopi bhaṇati. Bāhāvikkhepakoti bāhuṃ vikkhipanto.
anya-e0103n:127_5: Anupāhanānanti anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Saupāhanoti upāhanāruḷho. There bhikkhū anupakhajjāti
anya-e0103n:127_6: therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ anupavisitvā tesaṃ āsannataraṭṭhānaṃ upagantvā.
anya-e0103n:127_7: Kaṭṭhaṃ pakkhipati aggikuṇḍe. Vokkammāti passato atikkamitvā. Gūḷhāni sabhāvato paṭicchannāni
anya-e0103n:127_8: sāṇipākārādinā paṭicchāditāni. Anāpucchāti anāpucchitvā. Assāti anācārassa.
anya-e0103n:128_0: Apica bhikkhūtiādi sabbasseva bhikkhuno ācāradassanavasena pavattaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:128_1: na niddesapāḷi. Saddhāsīlasutacāgādiguṇahetuko garubhāvo garukaraṇaṃ vā gāravo, saha
anya-e0103n:128_2: gāravenāti sagāravo. Garuṭṭhāniyesu gāravasārajjādivasena paṭissāyanā patissā, sappatissavapaṭipatti.
anya-e0103n:128_3: Saha patissāyāti sappatisso. Savisesaṃ hirimanatāya, ottappibhāvena ca hirottappasampanno.
anya-e0103n:128_4: Sekhiyadhammapāripūrivasena sunivattho supāruto. Pāsādikenāti pasādāvahena, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe
anya-e0103n:128_5: cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Eseva nayo ito paresupi chasu padesu. Abhikkantenāti abhikkamena.
anya-e0103n:128_7: Indriyesu guttadvāroti cakkhundriyādīsu chasu dvāresu susaṃvihitārakkho. Bhojane
anya-e0103n:128_8: mattaññūti paribhuñjitabbato bhojanasaññite catubbidhepi paccaye pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogādivasena
anya-e0103n:128_10: jāgariyaṃ sātaccakāritāvasena anu anu yutto tattha yuttapayutto. Satisampajaññena
anya-e0103n:128_11: samannāgatotiādi yathāvuttassa ācārassa sambhāradassanaṃ. Tattha appicchoti niiccho.
anya-e0103n:128_12: Santuṭṭhoti yathālābhādivasena santosena tuṭṭho. Sakkaccakārīti ādarakārī. Garucittīkārabahuloti
anya-e0103n:128_13: garuṭṭhāniyesu garukaraṇabahulo. Ayaṃ vuccati ācāroti ayaṃ sagāravatādi atthakāmehi ācaritabbato ācāro.
anya-e0103n:129_0: Sīlādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ upanissayabhūto upanissayagocaro. Satisaṅkhāto cittassa ārakkhabhūto
anya-e0103n:129_1: eva gocaro ārakkhagocaro. Kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāto cittassa upanibandhanaṭṭhānabhūto gocaro
anya-e0103n:129_2: upanibandhagocaro. Appicchatādīhi dasahi vivaṭṭanissitāya kathāya vatthubhūtehi guṇehi
anya-e0103n:129_3: samannāgato dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato. Tato eva kalyāṇo sundaro mittoti kalyāṇamitto.
anya-e0103n:129_4: Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ parato āgamissati. Assutaṃ suttageyyādiṃ. Suṇātīti sutamayaṃ ñāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:129_5: uppādeti. Sutaṃ pariyodāpetīti tameva yathāsutaṃ avisadatāya apariyodātaṃ punappunaṃ
anya-e0103n:129_6: paripucchanādinā visodheti nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ karoti. Tattha ca ye kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyā
anya-e0103n:129_7: dhammā, tesu saṃsayaṃ chindanto kaṅkhaṃ vitarati. Kammakammaphalesu, ratanattaye
anya-e0103n:129_8: ca sammādiṭṭhiyā ujukaraṇena diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti. Tato eva ca duvidhāyapi saddhāsampadāya
anya-e0103n:129_9: cittaṃ pasādeti. Atha vā yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ pariyodapetvā tatthāgate rūpārūpadhamme
anya-e0103n:129_10: pariggahetvā sapaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggaṇhanto sattadiṭṭhivaṅkavidhamanena diṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0103n:129_11: ujuṃ karoti. Dhammānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāmattadassanena tīsupi addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:129_12: vitarati. Tato paraṃ ca udayabbayañāṇādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanto
anya-e0103n:129_13: aveccapasādena ratanattaye cittaṃ pasādeti. Tathābhūtova tassa kalyāṇamittassa anusikkhanena
anya-e0103n:129_14: saddhādīhi guṇehi na hāyati, aññadatthu vaḍḍhateva. Tenāha “yassa vā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:130_0: Antaragharanti antare antare gharāni ettha, taṃ etassāti vā “antaraghara”nti laddhanāmaṃ
anya-e0103n:130_1: gocaragāmaṃ paviṭṭho. Tattha ghare ghare bhikkhāpariyesanāya vīthiṃ paṭipanno. Okkhittacakkhūti
anya-e0103n:130_2: heṭṭhākhittacakkhu. Kittakena pana okkhittacakkhu hotīti āha “yugamattadassāvī”ti.
anya-e0103n:130_3: Susaṃvutoti saṃyato. Yathā panettha susaṃvuto nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “na hatthiṃ
anya-e0103n:131: Yatthāti yesu satipaṭṭhānesu. Cittaṃ bhāvanācittaṃ. Upanibandhatīti upanetvā nibandhati. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0103n:132: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
anya-e0103n:134: Satipaṭṭhānānaṃ upanibandhagocarabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sako pettiko visayoti attano pitu sammāsambuddhassa santako, tena diṭṭho dassito ca visayo.
anya-e0103n:135_1: asañcicca āpannasekhiyesu akusalacittuppādādibhedesūti evaṃ asañciccaggahaṇaṃ sekhiyavisesanaṃ
anya-e0103n:135_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sekhiyaggahaṇena cettha vattakkhandhakādīsu āgatavattādīnampi gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:135_3: Tepi hi sikkhitabbaṭṭhena “sekhiyā”ti icchitā. Tathā hi mātikāyaṃ pārājikādīnaṃ viya
anya-e0103n:135_4: sekhiyānaṃ paricchedo na kato. Evañca katvā “asañcicca āpannasekhiyā”ti asañciccaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:135_5: samatthitaṃ hoti. Na hi mātikāyaṃ āgatesu pañcasattatiyā sekhiyesu nosaññāvimokkho
anya-e0103n:135_6: nāma atthi, asañciccaggahaṇeneva cettha asatiajānanānampi saṅgaho kato. Keci panettha
anya-e0103n:135_7: asiñcicca āpannaggahaṇena acittakāpattiyo gahitāti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:135_9: vā sabbalahukassa vajjassa idhādhippetattā. Tenāha “yāni tāni vajjāni appamattakāni
anya-e0103n:135_11: anatikkamanīyānaṃ anāpattigamanīyānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Bhayadassanasīloti paramāṇumattaṃ
anya-e0103n:135_13: sabbalahukaṃ vā dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā dassanasabhāvo. Yaṃ kiñcīti
anya-e0103n:135_15: paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ. Sammā ādāyāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ, sabbaso ca ādiyitvā.
anya-e0103n:135_16: Ayaṃ pana ācāragocarasampadā kiṃ pātimokkhasīle pariyāpannā, udāhu apariyāpannāti?
anya-e0103n:135_17: Pariyāpannā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā puna vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ettha cā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:137_1: icchitabbanti vuttaṃ “soti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhito bhikkhū”ti. Sampādite hi etasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:137_2: pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ suguttaṃ surakkhitameva hoti, susaṃvihitakaṇṭakavati viya
anya-e0103n:137_3: sassanti. Kāraṇavasenāti asādhāraṇakāraṇassa vasena. Asādhāraṇakāraṇavasena hi phalaṃ
anya-e0103n:137_4: apadisīyati, yathā yavaṅkuro bherisaddoti. Nissayavohārena vā etaṃ nissitavacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:137_5: yathā mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontīti. Rūpanti rūpāyatanaṃ. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti ettha
anya-e0103n:137_6: yadi cakkhu rūpaṃ passeyya, aññaviññāṇasamaṅginopi passeyyuṃ, na cetaṃ atthi, kasmā?
anya-e0103n:137_7: Acetanattā cakkhussa. Tenāha “cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati acittakattā”ti. Atha viññāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:137_8: rūpaṃ passeyya, tirokuṭṭādigatampi naṃ passeyya appaṭighabhāvato, idampi natthi sabbassa
anya-e0103n:137_9: viññāṇassa dassanābhāvato. Tenāha “cittaṃ na passati acakkhukattā”ti. Tattha yathā
anya-e0103n:137_10: cakkhusannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ passati, na yaṃ kiñci. Tañca kenaci kuṭṭādinā antarite
anya-e0103n:137_11: na uppajjati, yattha ālokassa vibandho. Yattha pana na vibandho phalikagabbhapaṭalādike,
anya-e0103n:137_12: tattha antaritepi uppajjateva. Evaṃ viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ cakkhu passati, na yaṃ kiñcīti
anya-e0103n:137_13: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ cakkhuṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:138_0: Dvārārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭeti dvārassa ārammaṇena saṅghaṭṭe sati, cakkhussa rūpārammaṇe
anya-e0103n:138_1: āpāthagateti adhippāyo. Pasādavatthukena cittenāti cakkhupasādavatthukena tannissāya
anya-e0103n:138_2: pavattena viññāṇena, yaṃ “cakkhuviññāṇa”nti vuccati. Passatīti oloketi. Cakkhupasādasannissaye
anya-e0103n:138_3: hi viññāṇe ālokānuggahitaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sannissayaguṇena obhāsente taṃsamaṅgipuggalo
anya-e0103n:138_4: “rūpaṃ passatī”ti vuccati. Obhāsanañcettha ārammaṇassa yathāsabhāvato vibhāvanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:138_5: yaṃ “paccakkhato gahaṇa”nti vuccati. Usunā lakkhassa vedhe sijjhante tassa sambhārabhūtena
anya-e0103n:138_6: dhanunā vijjhatīti vacanaṃ viya viññāṇena rūpadassane sijjhante cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatīti
anya-e0103n:138_7: īdisī sasambhārakathā nāmesā hoti. Sasambhārā kathā sasambhārakathā, dassanassa kāraṇasahitāti
anya-e0103n:138_8: attho. Sasambhārassa vā dassanassa kathā sasambhārakathā. Tasmāti yasmā kevalena
anya-e0103n:138_9: cakkhunā, kevalena vā viññāṇena rūpadassanaṃ natthi, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:139_0: Itthipurisanimittaṃ vāti ettha itthisantānanissitarūpamukhena gayhamānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:139_2: ca sabbaṃ “itthī”ti sañjānanassa kāraṇabhāvato itthinimittaṃ. Vuttavipariyāyato purisanimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:139_3: veditabbaṃ. Subhanimittādikaṃ vāti ettha rāguppattihetubhūto iṭṭhākāro subhanimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:139_4: Ādi-saddena paṭighanimittādīnaṃ saṅgaho. So pana dosuppattiādihetubhūto aniṭṭhādiākāro
anya-e0103n:139_5: veditabbo. Kāmañcettha pāḷiyaṃ abhijjhādomanassāva sarūpato āgatā, upekkhānimittassāpi
anya-e0103n:139_6: pana saṅgaho icchitabbo, asamapekkhanena uppajjanakamohassāpi asaṃvarabhāvato. Tathā
anya-e0103n:139_7: hi vakkhati “muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā”ti. Upekkhānimittanti cettha aññāṇupekkhāya
anya-e0103n:139_8: vatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tañcassa asamapekkhanavasena veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ saṅkhepato
anya-e0103n:139_10: nimitta”nti. Diṭṭhamatteyeva saṇṭhātīti “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti sutte
anya-e0103n:139_11: vuttanayena vaṇṇāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena, vīthicittehi ca gahitamatteyeva tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:139_12: na tato paraṃ kiñci subhādiākāraṃ parikappeti. Pākaṭabhāvakaraṇatoti paribyattabhāvakaraṇato
anya-e0103n:139_13: vibhūtabhāvakaraṇato. Visabhāgavatthuno hi hatthādiavayavesu subhādito parikappentassa
anya-e0103n:139_14: aparāparaṃ tattha uppajjamānā kilesā paribyattā hontīti te tesaṃ anubyañjanā nāma.
anya-e0103n:139_15: Te pana yasmā tathā tathā sanniviṭṭhānaṃ bhūtupādāyarūpānaṃ sannivesākāro. Na hi
anya-e0103n:139_16: taṃ muñcitvā paramatthato hatthādi nāma koci atthi. Tasmā vuttaṃ “hatthapāda…pe…
anya-e0103n:139_17: ākāraṃ na gaṇhātī”ti. Kiṃ pana gaṇhātīti āha “yaṃ tattha bhūtaṃ, tadeva gaṇhātī”ti.
anya-e0103n:139_18: Yaṃ tasmiṃ sarīre vijjamānaṃ kesalomādi bhūtupādāyamattaṃ vā, tadeva yāthāvato gaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:139_19: Tattha asubhākāragahaṇassa nidassanaṃ dassento “cetiyapabbatavāsī”tiādinā mahātissattheravatthuṃ āhari.
anya-e0103n:140_0: Tattha sumaṇḍitapasādhitāti suṭṭhu maṇḍitā pasādhitā ca. Ābharaṇādīhi āhārimehi maṇḍanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:140_1: Sarīrassa ucchādanādivasena paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ pasādhananti vadanti, ābharaṇehi, pana
anya-e0103n:140_2: vatthālaṅkārādīhi ca alaṅkaraṇaṃ pasādhanaṃ. Ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ maṇḍanaṃ. Vipallatthacittāti
anya-e0103n:140_3: rāgavasena viparītacittā. Olokentoti thero kammaṭṭhānamanasikāreneva gacchanto saddakaṇṭakattā
anya-e0103n:140_5: aṭṭhikasaññaṃ. Aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānaṃ hi thero tadā pariharati. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti thero
anya-e0103n:140_6: kira tassā hasantiyā dantaṭṭhidassaneneva pubbabhāgabhāvanāya subhāvitattā paṭibhāganimittaṃ,
anya-e0103n:140_7: sātisayañca upacārajjhānaṃ labhitvā yathāṭhitova tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ adhigantvā
anya-e0103n:140_8: taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaparamparāya āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. Pubbasaññaṃ
anya-e0103n:140_9: anussarīti pubbakaṃ yathāraddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ anuyuñjiyamānaṃ aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:140_10: anussari samannāhari. Anumagganti anupathaṃ tassā padānupadaṃ. Therassa kira bhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:140_11: paguṇabhāvato dantaṭṭhidassaneneva tassā sakalasarīraṃ aṭṭhikasaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n:140_12: Na taṃ “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā sañjāni. Tenāha “nābhijānāmi…pe… mahāpathe”ti.
anya-e0103n:141_0: “Yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetū”ti vatvā puna “tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena
anya-e0103n:141_1: pidahanatthāyā”ti vuttaṃ, na asaṃvarassāti. Yadidaṃ yaṃ cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu
anya-e0103n:141_2: abhijjhādianvāssavanaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ asaṃvutacakkhundriyasseva hetu pavattaṃ dassitanti
anya-e0103n:141_3: katvā vuttaṃ. Cakkhudvārikassa hi abhijjhādianvāssavanassa taṃdvārikaviññāṇassa viya
anya-e0103n:141_4: cakkhundriyaṃ padhānakāraṇaṃ. Cakkhundriyassa asaṃvutatte sati te anvāssavantīti
anya-e0103n:141_5: asaṃvariyamānacakkhundriyahetuko so asaṃvaro tathā vuttoti. Yatvādhikaraṇanti hi
anya-e0103n:141_6: yassa cakkhundriyassa kāraṇāti attho. Kīdisassa ca kāraṇāti? Asaṃvutassa, kiñca asaṃvutaṃ?
anya-e0103n:141_7: Yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu abhijjhādayo anvāssavanti, tassa saṃvarāyāti ayamettha yojanā.
anya-e0103n:142_0: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vātiādi puna avacanatthaṃ idheva sabbaṃ vuttanti
anya-e0103n:142_1: chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbaṃ. Na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0103n:142_2: dussīlyaṃ atthi, tasmā dussīlyāsaṃvaro manodvāravasena, sesāsaṃvaro chadvāravasena
anya-e0103n:142_3: yojetabbo. Muṭṭhasaccādīnaṃ hi satipaṭipakkhākusaladhammādibhāvato siyā pañcadvāre
anya-e0103n:142_4: uppatti, na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti, pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ
anya-e0103n:142_5: aviññattijanakattā. Dussīlyādayo cettha pañca asaṃvarā sīlasaṃvarādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ
anya-e0103n:142_6: saṃvarānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena vuttā. Tasmiṃ satīti tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati.
anya-e0103n:143_0: Yathā kinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro “cakkhundriye asaṃvaro”ti vuccati,
anya-e0103n:143_1: taṃ nidassanaṃ kinti attho. Yathātiādinā nagaradvāre asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:143_2: gharādīnaṃ asaṃvutatā viya javane asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ dvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutatāti
anya-e0103n:143_3: evaṃ aññāsaṃvare aññāsaṃvutatā sāmaññameva nidasseti, na pubbāparasāmaññaṃ, antobahisāmaññaṃ
anya-e0103n:143_4: vā. Sati vā dvārabhavaṅgādike puna uppajjamānaṃ javanaṃ bāhiraṃ viya katvā nagaradvārasamānaṃ
anya-e0103n:143_5: vuttaṃ, itarañca antonagare gharādisamānaṃ. Paccayabhāvena hi purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle
anya-e0103n:143_6: asantampi bhavaṅgādi cakkhādi viya phalanipphattiyā santaṃyeva nāma hoti. Na hi dharamānaṃyeva
anya-e0103n:143_7: “santa”nti vuccati. “Bāhiraṃ viya katvā”ti ca paramatthato javanassa bāhirabhāve,
anya-e0103n:143_8: itarassa ca abbhantarabhāve asatipi “pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho
anya-e0103n:143_9: āgantukehi upakkiliṭṭha”ntiādi vacanato āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa
anya-e0103n:143_10: javanassa bāhirabhāvo, tabbidhurasabhāvassa itarassa abbhantarabhāvo ekena pariyāyena
anya-e0103n:143_11: hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Javane vā asaṃvare uppanne tato paraṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ asaṃvarahetubhāvāpattito.
anya-e0103n:143_12: Asaṃvarassa hi uppattiyā dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ tassa hetubhāvo paññāyatīti. Nagaradvārasadisena
anya-e0103n:143_13: javanena pavisitvā dussīlyādicorānaṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīsu musanaṃ kusalabhaṇḍavināsanaṃ
anya-e0103n:143_14: kathitaṃ. Yasmiṃ hi dvāre asaṃvaro uppajjati, so tattha dvārādīnaṃ saṃvarūpanissayabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:143_15: upacchindantoyeva pavattatīti. Dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ javanena saha sambandho ekasantatipariyāpannato daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:144_0: Ettha ca cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe āpāthagate niyamitādivasena kusalākusalajavane sattakkhattuṃ
anya-e0103n:144_1: uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe tadanurūpameva manodvārikajavane tasmiṃyevārammaṇe sattakkhattuṃyeva
anya-e0103n:144_2: uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre tadevārammaṇaṃ nissāya “itthī puriso”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:144_3: vavatthapentaṃ pasādarajjanādivasena sattakkhattuṃ javanaṃ javati. Evaṃ pavattamānaṃ
anya-e0103n:144_4: javanaṃ sandhāya “javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi agutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:145_1: uppannesu. Yathā hi pageva satiārakkhaṃ anupaṭṭhapentassa dussīlyādīnaṃ uppatti,
anya-e0103n:145_2: evaṃ pageva satiārakkhaṃ upaṭṭhapentassa sīlādīnaṃ uppatti veditabbā. Saddādīsupi
anya-e0103n:145_3: yathārahaṃ nimittānubyañjanāni veditabbāni. Sotaviññāṇena hi saddaṃ sutvā “itthisaddo”ti
anya-e0103n:145_4: vā “purisasaddo”ti vā iṭṭhāniṭṭhādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n:145_5: sutamatte eva saṇṭhāti. Yo ca gītasaddādikassa kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato “anubyañjana”nti
anya-e0103n:145_6: laddhavohāro mandatārādivasena vavatthito chajjādibhedabhinno ākāro, tampi na gaṇhātīti.
anya-e0103n:145_7: Evaṃ gandhādīsupi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. Manodvāre pana sāvajjanabhavaṅgaṃ manodvāraṃ
anya-e0103n:145_8: tasmiṃ dvāre dhammārammaṇe āpāthagate taṃ javanamanasāva viññāya vijānitvātiādinā
anya-e0103n:145_9: yojetabbaṃ. Kileso anubandho etassāti kilesānubandho, so eva nimittādigāho, tato
anya-e0103n:147_0: 16. Vutteti idheva uddesavasena pubbe vutte. Tathā hi “ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ
anya-e0103n:147_1: sikkhāpadāna”nti paduddhāraṃ katvā tāni pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “yāni tānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:147_2: Tattha yāni tāni evaṃ paññattāni cha sikkhāpadānīti sambandho. Ājīvahetūti jīvikanimittaṃ,
anya-e0103n:147_3: “evāhaṃ paccayehi akilamanto jīvissāmī”ti adhippāyena. Ājīvakāraṇāti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:147_4: Pāpicchoti pāpikāya asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya samannāgato. Icchāpakatoti icchāya
anya-e0103n:147_5: apakato upadduto, abhibhūto vā. Asantanti avijjamānaṃ. Abhūtanti anuppannaṃ. Anuppannattā
anya-e0103n:147_6: hi tassa taṃ asantanti purimassa pacchimaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ. Uttarimanussadhammanti
anya-e0103n:147_7: uttarimanussānaṃ ukkaṭṭhapurisānaṃ dhammaṃ, manussadhammato vā uttari ukkaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:147_8: Ullapatīti uggatāyuko lapati. Sīlaṃ hi bhikkhuno āyu, taṃ tassa tathālapanasamakālameva
anya-e0103n:147_9: vigacchati. Tenāha “āpatti pārājikassā”ti pārājikasaṅkhātā āpatti assa, pārājikasaññitassa
anya-e0103n:147_10: vā vītikkamassa āpajjanaṃ ullapananti attho. Sañcarittaṃ samāpajjatīti sañcaraṇabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:147_11: āpajjati, itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ, purisassa vā itthimatiṃ ārocetīti adhippāyo. “Imesaṃ
anya-e0103n:147_12: channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamassa vasenā”ti sambandho heṭṭhā dassito eva.
anya-e0103n:148: Kuhanātiādīsūti heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhapāḷiyāva paduddhāro. Ayaṃ pāḷīti ayaṃ vibhaṅge āgatā niddesapāḷi.
anya-e0103n:149_0: 17. Cīvarādipaccayā labbhantīti lābhā. Te eva sakkaccaṃ ādaravasena diyyamānā sakkārā.
anya-e0103n:149_1: Patthaṭayasatā kittisaddo. Taṃ lābhañca sakkārañca kittisaddañca. Sannissitassāti
anya-e0103n:149_3: asante attani avijjamāne saddhādiguṇe sambhāvetukāmassa. Asantaguṇasambhāvanatālakkhaṇā,
anya-e0103n:149_4: paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutālakkhaṇā hi pāpicchatā. Icchāya apakatassāti pāpikāya icchāya
anya-e0103n:149_5: sammāājīvato apeto katoti apakato. Tathābhūto ca ājīvūpaddavena upaddutoti katvā
anya-e0103n:150_0: Kuhanameva paccayuppādanassa vatthūti kuhanavatthu. Tividhampetaṃ tattha āgataṃ tassa
anya-e0103n:150_1: nissayabhūtāya imāya pāḷiyā dassetunti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Tadatthikassevāti tehi
anya-e0103n:150_2: cīvarādīhi atthikasseva. Paṭikkhipanenāti cīvarādīnaṃ paṭikkhipanahetu. Assāti bhaveyya.
anya-e0103n:150_3: Paṭiggahaṇena cāti ca-saddena pubbe vuttaṃ paṭikkhipanaṃ samuccinoti.
anya-e0103n:151_0: Bhiyyokamyatanti bahukāmataṃ. Yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tasmā “dhāreyyā”ti ettha yadetaṃ
anya-e0103n:151_1: saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhāraṇaṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa sāruppanti yojanā. Pāpaṇikānīti āpaṇato
anya-e0103n:151_2: chaḍḍitāni. Nantakānīti antarahitāni coḷakhaṇḍāni. Uccinitvāti uñchanena cinitvā
anya-e0103n:151_3: saṅgahetvā. Uñchācariyāyāti uñchācariyāya laddhena. Gilānassa paccayabhūtā bhesajjasaṅkhātā
anya-e0103n:151_5: ca sabbassa gomuttassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Pūtimuttenāti pūtibhāvena muttena parehi chaḍḍitena,
anya-e0103n:151_6: pūtibhūtena vā gomuttena. Dhutavādoti paresampi dhutaguṇavādī. Sammukhībhāvāti sammukhato
anya-e0103n:152_0: Attānaṃ uttarimanussadhammādhigamassa sāmante katvā jappanaṃ sāmantajappanaṃ. Mahesakkhoti
anya-e0103n:152_2: puna taṃ viseseti “sandiṭṭho sambhatto”ti. Diṭṭhamatto hi mitto sandiṭṭho. Daḷhabhattiko
anya-e0103n:152_3: sambhatto. Sahāyoti saha āyanako, sakhāti attho. Sattapadino hi “sakhā”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0103n:152_4: Vihāro pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso. Aḍḍhayogo dīghapāsādo, garuḷasaṇṭhānapāsādotipi
anya-e0103n:152_5: vadanti. Pāsādo caturassapāsādo. Hammiyaṃ muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. Kūṭāgāraṃ dvīhi kaṇṇikāhi
anya-e0103n:152_6: kattabbapāsādo. Aṭṭo paṭirājūnampi paṭibāhanayogyo catupañcabhūmako paṭissayaviseso.
anya-e0103n:152_7: Māḷo ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇavanto paṭissayaviseso. Uddaṇḍo agabbhikā ekadvārā
anya-e0103n:152_8: dīghasālāti vadanti. Apare pana bhaṇanti – vihāro nāma dīghamukhapāsādo. Aḍḍhayogo
anya-e0103n:152_9: ekapassena chadanakasenāsanaṃ. Tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti, itarapasse
anya-e0103n:152_10: nīcā, tena taṃ ekapassachadanakaṃ hoti. Pāsādo āyatacaturassapāsādo. Hammiyaṃ muṇḍacchadanaṃ
anya-e0103n:152_11: candikaṅgaṇayuttaṃ. Guhā kevalā pabbataguhā. Leṇaṃ dvārabaddhaṃ. Kūṭāgāraṃ yo koci
anya-e0103n:152_12: kaṇṇikābaddhapāsādo. Aṭṭo bahalabhittigehaṃ. Yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi
anya-e0103n:152_13: eva chadanaṃ hoti. Aṭṭālakākārena karīyatītipi vadanti. Māḷo vaṭṭākārena katasenāsanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:152_14: Uddaṇḍo eko paṭissayaviseso. Yo “bhaṇḍasālā, udosita”ntipi vuccati. Upaṭṭhānasālā sannipatanaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:153_1: taṃ etassa atthīti korajiko, kohaññena saṃyatakāyo, ativiya, abhiṇhaṃ vā korajiko
anya-e0103n:153_2: korajikakorajiko. Atiparisaṅkitoti keci. Ativiya kuho kuhakakuhako, sātisayavimhāpakoti
anya-e0103n:153_3: attho. Ativiya lapo lapanako lapakalapako. Mukhasambhāvikoti korajikakorajikādibhāvena
anya-e0103n:153_4: pavattavacanehi attano mukhamattena aññehi sambhāviko. So evarūpo evarūpatāya eva
anya-e0103n:153_5: attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā “ayaṃ samaṇo”tiādīni katheti. Gambhīrantiādi tassā kathāya
anya-e0103n:154_0: Sambhāvanādhippāyakatenāti “kathaṃ nu kho maṃ jano ‘ariyo’ti vā ‘visesalābhī’ti vā
anya-e0103n:154_1: sambhāveyyā”ti iminā adhippāyena katena. Gamanaṃ saṇṭhapetīti visesalābhīnaṃ gamanaṃ
anya-e0103n:154_2: viya attano gamanaṃ sakkaccaṃ ṭhapeti, sato sampajānova gacchanto viya hoti. Paṇidhāyāti
anya-e0103n:154_3: “arahāti maṃ jānantū”ti cittaṃ saṇṭhapetvā, patthetvā vā. Samāhito viyāti jhānasamādhinā
anya-e0103n:154_4: samāhito viya. Āpāthakajjhāyīti manussānaṃ āpāthaṭṭhāne samādhisamāpanno viya nisīdanto
anya-e0103n:154_5: āpāthake janassa pākaṭaṭṭhāne jhāyī. Iriyāpathasaṅkhātanti iriyāpathasaṇṭhapanasaṅkhātaṃ.
anya-e0103n:155_0: Paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātenāti ayoniso uppāditānaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭisevananti evaṃ kathitena,
anya-e0103n:155_1: tena vā paccayapaṭisevanena saṅkhātabbena kathitabbena. Aññaṃ viya katvā attano samīpe
anya-e0103n:155_2: bhaṇanaṃ sāmantajappitaṃ. Ā-kārassa rassattaṃ katvā “aṭṭhapanā”ti vuttaṃ. Kuhanaṃ
anya-e0103n:155_3: kuho, tassa ayanā pavatti kuhāyanā, kuhassa vā puggalassa ayanā gati kiriyā kuhāyanā.
anya-e0103n:155_4: Kuheti, kuhena vā itoti kuhito, kuhako.
anya-e0103n:156: Puṭṭhassāti “ko tisso, ko rājapūjito”ti puṭṭhassa. Uddhaṃ katvāti ukkhipitvā vibhavasampattiādinā paggahetvā.
anya-e0103n:157_0: Unnahanāti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ bandhanā paliveṭhanā. Dve kira bhikkhū ekaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā
anya-e0103n:157_1: āsanasālāya nisīditvā ekaṃ kumārikaṃ pakkosiṃsu. Tāya āgatāya tatreko ekaṃ pucchi
anya-e0103n:157_2: “ayaṃ, bhante, kassa kumārikā”ti? “Amhākaṃ upaṭṭhāyikāya telakandarikāya dhītā, imissā
anya-e0103n:157_3: mātā mayi gehaṃ gate sappiṃ dadamānā ghaṭeneva deti, ayampi mātā viya ghaṭena detī”ti
anya-e0103n:157_4: ukkācesi. Imaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “telakandarikavatthu cettha vattabba”nti.
anya-e0103n:158_0: Dhammānurūpā vāti mattāvacanānurūpaṃ vā. Mattāvacanaṃ hi “dhammo”ti vuccati. Yathāha
anya-e0103n:158_1: “subhāsitaṃ uttamamāhu santo, dhammaṃ bhaṇe nādhammaṃ taṃ dutiya”nti. Tena bahuṃ
anya-e0103n:158_2: vippalapanamāha, saccato vā aññā subhāsitā vācā “dhammo”ti veditabbo. Muggasūpasadisakammo
anya-e0103n:158_3: puggalo muggasūpyo. Tenāha “ayaṃ puggalo muggasūpyoti vuccatī”ti. Paribhaṭassa kammaṃ
anya-e0103n:159_0: Nimittena caranto, jīvanto vā nimittako, tassa bhāvo nemittikatā. Attano icchāya
anya-e0103n:159_1: pakāsanaṃ obhāso. Ko pana soti? “Ajja bhikkhūnaṃ paccayā dullabhā jātā”tiādikā paccayapaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
anya-e0103n:160_0: Akkosanabhayenāpi dadeyyāti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanaṃ. Tathā vambhanādayo.
anya-e0103n:160_1: Upekkhanā upāsakānaṃ dāyakādibhāvato bahi chaḍḍanā. Khipanāti khepavacanaṃ. Taṃ pana
anya-e0103n:160_2: avahasitvā vacanaṃ hotīti āha “uppaṇḍanā”ti. Pāpanāti adāyakattassa, avaṇṇassa vā
anya-e0103n:160_3: patiṭṭhāpanaṃ. Paresaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsakhādanasīlo parapiṭṭhimaṃsiko, tassa bhāvo parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā.
anya-e0103n:160_4: Abbhaṅganti abbhañjanaṃ. Nipisitvā gandhamagganā viyāti anippisite alabbhamānassa
anya-e0103n:160_5: gandhassa nipisane lābho viya paraguṇe anippisite alabbhamānānaṃ paccayānaṃ nipisanena lābho daṭṭhabboti.
anya-e0103n:161: Nikattuṃ appena lābhena bahukaṃ vañcetvā gahetuṃ icchanaṃ nijigīsanaṃ, tassa bhāvo nijigīsanatā. Tasseva icchanassa pavattiākāro, taṃsahajātaṃ vā gavesanakammaṃ.
anya-e0103n:162_0: Aṅganti hatthapādādiaṅgāni uddissa pavattaṃ vijjaṃ. Nimittanti nimittasatthaṃ. Uppātanti
anya-e0103n:162_2: itthipurisānaṃ lakkhaṇajānanasatthaṃ. Mūsikacchinnanti vatthādīnaṃ asukabhāge mūsikacchede
anya-e0103n:162_3: sati idaṃ nāma phalaṃ hotīti jānanakasatthaṃ. Palāsaggiādīsu iminā nāma agginā hute
anya-e0103n:162_4: idaṃ nāma hotīti aggivasena homavidhānaṃ aggihomaṃ. Iminā nayena dabbihomaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:162_5: Ādi-saddena thusahomādīnaṃ, aññesañca sutte āgatānaṃ micchājīvānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:162_7: pārisuddhi anavajjabhāvo, yena dhammena samena paccayalābho hoti. Na hi alaso ñāyena
anya-e0103n:164_0: 18. Paṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya ya-kāralopena niddeso. Yonisoti
anya-e0103n:164_1: cettha upāyattho yoniso-saddoti dassento āha “upāyena pathenā”ti. “Paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā”ti
anya-e0103n:164_2: vatvā tayidaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇanti dassetuṃ “paccavekkhitvāti attho”tiādi
anya-e0103n:164_3: vuttaṃ. Yathā hi paccavekkhitvāti sītapaṭighātādikaṃ taṃ taṃ payojanaṃ pati pati
anya-e0103n:164_4: avekkhitvā, ñāṇena passitvāti attho, evaṃ paṭisaṅkhāyāti tadeva payojanaṃ pati pati
anya-e0103n:164_5: saṅkhāya, jānitvāti attho. Ñāṇapariyāyo hi idha saṅkhā-saddoti. Ettha ca “paṭisaṅkhā
anya-e0103n:164_6: yoniso”tiādi kāmaṃ paccayaparibhogakālena vuccati, dhātuvasena pana paṭikūlavasena
anya-e0103n:164_7: vā paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīlaṃ sujjhatīti apare. Bhijjatīti keci. Eke
anya-e0103n:164_8: pana paṭhamaṃ eva pariyattanti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. “Cīvara”nti ekavacanaṃ ekattamattaṃ
anya-e0103n:164_9: vācakanti adhippāyena “antaravāsakādīsu yaṃ kiñcī”ti vuttaṃ, jātisaddatāya pana tassa
anya-e0103n:164_10: pāḷiyaṃ ekavacananti yattakāni cīvarāni yoginā pariharitabbāni, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0103n:164_11: gahaṇanti sakkā viññātuṃ, yaṃ kiñcīti vā anavasesapariyādānametaṃ, na aniyamavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:164_12: “Nivāseti vā pārupati vā”ti vikappanaṃ pana paṭisevanapariyāyassa paribhogassa vibhāgadassananti
anya-e0103n:164_13: taṃ paññapetvā sayananisīdana-cīvarakuṭikaraṇādivasenāpi paribhogassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:165_0: Payojanānaṃ mariyādā payojanāvadhi, tassa paricchindanavasena yo niyamo, tassa vacanaṃ
anya-e0103n:165_1: payojanā…pe… vacanaṃ. Idāni taṃ niyamaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ “ettakameva hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:165_3: Tenāha “na ito bhiyyo”ti. Līḷāvasena hi ekacce sattā vatthāni paridahanti ceva upasaṃviyanti
anya-e0103n:165_4: ca. Yathā taṃ yobbane ṭhitā nāgarikamanussā. Ekacce vibhūsanavasena, yathā taṃ rūpūpajīviniādayo.
anya-e0103n:165_5: Vilambanavasena vilambakā. Naṭambaravasena bhojādayo. Ajjhattadhātukkhobho sītarogādiuppādako.
anya-e0103n:165_7: hemantādīsu himapātādivasena pavattassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na uppādeti sītanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:165_8: Yadatthaṃ pana taṃ vinodanaṃ, taṃ matthakappattaṃ dassetuṃ “sītabbhāhate”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:165_9: Sabbatthāti “uṇhassa paṭighātāyā”tiādīsu sabbesu sesapayojanesu. Yadipi sūriyasantāpopi
anya-e0103n:165_10: uṇhova, tassa pana ātapaggahaṇena gahitattā “aggisantāpassā”ti vuttaṃ. Ekacco dāvaggisantāpo
anya-e0103n:165_11: kāyaṃ cīvarena paṭicchādetvā sakkā vinodetunti āha “tassa vanadāhādīsu sambhavo veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:165_12: Ḍaṃsāti piṅgalamakkhikā. Te pana yasmā ḍaṃsanasīlā, tasmā vuttaṃ “ḍaṃsanamakkhikā”ti.
anya-e0103n:165_14: Tividhā hi sappā – daṭṭhavisā phuṭṭhavisā diṭṭhavisā. Tesu purimakā dve eva gahitā.
anya-e0103n:165_15: Satapadiādīnampi tādisānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ. Niyatapayojanaṃ ekantikaṃ, sabbakālikañca
anya-e0103n:165_16: payojanaṃ. Hirī kuppati nillajjatā saṇṭhāti. Tenāha “vinassatī”ti. Kūpāvataraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:165_17: vā paṭicchādanaṃ arahatīti kopinaṃ. Hiriyitabbaṭṭhena hirī ca taṃ kopinañcāti hirikopinanti
anya-e0103n:165_18: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tassa cāti ca-saddo pubbe vuttapayojanānaṃ sampiṇḍanattho.
anya-e0103n:166_0: Yaṃ kiñci āhāranti khādanīyabhojanīyādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci āharitabbavatthuṃ. Piṇḍāya
anya-e0103n:166_1: bhikkhāya ulatīti piṇḍolo, tassa kammaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ. Tena piṇḍolyena bhikkhācariyāya.
anya-e0103n:166_2: Patitattāti pakkhipitattā. Piṇḍapāto patte pakkhittabhikkhāhāro. Piṇḍānaṃ vā pātoti
anya-e0103n:166_3: ghare ghare laddhabhikkhānaṃ sannipāto. “Natthi davā”tiādīsu sahasā kiriyāpi “davā”ti
anya-e0103n:166_4: vuccati, tato visesanatthaṃ “davatthaṃ, kīḷānimittanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha. Muṭṭhikamallā
anya-e0103n:166_6: balaṃ nissāya uppajjanakamado balamado. Taṃ nimittaṃ, balassa uppādanatthanti attho.
anya-e0103n:166_7: Porisamadanimittanti porisamado vuccati purisamāno “ahaṃ puriso”ti uppajjanakamāno.
anya-e0103n:166_8: Asaddhammasevanāsamatthataṃ nissāya pavatto māno, rāgo eva vā porisamadoti keci.
anya-e0103n:166_9: Taṃ nimittaṃ. Antepurikā rājorodhā. Sabbesaṃ sannivesayogyatāya vesiyo rūpūpajīviniyo.
anya-e0103n:166_10: Maṇḍanaṃ nāma idhāvayavapāripūrīti āha “aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ pīṇabhāvanimitta”nti, paribrūhanahetūti
anya-e0103n:166_11: attho. Naṭā nāma raṅganaṭā. Naccakā laṅghakādayo. Vibhūsanaṃ sobhāsamuppādananti
anya-e0103n:167_0: Etaṃ padaṃ. Mohūpanissayappahānatthanti mohassa upanissayatāpahānāya. Davā hi mohena
anya-e0103n:167_1: hoti, mohañca vaḍḍhetīti tassā vajjanena mohassa anupanissayatā. Dosūpanissayappahānatthanti
anya-e0103n:167_2: idaṃ balamadassa, purisamadassa ca dosahetuno vasena vuttaṃ, itarassa pana vasena
anya-e0103n:167_5: ekaccassa davamade ārabbha parassa paṭighasaṃyojanādīnaṃ uppatti hotiyeva manopadosikadevādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:167_6: viya, attano pana davamade ārabbha yesaṃ savisesaṃ rāgamohamānādayo pāpadhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n:167_7: Te sandhāya “attano saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanattha”nti vatvā maṇḍanavibhūsanāni paṭicca
anya-e0103n:167_9: vuttaṃ. Ayoniso paṭipattiyāti ettha kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ muñcitvā sabbāpi micchāpaṭipatti
anya-e0103n:167_10: ayoniso paṭipatti. Purimehi dvīhi padehi ayoniso paṭipattiyā, pacchimehi dvīhi kāmasukhallikānuyogassa
anya-e0103n:167_11: pahānaṃ vuttanti vadanti. “Catūhipi cetehī”ti pana vacanato sabbehi ubhinnampi pahānaṃ
anya-e0103n:167_12: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Kāmakīḷāpi davantogadhā hotiyeva, purisamadopi kāmasukhallikānuyogassa hetuyevāti.
anya-e0103n:168_1: Ṭhitiyāti ṭhitatthaṃ. Sā panassa ṭhiti pabandhavasena icchitāti āha “pabandhaṭṭhitattha”nti.
anya-e0103n:168_2: Pavattiyāti jīvitindriyappavattiyā. Tathā hi jīvitindriyaṃ “yāpanā vattanā”ti ca
anya-e0103n:168_3: niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tassā ca avicchedo āhārūpayogena hoti. Kāyassa cirataraṃ yāva āyukappo,
anya-e0103n:168_4: tāva avatthānaṃ yāpanāti dassento “cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṃ vā”ti āha. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:168_5: pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “gharūpatthambhamivā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – yathā jiṇṇagharasāmiko
anya-e0103n:168_6: gharassa upatthambhanaṃ karoti tassa apatanatthaṃ, yathā ca sākaṭiko akkhabbhañjanaṃ
anya-e0103n:168_7: karoti tassa sampavattanatthaṃ, evamesa yogī kāyassa ṭhitatthaṃ, yāpanatthañca piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0103n:168_8: paṭisevati paribhuñjatīti. Etena ṭhiti nāma apatanaṃ yāpanā pavattīti dasseti. Na
anya-e0103n:168_10: Tiṭṭhanti upādinnadhammā etāyāti ṭhiti, āyūti āha “ṭhitīti jīvitindriyassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
anya-e0103n:168_11: Tathā hi taṃ āyu “ṭhitī”ti niddiṭṭhaṃ, ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti kāyassa ṭhitihetutāya “ṭhitī”ti
anya-e0103n:168_13: Ābādhaṭṭhenāti vibādhanaṭṭhena, rogaṭṭhena vā. Jighacchāparamā hi rogā. Uparamatthanti
anya-e0103n:168_14: vūpasamatthaṃ. Vaṇālepanamiva vaṇiko. Uṇhasītādīsu abhibhavantesu tappaṭikāraṃ sītuṇhaṃ
anya-e0103n:168_15: viya paṭisevatīti sambandho. Maggabrahmacariyaṃ ṭhapetvā sikkhattayasaṅgahā sāsanāvacaritabbā
anya-e0103n:168_17: cā”ti. Anuggahaṇatthanti anu anu gaṇhanatthaṃ sampādanatthaṃ. Kāyabalaṃ nissāyāti
anya-e0103n:168_20: yathā agiddhā amucchitā kevalaṃ taṃ taṃ atthasiddhimeva avekkhantā paṭisevanti tehi
anya-e0103n:168_21: vinā asijjhanato, evamayampi kevalaṃ bhavakantāranittharaṇatthiko agiddho amucchito
anya-e0103n:168_22: tena vinā asijjhanato piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevatīti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:169_0: Itīti pakāratthe nipātapadaṃ. Tena paṭiseviyamānassa piṇḍapātassa paṭisevanākāro
anya-e0103n:169_1: gayhatīti āha “evaṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanenā”ti. Purāṇanti bhojanato purimakālikattā
anya-e0103n:169_2: purātanaṃ. Paṭihaṅkhāmīti paṭihanissāmi. Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti paṭisevatīti
anya-e0103n:169_3: yojanā. Kīdisaṃ, kathañcāti āha “aparimita…pe… aññataro viyā”ti. Aparimitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:169_4: bhojanaṃ paccayo etissāti aparimitabhojanapaccayā, taṃ aparimitabhojanapaccayaṃ attano
anya-e0103n:169_5: gahaṇītejapamāṇato atikkantapamāṇabhojanahetukanti attho. Yo bahuṃ bhuñjitvā attano
anya-e0103n:169_6: dhammatāya uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto “āhara hattha”nti vadati, ayaṃ āharahatthako. Yo bhuñjitvā
anya-e0103n:169_7: accuddhumātakucchitāya uṭṭhitopi sāṭakaṃ nivāsetuṃ na sakkoti, ayaṃ alaṃsāṭako. Yo
anya-e0103n:169_8: bhuñjitvā uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto tattheva parivattati, ayaṃ tatravaṭṭako. Yo yathā kākehi
anya-e0103n:169_9: āmasituṃ sakkā, evaṃ yāva mukhadvāraṃ āhāreti, ayaṃ kākamāsako. Yo bhuñjitvā mukhe
anya-e0103n:169_10: sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tattheva vamati, ayaṃ bhuttavamitako. Etesaṃ aññataro viya.
anya-e0103n:169_11: Atha vā purāṇavedanā nāma abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā. Taṃ “paṭihanissāmī”ti
anya-e0103n:169_12: paṭisevati. Navavedanā nāma atibhuttapaccayena uppajjanakavedanā. Taṃ “na uppādessāmī”ti
anya-e0103n:169_13: paṭisevati. Atha vā navavedanā nāma abhuttapaccayena uppajjanakavedanā, tassā anuppannāya
anya-e0103n:169_14: anuppajjanatthameva paṭisevati. Abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakāti cetaṃ khuddāya visesanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:169_15: Yassā appavatti bhojanena kātabbā, tassā dassanatthaṃ. Abhuttapaccayena, bhuttapaccayena
anya-e0103n:169_16: ca uppajjanakānuppajjanakavedanāsu purimā yathāpavattā jighacchānimittā vedanā. Sā
anya-e0103n:169_17: hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyopavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati. Pacchimāpi khuddānimittāva aṅgadāhasūlādivedanā
anya-e0103n:169_18: pavattā. Sā hi bhuttapaccayā pubbe anuppannāva nuppajjissatīti ayametāsaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n:170_0: Yā vedanā. Adhunāti etarahi. Asappāyāparimitabhojanaṃ nissāyāti asappāyāparimitassa
anya-e0103n:170_1: āhārassa bhuñjanapayogaṃ āgamma uppajjatīti attho. Purāṇakammapaccayavasenāti pubbe
anya-e0103n:170_2: purimajātiyaṃ katattā purāṇassa kammassa paccayatāvasena payogavipattiṃ āgamma uppajjanārahatāya
anya-e0103n:170_3: taṃ vajjetvā payogasampattiyā upaṭṭhāpanaṃ dukkhavedanāpaccayaghāto, paṭihananañca
anya-e0103n:170_4: hotīti āha “tassā paccayaṃ vināsento taṃ purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmī”ti. Ayuttaparibhogo
anya-e0103n:170_5: paccaye apaccavekkhitvā paribhogo. So eva katūpacitakammatāya kammūpacayo. Taṃ nissāya
anya-e0103n:170_6: paṭicca āyatiṃ anāgate kāle uppajjanato yā cāyaṃ “navavedanā”ti vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:170_7: Yuttaparibhogavasenāti paccavekkhitvā paccayānaṃ paribhogavasena, tassā navavedanāya
anya-e0103n:170_8: mūlaṃ ayuttaparibhogakammaṃ anibbattento sabbena sabbaṃ anuppādento. Ettāvatāti “iti
anya-e0103n:170_9: purāṇa”ntiādinā vuttena padadvayena. “Vihiṃsūparatiyā”tiādinā vā padacatukkena yuttaparibhogasaṅgaho
anya-e0103n:171_0: Asappāyāparimitūpayogena jīvitindriyupacchedako, iriyāpathabhañjanako vā siyā parissayo,
anya-e0103n:171_1: sappāyaparimitūpayogena pana so na hoti. Tathā sati cirakālappavattisaṅkhātā sarīrassa
anya-e0103n:171_2: yātrā yāpanā bhavissatīti imamatthaṃ dassento “parimitaparibhogena…pe… bhavissatī”ti
anya-e0103n:171_3: āha. Yo rogo sāddho asāddho ca na hoti, so yāpyarogo, so etassa atthīti yāpyarogī.
anya-e0103n:171_4: So hi niccakālaṃ bhesajjaṃ upasevati, tathā ayampīti. Yadi yātrāpi yāpanā, pubbepi
anya-e0103n:171_5: “yāpanāyā”ti vuttaṃ, ko ettha visesoti? Pubbe “yāpanāyā”ti jīvitindriyayāpanā adhippetā,
anya-e0103n:171_6: idha pana catunnampi iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanā yātrāti ayamettha viseso.
anya-e0103n:171_8: attano ca pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā paṭiggahaṇaṃ, saddhādeyyavinipātanatthaṃ vā paṭiggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:171_9: ayuttapaṭiggahaṇaṃ, yena vā āpattiṃ āpajjati. Apaccavekkhitvā paribhogo ayuttaparibhogo.
anya-e0103n:171_10: Tesaṃ parivajjanaṃ dhammena samena paccayuppādanādivasena veditabbaṃ. Dhammena hi
anya-e0103n:171_11: paccaye pariyesitvā dhammena paṭiggahetvā paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanaṃ anavajjatā nāma.
anya-e0103n:172_0: Aratīti ukkaṇṭhā. Pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu ca anabhirati. Tandīti pacalāyikā
anya-e0103n:172_1: niddā. Vijambhitāti thinamiddhābhibhavena kāyassa vijambhanā. Viññūhi garahā viññūgarahā.
anya-e0103n:172_2: Ekacco hi anavajjaṃyeva sāvajjaṃ karoti, “laddhaṃ me”ti pamāṇādhikaṃ bhuñjitvā taṃ
anya-e0103n:172_3: jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi kilamati, sakalavihāre bhikkhū
anya-e0103n:172_4: tassa sarīrapaṭijagganabhesajjapariyesanāpasutā honti. Aññe te “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā
anya-e0103n:172_5: “asukassa udaraṃ uddhumāta”ntiādīni sutvā “niccakālamesa evaṃpakatiko attano kucchipamāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:172_6: nāma na jānātī”ti nindanti, evaṃ anavajjaṃyeva sāvajjaṃ karoti. Evaṃ akatvā “anavajjatā
anya-e0103n:172_7: ca bhavissatī”ti paṭisevati. Attano hi pakatiaggibalādiṃ jānitvā “evaṃ me aratiādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:172_8: abhāvena kāyasukhatā, agarahitabbatā ca bhavissatī”ti pamāṇayuttameva paṭisevati.
anya-e0103n:172_9: Yāvatako bhojanena attho, tassa sādhanena yāvadatthaṃ udarassa paripūraṇena udarāvadehakaṃ
anya-e0103n:172_10: bhojanaṃ yāvadatthaudarāvadehakabhojanaṃ, tassa parivajjanena. Seyyāya sayanena laddhabbasukhaṃ
anya-e0103n:172_11: seyyasukhaṃ, ubhohi passehi samparivattanakaṃ sayantassa uppajjanasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:172_12: middhena niddāyanena uppajjanasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ, tesaṃ seyya…pe… sukhānaṃ pahānato
anya-e0103n:172_13: catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yogyabhāvassa paṭipādanaṃ kāyassa catuiriyāpathayogyabhāvapaṭipādanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:172_14: tato. Sukho iriyāpathavihāro phāsuvihāro. Pacchime vikappe, sabbavikappesu vā vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:172_15: phāsuvihāralakkhaṇaṃ āgamena samatthetuṃ “vuttampi heta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tīsupi vikappesu
anya-e0103n:173_0: Ettāvatāti “yātrā”tiādinā vuttena padattayena. “Yātrā ca me bhavissatī”ti payojanapariggahadīpanā.
anya-e0103n:173_1: Yātrā hi naṃ āhārūpayogaṃ payojetīti. Dhammikasukhāpariccāgahetuko phāsuvihāro majjhimā
anya-e0103n:173_2: paṭipadā antadvayaparivajjanato. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne aṭṭha aṅgāni samodhānetabbāni
anya-e0103n:173_3: – “neva davāyā”ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, “na madāyā”ti ekaṃ, “na maṇḍanāyā”ti ekaṃ, “na vibhūsanāyā”ti
anya-e0103n:173_4: ekaṃ, “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāyā”ti ekaṃ, “vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāyā”ti
anya-e0103n:173_5: ekaṃ, “iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī”ti ekaṃ,
anya-e0103n:173_6: “yātrā ca me bhavissatī”ti ekaṃ. “Anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā”ti ayamettha bhojanānisaṃso.
anya-e0103n:173_7: Mahāsivatthero panāha “heṭṭhā cattāri aṅgāni paṭikkhepo nāma, upari pana aṭṭhaṅgāni
anya-e0103n:173_8: samodhānetabbānī”ti. Tattha “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, “yāpanāyā”ti
anya-e0103n:173_10: paṭihaṅkhāmī”ti ekaṃ, “navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī”ti ekaṃ, “yātrā ca me bhavissatī”ti
anya-e0103n:173_11: ekaṃ, “anavajjatā cā”ti ekaṃ. Phāsuvihāro pana bhojanānisaṃsoti. Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ
anya-e0103n:173_12: āhāraṃ āhārento paṭisaṅkhā yoniso piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati nāma.
anya-e0103n:174_0: Yattha yatthāti bhummaniddesena sena-saddassa adhikaraṇatthavuttimāha. Tathā āsana-saddassāti.
anya-e0103n:174_1: Aḍḍhayogādimhīti ādi-saddena pāsādādiṃ, mañcādiñca saṅgaṇhāti. Yattha yattha vihāre
anya-e0103n:174_2: vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā āsatīti vihāraaḍḍhayogādike ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Idha ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n:174_3: pīṭhasanthatādīnampi saṅgaho veditabbo. Parisahanaṭṭhenāti abhibhavanaṭṭhena, vibādhanaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0103n:174_4: attho. Utuyeva utuparissayoti sītuṇhādiutuyeva asappāyo vuttanayena utuparissayo.
anya-e0103n:174_5: Tassa utuparissayassa vinodanatthaṃ, anuppannassa anuppādanatthaṃ, uppannassa vūpasamanatthañcāti
anya-e0103n:174_6: attho. Nānārammaṇato paṭisaṃharitvā kammaṭṭhānabhūte ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa
anya-e0103n:174_7: sammadeva layanaṃ paṭisallānaṃ, tattha ārāmo abhirati paṭisallānārāmo, tadatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:174_8: Senāsanaṃ hi vivittaṃ yogino bhāvanānukūlaṃ suññāgārabhāvato. Taṃ panetaṃ atthadvayaṃ
anya-e0103n:174_10: ekībhāvahetukaṃ sukhaṃ ekībhāvasukhaṃ, tadatthaṃ. Gaṇasaṅgaṇikakilesasaṅgaṇikābhāvena uppajjanakasukhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:175_0: Yadi utuyeva utuparissayo, “utu ca sītuṇha”nti sītuṇhapaṭighātaṃ vatvā utuparissayavinodanaṃ
anya-e0103n:175_1: kasmā vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kāmañcā”tiādi. Tattha “niyataṃ utuparissayavinodana”nti
anya-e0103n:175_2: etena “sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāyā”ti ettha vuttaṃ sītuṇhaṃ aniyataṃ
anya-e0103n:175_3: kadāci kadāci uppajjanakaṃ, utuparissayo pana sabbadābhāvī adhippetoti dasseti. Vuttappakāroti
anya-e0103n:175_4: “sītādiko, asappāyo”ti ca evaṃ vuttappakāro vivaṭaṅgaṇarukkhamūlādīsu nisinnassa
anya-e0103n:175_6: ca bhikkhussa kāyacittānaṃ ābādhaṃ kareyyuṃ. Yattha gutte senāsane ābādhaṃ na karonti.
anya-e0103n:175_7: Evaṃ jānitvāti ubhayaparissayarahitanti evaṃ ñatvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu veditabboti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:176_2: hoti. Yassa kassacīti sappiādīsu yassa kassaci. Sappāyassāti hi tassa vikāravūpasamenāti
anya-e0103n:176_3: adhippāyo. Bhisakkassa kammaṃ tena vidhātabbato. Tenāha “tena anuññātattā”ti. Nagaraparikkhārehīti
anya-e0103n:176_4: nagaraṃ parivāretvā rakkhaṇakehi. Vivaṭaparikkhepo parikkhā uḍḍāpo pākāro esikā paligho
anya-e0103n:176_6: Ariyamaggo hi idha “ratho”ti adhippeto. Tassa ca sammāvācādayo alaṅkāraṭṭhena “parikkhāro”ti
anya-e0103n:176_7: vuttā. Jīvitaparikkhārāti jīvitassa pavattikāraṇāni. Samudānetabbāti sammā uddhaṃ
anya-e0103n:176_8: uddhaṃ ānetabbā pariyesitabbā. Parivāropi hoti antarāyānaṃ parito vāraṇato. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:177_0: Tattha antaranti vivaraṃ, okāsoti attho. Verikānaṃ antaraṃ adatvā attano sāmikānaṃ
anya-e0103n:177_1: parivāretvā ṭhitasevakā viya rakkhaṇato. Assāti jīvitassa. Kāraṇabhāvatoti cirappavattiyā
anya-e0103n:177_2: kāraṇabhāvato. Rasāyanabhūtaṃ hi bhesajjaṃ sucirampi kālaṃ jīvitaṃ pavattetiyeva.
anya-e0103n:177_3: Yadipi anuppannā eva dukkhavedanā bhesajjaparibhogena paṭihaññanti, na uppannā tāsaṃ
anya-e0103n:177_4: saraseneva bhijjanato, uppannasadisā pana “uppannā”ti vuccanti. Bhavati hi taṃsadisesu
anya-e0103n:177_5: tabbohāro, yathā sā eva tittiri, tāniyeva osadhānīti. Tasmā vuttaṃ “uppannānanti
anya-e0103n:177_6: jātānaṃ bhūtānaṃ nibbattāna”nti. Sañcayato paṭṭhāya so dhātukkhobho samuṭṭhānaṃ etesanti
anya-e0103n:177_7: taṃsamuṭṭhānā. “Dukkhavedanā”ti vatvā sā akusalasabhāvāpi atthīti tato visesetuṃ
anya-e0103n:177_9: dukkhanti attho. Natthi ettha byābajjhanti abyābajjhaṃ, niddukkhatā. Tenāha “abyābajjhaparamatāyā”ti
anya-e0103n:178_0: Cīvarādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ nissayanaṃ paribhogo evāti dassetuṃ “te paṭicca nissāyā”ti
anya-e0103n:178_1: vatvā “paribhuñjamānā”ti vuttaṃ. Pavattantīti jīvanti. Jīvanampi hi pavattanaṃ, yato
anya-e0103n:180_0: 19. Evaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarādibhedena niddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ puna sādhanavibhāgena dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:180_1: “evametasmi”ntiādimāraddhaṃ. Tattha sādhīyati sampādiyati etenāti sādhanaṃ, saddhā
anya-e0103n:180_2: sādhanaṃ etassāti saddhāsādhano. Nanu ca vīriyasatipaññāhipi vinā pātimokkhasaṃvaro
anya-e0103n:180_3: na sijjhatīti? Saccaṃ na sijjhati, saddhāya pana visesahetubhāvaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttanti dassento āha
anya-e0103n:181_1: tassa tassa aparādhassa anurūpaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma sāvakānaṃ avisayo, buddhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:181_2: eva visayo. Sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu, tassa kālopi nāma sāvakānaṃ avisayo,
anya-e0103n:181_3: buddhānaṃ eva visayoti dassento “sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanapaṭikkhepo cettha nidassana”nti
anya-e0103n:181_4: āha. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputta, āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputta, tathāgatova
anya-e0103n:181_5: tattha kālaṃ jānissatī”ti. Tattha ca-saddo samuccayattho. Tena “apaññattaṃ na paññapema,
anya-e0103n:181_6: paññattaṃ na samucchindāma, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattāmā”ti evamādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:181_7: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Saddhāyāti saddahanena satthari, dhamme ca saddhāya paccupaṭṭhāpanena.
anya-e0103n:182_0: Kikīva aṇḍanti kikīsakuṇikā viya attano aṇḍaṃ. Sā kira jīvitampi pariccajitvā aṇḍameva
anya-e0103n:182_1: rakkhati. Camarīva vāladhinti camarīmigo viya attano vāladhiṃ. Camarīmigā kira byādhena
anya-e0103n:182_2: paripātiyamānā jīvitampi pariccajitvā kaṇḍakagumbādīsu laggaṃ attano vālameva rakkhanti.
anya-e0103n:182_3: Piyaṃva puttaṃ ekakanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Yathā hi ekaputtako kuṭumbiko taṃ
anya-e0103n:182_4: ekaputtaṃ, ekanayano ca taṃ ekanayanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ rakkhati. Tatheva sīlaṃ anurakkhamānakāti
anya-e0103n:182_5: anukampanavasena vuttaṃ. Supesalāti suṭṭhu piyasīlā. Sadā sabbakālaṃ daharamajjhimatherakālesu.
anya-e0103n:182_6: Channampi gāravānaṃ vasena sagāravā, garukāravantoti attho.
anya-e0103n:183: Evameva khoti yathā mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātikkamati, evameva. Mama sāvakāti ariyasāvake sandhāyāha. Te hi dhuvasīlā. Imasmiṃ attheti jīvitahetupi sīlassa avītikkamane.
anya-e0103n:184: Mahāvattaniaṭavī nāma viñjhāṭavī. Himavantapasse aṭavīti keci. Theranti nāmagottavasena apaññātaṃ ekaṃ theraṃ. Nipajjāpesuṃ gantvā kassaci mā āroceyyāti.
anya-e0103n:185_0: Pūtilatāyāti gaḷocilatāya. Samasīsīti jīvitasamasīsī. Yassa hi kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ
anya-e0103n:185_1: maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggo pariyādiyati, tato ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe
anya-e0103n:185_2: patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgottaraṇe vaṭṭasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati, so imāya
anya-e0103n:185_3: vārasamatāya “jīvitasamasīsī”ti vuccati. So ca thero tathā parinibbāyi. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:185_4: “samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyī”ti. Abhayatthero kira mahābhiñño. Tasmā cetiyaṃ kārāpesīti
anya-e0103n:185_5: vadanti. Appevāti appeva nāma attano jīvitampi jaheyya, na bhindeti na bhindeyya, na vītikkameyya.
anya-e0103n:186_0: Satiyā adhiṭṭhitānanti pageva upaṭṭhitāya satiyā ārakkhavasena adhiṭṭhitānaṃ indriyānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:186_1: Ananvāssavanīyatoti dvārabhāvena abhijjhādīhi ananubandhitabbato. Varanti seṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:186_2: Tattāyāti uṇhāya. Ādittāyāti ādito paṭṭhāya dittāya. Sampajjalitāyāti samantato jalantiyā.
anya-e0103n:186_3: Sajotibhūtāyāti ekajālībhūtāya. Sampalimaṭṭhanti sabbaso āmaṭṭhaṃ, añcitanti attho.
anya-e0103n:186_4: Na tveva varanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Rūpesūti rūpārammaṇesu. Anubyañjanaso nimittaggāhoti
anya-e0103n:186_5: kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanavasena uppādanena pākaṭīkaraṇavasena subhādinimittaggāho,
anya-e0103n:186_6: atha vā anubyañjanasoti hatthapādādianubyañjanato, nimittaggāhoti itthipurisādisubhādinimittaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:186_9: sammā avihitavatiparikkhepaṃ. Parassahārīhīti parasantakāvahārakehi corehi. Samativijjhatīti
anya-e0103n:187_0: Rūpesūti rūpahetu rūpanimittaṃ. Uppajjanakaanatthato rakkha indriyanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:187_1: Evaṃ sesesu. Ete hi dvārāti ete cakkhādidvārā. Satikavāṭena asaṃvutattā vivaṭā. Tato
anya-e0103n:187_2: eva arakkhitā. Kilesuppattiyā hetubhāvena taṃsamaṅginaṃ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva
anya-e0103n:187_3: vuttaṃ. Ete vā rūpādayo. Kilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā dvārā cakkhādidvārā. Te kīdisā vivaṭā
anya-e0103n:187_4: arakkhitā asaṃvutacakkhādihetuṃ taṃsamaṅginaṃ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:187_5: Agāranti gehaṃ. Ducchannanti na sammā chāditaṃ. Abhāvitanti lokuttarabhāvanārahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:188_0: Sampāditetiādissa vodānapakkhassa attho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana sabbaso
anya-e0103n:188_1: kilesānaṃ anuppādo atiukkaṭṭhadesanā maggenāgatasadisattā. Sampādetabboti “na punevaṃ
anya-e0103n:189_0: Adhunāpabbajitenāti na cirapabbajitena, navapabbajitenāti attho. Kāmarāgena ḍayhāmīti
anya-e0103n:189_1: kāmarāgagginā pariḍayhāmi. So ca pana dāho idāni cittagatoti dassento āha “cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:189_2: me pariḍayhatī”ti. Sādhūti āyācanā. Nibbāpananti tassa nibbāpanupāyaṃ. Gotamāti theraṃ gottena ālapati.
anya-e0103n:190_1: Nimittaṃ parivajjehi kīdisaṃ? Rāgūpasañhitaṃ rāguppattihetubhūtaṃ subhanimittaṃ parivajjehi
anya-e0103n:190_2: na manasi karohi. Na kevalaṃ subhanimittassāmanasikāro eva, atha kho asubhabhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:190_3: attano cittaṃ bhāvehi. Kathaṃ? Ekaggaṃ susamāhitaṃ yathā taṃ asubhārammaṇe vikkhepābhāvena
anya-e0103n:190_4: ekaggaṃ, suṭṭhu appitabhāvena susamāhitañca hoti, evaṃ bhāvehīti. Evaṃ samathabhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:190_5: kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanaṃ dassetvā idāni samucchedanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhāre”tiādi
anya-e0103n:190_6: vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅkhāre parato passāti sabbepi saṅkhāre avidheyyakatāya “pare”ti
anya-e0103n:190_7: passa. Aniccatāya pana udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā dukkhato, anattasabhāvattā, attavirahato
anya-e0103n:190_8: ca no attato passa. Evaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento maggapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0103n:190_9: catutthamaggena sabbaso nibbāpehi mahārāgaṃ tebhūmakassa abhibhavanato mahāvisayatāya
anya-e0103n:190_10: mahārāgaṃ vūpasamehi. Yathā etarahi, evaṃ mā ḍayhittho punappunanti daḷhataraṃ rāgavinodane niyojesi.
anya-e0103n:191_0: Evaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlassa sampādane vidhiṃ dassetvā evaṃ taṃ susampāditaṃ hotīti
anya-e0103n:191_1: nayaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādinā tattha paripūrakārino there nidasseti. Tattha “leṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:191_2: na ullokitapubba”nti idaṃ sabbattheva therassa yugamattadassitāya vuttaṃ. Kiṃ pana
anya-e0103n:191_3: thero senāsanaṃ na sodheti? “Ullokā paṭhamaṃ ohāretabba”nti hi vuttaṃ, antevāsikādayo
anya-e0103n:191_4: eva kirassa senāsanaṃ sodhenti. Assa nāgarukkhassa.
anya-e0103n:192_0: Tasmiṃ gāmeti mahāgāme. Taruṇā thaññapivanakā puttadhītaro yāsaṃ tā taruṇaputtā,
anya-e0103n:192_1: tāsaṃ. Lañjāpesīti thanapaṭṭikāya thane bandhāpetvā rājamuddikāya lañjāpesi. Rājā
anya-e0103n:192_2: theraṃ cirataraṃ daṭṭhuṃ kālavikkhepaṃ karonto “sve sīlāni gaṇhissāmī”ti āha. Thero
anya-e0103n:192_3: rañño ca deviyā ca vandanakāle sattākāramattaṃ gaṇhāti. Itthī purisoti pana vivekaṃ
anya-e0103n:192_4: na karoti. Tenāha “vavatthānaṃ na karomī”ti. “Aho suparisuddhasīlo vatāyaṃ ayyo”ti
anya-e0103n:192_5: daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Atiparisuddhaṃ pākaṭanti sappāyalābhena kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:192_6: ativiya parisuddhaṃ vibhūtaṃ ahosi. Sakalaṃ pabbataṃ unnādayantoti pathavikampanena
anya-e0103n:192_7: sakalaṃ pabbataṃ ekaṃ ninnādaṃ karonto. Tannivāsidevatānaṃ sādhukāradānenāti keci.
anya-e0103n:192_8: Bhantoti anavaṭṭhito. Bāloti taruṇadārako. Utrastoti ñātakehi vinābhāvena santrasto.
anya-e0103n:193_1: Yato pabbajito, tato paṭṭhāya pabbajitakālato pabhutīti attho. Indriyānīti indriyasaṃvarasīlāni.
anya-e0103n:193_2: Tesu hi bhinnesu indriyānipi bhinnānīti vuccanti ārakkhābhāvato, indriyāneva vā nimittānubyañjanaggāhassa
anya-e0103n:193_3: dvārabhūtāni bhinnāni nāma taṃsamaṅgino anatthuppattito, vipariyāyato abhinnānīti
anya-e0103n:193_4: veditabbāni. Indriyānaṃ vā ayoniso upasaṃhāro bhedanaṃ, yoniso upasaṃhāro abhedananti
anya-e0103n:193_5: apare. Mittattherovāti mahāmittatthero viya. Vareti seṭṭhe.
anya-e0103n:194_0: Tathā vīriyenāti tathā-saddena vīriyaṃ viseseti. Yathā sati anavajjalakkhaṇāva indriyasaṃvarasādhanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:194_1: tathā vīriyaṃ anavajjalakkhaṇaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisādhananti. Vīriyāpekkhameva visesanaṃ
anya-e0103n:194_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “sammāāraddhavīriyassā”ti. Ayuttā esanā anesanā, yathāvuttamicchājīvasaṅgahā.
anya-e0103n:194_3: Sā eva satthusāsanassa na patirūpāti appatirūpaṃ, taṃ anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ. Atha
anya-e0103n:194_4: vā patirūpavirodhinī appatirūpā, pariggahitadhutaṅgassa dhutaṅganiyamavirodhinī yassa
anya-e0103n:194_5: kassaci sallekhavikopinī paṭipatti. Imasmiṃ pakkhe ca-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho, anesanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:194_6: appatirūpañca pahāyāti. Paṭisevamānena parivajjayatā sampādetabbāti sambandho. “Parisuddhuppāde”ti
anya-e0103n:194_7: imināva dhammadesanādīnaṃ parisuddhāya samuṭṭhānatā dīpitā hotīti “dhammadesanādīhi
anya-e0103n:194_9: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Dhutaguṇe cassa pasannānanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Piṇḍapātacariyādīhīti
anya-e0103n:194_11: taṃtaṃdhutaṅganiyatāya paṭipattiyā anulomavasena, avikopanavasenāti attho. Mahicchasseva
anya-e0103n:194_12: micchājīvena jīvikā, na appicchassa. Appicchatāya ukkaṃsagatāya micchājīvassa asambhavo
anya-e0103n:194_13: evāti dassetuṃ “ekabyādhivūpasamattha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pūtiharitakīti pūtimuttaparibhāvitaṃ,
anya-e0103n:194_14: pūtibhāvena vā chaḍḍitaṃ haritakaṃ. Ariyavaṃso etassa atthīti, ariyavaṃse vā niyuttoti
anya-e0103n:194_15: ariyavaṃsiko, paccayagedhassa dūrasamussāritattā uttamo ca so ariyavaṃsiko cāti uttamaariyavaṃsiko.
anya-e0103n:195_0: Nimittaṃ nāma paccaye uddissa yathā adhippāyo ñāyati evaṃ nimittakammaṃ. Obhāso nāma
anya-e0103n:195_1: ujukameva akathetvā yathā adhippāyo vibhūto hoti, evaṃ obhāsanaṃ. Parikathā nāma
anya-e0103n:195_2: pariyāyena kathanaṃ. Tathā uppannanti nimittādivasena uppannaṃ.
anya-e0103n:196_0: Dvāraṃ dinnanti rogasīsena paribhogassa dvāraṃ dinnaṃ. Tasmā arogakālepi paribhuñjituṃ
anya-e0103n:196_1: vaṭṭati, āpatti na hotīti attho. Tenāha “kiñcāpi āpatti na hotī”tiādi. Na vaṭṭatīti
anya-e0103n:196_2: sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa na vaṭṭati, sallekhaṃ kopetīti adhippāyo. “Ājīvaṃ pana
anya-e0103n:196_3: kopetī”ti imināva senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttadhutaṅgadharassa nimittādayo na vaṭṭantīti
anya-e0103n:196_4: vadanti. Tadaññadhutaṅgadharassāpi na vaṭṭantiyevāti apare. Akarontoti yathāsakaṃ
anya-e0103n:197_0: Gaṇavāsaṃ pahāya araññāyatane paṭippassaddhivivekassa muddhabhūtāya aggaphalasamāpattiyā
anya-e0103n:197_1: viharanto mahāthero “pavivekaṃ brūhayamāno”ti vutto. Udarasannissito vātābādho udaravātābādho.
anya-e0103n:197_2: Asambhinnaṃ khīraṃ etassāti asambhinnakhīraṃ, tadeva pāyāsanti asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ,
anya-e0103n:197_3: udakena asammissakhīrena pakkapāyāsanti attho. Tassāti pāyāsassa. Uppattimūlanti
anya-e0103n:197_4: “gihikāle me, āvuso, mātā sappimadhusakkarādīhi yojetvā asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0103n:197_5: tena me phāsu ahosī”ti attano vacīnicchāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ uppattihetuṃ. “Aparibhogāraho
anya-e0103n:197_6: piṇḍapāto”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu therassa obhāsanādicittuppattiyeva natthīti? Saccaṃ
anya-e0103n:197_7: natthi, ajjhāsayaṃ pana ajānantā ekacce puthujjanā tathā maññeyyuṃ, anāgate ca sabrahmacārino
anya-e0103n:197_8: evaṃ mama diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjeyyunti paṭikkhipi. Apica mahātherassa paramukkaṃsagatā
anya-e0103n:197_9: sallekhapaṭipatti. Tathā hi daharabhikkhuno “kassa sampannaṃ na manāpa”nti vacanaṃ
anya-e0103n:197_10: nissāya yāva parinibbānā piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ na khādati.
anya-e0103n:198_0: Vacīviññattivipphārāti vacīnicchāraṇahetu. Atthaviññāpanavasena pavattamāno hi saddo
anya-e0103n:198_1: asatipi viññattiyā tassa kenaci paccayena paccayabhāve vacīviññattivaseneva pavattatīti
anya-e0103n:198_2: “vacīviññattivipphāro”ti vuccati. Bhuttoti bhuttavā sace bhaveyyaṃ ahaṃ. Sāti assa.
anya-e0103n:198_3: Akāralopena hi niddeso “evaṃsa te”tiādīsu viya. Antaguṇanti antabhogo. Bahi careti
anya-e0103n:198_4: āsayato nikkhamitvā gocaraggahaṇavasena bahi yadi vicareyya. Paramappicchaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:198_5: lokavohārenevamāha. Loke hi ayuttabhojanaṃ odariyaṃ garahantā evaṃ vadanti “kiṃsu
anya-e0103n:198_6: nāma tassa antāni bahi carantī”ti. Ārādhemīti ādito paṭṭhāya rādhemi, vase vattemīti attho.
anya-e0103n:199_0: Mahātissatthero kira dubbhikkhakāle maggaṃ gacchanto bhattacchedena, maggakilamathena
anya-e0103n:199_1: ca kilantakāyo dubbalo aññatarassa phalitassa ambassa mūle nipajji, bahūni ambaphalāni
anya-e0103n:199_2: tahaṃ tahaṃ patitāni honti. Tattheko vuḍḍhataro upāsako therassa santikaṃ upagantvā
anya-e0103n:199_3: parissamaṃ ñatvā ambapānaṃ pāyetvā attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ neti. Thero –
anya-e0103n:200: “Na pitā napi te mātā, na ñāti napi bandhavo;
anya-e0103n:202_0: Attānaṃ ovaditvā sammasanaṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tassa piṭṭhigato eva maggapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0103n:202_1: arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Imaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ambakhādakamahātissattheravatthupi cettha
anya-e0103n:203_1: ānisaṃsassa ca dassanaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsadassanaṃ. Tassa pana paccayādhikārattā vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:203_2: “paccayesū”ti. Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇabhāvena vuccati yathā tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddhanti.
anya-e0103n:203_3: Yena kāraṇena bhikkhuno apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma siyā, tasmiṃ vajjite paccayasannissitasīlaṃ
anya-e0103n:203_4: sijjhati, visujjhati cāti dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paccayagedhanti gedhaggahaṇeneva
anya-e0103n:203_5: sammohopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo tena saha pavattanato, tadupanissayato ca. Dhammena
anya-e0103n:203_6: samena uppanneti idaṃ paccayānaṃ āgamanasuddhidassanaṃ, na paccayasannissitasīlavisuddhidassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:203_7: Paccayānaṃ hi idamatthitaṃ upadhāretvā paribhuñjanaṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ. Yasmā
anya-e0103n:203_8: pana te paccayā ñāyādhigatā eva bhikkhunā paribhuñjitabbā, tasmā vuttaṃ “dhammena
anya-e0103n:203_9: samena uppanne paccaye”ti. Yathāvuttena vidhināti “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā vuttavidhinā.
anya-e0103n:204_0: Dhātuvasena vāti “yathāpaccayaṃ vattamānaṃ dhātumattamevetaṃ, yadidaṃ cīvarādi, tadupabhuñjako
anya-e0103n:204_1: ca puggalo”ti evaṃ dhātumanasikāravasena vā. Paṭikūlavasena vāti piṇḍapāte tāva āhāre
anya-e0103n:204_2: paṭikūlasaññāvasena, “sabbāni pana imāni cīvarādīni ajigucchanīyāni, imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:204_3: patvā ativiya jigucchanīyāni jāyantī”ti evaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena vā. Tato uttarīti
anya-e0103n:204_4: paṭilābhakālato upari. Anavajjova paribhogo āditova paññāya parisodhitattā adhiṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0103n:204_5: ṭhapitapattacīvarānaṃ viyāti. Paccavekkhaṇāya ādisuddhidassanaparametaṃ, na paribhogakāle
anya-e0103n:205_0: Theyyaparibhogo nāma anarahassa paribhogo. Bhagavatāpi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā
anya-e0103n:205_1: anuññātā, na dussīlassa. Dāyakānampi sīlavato eva pariccāgo, na dussīlassa. Attano
anya-e0103n:205_2: kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato. Iti satthārā ananuññātattā, dāyakehi ca
anya-e0103n:205_3: apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyāya paribhogo theyyaparibhogo. Iṇavasena
anya-e0103n:205_4: paribhogo iṇaparibhogo, paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo
anya-e0103n:205_5: viyāti attho. Tasmāti “sīlavato”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati.
anya-e0103n:205_6: Cīvaraṃ kāyato mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge purebhatta…pe… pacchimayāmesu paccavekkhitabbanti
anya-e0103n:205_7: sambandho. Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekadivase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ
anya-e0103n:205_8: dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Sace aruṇaṃ uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:205_9: tiṭṭhati. Hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttaṃ, taṃ yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya…pe…
anya-e0103n:205_10: hirikopīnapaṭicchādanatthaṃ. Hiyyo yo mayā piṇḍapāto paribhutto, so “neva davāyā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:205_11: sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ na kareyyāti vadanti, taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Senāsanampi
anya-e0103n:205_12: paribhoge paribhogeti pavese pavese. Satipaccayatāti satiyā paccayabhāvo paṭiggahaṇassa,
anya-e0103n:205_13: paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati, paccavekkhitvāva paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:205_14: paribhuñjitabbañcāti attho. Tenevāha “satiṃ katvā”tiādi. Evaṃ santepīti yadipi dvīsupi
anya-e0103n:205_15: ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā, evaṃ santepi. Apare panāhu – sati paccayatāti sati bhesajjaparibhogassa
anya-e0103n:205_16: paccayabhāve, sati paccayeti attho. Evaṃ santepīti paccaye satipīti. Taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:205_17: Tathā hi paccayasannissitasīlaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya visujjhati, na paccayassa bhāvamattena.
anya-e0103n:206_0: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi visuddhiyo
anya-e0103n:206_1: dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha. Tattha sujjhati etāyāti suddhi, yathādhammaṃ
anya-e0103n:206_2: desanāva suddhi desanāsuddhi. Vuṭṭhānassāpi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:206_3: Chinnamūlāpattīnaṃ pana abhikkhutāpaṭiññāva desanā. Adhiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho saṃvarova
anya-e0103n:206_4: suddhi saṃvarasuddhi. Dhammena samena paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
anya-e0103n:206_5: Catūsupi paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi. Esa tāva
anya-e0103n:206_6: suddhīsu samāsanayo. Suddhimantesu pana desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi. Sesesupi
anya-e0103n:206_7: eseva nayo. Suddhi-saddo pana vuttanayova. Evanti saṃvarabhedaṃ sandhāyāha. Pahāyāti
anya-e0103n:207_0: Dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti dāyādā. Ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato,
anya-e0103n:207_1: anuññātesu eva ca paribhogasambhavato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato
anya-e0103n:207_2: santakā. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu anukampā
anya-e0103n:207_3: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ no āmisadāyādā”’ti evaṃ pavattaṃ dhammadāyādasuttañca
anya-e0103n:208_0: Avītarāgānaṃ taṇhāparavasatāya paccayaparibhoge sāmibhāvo natthi, tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ
anya-e0103n:208_1: tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruciparibhogasambhavato. Tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena,
anya-e0103n:208_2: appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena, tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhanākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti,
anya-e0103n:208_3: dāyakānañca manorathaṃ paripūrenti. Tenāha “te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino
anya-e0103n:209_0: Sabbesanti ariyānaṃ, puthujjanānañca. Kathaṃ puthujjanānaṃ ime paribhogā sambhavanti?
anya-e0103n:209_1: Upacāravasena. Yo hi puthujjanassāpi sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ
anya-e0103n:209_2: pahāya tattha tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo, so sāmiparibhogo viya hoti.
anya-e0103n:209_3: Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti, dāyakānaṃ manorathassa
anya-e0103n:209_4: avirādhanato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa
anya-e0103n:209_5: paribhoge vattabbameva natthi, tassa sekkhasaṅgahato. Sekkhasuttaṃ hetassatthassa
anya-e0103n:209_6: sādhakaṃ. Tenāha “sīlavāpi hī”tiādi. Paccanīkattāti yathā iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitadesaṃ
anya-e0103n:209_7: gantuṃ na labhati, evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā
anya-e0103n:209_8: sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti āha “āṇaṇyaparibhogo vā”ti. Etena
anya-e0103n:209_9: nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti dasseti. Imāya sikkhāyāti
anya-e0103n:209_10: sīlasaṅkhātāya sikkhāya. Kiccakārīti paṭiññānurūpaṃ paṭipajjanato yuttapattakārī.
anya-e0103n:210_0: Idāni tameva kiccakāritaṃ suttapadena vibhāvetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:210_1: vihāranti patissayaṃ. Sayanāsananti mañcādiṃ. Ubhayenapi senāsanameva vuttaṃ. Āpanti
anya-e0103n:210_2: udakaṃ. Saṅghāṭirajūpavāhananti paṃsumalādino saṅghāṭigatarajassa dhovanaṃ. Sutvāna
anya-e0103n:210_3: dhammaṃ sugatena desitanti cīvarādīsu “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati sītassa
anya-e0103n:210_4: paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā. Saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvakoti
anya-e0103n:210_6: vūpasamanato pānīyampi gilānapaccayo”ti āpamukhena dassitaṃ gilānapaccayaṃ, saṅghāṭiyādicīvaranti
anya-e0103n:210_7: catubbidhaṃ paccayaṃ saṅkhāya “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā nayena paccavekkhitvā.
anya-e0103n:210_8: Seve sevituṃ sakkuṇeyya uttamapaññassa bhagavato sāvako sekho vā puthujjano vā.
anya-e0103n:211_0: Yasmā ca saṅkhāya sevī varapaññasāvako, tasmā hi piṇḍe…pe… pokkhare vāribindu, tathā
anya-e0103n:211_1: hoti. Kālenāti ariyānaṃ bhojanakāle. Laddhāti labhitvā. Paratoti aññato dāyakato.
anya-e0103n:211_2: Anuggahāti anukampāya bahumhi upanīte mattaṃ so jaññā jāneyya satataṃ sabbakālaṃ
anya-e0103n:211_3: upaṭṭhito upaṭṭhitassati. Ālepanarūhane yathāti bhesajjalepanena vaṇassa ruhane viya,
anya-e0103n:211_4: mattaṃ jāneyyāti yojanā. Āhareti āhareyya. “Āhareyyāhāra”nti vā pāṭho. Yāpanatthanti
anya-e0103n:211_5: sarīrassa yāpanāya. Amucchitoti taṇhāmucchāya amucchito gedhaṃ taṇhaṃ anāpanno.
anya-e0103n:212_0: Attano mātulassa saṅgharakkhitattherasseva nāmassa gahitattā bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero.
anya-e0103n:212_1: Sālikūranti sālibhattaṃ. Sunibbutanti susītalaṃ. Asaññatoti apaccavekkhaṇaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n:214_0: 20. Pariyanto etesaṃ atthīti pariyantāni, pariyantāni sikkhāpadāni yesaṃ te pariyantasikkhāpadā,
anya-e0103n:214_2: tadaññesaṃ upasampannānaṃ. Sāmaññajotanāpi hi visese tiṭṭhati. Kusaladhamme yuttānanti
anya-e0103n:214_3: vipassanācāre yuttapayuttānaṃ. Sekkhadhammā pariyantā paramā mariyādā etassāti sekkhapariyanto.
anya-e0103n:214_4: Nāmarūpaparicchedato, kusaladhammasamādānato vā pana paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhū, tāva
anya-e0103n:214_5: pavattakusaladhammappabandho sekkhadhamme āhacca ṭhito sekkhapariyanto. Sekkhadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:214_6: vā heṭṭhimantabhūtā sikkhitabbā lokiyā tisso sikkhā sekkhapariyanto, tasmiṃ sekkhapariyante.
anya-e0103n:214_7: Paripūrakārīnanti kiñcipi sikkhaṃ ahāpetvā pūrentānaṃ. Uparivisesādhigamatthaṃ kāye
anya-e0103n:214_8: ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ. Tato eva sīlapāripūriatthaṃ pariccattajīvitānaṃ. Diṭṭhisaṃkilesena
anya-e0103n:214_9: aparāmasanīyato pārisuddhivantaṃ sīlaṃ aparāmaṭṭhapārisuddhisīlaṃ. Kilesānaṃ sabbaso
anya-e0103n:215_0: Anupasampannānaṃ asekkhānaṃ, sekkhānaṃ, kalyāṇaputhujjanānañca sīlaṃ mahānubhāvatāya
anya-e0103n:215_1: ānubhāvato apariyantamevāti āha “gaṇanavasena sapariyantattā”ti. Kāyavācānaṃ saṃvaraṇato,
anya-e0103n:215_2: vinayanato ca saṃvaravinayā. Peyyālamukhena niddiṭṭhāti tattha tattha satthārā desitavitthāranayena
anya-e0103n:215_3: yathāvuttagaṇanato niddiṭṭhā. Sikkhāti sīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā. Vinayasaṃvareti vinayapiṭake.
anya-e0103n:215_4: Gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi upasampannānaṃ sīlanti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:215_5: Yaṃ kiñci hi upasampannena sikkhitabbaṃ sīlaṃ nāma, tattha kassacipi anavasesato
anya-e0103n:215_6: anavasesavasena. Samādānabhāvanti samādānasabbhāvaṃ. Lābha…pe… vasena adiṭṭhapariyantabhāvo
anya-e0103n:216_0: Dhanaṃ caje aṅgavarassa hetu pāripanthikacorādīhi upadduto. Aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno
anya-e0103n:216_1: sappadaṭṭhādikāle. Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto
anya-e0103n:216_2: sutasomamahābodhisattādayo viya. Tenāha “imaṃ sappurisānussatiṃ avijahanto”ti. Jighacchāparissamena
anya-e0103n:216_3: jīvitasaṃsaye satipi. Sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkammāti assāmikesu ambaphalesu bhūmiyaṃ patitesu
anya-e0103n:216_4: samīpeyeva santesupi paṭiggāhakābhāvena aparibhuñjanto paṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamitvā.
anya-e0103n:217_0: Sīlavantassāti sīlavantabhāvassa kāraṇā, sīlavantassa vā tuyhaṃ etādisaṃ aṃsena vāhaṇādikaṃ
anya-e0103n:217_1: kiccaṃ karoti, kāraṇā sīlassāti adhippāyo. Sudhotajātimaṇi viyāti catūsu pāsāṇesu
anya-e0103n:217_4: ca. “Kimatthaṃ mayaṃ idhāgatā”ti mahājanassa vippaṭisāro bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:217_5: Accharikāyāti aṅguliphoṭanena. Asatiyāti satisammosena. Aññāṇapakatanti aññāṇena
anya-e0103n:218_0: Appassutopi ce hotīti suttageyyādisutarahito hoti ce. Sīlesu asamāhitoti pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlesupi
anya-e0103n:218_1: na sammā patiṭṭhito hoti ce. Nāssa sampajjate sutanti assa sīlarahitassa puggalassa
anya-e0103n:218_2: sutaṃ attano, paresañca katthaci bhavasampattiāvahaṃ na hoti. “Dussīloyaṃ purisapuggalo”ti
anya-e0103n:218_3: hi sikkhākāmā na tassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanti. Bahussutopi ceti ettha ce-ti nipātamattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:219_0: Rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhagahaṇena taṇhāparāmāsābhāvamāha. Tathārūpanti rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:219_1: Bhinditvāti hanitvā. Saññapessāmīti saññattiṃ karissāmi, appakaṃ velaṃ maṃ vissejjetunti
anya-e0103n:220_0: Palipannoti sīdanto, sammakkhito vā. Sīleneva saddhiṃ marissāmīti sīlaṃ avināsento
anya-e0103n:220_1: tena saheva marissāmi, na idāni kadācipi taṃ pariccajissāmi. Sati hi bhavādāne sīlena
anya-e0103n:220_2: viyogo siyā, bhavameva nādiyissāmīti adhippāyo. Rogaṃ sammasantoti rogabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ
anya-e0103n:220_3: vedanāmukhena sesārūpadhamme, rūpadhamme ca pariggahetvā vipassanto.
anya-e0103n:221_0: Ruppatoti vikāraṃ āpādiyamānasarīrassa. Parisussatīti samantato sussati. Yathā kiṃ?
anya-e0103n:221_1: Pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ sūriyātapasantatte paṃsuni ṭhapitaṃ sirīsādipupphaṃ
anya-e0103n:221_2: viyāti attho. Ajaññanti amanuññaṃ jigucchanīyaṃ. Jaññasaṅkhātanti bālehi “jañña”nti
anya-e0103n:221_3: evaṃ kittitaṃ. Jaññarūpaṃ apassatoti yathābhūtaṃ appassato aviddasuno “jañña”nti
anya-e0103n:221_4: pasaṃsitaṃ. Dhiratthumanti dhi atthu imaṃ, dhi-saddayogena sabbattha upayogavacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:221_5: imassa pūtikāyassa dhikāro hotūti attho. Duggandhiyanti duggandhikaṃ duggandhavantaṃ.
anya-e0103n:221_6: Yattha yathāvutte pūtikāye rāgahetu pamattā pamādaṃ āpannā. Pajāti sattā. Hāpenti
anya-e0103n:221_7: maggaṃ sugatūpapattiyāti sugatūpapattiyā maggaṃ, sīlampi hāpenti, pageva jhānādinti
anya-e0103n:221_8: adhippāyo. Kevalaṃ “arahanto”ti vattabbā sāvakakhīṇāsavā, itare pana paccekabuddhā
anya-e0103n:223_1: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Pahānādīti ādi-saddena veramaṇiādīnaṃ catunnaṃ. Kesuci potthakesu
anya-e0103n:223_2: “pahānavasenā”ti likhanti, sā pamādalekhā. Pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīlanti hirottappakaruṇālobhādipamukhena
anya-e0103n:223_3: yena kusalacittuppādena pāṇātipāto pahīyati, taṃ pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīlanaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:223_4: sīlaṃ. Tathā pāṇātipātā virati veramaṇī sīlaṃ. Pāṇātipātassa paṭipakkhacetanā cetanā
anya-e0103n:223_5: sīlaṃ. Pāṇātipātassa saṃvaraṇaṃ pavesadvārapidhānaṃ saṃvaro sīlaṃ. Pāṇātipātassa
anya-e0103n:223_6: avītikkamanaṃ avītikkamo sīlaṃ. Adinnādānassātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Abhijjhādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:223_7: pana anabhijjhādivasena pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Veramaṇī cetanā taṃsampayuttā saṃvarāvītikkamā tappamukhā dhammā.
anya-e0103n:224_0: Evaṃ dasakusalakammapathavasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
anya-e0103n:224_1: samāpattīnaṃ, aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ, ariyamaggānañca vasena tāni dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:224_3: Kusalā hi dhammā kāmapaṭipakkhā idha “nekkhamma”nti adhippetā. Tenāha “kāmacchandassa
anya-e0103n:224_4: pahānaṃ sīla”ntiādi. Tattha pahānasīlādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Visesameva
anya-e0103n:224_5: vakkhāma. Abyāpādenāti mettāya. Ālokasaññāyāti vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitaālokasañjānanena.
anya-e0103n:225_0: Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttāya paṭhamajjhānādhigamassa
anya-e0103n:225_1: upāyabhūtāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:225_3: hi vibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāya ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti.
anya-e0103n:225_4: Tathā jhānasamāpattīsu abhiratinimittena pāmojjena. Tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya
anya-e0103n:225_6: vuttaṃ “ñāṇena avijjāya, pāmojjena aratiyā”ti. Uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya
anya-e0103n:226_0: “Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇāna”ntiādīsu kathaṃ jhānānaṃ sīlabhāvo, kathaṃ vā tattha
anya-e0103n:226_1: viratiyā sambhavo. Suvisuddhakāyakammādikassa hi cittasamādānavasena imāni jhānāni
anya-e0103n:226_2: pavattanti, na parittakusalāni viya kāyakammādivisodhanavasena, nāpi maggaphaladhammā
anya-e0103n:226_4: nippariyāyena natthi sīlanaṭṭho, kuto viramaṇaṭṭho. Pariyāyena panetaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:226_5: Ko pana so pariyāyo? Yadaggena mahaggatā kusaladhammā paṭipakkhe pajahanti, tadaggena
anya-e0103n:226_6: tato oratā. Te ca yathā cittaṃ nārohanti, evaṃ saṃvutā nāma honti. Pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhāto
anya-e0103n:226_7: manodvāre vītikkamo natthi etesūti avītikkamāti ca vuccanti, cetanā pana taṃsampayuttāti.
anya-e0103n:226_8: Soyamattho parato āgamissati. Evañca katvā vitakkādipahānavacanampi samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:226_9: Na hi nippariyāyato sīlaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ pahāyakaṃ yujjati, na cettha akusalavitakkādayo
anya-e0103n:226_10: adhippetā. Kiñcāpi paṭhamajjhānūpacāreyeva dukkhassa, catutthajjhānūpacāre ca sukhassa
anya-e0103n:226_11: pahānaṃ hoti, atisayapahānaṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ “catutthena jhānena sukhadukkhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:226_12: pahāna”nti. “Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ āruppakathāyaṃ āgamissati.
anya-e0103n:227_0: Aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā. Tebhūmikadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
anya-e0103n:227_1: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññāyāti “saṅkhatadhammā niccā sassatā”ti
anya-e0103n:227_2: evaṃ pavattāya micchāsaññāya, saññāggahaṇeneva diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:227_3: Esa nayo ito parāsupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya
anya-e0103n:227_4: anupassanāya. Nandiyāti sappītikataṇhāya. Virāgānupassanāyāti virajjanākārena pavattāya
anya-e0103n:227_5: anupassanāya. Rāgassāti saṅkhāresu rāgassa. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa
anya-e0103n:227_6: anupassanāya. Yathā vā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti,
anya-e0103n:227_7: evaṃ anupassanā nirodhānupassanā. Tenevāha “nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti no samudetī”ti.
anya-e0103n:227_8: Muñcitukāmatāya hi ayaṃ balappattā. Saṅkhārānaṃ paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā
anya-e0103n:227_9: paṭinissaggānupassanā. Paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā hi ayaṃ. Ādānassāti niccādivasena gahaṇassa.
anya-e0103n:227_10: Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇavasena ekattagahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā, tassā ghanasaññāya. Āyūhanassāti
anya-e0103n:227_11: abhisaṅkharaṇassa. Saṅkhārānaṃ avatthādivisesāpatti vipariṇāmo. Dhuvasaññāyāti thirabhāvagahaṇassa.
anya-e0103n:227_12: Nimittassāti samūhādighanavasena sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahatāya.
anya-e0103n:227_13: Paṇidhiyāti rāgādipaṇidhiyā, taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnatāyāti attho. Abhinivesassāti
anya-e0103n:227_18: keci. “Ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādinayappavattā saṃsayāpatti sammohābhinivesoti
anya-e0103n:227_20: vacanato ālayo taṇhā. Sā eva cakkhādīsu, rūpādīsu ca abhinivisanavasena pavattiyā
anya-e0103n:227_21: ālayābhinivesoti apare. “Evaṃ ṭhitā te saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī”ti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:227_22: paṭisaṅkhānupassanā. Appaṭisaṅkhā paṭisaṅkhāya paṭipakkhabhūtā mohappadhānā akusaladhammā.
anya-e0103n:227_23: Vaṭṭato vigatattā vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ, tattha ninnabhāvasaṅkhātena anupassanena pavatti
anya-e0103n:227_24: vivaṭṭānupassanā, saṅkhārupekkhā ceva anulomañāṇañca. Saññogābhiniveso saṃyujjanavasena
anya-e0103n:228_0: Diṭṭhekaṭṭhānanti diṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭhānañca pahānekaṭṭhānañca. Oḷārikānanti uparimaggavajjhe
anya-e0103n:228_1: kilese upādāya vuttaṃ. Aññathā dassanena pahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehi oḷārikā.
anya-e0103n:228_2: Aṇusahagatānanti aṇubhūtānaṃ, idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe upādāya vuttaṃ. Sabbakilesānanti
anya-e0103n:228_3: avasiṭṭhasabbakilesānaṃ. Na hi paṭhamamaggādīhi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyanti.
anya-e0103n:229_1: kho, ānanda, kusalāni sīlānī”ti vacanato cetaso avippaṭisāratthāya bhavanti. Avippaṭisāro
anya-e0103n:229_2: pāmojjatthāya. “Yoniso manasi karoto pāmojjaṃ jāyatī”ti vacanato pāmojjāya saṃvattanti.
