anya-e0103n:229_3: Pāmojjaṃ pītiyā. “Pamuditassa pīti jāyatī”ti vacanato pītiyā saṃvattanti. Pīti passaddhatthāya.
anya-e0103n:229_4: “Pītimanassa kāyo passambhatī”ti vacanato passaddhiyā saṃvattanti. Passaddhi sukhatthāya.
anya-e0103n:229_6: sukhaṃ vedetī”ti cettha somanassaṃ “sukha”nti vuttaṃ. Āsevanāyāti samādhissa āsevanāya.
anya-e0103n:229_7: Nirāmise hi sukhe siddhe “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato samādhi siddhoyeva
anya-e0103n:229_8: hoti, tasmā samādhissa āsevanāya paguṇabalavabhāvāya saṃvattantīti attho. Bhāvanāyāti
anya-e0103n:229_9: tasseva samādhissa vaḍḍhiyā. Bahulīkammāyāti punappunaṃ kiriyāya. Alaṅkārāyāti tasseva
anya-e0103n:229_11: avippaṭisārādikassa samādhisambhārassa siddhiyā tasseva samādhissa parikkhārāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0103n:229_12: Sambhārattho hi idha parikkhāra-saddo. “Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā
anya-e0103n:229_13: samudānetabbā”tiādīsu viya sambhāroti ca paccayo veditabbo. Kāmañcāyaṃ parikkhāra-saddo
anya-e0103n:229_15: hotī”tiādīsu parivārattho vutto. Idha pana alaṅkāraparivārānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā “sambhārattho”ti
anya-e0103n:229_17: parivārasampattiyā saṃvattanti. Pāripūriyāti vasībhāvasampāpanena, vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhāvāpādanena
anya-e0103n:230_0: Evaṃ suparisuddhasīlamūlakaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ samādhiṃ dassetvā idāni “samāhito
anya-e0103n:230_1: pajānāti passati, yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā
anya-e0103n:230_2: vimuccatī”ti vacanato sīlamūlakāni samādhipadaṭṭhānāni payojanāni dassetuṃ “ekantanibbidāyā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:230_3: vuttaṃ. Nibbidāya hi dassitāya tassā padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ dassitameva
anya-e0103n:230_4: hoti, tasmiṃ asati nibbidāya asijjhanato. Nibbidādayo atthato vibhattā eva. Yathābhūtañāṇadassananti
anya-e0103n:231_0: Idāni pahānādīsu sīlatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha pajahanaṃ anuppādanirodho
anya-e0103n:231_1: pahānanti tassa bhāvasādhanataṃ sandhāya “pahānanti koci dhammo nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:231_2: Yathā panassa dhammabhāvo sambhavati, tathā heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitameva. Evaṃ hissa sīlabhāvo
anya-e0103n:231_3: suṭṭhu yujjati. Taṃ taṃ pahānanti “pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ, adinnādānassa pahāna”nti
anya-e0103n:231_4: evaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ taṃ pahānaṃ. Tassa tassa kusaladhammassāti pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ
anya-e0103n:231_5: mettādikusaladhammassa, adinnādānassa pahānaṃ cāgādikusaladhammassāti evaṃ tassa
anya-e0103n:231_6: tassa kusaladhammassa. Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti patiṭṭhānabhāvena. Pahānaṃ hi tasmiṃ sati
anya-e0103n:231_7: hoti, asati na hoti, tassa “patiṭṭhāna”nti vattabbataṃ labhatīti katvā yasmiṃ santāne
anya-e0103n:231_8: pāṇātipātādayo tassa pakampahetavoti tappahānaṃ vikampābhāvakaraṇena ca samādhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:231_9: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sesapahānesupi vattabbaṃ. Samādhānaṃ saṇṭhapanaṃ, saṃyamanaṃ vā. Itare
anya-e0103n:231_10: cattāroti veramaṇiādayo cattāro dhammā na pahānaṃ viya vohāramattanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:231_11: Tato tatoti tamhā tamhā pāṇātipātādito. Tassa tassāti pāṇātipātādikassa saṃvaraṇavasena,
anya-e0103n:231_12: tassa tassa vā saṃvarassa vasena. Tadubhayasampayuttacetanāvasenāti veramaṇīhi, saṃvaradhammehi
anya-e0103n:231_13: ca sampayuttāya cetanāya vasena. Taṃ taṃ avītikkamantassāti taṃ taṃ pāṇātipātādiṃ
anya-e0103n:231_14: avītikkamantassa puggalassa, dhammasamūhassa vā vasena cetaso pavattisabbhāvaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0103n:233_0: 21. Saṃkilissati tenāti saṃkileso. Ko pana soti āha “khaṇḍādibhāvo sīlassa saṃkileso”ti.
anya-e0103n:233_1: Vodāyati visujjhati etenāti vodānaṃ, akhaṇḍādibhāvo. Lābhayasādīti ādi-saddena ñātiaṅgajīvitādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:233_2: saṅgaho. Sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā vemajjheti ca idaṃ tesaṃ uddesādipāḷivasena
anya-e0103n:233_3: vuttaṃ. Na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṃ anukkamo atthi. Khaṇḍanti khaṇḍavantaṃ,
anya-e0103n:233_4: khaṇḍitaṃ vā. Chiddanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyāti vatthante,
anya-e0103n:234_0: Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena. Methunasaṃyogavasenāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisabhāvāpattiyā
anya-e0103n:234_1: mithunānaṃ idanti methunaṃ, nibandhanaṃ. Methunavasena samāyogo methunasaṃyogo. Idha
anya-e0103n:234_2: pana methunasaṃyogo viyāti methunasaṃyogo, tassa vasena. Idhāti imasmiṃ loke. Ekaccoti
anya-e0103n:234_3: eko. Samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti pabbajjāmattena samaṇo vā jātimattena brāhmaṇo vā. Dvayaṃdvayasamāpattinti
anya-e0103n:234_4: dvīhi dvīhi samāpajjitabbaṃ, methunanti attho. Na heva kho samāpajjatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:234_5: Ucchādanaṃ ubbattanaṃ. Sambāhanaṃ parimaddanaṃ. Sādiyatīti adhivāseti. Tadassādetīti
anya-e0103n:234_6: taṃ ucchādanādiṃ abhiramati. Nikāmetīti icchati. Vittinti tuṭṭhiṃ. Idampi khoti ettha
anya-e0103n:234_7: idanti yathāvuttaṃ sādiyanādiṃ khaṇḍabhāvādivasena ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Pi-saddo vakkhamānaṃ
anya-e0103n:234_8: upādāya samuccayattho. Kho-saddo avadhāraṇattho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadetaṃ brahmacārīpaṭiññassa
anya-e0103n:234_10: idampi ekaṃsena tassa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍādibhāvāpādanato khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi
anya-e0103n:234_11: kammāsampīti. Evaṃ pana khaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā so aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati,
anya-e0103n:234_12: na parisuddhaṃ, saṃyutto methunasaṃyogena, na visaṃyutto. Tato cassa na jātiādīhi
anya-e0103n:235_0: Sañjagghatīti kilesavasena mahāhasitaṃ hasati. Saṃkīḷatīti kāyasaṃsaggavasena kīḷati.
anya-e0103n:235_1: Saṃkelāyatīti sabbaso mātugāmaṃ kelāyanto viharati. Cakkhunāti attano cakkhunā. Cakkhunti
anya-e0103n:235_2: mātugāmassa cakkhuṃ. Upanijjhāyatīti upecca nijjhāyati oloketi. Tirokuṭṭāti kuṭṭassa
anya-e0103n:235_3: parato. Tathā tiropākārā. Mattikāmayā bhitti kuṭṭaṃ, iṭṭhakāmayā pākāroti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:235_4: Yā kāci vā bhitti porisato diyaḍḍharatanuccappamāṇā kuṭṭaṃ, kuṭṭato adhiko pākāro.
anya-e0103n:236_0: Assāti brahmacārīpaṭiññassa. Pubbeti vatasamādānato pubbe. Kāmaguṇehīti kāmakoṭṭhāsehi.
anya-e0103n:236_1: Samappitanti suṭṭhu appitaṃ sahitaṃ. Samaṅgībhūtanti samannāgataṃ. Paricārayamānanti
anya-e0103n:236_2: kīḷantaṃ, upaṭṭhahiyamānaṃ vā. Paṇidhāyāti patthetvā. Sīlenātiādīsu yamaniyamādisamādānavasena
anya-e0103n:236_3: sīlaṃ. Avītikkamavasena vataṃ. Ubhayampi sīlaṃ. Dukkaracariyavasena pavattitaṃ vataṃ.
anya-e0103n:236_4: Taṃtaṃakiccasammatato vā nivattilakkhaṇaṃ sīlaṃ. Taṃtaṃsamādānavato vesabhojanakiccakaraṇādivisesapaṭipatti
anya-e0103n:236_5: vataṃ. Sabbathāpi dukkaracariyā tapo. Methunavirati brahmacariyaṃ.
anya-e0103n:237_0: Sabbasoti anavasesato, sabbesaṃ vā. Abhedenāti avītikkamena. Aparāya ca pāpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:237_1: anuppattiyā, guṇānaṃ uppattiyā saṅgahitoti yojanā. Tattha kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho.
anya-e0103n:237_2: Upanandhanalakkhaṇo upanāho. Paresaṃ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho. Yugaggāhalakkhaṇo
anya-e0103n:237_5: thaddhabhāvalakkhaṇo thambho. Karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho. Unnatilakkhaṇo māno.
anya-e0103n:237_6: Abbhunnatilakkhaṇo atimāno. Majjanalakkhaṇo mado. Cittavosaggalakkhaṇo pamādo. Ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n:238_0: Idāni “akhaṇḍādibhāvo panā”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yāni hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:238_1: Tattha anupahatānīti anupaddutāni. Vivaṭṭūpanissayatāya taṇhādāsabyato mocanena bhujissabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:238_2: Aviññūnaṃ appamāṇattā vuttaṃ “viññūhi pasatthattā”ti. Samādhisaṃvattanaṃ vā etesaṃ
anya-e0103n:238_3: payojanaṃ, samādhisaṃvattane vā niyuttānīti samādhisaṃvattanikāni. Niddānena sassasampatti
anya-e0103n:238_4: viya paṭipakkhavigamena sīlasampadā, sā ca tattha sati dosadassaneti āha “sīlavipattiyā
anya-e0103n:238_5: ca ādīnavadassanenā”ti. Nisammakārīnaṃ payojanagarukatāya diṭṭhaguṇeyeva sammāpaṭipattīti
anya-e0103n:239_0: Tattha sīlavipattiyā ādīnavo sīlasampadāya heṭṭhā dassitaānisaṃsapaṭipakkhato veditabbo,
anya-e0103n:239_1: taṃ suviññeyyanti avitthāretvā pakārantarehi dassetuṃ “apicā”ti āraddhaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:239_2: yathā sīlasampadā sattānaṃ manuññabhāvakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ sīlavipatti amanuññabhāvakāraṇanti
anya-e0103n:239_3: āha “dussīlo…pe… devamanussāna”nti. Ananusāsanīyo jigucchitabbato. Dukkhitoti sañjātadukkho.
anya-e0103n:239_4: Vippaṭisārīti “akataṃ vata me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā paccānutāpī. Dubbaṇṇoti guṇavaṇṇena,
anya-e0103n:239_5: kāyavaṇṇena ca virahito. Assāti dussīlassa. Samphassitānaṃ dukkho dukkhāvaho samphasso
anya-e0103n:239_6: etassāti dukkhasamphasso. Guṇānubhāvābhāvato appaṃ agghatīti appaggho. Anekavassagaṇikagūthakūpo
anya-e0103n:239_7: viyāti anekavassasamūhe sañcitukkārāvāṭo viya. Dubbisodhano sodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
anya-e0103n:239_8: Chavālātaṃ chavaḍāhe santajjanummukkaṃ. Ubhato paribāhiroti sāmaññato, gihibhogato
anya-e0103n:239_9: ca parihīno. Sabbesaṃ verī, sabbe vā verī etassāti sabbaverī, so eva sabbaveriko,
anya-e0103n:239_10: puriso. Saṃvāsaṃ nārahatīti asaṃvāsāraho. Saddhammeti paṭipattisaddhamme, paṭivedhasaddhamme ca.
anya-e0103n:240_2: ca assādena gadhitacittā pañcakāma…pe… gadhitacittā, tesaṃ. Te yathāvuttasukhassādā
anya-e0103n:241_0: Passatha noti passatha nu, api passatha. Mahantanti vipulaṃ. Aggikkhandhanti aggisamūhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:241_1: Ādittanti padittaṃ. Sampajjalitanti samantato pajjalitaṃ acchivipphuliṅgāni muccantaṃ.
anya-e0103n:241_2: Sajotibhūtanti sapabhaṃ samantato uṭṭhitāhi jālāhi ekappabhāsamudayabhūtaṃ. Taṃ kiṃ
anya-e0103n:241_3: maññathāti taṃ idāni mayā vuccamānamatthaṃ kiṃ maññathāti anumatigahaṇatthaṃ pucchati.
anya-e0103n:241_4: Āliṅgetvāti upagūhitvā. Upanisīdeyyāti teneva āliṅganena upecca nisīdeyya. Yadatthamettha
anya-e0103n:241_5: satthā aggikkhandhāliṅganaṃ, kaññāliṅganañca ānesi, tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ārocayāmī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:241_6: Tattha ārocayāmīti āmantemi. Voti tumhe. Paṭivedayāmīti pabodhemi. Dussīlassāti nissīlassa
anya-e0103n:241_7: sīlavirahitassa. Pāpadhammassāti dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvassa.
anya-e0103n:241_9: saritabbasamācārassa. Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī”ti
anya-e0103n:241_10: paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyova hoti, kenacideva vā karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci
anya-e0103n:241_11: nu kho ime mayā kataṃ kammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāroti.
anya-e0103n:241_13: na samaṇassa. Salākaggahaṇādīsu “ahampi samaṇo”ti micchāpaṭiññāya samaṇapaṭiññassa.
anya-e0103n:241_15: brahmacāripaṭiññassa. Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtikassa.
anya-e0103n:241_16: Chahi dvārehi rāgādikilesānuvassanena tintattā avassutassa. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā,
anya-e0103n:241_17: sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca kasambujātassa. Aggikkhandhūpamāya hīnūpamabhūtāyāti
anya-e0103n:241_18: attho. Tenāha bhagavā – “etadeva tassa vara”nti. Bhagavā dukkhaṃ dassetvā dukkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:242_0: Vāḷarajjuyāti vāḷehi katarajjuyā. Sā hi kharatarā hoti. Ghaṃseyyāti padhaṃsanavasena
anya-e0103n:242_1: ghaṃseyya. Teladhotāyāti telena nisitāya. Paccorasminti patiurasmiṃ urābhimukhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:242_2: uramajjheti adhippāyo. Ayosaṅkunāti saṇḍāsena. Pheṇuddehakanti pheṇaṃ uddehetvā,
anya-e0103n:243_0: Aggikkhandhāliṅganadukkhatopi adhimattadukkhatāya kaṭukabhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ phalaṃ etassāti
anya-e0103n:243_2: dussīlassa kuto tassa sukhaṃ natthevāti adhippāyo. Sādaneti sādiyane. Yanti añjalikammasādanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:243_3: Asīlinoti dussīlassa. Upahatanti sīlabyasanena upaddutaṃ. Khatanti kusalamūlānaṃ
anya-e0103n:243_4: khaṇanena khataṃ, khaṇitaṃ vā guṇaṃ sarīreti adhippāyo. Sabbabhayehīti attānuvādādisabbabhayehi.
anya-e0103n:244_1: Kāyagandhopi pāmojjaṃ, sīlavantassa bhikkhuno. Karoti api devānanti ettha “gandho
anya-e0103n:244_2: isīnaṃ ciradikkhitāna”ntiādikā gāthā vitthāretabbā. Avighātīti appaṭighātī. Vadhabandhādiparikilesā
anya-e0103n:244_3: diṭṭhadhammikā āsavā upaddavā. Samparāyikadukkhānaṃ mūlaṃ nāma dussīlyaṃ. Antamatikkantaṃ
anya-e0103n:244_4: accantaṃ, accantaṃ santā accantasantā kilesapariḷāhasaṅkhātadarathānaṃ abhāvena sabbadā
anya-e0103n:244_5: santā. Ubbijjitvāti ñāṇutrāsena uttasitvā. Vodāpetabbanti visodhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:248_0: 22. Appā icchā etassāti appiccho, paccayagedharahito. Tassa bhāvo appicchatā, alobhajjhāsayatāti
anya-e0103n:248_1: attho. Samaṃ tuṭṭhi, santena, sakena vā tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi, santuṭṭhi eva santuṭṭhitā,
anya-e0103n:248_2: aññaṃ apatthetvā yathāladdhehi itarītarehi paccayehi paritussanā. Santuṭṭhitādīhīti
anya-e0103n:248_3: ta-kāro vā padasandhikaro. “Santuṭṭhiādīhī”ti vā pāṭho. Te guṇeti te sīlavodānassa
anya-e0103n:248_4: hetubhūte appicchatādiguṇe. Sampādetunti sampanne kātuṃ. Te hi sīlavisuddhiyā paṭiladdhamattā
anya-e0103n:248_5: hutvā dhutadhammehi sampannatarā honti. Dhutaṅgasamādānanti kilesānaṃ dhunanakaaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0103n:248_6: viddhaṃsanakāraṇānaṃ sammadeva ādānaṃ. Evanti evaṃ sante, dhutaṅgasamādāne kateti
anya-e0103n:248_7: attho. Assa yogino. Sallekho kilesānaṃ sammadeva likhanā chedanā tanukaraṇaṃ. Paviveko
anya-e0103n:248_8: cittavivekassa upāyabhūtā vivekaṭṭhakāyatā. Apacayo yathā paṭipajjanato kilesā naṃ
anya-e0103n:248_9: apacinanti na ācinanti, tathā paṭipajjanā. Vīriyārambho anuppannānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:248_12: Sīlañceva yathāsamādinnaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena suparisuddhaṃ bhavissati.
anya-e0103n:248_13: Vatāni ca dhutadhammā ca sampajjissanti sampannā bhavissanti, nipphajjissanti vā.
anya-e0103n:248_14: Yā thirabhūtā itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanasantuṭṭhi porāṇānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:248_15: paveṇibhāvena ṭhitā, tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “porāṇe ariyavaṃsattaye patiṭṭhāyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:248_16: Bhāvanā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti bhāvanārāmo, tabbhāvo bhāvanārāmatā, samathavipassanābhāvanāsu
anya-e0103n:248_17: yuttappayuttatā. Yasmā adhigamāraho bhavissati, tasmāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:249_0: Lābhasakkārādi taṇhāya āmasitabbato, lokapariyāpannatāya ca lokāmisaṃ. Nibbānādhigamassa
anya-e0103n:249_1: anulomato anulomapaṭipadā vipassanābhāvanā. Atthatoti vacanatthato. Pabhedatoti vibhāgato.
anya-e0103n:249_2: Bhedatoti vināsato. Dhutādīnanti dhutadhutavādadhutadhammadhutaṅgānaṃ. Samāsabyāsatoti saṅkhepavitthārato.
anya-e0103n:250_0: 23. Rathikāti racchā. Saṅkārakūṭādīnanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Abbhuggataṭṭhenāti
anya-e0103n:250_1: ussitaṭṭhena. “Nadiyā kūla”ntiādīsu viya samussayattho kūla-saddoti āha “paṃsukūlamiva
anya-e0103n:250_2: paṃsukūla”nti. Ku-saddo kucchāyaṃ ula-saddo gatiatthoti āha “kucchitabhāvaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0103n:250_3: vuttaṃ hotī”ti, paṃsu viya kucchitaṃ ulati pavattatīti vā paṃsukūlaṃ. Paṃsukūlassa
anya-e0103n:250_4: dhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ uttarapadalopena, taṃ sīlamassāti paṃsukūliko, yathā “āpūpiko”ti.
anya-e0103n:250_5: Aṅgati attano phalaṃ paṭicca hetubhāvaṃ gacchatīti aṅgaṃ, kāraṇaṃ. Yena puggalo “paṃsukūliko”ti
anya-e0103n:250_6: vuccati, so samādānacetanāsaṅkhāto dhammo paṃsukūlikassa aṅganti paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0103n:250_7: Tenāha “paṃsukūlikassā”tiādi. Tassāti samādānassa. Samādiyati etenāti samādānaṃ, cetanā.
anya-e0103n:251_0: Eteneva nayenāti yathā paṃsukūladhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃsīlo paṃsukūliko, tassa aṅgaṃ
anya-e0103n:251_1: samādānacetanā “paṃsukūlikaṅga”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ eteneva vacanatthanayena ticīvaradhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:251_2: ticīvaraṃ, taṃsīlo tecīvariko, tassa aṅgaṃ samādānacetanā “tecīvarikaṅga”nti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:251_3: Saṅghāṭiādīsu eva tīsu cīvaresu ticīvarasamaññā, na kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikādīsūti
anya-e0103n:252_0: Taṃ piṇḍapātanti parehi diyyamānānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte patanasaṅkhātaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0103n:252_1: uñchatīti piṇḍapātiko, yathā bādariko sāmākiko. Piṇḍapāti eva piṇḍapātiko, yathā
anya-e0103n:252_2: bhaddo eva bhaddako. Avakhaṇḍanaṃ vicchindanaṃ nirantaramappavatti. Tappaṭikkhepato
anya-e0103n:252_3: anavakhaṇḍanaṃ avicchindanaṃ nirantarappavatti. Saha apadānenāti saha anavakhaṇḍanena.
anya-e0103n:252_4: Sapadānanti padassa kiriyāvisesanabhāvaṃ, yattha ca taṃ anavakhaṇḍanaṃ, tañca dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:252_5: “avakhaṇḍanarahitaṃ anugharanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Ekāsaneti iriyāpathantarena
anya-e0103n:252_6: anantaritāya ekāyayeva nisajjāya. Patte piṇḍoti ettha vatthubhedo idhādhippeto, na
anya-e0103n:252_7: sāmaññaṃ. Eva-kāro ca luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento “kevalaṃ ekasmiṃyeva patte”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:252_8: Uttarapadalopaṃ katvā ayaṃ niddesoti dassento “pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṃ
anya-e0103n:252_9: katvā”ti āha. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
anya-e0103n:253_0: Pacchābhattaṃ nāma pavāraṇato pacchā laddhabhattaṃ eva. Khalu-saddassa paṭisedhatthavācakattā
anya-e0103n:253_1: tena samānatthaṃ na-kāraṃ gahetvā āha “na pacchābhattiko”ti. Sikkhāpadassa visayo
anya-e0103n:253_2: sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhitto. Yo tassa avisayo, so eva samādānassa visayoti āha “samādānavasena
anya-e0103n:253_3: paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassā”ti. Abbhokāse nivāso abbhokāso. Susāne nivāso susānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:253_4: taṃ sīlaṃ assātiādinā sabbaṃ vattabbanti āha “eseva nayo”ti. Yathāsanthataṃ viya
anya-e0103n:253_5: yathāsanthataṃ, ādito yathāuddiṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ hesa “idaṃ bahumaṅkuṇaṃ duggandhapavāta”ntiādivasena
anya-e0103n:253_6: appaṭikkhipitvāva sampaṭicchati. Tenevāha “idaṃ tuyha”ntiādi. Sayananti nipajjanamāha.
anya-e0103n:253_7: Tena tena samādānenāti tena tena paṃsukūlikaṅgādikassa samādānena dhutakilesattāti
anya-e0103n:253_9: taṃ kilesadhunanaṃ, tāniyeva idha dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgānīti adhippetāni, na aññāni
anya-e0103n:253_10: yāni kānici, aññena vā dhutassāti ayamattho atthato āpanno. “Ñāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etesa”nti
anya-e0103n:253_11: iminā ñāṇapubbakataṃ tesaṃ samādānassa vibhāveti. Paṭipattiyāti sīlādisammāpaṭipattiyā.
anya-e0103n:253_12: Samādiyati etenāti samādānaṃ, samādānavasena pavattā cetanā, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti
anya-e0103n:256_0: Samādānacetanāya gahaṇaṃ taṃmūlakattā pariharaṇacetanāpi dhutaṅgameva. Attanā, parammukhena
anya-e0103n:256_1: ca kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṃ viluppanaṭṭhena loluppaṃ taṇhācāro, tassa viddhaṃsanakiccattā
anya-e0103n:256_2: loluppaviddhaṃsanarasāni. Tato eva nilloluppabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhanti, taṃ vā paccupaṭṭhāpentīti
anya-e0103n:257_0: Bhagavatova santike samādātabbānīti idaṃ antarā avicchedanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, rañño santike
anya-e0103n:257_1: paṭiññātārahassa atthassa tadupajīvino ekaṃsato avisaṃvādanaṃ viya. Sesānaṃ santike
anya-e0103n:257_2: samādānepi eseva nayo. Ekasaṅgītikassāti pañcasu dīghanikāyādīsu nikāyesu ekanikāyikassa.
anya-e0103n:257_3: Aṭṭhakathācariyassāti yassa aṭṭhakathātantiyeva visesato paguṇā, tassa. Etthāti attanāpi
anya-e0103n:257_4: samādānassa ruhane. Jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthūti so kira thero nesajjiko,
anya-e0103n:257_5: tassa taṃ na koci jānāti. Athekadivasaṃ rattiyā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṃ vijjulatobhāsena
anya-e0103n:257_6: disvā itaro pucchi “kiṃ, bhante, tumhe nesajjikā”ti. Thero dhutaṅgappicchatāya tāvadeva
anya-e0103n:259_0: 24. Gahapatidānacīvaranti ettha dāyakabhāvena samaṇāpi ukkaṭṭhassa gahapatipakkhaṃyeva
anya-e0103n:259_1: paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Pabbajito gaṇhissatī”ti ṭhapitakaṃ siyā gahapaticīvaraṃ,
anya-e0103n:259_2: na pana gahapatidānacīvaranti tādisaṃ nivattetuṃ dānaggahaṇaṃ. Aññatarenāti ettha
anya-e0103n:259_3: samādānavacanena tāva samādinnaṃ hotu, paṭikkhepavacanena pana kathanti? Atthato
anya-e0103n:259_4: āpannattā. Yathā “devadatto divā na bhuñjatī”ti vutte “rattiyaṃ bhuñjatī”ti atthato
anya-e0103n:259_5: āpannameva hoti, tassa āhārena vinā sarīraṭṭhiti natthīti, evamidhāpi bhikkhuno gahapatidānacīvare
anya-e0103n:259_6: paṭikkhitte tadaññacīvarappaṭiggaho atthato āpanno eva hoti, cīvarena vinā sāsane ṭhiti natthīti.
anya-e0103n:260_0: Evaṃ samādinnadhutaṅgenātiādividhānaṃ paṃsukūlikaṅge paṭipajjanavidhi. Susāne laddhaṃ
anya-e0103n:260_1: sosānikaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā tattha kenaci chaḍḍitattā patitaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “susāne
anya-e0103n:260_2: patitaka”nti. Evaṃ pāpaṇikampi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tālaveḷimaggo nāma mahāgāme ekā vīthi.
anya-e0103n:260_3: Anurādhapureti ca vadanti. Ḍaḍḍho padeso etassāti ḍaḍḍhappadesaṃ, vatthaṃ. Magge
anya-e0103n:260_5: Thokaṃ rakkhitvāti katipayaṃ kālaṃ āgametvā. Vātāhatampi sāmikānaṃ satisammosena
anya-e0103n:260_6: patitasadisanti “sāmike apassantena gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā thokaṃ āgametvā gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:261_0: “Saṅghassa demā”ti dinnaṃ, coḷakabhikkhāvasena laddhañca laddhakālato paṭṭhāya “samaṇacīvaraṃ
anya-e0103n:261_1: siyā nu kho, no”ti āsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ “na taṃ paṃsukūla”nti vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ tevīsatiyā
anya-e0103n:261_2: uppattiṭṭhānesu katthaci pariyāpannaṃ. Idāni imināva pasaṅgena yaṃ bhikkhudattiye
anya-e0103n:261_3: lakkhaṇapattaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, tassa ca ukkaṭṭhānukkaṭṭhavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “bhikkhudattiyepī”tiādi
anya-e0103n:261_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha gāhetvā vā dīyatīti saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā dentehi yaṃ cīvaraṃ vassaggena
anya-e0103n:261_5: pāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ dīyati. Senāsanacīvaranti senāsanaṃ kāretvā “etasmiṃ senāsane
anya-e0103n:261_6: vasantā paribhuñjantū”ti dinnacīvaraṃ. Na taṃ paṃsukūlanti apaṃsukūlabhāvo pubbe
anya-e0103n:261_7: vuttakāraṇato, gāhetvā dinnattā ca. Tenāha “no gāhāpetvā dinnameva paṃsukūla”nti.
anya-e0103n:261_8: Tatrapīti yaṃ gāhetvā na dinnaṃ bhikkhudattiyaṃ, tatrapi yena bhikkhunā cīvaraṃ dīyati,
anya-e0103n:261_9: tassa lābhe, dāne ca visuṃ visuṃ ubhayattha ādaragāravānaṃ sabbhāvato, tadabhāvato
anya-e0103n:261_10: ca bhikkhudattiyassa ekatosuddhi ubhatosuddhi anukkaṭṭhatā hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:261_11: “yaṃ dāyakehī”tiādi vuttaṃ, pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnakaṃ samaṇenāti adhippāyo. Yassa
anya-e0103n:261_12: kassacīti ukkaṭṭhādīsu yassa kassaci. Ruciyāti chandena. Khantiyāti nijjhānakkhantiyā.
anya-e0103n:262_1: nissayesu attanā yathāpaṭiññātadutiyanissayānurūpāya paṭipattiyā vijjamānatā. Ārakkhadukkhābhāvoti
anya-e0103n:262_3: abhāvo savisesalūkhasabhāvattā. Pāsādikatāti paresaṃ pasādāvahatā. Appicchatādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:262_5: samādāya vattanaṃ yāvadeva upari sammāpaṭipattisampādanāyāti vuttaṃ “sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n:262_6: anubrūhana”nti. Mārasenavighātāyāti mārassa, mārasenāya ca vihananāya viddhaṃsanāya.
anya-e0103n:262_7: Kāyavācācittehi yato saṃyatoti yati, bhikkhu. Dhāritaṃ yaṃ lokagarunā paṃsukūlaṃ,
anya-e0103n:262_8: taṃ ko na dhāraye, yasmā vā lokagarunā paṃsukūlaṃ dhāritaṃ, tasmā ko taṃ na dhārayeti
anya-e0103n:262_9: yojanā yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ ekantasambandhibhāvato. Paṭiññaṃ samanussaranti upasampadamāḷe
anya-e0103n:262_10: “āma bhante”ti ācariyapamukhassa saṅghassa sammukhā dinnaṃ paṭiññaṃ samanussaranto.
anya-e0103n:265_1: appaṭikkhipitabbato. Aññataravacanenāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
anya-e0103n:265_2: Yāva na sakkoti, yāva na labhati, yāva na sampajjatīti paccekaṃ yāva-saddo sambandhitabbo.
anya-e0103n:265_3: Na sampajjatīti na sijjhati. Nikkhittapaccayā doso natthīti nicayasannidhidhutaṅgasaṃkilesadoso
anya-e0103n:265_4: natthi. Āsanneti cīvarassa āsanne ṭhāne. Rajanakkhaṇe paribhuñjanakāsāvaṃ rajanakāsāvaṃ.
anya-e0103n:265_5: Tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ nāma attano, parassa vā santakaṃ senāsane paccattharaṇavasena
anya-e0103n:265_6: adhiṭṭhitaṃ. “Aṃsakāsāvaṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ hoti, iti paccattharaṇaṃ, aṃsakāsāvanti
anya-e0103n:265_7: imāni dvepi atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitānipi dhutaṅgabhedaṃ na karontī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:265_8: vuttanti vadanti. Pariharituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti rajanakāle eva anuññātattā niccaparibhogavasena
anya-e0103n:265_9: na vaṭṭati tecīvarikassa. Aṃsakāsāvanti khandhe ṭhapetabbakāsāvaṃ. Kāyaparihārikenāti
anya-e0103n:265_10: vātātapādiparissayato kāyassa pariharaṇamattena. Samādāyevāti gahetvā eva. Appasamārambhatāti
anya-e0103n:265_11: appakiccatā. Kappiye mattakāritāyāti nisīdanādivasena, parikkhāracoḷavasena ca bahūsu
anya-e0103n:265_12: cīvaresu anuññātesupi ticīvaramatte ṭhitattā. Saha pattacaraṇāyāti sapattacaraṇo. Pakkhī sapakkhako.
anya-e0103n:268_1: atirekalābhaṃ, saṅghabhattādinti attho. Sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:268_2: Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā dātabbabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ. Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ
anya-e0103n:268_3: dātabbabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ. Uposathe uposathe dātabbabhattaṃ uposathikaṃ. Paṭipadadivase
anya-e0103n:268_4: dātabbabhattaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ. Vihāraṃ uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ vihārabhattaṃ. Dhuragehe
anya-e0103n:268_5: eva ṭhapetvā dātabbabhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ. Gāmavāsīādīhi vārena dātabbabhattaṃ vārakabhattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:268_7: vaṭṭantīti bhikkhāpariyāyena vuttattā. Bhesajjādipaṭisaṃyuttā nirāmisasalākā. Yāvakālikavajjāti
anya-e0103n:268_8: ca vadanti. Vihāre pakkabhattampīti upāsakā idheva bhattaṃ pacitvā “sabbesaṃ ayyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:268_9: dassāmā”ti vihāreyeva bhattaṃ sampādenti, taṃ piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Āharitvāti
anya-e0103n:268_10: pattaṃ gahetvā gehato ānetvā. Taṃ divasaṃ nisīditvāti “mā, bhante, piṇḍāya carittha,
anya-e0103n:268_11: vihāreyeva bhikkhā ānīyatī”ti vadantānaṃ sampaṭicchanena taṃ divasaṃ nisīditvā. Serivihārasukhanti
anya-e0103n:269_0: Jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya piṇḍapariyesanato kosajjanimmaddanatā. “Yathāpi bhamaro puppha”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:269_1: vuttavidhinā āhārapariyesanato parisuddhājīvatā. Niccaṃ antaragharaṃ pavisantasseva
anya-e0103n:269_3: mattaññutāya, saṃsaṭṭhavihārābhāvato ca aparapositā. Kule kule appakaappakapiṇḍagahaṇena
anya-e0103n:269_4: parānuggahakiriyā. Antimāya jīvikāya avaṭṭhānena mānappahānaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “antamidaṃ,
anya-e0103n:269_5: bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ, yadidaṃ piṇḍolya”ntiādi. Missakabhattena yāpanato rasataṇhānivāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:270_0: Appaṭihatavuttitāya catūsupi disāsu vattanaṭṭhena cātuddiso. Ājīvassa visujjhatīti
anya-e0103n:270_1: ājīvo assa visujjhati. Attabharassāti appānavajjasulabharūpehi paccayehi attano bharaṇato
anya-e0103n:270_2: attabharassa. Tato eva ekavihāritāya saddhivihārikādīnampi aññesaṃ aposanato anaññaposino.
anya-e0103n:270_3: Padadvayenāpi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato
anya-e0103n:270_4: sallahukavuttitaṃ, subharataṃ, paramaappicchataṃ, santuṭṭhiñca dasseti. Devāpi pihayanti
anya-e0103n:270_5: tādinoti tādisassa bhusaṃ ativiya santakāyavacīmanokammatāya upasantassa paramena
anya-e0103n:270_6: satinepakkena samannāgamato sabbakālaṃ satimato piṇḍapātikassa bhikkhussa sakkādayo
anya-e0103n:270_7: devāpi pihayanti patthenti. Tassa sīlādiguṇesu bahumānaṃ uppādentā ādaraṃ janenti,
anya-e0103n:270_8: pageva manussā. Sace so lābhasakkārasilokasannissito na hoti, tadabhikaṅkhī na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n:273_0: 27. Imināti sapadānacārikena. Kālataranti kālasseva. Aphāsukaṭṭhānanti saparissayādivasena
anya-e0103n:273_1: duppavesanaṭṭhānaṃ. Puratoti vīthiyaṃ gacchantassa purato gharaṃ apaviṭṭhasseva.
anya-e0103n:273_2: Pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pesakāravīthiyaṃ pesakārabhāvaṃ nimminitvā ṭhitassa sakkassa
anya-e0103n:273_3: gharadvāre pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko taṃ divasaṃ na bhikkhaṃ āgamayamāno
anya-e0103n:273_4: nisīdati, tasmā taṃ anulometi. Katthacipi kule nibaddhaṃ upasaṅkamanābhāvato paricayābhāvena
anya-e0103n:273_5: kulesu niccanavakatā. Sabbattha alaggamānasatāya ca sommabhāvena ca candūpamatā.
anya-e0103n:273_6: Kulesu pariggahacittābhāvena tattha maccherappahānaṃ. Hitesitāya vibhāgābhāvato samānukampitā.
anya-e0103n:273_8: avhānassa asampaṭicchanā. Abhihārenāti bhikkhābhihārena. Sericāranti yathāruci vicaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:276_0: 28. Nānāsanabhojananti anekasmiṃ āsane bhojanaṃ, ekanisajjāya eva abhuñjitvā visuṃ
anya-e0103n:276_1: visuṃ nisajjāsu āhāraparibhoganti attho. Patirūpanti yuttarūpaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ. Vattaṃ
anya-e0103n:276_2: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vattaṃ kātuṃ yujjati. Vattaṃ nāma garuṭṭhānīye kattabbameva. Tattha
anya-e0103n:276_3: pana paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ theravādaṃ āha “āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ
anya-e0103n:276_4: vā”tiādi. Tassattho – ekāsanikaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhuñjantaṃ āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya, dhutaṅgabhedato
anya-e0103n:276_5: yāva bhojanapariyosānā na vuṭṭhātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhojanaṃ vā rakkheyya dhutaṅgabhedato,
anya-e0103n:276_6: abhuñjiyamānaṃ yāva bhuñjituṃ nārabhati, tāva vuṭṭhātabbanti attho. Yasmā tayidaṃ
anya-e0103n:276_7: dvayaṃ idha natthi, tasmā vattakaraṇaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na rakkhatīti adhippāyo. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:276_9: vaṭṭantīti dasseti. Appābādhatāti arogatā. Appātaṅkatāti akicchajīvitā sarīradukkhābhāvo.
anya-e0103n:276_10: Lahuṭṭhānanti kāyassa lahuparivattitā. Balanti sarīrabalaṃ. Phāsuvihāroti sukhavihāro.
anya-e0103n:276_11: Sabbametaṃ bahukkhattuṃ bhuñjanapaccayā uppajjanavikārapaṭikkhepapadaṃ. Rujāti rogā.
anya-e0103n:276_12: Na kammamattanoti attano yogakammaṃ purebhattaṃ, pacchābhattañca na parihāpeti, bahuso
anya-e0103n:279_0: 29. Appaṭikūlaṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati paṭikūlassa bhuttassa agaṇhanampi siyāti
anya-e0103n:279_1: adhippāyo. Pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabbanti “ekabhājanameva gaṇhāmī”ti bahuṃ gahetvā
anya-e0103n:279_2: na chaḍḍetabbaṃ. Nānārasataṇhāvinodananti nānārasabhojane taṇhāya vinodanaṃ. Atra
anya-e0103n:279_3: atra nānābhājane ṭhite nānārase icchā etassāti atriccho, tassa bhāvo atricchatā,
anya-e0103n:279_4: tassā atricchatāya pahānaṃ. Āhāre payojanamattadassitāti asambhinnanānārase gedhaṃ
anya-e0103n:279_5: akatvā āhāre satthārā anuññātapayojanamattadassitā. Visuṃ visuṃ bhājanesu ṭhitāni
anya-e0103n:279_6: byañjanāni gaṇhato tattha tattha sābhogatāya siyā vikkhittabhojitā, na tathā imassa
anya-e0103n:282_0: 30. Bhuñjantassa yaṃ upanītaṃ, tassa paṭikkhepena taṃ atirittaṃ bhojananti atirittabhojanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:282_1: Puna bhojanaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṃ, tabbisayattā imassa dhutaṅgassa.
anya-e0103n:282_2: Tenāha “idamassa vidhāna”nti. Yasmiṃ bhojaneti yasmiṃ bhuñjiyamāne bhojane. Tadeva
anya-e0103n:282_3: bhuñjati, na aññaṃ. Anatirittabhojanapaccayā āpatti anatirittabhojanāpatti, tato
anya-e0103n:282_4: dūrībhāvo anāpajjanaṃ. Odarikattaṃ ghasmarabhāvo kucchipūrakatā, tassa abhāvo ekapiṇḍenāpi
anya-e0103n:282_5: yāpanato. Nirāmisasannidhitā nihitassa abhuñjanato. Puna pariyesanavasena pariyesanāya
anya-e0103n:282_6: khedaṃ na yāti. Abhisallekhakānaṃ santosaguṇādīnaṃ vuddhiyā sañjananaṃ santosaguṇādivuḍḍhisañjananaṃ.
anya-e0103n:285_0: 31. Gāmantasenāsanaṃ pahāya araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbanti ettha gāmantaṃ, araññañca
anya-e0103n:285_1: sarūpato dassetuṃ “tattha saddhiṃ upacārenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha gāmapariyāpannattā
anya-e0103n:285_2: gāmantasenāsanassa “gāmoyeva gāmantasenāsana”nti vuttaṃ. Yo koci satthopi gāmo nāmāti
anya-e0103n:285_3: sambandho. Indakhīlāti ummārā. Tassāti leḍḍupātassa. Vinayapariyāyena araññalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:285_4: adinnādānapārājike āgataṃ. Tattha hi “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggahe
anya-e0103n:285_5: tadubhayaṃ asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gāmūpacāro hi loke
anya-e0103n:285_6: gāmasaṅkhameva gacchatīti. Nippariyāyato pana gāmavinimuttaṃ ṭhānaṃ araññameva hotīti
anya-e0103n:285_7: abhidhamme gāmā “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ. Suttantikapariyāyena
anya-e0103n:285_8: āraññakasikkhāpade “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āgataṃ āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya.
anya-e0103n:285_9: Na hi so vinayapariyāyike “araññe vasanato āraññiko pantasenāsano”ti sutte vutto.
anya-e0103n:285_10: Ayañca suttasaṃvaṇṇanāti idha sabbattha suttantakathāva pamāṇaṃ. Tasmā tattha āgatameva
anya-e0103n:285_11: lakkhaṇaṃ gahetabbanti dassento “taṃ āropitena ācariyadhanunā”tiādinā minanavidhiṃ
anya-e0103n:285_12: āha. Teneva hi majjhimaṭṭhakathānayova idamettha pamāṇanti ca vutto.
anya-e0103n:286_0: Tato tato magganti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṃ pidahati. Dhutaṅgasuddhikena dhutaṅgasodhanapasutena.
anya-e0103n:286_1: Yathāparicchinne kāleti ukkaṭṭhassa tayopi utū, majjhimassa dve, mudukassa eko utu.
anya-e0103n:286_2: Tatthapi dhutaṅgaṃ na bhijjati saussāhattā. Nipajjitvā gamissāmāti cittassa sithilabhāvena
anya-e0103n:286_3: dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjatīti vuttaṃ. Araññasaññaṃ manasi karontoti “ahaṃ vivekavāsaṃ vasissāmi,
anya-e0103n:286_4: yathāladdhova kāyaviveko sātthako kātabbo”ti manasikārasabbhāvato “bhabbo…pe… rakkhitu”nti
anya-e0103n:286_5: vuttaṃ. Assa āraññikassa cittaṃ na vikkhipanti āpāthamanupagamanato. Vigatasantāso
anya-e0103n:286_6: hoti vivekaparicayato. Jīvitanikantiṃ jahati bahuparissaye araññe nivāseneva maraṇabhayassa
anya-e0103n:286_7: dūrīkaraṇato. Pavivekasukharasaṃ assādeti anubhavati janasaṃsaggābhāvato. Ārādhayantoti
anya-e0103n:286_8: anunayanto. Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā vivekassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato āraññikaṅgayogino
anya-e0103n:289_0: 32. Channanti iṭṭhakāchadanādīhi chāditaṃ, āvasathanti attho. Sīmantarikarukkhoti
anya-e0103n:289_1: dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ rajjasīmāya ṭhitarukkho. Tattha hi tesaṃ rājūnaṃ balakāyo upagantvā
anya-e0103n:289_2: antarantarā yuddhaṃ kareyya, corāpi pāripanthikā samosarantā bhikkhussa sukhena nisīdituṃ
anya-e0103n:289_3: na denti. Cetiyarukkho “devatādhiṭṭhito”ti manussehi sammatarukkho pūjetuṃ upagatehi
anya-e0103n:289_4: manussehi avivitto hoti. Niyyāsarukkho sajjarukkhādi. Vaggulirukkho vaggulinisevito.
anya-e0103n:289_5: Sīmantarikarukkhādayo saparissayā, dullabhavivekā cāti āha “ime rukkhe vivajjetvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:289_6: Paṇṇasaṭanti rukkhato patitapaṇṇaṃ. Paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ rukkhamūlikabhāvassa
anya-e0103n:289_7: paṭicchādanatthaṃ. Channe vāsakappanā dhammassavanādīnamatthāyapi hoti. Tasmā “jānitvā
anya-e0103n:290_0: Abhiṇhaṃ tarupaṇṇavikāradassanenāti abhikkhaṇaṃ tarūsu, tarūnaṃ vā paṇṇesu vikārassa
anya-e0103n:290_2: Devatāhīti rukkhadevatāhi. Tāpi hi rukkhaṭṭhavimānesu vasantiyo rukkhesu vasanti.
anya-e0103n:290_3: Ayampi rukkheti sahavāsitā. Vaṇṇitoti “appāni cevā”tiādinā pasaṃsito. “Rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ
anya-e0103n:290_4: nissāya pabbajjā”ti evaṃ nissayoti ca bhāsito. Abhirattāni taruṇakāle, nīlāni majjhimakāle,
anya-e0103n:290_5: paṇḍūni jiṇṇakāle. Patitāni milāyanavasena. Evaṃ passanto tarupaṇṇāni paccakkhato
anya-e0103n:290_6: eva niccasaññaṃ panūdati pajahati, aniccasaññā evassa saṇṭhāti. Yasmā bhagavato jātibodhidhammacakkapavattanaparinibbānāni
anya-e0103n:293_0: 33. “Rukkhamūlaṃ paṭikkhipāmī”ti ettake vutte channaṃ appaṭikkhittameva hotīti “channañca
anya-e0103n:293_1: rukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipāmī”ti vuttaṃ. Dhutaṅgassa sabbaso paṭiyogipaṭikkhepena hi
anya-e0103n:293_2: samādānaṃ ijjhati, no aññathāti. “Dhammassavanāyā”ti imināva dhammaṃ kathentenāpi
anya-e0103n:293_3: uposathadivasādīsu suṇantānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ tehi yācitena channaṃ pavisituṃ
anya-e0103n:293_4: vaṭṭati, dhammaṃ pana kathetvā abbhokāsova gantabbo. Rukkhamūlikassāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:293_5: Uposathatthāyāti uposathakammāya. Uddisantenāti paresaṃ uddesaṃ dentena. Uddisāpentenāti
anya-e0103n:293_6: sayaṃ uddesaṃ gaṇhantena. Maggamajjhe ṭhitaṃ sālanti sīhaḷadīpe viya maggā anokkamma
anya-e0103n:293_7: ujukameva pavisitabbasālaṃ. Vegena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati asāruppattā. Yāva vassūparamā
anya-e0103n:293_8: ṭhatvā gantabbaṃ, na tāva dhutaṅgabhedo hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:294_0: Rukkhassa anto nāma rukkhamūlaṃ. Pabbatassa pana pabbhārasadiso pabbatapadeso. Acchannamariyādanti
anya-e0103n:294_1: yathā vassodakaṃ anto na pavisati, evaṃ chadanasaṅkhepena upari akatamariyādaṃ. Anto
anya-e0103n:294_2: pana pabbhārassa vassodakaṃ pavisati ce, abbhokāsasaṅkhepamevāti tattha pavisituṃ
anya-e0103n:294_3: vaṭṭati. Sākhāmaṇḍapoti rukkhasākhāhi viraḷacchannamaṇḍapo. Pīṭhapaṭo khalitthaddhasāṭako.
anya-e0103n:295_0: Paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati yathāvuttapabbhārādike ṭhapetvāti adhippāyo. Jānitvāti
anya-e0103n:295_1: dhammassavanādiatthaṃ channaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pavisitvā nisinno “idāni aruṇo uṭṭhahatī”ti
anya-e0103n:295_2: jānitvā. Rukkhamūlepi katthaci attheva nivāsaphāsukatāti siyā tattha āsaṅgapubbako
anya-e0103n:295_3: āvāsapalibodho, na pana abbhokāseti idheva āvāsapalibodhupacchedo ānisaṃso vutto.
anya-e0103n:295_4: Pasaṃsāyānurūpatāti aniketāti vuttapasaṃsāya anālayabhāvena anucchavikatā. Nissaṅgatāti
anya-e0103n:295_5: āvāsapariggahābhāveneva tattha nissaṅgatā. Asukadisāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, tasmā
anya-e0103n:295_6: tattha gantuṃ neva sakkāti edisassa parivitakkassa abhāvato cātuddiso. Migabhūtenāti
anya-e0103n:295_7: pariggahābhāvena migassa viya bhūtena. Sitoti nissito. Vindatīti labhati.
anya-e0103n:298_0: 34. Na susānanti asusānaṃ. Aññattho na-kāro, susānalakkhaṇarahitaṃ vasanaṭṭhānanti
anya-e0103n:298_1: adhippāyo. Na tatthāti “susāna”nti vavatthapitamatte ṭhāne na vasitabbaṃ. Na hi nāmamattena
anya-e0103n:298_2: susānalakkhaṇaṃ sijjhati. Tenāha “na hī”tiādi. Jhāpitakālato pana paṭṭhāya…pe… susānameva
anya-e0103n:298_3: chavena sayitamattāya susānalakkhaṇappattito. Chavasayanaṃ hi “susāna”nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:299_0: Sosānikena nāma appakiccena sallahukavuttinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “tasmiṃ pana
anya-e0103n:299_1: vasantenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Garukanti dupparihāraṃ. Tameva hi dupparihārabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:299_3: corā katakammāpi akatakammāpi osaranti, tattha coresu bhaṇḍasāmike disvā bhikkhusamīpe
anya-e0103n:299_4: bhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā palātesu manussā bhikkhuṃ “coro”ti gahetvā potheyyuṃ, tasmā vihāre
anya-e0103n:299_5: saṅghattheraṃ vā gocaragāme raññā niyuttaṃ rājayuttakaṃ vā attano sosānikabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:299_6: jānāpetvā yathā tādiso, añño vā parissayo na hoti, tathā appamattena vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:299_7: Caṅkamantassa yadā āḷahanaṃ abhimukhaṃ na hoti, tadāpi saṃvegajananatthaṃ tattha
anya-e0103n:299_8: diṭṭhi vissajjetabbāti dassetuṃ “addhakkhikena āḷahanaṃ olokentenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:300_0: Uppathamaggena gantabbaṃ attano sosānikabhāvassa apākaṭabhāvatthaṃ. Ārammaṇanti tasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:300_1: susāne “ayaṃ vammiko, ayaṃ rukkho, ayaṃ khāṇuko”tiādinā divāyeva ārammaṇaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:300_2: Bhayānakanti bhayajanakaṃ vammikādiṃ. Kenaci leḍḍupāsāṇādinā āsanne vicarantīti na
anya-e0103n:300_3: paharitabbā. Tilapiṭṭhaṃ vuccati palalaṃ. Māsamissaṃ bhattaṃ māsabhattaṃ. Guḷādīti
anya-e0103n:300_4: ādi-saddena tilasaṃguḷikādighanapūvañca saṅgaṇhāti. Kulagehaṃ na pavisitabbanti petadhūmena
anya-e0103n:300_5: vāsitattā, pisācānubandhattā ca kulagehassa abbhantaraṃ na pavisitabbaṃ. Devasikaṃ
anya-e0103n:300_6: chavaḍāho dhuvaḍāho. Matañātakānaṃ tattha gantvā devasikaṃ rodanaṃ dhuvarodanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:301_0: Susāne niccakālaṃ sivathikadassanena maraṇassatipaṭilābho. Tato eva appamādavihāritā.
anya-e0103n:301_1: Tattha chaḍḍitassa matakaḷevarassa dassanena asubhanimittādhigamo. Tato eva kāmarāgavinodanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:301_3: Tato maraṇassatipaṭilābhato ca saṃvegabahulatā. Byādhikānaṃ, jarājiṇṇānañca matānaṃ
anya-e0103n:301_4: tattha dassanena ārogyayobbanajīvitamadappahānaṃ. Khuddakassa, mahato ca bhayassa
anya-e0103n:301_5: abhibhavanato bhayabheravasahanatā. Saṃviggassa yoniso padahanaṃ sambhavatīti amanussānaṃ
anya-e0103n:304_0: 35. Senāsanagāhaṇe pare uṭṭhāpetvā gahaṇaṃ, “idaṃ sundaraṃ, idaṃ na sundara”nti paritulayitvā
anya-e0103n:304_1: pucchanā, olokanā ca senāsanaloluppaṃ. Tuṭṭhabbanti tussitabbaṃ. Vihārassa pariyantabhāvena
anya-e0103n:304_2: dūreti vā bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānādīnaṃ accāsanneti vā pucchituṃ na labhati, pucchanenapissa
anya-e0103n:304_3: dhutaṅgassa saṃkilissanato. Oloketunti loluppavasena passituṃ. Sacassa taṃ na ruccatīti
anya-e0103n:304_4: assa yathāsanthatikassa taṃ yathāgāhitaṃ senāsanaṃ aphāsukabhāvena sace na ruccati,
anya-e0103n:304_5: mudukassa asati roge yathāgāhitaṃ pahāya aññassa senāsanassa gahaṇaṃ loluppaṃ, majjhimassa
anya-e0103n:304_6: gantvā olokanā, ukkaṭṭhassa pucchanā. Sabbesampi uṭṭhāpetvā gahaṇe vattabbameva natthi.
anya-e0103n:305_0: Upaṭṭhāpanīyānampi anuṭṭhāpanena sabrahmacārīnaṃ hitesitā. Tāya karuṇāvihārānuguṇatā.
anya-e0103n:305_2: Tato eva anurodhavirodhappahānaṃ. Dvārapidahanaṃ okāsādānato. Yathāsanthatarāmatanti
anya-e0103n:308_0: 36. Seyyanti iriyāpathalakkhaṇaṃ seyyaṃ. Tappaṭikkhepeneva hi tadatthā “mañco bhisī”ti
anya-e0103n:308_1: evamādikā seyyā paṭikkhittā eva honti. “Nesajjiko”ti ca sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya
anya-e0103n:308_2: eva viharituṃ sīlamassāti imassa atthassa idha adhippetattā seyyā evettha paṭiyoginī,
anya-e0103n:308_3: na itare tathā aniṭṭhattā, asambhavato ca. Kosajjapakkhiyo hi iriyāpatho idha paṭiyogibhāvena
anya-e0103n:308_4: icchito, na itare. Na ca sakkā ṭhānagamanehi vinā nisajjāya eva yāpetuṃ tathā pavattetunti
anya-e0103n:308_5: seyyāvettha paṭiyoginī. Tenāha “tena panā”tiādi. Caṅkamitabbaṃ na “nesajjiko aha”nti
anya-e0103n:308_6: sabbarattiṃ nisīditabbaṃ. Iriyāpathantarānuggahito hi kāyo manasikārakkhamo hoti.
anya-e0103n:309_0: Cattāro pādā, piṭṭhiapassayo cāti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi pañcaṅgo. Catūhi aṭṭanīhi,
anya-e0103n:309_1: piṭṭhiapassayena ca pañcaṅgoti apare. Ubhosu passesu piṭṭhipasse ca yathāsukhaṃ apassāya
anya-e0103n:309_2: viharato nesajjikassa “anesajjikato ko viseso”ti gāhaṃ nivāretuṃ abhayatthero nidassito
anya-e0103n:310_0: Upacchedīyati etenāti upacchedananti vinibandhupacchedassa sādhakatamabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:310_1: Sabbakammaṭṭhānānuyogasappāyatā alīnānuddhaccapakkhikattā nisajjāya. Tato eva pāsādikairiyāpathatā.
anya-e0103n:310_2: Vīriyārambhānukūlatā vīriyasamatāyojanassa anucchavikatā. Tato eva sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n:310_3: anubrūhanatā. Paṇidhāyāti ṭhapetvā. Tanunti uparimakāyaṃ. Vikampetīti cāleti, icchāvighātaṃ
anya-e0103n:313_0: 37. Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ vasena siyā kusalāni, khīṇāsavānaṃ vasena siyā abyākatāni.
anya-e0103n:313_1: Tattha sekkhaputhujjanā paṭipattipūraṇatthaṃ, khīṇāsavā phāsuvihāratthaṃ dhutaṅgāni
anya-e0103n:313_2: pariharanti. Akusalampi dhutaṅganti akusalacittenāpi dhutaṅgasevanā atthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:313_3: Taṃ na yuttaṃ, yena akusalacittena pabbajitassa āraññikattaṃ, taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ nāma
anya-e0103n:313_4: na hoti. Kasmā? Lakkhaṇābhāvato. Yaṃ hidaṃ kilesānaṃ dhunanato dhutassa puggalassa,
anya-e0103n:313_5: ñāṇassa, cetanāya vā aṅgattaṃ, na taṃ akusaladhammesu sambhavati. Tasmā araññavāsādimattena
anya-e0103n:313_6: āraññikādayo tāva hontu, āraññikaṅgādīni pana na hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “na
anya-e0103n:313_7: maya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha imānīti dhutaṅgāni. Vuttaṃ heṭṭhā vacanatthaniddese. Na
anya-e0103n:313_8: ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti, kilesānaṃ dhunanaṭṭhenāti adhippāyo. Yassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0103n:313_9: etāni samādānāni aṅgāni, etena paṭhamenāpi atthavikappena “natthi akusalaṃ dhutaṅga”nti
anya-e0103n:313_10: dasseti. Na ca akusalaṃ kiñci dhunātīti akusalaṃ kiñci pāpaṃ na ca dhunāti eva appaṭipakkhato.
anya-e0103n:313_11: Yesaṃ samādānānaṃ taṃ akusalaṃ ñāṇaṃ viya aṅganti katvā tāni dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṃ.
anya-e0103n:313_12: Iminā dutiyenāpi atthavikappena “natthi akusalaṃ dhutaṅga”nti dasseti. Nāpi akusalantiādi
anya-e0103n:314_0: Yesanti abhayagirivāsike sandhāyāha. Te hi dhutaṅgaṃ nāma paññattīti vadanti. Tathā
anya-e0103n:314_1: sati tassa paramatthato avijjamānattā kilesānaṃ dhunanaṭṭhopi na siyā, samādātabbatā
anya-e0103n:314_2: cāti tesaṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyā virujjhatīti dassetuṃ “kusalattikavinimutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:314_3: Tasmāti yasmā paññattipakkhe ete dosā dunnivārā, tasmā taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:314_4: vuttanayo cetanāpakkhoyeva gahetabboti attho. Yasmā ete dhutaguṇā kusalattike paṭhamatatiyapadasaṅgahitā,
anya-e0103n:314_5: tasmā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
anya-e0103n:314_6: siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā,
anya-e0103n:314_7: siyā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikāti evaṃ sesatikadukapadehipi nesaṃ yathārahaṃ saṅgaho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n:315_0: Kāmaṃ sabbopi arahā dhutakileso, idha pana dhutaṅgasevanāmukhena kilese vidhunitvā
anya-e0103n:315_1: ṭhito khīṇāsavo “dhutakileso puggalo”ti adhippeto. Tathā sabbopi ariyamaggo nippariyāyena
anya-e0103n:315_2: kilesadhunano dhammo, visesato aggamaggo. Pariyāyena pana vipassanāñāṇādi. Heṭṭhimaparicchedena
anya-e0103n:315_3: dhutaṅgacetanāsampayuttañāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ dhutaṃ dassetvā dhutavāde dassetabbe
anya-e0103n:315_4: yasmā dhutavādabhedena dhuto viya dhutabhedena dhutavādopi duvidho, tasmā tesaṃ,
anya-e0103n:315_5: tadubhayapaṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkamettha sambhavatīti taṃ dassetuṃ “atthi dhuto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:316_0: Tayidanti nipāto, tassa “so aya”nti attho. Dhutadhammā nāmāti dhutaṅgasevanāya paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0103n:316_1: pāpadhammānaṃ dhunanavasena pavattiyā “dhuto”ti laddhanāmāya dhutaṅgacetanāya upakārakā
anya-e0103n:316_2: dhammāti katvā dhutadhammā nāma. Asampattasampattesu paccayesu alubbhanākārena pavattanato
anya-e0103n:316_3: appicchatā santuṭṭhitā ca atthato alobho. Paccayagedhādihetukānaṃ lolatādīnaṃ saṃkilesānaṃ
anya-e0103n:316_4: sammadeva likhanato chedanato gaṇasaṅgaṇikādibhedato saṃsaggato cittassa vivecanato
anya-e0103n:316_5: sallekhatā pavivekatā ca alobho amohoti imesu dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti tadantogadhā
anya-e0103n:316_6: tappariyāpannā honti, tadubhayasseva pavattivisesabhāvato. Imehi kusaladhammehi atthī
anya-e0103n:316_7: idamatthī, yena ñāṇena pabbajitena nāma paṃsukūlikaṅgādīsu patiṭṭhitena bhavitabbanti
anya-e0103n:316_8: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ dhutaguṇe samādiyati ceva pariharati ca, taṃ ñāṇaṃ idamatthitā. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:316_9: “idamatthitā ñāṇamevā”ti. Paṭikkhepavatthūsūti gahapaticīvarādīsu tehi tehi dhutaṅgehi
anya-e0103n:316_10: paṭikkhipitabbavatthūsu. Lobhanti taṇhaṃ. Tesveva vāti paṭikkhepavatthūsu eva. Ādīnavapaṭicchādakanti
anya-e0103n:316_13: paṭisevanadvārena, tena lesenāti attho. Atisallekhamukhenāti ativiya sallekhapaṭipattimukhena,
anya-e0103n:317_0: Sukhumakaraṇasannissayo rāgo dukkhāya paṭipattiyā patiṭṭhaṃ na labhatīti āha “dukkhāpaṭipadañca
anya-e0103n:317_1: nissāya rāgo vūpasammatī”ti. Sallekho nāma sampajānassa hoti, satisampajaññe moho
anya-e0103n:317_2: apatiṭṭhova appamādasambhavatoti vuttaṃ “sallekhaṃ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:318_0: Sīsaṅgānīti sīsabhūtāni aṅgāni, paresampi kesañci nānantarikatāya, sukaratāya ca
anya-e0103n:318_1: saṅgaṇhanato uttamaṅgānīti attho. Asambhinnaṅgānīti kehici sambhedarahitāni, visuṃyeva
anya-e0103n:318_2: aṅgānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhati rāgacaritassa mohacaritassa dosacaritassāpi,
anya-e0103n:318_3: taṃ ekaccaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ sevantassāti adhippāyo. Hāyati kammaṭṭhānaṃ sukumārabhāvenalūkhapaṭipattiṃ
anya-e0103n:318_4: asahantassa. Vaḍḍhateva mahāpurisajātikassāti adhippāyo. Na vaḍḍhati kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:318_5: upanissayarahitassa. Ekameva hi dhutaṅgaṃ yathā kilesadhunanaṭṭhena, evaṃ cetanāsabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n:319_0: Terasāpi dhutaṅgāni samādāya pariharantānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena “dvācattālīsa hontī”ti
anya-e0103n:319_1: vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ terasannampi pariharaṇassa ekajjhaṃyeva sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “sace
anya-e0103n:319_2: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “ekappahārena sabbadhutaṅgāni paribhuñjituṃ sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:319_3: Kathaṃ abbhokāse viharantassa rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ? “Channaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ
anya-e0103n:319_4: samādiyāmī”ti vacanato channe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpitamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati, na abbhokāse,
anya-e0103n:319_5: tasmā bhedahetuno abhāvena tampi arogameva. Tathā senāsanaloluppassa abhāvena yathāsanthatikaṅganti
anya-e0103n:319_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Āraññikaṅgaṃ gaṇamhā ohīyanasikkhāpadena paṭikkhittaṃ, khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṃ
anya-e0103n:319_7: anatirittabhojanasikkhāpadena. Pavāritāya hi bhikkhuniyā atirittaṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ
anya-e0103n:319_8: na labbhati. Kappiye ca vatthusmiṃ lolatāpahānāya dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ, na akappiye,
anya-e0103n:319_9: sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhittattā. Aṭṭheva honti bhikkhuniyā saṃkaccikacīvarādīhi saddhiṃ
anya-e0103n:319_10: pañcapi ticīvarasaṅkhameva gacchantīti katvā. Yathāvuttesūti bhikkhūnaṃ vuttesu terasasu
anya-e0103n:319_12: Sattāti bhikkhunīnaṃ vuttesu aṭṭhasu ekaṃ pahāya satta ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato.
anya-e0103n:319_13: “Ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅga”nti hi imaṃ anuvattamānameva katvā “satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīna”nti
anya-e0103n:323_1: suvisuddhe nirupakkilese. Imasmiṃ sīleti yathāvutte catupārisuddhisīle. “Cittaṃ bhāvaya”nti
anya-e0103n:323_2: imameva desanaṃ sandhāyāha “atisaṅkhepadesitattā”ti. Ko samādhīti sarūpapucchā. Kenaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:323_3: samādhīti kena atthena samādhīti vuccati, “samādhī”ti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ nissāya
anya-e0103n:324_0: “Ko samādhī”ti kāmañcāyaṃ sarūpapucchā, vibhāgavantānaṃ pana sarūpavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva
anya-e0103n:324_1: hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo. Taṃdassane ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:324_2: “samādhi bahuvidho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bahuvidhoti kusalādivasena anekavidho. Nānappakārakoti
anya-e0103n:324_4: sādheyyāti lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanā idha adhippetattho, tañca na sādheyya. Jhānavimokkhādīsu
anya-e0103n:324_5: hi samādhiṃ uddharitvā tassa labbhamānehi vibhāgehi vissajjane kariyamāne jhānavibhaṅgādīsu
anya-e0103n:324_6: āgato sabbo samādhipabhedo vissajjetabbo siyā. Tathā ca sati yvāyaṃ lokiyasamādhissa
anya-e0103n:324_7: bhāvanāvidhi adhippeto, tassa vissajjanāya okāsova na bhaveyya. Kiñca yenassa tikacatukkajhānikena
anya-e0103n:324_9: vehapphalādivasena dasavidho vā ekādasavidho vā bhavappabhedo nippajjati. Svāssa
anya-e0103n:324_10: pavattivibhāgo ayaṃ soti niddhāretvā vuccamāno vikkhepāya siyā, yathā taṃ avisaye.
anya-e0103n:324_11: Tenāha “uttari ca vikkhepāya saṃvatteyyā”ti. Kusalacittekaggatāti kusalā anavajjasukhavipākalakkhaṇā cittekaggatā.
anya-e0103n:325_0: Cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ avisāravasena sampiṇḍentassa viya ādhānaṃ samādhānaṃ. Avisāralakkhaṇo
anya-e0103n:325_1: hi samādhi, sampiṇḍanaraso ca. Sammā avikkhipanavasena ādhānaṃ samādhānaṃ. Avikkhepalakkhaṇo
anya-e0103n:325_2: vā hi samādhi, vikkhepaviddhaṃsanaraso cāti. Svāyaṃ yasmā ekārammaṇe cittassa ṭhitihetu,
anya-e0103n:325_3: tasmā “ṭhapananti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha. Tathā hesa “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitī”ti
anya-e0103n:325_5: hissa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dīpacciṭṭhiti nidassitā. Ānubhāvenāti balena, paccayabhāvenāti
anya-e0103n:325_6: attho. Avikkhipamānāti na vikkhipamānā vūpasamamānā. Upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno hi samādhi.
anya-e0103n:325_7: Etenassa vikkhepapaṭipakkhataṃ dasseti. Avippakiṇṇāti avisaṭā. Etena avisāralakkhaṇataṃ.
anya-e0103n:326_0: Sayaṃ na vikkhipati, sampayuttā vā na vikkhipanti etenāti avikkhepo, so lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:326_1: etassāti avikkhepalakkhaṇo. Vikkhepaṃ viddhaṃseti, tathā vā sampajjatīti vikkhepaviddhaṃsanaraso.
anya-e0103n:326_2: Uddhacce avikampanavasena paccupatiṭṭhati, sampayuttānaṃ vā taṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti
anya-e0103n:327_0: 39. Avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ nāma samādhissa āveṇiko sabhāvo, na tenassa koci vibhāgo labbhatīti
anya-e0103n:327_1: āha “avikkhepalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidho”ti. Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe appento viya
anya-e0103n:327_2: pavattatīti vitakko appanā. Tathā hi so “appanā byappanā”ti niddiṭṭho. Tappamukhatāvasena
anya-e0103n:327_3: pana sabbasmiṃ mahaggatānuttare jhānadhamme “appanā”ti aṭṭhakathāvohāro. Tathā tassa
anya-e0103n:327_4: anuppattiṭṭhānabhūte parittajhāne upacāravohāro. Gāmādīnaṃ samīpaṭṭhāne gāmūpacārādisamaññā
anya-e0103n:327_5: viyāti āha “upacārappanāvasena duvidho”ti. Idha pana samādhivasena veditabbaṃ. Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:327_6: lokoti vuccati vaṭṭaṃ, tappariyāpannatāya loke niyutto, tattha vā viditoti lokiyo.
anya-e0103n:327_7: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttaro uttiṇṇoti lokuttaro. Kāmañcettha lokiyasamādhi
anya-e0103n:327_8: bhāvetabbabhāvena gayhati, ubhayaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tato itaraṃ niddhāretuṃ
anya-e0103n:327_10: vattatīti sappītiko, pītisampayutto. Natthi etassa pītīti nippītiko, pītivippayutto.
anya-e0103n:327_11: Tesaṃ vasena. Sukhena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatoti sukhasahagato, sukhasampayuttoti
anya-e0103n:327_12: attho. Upekkhāsahagatepi eseva nayo. Upekkhāti cettha adukkhamasukhavedanā adhippetā.
anya-e0103n:327_13: Sā hi sukhadukkhākārapavattiṃ upekkhati majjhattākārasaṇṭhitattā. Sukhasahagata-padena
anya-e0103n:327_14: cettha sappītiko, nippītikekadeso ca saṅgahito, upekkhāsahagata-padena pana nippītikekadesovāti
anya-e0103n:328_0: Sabhāvato, paccayato, phalato ca majjhimapaṇītehi nihīno, tesaṃ vā guṇehi parihīnoti
anya-e0103n:328_1: hīno, attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nīto paṇīto, ubhinnaṃ majjhe bhavo majjhimo.
anya-e0103n:328_2: Sampayogavasena pavattamānena saha vitakkena savitakko, saha vicārena savicāro, savitakko
anya-e0103n:328_3: ca so savicāro cāti savitakkasavicāro. Ādi-saddena avitakkavicāramatto, avitakkāvicāro
anya-e0103n:328_4: ca gahito. Tattha vicārato uttari vitakkena sampayogābhāvato avitakko ca so vicāramatto
anya-e0103n:328_5: cāti avitakkavicāramatto. Visesanivattiattho vā matta-saddo. Savitakkasavicāro hi
anya-e0103n:328_6: samādhi vitakkavisiṭṭhena vicārena savicāro, ayaṃ pana vicāramattena vitakkasaṅkhātavisesarahitena,
anya-e0103n:328_7: tasmā avitakkavicāramatto. Atha vā bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkābhāvenāyaṃ vicāramatto,
anya-e0103n:328_8: na vicārato aññassa attano sampayuttadhammassa kassaci abhāvāti dassetuṃ avitakka-vacanena
anya-e0103n:328_9: vicāramatta-padaṃ visesetvā vuttaṃ. Ubhayarahito avitakkāvicāro. Pītisahagatādivasenāti
anya-e0103n:328_11: vuttanayameva. Paṭipakkhehi samantato khaṇḍitattā paritto. Parittanti vā appamattakaṃ
anya-e0103n:328_12: vuccati, ayampi appānubhāvatāya paritto viyāti paritto. Kilesavikkhambhanato, vipulaphalato,
anya-e0103n:328_13: dīghasantānato ca mahantabhāvaṃ gato, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gato paṭipannoti
anya-e0103n:328_14: mahaggato. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāpi natthi etassa pamāṇakaradhammā, tesaṃ vā paṭipakkhoti appamāṇo.
anya-e0103n:329_0: Paṭipajjati jhānaṃ etāyāti paṭipadā, pubbabhāgabhāvanā. Dukkhā kicchā paṭipadā etassāti
anya-e0103n:329_1: dukkhāpaṭipado. Pakatipaññāya abhivisiṭṭhattā abhiññā nāma appanāvahā bhāvanāpaññā,
anya-e0103n:329_2: dandhā mandā abhiññā etassāti dandhābhiñño. Dukkhāpaṭipado ca so dandhābhiñño cāti
anya-e0103n:329_4: jhānānaṃ aṅgabhāvavasena, catukkanayavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Hānabhāgiyādivasenāti hānakoṭṭhāsikādivasena.
anya-e0103n:331_0: Channaṃ anussatiṭṭhānānanti buddhānussatiādīnaṃ channaṃ anussatikammaṭṭhānānaṃ. Imesaṃ
anya-e0103n:331_1: vasenāti imesaṃ dasannaṃ kammaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena. “Pubbabhāge ekaggatā”ti iminā appanāya
anya-e0103n:331_2: upakārakanānāvajjanupacārassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na ekāvajjanasseva. Appanāsamādhīnanti
anya-e0103n:331_4: gotrabhu. Aparitto samādhīti dassetuṃ “paṭhamassa jhānassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:332_1: vuttaṃ. Siyā sappītiko, siyā nippītikoti aniyamavacanaṃ upacārasamādhisāmaññena sabbesampi
anya-e0103n:332_2: vā jhānānaṃ nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ upacārasamādhi siyā sappītiko, siyā nippītiko. Ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:332_3: pana ādito dukatikajjhānānaṃ upacārasamādhi sappītikova, itaresaṃ nippītikova, visabhāgavedanassa
anya-e0103n:332_4: cittassa āsevanapaccayatābhāvato, ekavīthiyaṃ vedanāparivattanābhāvato ca. Siyā sukhasahagato,
anya-e0103n:332_5: siyā upekkhāsahagatoti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Tattha pana “dukatikajjhānāna”nti
anya-e0103n:334_0: Paṭiladdhamattoti adhigatamatto anāsevito abahulīkato. So hi paridubbalabhāvena hīno
anya-e0103n:334_1: hoti. Nātisubhāvitoti ativiya paguṇabhāvaṃ apāpito. Subhāvitoti suṭṭhu bhāvito sammadeva
anya-e0103n:334_2: paguṇataṃ upanīto. Tenāha “vasippatto”ti. Chandādīnaṃ hīnatādivasenāpi imesaṃ hīnāditā
anya-e0103n:334_3: veditabbā. Tathā hi uḷārapuññaphalakāmatāvasena pavattito hīno, lokiyābhiññāsampādanāya
anya-e0103n:334_4: pavattito majjhimo, vivekakāmatāya ariyabhāve ṭhitena pavattito paṇīto. Attahitāya
anya-e0103n:334_5: bhavasampattiatthaṃ pavattito vā hīno, kevalaṃ alobhajjhāsayena pavattito majjhimo,
anya-e0103n:334_6: parahitāya pavattito paṇīto. Vaṭṭajjhāsayena vā pavattito hīno, vivekajjhāsayena
anya-e0103n:334_7: pavattito majjhimo, vivaṭṭajjhāsayena lokuttarapādakatthaṃ pavattito paṇīto.
anya-e0103n:335_0: Saddhiṃ upacārasamādhināti sabbesampi jhānānaṃ upacārasamādhinā saha. Vitakkamatteyeva
anya-e0103n:335_1: ādīnavaṃ disvāti vitakkeyeva oḷārikato upaṭṭhahante “cittassa khobhakaradhammo aya”nti
anya-e0103n:335_2: ādīnavaṃ disvā vicārañca santato manasi karitvā. Tenāha “vicāre adisvā”ti. Taṃ sandhāyāti
anya-e0103n:335_3: taṃ evaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ samādhiṃ sandhāya. Etaṃ “avitakkavicāramatto samādhī”ti dutiyapadaṃ
anya-e0103n:336_0: Tesvevāti tesu eva catukkapañcakanayesu. Tatiye catuttheti catukkanaye tatiye, pañcakanaye
anya-e0103n:336_1: catuttheti yojetabbaṃ. Avasāneti dvīsupi nayesu pariyosānajjhāne. Yathākkamaṃ catutthe,
anya-e0103n:336_2: pañcame vā. Pītisukhasahagato vāti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:336_3: Ettha ca satipi pītisahagatassāpi samādhissa sukhasahagatatte tīṇipi padāni asaṅkarato
anya-e0103n:336_4: dassetuṃ nippītikasukhato sappītikasukhassa visesadassanatthaṃ satthu pītitikadesanāti
anya-e0103n:336_5: nippītikasseva sukhassa vasena sukhasahagato samādhi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:339_0: Paṭhamasamannāhāro bhāvanaṃ ārabhantassa “pathavī pathavī”tiādinā kammaṭṭhāne paṭhamābhiniveso.
anya-e0103n:339_1: Tassa tassa jhānassa upacāranti nīvaraṇavitakkavicāranikantiādīnaṃ vūpasame thirabhūtaṃ
anya-e0103n:339_2: kāmāvacarajjhānaṃ. “Yāva appanā”ti iminā pubbabhāgapaññāya eva abhiññābhāvo vutto
anya-e0103n:339_3: viya dissatīti vadanti. Appanāpaññā pana abhiññāva. Yadaggena hi pubbabhāgapaññāya
anya-e0103n:340_1: upacārādhigamato pubbe asappāyasevitāya dukkhā paṭipadā. Pacchā asappāyasevitāya
anya-e0103n:340_2: dandhā abhiññā hoti. Sappāyasevinoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pubbabhāgeti upacārajjhānādhigamato
anya-e0103n:340_3: orabhāge. Aparabhāgeti tato uddhaṃ. Tassa vomissakatāti yo pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā
anya-e0103n:340_4: aparabhāge sappāyasevī, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā. Itarassa sukhā paṭipadā
anya-e0103n:340_5: dandhābhiññā hoti. Evaṃ paṭhamacatutthānaṃ vomissakatāya dutiyatatiyāti attho. Akatapalibodhupacchedassa
anya-e0103n:340_6: saparipanthatāya paṭipadā dukkhā hoti, itarassa sukhā. Asampāditaappanākosallassa
anya-e0103n:340_7: ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti, visadatāya khippā abhiññā.
anya-e0103n:341_1: samathavipassanāsu asato, sato ca adhikārassa vasena. Taṇhāya samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā
anya-e0103n:341_2: sā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthinīti āha “taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:341_3: Abhibhavo cassā itarakilesehi adhikatāya anabhibhūtassa taṇhāyāti adhikārato veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:341_4: Tathā avijjā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhāti tadabhibhūtassa dandhābhiññatā vuttā. Akatādhikāroti
anya-e0103n:341_5: bhavantare akataparicayo yathā paguṇaṃ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena
anya-e0103n:341_6: suppavatti vācuggatova hoti, evaṃ pubbe kataparicayassa bhāvanā appakasireneva ijjhatīti
anya-e0103n:341_7: āha “katādhikārassa sukhā”ti. Svāyaṃ akato, kato ca adhikāro samathanissito paṭipadāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:341_8: vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya. Vipassanānissito abhiññāyaṃ ñāṇappadhānattā
anya-e0103n:341_9: appanāya. Kilesindriyavasenāti tikkhātikkhānaṃ kilesindriyānaṃ vasena. Tenāha “tibbakilesassā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:342_1: dassetuṃ “yo puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Appaguṇoti na subhāvito vasībhāvaṃ apāpito. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:342_2: “uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotī”ti. Ayaṃ parittoti ayaṃ samādhi appānubhāvatāya
anya-e0103n:342_3: paritto. Avaḍḍhiteti ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi na vaḍḍhite yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe.
anya-e0103n:342_4: Ekaṅgulamattampi hi vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇamevāti vadanti. “Paguṇo subhāvito”ti vatvā
anya-e0103n:342_5: “uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkotī”ti iminā yathā paguṇopi uparijhānassa paccayo
anya-e0103n:342_6: bhavituṃ asakkonto samādhi parittoyeva hoti, na appamāṇo, evaṃ ñāṇuttarassa ekāsaneneva
anya-e0103n:342_8: “appamāṇo”tveva vuccati. Apare pana sace subhāvito paguṇo vasībhāvaṃ patto uparijhānassa
anya-e0103n:342_9: paccayo ahontopi appamāṇo eva, pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādipaṭipakkhānaṃ suvidūrabhāvatoti
anya-e0103n:342_10: vadanti. Vuttalakkhaṇavomissatāyāti yo appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na
anya-e0103n:342_11: sakkoti, vaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṃ paritto appamāṇārammaṇo. Yo pana paguṇo
anya-e0103n:342_12: uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, avaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṃ appamāṇo
anya-e0103n:343_0: Tatoti tato paṭhamajjhānato uddhaṃ. Virattapītikanti atikkantapītikaṃ vā jigucchitapītikaṃ
anya-e0103n:343_1: vā. Avayavo samudāyassa aṅganti vuccati, “senaṅgaṃ rathaṅga”ntiādīsu viyāti āha “catunnaṃ
anya-e0103n:344_0: Hānaṃ bhajatīti hānabhāgiyo, hānabhāgo vā etassa atthīti hānabhāgiyo, parihānakoṭṭhāsikoti
anya-e0103n:344_1: attho. Ālayassa apekkhāya apariccajanato ṭhitiṃ bhajatīti ṭhitibhāgiyo. Visesaṃ bhajatīti
anya-e0103n:344_2: visesabhāgiyo. Paccanīkasamudācāravasenāti tassa tassa jhānassa paccanīkānaṃ nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:344_3: pavattivasena. Tadanudhammatāyāti tadanurūpabhūtāya satiyā. Saṇṭhānavasenāti saṇṭhahanavasena
anya-e0103n:344_5: vā micchāsatī”ti sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha sāpekkhassa upari visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ
anya-e0103n:344_6: asakkuṇeyyattā avigatanikantikā taṃtaṃpariharaṇasatītipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Evañca katvā
anya-e0103n:344_7: “satiyā vā nikantiyā vā”ti vikappavacanañca yuttaṃ hoti. Visesādhigamavasenāti visesādhigamassa
anya-e0103n:344_8: paccayabhāvavasena, visesaṃ vā adhigacchati etenāti visesādhigamo, tassa vasena.
anya-e0103n:344_10: ca ābhogassa ca pavattivasena. Nibbedhabhāgiyatāti saccānaṃ nibbijjhanapakkhikatā
anya-e0103n:345_0: Kāmasahagatāti kāmārammaṇā, kāmasaññāhi vā vokiṇṇā. Avitakkasahagatāti “kathaṃ nu
anya-e0103n:345_1: kho me avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ bhaveyyā”ti evaṃ avitakkārammaṇā avitakkavisayā. Kāmañcāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:345_2: “paṭhamassa jhānassā”tiādiko pāṭho paññāvasena āgato, samādhissāpi panettha saṅgaho
anya-e0103n:345_3: atthevāti udāharaṇassa sātthakataṃ dassetuṃ “tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā samādhīpi
anya-e0103n:345_4: cattāro hontī”ti tesaṃ vasena evaṃ vuttanti attho.
anya-e0103n:346_0: Bhāvanāmayassa samādhissa idhādhippetattā upacārekaggatā “kāmāvacaro samādhī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:346_1: Adhipatiṃ karitvāti “chandavato ce samādhi hoti, mayhampi evaṃ hotī”ti chandaṃ adhipatiṃ,
anya-e0103n:346_2: chandaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. Labhati samādhinti evaṃ yaṃ samādhiṃ
anya-e0103n:346_3: labhati, ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhi, chandādhipatisamādhīti attho. Evaṃ vīriyasamādhiādayopi veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:347_0: Catukkabhedeti catukkavasena samādhippabhedaniddese. Aññattha sampayogavasena vicārena
anya-e0103n:347_1: saha vattamāno vitakko pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne viyojitopi na suṭṭhu viyojitoti,
anya-e0103n:347_2: tena saddhiṃyeva vicārasamatikkamaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiya”nti.
anya-e0103n:347_3: Dvidhā bhinditvā catukkabhede vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānanti yojanā. Pañcajhānaṅgavasenāti
anya-e0103n:347_4: pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhāvavasena samādhissa pañcavidhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:348_1: ettha “saṃkilesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hānabhāgiyo dhammoti apaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi
anya-e0103n:348_2: vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādianupakkhandanaṃ. Visesabhāgiyo dhammoti paguṇehi
anya-e0103n:348_4: “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhi”ntiādi. Tassattho – apaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:348_5: tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti codenti
anya-e0103n:348_6: tudanti, tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā
anya-e0103n:348_7: hāyati, tasmā hānabhāginī paññā. Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ santato
anya-e0103n:348_8: paṇītato manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā samudācaranti paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato
anya-e0103n:348_9: vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudanti, tassa dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ
anya-e0103n:348_10: saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa uppattiyā
anya-e0103n:348_11: padaṭṭhānatāya visesabhāginī paññā. Taṃsampayutto samādhi idhādhippeto. Iminā nayenāti
anya-e0103n:348_12: iminā paṭhamajjhāne vuttena vidhinā dutiyajjhānādīsupi hānabhāgiyadhammo, visesabhāgiyadhammo ca veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:350_1: sappītikādiggahaṇena sādhāraṇato ca ariyamaggasampayutto samādhi vutto. Bhāvito hoti
anya-e0103n:350_2: saññāya sampayuttattā. Tanti ariyamaggasamādhiṃ. Visunti paññābhāvanāya visuṃ katvā na vadāma.
anya-e0103n:351_0: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṃ na detīti palibodho ra-kārassa
anya-e0103n:351_1: la-kāraṃ katvā, paripanthoti attho. Upacchinditvāti samāpanena, saṅgahaṇena vā uparundhitvā,
anya-e0103n:352_0: Āvasanti etthāti āvāso. Paricchedavasena veṇiyati dissatīti pariveṇaṃ. Vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0103n:352_1: taṃ taṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Svāyaṃ āvāso. Navakammādīsūti ādi-saddena āvāsassa tadaññaṃ
anya-e0103n:353_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ palibodhābhāve. Pācīnakhaṇḍarājinti puratthimadisāyaṃ pabbatakhaṇḍānaṃ
anya-e0103n:353_1: antare vanarājiṭṭhānaṃ. “Nāmā”ti iminā tassa padesassa ayaṃ samaññāti dasseti. Paṭisāmitamevāti
anya-e0103n:353_2: niccakālaṃ paṭisāmetvāva vihārato nikkhamāmīti dasseti. Dhātunidhānaṭṭhānanti kāyabandhanadhammakaraṇanhānasāṭikaakkhakadhātusaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0103n:353_3: paribhogasarīradhātūnaṃ nidahitaṭṭhānaṃ. Īdisassa ayaṃ thero viya alaggacittassa.
anya-e0103n:353_4: Etena “bhikkhunā nāma āvāse evarūpena bhavitabba”nti ovādo dinno hoti. Ito paresupi
anya-e0103n:354_0: Kulanti kulaggahaṇena kulamanussānaṃ gahaṇaṃ gāmaggahaṇena gāmavāsīnaṃ viya. Upaṭṭhākakulampīti
anya-e0103n:354_1: pi-saddena pageva ñātikulanti dasseti. Uddesatthanti uddisāpanatthaṃ, pāṭhaṃ uddisāpetvā
anya-e0103n:354_2: sajjhāyitunti attho. Idhevāti imasmiṃyeva padese, yattha katthaci vihāreti attho.
anya-e0103n:355_0: Upagatoti vassaṃ upagato. Sadāti gatakālato pabhuti visesato pavāritadivasato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n:355_1: sabbadā divase divase. Paridevamānāti taṃtaṃvilapanavasena vividhaṃ paridevantī.
anya-e0103n:355_2: Sabbaṃ pavattinti attanā tattha diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya pacchā samāgamapariyosānaṃ
anya-e0103n:356_0: Kāyasakkhinti “passa ima”nti mukhapaṭiggāhakaṃ katvā. Rathavinītapaṭipadanti dasakathāvatthukittanapubbikaṃ
anya-e0103n:356_1: rathavinītūpamāhi vibhāvitaṃ rathavinītasutte āgataṃ sattavisuddhipaṭipadaṃ. Nālakapaṭipadanti
anya-e0103n:356_2: “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādinā satthārā nālakattherassa desitapaṭipadaṃ. Tuvaṭakapaṭipadanti
anya-e0103n:356_3: “mūlaṃ papañcasaṅkhāyā”tiādinā bhagavatā desitapaṭipadaṃ. Tattha hi yathākkamaṃ –
anya-e0103n:358: Ghāsesanaṃ chinnakatho, na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇe”. ;
anya-e0103n:359: “Gāme ca nābhisajjeyya, lābhakamyā janaṃ na lapayeyyā”ti. –
anya-e0103n:360: Evamādikā paramappicchakathā āgatā. Catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmatādīpakanti cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu santosassa, bhāvanārāmatāya ca pakāsakaṃ.
anya-e0103n:361_0: Labbhatīti lābho. Tenāha “cattāro paccayā”ti. Mahāparivāreti vipulaparivāre. Piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0103n:361_1: tāva dentā buddhapūjāpattacīvarādīni tassa parivārāni katvā denti, tathā cīvarādidānepi.
anya-e0103n:361_2: Bāhullikapiṇḍapātikāti piṇḍapātikā hutvā paccayabāhullikā. Vadantīti purimadivase
anya-e0103n:361_3: bhikkhāya āhiṇḍanakāle yathāsutaṃ vadanti. Niccabyāvaṭo upāsakādīnaṃ saṅgaṇhane.
anya-e0103n:362_0: Tassāti gaṇassa. Soti gaṇapalibodho. Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena gaṇavācakassa pariyesanampi
anya-e0103n:362_1: lahukameva icchitabbanti āha “yojanato paraṃ agantvā”ti. Attano kammanti samaṇadhammamāha.
anya-e0103n:363_0: Katākateti kate ca akate ca kamme jānanavasena ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbaṃ, katākateti
anya-e0103n:363_1: vā appake ca mahante ca kate, yathā “phalāphale”ti. Sace bahuṃ avasiṭṭhanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:364_0: Pabbajjāpekkhoti sīhaḷadīpe kira kuladārakānaṃ pabbajjā āvāhavivāhasadisā, tasmā
anya-e0103n:364_1: taṃ paricchinnadivasaṃ atikkametuṃ na sakkā. “Sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetu”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:364_2: samāpanena palibodhupacchedo vutto, byatirekato pana “sace taṃ alabhanto sakkoti
anya-e0103n:364_3: adhivāsetuṃ, araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammova kātabbo”ti ayamattho dassitoti saṅgahaṇena
anya-e0103n:365: Tathāti yathā upajjhāyo gilāno yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, tathā upasampāditaantevāsiko attano kammavācaṃ vatvā upasampādito.
anya-e0103n:366: Yo koci rogoti mūlabhūto, anubandho vā attano uppanno. Anamataggeti anu anu amatagge anādimati.
anya-e0103n:367_0: “Gantho”ti iminā ganthapalibodho idha vuttoti āha “pariyattiharaṇa”nti. Sajjhāyādīhīti
anya-e0103n:367_1: sajjhāyadhāraṇaparicayapucchādīhi. Itarassāti abyāvaṭassa. Yassa ganthadhuraṃ vissajjetvā
anya-e0103n:367_2: ṭhitassāpi gantho vattateva, na tassa gantho palibodho. Yathā tamhi tamhi vatthumhi
anya-e0103n:367_3: āgatattherānaṃ, nāpi sabbena sabbaṃ aganthapasutassa. Majjhimapaṇṇāsako āgacchati,
anya-e0103n:367_4: suttapadesānaṃ vārānañca sadisatāya byāmuyhanato. Puna na olokessāmīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:368_0: Gāmavāsikattherehīti anurādhapuravāsīhi. Anuggahetvāti aggahetvā tattha paricayaṃ
anya-e0103n:368_1: akatvā. Pañcanikāyamaṇḍaleti dīghāgamādike pañcapi nikāye sikkhitaparisāya. Parivattessāmīti
anya-e0103n:368_2: vaṇṇayissāmi. Suvaṇṇabherinti seṭṭhabheriṃ. Katamācariyānaṃ uggahoti katamesaṃ ācariyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:368_3: uggaho, kena parivattīyatīti adhippāyo. Ācariyamaggoti ācariyānaṃ kathāmaggo. Attano
anya-e0103n:368_4: ācariyānanti attano kathetuṃ yuttānaṃ ācariyānaṃ. Suvinicchitā sabbā tipiṭakapariyatti
anya-e0103n:368_5: etasmiṃ atthīti sabbapariyattiko, tepiṭakoti attho. Pīṭhe nisinno tato otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:368_6: taṭṭikāya nisīditvā. Gatakassāti paṭipattigamanena gatassa diṭṭhasaccassa. Cīvaraṃ
anya-e0103n:368_7: pārupitvāti ācariyassa apacitidassanatthaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā. Sāṭheyyābhāvato
anya-e0103n:369_0: Pothujjanikāti puthujjane bhavā. Dupparihārā bahuparissayatāya. Tathā hissā uttānaseyyakadārako,
anya-e0103n:369_1: taruṇasassañca nidassitaṃ. Vipassanāya palibodho samathayānikassa, na vipassanāyānikassa.
anya-e0103n:369_2: Yebhuyyena hi jhānalābhī samathayānikova hoti vipassanāsukhato. Itarenāti samathatthikena.
anya-e0103n:371_0: 42. Kammaṭṭhāne niyutto kammaṭṭhāniko, bhāvanamanuyuñjanto. Tena kammaṭṭhānikena.
anya-e0103n:371_1: Paricchinditvāti “imasmiṃ vihāre sabbe bhikkhū”ti evaṃ paricchinditvā. Sahavāsīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:371_2: bhikkhūnaṃ. Muducittatanti attani muducittataṃ janeti, ayañca sahavāsīnaṃ cittamaddavajananādiattho
anya-e0103n:371_4: hoti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ. Dibbānipi ārammaṇāni pageva itarāni. Sabbattha sabbasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:371_5: samaṇakaraṇīye, sabbasmiṃ vā kammaṭṭhānānuyoge. Pubbāsevanavasena atthayitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:371_6: Yogassa bhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ yogānuyogo, tadeva karaṇīyaṭṭhena kammaṃ, tassa yogānuyogakammassa
anya-e0103n:372_0: Niccaṃ pariharitabbattāti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ viya ekadāva ananuyuñjitvā sabbakālaṃ
anya-e0103n:372_2: sampannaṃ. Kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno
anya-e0103n:372_3: vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā
anya-e0103n:372_4: saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ, kammaphalañca, tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu
anya-e0103n:372_5: hitesitaṃ na pariccajati. Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako
anya-e0103n:372_7: gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti, cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto
anya-e0103n:372_8: asaṃsaṭṭho, vīriyasampattiyā āraddhavīriyo hoti attahitaparahitapaṭipattiyaṃ, satisampattiyā
anya-e0103n:372_9: upaṭṭhitassati hoti, samādhisampattiyā avikkhitto samāhitacitto, paññāsampattiyā
anya-e0103n:372_10: aviparītaṃ pajānāti. So satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya
anya-e0103n:372_11: sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena
anya-e0103n:372_12: satte ahitaṃ nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tena vuttaṃ “piyo…pe… niyojakoti evamādiguṇasamannāgata”nti.
anya-e0103n:373_0: Taṃ pana kalyāṇamittaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ dassetuṃ “mamaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kārakabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:373_1: yogakammassa. Pakāseti attānaṃ paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanena samuttejanāya, sampahaṃsanāya
anya-e0103n:373_2: ca, nanu kathesi paveṇipālanatthanti adhippāyo. Evarūpoti pesalo hutvā bahussuto.
anya-e0103n:373_3: Tantidharoti suttadharo tattha kehicipi asaṃhīro. Vaṃsānurakkhakoti buddhānubuddhavaṃsassa
anya-e0103n:373_4: anurakkhako. Paveṇipālakoti paveṇiyā ācariyuggahaṇassa anupālako. Ācariyamatikoti
anya-e0103n:373_5: ācariyamatiyaṃ niyutto tassā anativattanato. Na attanomatiṃ pakāseti kathetīti na
anya-e0103n:373_6: attanomatiko, attano matiṃ paggayha vattā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n:374_1: dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. Tattha pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayoti “yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:374_4: atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya ca visesato sodhitattā niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā gahitattā. Ito
anya-e0103n:374_5: cito ca suttañca kāraṇañca sallakkhetvāti pañcasupi nikāyesu ito cito ca tassa tassa
anya-e0103n:374_6: kammaṭṭhānassa anurūpaṃ suttapadañceva suttānugataṃ yuttiñca suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā.
anya-e0103n:374_7: Sappāyāsappāyaṃ yojetvāti yassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhati, tassa upakārānupakāraṃ yuttiṃ
anya-e0103n:374_8: magganena yojetvā, samādāya vā sammadeva hadaye ṭhapetvāti attho. Mahāmaggaṃ dassentoti
anya-e0103n:375_0: Sabbatthāti tattha tattha vihāre. Vattapaṭipattiṃ kurumānenāti paviṭṭhakāle āgantukavattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:375_1: nikkhamanakāle gamikavattanti yathārahaṃ taṃ taṃ vattaṃ pūrentena. Sabbapārihāriyatelanti
anya-e0103n:375_2: sabbesaṃ aṅgānaṃ, sabbesaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya pariharitabbatelaṃ. Ṭhapemīti anujānāpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:375_3: Yaṃ taṃ sammāvattaṃ paññattanti sambandho. Ekadivasaṃ sāyaṃ vissajjitenāpīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:377_0: 43. Santāne rāgassa ussannabhāvena caraṇaṃ pavatti rāgacariyā, sā sassatāsayādayo
anya-e0103n:377_1: viya daṭṭhabbā. Tathā dosacariyādayo. Saṃsaggo sampayogārahavasena veditabbo, yathā
anya-e0103n:377_3: “rāgadosacariyā rāgadosamohacariyā”tiādi. Imā eva hi sandhāya “aparāpi catasso”ti
anya-e0103n:377_4: vuttaṃ. Tathāti yathā rāgādīnaṃ, tathā saddhādīnaṃ saṃsaggasannipātavasena saddhābuddhicariyā
anya-e0103n:377_6: catasso. Evanti saṃsaggasannipātavasena. Saṃsagganti saṃsajjanaṃ missīkaraṇaṃ “rāgasaddhācariyā
anya-e0103n:377_7: dosasaddhācariyā”tiādinā. Anekāti tesaṭṭhi, tato atirekāpi vā, tā pana asammohantena
anya-e0103n:377_8: saṃyuttasuttaṭīkāyaṃ vitthārato dassitāti tattha vuttanayena veditabbā. “Pakatī”ti
anya-e0103n:377_9: iminā asati paṭipakkhabhāvanāyaṃ tattha tattha santāne cariyāya sabhāvabhūtataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:377_10: Ussannatā aññadhammehi rāgādīnaṃ adhikatā, yato rāgacariyādīnaṃ paccayasamavāye rāgādayo
anya-e0103n:377_11: balavanto honti, abhiṇhañca pavattanti. Tāsaṃ vasenāti channaṃ mūlacariyānaṃ vasena
anya-e0103n:377_12: chaḷeva puggalā honti. Aññathā anekapuggalā siyuṃ, tathā ca sati adhippetatthasiddhi
anya-e0103n:378_0: Saddhā balavatī hoti rāgussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n:378_2: attho. Sabhāgo hi dūrepi āsanneyevāti sabhāgatālakkhaṇamidha āsannaggahaṇaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:378_3: saddhāya siniyhanaṃ pasādavasena akālussiyaṃ alūkhatā, rāgassa pana rañjanavasena.
anya-e0103n:378_4: Saddhāya pariyesanaṃ adhimuccanavasena tanninnatā, rāgassa taṇhāyanavasena. Saddhāya
anya-e0103n:378_5: apariccajanaṃ okappanavasena anupakkhandanaṃ, rāgassa abhisaṅgavasenāti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi
anya-e0103n:378_6: tesaṃ yathā alūkhatādisāmaññena sabhāgatā, evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha
anya-e0103n:379_0: Paññā balavatī hoti dosussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n:379_2: attho. Tattha paññāya ārammaṇassa anallīyanaṃ tassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhavasena visaṃsaṭṭhatā,
anya-e0103n:379_3: dosassa pana byāpajjanavasena. Paññāya pariyesanaṃ yathābhūtadosapavicayo, dosassa
anya-e0103n:379_4: abhūtadosanijigīsā. Paññāya parivajjanaṃ nibbindanādivasena ñāṇutrāso, dosassa ahitādhānavasena
anya-e0103n:379_5: chaḍḍananti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṃ yathā anallīyanādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n:379_6: evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha “dosacaritassa buddhicarito sabhāgo”ti.
anya-e0103n:380_0: Antarāyakarā vitakkāti micchāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā uppajjanti mohussanne santāne
anya-e0103n:380_1: tadanuguṇassa dhammassa yebhuyyena pavattisabbhāvato. Tenāha “mohassa āsannalakkhaṇattā”ti,
anya-e0103n:380_2: anavaṭṭhānacañcalabhāvehi sabhāgadhammattāti attho. Tattha vitakkassa anavaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:380_3: parikappavasena savipphāratāya, mohassa sammūḷhatāvasena byākulatāya. Tathā vitakkassa
anya-e0103n:380_4: lahuparivitakkanena tadaṅgacalatāya cañcalatā, mohassa anogāḷhatāyāti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi
anya-e0103n:380_5: tesaṃ yathā anavaṭṭhānādisāmaññena sabhāgatā, evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha
anya-e0103n:381_0: Taṇhā rāgoyeva sabhāvato, tasmā rāgacariyāvinimuttā taṇhācariyā natthīti attho. Taṃsampayuttoti
anya-e0103n:381_1: tena rāgena sampayutto, dosādayo viya tena vippayutto natthīti adhippāyo. Tadubhayanti
anya-e0103n:381_2: taṇhāmānadvayaṃ. Nātivattatīti sabhāvato, sampayogavasena ca na atikkamitvā vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n:381_3: Kāmañcettha yathā rāgadosehi sampayogavasena saha vattamānassapi mohassa ussannatāvasena
anya-e0103n:381_4: visuṃ cariyābhāvo, na kevalaṃ mohasseva, tathā saddhābuddhivitakkānaṃ. Evaṃ rāgena
anya-e0103n:381_5: satipi sampayoge mānassāpi visuṃ cariyābhāvo yutto siyā, evaṃ santepi rāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchāvijjānaṃ
anya-e0103n:381_6: viya anusayaṭṭho imesaṃ rāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko cariyaṭṭhoti, nattheva mānacariyā.
anya-e0103n:381_7: Yato cariyā “pakatī”ti vuttā. Pakati ca sabhāvoti. Eteneva diṭṭhiyāpi visuṃ cariyābhāvābhāvo
anya-e0103n:381_8: saṃvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mohacariyantogadhāva diṭṭhicariyāti dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:381_9: “mohanidānattā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ca-saddena sampayogaṃ samuccinoti mohanidānattā,
anya-e0103n:382_0: 44. Kiṃ sappāyanti kīdisaṃ senāsanādisappāyaṃ. Pubbāciṇṇaṃ purimajātīsu ācaritaṃ.
anya-e0103n:382_1: Ekacceti upatissattheraṃ sandhāyāha. Tena hi vimuttimagge tathā vuttaṃ. Pubbe kirāti
anya-e0103n:382_2: kira-saddo arucisūcanattho. Iṭṭhappayogo manāpakiriyā. Subhakammabahulo yebhuyyena
anya-e0103n:382_3: sobhanakammakārī. Na sabbe rāgacaritā eva honti, aluddhānampi pubbe iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulatāsambhavato,
anya-e0103n:382_4: saggā cavitvā idhūpapattisambhavato ca. Etena asati pubbahetuniyāme yathāvuttakāraṇamattena
anya-e0103n:382_5: na tesaṃ luddhatā, luddhabhāvahetukā ca rāgacariyāti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:383_0: Itareti chedanādikammabahulā nirayādito idhūpapannā ca na sabbe dosamohacaritā eva
anya-e0103n:383_1: hontīti yojanā. Idhāpi yathāvuttakāraṇassa kodhanabhāve, mūḷhabhāve ca anekantikattā
anya-e0103n:383_2: dosamohacaritatāyapi anekaṃsikatā veditabbā. Dhātūnaṃ ussadaniyamo yadi pamāṇato,
anya-e0103n:383_3: so natthi, atha sāmatthiyato, sopi ekaṃsiko na upalabbhatīti dassento āha “yathāvutteneva
anya-e0103n:383_4: nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthī”ti. Tattha yathāvuttenevāti “dvinnaṃ pana dhātūna”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:383_5: vuttappakāreneva. Dosaniyameti semhādidosādhikatāya rāgādicarito hotīti dosavasena
anya-e0103n:383_7: mohacarito”ti vatvā puna “vātādhiko rāgacarito”ti ca vuttattā tampi dosavasena niyamavacanaṃ
anya-e0103n:383_8: pubbāparaviruddhameva. Aparicchinnavacananti paricchedakārikāya paññāya na paricchinditvā
anya-e0103n:384_1: pavattalobhādihetuniyāmena. Niyāmoti ca tesaṃyeva lobhādīnaṃ paṭiniyato lubbhanādisabhāvo
anya-e0103n:384_2: daṭṭhabbo. Lobho ussado etesanti lobhussadā, ussannalobhā, lobhādhikāti attho. Amohussadā
anya-e0103n:384_3: cāti ettha ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena ye ime lobhussadatādīnaṃ paccekaṃ vomissato
anya-e0103n:384_4: ca cuddasa pabhedā icchitā, te anavasesato sampiṇḍeti yathāvuttesu chasveva tesaṃ
anya-e0103n:385_0: Idāni taṃ nesaṃ lobhussadatādīnaṃ paccekaṃ vomissakatādiṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “yassa
anya-e0103n:385_1: hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Kammāyūhanakkhaṇeti kammakaraṇavelāyaṃ. Lobho balavāti lobho tajjāya
anya-e0103n:385_2: paccayasāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato adhiko hoti. Alobho mandoti tappaṭipakkho alobho dubbalo.
anya-e0103n:385_3: Kathaṃ panete lobhālobhā aññamaññaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ekakkhaṇe pavattantīti? Na
anya-e0103n:385_4: kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “ekakkhaṇe pavattantī”ti. Nikantikkhaṇaṃ pana āyūhanapakkhiyameva
anya-e0103n:385_5: katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Eseva nayo sesesupi. Pariyādātunti abhibhavituṃ na sakkoti. Yo
anya-e0103n:385_6: hi “evaṃsundaraṃ evaṃvipulaṃ evaṃmahagghañca na sakkā dātu”ntiādinā amuttacāgatādivasena
anya-e0103n:385_7: pavattāya cetanāya sampayutto alobho, so sammadeva lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0103n:385_8: Dosamohānaṃ anuppattiyā, tādisapaccayalābhena ca adosāmohā balavanto. Tasmāti lobhādosāmohānaṃ
anya-e0103n:385_9: balavabhāvato, alobhadosamohānañca dubbalabhāvatoti vuttameva kāraṇaṃ paccāmasati.
anya-e0103n:385_10: Soti taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo. Tena kammenāti tena lobhādiupanissayavatā kusalakammunā.
anya-e0103n:386_0: Purimanayenevāti pubbe vuttanayānusārena mandā alobhādosā lobhadose pariyādātuṃ na
anya-e0103n:386_1: sakkonti, amoho pana balavā mohaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkotīti evaṃ tattha tattha vāre yathārahaṃ
anya-e0103n:386_2: atidesattho veditabbo. Duṭṭhoti kodhano. Dandhoti mandapañño. Sīlakoti sukhasīlo.
anya-e0103n:387_1: ekakā, tayo dukā, eko tikoti lobhādiussadavasena akusalapakkheyeva satta vārā, tathā
