anya-e0103n:387_2: kusalapakkhe alobhādiussadavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti. Tattha alobhadosāmohā,
anya-e0103n:387_3: alobhādosamohā, alobhadosamohā balavantoti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi
anya-e0103n:387_4: dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā eva honti, tathā akusalapakkhe lobhādosamohā,
anya-e0103n:387_5: lobhadosāmohā, lobhādosāmohā balavantoti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadaamohussadaadosāmohussadavārā
anya-e0103n:387_6: gahitā evāti akusalakusalapakkhesu tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā.
anya-e0103n:387_7: Ye pana ubhayesaṃ missatāvasena lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā dassetabbā,
anya-e0103n:387_8: te alabbhanato eva na dassitā. Na hi ekasmiṃ santāne antarena avatthantaraṃ “lobho
anya-e0103n:387_9: ca balavā, alobho cā”tiādi yujjatīti, paṭipakkhavasena vā hi etesaṃ balavadubbalabhāvo,
anya-e0103n:387_10: sahajātadhammavasena vā. Tattha lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhavasena alobhena anadhibhūtatāya
anya-e0103n:387_11: balavabhāvo, tathā dosamohānaṃ adosāmohehi. Alobhādīnaṃ pana lobhādiabhibhavanato,
anya-e0103n:387_12: sabbesañca samānajātiyamabhibhuyya pavattivasena sahajātadhammato balavabhāvo. Tena
anya-e0103n:387_13: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “lobho balavā alobho mando, adosāmohā balavanto dosamohā mandā”ti.
anya-e0103n:387_14: So ca nesaṃ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato tathā āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:388_0: Yo luddhoti vuttoti yo ussadakittane “luddho”ti vutto, ayaṃ idha cariyāvicāre “rāgacarito”ti
anya-e0103n:388_1: veditabbo. Duṭṭhadandhāti “duṭṭho, dandho”ti ca vuttā yathākkamaṃ dosamohacaritā.
anya-e0103n:388_2: Paññavāti sātisayaṃ sappañño. Yato saddhāvitakkesu vijjamānesupi buddhicaritoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:388_3: Alobhādosānaṃ balavabhāvo saddhūpanissayatāya vinā na hotīti āha “aluddhaaduṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:389_0: Ayañca nayo sādhāraṇato vuttoti nibbattitapubbahetuniyāmavaseneva buddhicaritādikepi
anya-e0103n:389_1: dassetuṃ “yathā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha amohaparivārenāti amohaparikkhittena, upanissayato
anya-e0103n:389_2: sampayogato ca paññāya abhisaṅkhatenāti attho. Sesapadattayepi eseva nayo. Lobhādinā
anya-e0103n:389_4: Avirodho ca yugaggāhavasena appavattiyā veditabbo. Tathā hi saddhānusāridhammānusārigottāni
anya-e0103n:389_5: aññamaññampi bhinnasabhāvāneva. Ekaṃsena ca missakacariyāpi sampaṭicchitabbā pubbahetuniyāmena
anya-e0103n:389_6: cariyāsiddhito. Tathā ceva ussadakittanaṃ pavattaṃ yathārahaṃ lobhālobhādīnaṃ vipākassa
anya-e0103n:390_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?
anya-e0103n:390_1: Kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā
anya-e0103n:390_2: honti, tena vuccati kusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā. Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā
anya-e0103n:390_3: tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena vuccati akusalamūlapaccayāpi
anya-e0103n:390_4: saṅkhārā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā
anya-e0103n:390_5: honti, tena vuccati nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayāpi nāmarūpa”nti –
anya-e0103n:391_0: Ādi. Pubbahetuniyāmena ca yathā tihetukassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ, na tathā duhetukassa.
anya-e0103n:391_1: Yathā ca duhetukassa itikattabbatā nepakkaṃ, na tathā ahetukassa. Evaṃ lobhussadādayo
anya-e0103n:391_2: puggalā rāgacaritādayo hontīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti. Yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigamavasena
anya-e0103n:392_0: 45. Tatrāti tasmiṃ pucchāvacane. Nayoti jānananayo. Puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttopi attho
anya-e0103n:392_2: akittimena sabhāvagamanena. Cāturiyenāti cāturabhāvena siṅgārena. Ukkuṭikanti asamphuṭṭhamajjhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:392_3: Khaṇanto viyāti bhūmiṃ khaṇanto viya. Anukaḍḍhitanti pādanikkhepasamaye kaḍḍhanto
anya-e0103n:392_4: viya pādaṃ nikkhipati. Tenassa padaṃ anukaḍḍhitaṃ pacchato añchitaṃ hoti. Paribyākulāyāti
anya-e0103n:392_5: parito āluḷitāya. Chambhito viyāti vitthāyanto viya. Bhīto viyāti keci. Sahasānupīḷitanti
anya-e0103n:392_6: aggapādena, paṇhiyā ca sahasāva sannirujjhitaṃ. Vivaṭṭacchadassāti vinivaṭṭacchadanassa
anya-e0103n:392_7: pahīnakilesassa. Idamīdisaṃ padanti bhagavato padaṃ disvā vadati.
anya-e0103n:393_0: Pāsādikanti pasādāvahaṃ. Madhurākāranti iṭṭhākāraṃ. Thaddhākāranti thambhitākāraṃ.
anya-e0103n:393_1: Ataramānoti nataramāno, saṇikanti attho. Samodhāyāti sammadeva odhāya avikkhipitvā.
anya-e0103n:393_2: Nipajjitvāti kāyapasāraṇalakkhaṇāya nipajjāya seyyāya nipajjitvā sayati niddāyati.
anya-e0103n:393_3: Pakkhittakāyoti avakkhittakāyo avaso viya sahasā patitakāyo. Dussaṇṭhānanti virūpasannivesaṃ.
anya-e0103n:395_0: Nipuṇamadhurasamasakkaccakārīti sukosallaṃ sundaraṃ avisamaṃ sābhisaṅkhārañca karaṇasīlo.
anya-e0103n:395_1: Gāḷhathaddhavisamakārīti thiraṃ asithilaṃ visamañca karaṇasīlo. Aparicchinnaṃ apariniṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:396: Mukhapūrakanti mukhassa pūraṇaṃ mahantaṃ. Arasapaṭisaṃvedīti narasapaṭisaṃvedī. Bhājane chaḍḍentoti bhojanabhājane sitthāni chaḍḍento. Mukhaṃ makkhentoti bahimukhaṃ makkhento.
anya-e0103n:397: Kilantarūpo viyāti tassa asahanena khedappatto viya. Aññāṇupekkhāyāti aññāṇabhūtāya upekkhāya. Aññāṇasaṅkhātāya upekkhāyāti keci.
anya-e0103n:398_3: Sakalābhena asantussanalakkhaṇā asantuṭṭhitā. Vijjhanaṭṭhena siṅgaṃ, siṅgāratānāgarikabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0103n:398_4: kilesasiṅgaṃ. Attano sarīrassa, cīvarādiparikkhārassa ca maṇḍanavasena pavattaṃ loluppaṃ
anya-e0103n:398_5: cāpalyaṃ. Evamādayoti ettha ādi-saddena ahirikānottappamadappamādādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0103n:399_0: Parāparādhassa upanayhanalakkhaṇo upanāho. Paresaṃ guṇamakkhaṇalakkhaṇo makkho. Parassa
anya-e0103n:399_1: guṇe ḍaṃsitvā apanento viya yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso. Parasampattiusūyanalakkhaṇā
anya-e0103n:399_2: issā. Attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ macchariyaṃ. Idha ādi-saddena dovacassatāpāpamittatādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:400_0: Anussāhanaṃ thinaṃ. Asattivighāto middhaṃ. Cetaso avūpasamo uddhaccaṃ. Vippaṭisāro
anya-e0103n:400_1: kukkuccaṃ. Saṃsayo vicikicchā. Ayoniso daḷhaggāho ādhānaggāhitā. Yathāgahitassa micchāgāhassa
anya-e0103n:400_2: dubbiveṭhiyatā duppaṭinissaggiyatā. Idha ādi-saddena muṭṭhasaccaasampajaññādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:401: Muttacāgatāti vissaṭṭhacāgatā nissaṅgapariccāgo. Yathā māyādayo, tathā pavattā akusalakkhandhā, yathā ariyānaṃ dassanakāmatādayo, tathā pavattā kusalakkhandhā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:402_0: Pasādanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma vatthuttayaṃ. Saṃvejanīyaṭṭhānāni jātiādīni. Kusalānuyogeti
anya-e0103n:402_1: kusaladhammabhāvanāyaṃ. “Evañca evañca karissāmī”ti kiccānaṃ rattibhāge parivitakkanaṃ
anya-e0103n:402_2: rattiṃ dhūmāyanā. Tathāvitakkitānaṃ tesaṃ divasabhāge anuṭṭhānaṃ divā pajjalanā.
anya-e0103n:402_3: Hurāhuraṃ dhāvanāti ito cito ca tattha tattha ārammaṇe cittavosaggo. Tenevāha “idaṃ
anya-e0103n:402_4: pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukha”nti, “cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti ca.
anya-e0103n:403_0: Dhammappavattidassanādi ca pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatamevāti na sakkā vattunti
anya-e0103n:403_1: “sabbākārenā”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñci kiñci āgatampi atthevāti hi adhippāyo. “Na sārato paccetabba”nti
anya-e0103n:403_2: vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “rāgacaritassa hī”tiādimāha. Appamādavihārinoti tattha
anya-e0103n:403_3: vinidhāya bhāvaṃ paṭipajjanena appamādakārino. Bhinnalakkhaṇā iriyāpathādayoti cāturiyena
anya-e0103n:403_4: acāturiyena saṇikaṃ, sahasā ca gamanādayo. Na upapajjantīti na yujjanti. Pucchitvā
anya-e0103n:404_0: 46. Sappāyaṃ hitaṃ, kilesavighātīti attho. Adhotavedikanti aparisuddhaparikkhepavedikaṃ.
anya-e0103n:404_1: Bhūmaṭṭhakanti bhūmitaleyeva uṭṭhāpitaṃ uparimatalarahitaṃ. Ekato onatassa pabbatapādassa
anya-e0103n:404_3: olambamānamukhāhi khuddakavaggulīhi paripuṇṇaṃ. Oluggavilugganti chinnabhinnaṃ. Ujjaṅgalaṃ
anya-e0103n:404_4: lūkhadhūsaraṃ chāyūdakarahitaṃ. Sīhabyagghādibhayena sāsaṅkaṃ. Durūpanti virūpaṃ.
anya-e0103n:404_5: Dubbaṇṇanti asundaravaṇṇaṃ, dussaṇṭhānaṃ vā. Jālākārena katapūvaṃ jālapūvaṃ. Sāṇi
anya-e0103n:404_6: viya kharasamphassanti sāṇiphalako viya dukkhasamphassaṃ. Bhārikabhāvena, antarantarā
anya-e0103n:404_7: tunnakaraṇena ca kicchapariharaṇaṃ. Āṇigaṇṭhikāhatoti āṇinā, gaṇṭhiyā ca hatasobho.
anya-e0103n:404_8: Idaṃ rāgacaritassa sappāyaṃ, evamassa kilesasamudācāro na hotīti adhippāyo. Eseva nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0103n:405_0: Disāmukhanti disābhimukhaṃ, abbhokāsābhimukhanti adhippāyo. Mahākasiṇanti mahantaṃ
anya-e0103n:405_1: kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ. Sesaṃ senāsanādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ mohacaritassa, taṃ dosacaritassa vuttasadisameva.
anya-e0103n:406: Vitakkavidhāvanasseva paccayo hoti yathā taṃ āyasmato meghiyattherassa. Darīmukheti pabbatavivare. Parittanti suppasarāvamattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:407_1: paccekaṃ pariccheda-saddo yojetabbo. Vibhāvanāti “ayaṃ rāgacarito”tiādinā jānanavibhāvanā.
anya-e0103n:407_2: Ekaccakasiṇānussatiṭṭhānamattassa pasaṅgena kathitattā vuttaṃ “na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṃ
anya-e0103n:409_1: niddesato. “Ettha ettakāni upacārajjhānāvahāni, ettakāni appanājjhānāvahānī”ti upacārappanāvahato.
anya-e0103n:409_3: jhānappabhedato. “Etesu aṅgasamatikkamo, etesu ārammaṇasamatikkamo”ti evaṃ samatikkamato.
anya-e0103n:409_4: “Ettakānettha vaḍḍhetabbāni, ettakāni na vaḍḍhetabbānī”ti vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato. Ārammaṇatoti
anya-e0103n:409_7: āruppādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvato. Cariyānukūlatoti rāgacariyādīnaṃ anukūlabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:410_0: Kammaṭṭhānānīti ārammaṇabhāvena yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānāni. Catukkajjhānikāti catubbidharūpāvacarajjhānavanto,
anya-e0103n:410_1: tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāti attho. Catukkanayavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tikacatukkajjhānikesūti
anya-e0103n:410_2: tikajjhānikesu purimesu brahmavihāresu, catukkajjhānikesu ānāpānakasiṇesu. Sesesūti
anya-e0103n:411_0: Dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhahadayarūpassa sattassa cittaṃ ādikammiko cetopariyañāṇena paricchindituṃ
anya-e0103n:411_1: sakkoti, na itarassāti kasiṇapharaṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa paccayo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:411_2: “parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṃ samattho hotī”ti. Okāsena paricchinnattāti attano
anya-e0103n:411_3: ṭhitokāsena paricchinnattā. Tathā uggahakosallassa sampāditattā paricchinnākāreneva
anya-e0103n:411_4: tāni upatiṭṭhanti, tasmā na tattha vaḍḍhanāti adhippāyo. Sace pana koci vaḍḍheyya,
anya-e0103n:411_5: na tena koci guṇoti dassento āha “ānisaṃsābhāvā cā”ti. “Tesu panā”tiādinā tameva
anya-e0103n:411_6: ānisaṃsābhāvaṃ vivarati. Yasmā vaḍḍhitesu kuṇaparāsiyeva vaḍḍhati, avaḍḍhitepi kāmarāgavikkhambhanā
anya-e0103n:411_7: hotiyeva, tasmā ānisaṃsābhāvo. Vibhūtāti vipulārammaṇatāya supākaṭā, vaḍḍhitanimittatāya
anya-e0103n:412_0: Kevalanti sakalaṃ anavasesaṃ. “Pathaviṃ ima”nti vacanaṃ upaṭṭhānākārena vuttaṃ, na
anya-e0103n:412_1: nimittassa vaḍḍhanenāti adhippāyo. Lābhittāti sātisayaṃ lābhitāya, ukkaṃsagatavasibhāvatoti
anya-e0103n:412_2: attho. Thero hi paramāya vasipattiyā assamaṇḍale assaṃ sārento viya yattha tattha
anya-e0103n:412_3: nisinnopi ṭhitopi taṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjateva. Tenassa samantato nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ
anya-e0103n:413_0: Vuttāti dhammasaṅgahe vuttā. Mahanteti vipule. Ninnathalādivasena hi ekadese aṭṭhatvā
anya-e0103n:413_1: samantato gahaṇavasena sakalasarīre nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa taṃ mahantaṃ hoti. Mahante
anya-e0103n:413_2: vā sarīre. Appaketi sarīrassa ekadese nimittaṃ gaṇhātīti yojanā. Appake vā khuddake
anya-e0103n:413_3: dārakasarīre. Etanti asubhanimittaṃ. Ādīnavanti “asubharāsi eva vaḍḍhati, na ca koci
anya-e0103n:414_0: Sesānipi na vaḍḍhetabbānīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ upapattito vivarituṃ “kasmā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:414_1: vuttaṃ. Picupiṇḍādivasena upaṭṭhahantampi nimittaṃ vātasaṅghātasannissayanti katvā
anya-e0103n:414_3: saparicchedaṃ. Vāyokasiṇavaḍḍhane viya na ettha koci guṇo, kevalaṃ vātavaḍḍhanamevāti
anya-e0103n:414_4: āha “sādīnavattā”ti. Tesanti brahmavihārānaṃ. Nimittanti ārammaṇaṃ. Na ca tena attho
anya-e0103n:414_5: atthīti tena sattarāsivaḍḍhanena pathavīkasiṇādivaḍḍhane viya kiñci payojanaṃ natthi.
anya-e0103n:414_6: Pariggahavasenāti apariggahitassa bhāvanāvisayassa pariggahavasena, na nimittavaḍḍhanavasena.
anya-e0103n:414_8: paṭibhāganimittaṃ ayaṃ yogī. Sīmāsambhedeneva hettha upacārajjhānuppatti, na nimittuppattiyā.
anya-e0103n:414_9: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ parittādiārammaṇatā jhānassāti āha “parittaappamāṇārammaṇatāpettha
anya-e0103n:414_10: pariggahavasenā”ti, katipaye satte pariggahetvā pavattā mettādayo parittārammaṇā,
anya-e0103n:414_11: bahuke appamāṇārammaṇāti attho. Ākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimattā na vaḍḍhetabbanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:414_12: Vakkhati vā yaṃ tena sambandhitabbaṃ. Parikappajameva ārammaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0103n:414_13: na itaranti āha “na hi sakkā sabhāvadhammaṃ vaḍḍhetu”nti. Āruppānaṃ parittaappamāṇārammaṇatā
anya-e0103n:414_14: parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse, vipulakasiṇugghāṭimākāse ca pavattiyā veditabbā. Sesāni
anya-e0103n:415_1: Sesāni chāti cattāro brahmavihārā, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatananti imāni sesāni
anya-e0103n:415_2: cha. Vissandamānapubbatāya vipubbakaṃ. Paggharamānalohitatāya lohitakaṃ. Kimīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:415_3: pacalanena puḷuvakaṃ, calitārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Vātapānavivarādīhi antopaviṭṭhassa sūriyālokādikassa
anya-e0103n:415_4: calanākāro paññāyatīti obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇampi calitārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Pubbabhāgeti
anya-e0103n:416: Devesūti kāmāvacaradevesu, tattha asubhānaṃ paṭikūlassa ca āhārassa abhāvato. Assāsapassāsānaṃ brahmaloke abhāvato “ānāpānassati cā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:417_0: Diṭṭhenāti diṭṭhena vatthunā kāraṇabhūtena. Gahetabbānīti uggahetabbāni, uppādetabbauggahanimittānīti
anya-e0103n:417_1: attho. Tenāha “pubbabhāge”tiādi. Tassāti kāyagatāsatiyā. Ucchusassādīnaṃ pattesu
anya-e0103n:417_2: pacalamānavaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena vā tassa gahetabbattā vuttaṃ “vāyokasiṇaṃ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhenā”ti.
anya-e0103n:417_3: Na ādikammikena gahetabbānīti ādikammikena na gahetabbāni, bhāvanārambhavasena na
anya-e0103n:417_4: paṭṭhapetabbāni, heṭṭhime tayo brahmavihāre, kasiṇesu rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānañca
anya-e0103n:418: Imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesūti ettha kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇena yathārahaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ, jhānānañca gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sukhavihārassāti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa.
anya-e0103n:419_0: “Ekādasa kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlānī”ti ujuvipaccanīkavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
anya-e0103n:419_1: Vakkhati hi “sabbañceta”ntiādi. Anukūlāni rāgavikkhambhanassa upāyabhāvato. Aṭṭha
anya-e0103n:419_2: anukūlānīti yojanā. Evaṃ sesesu. Ekanti idaṃ anussatiapekkhaṃ anussatīsu ekanti,
anya-e0103n:419_3: na mohacaritavitakkacaritāpekkhaṃ tesaṃ aññassāpi anukūlassa alabbhanato. “Saddhācaritassa
anya-e0103n:419_4: purimā cha anussatiyo”ti idaṃ atisappāyavasena vuttaṃ. Imasseva ujuvipaccanīkaṃ imassa
anya-e0103n:419_5: atisappāyanti gahetabbassa visesassa abhāvato sabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāni. Parittanti
anya-e0103n:419_6: sarāvamattaṃ, appamāṇanti tato adhikapamāṇaṃ. Parittaṃ vā suppasarāvamattaṃ, appamāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:420_0: Cattāro dhammāti cattāro manasikaraṇīyā dhammā. Uttarīti sīlasampadā, kalyāṇamittatā,
anya-e0103n:420_1: sappāyadhammassavanaṃ, vīriyaṃ; paññāti imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhānato upari.
anya-e0103n:420_2: Asubhāti asubhabhāvanā ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu bhāvanānuyogā. Mettāti anodhiso,
anya-e0103n:420_3: odhiso vā pavattā mettābhāvanā. Ānāpānassatīti soḷasavatthukā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā.
anya-e0103n:420_5: aniccā”ti evaṃ pavattā aniccānupassanā. Asmimānasamugghātāyāti “asmī”ti uppajjanakassa
anya-e0103n:420_6: navavidhassāpi mānassa samucchindanāya. Ettha hi ekasseva cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā
anya-e0103n:420_7: vuttā, na ekassa catucariyatāya. Tena viññāyati “sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni sabbākusalavikkhambhanāni
anya-e0103n:421_0: Ekasseva satta kammaṭṭhānāni vuttāni, na cāyasmā rāhulo sabbacaritoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:421_2: Adhippāyoti tathāvacanassa adhippāyo. So pana “sabbañceta”ntiādinā vibhāvito eva.
anya-e0103n:422_1: gahetvā”tiādinā vuttanayena upasaṅkamitvā. Somanassameva uppajjati “evaṃ bahuparissayoyaṃ
anya-e0103n:422_2: attabhāvo ṭhāneyeva mayā niyyātito”ti. Tenāha “yathā hī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:423_0: Atajjanīyoti na tajjetabbo na niggahetabbo. Svāyaṃ atajjanīyabhāvo dovacassatāya
anya-e0103n:423_1: vā siyā, ācariye aniviṭṭhapematāya vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “dubbaco vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:423_2: Yo hi ācariyena tajjiyamāno kopañca dosañca apaccayañca pātukaroti, yo vā “kimassa
anya-e0103n:423_3: santike vāsenā”ti pakkamati, ayaṃ duvidhopi atajjanīyo. Dhammenāti ovādānusāsanidhammena.
anya-e0103n:423_4: Gūḷhaṃ ganthanti kammaṭṭhānaganthaṃ, saccapaṭiccasamuppādādisahitaṃ gambhīraṃ suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttañca.
anya-e0103n:424_0: Tumhākamatthāyāti vutteti “sataporise papāte patanena tumhākaṃ koci attho hotī”ti
anya-e0103n:424_1: kenaci vutte. Ghaṃsentoti “manussakakkena tumhākaṃ koci attho”ti vutte ghaṃsento
anya-e0103n:424_2: niravasesaṃ attabhāvaṃ khepetuṃ ussaheyyaṃ. “Mama assāsapassāsanirundhanena tumhākaṃ
anya-e0103n:424_3: koci rogavūpasamādiko attho atthī”ti kenaci vutte. Tīhipi bhikkhūhi ācariye bhattipavedanamukhena
anya-e0103n:425_0: 49. Aññattha pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma yattha seti, so tassa āsayo “migāsayo” viya,
anya-e0103n:425_1: āsayo eva ajjhāsayo. So duvidho vipanno, sampannoti. Tattha vipanno sassatādimicchābhinivesanissito.
anya-e0103n:425_2: Sampanno duvidho vaṭṭanissito, vivaṭṭanissitoti. Tesu vivaṭṭanissito ajjhāsayo “sampannajjhāsayenā”ti
anya-e0103n:425_3: idhādhippeto. Idāni naṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “alobhādīnaṃ vasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:425_4: chahākārehīti alubbhanādīhi chahi ākārehi. Sampannajjhāsayenāti pubbabhāgiyānaṃ sīlasampadādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:425_5: sādhanavasena, lokuttarānaṃ upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo,
anya-e0103n:425_6: tena. Alobhādayo hi anekadosavidhamanato, anekaguṇāvahato ca sattānaṃ bahukārā visesato
anya-e0103n:425_7: yogino. Tathā hi alobhādayo maccheramalādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ –
anya-e0103n:426_0: “Alobho maccheramalassa paṭipakkho, adoso dussīlyamalassa, amoho kusalesu dhammesu
anya-e0103n:426_1: abhāvanāya. Alobho cettha dānahetu, adoso sīlahetu, amoho bhāvanāhetu. Tesu ca alobhena
anya-e0103n:426_2: anadhikaṃ gaṇhāti luddhassa adhikaggahaṇato, adosena anūnaṃ duṭṭhassa ūnaggahaṇato,
anya-e0103n:427_0: “Alobhena cettha vijjamānaṃ dosaṃ dosato dhārento dose pavattati, luddho hi dosaṃ
anya-e0103n:427_1: paṭicchādeti. Adosena vijjamānaṃ guṇaṃ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati, duṭṭho hi
anya-e0103n:427_2: guṇaṃ makkheti. Amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṃ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve
anya-e0103n:427_3: pavattati, mūḷho hi tacchaṃ ‘ataccha’nti, atacchañca ‘taccha’nti gaṇhāti. Alobhena
anya-e0103n:427_4: ca piyavippayogadukkhaṃ na hoti luddhassa piyasabbhāvato, piyavippayogāsahanato ca,
anya-e0103n:427_5: adosena appiyasampayogadukkhaṃ na hoti duṭṭhassa appiyasabbhāvato, appiyasampayogāsahanato
anya-e0103n:427_6: ca, amohena icchitālābhadukkhaṃ na hoti, amūḷhassa hi ‘taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti evamādipaccavekkhaṇasabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n:428_0: “Alobhena cettha jātidukkhaṃ na hoti alobhassa taṇhāpaṭipakkhato, taṇhāmūlakattā
anya-e0103n:428_1: ca jātidukkhassa, adosena jarādukkhaṃ na hoti tikkhadosassa khippaṃ jarāsambhavato,
anya-e0103n:428_2: amohena maraṇadukkhaṃ na hoti, sammohamaraṇañhi dukkhaṃ, na ca taṃ amūḷhassa hoti.
anya-e0103n:428_3: Alobhena ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ, amohena pabbajitānaṃ, adosena pana sabbesampi sukhasaṃvāsatā hoti.
anya-e0103n:429_0: “Visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti, yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya
anya-e0103n:429_1: pettivisayaṃ upapajjanti, taṇhāya ca paṭipakkho alobho. Adosena niraye upapatti na
anya-e0103n:429_2: hoti, dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti, dosassa ca paṭipakkho
anya-e0103n:429_3: adoso. Amohena tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatti na hoti, mohena hi niccasammūḷhaṃ tiracchānayoniṃ
anya-e0103n:429_4: upapajjanti, mohapaṭipakkho ca amoho. Etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa abhāvakaro,
anya-e0103n:429_5: adoso dosavasena apagamanassa, amoho mohavasena amajjhattabhāvassa.
anya-e0103n:430_0: “Tīhipi cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṃsāsaññāti imā tisso,
anya-e0103n:430_1: asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti. Alobhena pana
anya-e0103n:430_3: amohena majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṃ. Tathā alobhena abhijjhākāyaganthassa
anya-e0103n:430_4: pabhedanaṃ hoti, adosena byāpādakāyaganthassa, amohena sesaganthadvayassa. Purimāni
anya-e0103n:430_5: ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānubhāvena, pacchimāni pacchimasseva ānubhāvena ijjhanti.
anya-e0103n:431_0: “Alobho cettha ārogyassa paccayo hoti, aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṃ na sevati,
anya-e0103n:431_1: tena arogo hoti. Adoso yobbanassa, aduṭṭho hi valitapalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno
anya-e0103n:431_2: dīgharattaṃ yuvā hoti. Amoho dīghāyukatāya, amūḷho hi hitāhitaṃ ñatvā ahitaṃ parivajjento,
anya-e0103n:432_0: “Alobho cettha bhogasampattiyā paccayo cāgena bhogapaṭilābhato, adoso mittasampattiyā
anya-e0103n:432_1: mettāya mittānaṃ paṭilābhato, aparihānato ca, amoho attasampattiyā, amūḷho hi attano
anya-e0103n:432_2: hitameva karonto attānaṃ sampādeti. Alobho ca dibbavihārassa paccayo hoti, adoso
anya-e0103n:433_0: “Alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti tesaṃ vināsena abhisaṅgahetukassa
anya-e0103n:433_1: dukkhassa abhāvā, adosena parapakkhesu, aduṭṭhassa hi verīsupi verisaññāya abhāvato,
anya-e0103n:434_0: “Alobhena ca aniccadassanaṃ hoti, luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato
anya-e0103n:434_1: na passati. Adosena dukkhadassanaṃ, adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattaāghātavatthupariggaho
anya-e0103n:434_2: saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati. Amohena anattadassanaṃ, amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo
anya-e0103n:434_3: apariṇāyakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ apariṇāyakato bujjhati. Yathā ca etehi aniccadassanādīni,
anya-e0103n:434_4: evaṃ etepi aniccadassanādīhi honti. Aniccadassanena hi alobho hoti, dukkhadassanena
anya-e0103n:434_5: adoso, anattadassanena amoho. Ko hi nāma ‘aniccamida’nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya
anya-e0103n:434_6: pihaṃ uppādeyya, saṅkhāre vā ‘dukkha’nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṃ kodhadukkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:434_7: uppādeyya, attasuññatañca bujjhitvā puna sammohaṃ āpajjeyyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:435_0: Tena vuttaṃ “pubbabhāgiyānaṃ sīlasampadādīnaṃ sādhanavasena lokuttarānaṃ, upanissayabhāvena
anya-e0103n:435_1: ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo”ti. Tenāha “evaṃ tissannaṃ bodhīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:436_0: Idāni te ajjhāsaye pāḷiyāva vibhāvetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha chāti gaṇanaparicchedo.
anya-e0103n:436_1: Ajjhāsayāti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. Ubhayaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ katvā chabbidhā ajjhāsayāti
anya-e0103n:436_2: attho. Bodhisattāti bujjhanakasattā, bodhiyā vā niyatabhāvena sattā laggā, adhimuttā
anya-e0103n:436_3: tanninnā tappoṇāti attho. Bodhiparipākāya saṃvattantīti yathābhinīhāraṃ attanā pattabbabodhiyā
anya-e0103n:436_4: paripācanāya bhavanti. Alobhajjhāsayāti alubbhanākārena pavattaajjhāsayā, ādito “kathaṃ
anya-e0103n:436_5: nu kho mayaṃ sabbattha, sabbadā ca aluddhā eva hessāmā”ti, majjhe ca alubbhanavaseneva,
anya-e0103n:436_6: pacchā ca tasseva rocanavasena pavattaajjhāsayā. Lobhe dosadassāvinoti lubbhanalakkhaṇe
anya-e0103n:436_7: lobhe sabbappakārena ādīnavadassāvino. Idaṃ tassa ajjhāsayassa ekadesato brūhanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:436_8: Lobhe hi ādīnavaṃ, alobhe ca ānisaṃsaṃ passantassa alobhajjhāsayo parivaḍḍhati, svāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:436_9: tattha ādīnavānisaṃsadassanavidhi vibhāvitoyeva. Sesapadesupi iminā nayena attho
anya-e0103n:436_10: veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – nekkhammanti idha pabbajjā. Paviveko tadaṅgaviveko,
anya-e0103n:436_11: vikkhambhanaviveko, kāyaviveko, cittaviveko ca. Nissaraṇaṃ nibbānaṃ. Sabbabhavagatīsūti
anya-e0103n:436_12: sabbesu bhavesu, sabbāsu ca gatīsu. Tadadhimuttatāyāti yadatthaṃ bhāvanānuyogo, yadatthā
anya-e0103n:437_0: 50. “Kiṃ caritosī”ti pucchito sace “na jānāmī”ti vadeyya, “ke vā te dhammā bahulaṃ
anya-e0103n:437_1: samudācarantī”ti pucchitabbo. Kiṃ vāti kiṃ asubhaṃ vā anussatiṭṭhānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā.
anya-e0103n:437_2: Kiṃ te manasi karoto phāsu hotīti cittassa ekaggabhāvena sukhaṃ hoti. Cittaṃ namatīti
anya-e0103n:437_3: pakatiyāva abhirativasena namati. Evamādīhīti ādi-saddena iriyāpathādīnaṃ saṅgaho
anya-e0103n:437_4: daṭṭhabbo. Tepi hi na sabbassa ekaṃsato byabhicārino eva. Tathā hi samudācāro pucchitabbo
anya-e0103n:437_5: vutto. “Asukañca asukañca manasikāravidhiṃ katipayadivasaṃ anuyuñjāhī”ti ca vattabbo.
anya-e0103n:438_0: “Pakatiyā uggahitakammaṭṭhānassā”ti idaṃ yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo, tattha sajjhāyavasena
anya-e0103n:438_1: vā manasikāravasena vā kataparicayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ekaṃ dve nisajjānīti ekaṃ vā
anya-e0103n:438_2: dve vā uṇhāsanāni. Sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā attano sammukhāva adhīyāpetvā dātabbaṃ, so ce
anya-e0103n:438_3: aññattha gantukāmoti adhippāyo. Tenāha “santike vasantassā”ti. Āgatāgatakkhaṇe kathetabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:439_0: Pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīkasiṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Katassāti katassa kasiṇassa. Taṃ taṃ
anya-e0103n:439_1: ākāranti ācariyena kammaṭṭhāne vuccamāne padapadatthādhippāyaopammādikaṃ attano ñāṇassa
anya-e0103n:439_2: paccupaṭṭhitaṃ taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ, yaṃ yaṃ nimittanti vuttaṃ. Upanibandhitvāti upanetvā
anya-e0103n:439_3: nibaddhaṃ viya katvā, hadaye ṭhapetvā apamussantaṃ katvāti attho. Evaṃ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitassatitāya
anya-e0103n:439_4: nimittaṃ gahetvā tattha sampajānakāritāya sakkaccaṃ suṇantena. Tanti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:439_5: suggahitaṃ nissāya. Itarassāti tathā agaṇhantassa. Sabbākārenāti kassacipi pakārassa
anya-e0103n:443_0: 51. Phāsu hotīti āvāsasappāyādilābhena manasikāraphāsutā bhāvanānukūlatā hoti. Parisodhentenāti
anya-e0103n:443_1: tesaṃ tesaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ chindanavasena visodhentena. Akilamantoyevāti akilantakāyo
anya-e0103n:443_2: eva. Sati hi kāyakilamathe siyā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa antarāyoti adhippāyo. Gaṇṭhiṭṭhānanti
anya-e0103n:443_3: atthato, adhippāyato ca dubbinivedhatāya gaṇṭhibhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Chinditvāti yāthāvato
anya-e0103n:443_4: atthassa, adhippāyassa ca vibhāvanena chinditvā, vibhūtaṃ supākaṭaṃ katvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:443_5: Suvisuddhanti suṭṭhu visuddhaṃ, nigumbaṃ nijjaṭanti attho.
anya-e0103n:445_0: 52. Aññatarenāti aññatarenāpi, pageva anekehīti adhippāyo. Mahantabhāvo mahattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:445_1: Tathā sesesu. Soṇḍavā soṇḍī. Tathā paṇṇantiādīsu. Bodhiaṅgaṇādīsu kātabbaṃ idha “vatta”nti
anya-e0103n:445_2: adhippetanti āha “pānīyaghaṭaṃ vā ritta”nti. Niṭṭhitāyāti paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhānaṃ dānena
anya-e0103n:445_3: parikkhīṇāya. Jiṇṇavihārepi yatra bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti “āyasmā, yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ
anya-e0103n:445_4: karotu, mayaṃ paṭijaggissāmā”ti. Evarūpe vihātabbanti ayampi nayo labbhati, vuttanayattā pana na vutto.
anya-e0103n:446_1: rajanatthāya dāru, dārumayadoṇikā, rajanapacanaṭṭhānaṃ, dhovanaphalakanti evamādīni.
anya-e0103n:446_2: Sākahārikāti sākahāriniyo itthiyo. Visabhāgasaddo kāmaguṇūpasaṃhito gītasaddoti vadanti,
anya-e0103n:446_3: kevalopi itthisaddo visabhāgasaddo eva. Tatrāti pupphavante vihāre. Tādisoyevāti
anya-e0103n:446_4: “tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā”tiādinā yādiso paṇṇavante vihāre upaddavo vutto,
anya-e0103n:446_5: tādisoyeva. “Pupphahārikāyo pupphaṃ ocinantiyo”ti pana vattabbaṃ. Ayamidha viseso.
anya-e0103n:447: Patthanīyeti tattha vasantesu sambhāvanāvasena upasaṅkamanādinā patthetabbe. Tenāha “leṇasammate”ti. Dakkhiṇāgirīti magadhavisaye dakkhiṇāgirīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:448: Visabhāgārammaṇāni iṭṭhāni, aniṭṭhāni ca. Aniṭṭhānaṃ hi dassanatthaṃ “ghaṭehi nighaṃsantiyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dabbūpakaraṇayoggā rukkhā dabbūpakaraṇarukkhā.
anya-e0103n:449_0: Yo pana vihāro. Khalanti dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Gāvo rundhanti “sassaṃ khādiṃsū”ti.
anya-e0103n:449_1: Udakavāranti kedāresu sassānaṃ dātabbaudakavāraṃ. Ayampīti mahāsaṅghabhogopi vihāro.
anya-e0103n:450_1: thalapaṭṭanaṃ. Appasannā honti. Tenassa tattha phāsuvihāro na hotīti adhippāyo. Maññamānā rājamanussā.
anya-e0103n:451_0: Samosaraṇenāti ito cito sañcaraṇena. Papāteti papātasīse ṭhatvā gāyi “gītasaddena
anya-e0103n:451_1: idhāgataṃ papāte pātetvā khādissāmī”ti. Vegena gahetvāti vegenāgantvā “kuhiṃ yāsī”ti khandhe gahetvā.
anya-e0103n:452: Yatthāti yasmiṃ vihāre, vihārasāmantā vā na sakkā hoti kalyāṇamittaṃ laddhuṃ, tattha vihāre so alābho mahādosoti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:453_0: Panthaninti panthe nīto pavattitoti panthanī, magganissito vihāro. Taṃ panthaniṃ.
anya-e0103n:453_1: Soṇḍinti soṇḍisahito vihāro soṇḍī, taṃ soṇḍiṃ. Tathā paṇṇantiādīsu. Nagaranissitaṃ
anya-e0103n:453_2: nagaranti vuttaṃ uttarapadalopena yathā “bhīmaseno bhīmo”ti. Dārunāti dārunissitena
anya-e0103n:453_3: saha. Visabhāgenāti yo visabhāgehi vusīyati, visabhāgānaṃ vā nivāso, so vihāro visabhāgo.
anya-e0103n:453_4: Tena visabhāgena saddhiṃ. Paccantanissitañca sīmānissitañca asappāyañca paccantasīmāsappāyaṃ.
anya-e0103n:453_5: Yattha mitto na labbhati, tampīti sabbattha ṭhāna-saddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso.
anya-e0103n:455_0: 53. Ayaṃ anurūpo nāmāti ayaṃ vihāro bhāvanāya anurūpo nāma. Nātidūranti gocaraṭṭhānato
anya-e0103n:455_1: aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya na atidūraṃ. Nāccāsannanti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaraṭṭhānato
anya-e0103n:455_2: pañcadhanusatikatāya na atiāsannaṃ. Tāya ca pana nātidūranāccāsannatāya, gocaraṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:455_3: parissayādirahitamaggatāya ca gamanassa ca āgamanassa ca yuttarūpattā gamanāgamanasampannaṃ.
anya-e0103n:455_4: Divasabhāge mahājanasaṃkiṇṇatābhāvena divā appākiṇṇaṃ. Abhāvattho hi ayaṃ appa-saddo
anya-e0103n:455_5: “appiccho”tiādīsu viya. Rattiyaṃ janālāpasaddābhāvena rattiṃ appasaddaṃ. Sabbadāpi
anya-e0103n:455_6: janasannipātanigghosābhāvena appanigghosaṃ. Appakasirenāti akasirena sukheneva. Sīlādiguṇānaṃ
anya-e0103n:455_7: thirabhāvappattiyā therā. Suttageyyādi bahu sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā. Vācuggatakaraṇena,
anya-e0103n:455_8: sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena ca āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti
anya-e0103n:455_9: āgatāgamā. Suttābhidhammasaṅkhātassa dhammassa dhāraṇena dhammadharā. Vinayassa dhāraṇena
anya-e0103n:455_10: vinayadharā. Tesaṃyeva dhammavinayānaṃ mātikāya dhāraṇena mātikādharā. Tattha tattha
anya-e0103n:455_11: dhammaparipucchāya paripucchati. Atthaparipucchāya paripañhati vīmaṃsati vicāreti.
anya-e0103n:455_12: Idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ imassa ko atthoti paripucchanaparipañhākāradassanaṃ. Avivaṭañceva
anya-e0103n:455_13: pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato vivaranti. Anuttānīkatañca yuttivibhāvanena
anya-e0103n:455_14: uttānīkaronti. Kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu saṃsayuppattiyā hetutāya gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu
anya-e0103n:455_15: pāḷipadesesu yāthāvato vinicchayadānena kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti. Ettha ca “nātidūraṃ,
anya-e0103n:455_16: nāccāsannaṃ, gamanāgamanasampanna”nti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, “divā appākiṇṇaṃ, rattiṃ appasaddaṃ
anya-e0103n:455_18: kho pana senāsane viharantassa…pe… parikkhārā”ti ekaṃ, “tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane
anya-e0103n:455_19: therā…pe… kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodentī”ti ekaṃ. Evaṃ pañca aṅgāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0103n:457: 54. Khuddakapalibodhupacchede payojanaṃ parato āgamissati. Aggaḷaanuvātaparibhaṇḍadānādinā daḷhīkammaṃ vā. Tantacchedādīsu tunnakammaṃ vā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:459_2: piṇḍapātabhuttāvinā onītapattapāṇināti attho. Bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvāti bhojananimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:459_3: parissamaṃ vinodetvā. Āhāre hi āsayaṃ paviṭṭhamatte tassa āgantukatāya yebhuyyena
anya-e0103n:459_4: siyā sarīrassa koci parissamo, taṃ vūpasametvā. Tasmiṃ hi avūpasante sarīrakhedena
anya-e0103n:459_5: cittaṃ ekaggataṃ na labheyyāti. Pavivitteti janavivitte. Sukhanisinnenāti pallaṅkaṃ
anya-e0103n:459_6: ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya nisajjāya sukhanisinnena. Vuttañhetanti yaṃ “katāya
anya-e0103n:459_7: vā”tiādinā pathaviyā nimittaggahaṇaṃ idha vuccati, vuttaṃ hetaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
anya-e0103n:460_0: Idāni taṃ aṭṭhakathāpāḷiṃ dassento “pathavīkasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto”tiādimāha. Tatthāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:460_1: saṅkhepattho – pathavīkasiṇaṃ uggaṇhantoti uggahanimittabhāvena pathavīkasiṇaṃ gaṇhanto
anya-e0103n:460_2: ādiyanto, uggahanimittabhūtaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ uppādentoti attho. Uppādanañcettha tathānimittassa
anya-e0103n:460_3: upaṭṭhāpanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pathaviyanti vakkhamānavisese pathavīmaṇḍale. Nimittaṃ gaṇhātīti
anya-e0103n:460_4: tattha cakkhunā ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ viya bhāvanāñāṇena vakkhamānavisesaṃ pathavīnimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:460_5: gaṇhāti. “Pathaviya”nti vatvāpi maṇḍalāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. Kateti vakkhamānavidhinā
anya-e0103n:460_6: abhisaṅkhateti attho. Vā-saddo aniyamattho. Akateti pākatike khalamaṇḍalādike pathavīmaṇḍale.
anya-e0103n:460_7: Sāntaketi saantake eva, saparicchede evāti attho. Sāvadhāraṇañhetaṃ vacanaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0103n:460_8: hi tena nivattitaṃ dassetuṃ “no anantake”ti vuttaṃ. Sakoṭiyetiādīnipi tasseva vevacanāni.
anya-e0103n:460_9: Suppamatte vātiādīsu suppasarāvāni samappamāṇāni icchitāni. Keci pana vadanti “sarāvamattaṃ
anya-e0103n:460_10: vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ hoti, suppamattaṃ tato adhikappamāṇanti. Kittimaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0103n:460_11: heṭṭhimaparicchedena sarāvamattaṃ, uparimaparicchedena suppamattaṃ, na tato adho,
anya-e0103n:460_12: uddhaṃ vāti parittappamāṇabhedasaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ‘suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā’ti vutta”nti.
anya-e0103n:460_13: Yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe ekaṅgulamattampi vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇamevāti vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0103n:461_0: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karotīti so yogāvacaro taṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ suggahitaṃ
anya-e0103n:461_1: nimittaṃ karoti. Yadā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā oloketvā tattha nimittaṃ gahetvā nimmīletvā
anya-e0103n:461_2: āvajjentassa ummīletvā olokitakkhaṇe viya upaṭṭhāti, tadā suggahitaṃ karoti nāma.
anya-e0103n:461_3: Athettha satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā abahigatena mānasena punappunaṃ sallakkhento sūpadhāritaṃ
anya-e0103n:461_4: upadhāreti nāma. Evaṃ upadhāritaṃ pana naṃ punappunaṃ āvajjento manasi karonto tamevārabbha
anya-e0103n:461_5: āsevanaṃ bhāvanaṃ bahulaṃ pavattento suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapeti nāma. Tasmiṃ ārammaṇeti
anya-e0103n:461_6: evaṃ suggahitakaraṇādinā sammadeva upaṭṭhite tasmiṃ pathavīkasiṇasaññite ārammaṇe.
anya-e0103n:461_7: Cittaṃ upanibandhatīti attano cittaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ upanetvā nibandhati aññārammaṇato
anya-e0103n:462_0: Idāni yathādassitassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa atthappakāsanena saddhiṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ vibhāvetukāmo
anya-e0103n:462_1: akate tāva nimittaggahaṇaṃ dassento “tattha yena atītabhavepī”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti
anya-e0103n:463_1: nīlādivaṇṇāhi mattikāhi paccekaṃ, ekajjhañca saṃsaggavasena. Gaṅgāvaheti gaṅgāsote.
anya-e0103n:463_2: Sīhaḷadīpe kira rāvaṇagaṅgā nāma nadī, tassā sotena chinnataṭaṭṭhāne mattikā aruṇavaṇṇā.
anya-e0103n:463_3: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “gaṅgāvahe mattikāsadisāya aruṇavaṇṇāyā”ti. Aruṇavaṇṇāya aruṇanibhāya,
anya-e0103n:464_0: Evaṃ kasiṇadose dassetvā idāni kasiṇakaraṇādike sesākāre dassetuṃ “tañca kho”tiādi
anya-e0103n:464_1: vuttaṃ. Saṃhārimanti saṃharitabbaṃ gahetvā caraṇayoggaṃ. Tatraṭṭhakanti yatra kataṃ,
anya-e0103n:464_2: tattheva tiṭṭhanakaṃ. Vuttappamāṇanti “suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā”ti vuttappamāṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:464_3: Vaṭṭanti maṇḍalasaṇṭhānaṃ. Parikammakāleti nimittuggahaṇāya bhāvanākāle. Etadevāti
anya-e0103n:464_4: yaṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ, etadeva pamāṇaṃ sandhāya “suppamattaṃ vā sarāvamattaṃ
anya-e0103n:464_5: vā”ti vuttaṃ. Suppaṃ hi nātimahantaṃ, sarāvañca mahantaṃ cāṭipidhānappahonakanti samappamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:465_0: 56. Tasmāti paricchedatthāya vuttattā. Evaṃ vuttapamāṇaṃ paricchedanti yathāvuttappamāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:465_1: vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ paricchedaṃ katvā, evaṃ vuttappamāṇaṃ vā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0103n:465_2: visabhāgavaṇṇena paricchedaṃ katvā. Rukkhapāṇikāti kucandanādirukkhapāṇikā aruṇavaṇṇassa
anya-e0103n:465_3: visabhāgavaṇṇaṃ samuṭṭhapeti. Tasmā taṃ aggahetvāti vuttaṃ. Pakatirukkhapāṇikā pana
anya-e0103n:465_4: pāsāṇapāṇikāgatikāva. Ninnunnataṭṭhānābhāvena bherītalasadisaṃ katvā. Tato dūrataretiādi
anya-e0103n:465_5: yathāvuttato padesato, pīṭhato ca aññasmiṃ ādīnavadassanaṃ. Kasiṇadosāti hatthapāṇipadādayo idha kasiṇadosā.
anya-e0103n:466_1: ca vuttavidhināva. Kāmesu ādīnavanti “kāmā nāmete aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā nirassādaṭṭhena,
anya-e0103n:466_2: tiṇukkūpamā anudahanaṭṭhena, aṅgārakāsūpamā mahābhitāpaṭṭhena, supinakūpamā ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena,
anya-e0103n:466_4: asisūnūpamā adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena, sattisūlūpamā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena, sappasirūpamā sapaṭibhayaṭṭhenā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:466_6: sāsaṅkaṃ, sabhayaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ, mīḷhaparibhogasadisaṃ, hīnaṃ, gammaṃ, pothujjanikaṃ,
anya-e0103n:466_7: anariyaṃ, anatthasaṃhita”ntiādinā ca anekākāravokāraṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavaṃ
anya-e0103n:466_8: dosaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Kāmanissaraṇeti kāmānaṃ nissaraṇabhūte, tehi vā nissaṭe. Aggamaggassa
anya-e0103n:466_9: pādakabhāvena sabbadukkhasamatikkamassa upāyabhūte. Nekkhammeti jhāne. Jātābhilāsena
anya-e0103n:466_11: dhammo ekantaniyyānikattā, suppaṭipanno saṅgho yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanato”ti evaṃ
anya-e0103n:466_13: paṭipajjati etāyāti nekkhammapaṭipadā, saupacārassa jhānassa, vipassanāya, maggassa,
anya-e0103n:466_14: nibbānassa ca adhigamakāraṇanti attho. Pubbe pana paṭhamajjhānameva nekkhammanti
anya-e0103n:469_0: Pavivekasukharasassāti cittavivekādivivekajassa sukharasassa. Evametehi pañcahi padehi
anya-e0103n:469_1: “ānisaṃsadassāvī”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Samena ākārenāti atiummīlanaatimandālocanāni
anya-e0103n:469_2: vajjetvā nātiummīlananātimandālocanasaṅkhātena samena ālocanākārena. Nimittaṃ gaṇhantenāti
anya-e0103n:469_3: pathavīkasiṇe cakkhunā gahitanimittaṃ manasā gaṇhantena. Bhāvetabbanti tathāpavattaṃ
anya-e0103n:470_0: Cakkhu kilamati atisukhumaṃ, atibhāsurañca rūpagataṃ upanijjhāyato viya. Ativibhūtaṃ
anya-e0103n:470_1: hoti attano sabhāvāvibhāvato. Tathā ca vaṇṇato vā lakkhaṇato vā upatiṭṭheyya. Tena
anya-e0103n:470_2: vuttaṃ “tenassa nimittaṃ nuppajjatī”ti. Avibhūtaṃ hoti gajanimmīlanena pekkhantassa
anya-e0103n:470_3: rūpagataṃ viya. Cittañca līnaṃ hoti dassane mandabyāpāratāya kosajjapātato. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:470_4: “evampi nimittaṃ nuppajjatī”ti. Ādāsatale mukhanimittadassinā viyāti yathā ādāsatale
anya-e0103n:470_5: mukhanimittadassī puriso na tattha atigāḷhaṃ ummīlati, nāpi atimandaṃ, na ādāsatalassa
anya-e0103n:470_6: vaṇṇaṃ paccavekkhati, nāpi lakkhaṇaṃ manasi karoti. Atha kho samena ākārena olokento
anya-e0103n:470_7: attano mukhanimittameva passati, evameva ayampi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samena ākārena olokento
anya-e0103n:470_8: nimittaggahaṇappasutoyeva hoti, tena vuttaṃ “samena ākārenā”tiādi. Na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabboti
anya-e0103n:470_9: yo tattha pathavīkasiṇe aruṇavaṇṇo, so na cintetabbo. Cakkhuviññāṇena pana gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:470_10: na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Tenevettha “na oloketabbo”ti avatvā paccavekkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0103n:470_11: Na lakkhaṇaṃ manasi kātabbanti yaṃ tattha pathavīdhātuyā thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ na manasi kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:471_0: Disvā gahetabbattā “vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā”ti vatvāpi vaṇṇavasenettha ābhogo na kātabbo,
anya-e0103n:471_1: so pana vaṇṇo nissayagatiko kātabboti dassento āha “nissayasavaṇṇaṃ katvā”ti. Nissayena
anya-e0103n:471_2: samānākārasannissito so vaṇṇo tāya pathaviyā samānagatikaṃ katvā, vaṇṇena saheva
anya-e0103n:471_3: “pathavī”ti manasi kātabbanti attho. Ussadavasena paṇṇattidhammeti pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0103n:471_4: ussannabhāvena sattito adhikabhāvena sasambhārapathaviyaṃ “pathavī”ti yo lokavohāro,
anya-e0103n:471_5: tasmiṃ paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ paṭṭhapetvā “pathavī, pathavī”ti manasi kātabbaṃ. Yadi
anya-e0103n:471_6: lokavohārena paṇṇattimatte cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, nāmantaravasenapi pathavī manasi kātabbā
anya-e0103n:471_7: bhaveyyāti, hotu, ko dosoti dassento “mahī medinī”tiādimāha. Tattha yamicchatīti
anya-e0103n:471_8: yaṃ nāmaṃ vattuṃ icchati, taṃ vattabbaṃ. Tañca kho yadassa saññānukūlaṃ hoti yaṃ
anya-e0103n:471_9: nāmaṃ assa yogino pubbe tattha gahitasaññāvasena anukūlaṃ pacuratāya, paguṇatāya
anya-e0103n:471_10: vā āgacchati, taṃ vattabbaṃ. Vattabbanti ca paṭhamasamannāhāre kassaci vacībhedopi
anya-e0103n:471_11: hotīti katvā vuttaṃ, ācariyena vā vattabbataṃ sandhāya. Kiṃ vā bahunā, pākaṭabhāvoyevettha
anya-e0103n:471_12: pamāṇanti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kālena ummīletvā kālena nimmīletvāti kiñci
anya-e0103n:471_13: kālaṃ cakkhuṃ ummīletvā nimittaggahaṇavasena pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā puna kiñci
anya-e0103n:471_14: kālaṃ cakkhuṃ nimmīletvā āvajjitabbaṃ. Yenākārena oloketvā gahitaṃ, tenākārena puna
anya-e0103n:472_0: 57. Āpāthamāgacchatīti manodvārikajavanānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ upagacchati. Tassa uggahanimittassa.
anya-e0103n:472_1: Na tasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ. Kasmā? Yadi uggahanimitte jātepi pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā
anya-e0103n:472_2: bhāveti, paṭibhāganimittuppatti na siyā. Samīpaṭṭhena ca na oloketuṃ na sakkā. Tena
anya-e0103n:472_4: parissayavinodanatthaṃ kattaradaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ. Sace nassati, athānena bhāvetabbanti
anya-e0103n:472_5: sambandho. Vakkhamānesu asappāyesu kenacideva asappāyena kāraṇabhūtena. Nimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:472_6: ādāyāti yathājātaṃ uggahanimittaṃ gahetvā. Samannāharitabbanti āvajjitabbaṃ nimittanti
anya-e0103n:472_7: adhippāyo, sammā vā anu anu āharitabbaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti attho. Takkāhataṃ vitakkāhatanti
anya-e0103n:472_8: takkanato, savisesaṃ takkanato ca “takko, vitakko”ti ca evaṃ laddhanāmena bhāvanācittasampayuttena
anya-e0103n:472_9: sammāsaṅkappena āhananapariyāhananakiccena aparāparaṃ vattamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āhataṃ,
anya-e0103n:472_10: pariyāhatañca kātabbaṃ, balappattavitakko manasikāro bahulaṃ pavattetabboti attho.
anya-e0103n:472_11: Evaṃ karontassāti evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karontassa. Yathā bhāvanā
anya-e0103n:472_12: pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahati, evaṃ anuyuñjantassa. Anukkamenāti bhāvanānukkamena.
anya-e0103n:472_13: Yadā saddhādīni indriyāni suvisadāni tikkhāni pavattanti, tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena
anya-e0103n:472_14: sātisayathāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni kāmāvacarāneva
anya-e0103n:472_15: jhānaṅgāni bahūni hutvā pātubhavanti. Tato eva tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā kāmacchandādayo
anya-e0103n:472_16: saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi vidūrī bhavanti, paṭibhāganimittuppattiyā saddhiṃ
anya-e0103n:472_17: taṃ ārabbha upacārajjhānaṃ uppajjati. Tena vuttaṃ “nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhantī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:472_18: Tattha sannisīdantīti sammadeva sīdanti, upasamantīti attho.
anya-e0103n:473_1: uggahanimittato paṭibhāganimittassa suparisuddhataṃ, saṇhasukhumatañca dasseti. Tañca
anya-e0103n:473_2: kho paṭibhāganimittaṃ neva vaṇṇavantaṃ na saṇṭhānavantaṃ aparamatthasabhāvattā. Īdisanti
anya-e0103n:473_4: vā. Yadi na panetaṃ tādisaṃ vaṇṇādivantaṃ, kathaṃ jhānassa ārammaṇabhāvoti āha “kevalañhī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:473_5: Saññajanti bhāvanāsaññājanitaṃ, bhāvanāsaññāya sañjātamattaṃ. Na hi asabhāvassa kutoci
anya-e0103n:474_0: 58. Vikkhambhitāneva sannisinnāva, na pana tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:474_1: “Upacārasamādhinā”ti vutte itaropi samādhi atthīti atthato āpannanti tampi dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:474_2: “duvidho hi samādhī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Dvīhākārehīti jhānadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvo,
anya-e0103n:474_3: thirabhāvappatti cāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi. Idāni tāni kāraṇāni avatthāmukhena dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:474_4: “upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upacārabhūmiyanti upacārāvatthāyaṃ. Yadipi tadā
anya-e0103n:474_5: jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggatabhāvappattāni na uppajjanti, tesaṃ pana paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:474_6: vikkhambhanena cittaṃ samādhiyati. Tenāha “nīvaraṇappahānena cittaṃ samāhitaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:474_7: Paṭilābhabhūmiyanti jhānassa adhigamāvatthāyaṃ. Tadā hi appanāpattānaṃ jhānadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:474_8: uppattiyā cittaṃ samādhiyati. Tenāha “aṅgapātubhāvenā”ti. Cittaṃ samāhitaṃ hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:475_0: Na thāmajātānīti na jātathāmāni, na bhāvanābalaṃ pattānīti attho. Cittanti jhānacittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:475_1: Kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhatīti samāpattivelaṃ sandhāyāha. Upacārabhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:475_2: nimittavaḍḍhanaṃ yuttanti katvā vuttaṃ “nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā”ti. Laddhaparihānīti laddhaupacārajjhānaparihāni.
anya-e0103n:475_3: Nimitte avinassante tadārammaṇajhānampi aparihīnameva hoti, nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena
anya-e0103n:475_4: vinaṭṭhe laddhaṃ laddhaṃ jhānampi vinassati tadāyattavuttito. Tenāha “ārakkhamhī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:477_0: 59. “Thāvarañca hotī”ti vatvā yathā thāvaraṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “sati upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:477_1: cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yathāladdhañhi nimittaṃ tattha satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā
anya-e0103n:477_2: ekaggataṃ vindantassa thiraṃ nāma hoti, surakkhitañca. Sati-ggahaṇena cettha sampajaññaṃ,
anya-e0103n:477_3: samādhiggahaṇena vīriyañca saṅgahitaṃ hoti nānantariyabhāvato. Tatthāti tesu āvāsesu.
anya-e0103n:477_4: Tīṇi tīṇīti ekekasmiṃ āvāse avutthaavutthaṭṭhāne vasananiyāmena tayo tayo divase vasitvā.
anya-e0103n:478: Uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vāti vuttaṃ gamanāgamane sūriyābhimukhabhāvanivāraṇatthanti. Sahassadhanuppamāṇaṃ diyaḍḍhakosaṃ.
anya-e0103n:479_0: Dvattiṃsa tiracchānakathāti rājakathādike sandhāyāha. Tā hi pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi
anya-e0103n:479_3: paviveko, asaṃsaggo, vīriyārambho, sīla, samādhi, paññā, vimutti, vimuttiñāṇadassana”nti
anya-e0103n:479_4: imāni appicchakathādīnaṃ vatthūni, tannissitaṃ bhassaṃ sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0103n:480_0: Atiracchānakathikoti natiracchānakathiko, tiracchānakathā vidhuraṃ dhammikaṃ kammaṭṭhānapaṭisaṃyuttameva
anya-e0103n:480_1: kathaṃ kathetīti adhippāyo. Sīlādiguṇasampannoti sīlasamādhiādiguṇasampanno. Yo hi
anya-e0103n:480_2: samādhikammaṭṭhāniko, samādhikammaṭṭhānassa vā pāraṃ patto, so imassa yogino sappāyo.
anya-e0103n:480_3: Tenāha “yaṃ nissāyā”tiādi. Kāyadaḷhībahuloti kāyassa santappanaposanappasuto. Yaṃ
anya-e0103n:480_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ “yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ
anya-e0103n:481_0: Bhojanaṃ yebhuyyena madhurambilarasavasena sattānaṃ upayogaṃ gacchati dadhiādīsu
anya-e0103n:481_1: tathā dassanato. Kaṭukādirasā pana kevalaṃ abhisaṅkhārakā evāti āha “kassaci madhuraṃ,
anya-e0103n:482_0: Yasmiṃ iriyāpathe ādhārabhūte, vattamāne vā, yasmiṃ vā iriyāpathe pavattamānassa.
anya-e0103n:482_1: Nimittāsevanabahulassāti nimitte āsevanābahulassa paṭibhāganimitte visayabhūte bhāvanāmanasikāraṃ
anya-e0103n:482_2: bahulaṃ āsevantassa, nimittassa vā gocarāsevanavasena āsevanābahulassa. Yena hi bhāventassa
anya-e0103n:484_0: 60. Na hoti appanā. Yena vidhinā appanāyaṃ kusalo hoti, so dasavidho vidhi appanākosallaṃ,
anya-e0103n:484_1: tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ. Vatthuvisadakiriyatoti vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇato appanākosallaṃ
anya-e0103n:485_0: 61. Cittacetasikānaṃ hi pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ, tappaṭibaddhāni cīvarādīni
anya-e0103n:485_1: ca idha “vatthūnī”ti adhippetāni. Tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti, tathā karaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:485_2: tesaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “ajjhattikabāhirāna”ntiādi. Sarīraṃ vāti vā-saddo
anya-e0103n:485_3: aṭṭhānappayutto, sarīraṃ sedamalaggahitaṃ vā aññena vā avassutakiccena vibādhitanti
anya-e0103n:485_4: adhippāyo. Senāsanaṃ vāti vā-saddena pattādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nanu cāyaṃ nayo
anya-e0103n:485_5: khuddakapalibodhupacchedena saṅgahito, puna kasmā vuttoti? Saccaṃ saṅgahito, so ca
anya-e0103n:485_6: kho bhāvanāya ārambhakāle. Idha pana āraddhakammaṭṭhānassa upacārajjhāne ṭhatvā appanāparivāsaṃ
anya-e0103n:485_7: vasantassa kālantare jāte tathāpaṭipatti appanākosallāya vuttā. Avisade sati, visayabhūte
anya-e0103n:485_8: vā. Kathaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa tāni visayo? Antarantarā pavattanakacittuppādavasenevaṃ
anya-e0103n:485_9: vuttaṃ. Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti. Cittacetasikesu
anya-e0103n:485_10: nissayādipaccayabhūtesu. Ñāṇampīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍane. Tena “na kevalaṃ taṃ vatthuyeva,
anya-e0103n:485_11: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotī”ti dassitaṃ. Taṃsampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0103n:485_12: pana aparisuddhatā avuttasiddhā, ñāṇassa ca visuṃ gahaṇaṃ appanāya bahukārattā. Tathā
anya-e0103n:485_13: hi jhānaṃ “dandhābhiññaṃ, khippābhiñña”nti ñāṇamukhena niddiṭṭhaṃ. Nissayanissayopi
anya-e0103n:485_14: nissayotveva vuccatīti āha “dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāyā”ti. Ñāṇe avisade vipassanābhāvanā
anya-e0103n:485_15: viya samādhibhāvanāpi paridubbalā hotīti dassetuṃ “aparisuddhena ñāṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:485_16: Tattha kammaṭṭhānanti samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ āha. Vuḍḍhiṃ aṅgapātubhāvena, virūḷhiṃ
anya-e0103n:485_17: guṇabhāvena, vepullaṃ sabbaso vasibhāvappattiyā veditabbaṃ. Visade panāti sukkapakkho,
anya-e0103n:486_1: adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena, paññāya avisadatāya, vīriyādīnaṃ ca sithilatādinā
anya-e0103n:486_2: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Tenāha “itarāni mandānī”ti. Tatoti tasmā saddhindriyassa
anya-e0103n:486_3: balavabhāvato, itaresañca mandattā. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:486_4: paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho, paggahova kiccaṃ, paggahakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti
anya-e0103n:486_5: sambandhitabbaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ, vikkhepapaṭipakkho.
anya-e0103n:486_6: Yena vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so avikkhepo. Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato
anya-e0103n:486_7: visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena
anya-e0103n:486_8: abhibhūtattā. Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:486_9: ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi, na aññathā. Tasmāti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati.
anya-e0103n:486_10: Tanti saddhindriyaṃ. Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe
anya-e0103n:486_11: adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannādivibhāgato
anya-e0103n:486_12: yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro
anya-e0103n:486_13: adhimokkho na hoti, “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo”ti parijānanavasena paññābyāpārassa
anya-e0103n:486_14: sātisayattā. Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
anya-e0103n:486_15: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hotīti. Tena vuttaṃ “taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāpetabba”nti.
anya-e0103n:487_0: Tathā amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:487_1: tenākārena bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa
anya-e0103n:487_2: balavabhāvo, attano vā paccayavisesato kiccuttariyena, vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
anya-e0103n:487_3: Tattha paṭhamavikappe hāpanavidhi dassito, dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasi karoto
anya-e0103n:487_4: vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:487_5: paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:488_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttatāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanappasuto
anya-e0103n:488_1: eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? Yo kho,
anya-e0103n:488_2: vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi
anya-e0103n:488_3: taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi. Atha naṃ satthā
anya-e0103n:491_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “ehi vakkalī”ti āha. So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā
anya-e0103n:491_1: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Saddhāya pana balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otari. Taṃ
anya-e0103n:491_2: ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamataṃ paṭipādento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā
anya-e0103n:491_3: dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:492_1: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena
anya-e0103n:492_2: hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati, samādhipakkhiyattā
anya-e0103n:492_3: tassā. Tathā hi sā samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā
anya-e0103n:492_4: viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato hāpeti. Tena
anya-e0103n:493_0: Soṇattherassa vatthūti sukumārassa soṇattherassa vatthu. So hi āyasmā satthu santike
anya-e0103n:493_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva
anya-e0103n:493_2: sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n:493_3: padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ
anya-e0103n:493_4: vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Satthā tattha
anya-e0103n:493_5: gantvā vīṇovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā
anya-e0103n:493_6: gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
anya-e0103n:493_7: arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabba”nti.
anya-e0103n:494_0: Sesesupīti satisamādhipaññindriyesupi. Ekassāti ekekassa. Sāmaññaniddesovāyaṃ daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:494_1: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ paccekaṃ adhimattatāya pana hāpanavasena samataṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n:494_2: idāni tattha yesaṃ visesato asādhāraṇato, sādhāraṇato ca samatā icchitabbā, taṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:494_3: “visesato panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etthāti etesu pañcasu indriyesu. Samatanti saddhāpaññānaṃ
anya-e0103n:494_4: aññamaññaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvaṃ. Tathā samādhivīriyānaṃ. Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ
anya-e0103n:494_5: visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānativattanaṃ visesato icchitabbameva,
anya-e0103n:494_6: yato nesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjatīti, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjauddhaccapakkhikānaṃ
anya-e0103n:495_0: “Balavasaddho hī”tiādi nidassanavasena vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yo balavatiyā saddhāya
anya-e0103n:495_1: samannāgato avisadañāṇo, so muddhappasanno hoti, na aveccappasanno. Tathā hi so avatthusmiṃ
anya-e0103n:495_2: pasīdati seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā. Kerāṭikapakkhanti sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ bhajati. Saddhāhīnāya
anya-e0103n:495_3: paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ
anya-e0103n:495_4: hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetupaṭirūpakehi vañcito. Evaṃbhūto pana sukkhatakkaviluttacitto
anya-e0103n:495_5: paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati, saññattiṃ na gacchati. Tenāha “bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya
anya-e0103n:495_6: rogo atekiccho hotī”ti. Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaviraho na atthāvaho
anya-e0103n:495_7: anatthāvaho ca, evamidhāpi samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaviraho na avikkhepāvaho vikkhepāvaho
anya-e0103n:495_8: cāti veditabbaṃ. Kosajjaṃ abhibhavati, tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Uddhaccaṃ
anya-e0103n:495_9: abhibhavatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tadubhayanti taṃ saddhāpaññādvayaṃ, samādhivīriyadvayañca.
anya-e0103n:496_0: Samādhikammikassāti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. Evanti evaṃ sante, saddhāya tesaṃ balavabhāve
anya-e0103n:496_1: satīti attho. Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavī”ti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattīti
anya-e0103n:496_2: acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento.
anya-e0103n:496_3: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena okappento pakkhandanto.
anya-e0103n:496_4: Ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati samādhipadhānattā jhānassa. Ubhinnanti samādhipaññānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:496_5: samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti, samabhāvenāpīti
anya-e0103n:496_6: attho. Appanāti idhādhippetaappanā. Tathā hi “hotiyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati, lokuttarappanā
anya-e0103n:496_7: pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha – “samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
anya-e0103n:497_0: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ, samādhivīriyānañca samatā icchitā, kathaṃ satīti āha
anya-e0103n:497_1: “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti. Sabbatthāti līnuddhaccapakkhesu pañcasu
anya-e0103n:497_2: indriyesu. Uddhaccapakkhiye gaṇhanto “saddhāvīriyapaññāna”nti āha. Aññathāpīti ca
anya-e0103n:497_3: gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi “kosajjapakkhena samādhinā” icceva vuttaṃ, na “passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī”ti.
anya-e0103n:497_4: Sā sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto sabbakammiko. Tena kāraṇena sabbattha icchitabbatthena.
anya-e0103n:497_5: Āha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā sabbatthikā, sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena
anya-e0103n:497_6: bojjhaṅgaggahaṇena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā, sabbatthiyāva sabbatthikā. Cittanti kusalacittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:497_7: Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0103n:498_1: nimittassa. Cittassa hi samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā samathanimittaṃ rakkhantoyeva
anya-e0103n:498_2: kasiṇanimittaṃ rakkhati. Tasmā pathavīkasiṇādikassāti ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ paṭibhāganimittasseva,
anya-e0103n:498_3: atha kho samathanimittassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tanti rakkhaṇakosallaṃ. Idha appanākosallakathāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:499_1: Līnanti saṅkucitaṃ kosajjapakkhapatitaṃ. Cittanti bhāvanācittaṃ. Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo
anya-e0103n:499_2: bhāvetīti ettha “tayo”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Yathā pana te bhāvetabbā,
anya-e0103n:500_0: Parittanti appakaṃ. Ujjāletukāmoti padīpetukāmo. Udakavātaṃ dadeyyāti udakamissaṃ
anya-e0103n:500_1: vātaṃ upaneyya. Akāloti nakālo, ayuttakālo vā. Satiādidhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā
anya-e0103n:500_2: bujjhati etāyāti katvā, taṃsamaṅgino vā bujjhatīti bodhino yogino aṅganti bojjhaṅgo,
anya-e0103n:500_3: pasattho, sundaro vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo. Kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā passaddhiyeva
anya-e0103n:500_5: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – samādhissa tāva padatthalakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā āgatāneva.
anya-e0103n:500_6: Upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā. Sā panāyaṃ atthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva idha bojjhaṅgupekkhā
anya-e0103n:500_7: veditabbā. Dusamuṭṭhāpayanti samuṭṭhāpetuṃ uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ. Dhammānaṃ, dhammesu
anya-e0103n:500_8: vā vicayo dhammavicayo, paññāti attho. Vīrassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā, vidhinā vā īretabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:500_9: pavattetabbanti vīriyaṃ, ussāho. Pīṇeti kāyaṃ, cittaṃ ca santappetīti pīti.
anya-e0103n:501_0: Yaṃ yaṃ sakaṃ yathāsakaṃ, attano attanoti attho. Āhāravasenāti paccayavasena. Bhāvanāti
anya-e0103n:501_1: uppādanā, vaḍḍhanā ca. Kusalākusalāti kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalā, tappaṭipakkhato
anya-e0103n:501_2: akusalā. Ye akusalā, te sāvajjā. Ye kusalā, te anavajjā. Akusalā hīnā, itare paṇītā.
anya-e0103n:501_3: Kusalāpi vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā hīnā, itare paṇītā. Kaṇhāti kāḷakā cittassa
anya-e0103n:501_4: apabhassarabhāvakaraṇā, sukkāti odātā cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto
anya-e0103n:501_5: vā kaṇhā, sukkābhijātihetuto sukkā. Te eva sappaṭibhāgā. Kaṇhā hi ujuvipaccanīkatāya
anya-e0103n:501_6: sukkehi sappaṭibhāgā. Tathā sukkāpi itarehi. Atha vā kaṇhā ca sukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā
anya-e0103n:501_7: ca kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā. Sukhā hi vedanā dukkhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgā, dukkhā
anya-e0103n:501_8: ca vedanā sukhāya sappaṭibhāgāti. Anuppannassāti anibbattassa. Uppādāyāti uppādanatthāya.
anya-e0103n:501_9: Uppannassāti nibbattassa. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti punappunabhāvāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya.
anya-e0103n:502_1: ekajjhaṃ katvā gahaṇe anavajjasukhavipākādikassa visuṃ visuṃ pana phusanādikassa
anya-e0103n:502_2: sabhāvalakkhaṇassa, aniccādikassa sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanavasena. Pavattamanasikāroti
anya-e0103n:502_4: So hi aviparītamanasikāratāya “yonisomanasikāro”ti vutto. Tadābhogatāya āvajjanāpi
anya-e0103n:502_5: taggatikāva. Ruppanalakkhaṇādikampi idha sāmaññalakkhaṇeneva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:502_7: āha “ārambhadhātūti paṭhamavīriyaṃ vuccatī”ti. Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ
anya-e0103n:502_8: hutvā paṭipakkhaṃ vidhamatīti āha “kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavatara”nti. Adhimattādhimattatarānaṃ
anya-e0103n:502_10: paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara”nti. Tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti ṭhāniyā,
anya-e0103n:502_11: pītisambojjhaṅgassa ṭhāniyā pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā. Ṭhātabbo vā ṭhāniyo, pītisambojjhaṅgo
anya-e0103n:502_12: ṭhāniyo etesūti pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā, aparāparaṃ vattamānā pītisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā
anya-e0103n:502_13: dhammā. Yasmā pana tesu pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgassa visesakāraṇaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:502_14: “pītiyā eva etaṃ nāma”nti. Uppādakamanasikāroti yathā manasi karoto anuppanno pītisambojjhaṅgo
anya-e0103n:502_15: uppajjati, uppanno ca vaḍḍhati, tathā pavattamanasikāro.
anya-e0103n:503_0: Paripucchakatāti pariyogāhetvā pucchakabhāvo. Pañcapi hi nikāye uggahetvā ācariye
anya-e0103n:503_1: pariyupāsitvā tassa tassa atthaṃ paripucchantassa, te vā saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā
anya-e0103n:503_2: yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ taṃ “idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ, imassa ko attho”ti pucchantassa
anya-e0103n:503_4: saṅkhepato, vitthārato ca pakāsitā eva. Tattha pana samādhisaṃvattaniyabhāvena āgatā,
anya-e0103n:503_5: idha paññāsaṃvattaniyabhāvena. Yadaggena hi samādhisaṃvattanikā, tadaggena paññāsaṃvattanikā
anya-e0103n:503_6: samādhissa ñāṇapaccupaṭṭhānato. “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā
anya-e0103n:503_8: momūhapuggalānaṃ dūrato pariccajanā. Paññavantapuggalasevanā nāma paññāya katādhikārānaṃ
anya-e0103n:503_9: saccapaṭiccasamuppādādīsu kusalānaṃ ariyānaṃ, vipassanākammikānaṃ vā mahāpaññānaṃ
anya-e0103n:503_10: kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ. Gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇāti gambhīrañāṇehi caritabbānaṃ
anya-e0103n:503_12: paccavekkhaṇā. Tadadhimuttatāti paññādhimuttatā, paññāya ninnapoṇapabbhāratāti attho.
anya-e0103n:504_0: Apāyādīti ādi-saddena jātiādiṃ atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:504_1: paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakañca dukkhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Vīriyāyattassa lokiyalokuttaravisesassa
anya-e0103n:504_2: adhigamo eva ānisaṃso, tassa dassanasīlatā vīriyāyatta…pe… dassitā. Sapubbabhāgo
anya-e0103n:504_3: nibbānagāmimaggo gamanavīthi gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadāti katvā. Dāyakānaṃ
anya-e0103n:504_4: mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena piṇḍāpacāyanatāti paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano
anya-e0103n:504_5: sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalakārabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā. Itarathāti
anya-e0103n:504_6: āmisapūjāya. Kusītapuggalaparivajjanatāti alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ
anya-e0103n:504_11: paccavekkhaṇatā. Tadadhimuttatāti tasmiṃ vīriyasambojjhaṅge adhimutti sabbiriyāpathesu
anya-e0103n:505_0: Buddhādīsu pasādasinehābhāvena thusakharahadayā lūkhapuggalā, tabbipariyāyena siniddhapuggalā
anya-e0103n:505_3: ceva paripucchakatādiākārehi ca. Ete dhammeti ete kusalādīsu yonisomanasikārādike
anya-e0103n:506_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Uddhatanti samādhiādīnaṃ mandatāya avūpasantaṃ. Duvūpasamayanti vūpasametuṃ
anya-e0103n:507_0: Taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvāti yenākārena assa yogino passaddhi samādhi upekkhāti ime
anya-e0103n:507_1: passaddhiādayo dhammā pubbe yathārahaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle uppannapubbā, taṃ cittataṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:507_2: passaddhākāraṃ, samāhitākāraṃ, ajjhupekkhitākārañca upalakkhetvā upadhāretvā. Tīsupi
anya-e0103n:507_3: padesūti “atthi, bhikkhave, kāyappassaddhī”tiādinā āgatesu tīsupi vākyesu, tehi vā
anya-e0103n:507_4: pakāsitesu tīsu dhammakoṭṭhāsesu. Yathāsamāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā gayhamāno samatho
anya-e0103n:507_5: eva samathanimittanti āha “samathanimittanti ca samathassevetamadhivacana”nti. Nānārammaṇe
anya-e0103n:507_6: paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso,
anya-e0103n:507_7: bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto. Ekaggatābhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti abyaggo, samādhi.
anya-e0103n:507_8: So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha “avikkhepaṭṭhena ca tasseva abyagganimittanti adhivacana”nti.
anya-e0103n:508_0: Sarīrāvatthaṃ ñatvā mattaso paribhutto paṇītāhāro kāyalahutādīnaṃ samuṭṭhāpanena
anya-e0103n:508_1: passaddhiyā paccayo hoti, tathā utusappāyaṃ, iriyāpathasappāyañca sevitaṃ, payogo
anya-e0103n:508_2: ca kāyiko pavattitoti āha “paṇītabhojanasevanatā”tiādi. Payogasamatādīnaṃ abhāvena
anya-e0103n:508_3: sadarathakāyacittā puggalā sāraddhapuggalā. Vuttavipariyāyena passaddhakāyā puggalā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:509_0: Nirassādassāti bhāvanassādarahitassa. Bhāvanā hi vīthipaṭipannā pubbenāparaṃ visesavatī
anya-e0103n:509_1: pavattamānā cittassa assādaṃ upasamasukhaṃ āvahati, tadabhāvato nirassādaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:509_2: hoti. Saddhāsaṃvegavasenāti saddhāvasena, saṃvegavasena ca. Sampahaṃsanatāti sammadeva
anya-e0103n:509_3: pahaṃsanatā saṃvejanapubbakapasāduppādanena bhāvanā cittassa tosanā. Sammāpavattassāti
anya-e0103n:509_4: līnuddhaccavirahena, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca samaṃ, savisesañca pavattiyā sammadeva
anya-e0103n:509_6: Jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇatāti paṭhamādīni jhānāni paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatādinā
anya-e0103n:509_7: teyeva vimokkhā tesaṃ “evaṃ bhāvanā, evaṃ samāpajjanā, evaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:509_8: evaṃ saṃkileso, evaṃ vodāna”nti pati pati avekkhaṇā.
anya-e0103n:510_0: Sattamajjhattatāti sattesu piyaṭṭhāniyesupi gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu majjhattākāro ajjhupekkhanā.
anya-e0103n:510_1: Saṅkhāramajjhattatāti ajjhattikesu cakkhādīsu, bāhiresu pattacīvarādīsu majjhattākāro
anya-e0103n:510_2: ajjhupekkhanā. Sattasaṅkhārānaṃ mamāyanaṃ sattasaṅkhārakelāyanaṃ. Imehākārehīti imehi
anya-e0103n:511_0: 66. Paññāpayogamandatāyāti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena. Yathā hi dānasīlāni alobhādosappadhānāni,
anya-e0103n:511_1: evaṃ bhāvanā amohappadhānā visesato appanāvahā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
anya-e0103n:511_2: tadā bhāvanācittassa anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa abhiruciṃ na janeti, tena
anya-e0103n:511_3: taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Yadā ca bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā,
anya-e0103n:511_4: tadā upasamasukhassa alābhena cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha “paññāpayogamandatāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:511_5: Nanti cittaṃ. Jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ, duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva
anya-e0103n:511_7: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte, anāgate
anya-e0103n:511_8: ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni. Ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca
anya-e0103n:511_9: uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvitadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu
anya-e0103n:512_0: Assāti cittassa. Alīnantiādīsu kosajjapakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya alīnaṃ.
anya-e0103n:512_2: upasamasukhādhigamena ca anirassādaṃ. Pubbenāparaṃ savisesaṃ tato eva ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:512_3: samathavīthipaṭipannañca. Tattha alīnatāya paggahe, anuddhatatāya niggahe, anirassādatāya
anya-e0103n:512_4: sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ āpajjati. Alīnānuddhatatāya hi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ anirassādatāya
anya-e0103n:512_5: samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ. Samappavattiyā vā alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n:513_1: yuttappayuttatā. Sā pana yasmā samādhiṃ garuṃ katvā tattha ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena
anya-e0103n:514_0: 67. Paṭiladdhe nimittasmiṃ evaṃ hi sampādayato appanākosallaṃ imaṃ appanā sampavattatīti
anya-e0103n:514_1: sambandho. Sāti appanā. Hitvā hīti hi-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā ṭhānametaṃ na vijjati,
anya-e0103n:514_2: tasmā cittappavattiākāraṃ bhāvanācittassa līnuddhatādivasena pavattiākāraṃ sallakkhayaṃ
anya-e0103n:514_3: upadhārento. Samataṃ vīriyasseva vīriyassa samādhinā samarasataṃyeva yojayetha. Kathaṃ
anya-e0103n:514_4: pana yojayethāti āha “īsakampī”tiādi. Tattha layanti līnabhāvaṃ, saṅkocanti attho.
anya-e0103n:514_5: Yantanti gacchantaṃ, paggaṇhetheva samabhāvāyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “accāraddhaṃ nisedhetvā
anya-e0103n:514_6: samameva pavattaye”ti. Kathaṃ pana samameva pavattayeti āha “reṇumhī”tiādi. Yathāti
anya-e0103n:514_7: reṇuādīsu yathā madhukarādīnaṃ pavatti upamābhāvena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sammavaṇṇitā, evaṃ
anya-e0103n:514_8: līnuddhatabhāvehi mocayitvā vīriyasamatāyojanena nimittābhimukhaṃ mānasaṃ paṭipādaye
anya-e0103n:516_1: Achekoti akusalo. Pakkhandoti dhāvituṃ āraddho. Vikasanakkhaṇeyeva sarasaṃ kusumaparāgaṃ
anya-e0103n:516_2: hoti, pacchā vātādīhi paripatati, virasaṃ vā hoti. Tasmā nivattane reṇu khīyatīti
anya-e0103n:516_3: āha “khīṇe reṇumhi sampāpuṇātī”ti. Puppharāsinti rukkhasākhāsu nissitaṃ pupphasañcayaṃ.
anya-e0103n:517_1: ṭhapite. Satthakammanti sirāvedhanādisatthakammaṃ. Phusitumpi uppalapattanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:517_2: Samenāti purimakā viya garuṃ, mandañca payogaṃ akatvā samappamāṇena payogena. Tatthāti
anya-e0103n:518_0: Makkaṭakasuttanti lūtasuttaṃ. Niyāmako nāvāsārathī. Laṅkāranti kilañjādimayaṃ nāvākaṭasārakaṃ.
anya-e0103n:518_1: Telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūretīti sarāvādigatena telena achaḍḍento sukhumacchiddakaṃ
anya-e0103n:518_2: telanāḷiṃ pūreti. Evamevāti yathā te ādito vuttamadhukarasallakattaantevāsisuttākaḍḍhakaniyāmakatelapūrakā
anya-e0103n:518_3: vegena payogaṃ karonti, evameva yo bhikkhu “sīghaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti gāḷhaṃ
anya-e0103n:518_4: vīriyaṃ karoti, yo majjhe vuttamadhukarādayo viya vīriyaṃ na karoti, ime dvepi vīriyasamatābhāvena
anya-e0103n:518_5: appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkonti. Yo pana avasāne vuttamadhukarādayo viya samappayogo,
anya-e0103n:518_6: ayaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti vīriyasamatāyogatoti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:518_7: Tena vuttaṃ “eko bhikkhū”tiādi. Līnaṃ bhāvanācittanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:520_1: paṭibhāganimitteyeva ṭhapanavasena nimittābhimukhaṃ paṭipādayato assa yogino. Ijjhissatīti
anya-e0103n:520_2: samijjhissati, uppajjissatīti attho. Anuyogavasenāti bhāvanāvasena. Sesānīti sesāni
anya-e0103n:520_3: tīṇi, cattāri vā. Pakaticittehīti pākatikehi kāmāvacaracittehi. Balava…pe… cittekaggatāni
anya-e0103n:520_4: bhāvanābalena paṭutarasabhāvappattiyā. Parikammattāti paṭisaṅkhārakattā. Yadi āsannattā
anya-e0103n:520_5: upacāratā, gotrabhuno eva upacārasamaññā siyāti āha “samīpacārittā vā”ti. Anaccāsannopi
anya-e0103n:520_6: hi nātidūrapavattī samīpacārī nāma hoti. Appanaṃ upecca carantīti upacārāni. Ito
anya-e0103n:520_7: pubbe parikammānanti nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ parikammānaṃ. Etthāti etesu parikammupacārānulomasaññitesu.
anya-e0103n:520_8: Sabbantimanti tatiyaṃ, catutthaṃ vā. Parittagottābhibhavanatoti parittassa gottassa
anya-e0103n:520_9: abhibhavanato. Gaṃtāyatīti hi gottaṃ, “paritta”nti pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ, buddhiñca
anya-e0103n:520_10: ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti parittagottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena
anya-e0103n:520_11: vinā na pavattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena. Tasmā so tāni tāyati rakkhatīti
anya-e0103n:520_12: vuccati. Taṃ pana mahaggatānuttaravidhuraṃ kāmataṇhāya gocarabhūtaṃ kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:520_13: āveṇikarūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahaggatagottepi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Bhāvanatoti uppādanato.
anya-e0103n:521_0: Avisesena sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññāti paṭhamanayo gahitaggahaṇaṃ hotīti āha “aggahitaggahaṇenā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:521_1: Nānāvajjanaparikammameva parikammanti adhippāyena “paṭhamaṃ vā upacāra”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:521_2: Catutthaṃ appanācittaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ pubbe vuttanayena sace catutthaṃ
anya-e0103n:521_3: gotrabhu hotīti attho. Pañcamaṃ vāti vā-saddo aniyame. Svāyaṃ aniyamo iminā kāraṇenāti
anya-e0103n:521_4: dassetuṃ “tañca kho khippābhiññadandhābhiññavasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha khippābhiññassa
anya-e0103n:521_5: catutthaṃ appeti, dandhābhiññassa pañcamaṃ. Kasmā pana catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā appeti,
anya-e0103n:521_6: na tato paranti āha “tato paraṃ javanaṃ patatī”ti. Tato pañcamato paraṃ chaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:521_7: sattamañca javanaṃ patantaṃ viya hoti parikkhīṇajavattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:522_0: Yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamajavanaṃ dubbalattā gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti, laddhāsevanaṃ
anya-e0103n:522_1: pana balavabhāvato dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ uppādeti, evaṃ laddhāsevanatāya
anya-e0103n:522_2: balavabhāvato chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamampi appetīti therassa adhippāyo. Tenāha “tasmā chaṭṭhepi
anya-e0103n:522_3: sattamepi appanā hotī”ti. Tanti therassa vacanaṃ. Suttasuttānulomaācariyavādehi anupatthambhitattā
anya-e0103n:522_4: vuttaṃ “attanomatimatta”nti. “Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā”ti pana suttapadamakāraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:522_5: āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā. Tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi paṭhamacetanā
anya-e0103n:522_6: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti, laddhāsevanā dutiyacetanā yāva chaṭṭhacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyā.
anya-e0103n:522_8: Tattha yadi chaṭṭhasattamaṃ javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti parikkhīṇajavattā, kathaṃ sattamajavanacetanā
anya-e0103n:522_9: upapajjavedanīyā, ānantariyā ca hotīti? Nāyaṃ viseso āsevanapaccayalābhena balappattiyā.
anya-e0103n:522_10: Kiñcarahi kiriyāvatthāvisesato. Kiriyāvatthā hi ārambhamajjhapariyosānavasena tividhā.
anya-e0103n:522_11: Tattha ca pariyosānāvatthāya sanniṭṭhāpakacetanābhāvena upapajjavedanīyāditā hoti,
anya-e0103n:522_12: na balavabhāvenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa
anya-e0103n:522_13: anantarapaccayabhāvena tathā abhisaṅkhatattāti ca vadanti. Tasmā chaṭṭhasattamānaṃ
anya-e0103n:522_14: papātābhimukhatāya parikkhīṇajavatā na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Tathā hi “yathā hi puriso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:523_0: Sā ca pana appanā. Addhānaparicchedoti kālaparicchedo. So panettha sattasu ṭhānesu
anya-e0103n:523_1: katthaci aparimāṇacittakkhaṇatāya, katthaci atiittarakhaṇatāya natthīti vutto. Na
anya-e0103n:523_2: hettha sampuṇṇajavanavīthi addhā labbhati. Tenevāha “ettha maggānantaraphala”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:523_3: Sesaṭṭhānesūti paṭhamappanā, lokiyābhiññā, maggakkhaṇo, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa phalakkhaṇoti
anya-e0103n:524: Ettāvatāti ettakena bhāvanākkamena esa yogāvacaro paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Evaṃ viharatā ca anena tadeva paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:525_0: 70. Tatthāti tasmiṃ jhānapāṭhe. Viviccitvāti visuṃ hutvā. Tenāha “vinā hutvā apakkamitvā”ti,
anya-e0103n:525_1: pajahanavasena apasakkitvāti attho. Vivicceva kāmehīti ettha “viviccā”ti iminā vivecanaṃ
anya-e0103n:525_2: jhānakkhaṇe kāmānaṃ abhāvamattaṃ vuttaṃ. “Viviccevā”ti pana iminā ekaṃsato kāmānaṃ
anya-e0103n:525_3: vivecetabbatādīpanena tappaṭipakkhatā jhānassa, kāmavivekassa ca jhānādhigamūpāyatā
anya-e0103n:525_4: dassitā hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhamaṃ jhāna”ntiādiṃ vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ
anya-e0103n:525_5: kātuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. “Andhakāre sati padīpobhāso viyā”ti etena yathā padīpobhāsābhāvena
anya-e0103n:525_6: rattiyaṃ andhakārābhibhavo, evaṃ jhānābhāvena sattasantatiyaṃ kāmābhibhavoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:526_0: Etanti pubbapadeyeva avadhāraṇavacanaṃ. Na kho pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “kāmehi evā”ti
anya-e0103n:526_1: avadhāraṇassa akatattā. Nissaranti niggacchanti etena, ettha vāti nissaraṇaṃ. Ke
anya-e0103n:526_2: niggacchanti? Kāmā, tesaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ pahānaṃ tannissaraṇaṃ, tato. Kathaṃ
anya-e0103n:526_3: pana samāne vikkhambhane kāmānamevetaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, na byāpādādīnanti codanaṃ yuttito,
anya-e0103n:526_4: āgamato ca sodhetuṃ “kāmadhātū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kāmadhātusamatikkamanatoti sakalassapi
anya-e0103n:526_5: kāmabhavassa samatikkamapaṭipadābhāvato. Tena imassa jhānassa kāmapariññābhāvamāha.
anya-e0103n:526_7: yathā mettā byāpādassa, karuṇā vihiṃsāya, evamidaṃ jhānaṃ kāmarāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti
anya-e0103n:526_8: dasseti. Evamattano pavattiyā, vipākappavattiyā ca kāmarāgato, kāmadhātuto ca vinivattasabhāvattā
anya-e0103n:526_9: idaṃ jhānaṃ visesato kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Svāyamattho pāṭhagato evāti āha “yathāhā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:526_10: Kāmañcetamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ purimapadeyeva avadhāraṇaṃ gahitaṃ, uttarapadepi pana taṃ
anya-e0103n:526_11: gahetabbameva tathā atthasambhavatoti dassetuṃ “uttarapadepī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Itoti
anya-e0103n:526_13: tadaṅgavivekādayo. Cittakāyaupadhivivekā cittavivekādayo. Tayo eva idha jhānakathāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:527_0: Niddeseti mahāniddese. Tattha hi “uddānato dve kāmā – vatthukāmā kilesakāmā cā”ti
anya-e0103n:527_1: uddisitvā “tattha katame vatthukāmā? Manāpiyā rūpā…pe… manāpiyā phoṭṭhabbā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:527_2: vatthukāmā niddiṭṭhā. Te pana kāmīyantīti kāmāti veditabbā. Tatthevāti niddese eva.
anya-e0103n:527_3: Vibhaṅgeti jhānavibhaṅge. Patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho chandanaṭṭhena chando,
anya-e0103n:527_4: tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo, tatopi balavataro bahalarāgo chandarāgo. Nimittānubyañjanāni
anya-e0103n:527_5: saṅkappeti etenāti saṅkappo, tathāpavatto lobho, tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo,
anya-e0103n:527_6: saṅkappanavaseneva pavatto tatopi balavataro saṅkapparāgoti. Svāyaṃ pabhedo ekasseva
anya-e0103n:527_7: lobhassa pavattiākāravasena, avatthābhedavasena ca veditabbo yathā “vaccho dammo
anya-e0103n:527_8: balībaddo”ti. Ime kilesakāmā. Kāmentīti kāmā, kāmenti etehīti vā.
anya-e0103n:528_0: Evañhi satīti evaṃ ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati. Vatthukāmehipīti “vatthukāmehi
anya-e0103n:528_1: viviccevā”tipi attho yujjatīti evaṃ yujjamānatthantarasamuccayattho pi-saddo, na
anya-e0103n:528_2: kilesakāmasamuccayattho. Kasmā? Imasmiṃ atthe kilesakāmehi vivekassa dutiyapadena
anya-e0103n:528_3: vuttattā. Tenāti vatthukāmavivekena. Kāyaviveko vutto hoti puttadārādipariggahavivekadīpanato.
anya-e0103n:528_4: Purimenāti kāyavivekena. Etthāti “vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”ti
anya-e0103n:528_5: etasmiṃ padadvaye, ito vā niddhārite vivekadvaye. Akusala-saddena yadipi kilesakāmā,
anya-e0103n:528_6: sabbākusalāpi vā gahitā, sabbathā pana kilesakāmehi viveko vuttoti āha “dutiyena
anya-e0103n:528_7: kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato”ti. Dutiyenāti ca cittavivekenāti attho. Etesanti yathāvuttānaṃ
anya-e0103n:528_8: dvinnaṃ padānaṃ, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Taṇhādisaṃkilesānaṃ vatthuno pahānaṃ
anya-e0103n:528_9: saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ. Lolabhāvo nāma tattha tattha rūpādīsu taṇhuppādo, tassa
anya-e0103n:528_10: hetu vatthukāmā eva veditabbā. Bālabhāvo avijjā, duccintitacintitādi vā, tassa ayonisomanasikāro,
anya-e0103n:528_11: sabbepi vā akusalā dhammā hetu. Kāmaguṇādhigamahetupi pāṇātipātādiasuddhapayogo hotīti
anya-e0103n:528_13: ca ajjhāsayavisodhanaṃ āsayaposanaṃ. Kāmesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ.
anya-e0103n:529_1: Kāmacchandoyevāti kāmasabhāvoyeva chando, na kattukamyatāchando, nāpi kusalacchandoti
anya-e0103n:529_2: adhippāyo. Jhānapaṭipakkhatoti jhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvato taṃhetu tannimittaṃ visuṃ
anya-e0103n:529_3: vutto. Akusalabhāvasāmaññena aggahetvā visuṃ sarūpena gahito. Yadi kilesakāmova purimapade
anya-e0103n:530_1: jhānaṅgāni uparijhānaṅgāni, tesaṃ attano paccanīkānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvadassanato tappaccanīkanīvaraṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:530_2: Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni tesaṃ pavattinivāraṇato. Samādhi kāmacchandassa
anya-e0103n:530_3: paṭipakkho rāgappaṇidhiyā ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato, nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa
anya-e0103n:530_4: cittassa samādhānato ca. Pīti byāpādassa paṭipakkhā pāmojjena samānayogakkhemattā.
anya-e0103n:530_5: Vitakko thinamiddhassa paṭipakkho yoniso saṅkappanavasena savipphārapavattito. Sukhaṃ
anya-e0103n:530_7: Vicāro vicikicchāya paṭipakkho ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpaṭirūpasabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n:530_8: Mahākaccānattherena desitaṃ piṭakānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā peṭakaṃ, tasmiṃ peṭake.
anya-e0103n:531_5: hoti, hontampi kāmarāgādivikkhambhanasabhāvameva hoti taṃsabhāvattāti avisesetvā
anya-e0103n:532_0: 71. Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:532_1: “vitakkanaṃ vitakko”ti vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ “vitakkanaṃ īdisamida”nti ārammaṇassa parikappananti
anya-e0103n:532_2: āha “ūhananti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiniruḷhaṃ viya
anya-e0103n:532_3: hoti, tasmā so ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇo vutto. Yathā hi koci rājavallabhaṃ, taṃsambandhinaṃ
anya-e0103n:532_4: mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati, evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:532_5: ārohati. Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti? Vitakkabaleneva.
anya-e0103n:532_6: Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati, evaṃ paricayena
anya-e0103n:532_7: vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. Paricayenāti ca santāne pavattavitakkabhāvanāsaṅkhātena
anya-e0103n:532_8: paricayena. Vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhiruhaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:532_9: ciraparicitaṃ. Tena taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva. Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ
anya-e0103n:532_10: hutvā sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇavirahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati,
anya-e0103n:532_11: yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena
anya-e0103n:532_12: pavattati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ādito, abhimukhaṃ vā hananaṃ āhananaṃ. Parito,
anya-e0103n:532_13: parivattetvā vā āhananaṃ pariyāhananaṃ. “Rūpaṃ rūpaṃ, pathavī pathavī”ti ākoṭentassa
anya-e0103n:532_14: viya pavatti “āhananaṃ, pariyāhanana”nti ca veditabbaṃ. Ānayanaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe
anya-e0103n:533_0: Anusañcaraṇaṃ anuparibbhamanaṃ. Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno eva santāne pākaṭo
anya-e0103n:533_1: hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Anumajjanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa anumasanaṃ,
