anya-e0103n:533_2: parimajjananti attho. Tathā hi vicāro “parimajjanahattho viya, sañcaraṇahattho viyā”ti
anya-e0103n:533_3: ca vutto. Tatthāti ārammaṇe. Sahajātānaṃ anuyojanaṃ ārammaṇe anuvicāraṇasaṅkhātaanumajjanavaseneva
anya-e0103n:533_4: veditabbaṃ. Anuppabandhanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavatti. Tathā hi
anya-e0103n:533_5: so “anusandhānatā”ti niddiṭṭho. Teneva ca “ghaṇḍānuravo viya, paribbhamanaṃ viyā”ti ca vutto.
anya-e0103n:534_0: Katthacīti paṭhamajjhāne, parittacittuppādesu ca. Vicārato oḷārikaṭṭhena, vicārasseva
anya-e0103n:534_1: ca pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena anuravato oḷāriko, tassa ca pubbaṅgamo ghaṇḍābhighāto viya vitakko.
anya-e0103n:534_2: Yathā hi ghaṇḍābhighāto paṭhamābhinipāto hoti, evaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaniropanaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:534_3: vitakko cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto hoti. Abhighāta-ggahaṇena cettha abhighātajo saddo
anya-e0103n:534_4: gahitoti veditabbo. Vipphāravāti vicalanayutto saparipphando. Paribbhamanaṃ viya
anya-e0103n:534_5: parissayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ. Anuppabandhena pavattiyanti upacāre vā appanāyaṃ vā
anya-e0103n:534_6: santānena pavattiyaṃ. Tattha hi vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya
anya-e0103n:534_7: pavattati, na paṭhamābhinipāte. Pākaṭo hotīti vitakkassa viseso abhiniropanākāro
anya-e0103n:534_8: oḷārikattā paṭhamajjhāne pākaṭo hoti, tadabhāvato pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne vicārassa
anya-e0103n:535_0: Vālaṇḍupakaṃ eḷakalomādīhi katacumbaṭakaṃ. Uppīḷanahatthoti piṇḍassa uppīḷanahattho.
anya-e0103n:535_1: Tasseva ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho. Maṇḍalanti kaṃsabhājanādīsu kiñci maṇḍalaṃ vaṭṭalekhaṃ
anya-e0103n:535_3: saphalo”ti voharīyati, evaṃ vitakkādiaṅgavinimuttaṃ avijjamānampi jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ
anya-e0103n:535_4: savicāra”nti voharīyatīti dassetuṃ “rukkho viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Jhānabhāvanāya puggalavasena
anya-e0103n:535_5: desetabbattā “idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānena jhānāni uddiṭṭhānīti.
anya-e0103n:535_6: Yadipi vibhaṅge puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā, attho pana tatrāpi vibhaṅgepi yathā
anya-e0103n:535_7: idha “iminā ca vitakkenā”tiādinā dhammavasena vutto, evameva daṭṭhabbo, paramatthato
anya-e0103n:535_8: puggalasseva abhāvatoti adhippāyo. Attho…pe… daṭṭhabbo jhānasamaṅgino vitakkavicārasamaṅgitādassanena,
anya-e0103n:535_9: jhānasseva ca savitakkasavicāratāya vuttattāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:536_0: Vivekāti vivekā hetubhūtāti viveka-saddassa bhāvasādhanataṃ sandhāyāha. Viveketi
anya-e0103n:536_1: kattusādhanataṃ, kammasādhanataṃ vā. “Vivitto”ti hi iminā nīvaraṇehi vinābhūto tehi
anya-e0103n:537_0: 72. Pīṇayatīti tappeti, vaḍḍheti vā. Sampiyāyanalakkhaṇāti paritussanalakkhaṇā. Pīṇanarasāti
anya-e0103n:537_1: paribrūhanarasā. Pharaṇarasāti paṇītarūpehi kāyassa byāpanarasā. Udaggabhāvo odagyaṃ.
anya-e0103n:537_2: Khuddikā lahuṃ lomahaṃsanamattaṃ katvā bhinnā na puna uppajjati. Khaṇikā bahulaṃ
anya-e0103n:537_3: uppajjati. Ubbegato pharaṇā niccalattā, ciraṭṭhitikattā ca paṇītatarā. Cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:537_4: gantvāti puṇṇavallikavihāre cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā. Pakatiyā diṭṭhārammaṇavasenāti pubbe
anya-e0103n:537_5: mahācetiyaṃ gahitārammaṇavasena. Citrageṇḍuko vicitrākārena katageṇḍuko. Upanissayeti
anya-e0103n:537_6: samīpe, tassa vā vihārassa nissayabhūte, gocaraṭṭhānabhūteti attho.
anya-e0103n:538_0: Gharājireti gehaṅgaṇe. Pabbatasikhare katacetiyaṃ “ākāsacetiya”nti vuttaṃ. Gahitanimittenevāti
anya-e0103n:538_2: kāraṇabhūtena. Gahitaṃ vā nimittaṃ etenāti gahitanimittaṃ, vuttākārena pavattacittaṃ,
anya-e0103n:538_3: tena gahitanimitteneva cittena saha. Pakkhandanti anupaviṭṭhaṃ. Anuparipphuṭanti
anya-e0103n:538_4: anu anu samantato phuṭaṃ, sabbaso anuvisaṭanti attho.
anya-e0103n:539_0: Passaddhiyā nimittabhāvena gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī. Paripācanavasena paripākaṃ gacchantī.
anya-e0103n:539_1: Appanāsampayuttāva pīti appanāsamādhipūrikā. Khaṇikasamādhipūrikā ca upacārasamādhipūrikā
anya-e0103n:539_2: ca appanāsamādhissa vidūratarāti tadubhayaṃ anāmasanto “tāsu yā appanāsamādhissā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:539_3: Samādhisampayogaṃ gatāti pubbe upacārasamādhinā sampayuttā hutvā anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā
anya-e0103n:540_0: 73. Sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, attanā sampayuttadhamme laddhassāde karotīti attho. Svāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:540_1: kattuniddeso pariyāyaladdho dhammato aññassa kattu nivattanattho, nippariyāyena pana
anya-e0103n:540_2: bhāvasādhanameva labbhatīti “sukhanaṃ sukha”nti vuttaṃ. Iṭṭhasabhāvattā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ,
anya-e0103n:540_3: sampayuttadhamme vā attani sādayatīti sātaṃ da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Sātaṃ “madhura”nti
anya-e0103n:540_4: vadanti. Sātaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sātalakkhaṇaṃ. Upabrūhanaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:540_5: saṃvaḍḍhanaṃ. Dukkhaṃ viya avissajjetvā adukkhamasukhā viya anajjhupekkhitvā anu
anya-e0103n:540_6: anu gaṇhanaṃ, upakāritā vā anuggaho. Katthaci paṭhamajjhānādike. Paṭilābhatuṭṭhīti
anya-e0103n:540_8: anubhavananti sabhāvato pītisukhāni vibhajitvā dasseti. Yattha pīti, tattha sukhanti
anya-e0103n:540_9: vitakkassa viya itarena pītiyā sukhena accantasaṃyogamāha. “Yattha sukhaṃ, tattha
anya-e0103n:540_10: na niyamato pītī”ti vicārassa viya vitakkena sukhassa pītiyā anaccantasaṃyogaṃ. Tena
anya-e0103n:540_11: accantānaccantasaṃyogitāya pītisukhānaṃ visesaṃ dasseti. Kaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāraṃ,
anya-e0103n:540_12: nirudakamaruṭṭhānaṃ. Vanameva vanantaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samayeti iṭṭhārammaṇassa paṭilābhasamaye,
anya-e0103n:541_0: Vivekajaṃ pītisukhanti ettha purimasmiṃ atthe vivekajanti jhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Pītisukhasaddato
anya-e0103n:541_1: ca atthiatthavisesato “assa jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāne”ti ettha a-kāro daṭṭhabbo. Dutiye
anya-e0103n:541_3: ca alopo kato. Lope vā sati “vivekajapītisukha”nti pāṭhoti ayaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n:542_0: Upasampajjāti ettha upa-saṃ-saddā “upalabbhati, saṃbhuñjatī”tiādīsu viya niratthakāti
anya-e0103n:542_1: dassetuṃ “upagantvā”tiādiṃ vatvā puna tesaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “upasampādayitvā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:542_2: vuttaṃ, tasmā patvā, sādhetvāti vā attho. Iriyanti kiriyaṃ. Vuttiādīni tasseva vevacanāni.
anya-e0103n:542_3: Pālanāti hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ iriyāpathantarehi rakkhaṇā.
anya-e0103n:544_0: 74. Pañca aṅgāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīnāni etassāti pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ. “Agyāhito”ti
anya-e0103n:544_1: ettha āhita-saddassa viya vippahīna-saddassettha paravacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, pañcahi
anya-e0103n:544_2: aṅgehi vippahīnanti vā pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ. Nanu aññepi akusalā dhammā iminā jhānena
anya-e0103n:544_3: pahīyanti, atha kasmā pañcaṅgavippahīnatāva vuccatīti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Jhānalābhinopi
anya-e0103n:544_5: vuttaṃ. Pahīyantīti vigacchanti, nappavattantīti attho. Ekattārammaṇeti pathavīkasiṇādivasena
anya-e0103n:544_6: ekasabhāve, ekaggatāsaṅkhāte ekattāvahe vā ārammaṇe. Tanti taṃ nānāvisayapalobhitaṃ
anya-e0103n:544_7: cittaṃ. Kāmadhātuppahānāyāti nānāvisayasamūpabyūḷhāya kāmadhātuyā pahānāya samatikkamāya
anya-e0103n:544_8: paṭipadaṃ jhānaṃ nappaṭipajjati. Nirantaranti vikkhepena anantaritaṃ, sahitanti attho.
anya-e0103n:544_9: Akammaññanti akammanīyaṃ, bhāvanākammassa ayogyanti attho. Uddhaccakukkuccaparetanti
anya-e0103n:544_10: uddhaccakukkuccena abhibhūtaṃ. Paribbhamati anavaṭṭhānato, avaṭṭhānassa samādhānassa
anya-e0103n:544_11: abhāvatoti attho. Vicikicchāya upahatanti sātisayassa vicārassa abhāvato “sammāsambuddho
anya-e0103n:544_12: nu kho bhagavā, na nu kho”ti, “pathavī pathavī”tiādinā manasikārena, “jhānaṃ siyā
anya-e0103n:544_13: nu kho, na nu kho”tiādinā ca pavattāya vicikicchāya upahataṃ. Nārohati appaṭipattinimittattā.
anya-e0103n:544_14: Visesena jhānantarāyakarattāti samādhiādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvena jhānādhigamassa antarāyakaraṇato.
anya-e0103n:545_0: Tehīti jhānādhigamassa paccayabhūtehi vitakkavicārehi. Avikkhepāya sampāditappayogassāti
anya-e0103n:545_1: tato evaṃ samādhānāya nipphāditabhāvanāpayogassa. Cetaso payogasampattisambhavāti
anya-e0103n:545_3: bhāvanāvasena parivuddhiṃ cetaso karotīti sambandho. Nanti cittaṃ. Sasesasampayuttadhammanti
anya-e0103n:545_4: avasiṭṭhaphassādidhammasahitaṃ, samaṃ sammā ca ādhiyatīti sambandho. Indriyasamatāvasena
anya-e0103n:545_5: samaṃ, paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ. Dūrībhāve līnuddhaccābhāvena sammā ca ṭhapetīti attho.
anya-e0103n:545_6: Ekaggatā hi samādhānakiccena cittaṃ, sampayuttadhamme ca attānaṃ anuvattāpentī jhānakkhaṇe
anya-e0103n:545_7: sātisayaṃ samāhite karotīti. Uppattivasenāti yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjanavasena. Etesu
anya-e0103n:545_8: vitakkādīsu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti tattheva jhānavohārato. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:546_0: Pakaticittatoti pākatikakāmāvacaracittato. Suvisadenāti suṭṭhu visadena, paṭutarenāti
anya-e0103n:546_1: attho. Sabbāvantanti sabbāvayavavantaṃ, anavasesanti attho. Apphuṭanti asamphuṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:546_2: Ārammaṇesu phusitāti appanāvasena pavattamānā cittekaggatā samantato ārammaṇaṃ pharantī
anya-e0103n:546_3: viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Kasmā panettha jhānapāṭhe aggahitā cittekaggatā gahitāti
anya-e0103n:546_4: anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha cittekaggatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu jhānaṅgesu. Na
anya-e0103n:546_5: niddiṭṭhāti sarūpato na niddiṭṭhā, sāmaññato pana jhānaggahaṇena gahitā. Evaṃ vuttattāti
anya-e0103n:546_6: sarūpeneva vuttattā, aṅgameva cittekaggatāti sambandho. Yena adhippāyenāti yena vitakkādīhi
anya-e0103n:546_7: saha vattantaṃ dhammaṃ dīpetuṃ tassa pakāsanādhippāyena “savitakkaṃ savicāra”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:546_8: uddeso kato. So eva adhippāyo tena bhagavatā vibhaṅge “cittekaggatā”ti niddisantena
anya-e0103n:546_9: pakāsito. Tasmā sā jhānapāṭhe aggahitāti na cintetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:548: 75. Ādimajjhapariyosānavasenāti jhānassa ādimajjhapariyosānavasena. Lakkhaṇavasenāti tesaṃyeva appanāyaṃ lakkhitabbabhāvavasena.
anya-e0103n:549_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ kalyāṇatālakkhaṇānaṃ vibhāvane. Paṭipadāvisuddhīti paṭipajjati jhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:549_1: etāyāti paṭipadā, gotrabhupariyosāno pubbabhāgiyo bhāvanānayo. Paripanthato visujjhanaṃ
anya-e0103n:549_2: visuddhi, paṭipadāya visuddhi paṭipadāvisuddhi. Sā panāyaṃ yasmā jhānassa uppādakkhaṇe
anya-e0103n:549_3: labbhati, tasmā vuttaṃ “paṭipadāvisuddhi ādī”ti. Upekkhānubrūhanāti visodhetabbatādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:549_4: abhāvato jhānapariyāpannāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā. Sā
anya-e0103n:549_5: panāyaṃ visesato jhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhati. Tena vuttaṃ “upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe”ti.
anya-e0103n:549_6: Sampahaṃsanāti tattha dhammānaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena
anya-e0103n:549_7: pariyodapanā. Sā pana yasmā jhānassa osānakkhaṇe pākaṭā hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “sampahaṃsanā
anya-e0103n:549_8: pariyosāna”nti. Imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇānīti paripanthato cittassa visujjhanākāro, majjhimassa
anya-e0103n:549_9: samathanimittassa paṭipajjanākāro, tattha pakkhandanākāroti imāni tīṇi jhānassa ādito
anya-e0103n:549_10: uppādakkhaṇe appanāpattilakkhaṇāni tehi ākārehi vinā appanāpattiyā abhāvato, asati
anya-e0103n:549_11: ca appanāya tadabhāvato. Ādikalyāṇañceva visuddhipaṭipadattā. Yathāvuttehi lakkhaṇehi
anya-e0103n:549_12: samannāgatattā, sampannalakkhaṇattā ca tilakkhaṇasampannañca. Iminā nayena majjhapariyosānalakkhaṇānañca yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:550_0: Sambharīyati jhānaṃ etenāti sambhāro, nānāvajjanaparikammaṃ. Saha sambhārenāti sasambhāro,
anya-e0103n:550_1: so eva sasambhāriko. Upacāroti ekāvajjanūpacāramāha. Paggahādikiccassa pubbabhāge
anya-e0103n:550_2: bhāvanāya eva sādhitattā yā tattha ekāvajjanūpacāre siddhā ajjhupekkhanā, sā jhānakkhaṇe
anya-e0103n:550_3: paribrūhitā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā”ti. Yathādhigataṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:550_4: nissāya yo pahaṭṭhākāro cittassa paritoso, taṃ paccavekkhaṇāvasena pavattaṃ sandhāyāha
anya-e0103n:550_5: “sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇā”ti. Eketi abhayagirivāsino. Te hi evaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiādike
anya-e0103n:550_6: vaṇṇayanti, tadayuttaṃ. Tathā hi sati ajjhānadhammehi jhānassa guṇasaṃkittanaṃ nāma
anya-e0103n:550_7: kataṃ hoti. Na hi bhūmantaraṃ bhūmantarapariyāpannaṃ hoti. Pāḷiyā cetaṃ viruddhanti
anya-e0103n:550_8: dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ekattagataṃ cittanti indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena,
anya-e0103n:550_9: ekaggatāya ca sikhāppattiyā tadanuguṇaṃ ekattaṃ gatanti ekattagataṃ, sasampayuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:550_10: appanāpattacittaṃ. Tasseva paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandatādi anantarameva vuccati. Tasmāti
anya-e0103n:550_11: yasmā ekasmiṃyeva appanācittakkhaṇe paṭipadāvisuddhiādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā āgamanavasenāti
anya-e0103n:551_0: Tasminti tasmiṃ vāre, catupañcacittaparimāṇāya appanāvīthiyanti attho. Tato paripanthato.
anya-e0103n:551_1: Cittaṃ visujjhatīti yadipi āgamanaṃ gahetuṃ avisesena viya vuttaṃ, parikammavisuddhito
anya-e0103n:551_2: pana appanāvisuddhi sātisayāva. Tenāha “visuddhattā”tiādi. Āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvāti
anya-e0103n:551_3: yenāvaraṇena āvaṭattā cittaṃ tato pubbe majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjituṃ na
anya-e0103n:551_4: sakkoti, tena vivittaṃ hutvā, taṃ vikkhambhetvāti attho. Līnuddhaccasaṅkhātānaṃ ubhinnaṃ
anya-e0103n:551_5: antānaṃ anupagamanena majjhimo, savisesaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ vūpasamanato samatho,
anya-e0103n:551_6: yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato nimittañcāti majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:551_7: “samappavatto appanāsamādhiyevā”ti. Tadanantaraṃ pana purimacittanti tassa appanācittassa
anya-e0103n:551_8: anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ, gotrabhucittanti attho. Ekasantatipariṇāmanayenāti
anya-e0103n:551_9: yathā “tadeva khīraṃ dadhisampanna”nti, evaṃ satipi parittamahaggatabhāvabhede, paccayapaccayuppannabhāvabhede
anya-e0103n:551_10: ca ekissā eva santatiyā pariṇāmūpagamananayena ekattanayavasena. Tathattanti tathabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:551_11: appanāsamādhivasena samāhitabhāvaṃ. Evaṃ paṭipannattāti vuttākārena paṭipajjamānattā.
anya-e0103n:551_12: Yasmiñhi khaṇe tathattaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe
anya-e0103n:551_13: tathattupagamanena appanāsamādhinā samāhitabhāvūpagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma.
anya-e0103n:551_14: Purimacitteti appanācittassa purimasmiṃ citte gotrabhucitte. Vijjamānākāranipphādikāti
anya-e0103n:551_16: nipphādikā, tenākārena nipphajjamānāti attho. Teyeva hi ākārā paccayavisesato jhānakkhaṇe
anya-e0103n:551_17: nipphajjamānā “paṭipadāvisuddhī”ti laddhasamaññā jhānassa taṃ visesaṃ nipphādentā
anya-e0103n:551_18: viya vuttā. Uppādakkhaṇeyevāti attalābhavelāyameva. Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ te ākārā nipphajjantīti
anya-e0103n:552_0: Tassāti cittassa. “Visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti pāḷiyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena āgatāti
anya-e0103n:552_2: āha “samathabhāvūpagamanenā”ti. Kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassāti pubbe
anya-e0103n:552_3: “kathaṃ nu kho kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pajaheyya”nti paṭipannassa idāni samathapaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n:552_4: tassa pahīnattā kilesasaṅgaṇikābhāvena ekattena upaṭṭhitassa jhānacittassa. Paripanthavisuddhimajjhimasamathapaṭipattipakkhandanehi
anya-e0103n:552_5: vuddhippattiyā anubrūhite jhānacitte laddhokāsā tatramajjhattupekkhā sampayuttesu
anya-e0103n:552_6: samavāhitabhāvena pavattamānā te anubrūhentī viya hotīti āha “tatramajjhattupekkhāya
anya-e0103n:553_0: Ye panete yuganaddhadhammāti sambandho. Tatthāti tasmiṃ jhānacitte. Aññamaññānativattanavasena
anya-e0103n:553_1: kiccakaraṇato yuge naddhā baddhā viya yuganaddhā. Vimuttirasenāti vimuccanakiccena,
anya-e0103n:553_2: vimuccanasampattiyā vā. Esa yogī. Vāhayatīti pavatteti. Assāti jhānacittassa. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:553_3: khaṇeti bhaṅgakkhaṇe. Uppādakkhaṇe atīte hi ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya āsevanā pavattati
anya-e0103n:553_4: nāma. Te ākārāti aññamaññānativattanādayo tattha dhammānaṃ pavattiākārā. Āsevanāpi
anya-e0103n:553_5: hi āsevanapaccayabhāvīnaṃ dhammānaṃ pavattiākāroyeva. Saṃkilesavodānesūti samādhipaññānaṃ
anya-e0103n:553_6: samarasatāya akaraṇaṃ bhāvanāya saṃkileso, karaṇaṃ vodānaṃ. Tathā sesesupi. Evametesu
anya-e0103n:553_7: saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ guṇaṃ puretaraṃ pāṭihāriyañāṇena
anya-e0103n:553_8: disvā yathā aññamaññānativattanādayo honti, tathā bhāvanāya sampahaṃsitattā teneva
anya-e0103n:553_9: ñāṇena visodhitattā. Visodhanaṃ hettha sampahaṃsanaṃ. Te ākārā yasmā nipphannā, tasmā
anya-e0103n:553_10: “dhammānaṃ…pe… veditabbāti vutta”nti lakkhaṇasaṃvaṇṇanāya ādimhi vuttaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.
anya-e0103n:554_0: “Yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti ko sambandho. Kasmā sampahaṃsanāva pariyosānanti
anya-e0103n:554_1: vuttā, na upekkhānubrūhanāti codanaṃ sandhāya “tattha yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0103n:554_2: hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ bhāvanācitte. Upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti
anya-e0103n:554_3: appanākāle bhāvanāya samappavattiyā, paṭipakkhassa ca pahānato paggahādīsu byāpārassa
anya-e0103n:554_4: akātabbato ajjhupekkhanāva hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “samaye cittassa ajjhupekkhanā,
anya-e0103n:554_5: visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti ca ādi. Sā panāyaṃ ajjhupekkhanā ñāṇassa kiccasiddhiyā
anya-e0103n:554_6: hoti, visesato ñāṇasādhanattā appanābyāpārassāti phalena kāraṇānumānañāyena. Yasmā
anya-e0103n:554_7: upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, tasmā ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā pariyosānanti vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:555_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tathāpaggahitaṃ
anya-e0103n:555_1: cittanti yathā bhāvanācittaṃ kosajjapakkhe na patati, tathā vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:555_2: dhammānaṃ bahulīkāravasena paggahitaṃ. Sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhatīti paggaṇhantenāpi samādhissa
anya-e0103n:555_4: okāsaṃ labhati. Taṃ pana ajjhupekkhanaṃ upekkhāvasena pubbe pavattapārihāriyapaññāvasena
anya-e0103n:555_5: appanāpaññāya kiccādhikatāti āha “paññāvasena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti. Tassa
anya-e0103n:555_6: adhimattattā eva ajjhupekkhantasseva nānāsabhāvehi nīvaraṇapamukhehi kilesehi appanācittaṃ
anya-e0103n:555_7: vimuccati. Vimokkhavasena vimuccanavasena. Paññāvasenāti pubbe pavattapārihāriyapaññāvasena.
anya-e0103n:555_8: Vimuttattāti nānākilesehi vimuttattā eva. Te dhammā saddhādayo, visesato saddhāpaññāvīriyasamādhayo
anya-e0103n:555_9: ca ekarasā samānakiccā honti. Evamayaṃ indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā nipphajjamānā
anya-e0103n:555_10: ñāṇabyāpāroti āha “ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna”nti. Evaṃ tividhāya paṭipadāvisuddhiyā
anya-e0103n:555_11: laddhavisesāya tividhāya upekkhānubrūhanāya sātisayaṃ paññindriyassa adhimuttabhāvena
anya-e0103n:555_12: catubbidhāpi sampahaṃsanā sijjhatīti āgamanupekkhā ñāṇakiccavasena dasapi ākārā jhāne eva veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:556_0: Gaṇanānupubbatāti gaṇanānupubbatāya, gaṇanānupubbatāmattaṃ vā paṭhamanti idanti attho.
anya-e0103n:556_1: Tena desanākkamaṃ ulliṅgeti. “Paṭhamaṃ uppannanti paṭhama”nti iminā paṭipattikkamaṃ,
anya-e0103n:556_2: uppannanti hi adhigatanti attho. “Paṭhamaṃ samāpajjitabbanti paṭhama”nti idaṃ pana
anya-e0103n:556_3: na ekantalakkhaṇanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭisiddhattā idha na gahitaṃ. Ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:556_5: vuttaṃ. Pathavīkasiṇasaṅkhātassa attano attano ārammaṇassa rūpaṃ viya cakkhunā upanijjhāyanato.
anya-e0103n:556_7: pajahanato. Sakalaṭṭhenāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena kate vā akate vā paricchijja gahite
anya-e0103n:556_8: pathavībhāge pathavīmaṇḍale sakalārammaṇakaraṇaṭṭhena. Na hi tassa ekadesamārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:556_9: karīyati. Pathavīkasiṇasannissayatāya nimittaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0103n:556_10: karontī”ti. Taṃsahacaraṇato jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:558_0: 76. Lakkhaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sarena vālaṃ vijjhatīti vālavedhī. Idha pana anekadhā bhinnassa
anya-e0103n:558_1: vālassa aṃsuṃ vijjhanto “vālavedhī”ti adhippeto. Tena vālavedhinā. Sūdenāti bhattakārena.
anya-e0103n:558_2: “Ākārā pariggahetabbā”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:558_3: Tattha sukusaloti suṭṭhu cheko. Dhanuggahoti issāso. Kammanti yogyaṃ. Akkantapadānanti
anya-e0103n:558_4: vijjhanakāle akkamanavasena pavattapadānaṃ. Ākāranti dhanujiyāsarānaṃ gahitākāraṃ.
anya-e0103n:558_5: Pariggaṇheyyāti upadhāreyya. Bhojanasappāyādayoti ādi-saddo avuttākārānampi saṅgāhako
anya-e0103n:558_6: daṭṭhabbo. Tena utubhāvanānimittādīnampi pariggaṇhanaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Tasminti tasmiṃ taruṇasamādhimhi.
anya-e0103n:559_0: Bhattāranti sāminaṃ, bhattavetanādīhi posakanti attho. Parivisantoti bhojento. Tassa
anya-e0103n:559_1: ruccitvā bhuñjanākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tassa upanāmentoti yojanā. Ayampi yogī. Adhigatakkhaṇe
anya-e0103n:559_2: bhojanādayo ākāreti pubbe jhānassa adhigatakkhaṇe kiccasādhake bhojanādigate ākāre.
anya-e0103n:559_3: Gahetvāti pariggahetvā sallakkhetvā. Naṭṭhe naṭṭhe samādhimhi punappunaṃ appanāya.
anya-e0103n:560_0: Mahānasavijjāparicayena paṇḍito. Tattha visadañāṇatāya byatto. Ṭhānuppattikakaosallayogena
anya-e0103n:560_1: kusalo. Nānaccayehīti nānaccayehi nānāsabhāvehi, nānārasehīti attho. Tenāha “ambilaggehī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:560_2: Sūpehīti byañjanehi. Ambilaggehīti ambilakoṭṭhāsehi, ye vā ambilarasā hutvā aggabhūtā,
anya-e0103n:560_3: tehi caturambilādimissehi. Esa nayo tittakaggādīsupi. Khārikehīti vātiṅgaṇakaḷīrādimissehi.
anya-e0103n:560_4: Nimittanti ākāraṃ ruccanavasena bhuñjanākāraṃ. Uggaṇhātīti uparūpari gaṇhāti upadhāreti.
anya-e0103n:560_5: Imassa vā sūpeyyassa atthāya hatthaṃ abhiharati. Abhihārānanti abhimukhena haritabbānaṃ
anya-e0103n:560_6: paṇṇākārānaṃ, pūjābhihārānaṃ vā. Nimittaṃ uggaṇhātīti “evaṃ me cittaṃ samāhitaṃ ahosī”ti
anya-e0103n:561_1: Suvisodhitattāti suṭṭhu visodhitattā, vikkhambhanavaseneva sammadeva pahīnattāti
anya-e0103n:561_3: saṅgaṇhāti. Nekkhammaguṇadassanenāpi hi tassa vibandhabhūte kāmacchande ādīnavo visesato
anya-e0103n:561_4: pākaṭo hotīti. Kāyaduṭṭhullanti kāyadarathaṃ sāraddhakāyataṃ. Tena kāyacittānaṃ sārambhanimittassa
anya-e0103n:561_5: byāpādanīvaraṇassa na visodhanamāha. Ārambhadhātumanasikārādīti ādi-saddena vīriyasambojjhaṅganimittānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:561_6: ālokasaññādīnañca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Samathanimittamanasikārādīti ādi-saddena samādhisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:561_7: dhammānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Aññepi samādhiparipantheti vicikicchāṭṭhāniye, madamānādike
anya-e0103n:561_8: ca sandhāyāha. Āsayanti vasanakasusiraṃ. Suparisuddhanti āsaṅkanīyattābhāvena suṭṭhu
anya-e0103n:561_9: parisuddhaṃ. Etthāha – nanu cāyaṃ pageva kāmādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā samathapaṭipadaṃ
anya-e0103n:561_10: paṭipanno upacārakkhaṇeyeva jhānena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāni, atha kasmā puna kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādi
anya-e0103n:561_11: gahitanti? Saccametaṃ. Taṃ pana pahānamattanti jhānassa ciraṭṭhitiyā atisayapahānatthaṃ puna gahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:562_0: Uddhacca middhanti kukkuccaṃ, thinañca tadekaṭṭhatāya gahitamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:562_1: Suddhantagatoti suparisuddhapariyantaṃ sabbaso visodhitakoṇapariyantaṃ uyyānaṃ gato.
anya-e0103n:562_2: Tahiṃ rameti tasmiṃ jhāne rameyya divasabhāgampi jhānasamaṅgī eva bhaveyya.
anya-e0103n:563_0: Cittabhāvanāvepullatthanti samādhibhāvanāya vipulabhāvāya. Yathā hi bhāvanāvasena
anya-e0103n:563_1: nimittassa uppatti, evamassa bhāvanāvaseneva vaḍḍhanampi. Tasmā ekaṅgulādivasena
anya-e0103n:563_2: nimittaṃ vaḍḍhentassa punappunaṃ bahulīkārena jhānaṃ bhāvanāpi vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ
anya-e0103n:565_0: 77. Tatrāti sāmiatthe bhummavacanaṃ, tassāti attho. Avaḍḍhetvāti yathā kumbhakāro
anya-e0103n:565_1: mattikāya pattaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ aparicchinditvāva pattaṃ vaḍḍheti, evaṃ pattavaḍḍhanayogena
anya-e0103n:565_2: pattavaḍḍhanayuttiyā avaḍḍhetvā pūvikassa pūvavaḍḍhanaṃ. Bhattassa upari bhattapakkhipanaṃ
anya-e0103n:565_3: bhattavaḍḍhanaṃ. Vatthassa tintassa añchanādi dussavaḍḍhanaṃ. Paccekaṃ yoga-saddo
anya-e0103n:565_4: yojetabbo. Aparicchinditvā na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ saparicchede eva bhāvanāpavattito. Tathā
anya-e0103n:566: Haṃsapotakāti javanahaṃsapotakā. Ukkūlaṃ unnataṭṭhānaṃ. Vikūlaṃ ninnaṭṭhānaṃ. Nadīsotena kataṃ viduggaṃ nadīviduggaṃ. Visamākārena ṭhito pabbatapadeso pabbatavisamo.
anya-e0103n:567_0: Thūlāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti paccavekkhaṇābāhullena vibhūtabhāvato. Dubbalāni hutvā
anya-e0103n:567_1: upaṭṭhahanti paguṇabalavabhāvassa anāpādikattā. Upari ussukkanāyāti bhāvanāya upari
anya-e0103n:568_0: Pabbateyyāti pabbate bahulacārinī. Akhettaññūti agocaraññū. Samādhiparipanthānaṃ
anya-e0103n:568_1: visodhanānabhiññātāya bālo. Jhānassa paguṇabhāvāpādanaveyyattiyassa abhāvena abyatto.
anya-e0103n:568_3: akusalo. Samādhinimittassa vā anāsevanāya bālo. Abhāvanāya abyatto. Abahulīkārena
anya-e0103n:568_4: akhettaññū. Sammadeva anadhiṭṭhānato akusaloti yojetabbaṃ. Ubhato bhaṭṭhoti ubhayato
anya-e0103n:568_5: jhānato bhaṭṭho. So hi appaguṇatāya na suppatiṭṭhitatāya saussāhopi vināsato, asāmatthiyato
anya-e0103n:570_0: 78. Vasanaṃ vasīti dhātuniddesatāya kiriyāniddesoti adhippāyenāha “vasiyo”ti, yathāruci
anya-e0103n:570_1: pavattiyoti attho. Āvajjanāya vasī, āvajjanāvasena vā vasī āvajjanavasī. Jhānaṃ āvajjituṃ
anya-e0103n:570_2: yattha yattha padese icchā yatthicchakaṃ. Yadā yadā, yasmiṃ yasmiṃ vā jhānaṅge icchā
anya-e0103n:570_3: yadicchakaṃ. Yāva yāva icchā yāvadicchakaṃ, da-kāro padasandhikaro. “Yāvā”ti ca idaṃ
anya-e0103n:570_4: bahūnaṃ javanavārānaṃ nirantaraṃ viya tathāpavattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na ekameva.
anya-e0103n:570_5: So hi paricchinnacittakkhaṇoti. Āvajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti vuttanayena yattha
anya-e0103n:570_6: katthaci ṭhāne yadā yadā yaṃ kiñci jhānaṅgaṃ āvajjentassa yathicchitaṃ kālaṃ āvajjanāya
anya-e0103n:570_7: āvajjanappavattiyā dandhāyitattaṃ vitthāyitattaṃ, cirāyitattaṃ vā natthi. Evaṃ āvajjanavasī
anya-e0103n:570_8: siddhā nāma hotīti attho. Sesāti vuṭṭhānaadhiṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇāvasiyo.
anya-e0103n:571_0: Aṅgasamudāyabhāvato jhānassa jhāne āvajjanavasiṃ nipphādetukāmena paṭipāṭiyā jhānaṅgāni
anya-e0103n:571_1: āvajjetabbānīti āha “paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato”ti. Yadipi āvajjanamevettha icchitaṃ
anya-e0103n:571_2: āvajjanavasiyā adhippetattā, āvajjanāya pana uppannāya javanehi bhavitabbaṃ. Tāni
anya-e0103n:571_3: ca kho āvajjanatapparatāya cittābhinīhārassa yathāvajjitajhānaṅgārammaṇāni katipayāneva
anya-e0103n:571_4: honti, na paripuṇṇānīti vuttaṃ “vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri pañca vā javanāni javantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:571_5: Cattāri tikkhindriyassa. Pañca nātitikkhindriyassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nirantaranti visabhāgehi
anya-e0103n:571_6: nirantaraṃ. Ayaṃ panāti bhavaṅgadvayantaritā catujavanacittā yathāvuttā āvajjanavasī.
anya-e0103n:571_7: Aññesaṃ vā dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ. Evarūpe kāleti uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya lahutaraṃ āvajjanavasīnibbattanakāle.
anya-e0103n:571_8: Sā ca kho ittarā parittakālā, na satthu yamakamahāpāṭihāriye viya ciratarappabandhavatī.
anya-e0103n:571_9: Tathā hi taṃ sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Adhigamena samaṃ sasampayuttassa jhānassa
anya-e0103n:572_0: Sīghanti ettha samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ dvīsu bhavaṅgesu uppannesu bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā
anya-e0103n:572_1: uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjanaṃ sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā. Ayañca matthakappattā
anya-e0103n:572_2: samāpajjanavasī satthu dhammadesanāyaṃ labbhati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “so kho ahaṃ,
anya-e0103n:572_3: aggivessana, tassā eva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva
anya-e0103n:572_4: cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmi yenassudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti.
anya-e0103n:572_5: Ito sīghatarā hi samāpajjanavasī nāma natthi. Juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi
anya-e0103n:572_6: kapotakandarāyaṃ viharantassa āyasmato sāriputtassa yakkhena mahantampi pabbatakūṭaṃ
anya-e0103n:572_7: padāletuṃ samatthe pahāre sīse dinne samāpajjanampettha nidassetabbaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati
anya-e0103n:572_8: “tadā thero tassa paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṃ appesī”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “aññataraṃ samādhiṃ
anya-e0103n:572_9: samāpajjitvā nisinno”ti vuttaṃ. Ime pana therā “samāpattito vuṭṭhānasamakālaṃ tena
anya-e0103n:573_0: Accharāmattanti aṅguliphoṭamattaṃ khaṇaṃ. Ṭhapetunti setu viya sīghasotāya nadiyā
anya-e0103n:573_1: oghaṃ vegena pavattituṃ adatvā yathāvuttakkhaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā. Abhibhuyya
anya-e0103n:573_2: ṭhapanaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ viyāti vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha vasī adhiṭṭhānavasī. Tatheva
anya-e0103n:573_3: lahuṃ vuṭṭhātunti accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā lahuṃ khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī
anya-e0103n:573_4: hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā. Bhavaṅgacittuppattiyeva hettha jhānato vuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:573_5: nāma. Ettha ca yathā “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti pubbaparikammavasena
anya-e0103n:573_6: adhiṭṭhānasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī, evaṃ “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato
anya-e0103n:574_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ nimmitapabbate tassa vivare. Kiñcāpi ekaṃyeva taṃ abhiññācittaṃ yena
anya-e0103n:574_1: pabbataṃ nimmineyya, abhiññāpādakassa pana jhānassa lahutaraṃ ṭhapanaṃ, vuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0103n:574_2: idha nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Ettakā iddhimantā ekaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ garuḷato rakkhituṃ
anya-e0103n:575_0: Āvajjanānantarānīti āvajjanavasībhāvāya yathākkamaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ āvajjanāya
anya-e0103n:575_1: parato yāni javanāni pavattāni, tāni tesaṃ paccavekkhaṇāni. Yadaggena āvajjanavasīsiddhi,
anya-e0103n:577_0: 79. Nīvaraṇappahānassa tappaṭhamatāya āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā. Thūlaṃ nāma vipulampi
anya-e0103n:577_1: pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyanti āha “oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti. Santato manasi karitvāti
anya-e0103n:577_2: paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya anoḷārikaṅgattā, santadhammasamaṅgitāya ca “santa”nti manasi
anya-e0103n:577_3: katvā. Ye hi dhammā dutiyajjhāne pītisukhādayo, kāmaṃ te paṭhamajjhānepi santi, tehi
anya-e0103n:577_4: pana te santatarā ceva paṇītatarā ca bhavantīti. Nikantinti nikāmanaṃ, apekkhanti
anya-e0103n:577_5: attho. Pariyādāyāti khepetvā. Cattāri pañcāti vā-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho. Dutiyajjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:577_6: etassa atthīti dutiyajjhānikaṃ. Vuttappakārānevāti paṭhamajjhāne vuttappakārāniyeva,
anya-e0103n:578_0: 80. Vūpasamāti vūpasamahetu, vūpasamoti cettha pahānaṃ adhippetaṃ, tañca vitakkavicārānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:578_1: Atikkamo atthato dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe anuppādoti āha “samatikkamā”tiādi. Katamesaṃ
anya-e0103n:578_2: panettha vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo adhippeto, kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, udāhu dutiyajjhānikānanti.
anya-e0103n:578_3: Kiñcettha yadi paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, natthi tesaṃ vūpasamo. Na hi kadāci paṭhamajjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:578_4: vitakkavicārarahitaṃ atthi. Atha dutiyajjhānikānaṃ, evampi nattheva vūpasamo, sabbena
anya-e0103n:578_5: sabbaṃ tesaṃ tattha abhāvatoti? Vuccate – yehi vitakkavicārehi paṭhamajjhānassa oḷārikatā,
anya-e0103n:578_6: tesaṃ samatikkamā dutiyassa jhānassa samadhigamo, na sabhāvato anoḷārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:578_7: samatikkamāti ayamattho “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti etena dīpito. Tasmā “kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ
anya-e0103n:578_8: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo idhādhippeto, udāhu dutiyajjhānikāna”nti edisī codanā anokāsāva.
anya-e0103n:578_9: Yasmā diṭṭhādīnavassa taṃtaṃjhānakkhaṇe anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ vūpasamanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0103n:578_10: Vitakkādayo eva jhānaṅgabhūtā tathā karīyanti, na taṃsampayuttā phassādayo, tasmā
anya-e0103n:578_11: vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamādivacanaṃ ñāyāgataṃ. Yasmā pana vitakkādīnaṃ viya taṃsampayuttadhammānampi
anya-e0103n:578_12: etena “etaṃ oḷārika”nti ādīnavadassanaṃ sutte āgataṃ, tasmā avisesena vitakkādīnaṃ,
anya-e0103n:578_13: taṃsahagatānañca vūpasamādike vattabbe vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamo vuccamāno adhikavacanaṃ
anya-e0103n:578_14: aññaṃ atthaṃ bodhetīti katvā kiñci visesaṃ dīpetīti dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “oḷārikassa
anya-e0103n:578_15: panā”tiādi gahitanti idha “yehi vitakkavicārehī”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Pītiyā
anya-e0103n:578_16: ca virāgā”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tasmā vitakkavicārapītisukhasamatikkamavacanāni oḷārikoḷārikaṅgasamatikkamā
anya-e0103n:578_18: vuttaṃ. Visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitepi hi vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanādike paheyyaṅganiddesatāsāmaññena
anya-e0103n:578_19: cittena samūhato gahite vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanassa tadekadesatā daṭṭhabbā. Ayañca
anya-e0103n:578_20: attho avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇanayena vutto. Atha vā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva
anya-e0103n:579_0: Niyakajjhattamadhippetaṃ na ajjhattajjhattādi. Tattha kāraṇamāha “vibhaṅge panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:579_1: Nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viyāti nīlayogato vatthaṃ nīlaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. Yena
anya-e0103n:579_2: sampasādanena yogā jhānaṃ sampasādanaṃ. Tasmiṃ dassite “sampasādanaṃ jhāna”nti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva
anya-e0103n:579_3: taṃyogā jhāne taṃsaddappavatti dassitāti avirodho yutto. Ekodibhāve kathanti ekodimhi
anya-e0103n:579_4: dassite ekodibhāvaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva jhānassa ekodivaḍḍhanatā
anya-e0103n:579_5: vuttā hotīti ce? “Ekodibhāva”nti padaṃ uddharitvā ekodissa niddeso na kātabbo siyāti
anya-e0103n:579_6: ekodibhāvasaddo eva samādhimhi pavatto sampasādanasaddo viya jhāne pavattatīti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:579_7: Imasmiñca atthavikappeti “cetaso sampasādayatī”ti etasmiṃ pakkhe “cetaso”ti ca upayogatthe
anya-e0103n:580_0: Seṭṭhopi loke “eko”ti vuccati “yāva pare ekāhaṃ te karomī”tiādīsu. Eko adutiyo “ekākībhi
anya-e0103n:580_1: khuddakehi jita”ntiādīsu asahāyatthopi eka-saddo diṭṭhoti āha “eko asahāyo hutvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:580_2: Saddhādayopi kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ sādhāraṇato, asādhāraṇato ca paccayā hontiyeva,
anya-e0103n:580_3: samādhi pana jhānakkhaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhakaraṇena sātisayaṃ
anya-e0103n:581_1: gahitaṃ. Svāyamatisayo yathā imasmiṃ jhāne labbhati, na tathā paṭhamajjhāneti imaṃ
anya-e0103n:581_2: visesaṃ dassetuṃ “nanu cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇe āhananapariyāhananavasena, anumajjanaanuyojanavasena
anya-e0103n:581_3: ca pavattamānā dhammā satipi nīvaraṇappahānena kilesakālussiyāpagame sampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0103n:581_4: kañci khobhaṃ karontā viya tehi ca te na sannisinnā hontīti vuttaṃ “vitakkavicārakkhobhena
anya-e0103n:581_5: na suppasanna”nti. Khuddikā ūmiyo vīciyo. Mahatiyo taraṅgā. Satipi indriyasamatte,
anya-e0103n:581_6: vīriyasamatāya ca teneva khobhena, sampasādābhāvena ca samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo
anya-e0103n:581_7: bahale viya jale maccho. Yathāvuttakkhobho eva palibodho. Evaṃ vuttenāti yassā saddhāya
anya-e0103n:581_8: vasena sampasādanaṃ, yassā ca cittekaggatāya vasena ekodibhāvanti ca jhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:581_9: Tāsaṃ eva “saddahanā”tiādinā pavattiākārassa visesavibhāvanāvasena vuttena. Tena
anya-e0103n:581_10: vibhaṅgapāṭhena. “Sampasādanayogato, sampasādanato vā sampasādanaṃ, ekodiṃ bhāvetīti
anya-e0103n:581_11: ekodibhāvanti jhānaṃ vutta”nti evaṃ pavattā ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā na virujjhati. Yathā
anya-e0103n:582_0: 81. Santāti samaṃ nirodhaṃ gatā. Samitāti bhāvanāya samaṃ gamitā nirodhitā. Vūpasantāti
anya-e0103n:582_1: tato eva suṭṭhu upasantā. Atthaṅgatāti atthaṃ vināsaṃ gatā. Abbhatthaṅgatāti upasaggena
anya-e0103n:582_2: padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. Appitāti vināsaṃ gamitā. Sositāti pavattisaṅkhātassa santānassa
anya-e0103n:582_3: abhāvena sosaṃ sukkhabhāvaṃ itā. Byantikatāti vigatantakatā.
anya-e0103n:583_0: Ayamatthoti bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkavicārānaṃ abhāvo. Codakena vuttamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
anya-e0103n:583_1: pariharituṃ “evametaṃ siddhovāyamattho”ti vatvā “na paneta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:583_2: etanti “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. Tadatthadīpakanti tassa vitakkavicārābhāvamattasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0103n:583_3: atthassa dīpakaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – dutiyajjhānādiadhigamūpāyadīpakena ajjhattasampasādanatāya,
anya-e0103n:583_4: cetaso ekodibhāvatāya ca hetudīpakena, avitakkaavicārabhāvahetudīpakena ca vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva
anya-e0103n:583_5: vitakkavicārābhāvo dīpitoti kiṃ puna avitakkaavicāravacanena katenāti? Na, adīpitattā.
anya-e0103n:583_6: Na hi vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena vitakkavicārānaṃ appavatti vuttā hoti. Vitakkavicāresu
anya-e0103n:583_7: hi taṇhāppahānaṃ etesaṃ vūpasamanaṃ, ye ca saṅkhāresu taṇhāppahānaṃ karonti, tesu
anya-e0103n:583_8: maggesu, pahīnataṇhesu ca phalesu saṅkhārapavatti hoti eva, evamevidhāpi vikkhambhitavitakkavicārataṇhassa
anya-e0103n:583_9: dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārasampayogo purimena na nivārito siyāti taṃnivāraṇatthaṃ,
anya-e0103n:584_0: “Dutiyaṃ uppannantipi dutiya”nti vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Na tathā imassa vitakkavicārāti
anya-e0103n:584_1: yathā paṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti, tathā imassa dutiyajjhānassa
anya-e0103n:584_2: upacārakkhaṇe vitakkavicārā na pahīyanti asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā, upacārabhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:584_3: ca te pahātuṃ asamatthabhāvato. Yadipi tāya tesu taṇhā pahīyati, na pana savisesaṃ.
anya-e0103n:584_4: Savisesañhi tattha taṇhāppahānaṃ appanāya eva hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “appanākkhaṇeyevā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:584_5: Pahānaṅgatāpi atisayappahānavaseneva veditabbā yathā nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānassa.
anya-e0103n:584_6: Tasmāti yasmā tivaṅgamevetaṃ jhānaṃ, tasmā. Tanti vibhaṅge vacanaṃ. Rathassa paṇḍukambalaṃ
anya-e0103n:584_7: viya sampasādo jhānassa parikkhāro, na jhānaṅganti āha “saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetu”nti.
anya-e0103n:586_0: 82. Uppilāvitanti kāmañcāyaṃ pariggahesu apariccattapemassa anādīnavadassino taṇhāsahagatāya
anya-e0103n:586_1: pītiyā pavattiākāro, idha pana dutiyajjhānapīti adhippetā. Tathāpi sabbaso pītiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:586_2: avirattaṃ, sāpi anubandheyyāti vuttaṃ. Uppilāvitaṃ viyāti vā uppilāvitaṃ. Ādīnavaṃ
anya-e0103n:586_3: hi tattha pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:587_0: 83. Virajjanaṃ virāgo. Taṃ pana virajjanaṃ nibbindanamukhena hīḷanaṃ vā tappaṭibaddharāgappahānaṃ
anya-e0103n:587_1: vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā”ti
anya-e0103n:587_2: āha. Vuttappakārāyāti “yadeva tattha pītī”tiādinā vuttappakārāya. Sampiṇḍanaṃ samuccayo.
anya-e0103n:589_0: 84. Upapattitoti samavāhitabhāvena patirūpato. Jhānupekkhāpi samavāhitameva antonītaṃ
anya-e0103n:589_1: katvā pavattatīti āha “samaṃ passatī”ti. Visadāyāti paribyattāya saṃkilesavigamena.
anya-e0103n:589_2: Vipulāyāti mahatiyā sātisayaṃ mahaggatabhāvappattiyā. Thāmagatāyāti pītivigamena thirabhāvappattāya.
anya-e0103n:590: Parisuddhapakati khīṇāsavapakati nikkilesatā. Sattesu kammassakatādassanahetuko samabhāvadassanākāro majjhattākāro brahmavihārupekkhā.
anya-e0103n:591_0: Sahajātadhammānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Samappavattiyā bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannāya
anya-e0103n:592_0: Upekkhānimittanti ettha līnuddhaccapakkhapātarahitaṃ majjhattaṃ vīriyaṃ upekkhā.
anya-e0103n:592_1: Tadeva taṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā pavattetabbassa tādisassa vīriyassa nimittabhāvato upekkhānimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:592_2: bhāvanāya samappavattikāle upekkhīyatīti upekkhā, vīriyameva upekkhā vīriyupekkhā.
anya-e0103n:593_1: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇa”nti evamāgatā
anya-e0103n:593_2: imā aṭṭha samādhivasena uppajjanti. “Sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ
anya-e0103n:593_3: nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:593_4: sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ. Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ…pe… arahattamaggaṃ
anya-e0103n:593_6: animittavihārasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ
anya-e0103n:593_7: nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ paṭisaṅkhā
anya-e0103n:593_8: santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇa”nti evamāgatā imā dasa vipassanāvasena uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n:593_9: Ettha ca paṭhamajjhānādīhi vikkhambhitāni nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīni paṭisaṅkhāya
anya-e0103n:593_11: diṭṭhādīnavattā tesaṃ gahaṇe uppādane ajjhupekkhantī vipassanāpaññā gahaṇe majjhattabhūtā upekkhā.
anya-e0103n:594_0: Tattha uppādanti purimakammapaccayā khandhānaṃ idha uppattimāha. Pavattanti tathāuppannassa
anya-e0103n:594_1: pavattiṃ. Nimittanti sabbampi tebhūmakasaṅkhāragataṃ nimittabhāvena upaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0103n:594_2: Āyūhananti āyatiṃ paṭisandhihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ. Paṭisandhinti āyatiṃ uppattiṃ. Gatinti
anya-e0103n:594_3: yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti. Nibbattinti khandhānaṃ nibbattanaṃ. Upapattinti “samāpannassa
anya-e0103n:594_4: vā upapannassa vā”ti ettha “upapannassā”ti vuttavipākappavattiṃ. Jātinti jarādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:594_5: paccayabhūtaṃ bhavapaccayā jātiṃ. Jarābyādhimaraṇādayo pākaṭā eva. Ettha ca uppādādayo
anya-e0103n:594_6: pañceva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa visayavasena vuttā, sesā tesaṃ vevacanavasena. “Nibbatti,
anya-e0103n:594_7: jātī”ti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ, “gati, upapatti cā”ti
anya-e0103n:594_8: idaṃ dvayaṃ pavattassa, jarādayo nimittassāti veditabbaṃ. Appaṇihitavimokkhavasena
anya-e0103n:594_9: magguppattihetubhūtā catasso, tathā phalasamāpattiyā catasso, suññatavihāraanimittavihāravasena
anya-e0103n:595_0: Yāti vipassanāpaññā. Yadatthīti yaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇattayaṃ upalabbhati. Yaṃ bhūtanti
anya-e0103n:595_1: yaṃ paccayanibbattattā bhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. Taṃ pajahatīti aniccānupassanādīhi
anya-e0103n:595_3: pajahati, yathā āyatiṃ ādānaṃ na hoti, tathā paṭipattiyā pajahati. Tathābhūto ca
anya-e0103n:595_4: tattha upekkhaṃ paṭilabhati. Vicinaneti aniccādivasena sammasanepi.
anya-e0103n:596_1: vimuttattā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā. Tesaṃ vūpasantattā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā
anya-e0103n:597_0: Yadi atthato ekā, kathamayaṃ bhedoti āha “tena tenā”tiādi. Tasmāti yasmā satipi sabhāvato
anya-e0103n:597_1: abhede yehi pana paccayavisesehi svāyamimāsaṃ avatthābhedo, tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ appavattito
anya-e0103n:597_2: na tāsaṃ abhedo, ekajjhaṃ vā pavatti, tasmā. Tenāha “yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:598_0: Ekībhāvoti ekatā. Satipi majjhattābhāvasāmaññe visayabhedena panassā bhedo. Yamatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:598_1: sandhāya “kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ vitthārato dassento “yathā hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:598_2: Ayaṃ vipassanupekkhā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati,
anya-e0103n:598_3: upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti. Tattha yadatthi yaṃ bhūtanti khandhapañcakaṃ, taṃ muñcitukamyatāñāṇena
anya-e0103n:598_5: bhūtassa saṅkhāralakkhaṇavicinane upekkhaṃ paṭilabhati. Saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇassa
anya-e0103n:598_6: sudiṭṭhattā tesaṃ vicinane majjhattabhūtāya vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya tathā diṭṭhādīnavānaṃ
anya-e0103n:598_7: tesaṃ gahaṇepi ajjhupekkhanā siddhāva hoti, sabbaso visaṅkhāraninnattā ajjhāsayassa.
anya-e0103n:599_0: Anābhogarasāti paṇītasukhepi tasmiṃ avanatipaṭipakkhakiccāti attho. Abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānāti
anya-e0103n:599_1: satipi sukhapāramippattiyaṃ tasmiṃ sukhe abyāvaṭā hutvā paccupatiṭṭhati, sampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0103n:599_2: vā tattha abyāpāraṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti attho. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ khobhaṃ, uppilavañca
anya-e0103n:599_3: āvahantehi vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā aparibyattaṃ. Tattha tatramajjhattatāya kiccaṃ.
anya-e0103n:602_0: 85. “Saratīti sato”ti padassa kattusādhanatamāha. Sampajānātīti sammadeva pajānāti.
anya-e0103n:602_1: Saraṇaṃ cintanaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti saraṇalakkhaṇā. Sammussanapaṭipakkho
anya-e0103n:602_2: asammussanaṃ, taṃ kiccaṃ etissāti asammussanarasā. Kilesehi ārakkhā hutvā paccupatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:602_3: tato vā ārakkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā. Asammuyhanaṃ sammadeva pajānanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:602_4: sammohapaṭipakkho vā asammoho. Tīraṇaṃ kiccassa pāragamanaṃ. Pavicayo vīmaṃsā.
anya-e0103n:603_0: Kāmaṃ upacārajjhānādīni upādāya paṭhamadutiyajjhānānipi sukhumāneva, imaṃ pana uparijhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:603_1: upādāya “oḷārikattā”ti vuttaṃ. Sā ca oḷārikatā vitakkādithūlaṅgatāya veditabbā. Keci
anya-e0103n:603_2: “bahucetasikatāyā”ti ca vadanti. Gati sukhā hoti tattha jhānesūti adhippāyo. Abyattaṃ
anya-e0103n:603_3: tattha satisampajaññakiccaṃ “idaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ karīyatī”ti vattabbassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n:603_4: Oḷārikaṅgappahānena sukhumattāti ayamattho kāmaṃ dutiyajjhānepi sambhavati, tathāpi
anya-e0103n:603_5: yebhuyyena avippayogībhāvena vattamānesu pītisukhesu pītisaṅkhātassa oḷārikaṅgassa
anya-e0103n:603_6: pahānena sukhumatāya idha sātisayo satisampajaññabyāpāroti vuttaṃ “purisassā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:603_7: Punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyyāti hānabhāgiyaṃ jhānaṃ siyā dutiyajjhānameva sampajjeyyāti
anya-e0103n:603_8: attho. Tenāha “pītisampayuttameva siyā”ti. “Idañca atimadhuraṃ sukha”nti tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ
anya-e0103n:603_9: sandhāyāha. Atimadhuratā cassa pahāsodagyasabhāvāya pītiyā abhāveneva veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:604_0: Tasmā etamatthaṃ dassentoti yasmā tassa jhānasamaṅgino yaṃ nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:604_1: sukhaṃ, taṃ so paṭisaṃvedeyya. Yaṃ vā tanti atha vā yaṃ taṃ yathāvuttaṃ nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:604_2: sukhaṃ. Taṃsamuṭṭhānena tato samuṭṭhitena atipaṇītena rūpena assa jhānasamaṅgino
anya-e0103n:604_3: rūpakāyo yasmā phuṭo. Yassa rūpakāyassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi jhānasamaṅgī kāyikaṃ
anya-e0103n:604_4: sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya. Tasmā etaṃ cetasikakāyikasukhapaṭisaṃvedanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ
anya-e0103n:604_5: dassento “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti āhā”ti yojanā. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho
anya-e0103n:604_7: paṭisaṃvedetīti vuccati. Phuṭattāti byāpitattāti attho. Yathā hi udakena phuṭasarīrassa
anya-e0103n:604_8: tādise nātipaccanīke vātādiphoṭṭhabbe phuṭe sukhaṃ uppajjati, evametehi phuṭasarīrassāti.
anya-e0103n:604_9: Aparo nayo – sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kathamābhogena vinā sukhapaṭisaṃvedanāti
anya-e0103n:604_10: codanāyaṃ “kiñcāpi…pe… evaṃ santepī”ti. Yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:604_11: tasmā sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti yojanā. Idāni sahāpi ābhogena sukhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ
anya-e0103n:605_0: 86. Yanti hetuatthe nipāto, yasmāti attho. Tenāha “yaṃjhānahetū”ti. “Ācikkhantī”tiādīni
anya-e0103n:605_1: padāni kittanatthānīti adhippāyenāha “pasaṃsantīti adhippāyo”ti. Kintīti pasaṃsanākārapucchā.
anya-e0103n:605_2: Edisesu ṭhānesu satiggahaṇeneva sampajaññampi gahitaṃ hotīti idha pāḷiyaṃ satiyā
anya-e0103n:605_3: eva gahitattā evaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya “satimā” icceva vuttaṃ, “sampajāno”ti heṭṭhā vuttattā vā.
anya-e0103n:606_0: Jhānakkhaṇe cetasikasukhameva labbhatīti “sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:606_1: Tatiyanti gaṇanānupubbatāti ito paṭṭhāya dutiyatatiyajjhānakathāhi aviseso, viseso ca vuttoti.
anya-e0103n:608_0: 87. Idāni nibbattitavisesaṃ dassento “ayaṃ pana viseso”ti vatvā “yasmā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:608_1: Āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti, aniṭṭhe ṭhāne padantarasaṅgahitassa āsevanapaccayattābhāvato.
anya-e0103n:608_2: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya uppajjitabbaṃ sātisayaṃ sukhavirāgabhāvanābhāvato. Tānīti
anya-e0103n:609_0: 88. “Pubbevā”ti vuttattā kadā pana tesaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti codanāyaṃ āha “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ
anya-e0103n:609_1: upacārakkhaṇe”ti. Evaṃ veditabbanti sambandho. Pahānakkamo nāma pahāyakadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:609_2: uppattipaṭipāṭi. Tena pana vuccamāne “dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ sukhaṃ somanassa”nti vattabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:609_3: siyā. Kasmā ito aññathā vacananti āha “indriyavibhaṅge”tiādi. Atha kasmā jhānesveva
anya-e0103n:610_0: Kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyanti attano paccayehi uppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ. Kattha
anya-e0103n:610_1: ca aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti nirodhaṭṭhānaṃ pucchati. Tena “katthā”ti pucchāyaṃ, “etthā”ti
anya-e0103n:610_2: vissajjanepi hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jhānānubhāvanimittaṃ hi anuppajjantaṃ
anya-e0103n:610_3: “dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Atisayanirodho suṭṭhu pahānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhena vūpasamo.
anya-e0103n:611_0: Nānāvajjaneti yena āvajjanena appanāvīthi, tato bhinnāvajjane, anekāvajjane vā. Appanāvīthiyañhi
anya-e0103n:611_1: upacāro ekāvajjano, itaro anekāvajjano anekakkhattuṃ pavattanato. Visamanisajjāya
anya-e0103n:611_2: uppannakilamatho visamāsanupatāpo. Pītipharaṇenāti pītiyā pharaṇarasattā, pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0103n:611_3: vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ. Tenāha “sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:611_4: Vitakkavicārapaccayepīti pi-saddo aṭṭhānappayutto, so “pahīnassā”ti ettha ānetvā
anya-e0103n:611_6: sambandho. “Tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi kilamicittampi uhaññī”ti
anya-e0103n:611_8: uppajjati domanassindriya”nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tatthassa siyā uppattīti tattha
anya-e0103n:612_0: Ettha ca yadeke “tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti vadantena jhānalābhīnampi domanussuppatti
anya-e0103n:612_1: atthīti dassitaṃ hoti. Tena ca anīvaraṇasabhāvo lobho viya dosopi atthīti dīpeti.
anya-e0103n:612_2: Na hi dosena vinā domanassaṃ pavattati. Na cettha paṭṭhānapāḷiyā virodho cintetabbo.
anya-e0103n:612_3: Yasmā tattha parihīnaṃ jhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ domanassaṃ dassitaṃ, aparihīnajjhānamārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:612_4: katvā uppajjamānassa domanassassa asambhavato. Jhānalābhīnaṃ sabbaso domanassaṃ nuppajjatīti
anya-e0103n:612_5: ca na sakkā vattuṃ, aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā. Na heva kho so pahīnajjhāno
anya-e0103n:612_6: ahosīti vadanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ anīvaraṇasabhāvassa dosassa abhāvato. Yadi siyā, rūpārūpāvacarasattānampi
anya-e0103n:612_7: uppajjeyya, na ca uppajjati. Tathā hi “arūpe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:612_9: Na cettha nīvaraṇattā parihāro, kāmacchandādīnampi anīvaraṇānaṃyeva nīvaraṇasadisatāya
anya-e0103n:612_10: nīvaraṇapariyāyassa vuttattā. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā”ti,
anya-e0103n:612_11: tampi akāraṇaṃ uppajjamānena ca domanassena jhānato parihāyanato. Lahukena pana paccayena
anya-e0103n:612_12: parihīnaṃ tādisā appakasireneva paṭipākatikaṃ karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tatthassa siyā
anya-e0103n:612_13: uppattī”ti idaṃ pana parikappavacanaṃ upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa appahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:612_14: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “na tveva antoappanāya”nti. Yadi pana tadā domanassaṃ uppajjeyya,
anya-e0103n:612_15: paṭhamajjhānampissa parihīnamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ pīti viya
anya-e0103n:612_16: na dūreti katvā “āsannattā”ti vuttaṃ. Nānāvajjanūpacāre pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ paṭipakkhena
anya-e0103n:612_17: avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyya vāti imamatthaṃ dassento “appanāppattāyā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:612_18: Tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā maggavīthito pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva
anya-e0103n:612_19: pavattanti, evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:613_0: Samāhaṭāti samānītā, saṅgahetvā vuttāti attho. Sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikattā avibhūtatāya
anya-e0103n:613_1: sukhumā. Tato eva anuminitabbasabhāvattā duviññeyyā. Duṭṭhassāti duṭṭhapayogassa,
anya-e0103n:613_2: duddammassāti attho. Sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ aññāpohananayenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:614_0: Adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyāti idameva catutthajjhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paccayadassanatthanti
anya-e0103n:614_1: adhigamassa upāyabhūtapaccayadassanatthaṃ. Tenāha “dukkhappahānādayo hi tassā paccayā”ti.
anya-e0103n:615: Pahīnāti vuttā “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”ti. Etāti sukhādayo vedanā.
anya-e0103n:616_0: Somanassaṃ rāgassa paccayo. Vuttañhi “sukhāya kho, āvuso visākha, vedanāya rāgānusayo
anya-e0103n:616_1: anusetī”ti. Domanassaṃ dosassa paccayo. Vuttampi cetaṃ “dukkhāya kho, āvuso visākha,
anya-e0103n:616_2: vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti. Sukhādighātenāti sukhādīnaṃ pahānena. Assa jhānassa.
anya-e0103n:617_0: Na dukkhanti adukkhaṃ, dukkhavidhuraṃ. Yasmā tattha dukkhaṃ natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:617_1: “dukkhābhāvenā”ti. Asukhanti etthapi eseva nayo. Etenāti dukkhasukhapaṭikkhepavacanena.
anya-e0103n:617_2: “Paṭipakkhabhūta”nti idaṃ idha tatiyavedanāya dukkhādīnaṃ samatikkamavasena pattabbattā
anya-e0103n:617_3: vuttaṃ, na kusalākusalānaṃ viya ujuvipaccanīkatāya. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītassa majjhattārammaṇassa,
anya-e0103n:617_5: Tato eva majjhattarasā. Avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānāti sukhadukkhāni viya na vibhūtākārā,
anya-e0103n:617_6: piṭṭhipāsāṇe migagatamaggo viya tehi anumātabbā avibhūtākāropaṭṭhānā. Sukhanirodho
anya-e0103n:617_7: nāma idha catutthajjhānūpacāro, so padaṭṭhānaṃ etissāti sukhanirodhapadaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:618_2: pārisuddhiupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhāne sati sampahaṃsanapaññā viya suparisuddhā,
anya-e0103n:618_3: suvisadā ca hotīti āha “yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi, sā upekkhāya katā, na aññenā”ti.
anya-e0103n:618_4: Yadi tatramajjhattatā idha “upekkhā”ti adhippetā, kathaṃ satiyeva “parisuddhā”ti
anya-e0103n:619_0: Evampi kasmā ayameva sati “upekkhāsatipārisuddhī”ti vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha
anya-e0103n:619_1: kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu vijjamānāyapi tatramajjhattatāya
anya-e0103n:619_2: paccanīkābhibhavato, sahāyapaccayavekallato ca apārisuddhi, tathā taṃsampayuttānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:619_3: Tadabhāvato idha pārisuddhīti imamatthaṃ rūpakavasena dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:619_4: vuttaṃ. Sūriyappabhābhibhavāti sūriyappabhāya abhibhuyyamānattā. Atikkhatāya candalekhā
anya-e0103n:619_5: viya rattipi sommasabhāvā sabhāgāya rattiyameva ca candalekhā samujjalatīti sā tassā
anya-e0103n:619_6: sabhāgāti dassento “sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:620_0: “Ekavīthiya”nti idaṃ tattha somanassassa ekaṃsena abhāvato vuttaṃ, na tato purimataresu
anya-e0103n:620_1: ekaṃsena bhāvato. Yathā pana vitakkādayo dutiyādijjhānakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti, na tesaṃ
anya-e0103n:620_2: ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesu, na evametanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Catukkajjhāneti catukkanayavasena
anya-e0103n:622_0: 90. Tatthāti paṭhamajjhāne. Catukkanayassa dutiyajjhāne viyāti catukkanayasambandhini
anya-e0103n:622_1: dutiyajjhāne viya. Taṃ dvidhā bhinditvāti catukkanaye dutiyaṃ “avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:622_2: avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti ca evaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pañcakanaye dutiyañceva tatiyañca
anya-e0103n:622_3: hoti abhidhammeti adhippāyo. Suttantesu pana sarūpato pañcakanayo na gahito.
anya-e0103n:623_0: Kasmā panettha nayadvayavibhāgo gahitoti? Abhidhamme nayadvayavasena jhānānaṃ desitattā.
anya-e0103n:623_1: Kasmā ca tattha tathā tāni desitāni? Puggalajjhāsayato, desanāvilāsato ca. Sannipatitadevaparisāya
anya-e0103n:623_2: kira yesaṃ yathādesite paṭhamajjhāne vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, itare santato.
anya-e0103n:623_3: Tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena ca caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ jhānaṃ desitaṃ. Yesaṃ
anya-e0103n:623_4: vicāro, yesaṃ pīti, yesaṃ sukhaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, itare santato. Tesaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0103n:623_5: ajjhāsayavasena tatiyādīni jhānāni desitāni. Ayaṃ tāva puggalajjhāsayo.
anya-e0103n:624_0: Yassā pana dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā bhagavā yasmā desanāvilāsappatto, tasmā
anya-e0103n:624_1: ñāṇamahantatāya desanāya sukusalo yaṃ yaṃ aṅgaṃ labbhati, tassa tassa vasena yathāruciṃ
anya-e0103n:624_2: desanaṃ niyāmento catukkanayavasena, pañcakanayavasena ca. Tattha ca pañcaṅgikaṃ
anya-e0103n:624_3: paṭhamaṃ, caturaṅgikaṃ dutiyaṃ, tivaṅgikaṃ tatiyaṃ, duvaṅgikaṃ catutthaṃ, duvaṅgikameva
anya-e0103n:624_4: pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ desesīti ayaṃ desanāvilāso. Ettha ca pañcakanaye dutiyajjhānaṃ catukkanaye
anya-e0103n:624_5: dutiyajjhānapakkhikaṃ katvā vibhattaṃ “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti
anya-e0103n:624_6: avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:624_8: jātattā ca. Paṭhamajjhānameva hi “kāmehi akusalehi ca vivitta”nti tadabhāvā na idha
anya-e0103n:624_9: “vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehī”ti sakkā vattuṃ, nāpi “vivekaja”nti. Suttantadesanāsu
anya-e0103n:624_10: ca pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyajjhānāni dutiyajjhānameva bhajanti vitakkavūpasamā vicāravūpasamā
anya-e0103n:624_11: avitakkattā, avicārattā ca. Evañca katvā suttantadesanāyapi pañcakanayo labbhatevāti
anya-e0103n:624_12: siddhaṃ hoti. Nanu suttante cattāriyeva jhānāni vibhattānīti pañcakanayo na labbhatīti?
anya-e0103n:624_14: Catukkanayanissito pana katvā pañcakanayo vibhattoti suttantadesanāyapi pañcakanayo
anya-e0103n:624_15: niddhāretabbo. “Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti hi vitakkassa, vicārassa, vitakkavicārānañca
anya-e0103n:624_16: “vitakkavicārāna”nti sakkā vattuṃ. Tathā “avitakkaṃ, avicāra”nti ca vinā, saha ca
anya-e0103n:624_17: vicārena vitakkappahānena avitakkaṃ, saha, vinā ca vitakkena vicārappahānena avicāranti
anya-e0103n:624_18: avitakkaṃ, avicāraṃ, avitakkañca avicārañcāti vā tividhampi sakkā saṅgahetuṃ.
anya-e0103n:625_0: Dutiyanti ca vitakkarahite, vitakkavicāradvayarahite ca ñāyāgatā desanā dutiyaṃ adhigantabbattā,
anya-e0103n:625_2: dutiye vūpasantopi vitakko sahāyabhūtavicārāvūpasamena na sammā vūpasantoti vitakkavicāradvayarahite
anya-e0103n:625_3: viya vicāravūpasameneva tadupasamaṃ, sesadhammānaṃ samānatañca dassentena “vitakkavicārānaṃ
anya-e0103n:625_4: vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ
anya-e0103n:625_5: pītisukhaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti tatiyaṃ catukkanaye dutiyena nibbisesaṃ
anya-e0103n:625_6: vibhattaṃ. Duvidhassāpi sahāyavirahena, aññathā ca vitakkappahānena avitakkattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:625_7: samādhijaṃ pītisukhattañca samānanti samānadhammattāpi dutiyanti niddeso. Vicāramattampi
anya-e0103n:625_8: hi vitakkavicāradvayarahitaṃ viya “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti avitakkaṃ
anya-e0103n:625_9: vicāramattaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti avitakkaṃ
anya-e0103n:625_10: samādhijaṃ pītisukhanti vibhattaṃ. Paṭhamajjhāne vā sahacārīsu vitakkavicāresu ekaṃ
anya-e0103n:625_11: atikkamitvā dutiyampi tatraṭṭhameva dosato disvā ubhayampi sahātikkamantassa pañcakanaye
anya-e0103n:625_12: tatiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tatiyaṃ adhigantabbattā. Paṭhamato anantarabhāvena panassa dutiyabhāvo
anya-e0103n:625_13: ca uppajjatīti. Kasmā panevaṃ sarūpato pañcakanayo na vibhattoti? Vineyyajjhāsayato.
anya-e0103n:630_0: 91. Yathāvitthāritassa atthassa atidesopi vitthāraṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti āha “vitthārakathā
anya-e0103n:630_1: hotī”ti. Āpokasiṇanti āpokasiṇajjhānaṃ, āpokasiṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Sabbaṃ vitthāretabbanti
anya-e0103n:630_2: pathavīkasiṇakammaṭṭhāne vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ. Ettakampīti “kate vā akate vāti
anya-e0103n:630_3: sabbaṃ vitthāretabba”nti ettakampi avatvā. Sāmuddikena loṇudakena bharito jalāsayo
anya-e0103n:630_5: bhūmiṃ sampattaṃ. Tathārūpanti yādisaṃ ākāsajaṃ udakaṃ, tādisaṃ. Tenāha “vippasannaṃ
anya-e0103n:630_6: anāvila”nti, yaṃ pana udakanti sambandho. “Na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabbo”tiādīsu yaṃ
anya-e0103n:630_7: vattabbaṃ, taṃ pathavīkasiṇakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Lakkhaṇaṃ pana idha paggharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:631: Vuttanayenevāti pathavīkasiṇabhāvanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva. Taraṅguṭṭhānādi, pheṇamissatādi ca idha kasiṇadoso. Soti yogāvacaro. Tassāti paṭibhāganimittassa.
anya-e0103n:633_0: 92. Siniddhāni sinehavantāni. Sāradārūni na pheggudārūni. Jālāya ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:633_1: siniddhasāradāruggahaṇaṃ. Ghaṭikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ katvāti khandhaso karitvā. Ālimpetvāti
anya-e0103n:634: Patanasadisanti patamānasadisaṃ. Akate gaṇhantassāti vuttanayena yathā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ anabhisaṅkhate kevale tejasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa.
anya-e0103n:636_0: 93. Vuttañhetanti ettha hi-saddo hetuattho, yasmāti attho. Tassa “tasmā”ti iminā
anya-e0103n:636_1: sambandho. Ucchagganti ucchukhette yathāṭhitānaṃ aggaṃ. Eritanti vātena calitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:636_2: Sameritanti sabbaso calitaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā “vāyokasiṇaṃ…pe… upalakkhetī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:636_3: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tasmā. Samasīsaṭṭhitanti upari pattānaṃ vasena samasīsaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:636_4: Veḷuṃ vā rukkhaṃ vāti etthāpi “samasīsaṃ ṭhitaṃ ghanapattaveḷuṃ vā ghanapattarukkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:636_5: vā”ti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Ekaṅgulādippamāṇesu kesesu rassabhāvato, dīghataresu olambanato,
anya-e0103n:636_6: viraḷesu anuppavesato vātappahāro na paññāyatīti caturaṅgulappamāṇaggahaṇaṃ, ghanaggahaṇañca
anya-e0103n:636_7: kataṃ. Etasmiṃ ṭhāne paharatīti satiṃ ṭhapetvāti ucchaggādīnaṃ pacalanākāraggahaṇamukhena
anya-e0103n:636_8: tesaṃ pahārake vātasaṅghāte satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā. Tattha satiṃ ṭhapetvāti tasmiṃ kāyapadesassa
anya-e0103n:636_9: saṅghaṭṭanavasena pavatte vāyupiṇḍe saṅghaṭṭanākāraggahaṇamukhena satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0103n:636_10: “Usumavaṭṭisadisa”nti etena purimakasiṇassa viya imassāpi nimittassa saṃviggahataṃ
anya-e0103n:636_11: dasseti. “Niccala”nti iminā niccalabhāvoyeva uggahanimittato imassa visesoti paṭibhāganimittassāpi
anya-e0103n:638_0: 94. Añjanarājivaṭṭādi vaṇṇadhātuyā vā. Tathārūpaṃ mālāgacchanti aviraḷavikasitanīlavaṇṇapupphasañchannaṃ
anya-e0103n:638_1: pupphagacchaṃ. Itarenāti akatādhikārena. Girikaṇṇikaggahanena nīlaṃ girikaṇṇikamāha.
anya-e0103n:638_2: Karaṇḍapaṭalaṃ samuggapidhānaṃ. Pattehiyevāti nīluppalādīnaṃ kesaravaṇṭāni apanetvā
anya-e0103n:638_3: kevalehi pattehiyeva. Pūretabbanti nīlavaṇṇaṃ vatthaṃ gahetvā bhaṇḍikaṃ viya bandhitvā
anya-e0103n:638_4: yathā nīlamaṇḍalaṃ hutvā paññāyati, tathā caṅkoṭakaṃ vā karaṇḍapaṭalaṃ vā pūretabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:638_5: Mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ vā assāti assa caṅkoṭakassa, karaṇḍapaṭalassa vā mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ bandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:640_0: 95. Pītakasiṇe mālāgacchanti ikkaṭādimālāgacchaṃ. Haritālaṃ, manosilā vā dhātu. Pattaṅgapupphehīti
anya-e0103n:640_1: pattaṅganāmikā pītavaṇṇapupphā ekā gacchajāti, tassa pupphehi. Āsanapūjanti cetiyaṅgaṇe
anya-e0103n:640_2: kataṃ āsanapūjaṃ. Kaṇikārapupphādināti ādi-saddena ākulikiṅkirātapupphādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:646_0: 98. Tathā asakkontenāti yathā sūriyālokādivasena obhāsanimittuppādanaṃ vuttaṃ, tassa
anya-e0103n:646_1: obhāsamaṇḍalassa na ciraṭṭhititāya tathā nimittuppādanaṃ kātuṃ asakkontena. Ghaṭamukhena
anya-e0103n:646_4: Ghanavippasannaṃ ālokapuñjasadisanti bhagavato byāmappabhā viya bahalo, vippasanno
anya-e0103n:646_5: ca hutvā puñjabhūto āloko atthi ce, taṃsadisoti attho.
anya-e0103n:648_0: 99. Chiddasadisameva hotīti yehi bhittipariyantādīhi paricchinnaṃ, taṃ chiddaṃ, taṃsadisaṃ,
anya-e0103n:648_1: tenavākārena uggahanimittaṃ upaṭṭhātīti attho. “Vaḍḍhiyamānampi na vaḍḍhatī”ti uggahanimittassa
anya-e0103n:648_2: avaḍḍhanīyataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbampi hi uggahanimittaṃ vaḍḍhiyamānaṃ na vaḍḍhatiyeva.
anya-e0103n:648_3: Satipi ca vaḍḍhetukāmatāyaṃ vaḍḍhanā na sambhavati bhāvanāya paridubbalattā. Bhāvanāvasena
anya-e0103n:648_4: hi nimittavaḍḍhanā. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana tasmiṃ uppanne bhāvanā thirāti katvā “vaḍḍhiyamānaṃ vaḍḍhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:649_0: Kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ “pathavīkasiṇādīni rūpajhānārammaṇāni aṭṭheva kasiṇāni sarūpato āgatāni,
anya-e0103n:649_1: odātakasiṇe pana ālokakasiṇaṃ, ākāsakasiṇe ca paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā
anya-e0103n:649_2: desanā katā”ti adhippāyenāha “iti kasiṇāni dasabalo, dasa yāni avocā”ti. Pakiṇṇakakathāpi
anya-e0103n:649_3: viññeyyāti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kasiṇe paṭiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā
anya-e0103n:649_4: asādhāraṇato, sādhāraṇato ca tattha tattha pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattā
anya-e0103n:651_0: 100. Ādibhāvoti ettha ādi-saddena yassa kassaci pathavīpakkhiyassa vatthuno nimmānādiṃ
anya-e0103n:651_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Ṭhānanisajjādikappanaṃ vāti etthāpi “ākāse vā udake vā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:652_0: Yadeva so icchati tassa ḍahanasamatthatāti bahūsu kappāsapicusāradāruādīsu ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0103n:652_1: rāsibhūtesu ṭhitesu yaṃ yadeva icchati, tassa tasseva ḍahanasamatthatā. Idha ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n:653: Vāyugatiyā gamanaṃ vāyugatigamanaṃ, atisīghagamanaṃ. Idha ādi-saddena yadicchitadesantaraṃ pāpuṇanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:654: Suvaṇṇanti adhimuccanā suvaṇṇabhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ seyyathāpi āyasmā pilindavaccho tiṇaṇḍupagapāsādādīnaṃ. Vuttanayenāti suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇanayena.
anya-e0103n:655: Vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha tattha ādi-saddena nīlobhāsanimmānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Pathavīpabbatādīti ādi-saddena samuddādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:656_0: Sabbāneva dasapi kasiṇāni. Imaṃ pabhedaṃ labhantīti imaṃ vaḍḍhanādivisesaṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0103n:656_1: Ekoti ekacco. Sañjānātīti bhāvanāpaññāya sañjānāti. Ādi-saddena “āpokasiṇa”ntiādipāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:657_1: Tañca kho vaḍḍhanavasena. Tenāha “ekacco hi uddhameva kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetī”ti. Heṭṭhābhūmitalābhimukhantiādīsupi
anya-e0103n:657_2: eseva nayo. Pubbe vaḍḍhanakāle payojanaṃ anapekkhitvā vaḍḍhentānaṃ vasena vuttattā
anya-e0103n:657_3: idāni “tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāretī”ti āha, kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetīti attho. Yathā
anya-e0103n:657_4: kinti āha “ālokamiva dibbacakkhunā rūpadassanakāmo”ti. Uddhañce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo
anya-e0103n:657_5: uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti, adho ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo adho ālokaṃ pasāreti, samantato
anya-e0103n:657_6: ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo samantato ālokaṃ pasāreti, evamayaṃ kasiṇanti attho.
anya-e0103n:658_1: na aññaṃ pathavīādi. Na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi. Añño kasiṇasambhedoti
anya-e0103n:658_2: āpokasiṇādinā saṅkaro. Sabbatthāti sabbesu āpokasiṇādīsu sesakasiṇesu. Ekadese aṭṭhatvā
anya-e0103n:658_3: anavasesena pharaṇappamāṇassa aggahaṇato pharaṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ. Teneva hi nesaṃ kasiṇasamaññā.
anya-e0103n:658_4: Tathā cāha “tañhī”tiādi. Tattha cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ālambanaṃ karonto.
anya-e0103n:658_5: Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā ekakkhaṇe sakalameva manasi karoti, na ekadesanti.
anya-e0103n:659_0: 101. Ānantariyakammasamaṅginoti pañcasu ānantariyakammesu yena kenaci samannāgatā.
anya-e0103n:659_1: Niyatamicchādiṭṭhikāti ahetukadiṭṭhi akiriyadiṭṭhi natthikadiṭṭhīti tīsu micchādiṭṭhīsu
anya-e0103n:659_2: yāya kāyaci niyatāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatā. Ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakāti ubhatobyañjanakā,
anya-e0103n:659_3: paṇḍakā ca. Kāmañcete ahetukapaṭisandhikattā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā honti, tathāpi
anya-e0103n:659_4: tibbakilesattā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā vuttā. Ahetukadvihetukapaṭisandhikāti ahetukapaṭisandhikā,
anya-e0103n:659_5: dvihetukapaṭisandhikā ca. Duhetukapaṭisandhikānampi hi ariyamaggapaṭivedho, jhānapaṭilābho
anya-e0103n:659_6: ca natthi, tasmā tepi vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā eva.
anya-e0103n:660_2: kattukamyatāchandaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uttarakurukāpi manussā mārādayo
anya-e0103n:660_3: viya acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā nibbutichandarahitattā. Duppaññāti bhavaṅgapaññāya
anya-e0103n:660_4: parihīnā. “Bhavaṅgapaññāya paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa pādakaṃ na
anya-e0103n:660_5: hoti, sopi duppaññoyevā”ti sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ hi bhavaṅge vattamāne
anya-e0103n:660_6: taṃsantatiyaṃ lokuttaraṃ nibbattati, taṃ tassa pādakaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:661_0: Kusalesu dhammesūti anavajjadhammesu, sukhavipākadhammesu vā. Okkamitunti adhigantuṃ.
anya-e0103n:661_2: yasmā ete vipākantarāyādayo evaṃ atthajānikarā, anatthahetubhūtā ca, tasmā. Tiṇṇameva
anya-e0103n:661_3: cettha antarāyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ itarassa sappaṭikārattā, kammantarāyapakkhikattā vāti
anya-e0103n:661_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sappurisūpanissayādīhīti ādi-saddena tajjaṃ yonisomanasikārādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:661_5: Saddhanti kammaphalasaddhaṃ, ratanattayasaddhañca. Chandanti bhāvanānuyoge tibbakattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0103n:661_6: kusalacchandaṃ. Paññanti pārihāriyapaññaṃ. Vaḍḍhetvāti yathā bhāvanā ijjhati, tathā
anya-e0103n:661_7: paribrūhetvā. Yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyattā, heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ca na vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:666_1: bhūtakathanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na saviññāṇakaasubhassa akammaṭṭhānabhāvato. Tathā
anya-e0103n:666_2: hi vakkhati “na kevalaṃ matasarīra”ntiādi. Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato
anya-e0103n:666_3: upari maraṇato paraṃ. Samuggatenāti uṭṭhitena. Uddhumātattāti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ dhumātattā
anya-e0103n:666_4: sūnattā. Uddhumātameva uddhumātakanti ka-kārena padavaḍḍhanamāha anatthantarato yathā
anya-e0103n:666_5: “pītakaṃ lohitaka”nti. Paṭikkūlattāti jigucchanīyattā. Kucchitaṃ uddhumātaṃ uddhumātakanti
anya-e0103n:666_6: kucchanatthe vā ayaṃ ka-kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:666_7: Tathārūpassāti “bhastā viya vāyunā”tiādinā yathārūpaṃ vuttaṃ, tathārūpassa.
anya-e0103n:667: Setarattehi paribhinnaṃ vimissitaṃ nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ, purimavaṇṇavipariṇāmabhūtaṃ vā nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n:668: Paribhinnaṭṭhānesu kākakaṅkādīhi. Vissandamānapubbanti vissavantapubbaṃ, tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharantapubbanti attho.
anya-e0103n:669: Apadhāritanti vivaṭaṃ ugghāṭitaṃ. Khittanti chaḍḍitaṃ, soṇasiṅgālādīhi visuṃ katvā khādanena sarīrasaṅghātato luñcitvā tahaṃ tahaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ. Vividhaṃ khittanti vikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:670_0: Purimanayenāti “vividhaṃ khitta”ntiādinā pubbe vuttanayena. Satthena hanitvāti verīhi
anya-e0103n:670_1: khaggakaravālādinā satthena paharitvā. Vuttanayenāti “aññena hattha”ntiādinā pubbe vuttanayena.
anya-e0103n:671: Abbhantarato nikkhamantehi kimīhi paggharantakimikulaṃ puḷavakanti āha “kimiparipuṇṇassā”ti.
anya-e0103n:672: Uddhumātakādīni āmakasusānādīsu chaḍḍitāsubhāni. Nissāyāti paṭicca tānipi ārabbha. Nimittānanti uggahapaṭibhāganimittānaṃ. Etāneva uddhumātakādīneva nāmāni.
anya-e0103n:674_0: 103. Bhāvetukāmenāti uppādetukāmena. Tenāti ācariyena. Assāti yogino. Asubhanimittatthāyāti
anya-e0103n:674_1: asubhanimittassa uggaṇhanatthāya, asubhe vā uggahanimittassa atthāya. Gamanavidhānanti
anya-e0103n:674_2: gamanavidhi. Yena vidhinā gantabbaṃ, so vidhi. Uggahanimittassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n:675_0: 104. Tāvadevāti sutakkhaṇeyeva. Atitthena puṇṇanadīādiṃ pakkhandantena viya anupavisantena
anya-e0103n:675_2: Sarīranti uddhumātakakaḷevaraṃ. Adhunāmatanti aciramataṃ uddhumātakabhāvaṃ appattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:675_3: Takkayatīti sambhāveti bhāriyaṃ katvā na maññati.
anya-e0103n:676_0: 105. Rūpasaddādīti ettha amanussānaṃ rūpehi, sīhabyagghādīnaṃ saddādīhi, amanussānampi
anya-e0103n:676_1: vā rūpasaddādīhi. Tathā sīhabyagghādīnanti yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Aniṭṭhārammaṇābhibhūtassāti
anya-e0103n:676_2: bheravādibhāvena aniṭṭhehi ārammaṇehi abhibhūtassa ajjhotthaṭassa. Na paṭisaṇṭhātīti
anya-e0103n:676_3: vidāhavasena āsaye na tiṭṭhati, ucchaḍḍetabbaṃ hotīti attho. Aññoti amanussādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:676_4: vasena vā aññathā vā vuttappakārato añño ābādho hoti. Soti saṅghatthero, abhiññātabhikkhu
anya-e0103n:676_5: vā. Yassānena ārocitaṃ, so. Katakammāti katatheyyakammā. Akatakammāti theyyakammaṃ
anya-e0103n:676_6: kātukāmā. Katakammā pana idhādhippetā. Tasmā teti katakammā corā. Saha oḍḍhenāti
anya-e0103n:676_7: sahoḍḍhaṃ, thenetvā gahiyamānabhaṇḍena saddhinti attho. Yajamānoti yaññaṃ yajanto
anya-e0103n:676_8: yaññasāmiko. “Addhā imāya paṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā.
anya-e0103n:677_0: Evaṃ gamanavidhānaṃ ekadesena vatvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena taṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0103n:677_1: vuttena vidhinā”tiādimāha. Tattha uggaṇhantoti uggaṇhanahetu. Ekoti ayaṃ eka-saddo
anya-e0103n:677_2: asahāyattho, na aññādiatthoti “adutiyo”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā vaṇṇādito vavatthānaṃ ekaṃsato
anya-e0103n:677_3: samuditameva icchitabbaṃ sabbatthakabhāvato, na tathā sandhiāditoti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:677_4: “vaṇṇatopī”tiādinā chasu ṭhānesu sampiṇḍanattho pi-saddo gahito. Puna eko adutiyotiādi
anya-e0103n:677_5: gahitanimittassa yogino nivattitvā vasanaṭṭhānagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tabbhāgiyaññevāti
anya-e0103n:677_6: tappakkhiyaṃyeva asubhanimittamanasikārasahitameva. Āsanaṃ paññapetīti nisajjaṃ kappeti.
anya-e0103n:677_7: Yaṃ pana “asubhanimittadisābhimukhe bhūmippadese”ti vakkhati, tampi imamevatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:677_8: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi kevalena disābhimukhabhāvena kiñci ijjhati.
anya-e0103n:678_0: Samantā nimittupalakkhaṇāti uddhumātakassa samantā pāsāṇādinimittasallakkhaṇā. Asammohatthāti
anya-e0103n:678_2: ekādasavidhena. Upanibandhanatthoti asubhārammaṇe cittaṃ upanetvā nibandhanattho.
anya-e0103n:679_0: 106. Tasmāti yasmā asubhanimittassa uggaṇhanaṃ ariyamaggapadaṭṭhānassa paṭhamajjhānassa
anya-e0103n:679_1: adhigamupāyo, yasmā vā “asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto eko adutiyo gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:679_2: tasmā. Cittasaññattatthāyāti sarīrasabhāvasallakkhaṇena, saṃvegajananena ca attano
anya-e0103n:679_3: cittassa saññattiatthaṃ saññāpanatthaṃ. “Cittasaññatatthāyā”ti vā pāṭho, kilesavasena
anya-e0103n:679_4: asaṃyatassa cittassa saṃyamanatthaṃ damanatthaṃ, na kammaṭṭhānatthanti attho. Kammaṭṭhānasīsenāti
anya-e0103n:679_5: kammaṭṭhānena sīsabhūtena, taṃ uttamaṅgaṃ padhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā. Mūlakammaṭṭhānanti
anya-e0103n:679_6: pakatiyā attanā kālena kālaṃ parihariyamānaṃ buddhānussatiādisabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:679_9: Evaṃ hi sati asammuṭṭhā nāma hoti. Bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe appavattitvā kammaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0103n:679_10: pavattamānaṃ mānasaṃ abahigataṃ nāma. Tathābhūtena cānena rūpindriyāni appavattakiccāni
anya-e0103n:680_0: Dvāraṃ sallakkhetabbanti vihāre puratthimādīsu disāsu asukadisāya idaṃ dvāraṃ, tato
anya-e0103n:680_1: eva tāya disāya sallakkhitena asukadvārena nikkhantomhīti dvāraṃ upadhāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:680_2: Tatoti dvārasallakkhaṇato pacchā. Yena maggena gacchati sayaṃ. Nimittaṭṭhānanti asubhanimittassa
anya-e0103n:680_3: gaṇhanaṭṭhānaṃ. Āhāraṃ chaḍḍāpeyyāti vamanaṃ kārāpeyya. Kaṇṭakaṭṭhānanti kaṇṭakavantaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:681_0: 107. Disā vavatthapetabbāti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “ekasmiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:681_1: Khāyatīti upaṭṭhāti. Kammaniyanti bhāvanāya kammakkhamaṃ. Ubbāḷhassāti bādhitassa.
anya-e0103n:681_2: Vidhāvatīti nānārammaṇe visarati. Ukkammāti ujukaṃ anuvātato apakkamma. Matakaḷevaraṃ
anya-e0103n:681_3: puthujjanassa yebhuyyena bhayato upaṭṭhātīti āha “accāsanne bhayamuppajjatī”ti. Anupādanti
anya-e0103n:681_4: pādasamīpaṃ. Yattha ṭhitassa sukhena oloketuṃ sakkā, taṃ olokentassa phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:682_0: 108. Samantāti samantato. Puna samantāti sāmantā samīpe. Kacchakoti kāḷakacchako,
anya-e0103n:682_1: “pilakkho”tipi vadanti. Kapītanoti pippalirukkho. Sindīti khuddakakhajjurī. Karamandādayo
anya-e0103n:682_2: pākaṭā eva. Sāmāti sāmalatā. Kāḷavallīti kāḷavaṇṇā apattikā ekā latājāti. Pūtilatāti
anya-e0103n:683_0: 109. Taṃ nimittakaraṇādi idheva yathāvutte pāsāṇādinimittakaraṇe eva antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ.
anya-e0103n:683_1: Sanimittaṃ karotīti saha nimittaṃ karoti, asubhaṃ pāsāṇādinimittena saha karoti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0103n:683_2: Atha vā asubhanimittaṃ, pāsāṇādinimittañca saha ekajjhaṃ karonto vavatthapento “sanimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:683_3: karotī”ti vutto. Samānakālatādīpakena hi saha-saddena ayaṃ samāso yathā “sacakkaṃ
anya-e0103n:683_4: dehī”ti. Tayidaṃ nimittakaraṇaṃ aparāparaṃ sallakkhaṇena hoti, na ekavāramevāti āha
anya-e0103n:683_5: “punappunaṃ vavatthapento hi sanimittaṃ karotī”ti. Dveti pāsāṇāsubhanimittāni. Samāsetvā
anya-e0103n:683_6: saṅgahetvā ekajjhaṃ katvā. Sārammaṇanti asubhārammaṇena saddhiṃ pāsāṇādiṃ samānārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:683_7: karoti, saha vā ārammaṇaṃ karoti, ekārammaṇaṃ viya ubhayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0103n:683_8: viya ca aparāparaṃ sallakkhento pāsāṇādiṃ, asubhanimittañcāti dvayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti attho.
anya-e0103n:684_0: Attaniyoti sako. Vaṇitanti sūnaṃ. Sabhāvena sarasenāti uddhumātakabhāvasaṅkhātena
anya-e0103n:684_1: attano lakkhaṇena, paresaṃ jigucchuppādanasaṅkhātena attano kiccena ca, sabhāvo eva
anya-e0103n:685_0: 110. Chabbidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbanti vaṇṇādinā chappakārena tāva uddhumātakaasubhanimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:685_1: gahetabbaṃ. Keci “kaḷevarassa dīgharassādippamāṇena saddhiṃ sattavidhenā”ti vadanti,
anya-e0103n:685_2: taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi. Liṅgatoti ettha liṅgaṃ nāma vayo liṅgaṃ, na thanamassuādi
anya-e0103n:685_3: itthipurisaliṅganti dassentena “itthiliṅgaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ṭhitassa sattassa idaṃ
anya-e0103n:685_4: sarīranti sambandho. Uddhumātakasaṇṭhānavaseneva, na pākatikasaṇṭhānavasena. Etena
anya-e0103n:685_5: yadi tattha koci anuddhumātakabhāvappatto padeso siyā, so na gahetabboti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:685_6: Oḷārikāvayavavasena idaṃ saṇṭhānavavatthānaṃ, na sukhumāvayavavasenāti sīsasaṇṭhānādikaṃ
anya-e0103n:686_0: Imissā disāyāti imissā puratthimāya, dakkhiṇapacchimauttarāya disāya, anudisāya vā
anya-e0103n:686_1: ṭhitoti yojanā. Imasmiṃ nāma okāse hatthāti imasmiṃ nāma bhūmippadese imassa kaḷevarassa
anya-e0103n:687_0: Adho pādatalenātiādi nābhiyā heṭṭhā adho, tato uddhaṃ uparīti imassa vavatthānassa
anya-e0103n:687_1: vasena vuttaṃ. Hatthaparicchedo heṭṭhā aṅguliaggena upari aṃsakūṭasandhinā tiriyaṃ
anya-e0103n:687_2: tacapariyantena gahetabbo. Esa nayo pādaparicchedādīsupi. Yattakaṃ vā pana ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:687_3: gaṇhatīti sace sabbaṃ sarīraṃ paricchinditvā gahetuṃ na sakkoti, padeso tassa uddhumāto,
anya-e0103n:687_4: so yattakaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ uddhumātakavasena ñāṇena pariggaṇhāti, tattakameva yathāpariggahitameva.
anya-e0103n:687_5: Idaṃ īdisanti idaṃ hatthādikaṃ īdisaṃ evamākāraṃ. Uddhumātakanti yathāsabhāvato paricchinditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:687_6: Visabhāge sarīre ārammaṇanti kammaṭṭhānaṃ paṭikkūlākāro na upaṭṭhāti na khāyati,
anya-e0103n:687_7: subhato upaṭṭhaheyya. Tenāha “vipphandanasseva paccayo hotī”ti, kilesaparipphandanasseva
anya-e0103n:687_8: nimittaṃ hotīti attho. Ugghāṭitāpīti uddhumātabhāvappattāpi, sabbaso kuthitasarīrāpīti
anya-e0103n:687_9: vā attho. Svāyamattho paṭhamapārājike vinītavatthūhi dīpetabbo.
anya-e0103n:688_4: katasamaṇadhammo. Tato eva sabbaso kusalavāsanāya, kusalabhāvanāya ca pūraṇena vāsitavāsano
anya-e0103n:688_5: bhāvitabhāvano. Vivaṭṭūpanissayakusalabījena sabījo. Ñāṇassa paripakkabhāvena ñāṇuttaro.
anya-e0103n:688_6: Yathāvuttāya paṭipattiyā kilesānaṃ tanukaraṇena appakileso. Olokitolokitaṭṭhāneyevāti
anya-e0103n:688_7: uddhumātakādiasubhassa yattha yattha olokitolokitaṭṭhāne eva, tādisassa kālaviseso,
anya-e0103n:688_8: asubhassa padesaviseso vā apekkhitabbo natthīti attho. No ce evaṃ upaṭṭhātīti evaṃ
anya-e0103n:688_9: yathāvuttapurisavisesassa viya paṭibhāganimittaṃ no ce upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ chabbidhenāti
anya-e0103n:688_10: evaṃ vuttākārena vaṇṇādivasena chabbidhena. Punapīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena
anya-e0103n:688_11: nimittaggahaṇavidhiṃ sampiṇḍeti, na pañcavidhataṃ. Chabbidhena hi pubbe nimittaggahaṇaṃ vihitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:689_0: 112. Asītisatasandhitoti sabbepi sandhayo tadāpi atthevāti dassanatthaṃ vatvā uddhumātabhāvena
anya-e0103n:689_1: yebhuyyena na paññāyanti. Ye pana paññāyanti, te vavatthapetabbāti dassetuṃ “uddhumātake
anya-e0103n:689_2: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tayo dakkhiṇahatthasandhīti aṃsakapparamaṇibandhānaṃ vasena
anya-e0103n:689_3: tayo dakkhiṇahatthasandhayo. Tathā vāmahatthasandhayo. Kaṭijaṇṇugopphakānaṃ vasena
anya-e0103n:689_4: tayo dakkhiṇapādasandhayo. Tathā vāmapādasandhayo. Eko kaṭisandhīti kaṭiyā saddhiṃ
anya-e0103n:689_6: vāmahatthavāmapassānañca antaraṃ vivaraṃ. Pādantaranti ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ vemajjhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:689_7: Udarantaranti nābhiṭṭhānasaññitaṃ kucchivemajjhaṃ, udarassa vā abbhantaraṃ. Kaṇṇantaranti
anya-e0103n:689_8: kaṇṇachiddaṃ. Iti-saddo ādiattho, tena nāsacchiddādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Akkhīnaṃ,
anya-e0103n:689_9: mukhassa ca vasenāpi vivaraṃ labbhatevāti dassetuṃ “akkhīnampī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samantatoti
anya-e0103n:689_10: evaṃ sandhiādito uddhumātakaṃ vavatthapentassa ce nimittaṃ upatiṭṭhati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
anya-e0103n:689_11: No ce, samantato vavatthapetabbanti vavatthāpanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “sakalasarīre”tiādi
anya-e0103n:689_12: vuttaṃ. Tattha ñāṇaṃ cāretvāti sabbatthakameva sarīraṃ āvajjetvā tattha paṭikkūlākārasahitaṃ
anya-e0103n:689_13: uddhumātakabhāvaṃ ārabbha nirantaraṃ bhāvanāñāṇaṃ pavattetvā. Yaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ pana
anya-e0103n:689_14: ñāṇaṃ cārentassa tasmiṃ sarīre yo padeso vibhūto hutvā uddhumātakākārena vibhūtabhāvena
anya-e0103n:691_2: gaṇhitabbanti yathā uggahanimittaṃ upaṭṭhahati, evaṃ sammadeva asubhanimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:691_3: Idāni tameva nimittassa suṭṭhu gahaṇākāraṃ upadisanto “satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:691_4: Tattha evaṃ punappunaṃ karontenāti yathā “imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti
anya-e0103n:691_5: sañjātādarena satisampajaññañca suṭṭhu upaṭṭhapetvā uddhumātakaasubhaṃ paṭhamaṃ āvajjitaṃ,
anya-e0103n:691_6: evaṃ punappunaṃ tattha āvajjanaṃ karontena. Sādhukaṃ upadhāretabbañceva vavatthapetabbañcāti
anya-e0103n:691_7: sakkaccaṃ satiyā sallakkhetabbañceva paññāya nicchetabbañca. Sati hi “dhāraṇā”ti
anya-e0103n:691_8: niddiṭṭhā, dhāraṇañcettha sallakkhaṇaṃ. Paññā “pavicayo”ti niddiṭṭhā, pavicayo cettha
anya-e0103n:691_9: nicchayoti. Atha vā upadhāretabbanti satipubbaṅgamāya paññāya upalakkhetabbaṃ. Na
anya-e0103n:691_10: hi kadāci satirahitā paññā atthi. Vavatthapetabbanti paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā nicchinitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:691_11: Paññāsahitā eva hi sati idhādhippetā, na tabbirahitā. Addhakkhiapaṅgādivasenāpi olokanaṃ
anya-e0103n:691_12: atthīti “ummīletvā oloketvā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena paribyattameva olokanaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ
anya-e0103n:691_13: punappunaṃ karontassāti vuttappakārena cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokanaṃ, nimmīletvā āvajjanañca
anya-e0103n:691_14: aparāparaṃ anekavāraṃ karontassa. Uggahanimittanti uddhumātake uggaṇhananimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:691_15: Suggahitanti suṭṭhu gahitaṃ. Yathā na vinassati na pamuṭṭhaṃ hoti, evaṃ gahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:691_16: Ekasadisanti samānasadisaṃ. Samānattho hi ayaṃ eka-saddo, yathā “ariyavinayeti vā,
anya-e0103n:691_17: sappurisavinayeti vā, esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññe vā”ti.
anya-e0103n:692_0: Āgamanakāleti vihārato susānaṃ uddissa āgamanakāle. Vuttanayenevāti atidesavasena
anya-e0103n:692_1: dīpitampi atthaṃ “ekakenā”tiādinā sarūpato dasseti. Tattha tadeva kammaṭṭhānanti
