anya-e0103n:692_2: uddhumātakakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Mūlakammaṭṭhānanti eke, tadayuttaṃ. Upaṭṭhitanimittaṃ hi
anya-e0103n:692_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā kammaṭṭhānantaramanasikāro rañño rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā videsagamanaṃ
anya-e0103n:693_1: vetāḷasadisaṃ bhayānakaṃ visayaṃ. Vikkhittacittoti bhīrukapuriso viya pisācādiṃ disvā
anya-e0103n:693_2: cittavikkhepaṃ patto. Ummattako viyāti yakkhummattako viya ekacco hoti. Jhānavibbhantakoti
anya-e0103n:693_3: jhānato viccutako sīlavibbhantakamantavibbhantakā viya. Santhambhetvāti uppannaparittāsavūpasamanena
anya-e0103n:693_4: vigatakampatāya niccalo hutvā. Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitantiādi santhambhanassa upāyadassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:693_5: Matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā anubandhanakaṃ nāma natthi asati tādise mantappayoge. Sopi
anya-e0103n:693_6: uddhumātakādibhāvamappatte avinaṭṭharūpe eva ijjhati, tathā devatādhiggaho, na evarūpeti
anya-e0103n:693_7: adhippāyo. Saññajoti bhāvanāparikappasaññāya jāto. Tato eva saññāsambhavo saññāmattasamuṭṭhāno.
anya-e0103n:693_8: Tāsaṃ vinodetvāti nimittupaṭṭhānanimittaṃ uppannacittasantāsaṃ vuttappakārena vinodetvā
anya-e0103n:693_9: vūpasametvā. “Idāni tava parissamo sapphalo jāto”ti hāsaṃ pītiṃ pamodanaṃ uppādetvā.
anya-e0103n:694_0: Nimittaggāhanti nimittassa uggaṇhanaṃ, uggahanimittaṃ. Sampādentoti sādhento nipphādento.
anya-e0103n:694_1: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ upanibandhatīti bhāvanaṃ yathāvutte nimitte upanento nibandhati. Yogakammaṃ
anya-e0103n:694_2: hi yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato “kammaṭṭhāna”nti adhippetaṃ, yogakammassa
anya-e0103n:694_3: vā pavattiṭṭhānatāya yathāupaṭṭhitanimittaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ bhāvanācitte upanibandhati.
anya-e0103n:694_4: Taṃ panassa upanibandhanaṃ sandhāya cittaṃ sañcarāpetabbaṃ. Evaṃ “visesamadhigacchatī”ti
anya-e0103n:694_5: vuttanti dassento “tassa hī”tiādimāha. Tattha tassāti yogino, tassa vā uddhumātakāsubhassa.
anya-e0103n:694_6: Mānasaṃ cārentassāti bhāvanācittaṃ aparāparaṃ pavattentassa, uggahanimittaṃ punappunaṃ
anya-e0103n:695_1: atthaṃ vatvā taṃ pana kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ, tassā ca sampaṭipādanavidhiṃ vitthārato
anya-e0103n:695_2: dassetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha katimīti pakkhassa katamī, kiṃ dutiyā, tatiyādīsu
anya-e0103n:695_3: vā aññatarāti attho. Tuṇhībhūtena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati pucchantānaṃ cittassa aññathattapariharaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:695_4: Appasannānañhi pasādāya, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvāya sāsanasampaṭipatti. Nassatīti
anya-e0103n:695_5: na dissati, na upaṭṭhātīti attho. “Āgantukapaṭisanthāro kātabbo”ti iminā āgantukavattaṃ
anya-e0103n:695_6: ekadesena dassitanti “avasesānipī”ti vatvā āgantukavattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ puna
anya-e0103n:695_8: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Vattakkhandhake hi āgatāni mahāvattāni idha “khandhakavattānī”ti
anya-e0103n:695_9: vuttāni. Tajjanīyakammakatādikāle pana pārivāsikādikāle ca caritabbāni imassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0103n:695_10: asambhavato idha nādhippetāni. Nimittaṃ vā antaradhāyatīti susāne ṭhitaṃ asubhanimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:695_12: kāraṇena, imassa kammaṭṭhānassa dullabhattāti attho. Nisīditvā paccavekkhitabboti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:696_0: Nimittaṃ gahetuṃ gamane viya nimittaṃ gahetvā nivattanepi yathāsallakkhitadisādipaccavekkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:696_1: yāva nimittavināsā pavattitakiriyāya avicchedena upadhāraṇatthaṃ. Sati hi tassa nirantarūpadhāraṇe
anya-e0103n:696_2: vihāraṃ pavisitvā nisinnakāle kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhitākāro samathanimittassa gahaṇe
anya-e0103n:696_3: cittassa samāhitākāro viya pākaṭo hutvā upatiṭṭheyyāti. Tenāha “tassevaṃ…pe… vīthiṃ
anya-e0103n:696_4: paṭipajjatī”ti. Purimākārena nimittassa pākaṭabhāvena upaṭṭhitattā purimākāreneva
anya-e0103n:697_0: 116. Uddhumātakaṃ nāma ativiya asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlaṃ bībhacchaṃ bhayānakañca,
anya-e0103n:697_1: evarūpe ārammaṇe bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa evaṃ ābaddhaparikammassa thirībhūtasseva
anya-e0103n:697_2: yogino adhippāyo samijjhatīti dassetuṃ “ānisaṃsadassāvī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evanti evameva
anya-e0103n:697_3: vuttappakāreneva ānisaṃsadassāvinā. Taṃ rakkheyyāti “addhā iminā sukhaṃ jīvissāmī”ti
anya-e0103n:697_4: attano jīvitaṃ viya taṃ maṇiratanaṃ rakkheyya. Catudhātukammaṭṭhānikotiādi nesaṃ
anya-e0103n:697_6: vā tattha vā niyutto, catudhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ vā pariharanto. Itarānīti vuttāvasiṭṭhāni
anya-e0103n:697_7: anussatibrahmavihārādīni. Taṃ nimittanti taṃ yathāladdhaṃ uggahanimittaṃ. “Rakkhitabba”nti
anya-e0103n:698_0: 117. Nānā karīyati etenāti nānākaraṇaṃ, bhedo. Bībhacchaṃ bheravadassanaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti
anya-e0103n:698_1: manasikārassa anuḷāratāya, anupasantatāya ca ārammaṇassa. Tabbipariyāyato “paṭibhāganimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:698_2: thūlaṅgapaccaṅgapuriso viya upaṭṭhātī”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Bahiddhāti gocarajjhattato
anya-e0103n:698_3: bahiddhā. Kāmānaṃ amanasikārāti asubhabhāvanānubhāvena kāmasaññāya dūrasamussāritattā
anya-e0103n:698_4: kāmaguṇe ārabbha manasikārasseva abhāvā. Amanasikārāti vā manasikārapaṭipakkhahetu.
anya-e0103n:698_5: Yāya hi kāmasaññāya vasena sattā kāme manasi karonti, tassā paṭipakkhabhūtā asubhasaññā
anya-e0103n:698_6: kāmānaṃ amanasikāro, tannimittanti attho. Tenāha “vikkhambhanavasena kāmacchando
anya-e0103n:698_7: pahīyatī”ti. Paṭibhāganimittārammaṇāya hi asubhasaññāya saddhiṃ balappatto samādhi
anya-e0103n:698_8: uppajjamānova kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambheti, anurodhamūlako āghāto mūlakāraṇe vikkhambhite
anya-e0103n:698_9: vikkhambhitoyeva hotīti āha “anunaya…pe… pahīyatī”ti. Na hi kadāci pahīnānunayassa
anya-e0103n:698_10: byāpādo sambhavati. Yathāvuttaasubhasaññāsahagatā hi pīti sātisayā pavattamānāva
anya-e0103n:698_11: byāpādaṃ vikkhambhentī pavattati. Tathā āraddhavīriyatāyāti yathā upacārajjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:698_12: uppajjati, tathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena paggahitavīriyatāya. Vīriyañhi paggaṇhantassa
anya-e0103n:698_13: sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappaṃ viya savipphāratāya thinamiddhaṃ vikkhambhentameva uppajjati.
anya-e0103n:699_0: Vippaṭisāro pacchānutāpo, tappaṭipakkhato avippaṭisāro darathapariḷāhābhāvena cittassa
anya-e0103n:699_1: nibbutatā. Tassa avippaṭisārassa paccayabhūtaṃ sīlaṃ, taṃsahagatā tadupanissayā ca
anya-e0103n:699_2: pītipassaddhisukhādayo sabhāvato, hetuto ca santasabhāvā, tesaṃ anuyuñjanena avūpasantasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:699_4: pahīyatī”ti. Bhāvanāya hi pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā yaṃ sātisayaṃ sukhaṃ labbhati,
anya-e0103n:699_5: taṃ anupasantasabhāvaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vikkhambhentameva uppajjati. Adhigatavisesassāti
anya-e0103n:699_6: yathādhigatassa bhāvanāvisesassa. Paccakkhatāyāti paṭipajjantassa yogino paccakkhabhāvato
anya-e0103n:699_7: “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā, yo evarūpiṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ desetī”ti paṭipattidesake
anya-e0103n:699_8: satthari. Paṭipattiyanti paṭipajjamānajjhānapaṭipattiyaṃ. Paṭipattiphaleti tāya sādhetabbe
anya-e0103n:699_10: Iti pañca nīvaraṇāni pahīyantīti evaṃ paṭibhāganimittapaṭilābhasamakālameva heṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:699_11: pavattabhāvanānubhāvanipphannehi samādhiādīhi kāmacchandādīni pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena
anya-e0103n:699_12: pahīyanti. Na hi paṭipakkhena vinā pahātabbassa pahānaṃ sambhavati, paṭipakkhā ca
anya-e0103n:699_13: samādhiādayo kāmacchandādīnaṃ. Yathāha peṭake “samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:700_0: Teneva ca “imehi tesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahāna”nti pahānaparidīpanamukhena jhānaṅgāni
anya-e0103n:700_1: sarūpato dassetuṃ “tasmiññeva cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tasmiññeva cāti yaṃ taṃ yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0103n:700_2: uggahanimittaṃ bhinditvā viya upaṭṭhitaṃ, tassa paṭicchannabhūtaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ,
anya-e0103n:700_3: tasmiññeva nimitte. Cetasoti attanā sampayuttacittassa. Abhiniropanalakkhaṇoti āropanalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0103n:700_4: appanāsabhāvoti attho. Nimittānumajjanaṃ paṭibhāganimitte anuvicaraṇaṃ. Ārammaṇe
anya-e0103n:700_5: hi bhamarassa padumassūpari anuparibbhamanaṃ viya vicārassa anuvicāraṇākārena pavatti
anya-e0103n:700_6: anumajjanakiccaṃ. Viseso eva adhigantabbato visesādhigamo, paṭiladdho ca so visesādhigamo
anya-e0103n:700_7: cāti paṭi…pe… gamo, tappaccayā taṃhetukā paṭiladdhavisesādhigamapaccayā pīti. Pītimanassa
anya-e0103n:700_9: kāyo passambhatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Passaddhinimittaṃ passaddhihetukaṃ sukhaṃ “passaddhakāyo
anya-e0103n:700_10: sukhaṃ vediyatī”ti vacanato. Sukhanimittā sukhapaccayā ekaggatā. “Sukhino cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:700_11: samādhiyatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Iti jhānaṅgāni pātubhavantīti evaṃ etāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni
anya-e0103n:700_12: tasmiṃyeva nimitte uppajjanti. Paṭhamajjhānapaṭibimbabhūtanti paṭhamajjhānassa paṭicchannabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0103n:702_0: 118. Vinīlakādīsupi kammaṭṭhānesu. Lakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti yaṃ taṃ nimittaggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:702_1: vuttaṃ. Vuttanayenevāti uddhumātake vuttanayeneva. Saha vinicchayena, adhippāyena
anya-e0103n:702_2: cāti savinicchayādhippāyaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ veditabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:703: Kabarakabaravaṇṇanti yebhuyyena sabalavaṇṇaṃ. Ussadavasenāti rattasetanīlavaṇṇesu ussadassa vaṇṇassa vasena.
anya-e0103n:705_0: Corāṭaviyanti corehi pariyuṭṭhitaaraññe. Yatthāti yasmiṃ āghātane. Chinnapurisaṭṭhāneti
anya-e0103n:705_1: chinnapurisavante ṭhāne. Nānādisāyaṃ patitampīti chinnaṃ hutvā sarīrassa khaṇḍadvayaṃ
anya-e0103n:705_2: visuṃ disāsu patitampi. Ekāvajjanenāti ekasamannāhārena. Āpāthamāgacchatīti ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0103n:705_3: āpāthaṃ āgacchati. Vissāsaṃ āpajjatīti ajegucchitaṃ upagaccheyya seyyathāpi chavaḍāhako.
anya-e0103n:705_4: Sahatthā aparāmasane jigucchā saṇṭhātiyevāti āha “kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā…pe…
anya-e0103n:706: Khāyitasadisamevāti khāyitāsubhasadisameva. Aṅgulaṅgulantaranti vividhaṃ khittaṃ sarīrāvayavaṃ aṅgulantaraṃ aṅgulantaraṃ. Katvā vāti kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā sayaṃ katvā vā.
anya-e0103n:707: Laddhappahārānanti laddhāvudhappahārānaṃ mukhatoti sambandho. Mukhatoti pahārādimukhato. Paggharamānakāleti lohitaṃ paggharamānakāle. Lohitakaṃ labbhatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:708: Tanti puḷavakaṃ. Tesūti soṇādisarīresu. Aṭṭhikanti aṭṭhikaasubhaṃ nānappakārato vuttanti sambandho. Purimanayenevāti pubbe uddhumātake vuttanayeneva.
anya-e0103n:709_0: 119. Tanti aṭṭhikaṃ. Na upaṭṭhātīti sabhāvato na upaṭṭhāti, paṭikkūlavasena na upaṭṭhātīti
anya-e0103n:709_1: attho. Tenāha “odātakasiṇasambhedo hotī”ti. Aṭṭhike paṭhamavayādisaṃlakkhaṇaṃ na
anya-e0103n:709_2: sakkāti “liṅganti idha hatthādīnaṃ nāma”nti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā pana “ayaṃ
anya-e0103n:709_3: daharassa, ayaṃ yobbane ṭhitassa, ayaṃ avayavehi vuddhipattissā”ti evaṃ vayavasena
anya-e0103n:709_4: vavatthapetuṃ sakkuṇeyyāva, abyāpitāya pana na gahitanti veditabbaṃ. Yadipi aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:709_5: sandhito vavatthāpanaṃ labbhati, aṭṭhike pana na labbhatīti tassa aniyatabhāvadīpanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:709_6: kamavilaṅghanaṃ katvā “tassa tassa aṭṭhino ninnaṭṭhānathalaṭṭhānavasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:709_7: Tattha ninnaṭṭhānaṃ nāma aṭṭhino vinatappadeso. Thalaṭṭhānaṃ unnatappadeso. Ghaṭitaghaṭitaṭṭhānavasenāti
anya-e0103n:709_9: Antaravasenāti aññamaññassa antaravasena, susiravasena ca. Sabbatthevāti sakalāya
anya-e0103n:710_0: 120. Etthāti etasmiṃ aṭṭhikāsubhe. Yujjamānavasena sallakkhetabbanti yaṃ nimittaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:710_1: yattha yujjati, taṃ tattha uggaṇhanatthaṃ nimittaggahaṇavasena upalakkhetabbaṃ. Sakalāyāti
anya-e0103n:710_2: anavasesabhāgāya paripuṇṇāvayavāya. Sampajjati nimittupaṭṭhānavasena. Tesūti aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṭṭhikesu.
anya-e0103n:710_3: Vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Tanti “ekasadisamevā”ti vacanaṃ. Ekasmiṃ aṭṭhike yuttanti idaṃ
anya-e0103n:710_4: yathā vinīlakādīsu ubhinnaṃ nimittānaṃ yathārahaṃ vaṇṇavisesato, paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇato,
anya-e0103n:710_5: savivarāvivarato, calācalato ca viseso labbhati, na evametassāti katvā vuttaṃ, na
anya-e0103n:710_6: pana sabbena sabbaṃ visesābhāvato. Tenevāha “ekaṭṭhikepi cā”tiādi. Tattha bībhacchenāti
anya-e0103n:710_7: suvibhūtaaṭṭhirūpattā aṭṭhibhāveneva virūpena. Bhayānakenāti teneva pākatikasattānaṃ
anya-e0103n:710_8: bhayāvahena. Pītisomanassajanakenāti saṇhamaṭṭhabhāvena upaṭṭhānato, bhāvanāya ca
anya-e0103n:710_9: savisesattā pītiyā, somanassassa ca uppādakena. Tenevāha “upacārāvahattā”ti.
anya-e0103n:711_0: Imasmiṃ okāseti uggahapaṭibhāganimittānaṃ vuttaṭṭhāne. Dvāraṃ datvā vāti “paṭikkūlabhāveyeva
anya-e0103n:711_1: diṭṭhe nimittaṃ nāma hotī”ti ettake eva aṭṭhatvā anantarameva “duvidhaṃ idha nimitta”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:711_2: uggahapaṭibhāganimittāni vibhajitvā vacanena yathāvuttassa nimittavibhāgassa dvāraṃ
anya-e0103n:711_3: datvāva vuttaṃ. Nibbikappanti “subha”nti vikappena nibbikappaṃ, asubhantvevāti attho.
anya-e0103n:712_1: sakalassāpi tassā itthiyā sarīrassa aṭṭhisaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhānādīni ettha aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:713_0: Subhaguṇoti savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā suparisuddhaguṇo. Dasasatalocanenāti
anya-e0103n:713_1: sahassakkhena devānamindena. So hi ekāsaneneva sahassaatthānaṃ vicāraṇasamatthena
anya-e0103n:713_2: paññācakkhunā samannāgatattā “sahassakkho”ti vuccati. Thutakittīti “yo dhīro sabbadhi
anya-e0103n:715_2: Sarīrañhi vinassamānaṃ aññarūpena ṭhitassa rakkhasassa viya sabhāvappattivaseneva
anya-e0103n:715_4: ayamasubhappabhedo vutto, mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsu kathaṃ navappabhedoti? So sarasato
anya-e0103n:715_5: eva sabhāvappattivasena vutto, ayaṃ pana parūpakkamenāpi. Tattha ca idhāgatesu dasasu
anya-e0103n:715_6: asubhesu ekaccāneva gahitāni, aṭṭhikañca pañcavidhā vibhattaṃ. Tāni ca vipassanāvasena,
anya-e0103n:716_0: Imesaṃ pana dassanampi asubhabhāvasāmaññena satipi avisesato rāgacaritānaṃ sappāyabhāve
anya-e0103n:716_1: yaṃ vuttaṃ “rāgacaritabhedavasena cā”ti, taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “visesato”tiādi
anya-e0103n:716_2: vuttaṃ. Sūnabhāvena susaṇṭhitampi sarīraṃ dussaṇṭhitameva hotīti uddhumātakasarīre
anya-e0103n:716_4: ratto saṇṭhānarāgī, tassa sappāyaṃ saṇṭhānarāgassa vikkhambhanupāyabhāvato. Kāyo
anya-e0103n:716_5: eva kāyavaṇo, tattha paṭibaddhassa nissitassa. Susirabhāvappakāsanatoti susirassa
anya-e0103n:716_6: vivarassa atthibhāvappakāsanato. Sarīre ghanabhāvarāginoti sarīre aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0103n:716_7: thirabhāvaṃ paṭicca uppajjanakarāgavato. Vikkhepappakāsanatoti soṇasiṅgālādīhi ito
anya-e0103n:716_8: cito ca vikkhepassa pakāsanato aṅgapaccaṅgalīlārāgino sappāyaṃ. Īdisānaṃ kira anavaṭṭhitarūpānaṃ
anya-e0103n:716_9: avayavānaṃ ko līḷāvilāsoti virāgasambhavato. Saṅghātabhedavikārappakāsanatoti saṅghātassa
anya-e0103n:716_10: aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ saṃhatabhāvassa susambandhatāya bhedo eva vikāro saṅghātabhedavikāro,
anya-e0103n:716_11: tassa pakāsanato. Lohitaṃ makkhitaṃ hutvā paṭikkūlabhāvo lohitamakkhitapaṭikkūlabhāvo,
anya-e0103n:716_12: tassa pakāsanato. Mamattarāginoti “mama aya”nti uppajjanakarāgavato. Dantasampattirāginoti
anya-e0103n:717_0: Kasmā panettha uddhumātakādike paṭhamajjhānameva uppajjati, na dutiyādīnīti anuyogaṃ
anya-e0103n:717_1: manasi katvā āha “yasmā panā”tiādi. Aparisaṇṭhitajalāyāti sotavasena pavattiyā samantato
anya-e0103n:717_2: aṭṭhitajalāya asannisinnasalilāya. Arittabalenāti pājanadaṇḍabalena. Dubbalattā ārammaṇassāti
anya-e0103n:717_3: paṭikkūlabhāvena attani cittaṃ ṭhapetuṃ asamatthabhāvo ārammaṇassa dubbalatā. Paṭikkūle
anya-e0103n:717_4: hi ārammaṇe sarasato cittaṃ pavattituṃ na sakkoti, abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana vitakkena
anya-e0103n:717_5: abhiniropiyamānameva cittaṃ ekaggataṃ labhati. Na vinā vitakkenāti vitakkarahitāni
anya-e0103n:717_6: dutiyādijjhānāni tattha patiṭṭhaṃ na labhanti. Tenāha “vitakkabalenevā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:718_0: Yadi paṭikkūlabhāvato uddhumātādiārammaṇe dutiyādijjhānāni na pavattanti, evaṃ sante
anya-e0103n:718_1: paṭhamajjhānenāpi tattha na uppajjitabbaṃ. Na hi tattha pītisomanassānaṃ sambhavo
anya-e0103n:718_2: yuttoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “paṭikkūlepi ca etasmi”ntiādi. Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitānīvaraṇasantāparogavūpasamānaṃ
anya-e0103n:719_0: 122. Yathāvuttakāraṇena dasadhā vavatthitampi sabhāvato ekavidhamevāti dassetuṃ “dasavidhampi
anya-e0103n:719_1: ceta”ntiādiṃ vatvā svāyaṃ sabhāvo yathā aviññāṇakesu, evaṃ saviññāṇakesupi labbhateva.
anya-e0103n:719_2: Tasmā tatthāpi yonisomanasikāravato bhāvanā ijjhatevāti dassento “tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:719_3: Etthāti etasmiṃ jīvamānakasarīre. Alaṅkārenāti paṭijagganapubbakena alaṅkaraṇena.
anya-e0103n:719_4: Na paññāyati pacurajanassāti adhippāyo. Atirekatisataaṭṭhikasamussayaṃ dantaṭṭhikehi
anya-e0103n:719_5: saddhiṃ, tehi pana vinā “timattāni aṭṭhisatānī”ti kāyagatāsatiyaṃ vakkhati. Chiddāvachiddanti
anya-e0103n:719_7: niccakālaṃ upari, heṭṭhā ca vissavantaṃ. Vemattanti nānattaṃ. Nānāvatthehīti nānāvaṇṇehi
anya-e0103n:719_8: vatthehi. Hiriyā lajjāya kopanato vināsanato hirikopinaṃ, uccārapassāvamaggaṃ. Yāthāvasarasanti
anya-e0103n:719_9: yathābhūtaṃ sabhāvaṃ. Yāthāvato rasīyati ñāyatīti hi raso, sabhāvo. Ratinti abhiratiṃ
anya-e0103n:719_10: abhiruciṃ. Attasinehasaṅkhātena rāgena rattā attasineharāgarattā. Vihaññamānenāti
anya-e0103n:720_0: Kiṃsukanti pālibhaddakaṃ, palāsoti keci, simbalīti apare. Atilolupoti ativiya lolasabhāvo.
anya-e0103n:720_1: Adunti etaṃ. Nanti kesādisarīrakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Mucchitāti mohitā, mucchāpāpikāya vā taṇhāya
anya-e0103n:721_0: Ukkarūpamoti uccārapassāvaṭṭhānasamo, vaccakūpasamo vā. Cakkhubhūtehīti cakkhuṃ pattehi
anya-e0103n:721_1: paṭiladdhapaññācakkhukehi, lokassa vā cakkhubhūtehi. Allacammapaṭicchannoti allacammapariyonaddho.
anya-e0103n:722_0: Dabbajātikenāti uttarimanussadhamme paṭiladdhuṃ bhabbarūpena. Yattha yattha sarīre,
anya-e0103n:722_1: sarīrassa vā yattha yattha koṭṭhāse. Nimittaṃ gahetvāti asubhākārassa suṭṭhu sallakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0103n:722_2: yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ uggaṇhanavasena nimittaṃ gahetvā, uggahanimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:722_3: uppādetvāti attho. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpetabbanti yathāladdhe uggahanimitte kammaṃ
anya-e0103n:722_4: karontena paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppādetvā upacārajjhāne ṭhitena tameva bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpentena
anya-e0103n:722_5: asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpetabbaṃ. Adhigatappano hi paṭhamajjhāne ṭhito tameva
anya-e0103n:722_6: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā saṅkhāre sammasanto nacirasseva sabbāsave khepetīti.
anya-e0103n:727_1: “Anu anu sati anussatī”ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “punappunaṃ uppajjanato”ti vatvā na
anya-e0103n:727_2: ettha anu-saddayogena sati-saddo atthantaravācakoti dassetuṃ “satiyeva anussatī”ti
anya-e0103n:727_3: vuttaṃ. Tena nāyamanu-saddo “upalabbhatī”tiādīsu upa-saddo viya anatthako, nāpi “sañjānanaṃ
anya-e0103n:727_5: vā pavattattā”ti iminā ca anussatiyā anussaritabbānurūpatā vuttā hotīti pavattakasseva
anya-e0103n:727_6: anurūpataṃ dassetuṃ “kulaputtassa anurūpā”ti vuttaṃ, saddhāpabbajitassa vā kulaputtassa.
anya-e0103n:727_7: Anurūpatā nāma pavattitabbaṭṭhānassa anurūpatāya eva hotīti pavattakasseva anurūpatā
anya-e0103n:727_8: vuttā, na ubhayassa. Anurūpāti ca yuttāti attho. Buddhanti ye guṇe upādāya bhagavati
anya-e0103n:727_9: “buddho”ti paññatti, te guṇe ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Tenāha “buddhaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0103n:727_10: satiyā etamadhivacana”nti. Ārabbhāti ālambitvā. Dhammanti pariyattidhammena saddhiṃ
anya-e0103n:727_11: navavidhampi lokuttaradhammaṃ. Nanu ca nibbānaṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena vakkhati?
anya-e0103n:727_12: Kiñcāpi vakkhati, dhammabhāvasāmaññena pana maggaphalehi saddhiṃ idha pāḷiyā saṅgahitattā
anya-e0103n:727_13: tassāpi dhammānussatikammaṭṭhāne gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, asaṅkhatāmatādibhāvena pana
anya-e0103n:727_14: maggaphalehi visiṭṭhatāya tassa visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Sīlānussatiādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:727_15: pana tissannaṃ anussatīnaṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṃ yogāvacarassa attano
anya-e0103n:727_16: eva sīlassa cāgassa saddhādīnañca anussatiṭṭhānabhāvena gahetabbattā. Rūpakāyaṃ gatāti
anya-e0103n:727_17: attano karajakāyaṃ ārabbha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattā. Kāyeti kāye visayabhūte.
anya-e0103n:727_19: sattasu anussatīsu natthi nimittuppatti, idha atthīti dassanatthaṃ nimitta-ggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:727_20: Tathā assāsapassāsanimittārammaṇāyāti etthāpi. Upasamanti sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṃ, nibbānanti attho.
anya-e0103n:728_0: 124. Avecca buddhaguṇe yāthāvato ñatvā uppanno pasādo aveccappasādo, ariyamaggena
anya-e0103n:728_1: āgatappasādo, taṃsadisopi vā yo diṭṭhigatavātehi acalo asampakampiyo, tena samannāgatena.
anya-e0103n:728_2: Tādisassa buddhānussatibhāvanā ijjhati, na itarassa. Patirūpasenāsaneti yathāvuttaaṭṭhārasadosavajjite
anya-e0103n:728_3: pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane. Rahogatenāti rahasi gatena. Tena kāyavivekaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:728_4: Paṭisallīnenāti nānārammaṇato paṭisallīnena, bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato paṭikkamāpetvā
anya-e0103n:728_5: kammaṭṭhāne sallīnena, susiliṭṭhacittenāti attho. Evanti imāya pāḷiyā āgatanayena.
anya-e0103n:729_0: So bhagavāti ettha soti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ
anya-e0103n:729_1: sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho devānaṃ atidevo brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi
anya-e0103n:729_2: kāraṇehi sadevake loke “bhagavā”ti patthaṭakittisaddo, so. Bhagavāti idaṃ satthu
anya-e0103n:729_3: nāmakittanaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata”ntiādi. Parato pana
anya-e0103n:729_4: bhagavāti guṇakittanaṃ. Arahantiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ itipi-saddaṃ yojetvā
anya-e0103n:729_5: buddhaguṇā anussaritabbāti dassento “itipi arahaṃ…pe… itipi bhagavāti anussaratī”ti
anya-e0103n:729_6: āha. “Itipetaṃ bhūtaṃ itipetaṃ taccha”ntiādīsu viya iti-saddo āsannapaccakkhakaraṇattho,
anya-e0103n:729_7: pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena nesaṃ bahubhāvo dīpito, tāni ca guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni
anya-e0103n:729_8: bhāventena cittassa sammukhībhūtāni kātabbānīti dassento “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:730_0: 125. Dūratā nāma āsannatā viya upādāyupādāya vuccatīti paramukkaṃsagataṃ dūrabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:730_1: dassento “suvidūravidūre”ti āha, suṭṭhu vidūrabhāveneva vidūreti attho. Sā panassa
anya-e0103n:730_2: kilesato dūratā tesaṃ sabbaso pahīnattāti dassento āha “maggena kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā”ti.
anya-e0103n:730_3: Nanu aññesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ te pahīnā evāti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ “savāsanāna”nti.
anya-e0103n:730_4: Na hi bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṃ sakkonti, etena aññehi
anya-e0103n:730_5: asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato arahattanti dassitaṃ hoti. Kā panāyaṃ vāsanā nāma? Pahīnakilesassāpi
anya-e0103n:730_7: pilindavacchassa vasalasamudācāranimittaṃ viya. Kathaṃ pana “ārakā”ti vutte “kilesehī”ti
anya-e0103n:730_8: ayamattho labbhatīti? Sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato, visesatthinā ca visesassa
anya-e0103n:730_9: anupayojetabbato, “ārakāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā”tiādīni suttapadānettha udāharitabbāni.
anya-e0103n:730_10: Ārakāti cettha ā-kārassa rassattaṃ, ka-kārassa ca ha-kāraṃ, sānusāraṃ katvā niruttinayena
anya-e0103n:730_11: “araha”nti padasiddhi veditabbā. Vuttamevatthaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ “so tato ārakā
anya-e0103n:730_12: nāmā”ti gāthābandhamāha. Tattha samañjanasīlo samaṅgī, na samaṅgitā asamaṅgitā asamannāgamo asahavuttitā.
anya-e0103n:731: 126. Anatthacaraṇena kilesā eva arayoti kilesārayo. “Arīnaṃ hatattā arihā”ti vattabbe niruttinayena “araha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:732_0: 127. Yañcetaṃ saṃsāracakkanti sambandho. Rathacakkassa nābhi viya mūlāvayavabhūtaṃ
anya-e0103n:732_1: anto, bahi ca samavaṭṭhitaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāmayaṃ dvayanti vuttaṃ “avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhī”ti.
anya-e0103n:732_2: Nābhiyā, nemiyā ca sambandhā arasadisā paccayaphalabhūtehi avijjātaṇhājarāmaraṇehi
anya-e0103n:732_3: sambandhā puññādisaṅkhārāti vuttaṃ “puññādiabhisaṅkhārāra”nti. Tattha tattha bhave
anya-e0103n:732_4: pariyantabhāvena pākaṭaṃ jarāmaraṇanti taṃ nemiṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā āha “jarāmaraṇanemī”ti.
anya-e0103n:732_5: Yathā ca rathacakkapavattiyā padhānakāraṇaṃ akkho, evaṃ saṃsāracakkapavattiyā āsavasamudayoti
anya-e0103n:732_6: āha “āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā”ti. Āsavā eva avijjādīnaṃ kāraṇattā āsavasamudayo.
anya-e0103n:732_8: tibhavo eva ratho, tasmiṃ tibhavarathe. Attano paccayehi samaṃ, sabbaso vā ādito
anya-e0103n:732_9: paṭṭhāya yojitanti samāyojitaṃ. Ādirahitaṃ kālaṃ pavattatīti katvā anādikālappavattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:735_0: Evaṃ vuttasaṃsārova saṃsāracakkaṃ. Anenāti bhagavatā. Bodhimaṇḍeti bodhisaṅkhātassa
anya-e0103n:735_1: ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne, kāle vā. Vīriyapādehīti saṃkilesavodānapakkhiyesu
anya-e0103n:735_2: sannirumbhanasannikkhipanakiccatāya dvidhā pavattehi attano vīriyasaṅkhātehi pādehi.
anya-e0103n:735_3: Sīlapathaviyanti patiṭṭhaṭṭhena sīlameva pathavī, tassaṃ. Patiṭṭhāyāti sampādanavasena
anya-e0103n:735_4: patiṭṭhahitvā. Saddhāhatthenāti anavajjadhammādānasādhanato saddhāva hattho, tena.
anya-e0103n:735_5: Kammakkhayakaranti kāyakammādibhedassa sabbassapi kammassa khayakaraṇato kammakkhayakaraṃ.
anya-e0103n:736_0: 128. Evaṃ “arānaṃ hatattā”ti ettha vuttaaraghāte saṃsāraṃ cakkaṃ viya cakkanti gahetvā
anya-e0103n:736_1: atthayojanaṃ katvā idāni paṭiccasamuppādadesanākkamenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:736_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha anamataggaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭanti anu anu amataggaṃ aviññātakoṭikaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0103n:736_3: Sesā dasa dhammā saṅkhārādayo jātipariyosānā arā. Kathaṃ? Nābhiyā avijjāya mūlato,
anya-e0103n:736_4: nemiyā jarāmaraṇena antato sambandhattāti dassento āha “avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā
anya-e0103n:736_5: cā”ti. Dukkhādīsūti dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggesu. Tattha dukkhe aññāṇaṃ tadantogadhattā,
anya-e0103n:736_6: tappaṭicchādanato ca, sesesu paṭicchādanatova. Dukkhanti cettha dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
anya-e0103n:736_7: adhippetanti taṃ kāmabhavādivasena tidhā bhinditvā tathā tappaṭicchādikaṃ avijjaṃ,
anya-e0103n:736_8: avijjādipaccaye tīsu bhavesu saṅkhārādike ca paṭipāṭiyā dassento “kāmabhave ca avijjā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:736_9: Tattha kāmabhave avijjāti kāmabhave ādīnavappaṭicchādikā avijjā. Rūpabhave arūpabhave
anya-e0103n:736_10: avijjāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kāmabhave saṅkhārānanti kāmabhūmipariyāpannānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:736_11: kāmabhave vā nipphādetabbā ye saṅkhārā, tesaṃ kāmabhavūpapattinibbattakasaṅkhārānanti
anya-e0103n:736_12: attho. Paccayo hotīti puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ tāva ārammaṇapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena
anya-e0103n:736_13: cāti dvidhā paccayo hoti. Apuññābhisaṅkhāresu sahajātassa sahajātādivasena, asahajātassa
anya-e0103n:736_14: anantarasamanantarādivasena, nānantarassa pana ārammaṇavasena ceva upanissayavasena
anya-e0103n:736_15: ca paccayo hoti. Arūpabhave saṅkhārānanti āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ. Paccayo hoti upanissayavaseneva.
anya-e0103n:736_16: Imasmiṃ panatthe ettha vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hoti, sayameva ca parato āgamissatīti
anya-e0103n:737_0: Tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānanti cakkhusotamanāyatanānaṃ. Ekassāyatanassāti manāyatanassa. Iminā
anya-e0103n:737_1: nayena phassādīnampi vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhāti rūpataṇhādibhedā
anya-e0103n:738_0: Taṇhādimūlikā kathā atisaṃkhittāti taṃ, upādānabhave ca vibhajitvā vitthāretvā dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:738_2: Tathā “saggasampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”tiādīhi. Sā pana taṇhā yasmā bhusamādānavasena
anya-e0103n:738_3: pavattamānā kāmupādānaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “kāmupādānapaccayā”ti. Tathevāti
anya-e0103n:739_0: Brahmalokasampattinti rūpībrahmaloke sampattiṃ. “Sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:739_1: kāmā”ti vacanato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti katvā “kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṃ
anya-e0103n:739_2: bhāvetī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sesupādānamūlikāsupīti etthāyaṃ yojanā – idhekacco “natthi
anya-e0103n:739_3: paro loko”ti natthikadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādi
anya-e0103n:739_4: vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ. Aparo “asukasmiṃ sampattibhave attā ucchijjatī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0103n:739_5: gaṇhāti, so tatrūpapattiyā kāyena sucaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:739_6: Aparo “rūpī manomayo hutvā attā ucchijjatī”ti rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti. Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti
anya-e0103n:739_7: sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Aparo “arūpabhave uppajjitvā attā ucchijjatī”ti
anya-e0103n:739_8: arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti. Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:739_9: Etāhiyeva attavādupādānamūlikāpi yojanā saṃvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādavasenāpi
anya-e0103n:739_10: yojanā veditabbā. Aparo “sīlena suddhī”ti “asuddhimaggaṃ suddhimaggo”ti parāmasanto
anya-e0103n:739_11: sīlabbatupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādinā sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:740_0: Idāni yvāyaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena “kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo
anya-e0103n:740_1: hotī”tiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo, saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayuppannabhāvo ca dassito,
anya-e0103n:740_2: tameva paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento “evaṃ aya”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:740_3: Tattha yathā saṅkhārā hetunibbattā, evaṃ avijjāpi kāmāsavādinā sahetukā evāti āha
anya-e0103n:740_5: paricchijja gahaṇe, nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ. Paññāti kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhisaṅkhātā
anya-e0103n:740_6: pakārato jānanā. Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti paṭiccasamuppādāvabodho. Idañca dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:740_7: yasmā addhāttaye kaṅkhāmalavitaraṇavasena pavattati, tasmā “atītampi addhāna”ntiādi
anya-e0103n:740_8: vuttaṃ. Eteneva nayenāti etena “avijjā hetū”tiādinā avijjāyaṃ vuttena nayena. “Saṅkhārā
anya-e0103n:741_0: Saṃkhippanti ettha avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepo, hetu, vipāko ca. Hetu vipākoti
anya-e0103n:741_1: vā saṃkhippatīti saṅkhepo, avijjādayo viññāṇādayo ca. Saṅkhepabhāvasāmaññena pana
anya-e0103n:741_2: ekavacanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Te pana saṅkhepā atīte hetu, etarahi vipāko, etarahi
anya-e0103n:741_3: hetu, āyatiṃ vipākoti evaṃ kālavibhāgena cattāro jātā. Tenāha “purimasaṅkhepo cettha
anya-e0103n:741_4: atīto addhā”tiādi. Saṅkhepa-saddo vā bhāgādhivacananti atīto hetubhāgo paṭhamo saṅkhepo.
anya-e0103n:741_5: Esa nayo sesesupi. Taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva honti kilesakammabhāvasāmaññato, tehi
anya-e0103n:741_6: vinā avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ sakiccākaraṇato ca. Kammaṃ taṇhā ca tassa sahakārīkāraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:742_1: vuttāti āha “jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena viññāṇādīnaṃ niddiṭṭhattā”ti. Imeti viññāṇādayo.
anya-e0103n:742_2: Āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ paccuppannahetuto bhāvīnaṃ anāgatānaṃ gahitattā. Teti avijjādayo.
anya-e0103n:742_3: Ākāratoti sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi
anya-e0103n:742_4: pakāsīyantīti ākārā, atītahetuādīnaṃ vā pakārā ākārā, tato ākārato. Vīsatividhā honti
anya-e0103n:743_0: Saṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ antarā eko sandhīti hetuto phalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalasambandhabhūto
anya-e0103n:743_1: eko sandhi. Tathā bhavajātīnamantarā. Vedanātaṇhānamantarā pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato
anya-e0103n:743_2: phalahetusambandhabhūto eko sandhi. Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa
anya-e0103n:744_0: Itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Tenāha “catusaṅkhepa”ntiādi. Sabbākāratoti idha vuttehi,
anya-e0103n:744_1: avuttehi ca paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge, anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānādīsu ca āgatehi sabbehi
anya-e0103n:744_2: ākārehi. Jānātīti avabujjhati. Passatīti dassanabhūtena ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato
anya-e0103n:744_3: passati. Aññāti paṭivijjhatīti tesaṃyeva vevacanaṃ. Tanti taṃ jānanaṃ. Ñātaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0103n:744_4: yathāsabhāvato jānanaṭṭhena. Pajānanaṭṭhenāti aniccādīhi pakārehi paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena.
anya-e0103n:745_0: Idāni yadatthamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ idhānītaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “iminā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:745_1: te dhammeti te avijjādike dhamme. Yathābhūtaṃ ñatvāti mahāvajirañāṇena yāthāvato
anya-e0103n:745_2: jānitvā. Nibbindanto balavavipassanāya virajjanto vimuccanto ariyamaggehi are hanīti
anya-e0103n:745_3: yojanā. Tattha yadā bhagavā virajjati vimuccati, tadā are hanati nāma. Tato paraṃ
anya-e0103n:745_4: pana abhisambuddhakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ “hani vihani viddhaṃsesī”ti.
anya-e0103n:746_0: 129. Cakkavattino acetane cakkaratane uppanne tattheva loko pūjaṃ karoti, aññattha
anya-e0103n:746_1: pūjāvisesā pacchijjanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana sammāsambuddhe uppanneti dassento “uppanne
anya-e0103n:746_2: tathāgate”tiādimāha. Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti yathāvuttato aññesaṃ amahesakkhehi
anya-e0103n:746_3: devamanussehi kariyamānānaṃ nātiuḷārānaṃ pūjāvisesānaṃ arahabhāve kā nāma kathā.
anya-e0103n:747_0: 130. Asilokabhayenāti akittibhayena. Raho pāpaṃ karonti “mā naṃ koci jaññā”ti esa
anya-e0103n:747_1: bhagavā na kadāci karoti pāpahetūnaṃ bodhimaṇḍe eva suppahīnattā. Aparo nayo – ārakāti
anya-e0103n:747_2: arahaṃ, suvidūrabhāvatoicceva attho. Kuto pana suvidūrabhāvatoti? Ye abhāvitakāyā
anya-e0103n:747_3: abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā, tato eva appahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa
anya-e0103n:747_4: akovidā ariyadhamme avinītā ariyadhammassa adassāvino appaṭipannā micchāpaṭipannā
anya-e0103n:748_0: “Saṅghāṭikaṇṇecepi me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa
anya-e0103n:748_1: pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo
anya-e0103n:748_2: muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo. Atha kho so ārakāva
anya-e0103n:748_3: mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. Taṃ kissa hetu? Dhammaṃ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati,
anya-e0103n:749: Yathāvuttapuggalā hi sacepi sāyaṃ pātaṃ satthu santikāvacarāva siyuṃ, na te tāvatā “satthu santikā”ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṃ. Iti asappurisānaṃ ārakā dūreti arahaṃ.
anya-e0103n:751: Ārakā tehi bhagavā, dūre tenārahaṃ mato”ti.
anya-e0103n:752_0: Tathā ārakāti arahaṃ, āsannabhāvatoti attho. Kuto pana āsannabhāvatoti? Ye bhāvitakāyā
anya-e0103n:752_1: bhāvitasīlā bhāvitacittā bhāvitapaññā, tato eva pahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa
anya-e0103n:752_2: kovidā ariyadhamme suvinītā ariyadhammassa dassāvino sammāpaṭipannā, tato āsannabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:753_0: “Yojanasate cepi me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya, so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu
anya-e0103n:753_1: na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito
anya-e0103n:753_2: ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo. Atha kho so santikeva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. Taṃ kissa
anya-e0103n:753_3: hetu? Dhammaṃ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passati, dhammaṃ passanto maṃ passatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:754: Tathārūpā hi puggalā satthu yojanasahassantarikāpi honti, na tāvatā te “satthu dūracārino”ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṃ. Iti sappurisānaṃ ārakā āsanneti arahaṃ.
anya-e0103n:756: Ārakā tehi āsanne, tenāpi arahaṃ jino.
anya-e0103n:757_0: Ye ime rāgādayo pāpadhammā yasmiṃ santāne uppajjanti, tassa diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi
anya-e0103n:757_1: anatthaṃ āvahanti. Nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya ekaṃseneva ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ca,
anya-e0103n:757_2: te attahitaṃ, parahitañca paripūretuṃ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā
anya-e0103n:757_3: pariccajitabbā pahātabbāti rahā nāma, te ca yasmā bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggena
anya-e0103n:758: “Tathāgatassa kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgo pahīno doso moho, sabbepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā”ti.
anya-e0103n:759: Tasmā sabbaso na santi etassa rahāti arahoti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṃ a-kārādesaṃ katvā “araha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:761: Tesaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṃ mato.
anya-e0103n:762_0: Ye te sabbaso pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā bhāvitamaggā sacchikatanirodhā arahanto
anya-e0103n:762_1: khīṇāsavā, ye ca sekkhā appattamānasā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti,
anya-e0103n:762_2: ye ca parisuddhapayogā kalyāṇajjhāsayā saddhāsīlasutādiguṇasampannā puggalā, tehi
anya-e0103n:762_3: na rahitabbo na pariccajitabbo, te ca bhagavatāti arahaṃ. Tathā hi ariyapuggalā satthārā
anya-e0103n:762_4: diṭṭhadhammassa paccakkhakaraṇato satthu dhammasarīrena avirahitā eva honti. Yathāha āyasmā piṅgiyo –
anya-e0103n:767: “Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,
anya-e0103n:771: Teneva ca te aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n:772: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:773_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi yebhuyyena satthari niccalasaddhā eva honti. Iti suppaṭipannehi
anya-e0103n:773_1: purisavisesehi avirahitabbato, tesañca avirahanato na santi etassa rahā pariccajanakā,
anya-e0103n:773_2: natthi vā etassa raho sādhūhi pariccajitabbatāti arahaṃ.
anya-e0103n:775: Na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenārahaṃ mato”ti.
anya-e0103n:776_0: Rahoti ca gamanaṃ vuccati, bhagavato ca nānāgatīsu paribbhamanasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāre
anya-e0103n:776_1: gamanaṃ natthi kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena bodhimūleyeva sabbaso sasambhārassa
anya-e0103n:779: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
anya-e0103n:780: Evaṃ natthi etassa rahogamanaṃ gatīsu paccājātītipi arahaṃ.
anya-e0103n:781: Raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso;
anya-e0103n:783_0: Pāsaṃsattā vā bhagavā arahaṃ. Akkharacintakā hi pasaṃsāyaṃ araha-saddaṃ vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0103n:783_1: Pāsaṃsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito.
anya-e0103n:783_2: Tathā hesa anuttarena sīlena anuttarena samādhinā anuttarāya paññāya anuttarāya vimuttiyā
anya-e0103n:783_3: asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ guṇe vibhajitvā
anya-e0103n:783_4: vuccamāne paṇḍitapurisehi devehi brahmehi bhagavatā vā pana pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpo.
anya-e0103n:784: Guṇehi sadiso natthi, yasmā loke sadevake;
anya-e0103n:789: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṃsā arahaṃ jino”ti.
anya-e0103n:790_0: 131. Sammāti aviparītaṃ. Sāmanti sayameva. Sambuddhoti hi ettha saṃ-saddo “saya”nti
anya-e0103n:790_1: etassa atthassa bodhako daṭṭhabbo. Sabbadhammānanti anavasesānaṃ ñeyyadhammānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:790_2: Kathaṃ panettha sabbadhammāvabodho labbhatīti? Ekadesassa aggahaṇato. Padesaggahaṇe
anya-e0103n:790_3: hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti. Evañca
anya-e0103n:790_4: katvā atthavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya
anya-e0103n:790_5: abhāvato. “Sammā sāmaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho”ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati,
anya-e0103n:790_6: “sabbadhammāna”nti pana atthato labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Na hi bujjhanakiriyā avisayā yujjati.
anya-e0103n:791_0: Idāni tassā visayaṃ “sabbadhamme”ti sāmaññato vuttaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “abhiññeyye
anya-e0103n:791_1: dhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha abhiññeyyeti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānitabbe. Ke pana
anya-e0103n:791_2: teti? Catusaccadhamme. Abhiññeyyato buddhoti abhiññeyyabhāvato bujjhi. Pubbabhāge
anya-e0103n:791_3: vipassanāpaññāya, adhigamakkhaṇe maggapaññāya, aparabhāge sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi aññāsīti
anya-e0103n:791_4: attho. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Pariññeyye dhammeti dukkhaṃ ariyasaccamāha. Pahātabbeti
anya-e0103n:791_5: samudayapakkhiye. Sacchikātabbeti nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha. Bahuvacananiddeso pana sopādisesādikaṃ
anya-e0103n:791_6: pariyāyasiddhaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā kato, uddeso vā ayaṃ catusaccadhammānanti. Tathā hi
anya-e0103n:791_7: vakkhati “cakkhuṃ dukkhasacca”ntiādi. Uddeso ca avinicchitatthaparicchedassa dhammassa
anya-e0103n:791_8: vasena karīyati. Uddesena hi uddisiyamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāmattaṃ vuccati, na
anya-e0103n:791_9: paricchedoti aparicchedena bahuvacanena vuttaṃ yathā “appaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā
anya-e0103n:791_10: dhammā”ti. Sacchikātabbeti vā phalavimuttīnampi gahaṇaṃ, na nibbānassevāti bahuvacananiddeso
anya-e0103n:791_11: kato. Evañca bhāvetabbeti ettha jhānānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:792_0: Gāthāyaṃ bhāvetabbañcāti ettha ca-saddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena sacchikātabbassa
anya-e0103n:792_1: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tasmā buddhosmīti yasmā cattāri saccāni mayā buddhāni, saccavinimuttañca
anya-e0103n:792_2: kiñci ñeyyaṃ natthi, tasmā sabbampi ñeyyaṃ buddhosmi, abbhaññāsinti attho.
anya-e0103n:793_0: 132. Evaṃ saccavasena sāmaññato vuttamatthaṃ dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammehi,
anya-e0103n:793_1: khandhādīhi ca saccavaseneva vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “api cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha mūlakāraṇabhāvenāti
anya-e0103n:793_2: santesupi avijjādīsu aññesu kāraṇesu tesampi mūlabhūtakāraṇabhāvena. Taṇhā hi kammassa
anya-e0103n:793_3: vicittabhāvahetuto, sahāyabhāvūpagamanato ca dukkhavicittatāya padhānakāraṇaṃ. Samuṭṭhāpikāti
anya-e0103n:793_4: uppādikā. Purimataṇhāti purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā. Ubhinnanti cakkhussa, taṃsamudayassa
anya-e0103n:794_0: Kasiṇānīti kasiṇajjhānāni. Dvattiṃsākārāti dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā, tadārammaṇajjhānāni
anya-e0103n:794_1: ca. Nava bhavāti kāmabhavādayo tayo, saññībhavādayo tayo, ekavokārabhavādayo tayoti
anya-e0103n:794_2: nava bhavā. Cattāri jhānānīti aggahitārammaṇavisesāni cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni,
anya-e0103n:794_3: vipākajjhānānaṃ vā etaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhūtā taṇhā samuṭṭhāpikā
anya-e0103n:794_4: purimataṇhāti veditabbā. Kiriyadhammānaṃ pana yattha te tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā.
anya-e0103n:795_0: Anubuddhoti bujjhitabbadhammassa anurūpato buddho. Tenāti tasmā. Yasmā sāmaññato,
anya-e0103n:795_1: visesato ca ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme buddho, tasmā vuttaṃ. Kinti āha “sammā
anya-e0103n:795_2: sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā”ti, sabbassapi ñeyyassa sabbākārato aviparītaṃ sayameva
anya-e0103n:795_3: abhisambuddhattāti attho. Imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa
anya-e0103n:796_0: Nanu ca sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, aññathā “cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni buddhañāṇānī”ti
anya-e0103n:796_1: vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti? Na virujjhati, visayapavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:796_2: ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā. Ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayatāya
anya-e0103n:796_4: vuttaṃ. Yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṃ “sabbaṃ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:796_5: tattha āvaraṇaṃ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntiādi. Tasmā natthi nesaṃ atthato bhedo,
anya-e0103n:796_6: ekantena cetaṃ evamicchitabbaṃ. Aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ sādhāraṇatā, asabbadhammārammaṇatā
anya-e0103n:796_7: ca āpajjeyya. Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṃ atthi, anāvaraṇañāṇassa
anya-e0103n:796_8: ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṃ na pavattati, tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva
anya-e0103n:796_9: na siyā. Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇato, idha pana sabbattha
anya-e0103n:796_10: appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ. Tassa cādhigamena
anya-e0103n:796_11: bhagavā “sabbaññū, sabbavidū, sammāsambuddho”ti ca vuccati na sakiṃyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato.
anya-e0103n:796_12: Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā
anya-e0103n:796_13: mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ “buddho”ti. Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena
anya-e0103n:796_14: hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.
anya-e0103n:797_0: Etthāha – kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, udāhu
anya-e0103n:797_1: kamenāti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, atītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhādibhedabhinnānaṃ
anya-e0103n:797_2: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ
anya-e0103n:797_3: pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā, tathā ca sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
anya-e0103n:797_4: vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā
anya-e0103n:797_5: hontīti āpajjati. Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ
anya-e0103n:797_6: buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tena te ‘sabbavidū’ti vuccanti, evañca katvā ‘caraṃ samāhito
anya-e0103n:797_7: nāgo, tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṃ suvuttaṃ hotī”ti vadanti, tesampi vuttadosānātivatti,
anya-e0103n:797_9: bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā. Tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.
anya-e0103n:798_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattati? Evampi na yujjati. Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena,
anya-e0103n:798_1: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho
anya-e0103n:798_2: sambhavati, apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa. Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa
anya-e0103n:798_3: ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā ‘sesepi eva’nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:798_4: tañca ñāṇaṃ na anumānikaṃ saṃsayābhāvato. Saṃsayānubaddhaṃ hi loke anumānañāṇa”nti
anya-e0103n:798_5: vadanti, tesampi taṃ na yuttaṃ. Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa
anya-e0103n:798_6: ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā “sesepi eva”nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
anya-e0103n:799_0: Atha tampi paccakkhaṃ, tassa sesabhāvo eva na siyāti? Sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n:799_1: Avisayavicāraṇabhāvato. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ bhagavatā “buddhavisayo, bhikkhave, acinteyyo
anya-e0103n:799_2: na cintetabbo. Yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti. Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:799_3: – yaṃkiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ sakalaṃ, ekadeso vā, tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya
anya-e0103n:799_4: paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati, niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato. Ñātuṃ icchitassa
anya-e0103n:799_5: ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā, ekanteneva sā
anya-e0103n:799_6: icchitabbā “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā
anya-e0103n:800_0: Nanu ca etasmiṃ pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ, tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya
anya-e0103n:800_1: anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti? Na, tassa
anya-e0103n:800_2: visodhitattā. Visodhito hi so buddhavisayo acinteyyoti. Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya
anya-e0103n:800_3: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā. Tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi
anya-e0103n:800_4: taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha
anya-e0103n:800_5: acinteyyaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ
anya-e0103n:800_6: ñeyyaṃ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyya”nti. Evamekajjhaṃ, visuṃ,
anya-e0103n:800_7: sakiṃ, kamena vā icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0103n:801_0: 133. Vijjāhīti ettha vindiyaṃ vindatīti vijjā, yāthāvato upalabbhatīti attho. Attano
anya-e0103n:801_1: vā paṭipakkhassa vijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā, tamokkhandhādikassa padālanaṭṭhenāti attho.
anya-e0103n:801_2: Tato eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā. Sampannattāti samannāgatattā,
anya-e0103n:801_3: paripuṇṇattā vā, avikalattāti attho. Tissannaṃ, aṭṭhannaṃ ca vijjānaṃ tattha tattha
anya-e0103n:801_4: sutte gahaṇaṃ vineyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī
anya-e0103n:801_5: ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ vīriyaṃ sati paññā ca. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu saddho
anya-e0103n:801_6: hotī”tiādi. Cattāri jhānānīti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.
anya-e0103n:802_0: Kasmā panettha sīlādayo pannaraseva “caraṇa”nti vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “imeyeva
anya-e0103n:802_1: hī”tiādi. Tena tesaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṃsato sādhanabhāvamāha.
anya-e0103n:802_2: Idāni tadatthasādhanāya āgamaṃ dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha. Bhagavātiādi vuttassevatthassa
anya-e0103n:803_0: Nanu cāyaṃ vijjācaraṇasampadā sāvakesupi labbhatīti? Kiñcāpi labbhati, na pana tathā,
anya-e0103n:803_1: yathā bhagavatoti dassetuṃ “tattha vijjāsampadā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Caraṇadhammapariyāpannattā
anya-e0103n:803_2: karuṇābrahmavihārassa, so cettha mahaggatabhāvappattā sādhāraṇabhāvoti āha “caraṇasampadā
anya-e0103n:803_3: mahākāruṇikataṃ pūretvā ṭhitā”ti. Yathā sattānaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojanaṃ
anya-e0103n:803_4: paññāya vinā na hoti, evaṃ nesaṃ atthānatthajānanaṃ satthu karuṇāya vinā na hotīti
anya-e0103n:803_5: ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā. Yattha pana yassā padhānabhāvo, taṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:803_6: “so sabbaññutāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā taṃ vijjācaraṇasampannoti yathā aññopi
anya-e0103n:803_7: vijjācaraṇasampanno, tena vijjācaraṇasampannassevāyaṃ āveṇikā paṭipattīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:803_8: Sā panāyaṃ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n:804_0: Ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti, caraṇasampadāya karuṇāmahattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:804_1: Tesu paññāya bhagavato dhammarajjappatti, karuṇāya dhammasaṃvibhāgo. Paññāya saṃsāradukkhanibbidā,
anya-e0103n:804_2: karuṇāya saṃsāradukkhasahanaṃ. Paññāya paradukkhaparijānanaṃ, karuṇāya paradukkhapatikārārambho.
anya-e0103n:804_3: Paññāya parinibbānābhimukhabhāvo, karuṇāya tadadhigamo. Paññāya sayaṃ taraṇaṃ, karuṇāya
anya-e0103n:804_4: paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ. Paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi, karuṇāya buddhakiccasiddhi. Karuṇāya
anya-e0103n:804_5: vā bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ saṃsārābhimukhabhāvo, paññāya tattha anabhirati. Tathā karuṇāya
anya-e0103n:804_6: paresaṃ abhiṃsāpanaṃ, paññāya sayaṃ parehi abhāyanaṃ. Karuṇāya paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ
anya-e0103n:804_7: rakkhati, paññāya attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati. Tathā karuṇāya aparantapo, paññāya
anya-e0103n:804_8: anattantapo. Tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo
anya-e0103n:804_9: siddho hoti. Tathā karuṇāya lokanāthatā, paññāya attanāthatā. Karuṇāya cassa ninnatābhāvo,
anya-e0103n:804_10: paññāya unnamābhāvo. Tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho paññānugatattā na
anya-e0103n:804_11: ca na sabbattha virattacitto, paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto karuṇānugatattā
anya-e0103n:804_12: na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto. Yathā hi karuṇā bhagavato sinehasokavirahitā,
anya-e0103n:804_13: evaṃ paññā ahaṃkāramamaṃkāravinimuttāti aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā
anya-e0103n:805_0: 134. Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati “gate ṭhite”tiādīsu. Sobhananti subhaṃ. Subhabhāvo
anya-e0103n:805_1: visuddhatāya, visuddhatā dosavigamenāti āha “parisuddhamanavajja”nti. Gamanañca nāma
anya-e0103n:805_2: bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṃ gamanaṃ dassento “ariyamaggo”ti āha. So hi nibbānassa
anya-e0103n:805_3: gati adhigamoti katvā “gataṃ, gamana”nti ca vuccati. Idāni tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:805_4: dassetuṃ “tena hesā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khemaṃ disanti nibbānaṃ. Asajjamānoti paripanthābhāvena
anya-e0103n:805_5: sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṃ akaronto, pageva itarattha. Atha vā ekāsane nisīditvā
anya-e0103n:805_6: khippabhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṃ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno asajjanto gato.
anya-e0103n:805_7: Yaṃ gamanaṃ gacchanto sabbamanatthaṃ apaharati, sabbañca anuttaraṃ sampattiṃ āvahati,
anya-e0103n:805_8: tadeva sobhanaṃ nāma. Tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha “iti sobhanagamanattā sugato”ti
anya-e0103n:806_0: Asundarānaṃ dukkhānaṃ saṅkhārappavattīnaṃ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṃ
anya-e0103n:806_1: nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti āha “sundarañcesa ṭhānaṃ gato amataṃ nibbāna”nti. Tenāha bhagavā
anya-e0103n:806_2: “nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti. Sammāti suṭṭhu. Suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa
anya-e0103n:806_3: gamananti āha “pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto”ti. Idañca sikhāppattaṃ sammāgamanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:806_4: yāya āgamanīyapaṭipadāya siddhaṃ, sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā sugatoti
anya-e0103n:806_5: dassetuṃ “sammā vā gato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sammāpaṭipattiyāti sammāsambodhiyā sampāpane
anya-e0103n:806_6: aviparītapaṭipattiyā. “Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto”ti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā
anya-e0103n:806_7: avibhāgena sabbasattānaṃ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti. “Sassataṃ
anya-e0103n:806_8: ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gato”ti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṃ dasseti. “Kāmasukhaṃ
anya-e0103n:806_9: attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gato”ti etena ariyamaggagatiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:807_0: Tatrāti yuttaṭṭhāne yuttasseva bhāsane nipphādetabbe, sādhetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Abhūtanti
anya-e0103n:807_1: abhūtatthaṃ. Atthamukhena hi vācāya abhūtatā, bhūtatā vā. Atacchanti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:807_2: Abhūtanti vā asantaṃ avijjamānaṃ. Atacchanti atathākāraṃ aññathāsantaṃ. Anatthasañhitanti
anya-e0103n:807_3: diṭṭhadhammikena, samparāyikena vā anatthena sañhitaṃ, anatthāvahaṃ. Na atthoti anattho,
anya-e0103n:807_4: atthassa paṭipakkho, abhāvo ca, tena sañhitaṃ, pisuṇavācaṃ, samphappalāpañcāti attho.
anya-e0103n:807_5: Evamettha catubbidhassāpi vacīduccaritassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca paṭhamā vācā
anya-e0103n:807_9: Catutthī “vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṃ sugatiṃ āvahatī”ti lokassa
anya-e0103n:807_10: byāmohanakathā. Pañcamī bhūtena pesuññūpasaṃhārādikathā. Chaṭṭhā yuttappattaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:807_11: pavattitā dānasīlādikathā veditabbā. Evaṃ sammā gadattāti yathāvuttaṃ abhūtādiṃ vajjetvā
anya-e0103n:807_12: bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato
anya-e0103n:807_13: da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṃ
anya-e0103n:808_0: Apica sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato. Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ
anya-e0103n:808_1: ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ bhaddakaṃ. Tathā lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya
anya-e0103n:808_4: yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya, sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahatāya ca sobhanameva. Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena
anya-e0103n:808_5: sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato. Tathā
anya-e0103n:808_6: lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato
anya-e0103n:808_7: atītoti sugato. Lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti
anya-e0103n:808_8: sugato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti
anya-e0103n:808_9: sugato. Tathā yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ
anya-e0103n:808_10: pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammā paccakkhato
anya-e0103n:809_0: 135. Sabbathāti sabbappakārena. Yo yo loko yathā yathā veditabbo, tathā tathā. Te
anya-e0103n:809_1: pana pakāre dassetuṃ “sabhāvato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sabhāvatoti dukkhasabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:809_2: Sabbo hi loko dukkhasabhāvo. Yathāha “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti.
anya-e0103n:809_3: Samudayatoti yato so samudeti, tato taṇhādito. Nirodhatoti yattha so nirujjhati,
anya-e0103n:809_4: tato visaṅkhārato. Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo, tato ariyamaggato,
anya-e0103n:810_0: Iti “sabbathā lokaṃ avedī”ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṃ suttaṃ dassento “yattha kho āvuso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:810_1: Tattha “na jāyatī”tiādinā ujukaṃ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā “na cavati na upapajjatī”ti
anya-e0103n:810_2: padadvayena aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanāni paṭikkhipati. Keci pana “na jāyatītiādi
anya-e0103n:810_3: gabbhaseyyakavasena vuttaṃ, itaraṃ opapātikavasenā”ti vadanti. Tanti jātiādirahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:810_4: Gamanenāti padasā gamanena. Ñāteyyanti jānitabbaṃ. “Ñātāya”nti vā pāṭho, ñātā ayaṃ
anya-e0103n:811_0: Kāmaṃ pādagamanena gantvā lokassantaṃ ñātuṃ, daṭṭhuṃ, pattuṃ vā na sakkā, apica parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:811_1: taṃ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha sasaññimhīti saññāsahite.
anya-e0103n:811_2: Tato eva samanake saviññāṇake. Aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṃ
anya-e0103n:811_3: na sakkāti adhippāyo. Lokanti khandhādilokaṃ. Lokanirodhanti tassa lokassa nirujjhanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:811_4: nibbānameva vā. Adesampi hi taṃ yesaṃ nirodho, tesaṃ vasena upacārato, desatopi niddisīyati
anya-e0103n:811_5: yathā “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha
anya-e0103n:812_0: Gamanenāti pākatikagamanena. Lokassantoti saṅkhāralokassa anto antakiriyāhetubhūtaṃ
anya-e0103n:812_1: nibbānaṃ. Kudācananti kadācipi. Apatvāti aggamaggena anadhigantvā. Pamocananti pamutti
anya-e0103n:812_2: nissaraṇaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā lokassantaṃ apatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā. Haveti
anya-e0103n:812_3: nipātamattaṃ. Lokavidūti sabhāvādito sabbaṃ lokaṃ jānanto. Sumedhoti sundarapañño.
anya-e0103n:812_4: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṃ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū. Maggabrahmacariyavāsassa
anya-e0103n:812_5: pariniṭṭhitattā vusitabrahmacariyo. Sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ samitattā, catusaccadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:812_6: vā abhisamitattā samitāvī. Nāsīsati na pattheti. Yathā imaṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ parañca lokaṃ appaṭisandhikattā.
anya-e0103n:813_0: 136. Evaṃ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvato dassitattā, loko pana ekadeseneva
anya-e0103n:813_1: vuttoti taṃ anavasesato dassetuṃ “apica tayo lokā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha indriyabaddhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:813_2: khandhānaṃ samūho, santāno ca sattaloko. Rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya satto, lokīyanti
anya-e0103n:813_3: ettha kusalākusalaṃ, tabbipāko cāti lokoti. Anindriyabaddhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ samūho,
anya-e0103n:813_4: santāno ca okāsaloko lokiyanti ettha tasā, thāvarā ca, tesañca okāsabhūtoti. Tadādhāratāya
anya-e0103n:813_5: hesa “bhājanaloko”tipi vuccati. Ubhayepi khandhā saṅkhāraloko paccayehi saṅkharīyanti,
anya-e0103n:813_6: lujjanti palujjanti cāti. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikā, paccayāyattavuttikāti
anya-e0103n:813_7: attho. Paccayattho hettha āhāra-saddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu
anya-e0103n:813_8: viya. Evaṃ hi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti. Sā panāyaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikatā
anya-e0103n:813_9: nippariyāyato saṅkhāradhammo, na sattadhammoti āha “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:814_0: Yadi evaṃ “sabbe sattā”ti idaṃ kathanti? Puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanāti nāyaṃ doso. Yathā
anya-e0103n:814_1: aññatthāpi “ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā
anya-e0103n:814_2: vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro
anya-e0103n:814_3: hoti. Katamasmiṃ ekadhamme? Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti. Diṭṭhigatikānaṃ sassatādivasena
anya-e0103n:814_4: “attā, loko”ti ca parikappanā yebhuyyena sattavisayā, na saṅkhāravisayāti āha “sassato
anya-e0103n:814_5: lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:815_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti.
anya-e0103n:815_1: Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṃ paribbhamaneneva tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti.
anya-e0103n:815_2: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakaṃ sahassappakāro okāsaloko, sahassalokadhātuyoti attho.
anya-e0103n:816_0: Tampīti taṃ tividhampi lokaṃ. Tathā hissa sabbathāpi viditoti sambandho. Eko lokoti
anya-e0103n:816_1: “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0103n:816_2: paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā, tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n:816_3: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Nāma-ggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa
anya-e0103n:816_4: aggahaṇaṃ, tassa alokasabhāvattā. Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya
anya-e0103n:816_5: maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, pariññeyyānaṃ dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:816_6: idha “loko”ti adhippetattā. Atha vā “na lujjati na palujjatī”ti yo gahito tathā na
anya-e0103n:816_7: hoti, so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā
anya-e0103n:817_0: Ettha ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti paccayāyattavuttitāvacanena saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā. Tāya
anya-e0103n:817_1: ca “yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā”ti vacanato dukkhānattatā ca
anya-e0103n:817_2: pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni. Nāmanti cattāro arūpino khandhā,
anya-e0103n:817_3: te ca atthato phassādayo. Rūpanti bhūtupādāyarūpāni, tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti
anya-e0103n:817_4: aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā. Taggahaṇeneva ye tesaṃ visesā kusalādayo,
anya-e0103n:817_5: hetuādayo ca, tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha “iti ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito”ti.
anya-e0103n:818_0: Āgamma cittaṃ seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya. Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā
anya-e0103n:818_1: tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo, evaṃ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma
anya-e0103n:818_2: yattha seti, so tassa āsayoti vuccati. So pana sassatadiṭṭhiādivasena catubbidho. Vuttañca –
anya-e0103n:821_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā
anya-e0103n:821_1: imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā. Yathāha “dvayanissito khvāyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena
anya-e0103n:821_2: atthitañca natthitañcā”ti. Atthitāti hi sassataggāho adhippeto, natthitāti ucchedaggāho.
anya-e0103n:821_3: Ayaṃ tāva vaṭṭanissitānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ āsayo. Vivaṭṭanissitānaṃ pana suddhasattānaṃ
anya-e0103n:822: Āsayaṃ jānātīti catubbidhampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti. Jānanto ca tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ, tesañca ñāṇānaṃ appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0103n:823: “Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti, kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti”ādi.
anya-e0103n:824_0: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayantīti anusayā, anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti
anya-e0103n:824_1: attho. Etena nesaṃ kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahataṃ dasseti. Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe
anya-e0103n:824_2: sati uppajjanti. Ke pana te? Rāgādayo satta anāgatā kilesā, atītā, paccuppannā ca
anya-e0103n:824_3: taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti. Na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi. Taṃ
anya-e0103n:824_4: sattavidhaṃ anusayaṃ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0103n:825_0: Caritanti sucaritaduccaritaṃ. Taṃ hi vibhaṅge caritaniddese niddiṭṭhaṃ. Atha vā caritanti
anya-e0103n:825_1: cariyā veditabbā. Tā pana rāgadosamohasaddhābuddhivitakkavasena cha mūlacariyā, tāsaṃ
anya-e0103n:825_2: apariyanto antarabhedo, saṃsaggabhedo pana tesaṭṭhividho. Taṃ caritaṃ sabhāvato saṃkilesavodānato
anya-e0103n:825_3: samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena jānāti.
anya-e0103n:826_0: Adhimutti ajjhāsayadhātu. Sā duvidhā hīnādhimutti paṇītādhimuttīti. Yāya hīnādhimuttikā
anya-e0103n:826_1: sattā hīnādhimuttikeyeva sevanti, paṇītādhimuttikā ca paṇītādhimuttikeyeva. Sā ajjhāsayadhātu
anya-e0103n:826_2: ajjhāsayasabhāvo adhimutti. Taṃ adhimuttiṃ jānāti “imassa adhimutti hīnā, imassa
anya-e0103n:826_3: paṇītā”ti, tatthāpi “imassa mudu, imassa mudutarā, imassa mudutamā”tiādinā. Indriyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:826_4: hi tikkhamudubhāvādinā yathārahaṃ adhimuttiyā tikkhamudubhāvādiko veditabbo. Tathā
anya-e0103n:826_5: hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodanīyaṃ “heṭṭhā gahitāpi adhimutti idha sattānaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā”ti.
anya-e0103n:827_0: Apparajaṃ akkhaṃ etesanti apparajakkhā, appaṃ vā rajaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi etesanti
anya-e0103n:827_1: apparajakkhā, anussadarāgādirajā sattā, te apparajakkhe. Mahārajakkheti etthāpi eseva
anya-e0103n:828_0: Tikkhindriyeti tikhiṇehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. Mudindriyeti mudukehi
anya-e0103n:828_1: saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. Upanissayaindriyāni nāma idhādhippetāni. Svākāreti
anya-e0103n:828_2: sundarākāre kalyāṇapakatike, vivaṭṭajjhāsayeti attho. Suviññāpayeti sammattaniyāmaṃ
anya-e0103n:828_3: viññāpetuṃ sukare saddhe, paññavante ca. Bhabbe abhabbeti ettha bhabbeti kammāvaraṇakilesāvaraṇavipākāvaraṇarahite.
anya-e0103n:828_4: Vuttavipariyāyena dvākāraduviññāpayābhabbā veditabbā. Ettha ca “imassa rāgarajo appo,
anya-e0103n:828_5: imassa dosarajo appo”tiādinā apparajakkhesu jānanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:828_6: Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti, tasmā assa bhagavato
anya-e0103n:829_0: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi. Tassa pana jānanaṃ na nibbidāya
anya-e0103n:829_1: virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṃ, bhagavato pana tampi suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitameva,
anya-e0103n:830_0: “Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘taṃ kiṃ
anya-e0103n:830_1: maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ – yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:831_0: 137. Okāsalokopi sabbathā viditoti sambandho. Cakkavāḷanti lokadhātu. Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena
anya-e0103n:831_2: cāti catuadhikāni tiṃsasatāni, tīṇisahassāni, cattārisatāni cāti attho. Aḍḍhuḍḍhānīti
anya-e0103n:831_3: upaḍḍhacatutthāni, tīṇisatāni, paññāsañcāti attho. Nahutānīti dasasahassāni. Saṅkhātāti
anya-e0103n:831_4: kathitā. Saṇṭhitīti heṭṭhā, uparito cāti sabbaso ṭhiti.
anya-e0103n:832_0: Evaṃ saṇṭhiteti evamavaṭṭhite. Etthāti cakkavāḷe. Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva
anya-e0103n:832_1: caturāsīti yojanasahassāniyeva ubbedho. Na kevalaṃ cettha ubbedhova, atha kho āyāmavitthārāpissa
anya-e0103n:833: “Sineru, bhikkhave, pabbatarājā caturāsīti yojanasahassāni āyāmena, caturāsīti yojanasahassāni vitthārenā”ti.
anya-e0103n:834_0: Tatoti sinerussa heṭṭhā, upari ca vuttappamāṇato. Upaḍḍhupaḍḍhenāti upaḍḍhena upaḍḍhena.
anya-e0103n:834_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca
anya-e0103n:834_2: upari uggato yugandharapabbato, ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva
anya-e0103n:834_3: ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:834_4: Yathā mahāsamuddo yāva cakkavāḷapādamūlā anupubbaninno, evaṃ yāva sinerupādamūlāti
anya-e0103n:834_5: heṭṭhā sinerupamāṇato upaḍḍhapamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṃ suppatiṭṭhito,
anya-e0103n:834_6: evaṃ īsadharādayopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno
anya-e0103n:834_7: anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro”ti. Sineruyugandharādīnaṃ antare sīdantarasamuddā nāma.
anya-e0103n:834_8: Te vitthārato yathākkamaṃ sineruādīnaṃ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti. Brahāti mahanto.
anya-e0103n:835_0: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā. Sineruṃ tāva
anya-e0103n:835_1: parikkhipitvā ṭhito yugandharo, taṃ parikkhipitvā īsadharo. Evaṃ taṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā
anya-e0103n:836_0: Yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanānaṃ satāni
anya-e0103n:836_1: ucco ubbedho. Nagavhayāti naga-saddena avhātabbā rukkhābhidhānā. Paññāsayojanakkhandhasākhāyāmāti’
anya-e0103n:836_2: ubbedhato paññāsayojanakkhandhāyāmā, ubbedhato, samantato ca paññāsayojanasākhāyāmā
anya-e0103n:836_3: ca. Tato eva satayojanavitthiṇṇā, tāvadeva ca uggatā. Yassānubhāvenāti yassā mahantatā
anya-e0103n:838: Sirīsenāti paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ. Sattamanti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, sirīso bhavati sattamoti attho.
anya-e0103n:839_0: Tattha caṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ heṭṭhā, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ upari. Tassa āsannabhāvena candamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0103n:839_1: attano chāyāya vikalabhāvena upaṭṭhāti. Tāni yojanantarikāni yugandharaggapamāṇe
anya-e0103n:839_2: ākāse vicaranti. Asurabhavanaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhā. Avīci jambudīpassa. Jambudīpo sakaṭasaṇṭhāno.
anya-e0103n:839_3: Aparagoyānaṃ ādāsasaṇṭhāno. Pubbavideho addhacandasaṇṭhāno. Uttarakuru pīṭhasaṇṭhāno.
anya-e0103n:839_5: vadanti. Tadantaresūti tesaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu. Tiṇṇaṃ hi pattānaṃ aññamaññaāsannabhāvena
anya-e0103n:839_6: ṭhapitānaṃ antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antare ekeko lokantaranirayo.
anya-e0103n:840_0: Anantānīti aparimāṇāni, “ettakānī”ti aññehi minituṃ asakkuṇeyyāni. Bhagavā anantena
anya-e0103n:840_1: buddhañāṇena avedi “ananto ākāso, ananto sattanikāyo, anantāni cakkavāḷānī”ti tividhampi
anya-e0103n:840_2: anantaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ paricchindati sayampi anantattā. Yāvatakaṃ hi ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ
anya-e0103n:840_3: ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ
anya-e0103n:840_4: ñeyyanti. Tena vuttaṃ “anantena buddhañāṇena avedī”ti. Anantatā cassa anantañeyyapaṭivijjhaneneva
anya-e0103n:840_5: veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā. Nanu cettha vivaṭṭādīnampi viditatā vattabbāti?
anya-e0103n:840_6: Saccaṃ vattabbaṃ, sā pana parato abhiññākathāyaṃ āgamissatīti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n:841_0: 138. Attanāti nissakkavacanametaṃ. Guṇehi attanā visiṭṭhatarassāti sambandho. Tara-ggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:841_1: cettha “anuttaro”ti padassa atthaniddesatāya kataṃ, na visiṭṭhassa kassaci atthitāya.
anya-e0103n:841_2: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi, kuto sadiso. Visiṭṭhe
anya-e0103n:841_3: pana kā kathā. Kassacīti kassacipi. Abhibhavatīti sīlasampadāya upanissayabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0103n:841_5: samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anaññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa pahīnattā ukkaṃsapāramippatto
anya-e0103n:841_6: satthu sīlaguṇo. Tena bhagavā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ aññadatthu abhibhuyya pavattati, na
anya-e0103n:841_7: sayaṃ kenaci abhibhuyyatīti adhippāyo. Evaṃ samādhiguṇādīsupi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:841_8: Sīlādayo cete lokiyalokuttaramissakā veditabbā. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ pana lokiyaṃ kāmāvacarameva.
anya-e0103n:842_0: Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ tena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavatīti? Tassāpi ānubhāvato asadisattā.
anya-e0103n:842_1: Tampi hi visayato, pavattito, pavatti ākārato ca uttaritarameva. Taṃ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:842_2: satthu vimuttiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattati, pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṃ paramagambhīraṃ
anya-e0103n:842_3: saṇhasukhumaṃ savisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ vibhūtataraṃ
anya-e0103n:842_4: katvā pavattati, sammadeva ca vasībhāvassa pāpitattā, bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā
anya-e0103n:843_0: Evaṃ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:843_1: dassetuṃ “asamo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha asamoti ekasmiṃ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena
anya-e0103n:843_2: samā sadisāti asamo. Tathā asamehi atītānāgatabuddhehi samo, asamā vā samā etassāti
anya-e0103n:843_3: asamasamo. Sīlādiguṇena natthi etassa paṭimāti appaṭimo. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:843_4: Tattha upamāmattaṃ paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo, yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭipuggalo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:844_0: Na kho panāhaṃ samanupassāmīti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbalokaṃ
anya-e0103n:844_1: passantopi tattha sadevake…pe… pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṃ sampannatarasīlaṃ
anya-e0103n:844_2: kañci puggalaṃ na kho pana passāmi, tādisassa abhāvatoti adhippāyo. Aggappasādasuttādīnīti ettha –
anya-e0103n:845_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā
anya-e0103n:845_1: arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati
anya-e0103n:845_2: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā. Agge kho pana
anya-e0103n:847: “Sadevake…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti –
anya-e0103n:848: Evamādīni suttapadāni veditabbāni. Ādikā gāthāyoti ettha –
anya-e0103n:849: “Ahaṃ hi arahā loke, ahaṃ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0103n:852: Mutto mocayataṃ aggo, tiṇṇo tārayataṃ varo. ;
anya-e0103n:858_0: 139. Dametīti sameti, kāyasamādīhi yojetīti attho. Taṃ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṃ
anya-e0103n:858_1: yathārahaṃ tadaṅgavinayādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti āha “vinetīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Dametuṃ
anya-e0103n:858_2: yuttāti damanārahā. Amanussapurisāti ettha na manussāti amanussā. Taṃsadisatā ettha
anya-e0103n:858_3: jotīyati, tena manussattamattaṃ natthi, aññaṃ samānanti yakkhādayo “amanussā”ti adhippetā,
anya-e0103n:858_4: na ye keci manussehi aññe. Tathā hi tiracchānapurisānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, yakkhādayo
anya-e0103n:858_5: eva ca niddiṭṭhā. Apalālo himavantavāsī. Cūḷodaramahodarā nāgadīpavāsino. Aggisikhadhūmasikhā
anya-e0103n:858_6: sīhaḷadīpavāsino. Nibbisā katā dosavisassa vinodanena. Tenāha “saraṇesu ca sīlesu
anya-e0103n:858_7: ca patiṭṭhāpitā”ti. Kūṭadantādayoti ādi-saddena ghoṭamukhaupāligahapatiādīnaṃ saṅgaho
anya-e0103n:858_9: daṭṭhabbo. Idaṃ cettha suttanti idaṃ kesisuttaṃ. Vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehīti
anya-e0103n:858_10: etasmiṃ atthe vitthāretabbaṃ yathārahaṃ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayassa dīpanato.
anya-e0103n:859_1: dutiyajjhāna”ntiādinā tassa tassa uparūpari visesaṃ ācikkhantoti sambandho. Sotāpannādīnanti
anya-e0103n:859_2: etthāpi eseva nayo. “Dantepi dametiyevā”ti idaṃ pubbe “sabbena sabbaṃ damathaṃ anupagatā
anya-e0103n:859_3: purisadammā”ti vuttāti katvā vuttaṃ. Ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṃ
anya-e0103n:859_4: nātivattā, te satte sandhāya “dantepi dametiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tepi hi purisadammā evāti,
anya-e0103n:860_0: Atthapadanti atthābhibyañjakapadaṃ, vākyanti attho. Vākyena hi atthābhibyatti, na
anya-e0103n:860_1: nāmādipadamattena. Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo
anya-e0103n:860_2: dassito hoti. Tenāha “bhagavā hī”tiādi. Aṭṭha disāti aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Tā hi aññamaññasambandhāpi
anya-e0103n:860_3: asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena dissanti apadissantīti disā, disā viyāti vā disā. Asajjamānāti na
anya-e0103n:860_4: sajjamānā vasībhāvappattiyā nissaṅgacārā. Dhāvanti javanavuttiyogato. Ekaṃyeva disaṃ
anya-e0103n:860_5: dhāvati, attano kāyaṃ aparivattentoti adhippāyo. Satthārā pana damitā purisadammā
anya-e0103n:860_6: ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti. Tenāha “ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā”ti. Aṭṭha disāti
anya-e0103n:860_7: ca nidassanamattametaṃ, lokiyehi agatapubbaṃ nirodhasamāpattidisaṃ, amatadisañca pakkhandanato.
anya-e0103n:861_0: 140. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha niyuttoti diṭṭhadhammiko, idhalokattho.
anya-e0103n:861_1: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko, tattha niyuttoti
anya-e0103n:861_2: samparāyiko, paralokattho. Paramo uttamo attho paramattho, nibbānaṃ. Tehi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi.
anya-e0103n:861_3: Yathārahanti yathānurūpaṃ. Tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ arahati, tadanurūpaṃ.
anya-e0103n:861_4: Anusāsatīti vineti tasmiṃ atthe patiṭṭhapeti, saha atthena vattatīti sattho, bhaṇḍamūlena
anya-e0103n:861_5: vāṇijjāya desantaraṃ gacchanto janasamūho. Hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo
anya-e0103n:861_6: so etassa atthīti satthā, satthavāho. So viya bhagavāti āha “satthā viyāti satthā,
anya-e0103n:862_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ “yathā satthavāho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:862_1: sattheti satthike jane. Kaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāro, nirudako araññappadeso. Ruḷhīvasena
anya-e0103n:862_2: pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati. Corakantāranti corehi adhiṭṭhitakantāraṃ.
anya-e0103n:862_3: Tathā vāḷakantāraṃ. Dubbhikkhakantāranti dullabhabhikkhaṃ kantāraṃ. Tāretīti akhemantaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:862_4: atikkāmeti. Uttāretītiādi upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. Atha vā uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṃ
anya-e0103n:862_5: upanento tāreti. Nittāretīti akhemantaṭṭhānato nikkhāmento tāreti. Patāretīti pariggahetvā
anya-e0103n:862_6: tāreti, hatthena pariggahetvā viya tāretīti attho. Sabbampetaṃ tāraṇuttāraṇādikhemaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:862_7: ṭhapanamevāti āha “khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpetī”ti. Satteti veneyyasatte. Mahāgahanatāya,
anya-e0103n:862_8: mahānatthatāya, dunnittharaṇatāya ca jātiyeva kantāro jātikantāro, taṃ jātikantāraṃ.
anya-e0103n:863_0: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasenāti ukkaṭṭhasattaparicchedavasena. Devamanussā eva hi ukkaṭṭhasattā,
anya-e0103n:863_2: paricchindanavasena. Etanti “devamanussāna”nti etaṃ vacanaṃ. Bhagavatoti nissakkavacanaṃ
anya-e0103n:863_3: yathā “upajjhāyato ajjhetī”ti, bhagavato santiketi vā attho. Upanissayasampattinti
anya-e0103n:864_0: Gaggarāyāti gaggarāya nāma rañño deviyā, tāya vā kāritattā “gaggarā”ti laddhanāmāya.
anya-e0103n:864_1: Sare nimittaṃ aggahesīti “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṃ gaṇhi,
anya-e0103n:864_2: gaṇhanto ca pasannacitto parisapariyante nipajji. Sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsīti tassa
anya-e0103n:864_3: sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṃ apassanto tattha daṇḍaṃ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi. Maṇḍūkopi
anya-e0103n:864_4: daṇḍe ṭhapitepi uppīḷitepi dhammagatena pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi. Devaloke
anya-e0103n:864_5: nibbattasattānaṃ ayaṃ dhammatā, yā “kutohaṃ idha nibbatto, tattha kiṃ nu kho kammamakāsi”nti
anya-e0103n:864_6: āvajjanā. Tasmā attano purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha “are ahampi nāma idha nibbatto”ti.
anya-e0103n:865_0: Bhagavā jānantova mahājanassa kammaphalaṃ, buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātukāmo “ko
anya-e0103n:865_1: me vandatī”ti gāthāya pucchi. Tattha koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko, katamoti
anya-e0103n:865_2: attho. Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde. Iddhiyāti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. “Yasasā”ti
anya-e0103n:865_3: iminā edisena parivārena, paricchedena ca. Jalanti vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya
anya-e0103n:865_4: kantena kamanīyena sundarena. Vaṇṇenāti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. Sabbā obhāsayaṃ
anya-e0103n:865_5: disāti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento, cando viya, sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti attho.
anya-e0103n:866_0: Evaṃ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṃ pavedento “maṇḍūkohaṃ pure āsi”nti
anya-e0103n:866_1: gāthamāha. Tattha pureti purimajātiyaṃ. “Udake”ti idaṃ tadā attano uppattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:866_2: “Udake maṇḍūko”ti etena uddhamāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:866_3: Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṃ ghāsesanaṭṭhānaṃ. Idha pana gocaro viyāti gocaro,
anya-e0103n:866_4: vāri udakaṃ gocaro etassāti vārigocaro. Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi
anya-e0103n:866_5: hotīti “vārigocaro”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā
anya-e0103n:866_6: desentassa tava dhammaṃ “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa.
anya-e0103n:866_7: Anādare cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Avadhi vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama
anya-e0103n:866_8: samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresīti attho.
anya-e0103n:867_0: Sitaṃ katvāti “tathā parittatarenāpi puññānubhāvena evaṃ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarā
anya-e0103n:867_2: bhiyyoso mattāya taṃ padesaṃ obhāsento sitaṃ katvā. Pītisomanassavasena hi so –
anya-e0103n:869: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
anya-e0103n:870: “Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama;
anya-e0103n:871: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti. ;
anya-e0103n:873_0: 141. Yaṃ pana kiñcīti ettha yanti aniyamitavacanaṃ. Tathā kiñcīti. Panāti vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:873_1: Tasmā yaṃ kiñcīti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Panāti vā visesatthadīpako
anya-e0103n:873_2: nipāto. Tena “sammāsambuddho”ti iminā saṅkhepato, vitthārato ca satthu catusaccābhisambodho
anya-e0103n:873_3: vutto. “Buddho”ti pana iminā tadaññassapi ñeyyassāvabodho. Purimena vā satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo,
anya-e0103n:873_4: pacchimena desanāñāṇānubhāvo. Pīti upari vuccamāno viseso jotīyati. Sabbaso paṭipakkhehi
anya-e0103n:873_5: vimuccatīti vimokkho, aggamaggo. Tassa anto aggaphalaṃ, tattha bhavaṃ tasmiṃ laddhe
anya-e0103n:873_6: laddhabbato vimokkhantikañāṇaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ sabbampi buddhañāṇaṃ. Evaṃ pavattoti ettha –
anya-e0103n:874_0: “Sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, visavitāya
anya-e0103n:874_1: buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti
anya-e0103n:874_2: buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho,
anya-e0103n:874_3: ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddho,
anya-e0103n:874_4: abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddho. Buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ, na pitarā
anya-e0103n:874_5: kataṃ, na bhātarā kataṃ, na bhaginiyā kataṃ, na mittāmaccehikataṃ, na ñātisālohitehi
anya-e0103n:874_6: kataṃ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ, na devatāhi kataṃ. Vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:874_7: bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti –
anya-e0103n:875: Ayaṃ niddesapāḷinayo. Yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi, tasmā dvīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭisambhidānayo vā”ti aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto.
anya-e0103n:876_0: Tattha yathā loke avagantā “avagato”ti vuccati, evaṃ bujjhitā saccānīti buddho suddhakattuvasena.
anya-e0103n:876_1: Yathā paṇṇasosā vātā “paṇṇasusā”ti vuccanti, evaṃ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho hetukattuvasena,
anya-e0103n:877_0: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho. Sabbadassāvitāya
anya-e0103n:877_1: buddhoti sabbadhammānaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhattā buddhoti attho. Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti
anya-e0103n:877_2: aññena abodhanīto sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho. Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato
anya-e0103n:877_3: padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho. Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi
anya-e0103n:877_4: chahi pariyāyehi niddakkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddakkhayavibuddhattā
anya-e0103n:877_5: buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṃ buddhiatthatāya
anya-e0103n:877_6: buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti ekāyanamaggaṃ gatattā buddhoti vuccatīti
anya-e0103n:877_7: attho. Eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā
anya-e0103n:877_8: buddho, atha kho sayameva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n:877_9: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti anatthantaraṃ. Tattha
