anya-e0103n:877_10: yathā rattaguṇayogato ratto paṭo, evaṃ buddhaguṇayogato buddhoti ñāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:877_11: Tato paraṃ buddhoti netaṃ nāmantiādi atthānugatāyaṃ paññattīti bodhanatthaṃ vuttanti
anya-e0103n:877_12: evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:878_1: sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuttavacanamidaṃ
anya-e0103n:878_4: payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya, accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
anya-e0103n:879_0: Bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato “seṭṭha”nti
anya-e0103n:879_1: vuttaṃ. Atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṃ, attho. Tasmā yo “bhagavā”ti vacanena vacanīyo
anya-e0103n:879_2: attho, so seṭṭhoti attho. Bhagavāti vacanamuttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Gāravayuttoti
anya-e0103n:879_3: garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato, garukaraṇaṃ vā sātisayaṃ arahatīti gāravayutto, gāravārahoti attho.
anya-e0103n:880_0: Guṇavisesahetukaṃ “bhagavā”ti idaṃ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato
anya-e0103n:880_1: vibhajitukāmo nāmaṃyeva tāva atthuddhāravasena dassento “catubbidhaṃ vā nāma”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:880_2: Tattha āvatthikanti avatthāya viditaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthaṃ upādāya paññattaṃ voharitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:880_3: Tathā liṅgikaṃ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṃ. Nemittikanti nimittato āgataṃ. Adhiccasamuppannanti
anya-e0103n:880_4: yadicchāya pavattaṃ, yadicchāya āgataṃ yadicchakaṃ. Paṭhamena ādi-saddena bālo, yuvā,
anya-e0103n:880_5: vuḍḍhoti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, dutiyena muṇḍī, jaṭīti evamādiṃ, tatiyena bahussuto,
anya-e0103n:880_6: dhammakathiko, jhāyīti evamādiṃ, catutthena aghamarisanaṃ pāvacananti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:880_8: “Vimokkhantika”nti iminā idaṃ nāmaṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:880_9: Yadi vimokkhantikaṃ, atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha “saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa
anya-e0103n:880_10: paṭilābhā”ti. Buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṃ nipphajjamānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi
anya-e0103n:880_11: buddhaguṇehi saddhiṃyeva nipphajjati. Tena vuttaṃ “vimokkhantika”nti. Sacchikā paññattīti
anya-e0103n:880_12: sabbadhammānaṃ sacchikiriyānimittā paññatti. Atha vā sacchikā paññattīti paccakkhasiddhā
anya-e0103n:880_13: paññatti. Yaṃguṇanimittā hi sā, te satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā
anya-e0103n:880_14: eva nāma hoti, na paresaṃ vohāramattenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:881_0: 143. Vadantīti mahātherassa garubhāvato bahuvacanenāha, saṅgītikārehi vā katamanuvādaṃ
anya-e0103n:881_1: sandhāya. Issariyādibhedo bhago assa atthīti bhagī. Akāsi bhagganti rāgādipāpadhammaṃ
anya-e0103n:881_2: bhaggaṃ akāsi, bhaggavāti attho. Bahūhi ñāyehīti kāyabhāvanādikehi anekehi bhāvanākkamehi.
anya-e0103n:881_3: Subhāvitattanoti sammadeva bhāvitasabhāvassa. Paccatte cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:883_0: “Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṃ. Apica bhaggarāgoti bhagavā, bhaggadosoti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:883_1: bhaggamohoti bhagavā, bhaggamānoti bhagavā, bhaggadiṭṭhīti bhagavā, bhaggataṇhoti
anya-e0103n:883_2: bhagavā, bhaggakilesoti bhagavā, bhaji vibhaji pavibhaji dhammaratananti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:883_3: bhavānaṃ antakaroti bhagavā, bhāvitakāyo bhāvitasīlo bhāvitacitto bhāvitapaññoti
anya-e0103n:883_4: bhagavā, bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni
anya-e0103n:883_5: vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā
anya-e0103n:883_7: attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti
anya-e0103n:883_8: bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnanti
anya-e0103n:883_9: bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ navannaṃ
anya-e0103n:883_10: anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ dasannaṃ
anya-e0103n:883_11: kasiṇasamāpattīnaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā
anya-e0103n:883_12: catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ pañcannaṃ
anya-e0103n:883_13: indriyānaṃ pañcannaṃ balānaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti
anya-e0103n:883_14: bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānaṃ catunnaṃ vesārajjānaṃ catunnaṃ
anya-e0103n:883_15: paṭisambhidānaṃ channaṃ abhiññānaṃ channaṃ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā, bhagavāti netaṃ
anya-e0103n:884_0: Ettha ca “gāravādhivacana”ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṃ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0103n:884_1: yathārahaṃ pana tesaṃ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni. Tattha gāravādhivacananti
anya-e0103n:884_2: garūnaṃ garubhāvavācakaṃ vacanaṃ. Bhajīti bhāgaso kathesi. Tenāha “vibhajī”ti. Dhammaratananti
anya-e0103n:884_3: maggaphalādiariyadhammaratanaṃ. Puna bhajīti sevi. Bhāgīti bhāgadheyyavā. Puna bhāgīti
anya-e0103n:884_4: bhajanasīlo. Attharasassāti atthasannissayassa rasassa. Vimuttāyatanasīse hi ṭhatvā
anya-e0103n:884_5: dhammaṃ kathentassa, suṇantassa ca tadatthaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṃ attharaso.
anya-e0103n:884_6: Dhammaṃ ārabbha dhammaraso. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammaveda”nti.
anya-e0103n:884_7: Vimuttirasassāti vimuttibhūtassa, vimuttisannissayassa vā rasassa. Saññābhāvanānanti
anya-e0103n:884_8: aniccasaññādīnaṃ dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ. Channaṃ buddhadhammānanti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni
anya-e0103n:884_9: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha tattha “bhagavā”ti saddasiddhi niruttinayena veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:885_0: 144. Yadipi “bhāgyavā”tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho “bhagī bhajī”ti niddesagāthāya
anya-e0103n:885_1: saṅgahito eva, tathāpi padasiddhi atthavibhāgaatthayojanādisahito saṃvaṇṇanānayo
anya-e0103n:885_2: tato aññākāroti vuttaṃ “ayaṃ pana aparo nayo”ti. Ādikanti ādi-saddena vaṇṇavikāro,
anya-e0103n:885_3: vaṇṇalopo, dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Saddanayenāti
anya-e0103n:885_5: gahetvā”ti. Pakkhipanameva lakkhaṇaṃ. Tappariyāpannatākaraṇaṃ hi pakkhipanaṃ. Pārappattanti
anya-e0103n:885_6: paramukkaṃsagataṃ pāramibhāvappattaṃ. Bhāgyanti kusalaṃ. Tattha maggakusalaṃ lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṃ,
anya-e0103n:885_7: itaraṃ lokiyasukhanibbattakaṃ, itarampi vā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pariyāyato lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṃ siyā.
anya-e0103n:886_0: Lobhādayo ekakavasena gahitā. Tathā viparītamanasikāro vipallāsabhāvasāmaññena, ahirikādayo
anya-e0103n:886_1: dukavasena. Lobhādayo ca puna “tividhākusalamūla”nti tikavasena gahitā. Kāyaduccaritādi-taṇhāsaṃkilesādirāgamalādirāgavisamādikāmasaññādikāmavitakkāditaṇhāpapañcādayo
anya-e0103n:886_3: taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, piṇḍapāta, senāsana, itibhavābhavahetu vā”ti evamāgatā
anya-e0103n:886_4: cattāro taṇhuppādā. “Buddhe kaṅkhati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya, sabrahmacārīsu kupito
anya-e0103n:886_5: hoti anattamano āhatacitto khīlajāto”ti evamāgatāni pañca cetokhīlāni. “Kāme avītarāgo
anya-e0103n:886_6: hoti, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo, yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ
anya-e0103n:886_7: passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ
anya-e0103n:886_8: caratī”ti āgatā pañca vinibandhā. Rūpābhinandanādayo pañcābhinandanā. Kodho, makkho,
anya-e0103n:886_9: issā, sāṭheyyaṃ, pāpicchatā, sandiṭṭhiparāmāsoti imāni cha vivādamūlāni. Rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā.
anya-e0103n:887_1: aṭṭha micchattā. “Taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0103n:887_2: vinicchayo, vinicchayaṃ paṭicca chandarāgo, chandarāgaṃ paṭicca ajjhosānaṃ, ajjhosānaṃ
anya-e0103n:887_3: paṭicca pariggaho, pariggahaṃ paṭicca macchariyaṃ, macchariyaṃ paṭicca ārakkhā, ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:887_4: daṇḍādānādayo”ti ete nava taṇhāmūlakā. Cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatavādā,
anya-e0103n:887_5: cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññīvādā,
anya-e0103n:887_6: aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, satta ucchedavādā, pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
anya-e0103n:887_7: etāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni. Ajjhattikassa upādāya “asmī”ti hoti, “itthasmī”ti,
anya-e0103n:887_10: siya”nti, “aññathā siya”nti, “apāhaṃ siya”nti, “apāhaṃ itthaṃ siya”nti, “apāhaṃ evaṃ
anya-e0103n:887_11: siya”nti, “apāhaṃ aññathā siya”nti hotīti aṭṭhārasa, bāhirassupādāya “iminā asmī”ti
anya-e0103n:887_12: hoti, “iminā itthasmī”ti, “iminā evasmī”ti, “iminā aññathāsmī”tiādikā vuttanayā aṭṭhārasāti
anya-e0103n:887_13: chattiṃsa, atītā chattiṃsa, anāgatā chattiṃsa, paccuppannā chattiṃsāti aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni.
anya-e0103n:888_0: Pabheda-saddo paccekaṃ sambandhitabbo. Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – lobhappabhedā dosappabhedā
anya-e0103n:888_1: yāva aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritappabhedāti. Sabbāni sattānaṃ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṃ
anya-e0103n:888_2: anekāni satasahassāni abhañjīti yojanā. Ārammaṇādivibhāgato hi pavattiākāravibhāgato
anya-e0103n:888_3: ca anantappabhedā kilesāti. Saṅkhepatoti ettha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena
anya-e0103n:888_6: devaputtamaccumārañca abhañji bhagge akāsi. Parissayānanti upaddavānaṃ. Sampati,
anya-e0103n:888_7: āyatiñca sattānaṃ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena kilesāva māroti kilesamāro.
anya-e0103n:888_8: Vadhakaṭṭhena khandhāva māroti khandhamāro. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “vadhakaṃ rūpaṃ ‘vadhakaṃ
anya-e0103n:888_10: māroti abhisaṅkhāramāro. Saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova māroti
anya-e0103n:888_11: devaputtamāro. Sattānaṃ jīvitassa, jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā
anya-e0103n:889_1: dīpitā hoti, itarāsaṃ phalasampadānaṃ mūlabhāvato, adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ca. Dhammakāyasampatti
anya-e0103n:889_2: dīpitā hoti, pahānasampadāpubbakattā ñāṇasampadādīnaṃ. Bhāgyavatāya lokiyānaṃ bahumatabhāvo.
anya-e0103n:889_3: Bhaggadosatāya parikkhakānaṃ bahumatabhāvoti yojanā. Evaṃ ito paresupi yathāsaṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0103n:889_4: yojetabbaṃ. Puññavantaṃ hi gahaṭṭhā khattiyādayo abhigacchanti, pahīnadosaṃ pabbajitatāpasaparibbājakādayo
anya-e0103n:889_5: “dosavinayāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti. Abhigatānañca nesaṃ kāyacittadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo,
anya-e0103n:889_6: āmisadānadhammadānehi upakārasabbhāvato. Rūpakāyaṃ tassa pasādacakkhunā, dhammakāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:889_7: paññācakkhunā disvā dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanato upagatānañca tesaṃ āmisadānadhammadānehi
anya-e0103n:889_8: upakāritā, “pubbe āmisadānadhammadānehi mayā ayaṃ lokaggabhāvo adhigato, tasmā tumhehipi
anya-e0103n:889_9: evameva paṭipajjitabba”nti evaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojanena abhigatānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhehi
anya-e0103n:890_0: Sakacitte issariyaṃ attano cittassa vasībhāvāpādanaṃ, yena paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññitādivihārasiddhi,
anya-e0103n:890_2: ijjhanato. Aṇimālaghimādikanti ādi-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti
anya-e0103n:890_3: ime chapi saṅgahitā. Tattha kāyassa aṇubhāvakaraṇaṃ aṇimā. Lahubhāvo laghimā ākāse
anya-e0103n:890_4: padasā gamanādinā. Mahattaṃ mahimā kāyassa mahantatāpādanaṃ. Iṭṭhadesappatti patti.
anya-e0103n:890_5: Adhiṭṭhānādivasena icchitanipphādanaṃ pākammaṃ. Sayaṃvasitā issarabhāvo īsitā. Iddhividhe
anya-e0103n:890_6: vasībhāvo vasitā. Ākāsena vā gacchato, aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti
anya-e0103n:890_8: issariyaṃ. Taṃ pana bhagavato iddhividhantogadhaṃ, anaññasādhāraṇañcāti āha “sabbākāraparipūraṃ atthī”ti.
anya-e0103n:891_0: Kesañci padesavutti, ayathābhūtaguṇasannissayattā aparisuddho ca yaso hoti, na evaṃ
anya-e0103n:891_1: tathāgatassāti dassetuṃ “lokattayabyāpako”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṃ
anya-e0103n:891_2: āruppe uppannānaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā bhagavato guṇe anussarantānaṃ yaso pākaṭo
anya-e0103n:891_3: hotīti āha “lokattayabyāpako”ti. Yathābhuccaguṇādhigatattā eva ativiya parisuddho.
anya-e0103n:891_5: aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ sobhā. “Tiṇṇo tāreyya”ntiādinā yaṃ yaṃ etena lokanāthena icchitaṃ
anya-e0103n:892_1: na kevalaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā, atha kho saṅgahādayo,
anya-e0103n:892_2: samayavimuttādayo, ṭhapanādayo, tikapaṭṭhānādayo ca saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ. Dukkhasaccassa
anya-e0103n:892_3: pīḷanaṭṭho taṃsamaṅgino sattassa hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ. Saṅkhataṭṭho sameccasambhūyapaccayehi
anya-e0103n:892_4: katabhāvo. Santāpaṭṭho dukkhadukkhatādīhi santappanaṃ paridahanaṃ. Vipariṇāmaṭṭho
anya-e0103n:892_5: jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho dukkhassa
anya-e0103n:892_6: nibbattanavasena sampiṇḍanaṃ. Nidānaṭṭho “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:892_7: Saṃyogaṭṭho saṃsāradukkhena saṃyojanaṃ. Palibodhaṭṭho maggādhigamassa nivāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:892_8: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā, tannissaraṇanimittatā
anya-e0103n:892_9: vā. Vivekaṭṭho sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyuttatā. Asaṅkhataṭṭho kenacipi paccayena anabhisaṅkhatatā.
anya-e0103n:892_10: Amataṭṭho niccasabhāvattā maraṇābhāvo, sattānaṃ maraṇābhāvahetutā vā. Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho
anya-e0103n:892_11: vaṭṭadukkhato niggamanaṭṭho. Hetuattho nibbānassa sampāpakabhāvo. Dassanaṭṭho accantasukhumassa
anya-e0103n:892_12: nibbānassa sacchikaraṇaṃ. Ādhipateyyaṭṭho catusaccadassane sampayuttānaṃ ādhipaccakaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:892_13: ārammaṇādhipatibhāvo vā visesato maggādhipativacanato. Satipi hi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve
anya-e0103n:892_14: “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti evamādiṃ avatvā “maggādhipatino dhammā” icceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:892_15: tasmā viññāyati “atthi maggassa ārammaṇādhipatibhāve viseso”ti. Ete ca pīḷanādayo
anya-e0103n:892_16: soḷasākārā nāma. Kasmā panettha aññesu rogagaṇṭhādiākāresu vijjamānesu eteva pariggayhantīti?
anya-e0103n:892_17: Salakkhaṇato ca saccantaradassanato ca āvibhāvato. Svāyamattho parato saccakathāyameva āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n:893_1: Phalasamāpatti ariyavihāro. Kāmehi vivekaṭṭhakāyatāvasena ekībhāvo kāyaviveko. Paṭhamajjhānādinā
anya-e0103n:893_2: nīvaraṇādīhi vivittacittatā cittaviveko. Upadhiviveko nibbānaṃ. Aññeti lokiyābhiññādike.
anya-e0103n:894_0: Kilesābhisaṅkhāravasena bhavesu paribbhamanaṃ, so ca taṇhāppadhānoti vuttaṃ “taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0103n:894_1: gamana”nti. Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṃ puna apaccāvamanavasena chaḍḍitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:894_2: Bhagavāti vuccati niruttinayenāti dassento āha “yathā…pe… mekhalā”ti.
anya-e0103n:895: Aparo nayo – bhāgavāti bhagavā, bhatavāti bhagavā, bhāge vanīti bhagavā, bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhattavāti bhagavā, bhage vamīti bhagavā. Bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:896: Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n:897: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
anya-e0103n:898_0: Tattha kathaṃ bhāgavāti bhagavā? Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇakoṭṭhāsā, te anaññasādhāraṇā
anya-e0103n:898_1: niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti. Tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti
anya-e0103n:898_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ, hirī ottappaṃ, saddhā vīriyaṃ, sati sampajaññaṃ, sīlavisuddhi
anya-e0103n:898_3: diṭṭhivisuddhi, samatho vipassanā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi sucaritāni, tayo sammāvitakkā,
anya-e0103n:898_4: tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā,
anya-e0103n:898_5: cattāro iddhipādā, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ariyaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidā,
anya-e0103n:898_6: catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni, cattāro ariyavaṃsā, cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni, pañca padhāniyaṅgāni,
anya-e0103n:898_7: pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, pañca
anya-e0103n:898_8: nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni, pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā saññā,
anya-e0103n:898_9: cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, cha gāravā, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, cha satatavihārā, cha
anya-e0103n:898_10: anuttariyāni, cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, cha abhiññā, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni, satta
anya-e0103n:898_11: aparihāniyā dhammā, satta ariyadhammā, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, satta
anya-e0103n:898_12: sappurisadhammā, satta nijjaravatthūni, satta saññā, sattadakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā,
anya-e0103n:898_14: aṭṭha sammattāni, aṭṭhalokadhammātikkamā, aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni, aṭṭhaakkhaṇadesanā,
anya-e0103n:898_15: aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā, aṭṭhaabhibhāyatanadesanā, aṭṭha vimokkhā, nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā
anya-e0103n:898_16: dhammā, nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni, navasattāvāsadesanā, nava āghātapaṭivinayā,
anya-e0103n:898_17: nava saññā, nava nānattā, nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakāraṇā dhammā, dasa kasiṇāyatanāni,
anya-e0103n:898_18: dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa sammattāni, dasa ariyavāsā, dasa asekkhadhammā, dasa
anya-e0103n:898_19: tathāgatabalāni, ekādasa mettānisaṃsā, dvādasa dhammacakkākārā, terasa dhutaguṇā,
anya-e0103n:898_20: cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, soḷasavidhā ānāpānassati,
anya-e0103n:898_21: soḷasa aparantapanīyā dhammā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni,
anya-e0103n:898_22: catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni, paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni, paropaññāsa kusaladhammā, sattasattatiñāṇavatthūni,
anya-e0103n:898_24: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo
anya-e0103n:898_25: anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti
anya-e0103n:898_26: upalabbhanti. Tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ā-kārassa
anya-e0103n:898_27: rassattaṃ katvā “bhagavā”ti vutto. Evaṃ tāva bhāgavāti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:901_0: Kathaṃ bhatavāti bhagavā? Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha
anya-e0103n:901_1: dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūretabbā
anya-e0103n:901_3: pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo, dānādīni
anya-e0103n:901_4: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, saccādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, attapariccāgo, nayana, dhana,
anya-e0103n:901_5: rajja, puttadārapariccāgoti pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:901_6: ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā, buddhatthacariyāti evamādayo, saṅkhepato vā sabbe
anya-e0103n:901_8: satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā, saṃkilesabhāgiyā, ṭhitibhāgiyā
anya-e0103n:901_9: vā na honti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva honti, evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ
anya-e0103n:901_10: anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena
anya-e0103n:901_11: ta-kārassa ga-kāraṃ katvā. Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakārakadhamme
anya-e0103n:901_12: vuttanayena bhari sambhari, paripūresīti attho. Evampi bhatavāti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:903: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n:904_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vanīti bhagavā? Ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā,
anya-e0103n:904_1: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ, attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ
anya-e0103n:904_2: niccakappaṃ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu,
anya-e0103n:904_3: kusalādīsu, khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
anya-e0103n:904_4: vitthārato pana “cakkhuṃ pariññeyyaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādinā anekapariññeyyabhāgā,
anya-e0103n:904_5: “cakkhussa samudayo pahātabbo…pe… jarāmaraṇassa samudayo pahātabbo”tiādinā pahātabbabhāgā,
anya-e0103n:904_8: bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā, te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ
anya-e0103n:904_9: vasena sevi. Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā
anya-e0103n:904_10: sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā, “kinti nu kho te veneyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya”nti
anya-e0103n:904_11: mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi, sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi.
anya-e0103n:906: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato.
anya-e0103n:907_0: Kathaṃ bhage vanīti bhagavā? Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ
anya-e0103n:907_1: bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo. Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito
anya-e0103n:907_2: pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi, yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato
anya-e0103n:907_3: buddhakārakadhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi. Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite
anya-e0103n:907_4: anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi. Vitthārato pana padesarajjaissariyacakkavattisampattidevarajjasampattiādivasena,
anya-e0103n:907_6: ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi. Evampi bhage vanīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:908: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthū;
anya-e0103n:909: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n:910_0: Kathaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā? Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā. Tathāgato
anya-e0103n:910_5: suvisuddhena ca thutighosena samannāgatattā, ukkaṃsapāramippattāsu appicchatāsantuṭṭhiādīsu
anya-e0103n:910_8: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno”ti evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena
anya-e0103n:910_10: paramapemasambhattiṭṭhānaṃ. Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā
anya-e0103n:910_11: honti, kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena
anya-e0103n:910_12: vā brahmunā vāti. Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti,
anya-e0103n:913_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati, evameva kho, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n:913_1: yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
anya-e0103n:914: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:916: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
anya-e0103n:917_0: Kathaṃ bhage vamīti bhagavā? Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo
anya-e0103n:917_1: pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ, issariyaṃ, yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho
anya-e0103n:917_2: chaḍḍayi. Tathā hissa somanassakumārakāle hatthipālakumārakāle ayogharapaṇḍitakāle
anya-e0103n:917_4: rajjasiriyā pariccattaattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ natthi. Carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṃ
anya-e0103n:917_6: sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā
anya-e0103n:917_7: sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāni
anya-e0103n:917_8: nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā, sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanalokavisesasannissayā
anya-e0103n:917_9: sobhā kappaṭṭhiyabhāvato. Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsasattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena
anya-e0103n:920_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vamīti bhagavā? Bhāgā nāma sabhāvadhammakoṭṭhāsā, te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena,
anya-e0103n:920_1: tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena, atītādivasena ca anekavidhā, te ca bhagavā “sabbaṃ papañcaṃ,
anya-e0103n:920_2: sabbaṃ yogaṃ, sabbaṃ ganthaṃ, sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ samadhigacchanto
anya-e0103n:920_3: vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami. Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ
anya-e0103n:920_4: āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ, cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ, rūpe sadde gandhe rase
anya-e0103n:920_5: phoṭṭhabbe dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ, cakkhusamphassaṃ…pe… manosamphassaṃ,
anya-e0103n:920_6: cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ saññaṃ…pe…
anya-e0103n:920_7: manosamphassajaṃ saññaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:920_8: rūpataṇhaṃ …pe… dhammataṇhaṃ, rūpavitakkaṃ…pe… dhammavitakkaṃ, rūpavicāraṃ…pe… dhammavicāra”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:920_9: anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri anapekkhapariccāgena
anya-e0103n:921: “Yaṃ taṃ, ānanda, cattaṃ vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:922_0: Evampi bhāge vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje
anya-e0103n:922_1: hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho
anya-e0103n:922_2: pariccaji pajahi, paresañca tathattāya dhammaṃ desesi. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
anya-e0103n:923: “Dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā. Kullūpamaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:926: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n:928: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n:929: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
anya-e0103n:930_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā,
anya-e0103n:930_2: tadavinābhāvena tadantogadhattā. Parahitapaṭipatti payogāsayabhedato duvidhā. Tattha
anya-e0103n:930_4: paṭiviruddhesupi niccaṃ hitesitā, ñāṇaparipākakālāgamanādiparahitapaṭipatti ca, āmisapaṭiggahaṇādināpi
anya-e0103n:930_5: atthacariyā parahitapaṭipatti hotiyeva. Tasmā tesaṃ vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṃ “araha”ntiādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:931_0: Tattha “araha”nti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n:931_1: “Sammāsambuddho, lokavidū”ti ca imehi padehi ñāṇasampadāvasena. Nanu ca “lokavidū”ti
anya-e0103n:931_2: imināpi sammāsambuddhatā vibhāvīyatīti? Saccaṃ vibhāvīyati, atthi pana viseso, “sammāsambuddho”ti
anya-e0103n:931_3: iminā sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvo vibhāvito, “lokavidū”ti pana iminā āsayānusayañāṇādīnampi
anya-e0103n:931_4: ānubhāvo vibhāvitoti. “Vijjācaraṇasampanno”ti iminā sabbāpi bhagavato attahitasampatti
anya-e0103n:931_5: vibhāvitā. “Sugato”ti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n:931_6: parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā. “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti
anya-e0103n:931_7: imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā. “Buddho”ti iminā bhagavato attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n:931_8: parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā. Evañca katvā “sammāsambuddho”ti vatvā “buddho”ti
anya-e0103n:931_9: vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Tenevāha “attanāpi bujjhi aññepi satte bodhesī”tiādi. “Bhagavā”ti
anya-e0103n:931_10: ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n:932_0: Aparo nayo – hetuphalasattūpakāravasena saṅkhepato tividhā buddhaguṇā. Tattha “arahaṃ
anya-e0103n:932_1: sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidū”ti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā
anya-e0103n:932_2: vibhāvitā. “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti imehi sattūpakāravasena
anya-e0103n:932_3: buddhaguṇā pakāsitā. “Buddho”ti iminā phalavasena, sattūpakāravasena ca buddhaguṇā
anya-e0103n:932_4: vibhāvitā. “Sugato bhagavā”ti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā
anya-e0103n:933_1: vuttappakārena. Tasmiṃ samayeti buddhaguṇānussaraṇasamaye. Rāgapariyuṭṭhitanti rāgena
anya-e0103n:933_2: pariyuṭṭhitaṃ, pariyuṭṭhānappattehi rāgehi sahitaṃ cittaṃ araññamiva corehi tena
anya-e0103n:933_3: pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ, tassa pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvato, pariyuṭṭhitarāganti attho.
anya-e0103n:933_4: Yaṃ vā rāgassa pariyuṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ taṃsahite citte upacaritanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:933_5: pakkhe rāgenāti rāgena hetunāti attho. Ujugatamevāti pageva kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ apanītattā,
anya-e0103n:933_6: cittassa ca anujubhāvakarānaṃ māyādīnaṃ abhāvato, rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vā onatiunnativirahato
anya-e0103n:933_7: ujubhāvameva kataṃ. Atha vā ujugatamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa vīthiṃ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamanato
anya-e0103n:933_8: majjhimasamathanimittapaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṃ. Tathāgataṃ ārabbhāti tathāgataguṇe ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:934_0: Iccassāti iti assa. “So bhagavā itipi araha”ntiādinā pubbe vuttappakārena buddhaguṇe
anya-e0103n:934_1: anuvitakkayatoti sambandho. Evanti “neva tasmiṃ samaye”tiādinā vuttanayena. Buddhaguṇapoṇāti
anya-e0103n:934_3: vitakkāhataṃ, vitakkapariyāhataṃ, punappunaṃ anumajjanañca karotīti dasseti. Pīti
anya-e0103n:934_4: uppajjatīti bhāvanāvasena upacārajjhānanipphādikā balavatī pīti uppajjati. Pītimanassa
anya-e0103n:934_6: sukhumāvatthā uddhaccasahagatā kilesā. Paṭippassambhantīti sannisīdanti. Anukkamena
anya-e0103n:934_7: ekakkhaṇeti yadā buddhaguṇārammaṇā bhāvanā uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n:934_8: tadā nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva honti, suvisadāni saddhādīni
anya-e0103n:934_9: indriyāni honti, bhāvanāya paguṇatāya vitakkavicārā sātisayaṃ paṭukiccāva honti,
anya-e0103n:934_10: balavatī pīti uppajjati, pītipadaṭṭhānā passaddhi savisesā jāyati, passaddhakāyassa
anya-e0103n:934_11: samādhipadaṭṭhānaṃ sukhaṃ thirataraṃ hutvā pavattati, sukhena anubrūhitaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:934_12: kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva samādhiyati. Evaṃ anukkamena pubbabhāge vitakkādayo uparūpari
anya-e0103n:934_14: ekarasabhāvena paṭutamāni hutvā ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0103n:935: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti…pe… sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:936_0: Kasmā panettha jhānaṃ appanāpattaṃ na hotīti āha “buddhaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:936_1: Gambhīre hi ārammaṇe gambhīre udake patitanāvā viya samathabhāvanā patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0103n:936_2: “gambhīratāyā”ti ca iminā sabhāvadhammatāpi saṅgahitā. Sabhāvadhammo hi gambhīro
anya-e0103n:936_3: na paññatti. Nanu ca tajjāpaññattivasena sabhāvadhammo gayhatīti? Saccaṃ gayhati
anya-e0103n:936_4: pubbabhāge, bhāvanāya pana vaḍḍhamānāya paññattiṃ samatikkamitvā sabhāveyeva cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:936_5: tiṭṭhati. Nanu ca sabhāvadhammepi katthaci appanā samijjhati dutiyāruppajjhānādīti?
anya-e0103n:936_6: Saccaṃ samijjhati, tañca kho ekappakāre ārammaṇe, idaṃ pana nānappakāranti dassento
anya-e0103n:936_8: manasikāraṃ pavattentassa ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse appanāvasena bhāvanā avatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:936_9: evamidha kasmā na hotīti? Visamoyaṃ upaññāso. Tattha hi satipi koṭṭhāsabahubhāve
anya-e0103n:936_10: ekappakāreneva bhāvanā vattati paṭikkūlākārasseva gahaṇato, idha pana nānappakārena
anya-e0103n:936_11: guṇānaṃ nānappakārattā, na ayamekasmiṃyeva guṇe ṭhātuṃ sakkoti bhāvanābalena paccakkhato
anya-e0103n:936_12: buddhaguṇesu upaṭṭhahantesu saddhāya balavabhāvato. Teneva hi “adhimuttatāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:936_13: Yadi upacārappattaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, kathaṃ buddhānussatīti vuttanti āha “tadeta”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:937_0: Sagāravo hoti sappatisso, satthu guṇasarīrassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhahanato. Tatoyeva
anya-e0103n:937_2: bhāvanāya pavattattā sativepullaṃ. Tesaṃ paramagambhīratāya, nānappakāratāya ca paññāvepullaṃ.
anya-e0103n:937_3: Tesaṃ uḷārapuññakkhettatāya puññavepullañca adhigacchati. Pītipāmojjabahulo hoti
anya-e0103n:937_5: satiyā bhayabheravābhibhavanato. Tenāha bhagavā “anussaretha sambuddhaṃ, bhayaṃ tumhāka
anya-e0103n:937_6: no siyā”ti. Dukkhādhivāsanasamattho buddhānussatiyā sarīradukkhassa padumapalāse
anya-e0103n:937_7: udakassa viya vinivaṭṭanato. Saṃvāsasaññanti sahavāsasaññaṃ. Buddhabhūmiyaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:937_8: namati buddhaguṇānaṃ mahantabhāvassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhānato. Buddhānussatibhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:937_9: sabbadā buddhaguṇānaṃ citte viparivattanato vuttaṃ “sammukhā satthāraṃ passato viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:937_10: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti imāya bhāvanāya upari taṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā saccāni appaṭivijjhanto.
anya-e0103n:938_0: Appamādanti appamajjanaṃ sakkaccaṃ anuyogaṃ. Kayirāthāti kareyya. Sumedhasoti sundarapañño.
anya-e0103n:938_1: Evaṃ mahānubhāvāyāti vuttappakārena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādisamatthena satthari sagāravabhāvādihetubhūtena
anya-e0103n:940_0: 146. Dhammānussatinti ettha padattho, sabhāvattho ca ādito vuttoyevāti taṃ anāmasitvā
anya-e0103n:940_2: panettha buddhānussatiyaṃ viya “aveccappasādasamannāgatenā”ti na vuttaṃ. Nanu etā
anya-e0103n:940_3: paṭipāṭiyā cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaṃ vasena desanaṃ āruḷhāti? Saccametaṃ, evaṃ
anya-e0103n:940_5: idha na vuttaṃ, ariyasāvakānaṃ pana sukhena ijjhantīti. Tathāpi pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā
anya-e0103n:940_6: ca buddhānussatiniddese vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, ayañca vicāro parato āgamissateva.
anya-e0103n:941_0: 147. Pariyattidhammopīti pi-saddena lokuttaradhammaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Itaresūti sandiṭṭhikādipadesu.
anya-e0103n:941_1: Lokuttaradhammovāti avadhāraṇaṃ nippariyāyena sandiṭṭhikādiatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:941_2: pariyāyato panete pariyattidhammepi sambhavanteva. Tathā hi pariyattidhammo bahussutena
anya-e0103n:941_3: āgatāgamena paramena satinepakkena samannāgatena paññavatā ādikalyāṇatādivisesato
anya-e0103n:941_4: sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko. Ācariyapayirupāsanāya vinā na labbhāti ce? Lokuttaradhammepi
anya-e0103n:941_6: jayatī”ti ayaṃ panattho titthiyanimmaddane nippariyāyatova labbhati, kilesajaye pariyāyato
anya-e0103n:941_7: paramparāhetubhāvato. “Sandiṭṭhaṃ arahatī”ti ayampi attho labbhateva, sabbaso saṃkilesadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:941_8: pahānaṃ, vodānadhammānaṃ paribrūhanañca uddissa pavattattā. Ayañca attho “ye kho
anya-e0103n:941_9: tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya, saññogāya
anya-e0103n:941_10: saṃvattanti no visaññogāya, saupādānāya saṃvattanti no anupādānāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami,
anya-e0103n:941_11: dhāreyyāsi ‘neso dhammo, neso vinayo, netaṃ satthusāsana”’nti, “dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n:941_12: pahātabbā, pageva adhammā”ti ca evamādīhi suttapadehi vibhāvetabbo. Akālikādhigamupāyatāya
anya-e0103n:941_13: akāliko. Vijjamānatāparisuddhatāhi ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko. Tato eva
anya-e0103n:941_14: vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthikehi attano citte upanayanaṃ, cittassa vā tattha upanayanaṃ
anya-e0103n:941_15: arahatīti opaneyyiko. Vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā paricayena sammadeva atthavedaṃ, dhammavedañca
anya-e0103n:941_16: labhantehi paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti. Evaṃ sandiṭṭhikādipadesu pariyattidhammampi
anya-e0103n:942_0: Sāti gāthā. Samantabhadrakattāti sabbabhāgehi sundarattā. Dhammassāti sāsanadhammassa.
anya-e0103n:942_1: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi, yesu pana avayavesu
anya-e0103n:942_2: samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu “gāthā”ti samaññā, taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā saṃsāmivohāraṃ
anya-e0103n:942_4: nātibahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, itarassa pana teneva
anya-e0103n:942_6: nidānaganthena. Nigamanenāti “idamavocā”tiādikena, “iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ
anya-e0103n:943_0: Ayaṃ kathā visesato suttapiṭakasaṃvaṇṇanāti katvā suttapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇādikaṃ
anya-e0103n:943_1: dassetvā idāni suttapiṭakavinayapiṭakānaṃ vasena taṃ dassetuṃ “sanidānasauppattikattā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:943_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha sanidānasauppattikattāti yathāvuttanidānena sanidānatāya, saaṭṭhuppattikatāya
anya-e0103n:943_3: ca. Veneyyānaṃ anurūpatoti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā, dhammadesanāya ca taṃtaṃsikkhāpadabhāvena
anya-e0103n:943_4: paññāpiyamānassa veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattiyamānassa anurūpato. Atthassāti desiyamānassa
anya-e0103n:943_5: ca sīlādiatthassa. “Taṃ kissa hetu ? Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave”tiādinā tattha tattha
anya-e0103n:944: Evaṃ suttavinayavasena pariyattidhammassa ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇataṃ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni ekajjhaṃ gahetvā taṃ dassetuṃ “sakalopī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sāsanadhammoti –
anya-e0103n:947_0: Evaṃ vuttassa satthusāsanassa pakāsako pariyattidhammo. Sīlena ādikalyāṇo sīlamūlakattā
anya-e0103n:947_1: sāsanassa. Samathādīhi majjhekalyāṇo tesaṃ sāsanasampattiyā vemajjhabhāvato. Nibbānena
anya-e0103n:947_2: pariyosānakalyāṇo tadadhigamato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato. Sāsane sammāpaṭipatti nāma
anya-e0103n:947_3: paññāya hoti, tassā ca sīlaṃ, samādhi ca mūlanti āha “sīlasamādhīhi ādikalyāṇo”ti.
anya-e0103n:947_4: Paññā pana anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “vipassanāmaggehi
anya-e0103n:947_5: majjhekalyāṇo”ti āha. Tassa nipphatti phalaṃ, kiccaṃ nibbānasacchikiriyā, tato paraṃ
anya-e0103n:947_6: kattabbaṃ natthīti dassento āha “phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo”ti. Phalaggahaṇena
anya-e0103n:947_7: vā saupādisesanibbānamāha, itarena itaraṃ, tadubhayañca sāsanasampattiyā osānanti
anya-e0103n:948_0: Buddhassa subodhitā sammāsambuddhatā, tāya ādikalyāṇo tappabhavattā. Sabbaso saṃkilesappahānaṃ
anya-e0103n:948_1: vodānaṃ, pāripūrī ca dhammasudhammatā, tāya majjhekalyāṇo taṃsarīrattā. Satthārā
anya-e0103n:948_2: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ tathā paṭipatti saṅghasuppaṭipatti, tāya pariyosānakalyāṇo, tāya sāsanassa
anya-e0103n:948_3: loke suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato. Tanti sāsanadhammaṃ. Tathattāyāti yathattāya bhagavatā
anya-e0103n:948_4: dhammo desito, tathattāya tathabhāvāya. So pana abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti
anya-e0103n:948_5: tividho, ito aññathā nibbānādhigamassa abhāvato. Tattha sabbaguṇehi aggabhāvato,
anya-e0103n:948_6: itarabodhidvayamūlatāya ca paṭhamāya bodhiyā ādikalyāṇatā, guṇehi vemajjhabhāvato
anya-e0103n:948_7: dutiyāya majjhekalyāṇatā, tadubhayāvaratāya, tadosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa tatiyāya
anya-e0103n:949: Esoti sāsanadhammo. Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanatoti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṃ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhanasambhavato. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ –
anya-e0103n:950: “Yathā yathāvuso, bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti, aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī, tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṃ labhati dhammaveda”nti.
anya-e0103n:951: “Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṃ samaye pahīnāni hontī”ti –
anya-e0103n:952: Ca ādi. Samathavipassanāsukhāvahanatoti samathasukhassa ca vipassanāsukhassa ca sampādanato. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
anya-e0103n:953: “So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukha”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:957: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti ca. ;
anya-e0103n:958_0: Tathāpaṭipannoti yathā samathavipassanāsukhaṃ āvahati, yathā vā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:958_1: tathā paṭipanno sāsanadhammo. Tādibhāvāvahanatoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu
anya-e0103n:958_2: tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato. Esa bhagavā vuttanayena tividhakalyāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:958_3: dhammaṃ desento yaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ, maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, taṃ yathānurūpaṃ
anya-e0103n:959_0: Tattha avisesena tisso sikkhā, sakalo ca tantidhammo sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0103n:959_1: vuttaṃ “katamesānaṃ kho, bhante, buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ naciraṭṭhitikaṃ
anya-e0103n:959_3: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīya”nti. Yathānurūpanti
anya-e0103n:959_4: yathārahaṃ. Sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ hi sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ. Maggabrahmacariye
anya-e0103n:959_5: vattabbameva natthi. Atthasampattiyāti sampannatthatāya. Sampattiattho hi idha saha-saddo.
anya-e0103n:959_6: Itaraṃ pana yathāvuttenatthena sātthaṃ, sabyañjanañca. Ye panettha “vacanasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:959_7: sātthaṃ, atthasabhāvaṃ sabyañjana”nti vibhajitvā vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ, tathā
anya-e0103n:959_8: vibhattassa pariyattidhammassa abhāvato. Saddatthā hi abhinnarūpā viya hutvā viniyogaṃ
anya-e0103n:959_9: gacchanti. Tathā hi nesaṃ lokiyāmissībhāvaṃ paṭijānanti. Satipi vā bhede “sabyañjana”nti
anya-e0103n:959_10: ettha yadi tulyayogo adhippeto “saputto āgato”tiādīsu viya, evaṃ sati “atthapaṭisaraṇā,
anya-e0103n:959_11: bhikkhave, hotha, mā byañjanapaṭisaraṇā”ti atthappadhānavādo bādhito siyā, atha vijjamānatāmattaṃ
anya-e0103n:959_12: “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu viya byañjanasampatti aggahitā siyā. Tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:960_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti ettha nettinayenāpi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkāsana…pe… sabyañjana”nti
anya-e0103n:960_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha yadipi nettiyaṃ byañjanamukhena byañjanatthaggahaṇaṃ hotīti “akkharaṃ
anya-e0103n:960_2: pada”ntiādinā byañjanapadāni paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhāni, idha pana pāḷiyaṃ “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti
anya-e0103n:960_3: āgatattā atthapadāniyeva paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkāsanapakāsanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:960_4: saṅkhepato kāsanaṃ dīpanaṃ saṅkāsanaṃ “maññamāno bhikkhu baddho mārassa, amaññamāno
anya-e0103n:960_5: mutto”tiādīsu viya. Tattakena hi tena bhikkhunā paṭividdhaṃ. Tenāha “aññātaṃ bhagavā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:960_6: Paṭhamaṃ kāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ. Ādikammasmiṃ hi ayaṃ pasaddo “paññapeti paṭṭhapetī”tiādīsu
anya-e0103n:960_7: viya. Tikkhindriyāpekkhaṃ cetaṃ padadvayaṃ uddesabhāvato. Tikkhindriyo hi saṅkhepato
anya-e0103n:960_8: paṭhamañca vuttamatthaṃ paṭipajjati. Saṃkhittassa vitthāravacanaṃ, sakiṃ vuttassa
anya-e0103n:960_9: puna vacanañca vivaraṇavibhajanāni. Yathā “kusalā dhammā”ti saṅkhepato sakiṃyeva
anya-e0103n:960_10: ca vuttassa atthassa “katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ citta”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:960_11: vitthārato vivaraṇavasena, vibhajanavasena ca puna vacanaṃ. Majjhimindriyāpekkhametaṃ
anya-e0103n:960_12: padadvayaṃ niddesabhāvato. Vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṃ, vibhattassa ca pakārehi
anya-e0103n:960_13: ñāpanaṃ veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ uttānīkaraṇapaññāpanāni. Yathā “phasso hotī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:960_14: vivaṭavibhattassa atthassa “katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso? Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso
anya-e0103n:960_15: phusanā samphusanā”tiādinā uttānīkiriyā, paññāpanā ca. Mudindriyāpekkhametaṃ padadvayaṃ
anya-e0103n:961: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ pāṭhavikappo jātoti? Vuccate – nettipāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena purimapāṭho. Tattha hi –
anya-e0103n:966_0: Desanāhārayojanāya ca etassevatthassa “saṅkāsanā pakāsanā”tiādinā āgataṃ. Pacchimo
anya-e0103n:966_1: pana “paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti ‘passathā’ti cāhā”ti sutte
anya-e0103n:966_2: āgatanayena byañjanamattakato. Evañca nesaṃ dvinnaṃ pāṭhānaṃ viseso, na atthato.
anya-e0103n:966_3: Tathā hi saṅkhepato “paṭhamaṃ ñāpanaṃ paññāpanaṃ, paṭhamameva ṭhapanaṃ paṭṭhapana”nti
anya-e0103n:966_4: imāni padāni saṅkāsanapakāsanapadehi atthato avisiṭṭhāni. Yañca purimapāṭhe chaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0103n:966_5: padaṃ “pakārato ñāpana”nti paññāpanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ dutiyapāṭhe pakāsanapadena “nibbisesaṃ
anya-e0103n:966_6: pakārato kāsana”nti katvā. Yasmā ñāpanakāsanāni atthāvabhāsanasabhāvatāya abhinnāni,
anya-e0103n:966_7: sabbesañca veneyyānaṃ cittassa tosanaṃ, buddhiyā ca nisānaṃ yāthāvato vatthusabhāvāvabhāsane
anya-e0103n:966_8: jāyatīti. Evaṃ atthapadarūpattā pariyattiatthassa yathāvuttachaatthapadasamāyogato sātthaṃ sāsanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:967_1: pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ. “Ekakkharaṃ padaṃ akkhara”nti eke “ā evaṃ kira ta”ntiādīsu ā-kārādayo
anya-e0103n:967_2: viya. “Visuddhakaraṇānaṃ manasā desanāvācāya akkharaṇato akkhara”nti aññe. Vibhattiyantaṃ
anya-e0103n:967_3: atthañāpanato padaṃ. Saṅkhepato vuttaṃ padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjetīti byañjanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:967_4: vākyaṃ. “Kiriyāpadaṃ abyayakārakavisesanayuttaṃ vākya”nti hi vadanti. Pakārato vākyavibhāgo
anya-e0103n:967_5: ākāro. Ākārābhihitaṃ nibbacanaṃ nirutti. Nibbacanavitthāro nissesupadesato niddeso.
anya-e0103n:967_6: Etesaṃ akkharādīnaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ sampattiyā sampannatāya sabyañjanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:968_0: Tatrāyamassa atthapadasamāyogo, byañjanasampatti ca – akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi
anya-e0103n:968_1: pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttānīkaroti, niddesehi
anya-e0103n:968_2: paññapeti, tathā akkharehi ugghāṭetvā padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṃ, byañjanehi vipañcetvā
anya-e0103n:968_3: ākārehi vineti vipañcitaññuṃ, niruttīhi netvā niddesehi vineti neyyaṃ. Evañcāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:968_4: dhammo ugghaṭiyamāno ugghaṭitaññuṃ vineti, vipañciyamāno vipañcitaññuṃ, niyyamāno
anya-e0103n:968_5: neyyaṃ. Tattha ugghaṭanā ādi, vipañcanā majjhe, nayanamante. Evaṃ tīsu kālesu tidhā
anya-e0103n:968_6: desito dosattayavidhamano guṇattayāvaho tividhaveneyyavinayanoti. Evampi tividhakalyāṇoyaṃ
anya-e0103n:968_7: dhammo atthabyañjanapāripūriyā “sāttho sabyañjano”ti veditabbo “paripuṇṇo, parisuddho”ti ca.
anya-e0103n:969_0: Atthagambhīratātiādīsu attho nāma tantiattho. Dhammo tanti. Paṭivedho tantiyā, tantiatthassa
anya-e0103n:969_1: ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Desanā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā. Te panete atthādayo
anya-e0103n:969_2: yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
anya-e0103n:969_3: tasmā gambhīrā. Atha vā attho nāma hetuphalaṃ. Dhammo hetu. Desanā paññatti, yathādhammaṃ
anya-e0103n:969_4: dhammābhilāpo, anulomapaṭilomasaṅkhepavitthārādivasena vā kathanaṃ. Paṭivedho abhisamayo,
anya-e0103n:969_5: atthānurūpaṃ dhammesu, dhammānurūpaṃ atthesu, paññattipathānurūpaṃ paññattīsu avabodho,
anya-e0103n:969_6: tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo. Tepi
anya-e0103n:969_7: cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo
anya-e0103n:969_8: dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā
anya-e0103n:970_0: Atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Atthadhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsu pabhedagataṃ
anya-e0103n:970_1: ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti imissāpi paṭisambhidāya atthavisayattā āha “atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāvisayato
anya-e0103n:970_2: sāttha”nti, atthasampattiyā asati tadabhāvato. Dhammoti tanti. Niruttīti tantipadānaṃ
anya-e0103n:970_3: niddhāretvā vacanaṃ. Tattha pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāti āha
anya-e0103n:970_5: Parikkhakajanappasādakanti ettha iti-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā parikkhakajanānaṃ kiṃkusalagavesīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:970_6: pasādāvahaṃ, tasmā sātthaṃ. Atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ nadīpūrena viya
anya-e0103n:970_7: upari vuṭṭhippavattiyā. Sātthakatā panassa paṇḍitavedanīyatāya, sā paramagambhīrasaṇhasukhumabhāvato
anya-e0103n:970_9: yasmā lokiyajanassa pasādāvahaṃ, tasmā sabyañjanaṃ. Lokiyajano hi byañjanasampattiyā
anya-e0103n:970_10: tussati, idhāpi phalena hetuno anumānaṃ. Sabyañjanatā panassa saddheyyatāya, sā ādikalyāṇādibhāvato veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:971_0: Atha vā paṇḍitavedanīyato sāttha”nti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṃ āha, tato
anya-e0103n:971_2: tato lokiyajanappasādakanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthanti
anya-e0103n:971_3: adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṃ aññathā tadabhāvato. Uttānapadato sabyañjananti
anya-e0103n:971_4: subodhasaddatāya byañjanasampannaṃ, paramagambhīrassapi atthassa veneyyānaṃ suviññeyyabhāvāpādanato.
anya-e0103n:971_5: Sabbopesa paṭhamassa atthadvayassa pabhedo daṭṭhabbo, tathā ceva tattha tattha saṃvaṇṇitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:971_6: Tathā hettha vikappassa, samuccayassa vā aggahaṇaṃ. Upanetabbassāti pakkhipitabbassa
anya-e0103n:971_7: vodānatthassa avuttassa abhāvato. Sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvenāti sabbabhāgehi paripuṇṇatāya.
anya-e0103n:972_1: adhigamaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sātthaṃ kapilavatādi viya tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ ahutvā
anya-e0103n:972_3: durakkhātadhammesu paricayaṃ karontassa viya sammohaṃ ajanetvā bāhusaccaveyyattiyasabbhāvato
anya-e0103n:972_4: sabyañcanaṃ. Byañjanasampattiyā hi sati āgamabyattīti. Sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhayuttatoti
anya-e0103n:972_5: sīlādīhi pañcahi dhammakoṭṭhāsehi avirahitattā. Kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ anavasesena samantato
anya-e0103n:972_7: vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇāya. Lokāmisanirapekkhatoti kathañcipi taṇhāsannissayassa anissayanato.
anya-e0103n:973_0: Evaṃ ādikalyāṇatādiapadesena satthu purimavesārajjadvayavasena dhammassa svākkhātataṃ
anya-e0103n:973_2: vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti svākkhāto”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāvento “yathā
anya-e0103n:973_3: hī”tiādimāha. Tattha vipallāsamāpajjatīti tesaṃ dhamme “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:973_4: vipākādīnaṃ antarāyikattābhāvato ekaṃsena apāyūpapattihetutāya abhāvato. Niyyānikattābhāvatoti
anya-e0103n:973_6: tato niyyānikattābhāvato viparīto eva hoti. Tenāti atthassa vipallāsāpajjanena. Te
anya-e0103n:974_3: anāmasanīyā yādisī paṭipadā, tadanurūpassa. Supaññattāti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahitā
anya-e0103n:974_4: sammādiṭṭhiādippabhedā micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pahāyikabhāvena suṭṭhu sammadeva vihitā.
anya-e0103n:974_5: Saṃsandati kilesamalavisuddhitāya sameti. Evaṃ magganibbānānaṃ paṭipadāpaṭipajjanīyabhāvehi
anya-e0103n:974_6: aññamaññānurūpatāya svākkhātataṃ dassetvā idāni tividhassāpi lokuttaradhammassa paccekaṃ
anya-e0103n:974_7: svākkhātataṃ dassetuṃ “ariyamaggo cetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha antadvayanti sassatucchedaṃ,
anya-e0103n:974_8: kāmasukhaattakilamathānuyogaṃ, līnuddhaccaṃ, patiṭṭhānāyūhananti evaṃ pabhedaṃ antadvayaṃ.
anya-e0103n:974_9: Anupagammāti anupagantvā, anupagamanahetu vā. Paṭipassaddhakilesānīti suṭṭhu vūpasantakilesāni,
anya-e0103n:974_11: vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi amatañca tāṇañca leṇañcā”tiādinā tesu tesu suttesu
anya-e0103n:975_0: 148. “Rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo”ti iminā “ariyamaggena
anya-e0103n:975_1: mama rāgādayo pahīnā”ti sayaṃ attanā anaññaneyyena daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhi eva sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0103n:976_0: Tena tena ariyasāvakena parasaddhāya parassa saddahanena paraneyyena gantabbataṃ
anya-e0103n:976_1: hitvā ñāpetabbataṃ pahāya paccavekkhaṇañāṇena karaṇabhūtena. Pasatthā diṭṭhi sandiṭṭhi
anya-e0103n:976_2: yathā sambojjhaṅgo. Ariyamaggo attanā sampayuttāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati, ariyaphalaṃ
anya-e0103n:976_3: tāya eva attano kāraṇabhūtāya, nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇena attano visayībhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0103n:977_1: heṭṭhimaṃ sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṃ paccayabhāvena upari maggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato
anya-e0103n:978_0: 149. Nāssa kāloti nāssa āgametabbo kālo atthi. Yathā hi lokiyakusalassa “upapajje,
anya-e0103n:978_1: aparapariyāye”tiādinā phaladānaṃ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi, na evametassāti attho.
anya-e0103n:978_2: Tenāha “na pañcāhā”tiādi. Pakaṭṭhoti dūro. Phaladānaṃ pati kālo pakaṭṭho assāti kāliko,
anya-e0103n:978_3: kālantaraphaladāyī. Tenāha “attano phaladāne”ti. Pattoti upanīto. Idanti “akāliko”ti padaṃ.
anya-e0103n:979_0: 150. Vidhinti vidhānaṃ, “ehi passā”ti evaṃpavattavidhivacanaṃ. Vijjamānattāti paramatthato
anya-e0103n:979_1: upalabbhamānattā. Parisuddhattāti kilesamalavirahena sabbathā visuddhattā. Amanuññampi
anya-e0103n:979_2: kadāci payojanavasena yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṃ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṃ dassento
anya-e0103n:980_0: 151. Upanetabboti upaneyyo, upaneyyova opaneyyikoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā
anya-e0103n:980_1: āha “upanetabboti opaneyyiko”ti. Citte upanayanaṃ uppādananti āha “idaṃ saṅkhate
anya-e0103n:980_2: lokuttaradhamme yujjatī”ti. Citte upanayananti pana ārammaṇabhūtassa dhammassa ārammaṇabhāvūpanayane
anya-e0103n:980_3: adhippete asaṅkhatepi yujjeyya “ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko”ti.
anya-e0103n:980_4: Allīyananti phusanaṃ. Nibbānaṃ upaneti ariyapuggalanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:981_0: 152. Viññūhīti vidūhi, paṭividdhasaccehīti attho. Te pana ekaṃsato ugghaṭitaññūādayo
anya-e0103n:981_2: attho gahetabboti āha “attani attanī”ti. Veditabboti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ veditabboti āha
anya-e0103n:981_3: “bhāvito me”tiādi. Tattha “me”ti iminā “paccatta”nti padena vuttamatthaṃ anvayato
anya-e0103n:981_4: dassetvā puna byatirekena dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva. “Viññūhī”ti
anya-e0103n:981_5: idaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti dassento “bālānaṃ pana avisayo cesā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:982_0: Evaṃ ādikalyāṇatādinā aññamaññassa anurūpadesanāya dhammassa svākkhātataṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n:982_1: idāni purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ kāraṇavacananti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:982_2: Tattha sandiṭṭhikattāti yasmā ayaṃ dhammo vuttanayena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo, sandiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0103n:982_3: kilese viddhaṃseti, sandassanañca arahati, tasmā svākkhāto durakkhāte titthiyadhamme
anya-e0103n:982_4: tadabhāvato. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi yathārahaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:983: 153. Tassevantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ buddhānussatiyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:985_0: 154. Ariyasaṅghaguṇāti ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato, sadevakena
anya-e0103n:985_1: ca lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato ariyo ca so saṅgho ca, ariyānaṃ vā saṅgho ariyasaṅgho, tassa guṇā.
anya-e0103n:986_0: 155. Yaṃ sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno “suṭṭhu paṭipanno”ti vuccati. Sā ariyamaggapaṭipadā
anya-e0103n:986_1: paṭipakkhadhamme anivattidhamme katvā pajahanato payojanābhāvā sayampi anivattidhammā,
anya-e0103n:986_2: adhigantabbassa ca nibbānassa ekaṃsato anulomīti. Tato eva apaccanīkā, anudhammabhūtā
anya-e0103n:986_3: ca, tassā ca paṭipannattā ariyasaṅgho “suppaṭipanno”ti vuttoti dassetuṃ “suṭṭhu paṭipanno”tiādi
anya-e0103n:986_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha “anivattipaṭipada”nti iminā ujuppaṭipattiṃ dasseti. Punappunaṃ nivattane
anya-e0103n:986_5: hi sati ujuppaṭipatti na hoti. “Anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipada”nti iminā ñāyappaṭipattiṃ.
anya-e0103n:986_6: Paṭipajjitabbassa hi nibbānassa anulomanena, apaccanīkatāya cassā ñāyato. “Dhammānudhammapaṭipada”nti
anya-e0103n:986_7: iminā sāmīcippaṭipattiṃ anucchavikabhāvadīpanato. Etena paṭhamapadassa papañcaniddeso,
anya-e0103n:986_8: itarāni tīṇi padānīti dasseti. Tenāha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:987_0: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanena kiccasiddhito ariyabhāvāvahaṃ savanaṃ sakkaccasavanaṃ
anya-e0103n:987_1: nāmāti vuttaṃ “sakkaccaṃ suṇantīti sāvakā”ti, tena ariyā eva nippariyāyato satthu
anya-e0103n:987_2: sāvakā nāmāti dasseti. Sīladiṭṭhisāmaññatāyāti ariyena sīlena, ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā
anya-e0103n:987_3: samānabhāvena. Ariyānañhi sīladiṭṭhiyo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ninnānākaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:987_4: maggenāgatattā. Tena te yattha katthaci ṭhitāpi saṃhatāva. Tenāha “saṅghātabhāvamāpanno”ti.
anya-e0103n:987_5: Māyāsāṭheyyādipāpadhammasamucchedena uju. Tato eva gomuttavaṅkābhāvena avaṅkā. Candalekhāvaṅkābhāvena
anya-e0103n:987_6: akuṭilā. Naṅgalakoṭivaṅkābhāvena ajimhā. Avaṅkādibhāvena vā uju. Parisuddhaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:987_7: ariyā. Apaṇṇakabhāvena ñāyati kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti
anya-e0103n:987_8: ñāyo. Vaṭṭadukkhaniyyānāya anucchavikattā. Anurūpattā sāmīci opāyikātipi saṅkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:987_9: samaññaṃ gatā sammāpaṭipatti, tāya samaṅgitāya suppaṭipannā “sammā paṭipajjantī”ti
anya-e0103n:987_10: katvā. Vattamānattho hi ayaṃ paṭipanna-saddo yathā “sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya
anya-e0103n:987_11: paṭipanno”ti. Atītaṃ paṭipadanti yathāvuttamaggasammāpaṭipattiṃ vadati. Ubhayena
anya-e0103n:987_12: ca sāmaññaniddesena, “suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā”ti ekasesanayena
anya-e0103n:988_0: Evaṃ ādipadatthaniddesabhāvena itarapadānaṃ atthaṃ vatvā idāni catunnampi padānaṃ
anya-e0103n:988_1: avomissakaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathānusiṭṭhanti satthārā
anya-e0103n:988_2: yathā anusiṭṭhaṃ, tathā anusāsanīanurūpanti attho. Apaṇṇakapaṭipadanti avirajjhanakapaṭipadaṃ,
anya-e0103n:988_3: anavajjapaṭipattinti attho. Ettha ca svākkhāte dhammavinaye apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāti
anya-e0103n:988_4: evaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ. Purimapadena sambandhe dutiyapadaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā, nanu
anya-e0103n:988_5: ca dutiyapadena sambandhepi paṭhamaṃ padaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyāti? Na tassa paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0103n:988_6: apekkhitattā. Sā pana sāvakānaṃ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipadāti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:988_8: ubhayaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā hi pi-saddena ubhayaṃ samuccinoti.
anya-e0103n:989: Kilesajimhavasena antadvayagāhoti sabbaso taṃ pahāya sammāpaṭipadā kāyādivaṅkappahāyinī ujuppaṭipatti hotīti āha “majjhimāya paṭipadāya…pe… ujuppaṭipanno”ti.
anya-e0103n:990_0: Ñāyo nāma yuttappattapaṭipatti, nibbānañca, sabbasaṅkhārasamathatāya ādittaṃ celaṃ,
anya-e0103n:990_1: sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi paṭipajjitabbamevāti āha “ñāyo vuccati nibbāna”nti. Nibbāyanakiriyāmukhena
anya-e0103n:990_2: cettha nibbānaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, maggañāṇādīhi vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati sacchikarīyati
anya-e0103n:990_3: cāti ñāyo nibbānanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:991: Guṇasambhāvanāya parehi kayiramānaṃ paccupaṭṭhānādisāmīcikammaṃ arahantīti sāmīcikammārahā.
anya-e0103n:992_0: 156. Yadidanti antogadhaliṅgavacanabhedo nipātoti tassa vacanabhedena atthamāha “yā
anya-e0103n:992_1: imānī”ti. Evanti pakāratthe nipāto, iminā pakārenāti attho. Tena itarāni tīṇi yugaḷāni
anya-e0103n:992_2: dassitāni hontīti āha “evaṃ cattāri purisayugaḷāni hontī”ti. Etanti etaṃ “purisapuggalā”ti
anya-e0103n:992_3: bahuvacanavasena vuttaṃ padaṃ. Purisā ca te puggalā ca purisapuggalā. Tattha “purisā”ti
anya-e0103n:992_4: iminā paṭhamāya pakatiyā gahaṇaṃ, “puggalā”ti pana dutiyāyapi sattasāmaññenāti evaṃ
anya-e0103n:992_5: vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ kīdisānaṃ? Ānetvā hunitabbānanti adhikārato
anya-e0103n:992_6: pākaṭoyamattho. Dātabbanti vā paccattavacanaṃ “catunnaṃ paccayāna”nti padaṃ apekkhitvā
anya-e0103n:992_7: sāmivasena pariṇāmetabbaṃ, aññathā yesaṃ kesañci catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ “āhuna”nti samaññā
anya-e0103n:992_8: siyā. Āhunaṃ arahatīti vā āhuneyyo. Sakkādīnampi vā āhavananti sakkādīhipi diyyamānaṃ
anya-e0103n:992_9: dānaṃ. Yattha hutaṃ mahapphalanti yasmiṃ āvahanīyaggimhi hutaṃ dadhiādi āhuneyyaggigahapataggidakkhiṇeyyaggīsu
anya-e0103n:992_10: hutato uḷāraphalanti tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhi. Hutanti dinnaṃ. Nikāyantareti sabbatthikavādinikāye.
anya-e0103n:993_0: Ṭhapetvā 165 teti te piyamanāpe ñātimitte apanetvā, tesaṃ adatvāti adhippāyo. Esa
anya-e0103n:993_1: eso. Ekabuddhantare ca dissatīti ekasmiṃ buddhantare vītivatte dissati. Ca-saddena
anya-e0103n:993_2: kadāci asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe vītivatteti dasseti. Abbokiṇṇanti paṭipakkhehi avomissaṃ,
anya-e0103n:993_3: kiriyāvisesakañcetaṃ. Piyamanāpattakaradhammā nāma sīlādayo, te ariyasaṅghe suppatiṭṭhitā.
anya-e0103n:993_4: Ayaṃ hettha adhippāyo – ñātimittā vippayuttā na cirasseva samāgacchanti, anavaṭṭhitā
anya-e0103n:993_5: ca tesu piyamanāpatā, na evamariyasaṅgho. Tasmā saṅghova pāhuneyyoti. Pubbakāranti
anya-e0103n:993_7: ca sabbena pakārena. Svāyaṃ pāhavanīya-saddo “pāhuneyyo”ti vuccati pariyāyabhāvena.
anya-e0103n:994_0: Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā. Tathābhāvakaraṇena
anya-e0103n:994_1: dakkhiṇaṃ arahati. Yathā uḷārātivipuludrayalābhena visodhitaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ dakkhiṇā
anya-e0103n:996_0: Yadipi pāḷiyaṃ “anuttara”nti vuttaṃ. Natthi ito uttaraṃ visiṭṭhanti hi anuttaraṃ.
anya-e0103n:996_1: Samampissa pana natthīti dassento “asadisa”nti āha. Khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena
anya-e0103n:996_2: tāyati rakkhati, khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti vā khettaṃ, kedārādi, khettaṃ viya
anya-e0103n:996_3: khettaṃ, puññānaṃ khettaṃ puññakkhettaṃ. Sesaṃ buddhānussatiyaṃ vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:998_0: 158. Aho vata sīlāni akhaṇḍāni, aho vata acchiddānīti evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:998_1: Aho vatāti ca sambhāvane nipāto. Tenāha “akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasenā”ti. Akhaṇḍabhāvādisampattivasenāti
anya-e0103n:998_2: attho. Parassa sīlāni anussariyamānāni piyamanāpabhāvāvahanena kevalaṃ mettāya padaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:998_3: honti, na visuṃ kammaṭṭhānanti āha “attano sīlāni anussaritabbānī”ti. Cāgādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:999_0: Yesanti sīlādīnaṃ. Paṭipāṭiyā samādāne samādānakkamena, ekajjhaṃ samādāne uddesakkamena
anya-e0103n:999_1: sīlānaṃ ādiantaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyāti vatthante, dasante vā
anya-e0103n:999_2: chinnavatthaṃ viya, visadisūdāharaṇaṃ cetaṃ. Evaṃ sesānipi udāharaṇāni. Vinivedhavasena
anya-e0103n:999_3: chinnasāṭako vinividdhasāṭako. Visabhāgavaṇṇena gāvī viyāti sambandho. Sabalarahitāni
anya-e0103n:999_4: vā asabalāni. Tathā akammāsāni. Sattavidhamethunasaṃyogo heṭṭhā sīlakathāyaṃ vutto
anya-e0103n:999_6: gahitā. Tāniyeva akhaṇḍādiguṇāni sīlāni. Sīlassa taṇhādāsabyato mocanaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayabhāvāpādanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:999_7: Tato eva taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo serī sayaṃvasī bhujisso nāma hoti. Tenāha “bhujissabhāvakaraṇena
anya-e0103n:999_8: bhujissānī”ti. “Imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhaveyyaṃ devaññataro vā, tattha nicco dhuvo
anya-e0103n:999_9: sassato”ti, “sīlena suddhī”ti ca evamādinā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā ayaṃ te sīlesu
anya-e0103n:999_10: dosoti catūsu vipattīsu yāya kāyaci vipattiyā dassanena parāmaṭṭhuṃ anuddhaṃsetuṃ.
anya-e0103n:1000_0: 159. Sikkhāya sagāravoti sīladhanaṃ nissāya paṭiladdhasamādānattā sātisayaṃ sikkhāya
anya-e0103n:1000_1: sagāravo sappatisso hoti. Sabhāgavuttīti sampannasīlehi sabhāgavuttiko, tāya eva
anya-e0103n:1000_2: vā sikkhāya sabhāgavutti. Yo hi sikkhāgāravarahito, so tāya visabhāgavutti nāma hoti
anya-e0103n:1000_3: vilomanato. Yathā parehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti, evaṃ dhammāmisehi paṭisantharaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1000_4: paṭisanthāro. Sikkhāya sagāravattā eva tattha appamatto hoti. Attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1000_5: daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhayanti evamādīni bhayāni imassa dūrasamussāritānīti āha “attānuvādādibhayavirahito”ti.
anya-e0103n:1002_1: tanninnena tappoṇena. Niccaṃ sadā pavattā dānasaṃvibhāgā yassa so niccapavattadānasaṃvibhāgo,
anya-e0103n:1002_2: tena. Idhāpi “pakatiyā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Yaṃ parassa paṭiyattaṃ diyyati,
anya-e0103n:1002_3: taṃ dānaṃ. Yaṃ attanā paribhuñjitabbato saṃvibhajati, so saṃvibhāgo. Ito dāni pabhutīti
anya-e0103n:1002_4: ito paṭṭhāya dāni ajjatagge ajjadivasaṃ ādiṃ katvā. Adatvā na bhuñjissāmīti dānasamādānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1002_5: katvā. Taṃdivasanti tasmiṃ bhāvanārambhadivase. Tattha nimittaṃ gaṇhitvāti tasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1002_6: dāne pariccāgacetanāya pavattiākārassa sallakkhaṇavasena nimittaṃ gahetvā. Vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasenāti
anya-e0103n:1002_7: vigatāni malamaccherāni etasmāti vigatamalamacchero, cāgo, tassa bhāvo vigatamalamaccheratā.
anya-e0103n:1002_8: Tadādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ, sampattīnaṃ, ānisaṃsānaṃ vā vasena.
anya-e0103n:1003_0: Sataṃ dhammaṃ anukkamanti sādhūnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ dhammaṃ paveṇiṃ anu anu kamanto
anya-e0103n:1003_1: okkamanto, avokkamanto vā. Ye ime dāyakassa lābhā āyuvaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādayo,
anya-e0103n:1003_2: piyabhāvādayo ca bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitā pakittitā. Manussattaṃ vāti vā-saddo avuttavikappattho,
anya-e0103n:1004_0: Maccheramalenāti maccherasaṅkhātena malena. Atha vā maccherañca malañca maccheramalaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1004_1: tena maccherena ceva lobhādimalena cāti attho. Pajāyanavasenāti yathāsakaṃ kammanibbattanavasena.
anya-e0103n:1004_2: Kaṇhadhammānanti lobhādiekantakāḷakānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ. Vigatattāti pahīnattā. Vigatamalamaccherena
anya-e0103n:1004_3: cetasāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ. Sotāpannassa satoti gehaṃ āvasantassa
anya-e0103n:1004_4: sotāpannassa samānassa. Nissayavihāranti nissāya viharitabbavihāraṃ, devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakakammaṭṭhānanti
anya-e0103n:1004_5: attho. Abhibhavitvāti agāraṃ āvasantānaṃ aññesaṃ uppajjanakarāgādiupakkilese abhibhuyya.
anya-e0103n:1005_0: Yo kiñci dentopi sāpekkhova deti, so muttacāgo na hoti, ayaṃ pana na evanti “muttacāgo”ti
anya-e0103n:1005_1: vuttaṃ. Vissaṭṭhacāgoti nirapekkhapariccāgoti attho. Yathā pāṇātipātabahulo puggalo
anya-e0103n:1005_2: “lohitapāṇī”ti vuccati, evaṃ dānabahulo puggalo “payatapāṇī”ti vuttoti dassento “dātuṃ
anya-e0103n:1005_3: sadā dhotahatthoyevā”ti āha. Tattha sadāti niccaṃ, abhiṇhanti attho. Pariccāgoti
anya-e0103n:1005_4: deyyadhammapariccāgoti adhikārato viññāyati. Yaṃ yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pare yācanakā.
anya-e0103n:1005_5: Yācane yogo yācanayogo, parehi yācituṃ yuttoti attho. Yājena yuttoti dānena yutto
anya-e0103n:1005_6: sadā pariccajanato. Ubhayeti yathāvutte dāne, saṃvibhāge ca rato abhirato.
anya-e0103n:1006_0: 161. Yathā parisuddhasīlassa puggalassa akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlassa anussarantassa
anya-e0103n:1006_1: sīlānussatibhāvanā ijjhati, evaṃ parisuddhauḷārapariccāgassa puggalassa anupakkiliṭṭhameva
anya-e0103n:1006_2: attano pariccāgaṃ anussarantassa bhāvanā ijjhatīti dassetuṃ “vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasenā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1007_0: Bhiyyosoti uparipi. Mattāya pamāṇassa mahatiyā mattāya, vipulena pamāṇenāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1007_1: Cāgādhimuttoti pariccāge adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro. Tato eva alobhajjhāsayo katthacipi
anya-e0103n:1007_2: anabhisaṅgacitto. Paṭiggāhakesu mettāyanavasena pariccāgo hotīti mettāya mettābhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:1007_3: anulomakārī anurūpapaṭipatti. Visāradoti visado attanova guṇena katthacipi amaṅkubhūto
anya-e0103n:1009_0: 162. Ariyamaggavasenāti ariyamaggassa adhigamavasena. Samudāgatehīti sammadeva taduppattito
anya-e0103n:1009_1: uddhaṃ āgatehi. Yādisā hi ariyānaṃ santāne lokiyāpi saddhādayo, na tādisā kadācipi
anya-e0103n:1009_2: pothujjanikā saddhādayo. Dibbantīti devā. Cattāro mahārājāno etesanti catumahārājā,
anya-e0103n:1009_3: te eva cātumahārājikā. Tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino tatthūpapannāti taṃsahacaritaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1009_4: tāvatiṃsaṃ, tannivāsinopi devā taṃsahacaraṇato eva tāvatiṃsā. Dukkhato yātā apayātāti
anya-e0103n:1009_5: yāmā. Tusāya pītiyā itā upagatāti tusitā. Bhogānaṃ nimmāne rati etesanti nimmānaratino.
anya-e0103n:1009_6: Paranimmitesu bhogesu vasaṃ vattentīti paranimmitavasavattino. Brahmānaṃ kāyo samūho
anya-e0103n:1009_7: brahmakāyo, tappariyāpannatāya tattha bhavāti brahmakāyikā. Tatuttarīti tato brahmakāyikehi
anya-e0103n:1009_8: uttari, upari parittābhādike sandhāya vadati. Devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāti “yathārūpāya
anya-e0103n:1009_9: maggenāgatāya saddhāya samannāgatā, sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya samannāgatā ito
anya-e0103n:1009_10: cutā tattha upapannā tā devatā, mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññā
anya-e0103n:1009_11: ca saṃvijjatī”ti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakkhiṃ otārentena viya attano saddhādiguṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0103n:1010_0: Yadi evaṃ sutte ubhayaguṇānussaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha
anya-e0103n:1010_1: “sutte panā”tiādi. Tattha kiñcāpi vuttanti “attano ca, tāsañca devatāna”nti ubhayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1010_2: samadhuraṃ viya sutte kiñcāpi vuttaṃ. Atha kho taṃ “devatānaṃ saddhañca sīlañcā”tiādivacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1010_3: Sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbanti “vutta”nti parato padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Kimatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1010_4: pana sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapananti āha “devatānaṃ attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthanti
anya-e0103n:1010_5: veditabba”nti. Kasmā pana sutte yathārutavasena atthaṃ aggahetvā evaṃ attho gayhatīti
anya-e0103n:1011_0: 163. Tasmāti yasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇānussaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1011_1: daḷhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, sīlacāgānussatīsu viya idhāpi attano guṇānussaraṇaṃ jhānuppattinimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1011_2: yuttaṃ, tasmā. Pubbabhāge bhāvanārambhe. Aparabhāgeti yathā bhāventassa upacārajjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1011_3: ijjhati, tathā bhāvanākāle. Yadi attano eva idha guṇā anussaritabbā, kathamayaṃ devatānussatīti
anya-e0103n:1011_5: bhāvanā “devatānussatī”ti vuttā, na devatānaṃ, tāsaṃ guṇānaṃ vā anussaraṇenāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1011_6: Pubbabhāge vā pavattaṃ devatāguṇānussaraṇaṃ upādāya “devatānussatī”ti imissā samaññā
anya-e0103n:1011_7: veditabbā. Tathā hi vakkhati “pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasenā”ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
anya-e0103n:1013_0: 164. Etāsanti etāsaṃ buddhānussatiādīnaṃ channaṃ anussatīnaṃ. Vitthāradesanāyanti
anya-e0103n:1013_1: vitthāravasena pavattadesanāyaṃ, mahānāmasuttaṃ sandhāya vadati. Bhagavātiādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1013_2: atthanti bhagavātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ. Atthavedanti vā hetuphalaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ
anya-e0103n:1013_3: tuṭṭhimāha. Dhammavedanti hetuṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ. “Ārakattā araha”nti anussarantassa
anya-e0103n:1013_4: hi yaṃ taṃ bhagavato kilesehi ārakattaṃ, so hetu. Ñāpako cettha hetu adhippeto, na
anya-e0103n:1013_5: kārako, sampāpako vā. Yonena ñāyamāno arahattattho, taṃ phalaṃ. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi
anya-e0103n:1013_7: “yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā”tiādinā ca tattha tattha hetuapadeso katoyevāti. Dhammūpasaṃhitanti
anya-e0103n:1014_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ, avadhāraṇañca tesaṃ sukhasiddhidassanatthaṃ. Tenāha “tesaṃ hī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1014_2: Na puthujjanānaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ ijjhantīti. Tathā hi vakkhati “evaṃ santepī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1014_3: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā mahānāmasuttādīsu bahūsu suttesu ariyasāvakaggahaṇaṃ katanti? Tesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1015_0: Nikkhantanti niggataṃ nissaṭaṃ. Muttanti vissaṭṭhaṃ. Vuṭṭhitanti apetaṃ. Sabbametaṃ
anya-e0103n:1015_1: vikkhambhanameva sandhāya vadati. Gedhamhāti palibodhato. Idampīti buddhānussativasena
anya-e0103n:1015_2: laddhaṃ upacārajjhānamāha. Ārammaṇaṃ karitvāti paccayaṃ katvā, pādakaṃ katvāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1016_0: Sambādheti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā sampīḷe saṃkaṭe gharāvāse. Okāsādhigamo lokuttaradhammassa
anya-e0103n:1016_1: adhigamāya adhigantabbaokāso. Anussatiyo eva anussatiṭṭhānāni. Visuddhidhammāti visujjhanasabhāvā,
anya-e0103n:1016_2: visujjhituṃ vā bhabbā. Paramatthavisuddhidhammatāyāti paramatthavisuddhiyā nibbānassa
anya-e0103n:1017_0: 166. Evaṃ santepīti evaṃ mahānāmasuttādīsu anekesu suttesu ariyasāvakasseva vasena
anya-e0103n:1017_1: chasu anussatīsu desitāsupi. Yassānubhāvenāti yassa cittappasādassa balena. Pītiṃ
anya-e0103n:1022_0: 167. Itoti devatānussatiyā. Sā hi chasu anussatīsu sabbapacchā niddiṭṭhattā āsannā,
anya-e0103n:1022_1: paccakkhā ca. Anantarāyāti tadanantaraṃ uddiṭṭhattā vuttaṃ. Maraṇassa sati maraṇassatīti
anya-e0103n:1022_2: maraṇaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tattha maraṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmañcettha khandhānaṃ bhedo
anya-e0103n:1022_3: “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti vacanato cutikhandhānaṃ vināso maraṇanti
anya-e0103n:1022_4: vattabbaṃ, visesato pana taṃ jīvitindriyassa vināsabhāvena kammaṭṭhānikānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0103n:1022_5: “jīvitindriyassa upacchedo”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha niddese “kaḷevarassa nikkhepo jīvitindriyassupacchedo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1022_6: Tattha ekabhavapariyāpannassāti ekena bhavena paricchinnassa. Jīvitindriyassa upacchedoti
anya-e0103n:1022_8: arahato santānassa sabbaso ucchedabhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ. Saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgasaṅkhātanti
anya-e0103n:1022_9: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ udayavayaparicchinnassa pavattikhaṇassa bhaṅgo nirodhoti saṅkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1022_10: gataṃ. Khaṇikamaraṇanti yathāvuttakhaṇavantaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe labbhamānaṃ maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1022_11: Yaṃ khandhappabandhaṃ upādāya rukkhādisamaññā, tasmiṃ anupacchinnepi allatādivigamanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1022_12: nissāya matavohāro sammutimaraṇaṃ. Na taṃ idha adhippetanti taṃ samucchedakhaṇikasammutimaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1022_13: idha maraṇānussatiyaṃ nādhippetaṃ abāhullato, anupaṭṭhahanato, asaṃvegavatthuto cāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1023_0: Adhippetaṃ satiyā ārammaṇabhāvena. Āyuādīnaṃ khayakāle maraṇaṃ kālamaraṇaṃ. Tesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1023_1: aparikkhīṇakāle maraṇaṃ akālamaraṇaṃ. “Kālamaraṇaṃ puññakkhayenā”ti idaṃ yathādhikāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1024_1: sampattiyaṃ. Vipakkavipākattāti attano phalānurūpaṃ dātabbavipākassa dinnattā. Gatikālāhārādisampattiyā
anya-e0103n:1024_2: abhāvenāti devānaṃ viya gatisampattiyā, paṭhamakappiyānaṃ viya kālasampattiyā, uttarakurukādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1024_3: viya āhārasampattiyā ca abhāvena. Ādi-saddena utusukkasoṇitādiṃ pariggayhati. Ajjatanakālapurisānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1024_4: viyāti viya-saddo aṭṭhāne paṭṭhapito, ajjatanakālapurisānaṃ vassasatamattaparimāṇassa
anya-e0103n:1024_5: viya āyuno khayavasenāti yojanā. Evaṃ hi anāgatepi paramāyuno saṅgaho kato hoti,
anya-e0103n:1024_6: atīte pana gatisampattiyā viya kālāhārādisampattiyā bhāvena anekavassasahassa parimāṇopi
anya-e0103n:1024_7: āyu ahosi. Ayañca vibhāgo vattamānassa antarakappassa vasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1024_8: Kalāburājādīnanti ādi-saddena nandayakkhanandamāṇavakādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Taṃ
anya-e0103n:1024_9: sabbampīti yaṃ “kālamaraṇaṃ akālamaraṇaṃ, tatthāpi puññakkhayamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1024_10: ubhayakkhayamaraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇa”nti vuttappabhedaṃ maraṇaṃ, taṃ sabbampi.
anya-e0103n:1025_0: 168. Yonisoti upāyena. Manasikāroti maraṇārammaṇo manasikāro. Yena pana upāyena manasikāro
anya-e0103n:1025_1: pavattetabbo, taṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “ayoniso pavattayato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1025_2: ayoniso pavattayatoti anupāyena satiṃ, saṃvegaṃ, ñāṇañca anupaṭṭhapetvā maraṇaṃ anussarato.
anya-e0103n:1025_3: Tadetaṃ sabbampīti sokapāmojjānaṃ uppajjanaṃ, saṃvegassa anuppajjanaṃ, santāsassa
anya-e0103n:1025_4: uppajjanañca yathākkamaṃ satisaṃvegañāṇaviharato hoti. Yo hi “maraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ jātassa
anya-e0103n:1025_5: ekantika”nti paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ sarati, tattha saṃvegajāto hoti sampajāno ca, tassa
anya-e0103n:1025_6: iṭṭhajanamaraṇādinimittaṃ sokādayo anokāsāva. Tasmāti yasmā ayoniso manasikāraṃ pavattayato
anya-e0103n:1025_7: ete dosā, tasmā. Tattha tatthāti araññasusānādīsu. Hatamatasatteti corādīhi hate,
anya-e0103n:1025_8: sarasena mate ca satte. Diṭṭhapubbā sampatti yesaṃ te diṭṭhapubbasampattī, tesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1025_9: diṭṭhapubbasampattīnaṃ. Yojetvāti upaṭṭhapetvā. Ekaccassāti tikkhindriyassa ñāṇuttarassa.
anya-e0103n:1026_0: 169. Vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānatoti ghātakassa viya pati pati upaṭṭhānato āsannabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1026_1: Sampattivipattitoti ārogyādisampattīnaṃ viya jīvitasampattiyā vipajjanato. Upasaṃharaṇatoti
anya-e0103n:1026_2: paresaṃ maraṇaṃ dassetvā attano maraṇassa upanayanato. Kāyabahusādhāraṇatoti sarīrassa
anya-e0103n:1026_3: bahūnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvato. Āyudubbalatoti jīvitassa dubbalabhāvato. Animittatoti maraṇassa
anya-e0103n:1027_0: Vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānatoti ettha viya-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento “vadhakassa viya
anya-e0103n:1027_1: paccupaṭṭhānato”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivaranto “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Tattha cārayamānoti
anya-e0103n:1027_2: āgurento paharaṇākāraṃ karonto. Paccupaṭṭhitova upagantvā ṭhito samīpe eva. Jarāmaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1027_3: gahetvāva nibbattanti “yathā hi ahicchattakamakuḷaṃ uggacchantaṃ paṃsuvirahitaṃ na
anya-e0103n:1027_4: hoti, evaṃ sattā nibbattantā jarāmaraṇavirahitā na hontī”ti ettakena upamā. Ahicchattakamakuḷaṃ
anya-e0103n:1027_5: kadāci katthaci paṃsuvirahitampi bhaveyya, sattā pana kathañcipi jarāmaraṇavirahitā
anya-e0103n:1027_6: na hontīti khaṇikamaraṇaṃ tāva upamābhāvena dassetvā idhādhippetaṃ maraṇaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1027_7: “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā yadime sattā jarāmaraṇaṃ gahetvāva nibbattanti, nibbattisamanantarameva
anya-e0103n:1027_8: maritabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tathā hī”tiādi. Avassaṃ maraṇatoti avassaṃ maritabbato,
anya-e0103n:1027_9: ekantena maraṇasabbhāvato vā. Pabbateyyāti pabbatato āgatā. Hārahārinīti pavāhe patitassa
anya-e0103n:1027_10: tiṇapaṇṇādikassa ativiya haraṇasīlā. Sandatevāti savati eva. Vattatevāti pavāhavasena
anya-e0103n:1028_0: Yamekarattinti yassaṃ ekarattiyaṃ, bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, accantasaṃyoge
anya-e0103n:1028_1: vā. Paṭhamanti sabbapaṭhamaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe. Gabbheti mātukucchiyaṃ. Māṇavoti satto.
anya-e0103n:1028_2: Yebhuyyena sattā rattiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti rattiggahaṇaṃ. Abbhuṭṭhitovāti uṭṭhitaabbho
anya-e0103n:1028_3: viya, abhimukhabhāvena vā uṭṭhitova maraṇassāti adhippāyo. So yātīti so māṇavo yāti,
anya-e0103n:1028_4: paṭhamakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya gacchateva. Sa gacchaṃ na nivattatīti so evaṃ gacchanto
anya-e0103n:1028_5: khaṇamattampi na nivattati, aññadatthu maraṇaṃyeva upagacchati.
anya-e0103n:1029_0: Kunnadīnanti pabbatato patitānaṃ khuddakanadīnaṃ. Pāto āporasānugatabandhanānanti
anya-e0103n:1029_1: purimadivase divā sūriyasantāpena anto anupavisitvā puna rattiyaṃ bandhanamūlaṃ upagatena
anya-e0103n:1030_0: Accayantīti atikkamanti. Uparujjhatīti nirujjhati. Udakameva odakaṃ, udakoghaṃ vā.
anya-e0103n:1030_1: Yasmā accayanti ahorattā, tasmā jīvitaṃ uparujjhati. Yasmā jīvitaṃ uparujjhati, tasmā
anya-e0103n:1030_2: āyu khīyati maccānaṃ. Papatatoti papatanato bhayaṃ sāmikānaṃ rukkhe ṭhatvā kamme
anya-e0103n:1030_3: viniyuñjitukāmānaṃ, heṭṭhā paviṭṭhānaṃ vā. Uggamanaṃ pati uggamananimittaṃ. Mā maṃ
anya-e0103n:1031: Koci mittamukhasatturandhagavesī saha vattamānopi na haneyya, ayaṃ pana ekaṃsena hanatiyevāti dassetuṃ “sahajātiyā āgatato”ti vatvā “jīvitaharaṇato cā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1032: 170. Nanti sampattiṃ. Sukhīti dibbasadisehi bhogehi, ādhipateyyena ca sukhasamaṅgī. Dehabandhenāti sarīrena. Asokoti asokamahārājā. Sokamāgatoti socitabbataṃ gato.
anya-e0103n:1033_0: Ārogyaṃ yobbanānaṃ. Byādhijarāpariyosānatā jīvitassa maraṇapariyosānatāya udāharaṇavasena
anya-e0103n:1033_1: ānītā, paccayabhāgavasena vā. Lokoyeva lokasannivāso yathā sattāvāsāti, sannivasitabbatāya
anya-e0103n:1033_2: vā sattanikāyo lokasannivāso. Anugatoti anubandho paccatthikena viya. Anusaṭoti anupaviṭṭho
anya-e0103n:1033_3: upavisena viya. Abhibhūtoti ajjhotthaṭo maddahatthīhi viya. Abbhāhatoti pahaṭo bhūtehi viya.
anya-e0103n:1034_0: Selāti silāmayā, na paṃsuādimayā. Vipulāti mahantā anekayojanāyāmavitthārā. Nabhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1034_1: āhaccāti vipulattā eva ākāsaṃ abhivihacca sabbadisāsu pharitvā. Anupariyeyyunti anuvicareyyuṃ.
anya-e0103n:1034_2: Nippothentāti attanā āghātitaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karontā. Adhivattantīti adhibhavanti.
anya-e0103n:1034_3: Kulena vā rūpena vā sīlena vā sutena vā saddhādīhi vā seṭṭhoti sambhāvanāya khattiyādīsu
anya-e0103n:1034_4: na kañci parivajjeti. Tehi eva nihīnoti avamaññamānāya suddādīsu na kañci parivajjeti.
anya-e0103n:1034_5: Aññadatthu sabbameva abhimaddati nimmathati. Daṇḍādiupāyā ca tattha avisayā evāti
anya-e0103n:1034_6: dassetuṃ “na tattha hatthīnaṃ bhūmī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha mantayuddhenāti āthabbaṇavedavihitena
anya-e0103n:1034_7: mantasaṅgāmappayogena. Dhanenāti dhanadānena. Vā-saddo avuttavikappanattho. Tena
anya-e0103n:1035_0: 171. Parehi saddhiṃ attano upasaṃharaṇatoti parehi matehi saddhiṃ “tepi nāma matā,
anya-e0103n:1035_1: kimaṅgaṃ pana mādisā”ti attano maraṇassa upanayanato. Yasamahattatoti parivāramahattato,
anya-e0103n:1035_2: vibhavamahattato ca. Puññamahattatoti mahāpuññabhāvato. Thāmamahattatoti vīriyabalamahattato.
anya-e0103n:1035_3: Yudhiṭṭhilo dhammaputto. Cānuro yo baladevena nibbuddhaṃ katvā mārito.
anya-e0103n:1036: Saha iddhīhīti vejayantakampananandopanandadamanādīsu diṭṭhānubhāvāhi attano iddhīhi saddhiṃ maccumukhaṃ paviṭṭho.
anya-e0103n:1037_0: Kalaṃ nagghanti soḷasinti soḷasannaṃ pūraṇabhāgaṃ na agghanti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
anya-e0103n:1037_1: āyasmato therassa sāriputtassa paññaṃ soḷasabhāge katvā tato ekaṃ bhāgaṃ soḷasadhā
anya-e0103n:1037_2: gahetvā laddhaṃ ekabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ kalaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1038_0: Sabbassāpi saṃkilesapakkhassa samugghāto ñāyena āraddhavīriyassa hotīti āha “ñāṇavīriyabalenā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1038_1: Sammādiṭṭhisammāvāyāmesu hi siddhesu aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo siddhova hotīti. Ekākībhāvena
anya-e0103n:1038_2: khaggavisāṇakappā. Paratoghosena vinā sayameva bhūtā paṭividdhākuppāti sayambhuno.
anya-e0103n:1039_0: Hatthagatasuvaṇṇavalayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrassa katthaci asattatāti
anya-e0103n:1039_1: evamādikaṃ taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ āgamma. Vīmaṃsantāti pavattinivattiyo upaparikkhantā.
anya-e0103n:1039_2: Mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esanaṭṭhena mahesayo. Ekacariyanivāsenāti ekacariyanivāsamattena,
anya-e0103n:1039_3: na sīlādinā. Khaggamigasiṅgasamā upamā yesaṃ, khaggamigasiṅgaṃ vā samūpamā yesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1040_1: mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi vicitro acchariyabbhuto rūpakāyo etassāti asīti…pe… rūpakāyo.
anya-e0103n:1040_3: samiddho dhammakāyo etassāti sabbākāra…pe… dhammakāyo. Ṭhānasoti taṅkhaṇeyeva.
anya-e0103n:1041: Evaṃ mahānubhāvassāti evaṃ yathāvuttarūpakāyasampattiyā, dhammakāyasampattiyā ca viññāyamānavipulāparimeyyabuddhānubhāvassa, vasaṃ nāgataṃ anupagamanavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1042: Maraṇaṃ sāmaññaṃ etassāti maraṇasāmañño, tassa bhāvo maraṇasāmaññatā, tāya.
anya-e0103n:1043: 172. Kimikulānanti kimisamūhānaṃ, kimijātīnaṃ vā. Jīyantīti jaraṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0103n:1044_0: Nikkhanteti vītivatte. Paṭihitāyāti paccānugatāya. So mamassa antarāyoti sā yathāvuttā
anya-e0103n:1044_1: na kevalaṃ kālakiriyāva, atha kho mama atidullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā ṭhitassa satthusāsanamanasikārassa
anya-e0103n:1044_2: antarāyo assa bhaveyya. Byāpajjeyyāti vipattiṃ gaccheyya. Satthakena viya aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1045_0: 173. Abalanti balahīnaṃ. Dubbalanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Abhāvattho hi ayaṃ du-saddo
anya-e0103n:1045_1: “dussīlo duppañño”tiādīsu viya. Tadetaṃ āyu. Assāsapassāsānaṃ samavuttitā aparāparaṃ
anya-e0103n:1045_2: pavesanikkhamova. Bahi nikkhantanāsikavāte anto apavisante, paviṭṭhe vā anikkhamanteti
anya-e0103n:1045_3: ekasseva pavesanikkhamo viya vuttaṃ, taṃ nāsikavātabhāvasāmaññenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adhimattatāya
anya-e0103n:1045_4: accāsannaadhiṭṭhānādinā. Tadabhāvo hi iriyāpathānaṃ samavuttitā. Atisītena abhibhūtassa
anya-e0103n:1045_5: kāyassa vipajjanaṃ mahiṃsaraṭṭhādīsu himapātakālena dīpetabbaṃ. Tattha hi sattā sītena
anya-e0103n:1045_6: bhinnasarīrā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti. Atiuṇhena abhibhūtassa vipajjanaṃ marukantāre
anya-e0103n:1045_7: uṇhābhitattāya pacchiṃ, tattha ṭhapitaṃ upari sāṭakaṃ, puttañca akkamitvā matāya
anya-e0103n:1045_8: itthiyā dīpetabbaṃ. Mahābhūtānaṃ samavuttitā pakopābhāvo. Pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ pakopena
anya-e0103n:1045_9: sarīrassa vikārāpatti parato dhātukammaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ āgamissati. Yuttakāleti bhuñjituṃ
anya-e0103n:1046_0: 174. Avavatthānatoti kālādivasena vavatthānābhāvato. Vavatthānanti cettha paricchedo
anya-e0103n:1046_1: adhippeto, na asaṅkarato vavatthānaṃ, nicchayo cāti āha “paricchedābhāvato”ti. Na
anya-e0103n:1047_0: Ito paranti ettha paranti paraṃ aññaṃ kālanti attho. Tena orakālassāpi saṅgaho siddho
