anya-e0103n:1047_1: hoti. Paramāyuto orakālaṃ eva cettha “para”nti adhippetaṃ. Tato paraṃ sattānaṃ jīvanassa
anya-e0103n:1047_2: abhāvato “vavatthānābhāvato”ti vattuṃ na sakkāti. Abbudapesītiādīsu “abbudakāle pesikāle”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1047_3: kāla-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Kāloti idha pubbaṇhādivelā adhippetā. Tenāha “pubbaṇhepi
anya-e0103n:1047_4: hī”tiādi. Idheva dehena patitabbanti sambandho. Anekappakāratoti nagare jātānaṃ gāme,
anya-e0103n:1047_5: gāme jātānaṃ nagare, vane jātānaṃ janapade, janapade jātānaṃ vanetiādinā anekappakārato.
anya-e0103n:1047_6: Ito cutenāti ito gatito cutena. Idha imissaṃ gatiyaṃ. Yantayuttagoṇo viyāti yathā
anya-e0103n:1047_7: yante yuttagoṇo yantaṃ nātivattati, evaṃ loko gatipañcakanti ettakena upamā.
anya-e0103n:1048_0: 175. Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato upari “dasa vā vassāni, vīsati vā”tiādinā dutiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1048_1: vassasataṃ apāpuṇanto appakaṃ vā jīvatīti attho. Gamanīyoti gandhabbo upapajjanavasena.
anya-e0103n:1049: Hīḷeyyāti paribhaveyya na sambhāveyya. Nanti āyuṃ. Suporisoti sādhupuriso paññavā. Careyyāti sucaritaṃ careyya. Tenāha “ādittasīsovā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1051_0: “Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, tiṇagge ussāvabindu sūriye uggacchante khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati,
anya-e0103n:1051_1: na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hoti. Udake udakapubbuḷaṃ. Udake daṇḍarāji. Nadī pabbateyyā dūraṅgamā
anya-e0103n:1051_2: sīghasotā hārahārinī. Balavā puriso jivhagge kheḷapiṇḍaṃ saṃyūhitvā akasireneva vameyya.
anya-e0103n:1051_3: Divasaṃ santatte ayokaṭāhe maṃsapesi pakkhittā khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati, na ciraṭṭhitikā
anya-e0103n:1051_4: hoti. Gāvī vajjhā āghātanaṃ nīyamānā yaṃ yadeva pādaṃ uddharati, santikeva hoti vadhassa,
anya-e0103n:1051_5: santikeva maraṇassa, evamevaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, govajjhūpamaṃ jīvitaṃ manussānaṃ parittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1051_6: lahukaṃ bahudukkhaṃ bahupāyāsaṃ mantāyaṃ boddhabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:1053_0: Rattindivanti ekaṃ rattindivaṃ. Bhagavato sāsananti ariyamaggapaṭivedhāvahaṃ satthu
anya-e0103n:1053_1: ovādaṃ. Bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assāti bahuṃ vata mayā attahitaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ kataṃ
anya-e0103n:1053_2: bhaveyya. Tadantaranti taṃ khaṇaṃ tattakaṃ velaṃ. Ekaṃ piṇḍapātanti ekaṃ divasaṃ
anya-e0103n:1053_3: yāpanappahonakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ. Dandhanti mandaṃ cirāya. Avissāsiyo avissāsanīyo.
anya-e0103n:1054_0: 176. Citte dharanteyeva sattānaṃ jīvitavohāro, cittassa ca atiittaro khaṇo lahuparivattibhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1054_1: Yathāha bhagavā “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1054_2: yathayidaṃ citta”nti. Tasmā sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikattā lahusaṃ ittaranti
anya-e0103n:1054_3: dassento “paramatthato”tiādimāha. Tattha “paramatthato”ti iminā yāyaṃ “yo ciraṃ jīvati,
anya-e0103n:1054_4: so vassasata”ntiādinā sattānaṃ jīvitappavatti vuttā, sā pabandhavisayattā vohāravasenāti
anya-e0103n:1055_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā susikkhitā katahatthā katūpāsanā
anya-e0103n:1055_1: catuddisā ṭhitā assu, atha puriso āgaccheyya ‘ahaṃ imesaṃ…pe… katūpāsanānaṃ catuddisā
anya-e0103n:1055_2: kaṇḍe khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyaṃ gahetvā āharissāmī’ti. Yathā ca, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n:1055_3: tassa purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṃ javo, tato sīghataro. Yathā ca, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n:1055_4: tassa purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṃ javo, yathā ca yā devatā candimasūriyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1055_5: purato dhāvanti, tāsaṃ devatānaṃ javo, tato sīghataraṃ āyusaṅkhārā khīyantī”ti –
anya-e0103n:1056_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ parittampi paṭikkhipati. Tatra hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena
anya-e0103n:1056_1: paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi, pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsannipātatopi parittako rūpajīvitindriyassa
anya-e0103n:1056_2: so khaṇo vutto, cittassa pana ativiya parittataro, yassa upamāpi natthi. Tenevāha
anya-e0103n:1056_3: “yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, upamāpi na sukarā, yāva lahuparivattaṃ citta”nti. Jīvitakkhaṇoti
anya-e0103n:1056_4: jīvanakkhaṇo. Ekacittappavattimattoyeva ekassa cittassa pavattimatteneva sattānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1056_5: paramatthato jīvanakkhaṇassa paricchinnattā. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya pakāsento “yathā
anya-e0103n:1056_6: nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha pavattamānanti pavattantaṃ. Ekacittakkhaṇikanti ekacittakkhaṇamattavantaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1056_7: Tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatteti yena vattamānacittakkhaṇena “jīvatī”ti vuccati, tasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1056_8: citte nirodhaṃ bhaṅgaṃ pattamatte taṃsamaṅgī satto niruddho matoti vuccati. Vuttamevatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1056_9: pāḷiyā vibhāvetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena tīsupi kālesu sattānaṃ paramatthato
anya-e0103n:1057_0: Jīvitanti jīvitindriyaṃ. Sukhadukkhāti sukhadukkhavedanā. Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu
anya-e0103n:1057_1: eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. Attabhāvoti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā
anya-e0103n:1057_2: vuttā. Kevalāti attanā, niccabhāvena vā avomissā. Ekacittasamāyuttāti ekekena cittena
anya-e0103n:1057_3: sahitā. Lahuso vattati khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiittaro
anya-e0103n:1058_0: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cutito uddhaṃ “niruddhā”ti vattabbā
anya-e0103n:1058_1: ye khandhā. Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa
anya-e0103n:1058_2: bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhā khandhā. Sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā. Kathaṃ? Gatā
anya-e0103n:1058_3: appaṭisandhikā puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā. Yathā hi cutikhandhā na nivattanti,
anya-e0103n:1058_4: evaṃ tato pubbepi khandhā, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1059_0: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti ajāto nāma hoti. Paccuppannena
anya-e0103n:1059_1: vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno nāma hoti. Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa
anya-e0103n:1059_2: viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato mato nāma
anya-e0103n:1059_3: hoti niruddhassa appaṭisandhikattā. Evaṃ santepi paññatti paramatthiyā yā taṃ taṃ
anya-e0103n:1059_4: dharantaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso jīvati, phusso jīvatī”ti vacanappavattiyā visayabhūtā
anya-e0103n:1059_5: santānapaññatti, sā ettha paramatthiyā paramatthabhūtā. Tathā hi vadanti “nāmagottaṃ na jīratī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1060_0: 177. Aññataraññatarena ākārena. Cittanti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ. Āsevanaṃ labhatīti
anya-e0103n:1060_1: bhāvanāsevanaṃ labhati, bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ pahāya ekattavasena maraṇārammaṇameva
anya-e0103n:1060_2: hotīti. Tenāha “maraṇārammaṇā sati santiṭṭhatī”ti. Sabhāvadhammānaṃ bhedo sabhāvadhammagatiko
anya-e0103n:1060_3: evāti āha “sabhāvadhammattā pana ārammaṇassā”ti. Tenāha bhagavā “jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n:1060_4: aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”ntiādi. Saṃvejanīyattāti saṃvegajananato mahābhūtesu
anya-e0103n:1060_5: mahāvikāratā viya gayhamānā maraṇaṃ anussariyamānaṃ uparūpari ubbegameva āvahatīti
anya-e0103n:1060_6: tattha na bhāvanācittaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti. Yadi sabhāvadhammattā appanaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0103n:1060_7: lokuttarajjhānaṃ ekaccāni arūpajjhānāni ca kathanti āha “lokuttarajjhānaṃ panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1060_10: pāpadhammānaṃ vigamoti evaṃbhūtassa visuddhibhāvanānukkamassa vasena lokuttarajjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1060_11: appanāppattameva hoti. Ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattaṃ tattha hotīti aññesaṃ sabhāvadhammārammaṇakammaṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1060_12: viya cittassa samādhāne byāpāro natthi. Yathāsamāhitena pana cittena ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattameva
anya-e0103n:1060_13: bhāvanāya kātabbaṃ, tasmā sabhāvadhammepi āruppajjhānaṃ appetīti.
anya-e0103n:1061_0: Satataṃ appamatto hoti saṃvegabahulattā, tato evassa sabbabhavesu anabhiratisaññāpaṭilābho.
anya-e0103n:1061_1: Jīvitanikantiṃ jahāti maraṇassa avassaṃbhāvitādassanato. Pāpagarahī hoti aniccasaññāpaṭilābhato,
anya-e0103n:1061_2: tato eva asannidhibahulatā, vigatamalamaccheratā ca. Tadanusārenāti aniccasaññāparicayānusārena.
anya-e0103n:1061_3: Abhāvitamaraṇāti abhāvitamaraṇānussaraṇā. Abhayo asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti pageva maraṇasaññāya sūpaṭṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n:1063_0: 178. Buddhā uppajjanti etthāti buddhuppādo, buddhānaṃ uppajjanakālo, tasmā. Aññatra
anya-e0103n:1063_1: taṃ ṭhapetvā, aññasmiṃ kāleti attho. Na pavattapubbanti apavattapubbaṃ. Tato eva
anya-e0103n:1063_2: sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ. Nanu ca sunettasatthārādayo, aññe ca tāpasaparibbājakā
anya-e0103n:1063_3: sarīraṃ “asubha”nti jāniṃsu. Tathā hi sumedhatāpasena sarīraṃ jigucchantena vuttaṃ –
anya-e0103n:1066_0: Ādi. Kāmaṃ bodhisattā, aññe ca tāpasādayo sarīraṃ “asubha”nti jānanti, kammaṭṭhānabhāvena
anya-e0103n:1066_1: pana na jānanti. Tena vuttaṃ “aññatra buddhuppādā”tiādi. Saṃvegāya saṃvattati yāthāvato
anya-e0103n:1066_3: yogehi khemabhāvāya. Satisampajaññāyāti sabbattha satiavippavāsāya ca sattaṭṭhāniyasampajaññāya
anya-e0103n:1066_5: tisso vijjā, cittassa adhimutti nibbānaṃ, cattāri sāmaññaphalānīti etesaṃ paccakkhakaraṇāya.
anya-e0103n:1066_6: Amatassa nibbānassa adhigamahetutāya, amatasadisātappakasukhasahitatāya ca kāyagatāsati
anya-e0103n:1066_7: “amata”nti vuttā. Paribhuñjantīti jhānasamāpajjanena vaḷañjanti. Parihīnanti jinaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1066_8: Viraddhanti anadhigamena virajjhitaṃ. Āraddhanti sādhitaṃ nipphāditaṃ. Anekehi ākārehi
anya-e0103n:1066_9: tesu tesu suttantesu pasaṃsitvā yaṃ taṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1066_10: Kattha pana niddiṭṭhanti? Kāyagatāsatisutte. Tattha hi “kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1066_11: ayaṃ desanā āgatā. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – bhikkhave, kena pakārena kāyagatāsatibhāvanā
anya-e0103n:1066_12: bhāvitā, kena ca pakārena punappunaṃ katā ānāpānajjhānādīnaṃ nipphattiyā mahapphalā,
anya-e0103n:1066_13: tesaṃ tesaṃ vijjābhāgiyānaṃ, abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānañca dhammānaṃ, aratiratisahanatādīnañca
anya-e0103n:1066_14: saṃsiddhiyā mahānisaṃsā ca hotīti? Ānāpānapabbanti ānāpānakammaṭṭhānāvadhi. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0103n:1067_0: Dhātumanasikārakammaṭṭhānena yadipi upacārasamādhi ijjhati, sammasanavāro pana tattha
anya-e0103n:1067_2: kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto”ti tattha tattha asubhāniccatādīhi saddhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1067_3: kāye ādīnavassa vibhāvanavasena desanāya āgatattā “navasivathika…pe… vuttānī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1067_4: Ettha uddhumātakādīsūti etesu sivathikapabbesu āgatauddhumātakādīsu. Ānāpānassativasenāti
anya-e0103n:1067_6: gayhati, taṃ idha pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhimiñjeneva saṅgaṇhitvā desanā āgatāti dassento “matthaluṅgaṃ
anya-e0103n:1067_7: aṭṭhimiñjena saṅgahetvā”ti āha. Idhāti imasmiṃ anussatiniddese. Kāyaṃ gatā, kāye
anya-e0103n:1067_8: vā gatā sati kāyagatāsatīti satisīsena idaṃ dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1068_1: Ṭhānagamanāvatthaṃ sarīraṃ sandhāya, tassa vā avayavesu sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ pādatalanti
anya-e0103n:1068_2: vuttaṃ “uddhaṃ pādatalā”ti. Tiriyaṃ tacaparicchinnanti ettha nanu kesalomanakhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1068_3: tacassa ca atacaparicchinnatā atthīti? Kiñcāpi atthi, tacaparicchinnabahulatāya pana
anya-e0103n:1068_4: kāyassa tacaparicchinnatā hotīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Taco pariyanto assāti tacapariyantoti
anya-e0103n:1068_5: etena pana vacanena kāyekadesabhūto taco gahito eva, tappaṭibaddhā ca kesādayo tadanupaviṭṭhamūlā
anya-e0103n:1068_6: tacapariyantāva hontīti dvattiṃsākārasamūho sabbopi kāyo tacapariyanto vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1069_0: Atthīti vacanavipallāsena vuttaṃ, nipātapadaṃ vā etaṃ. Tasmā tīsupi saṅkhāsu tadevassa
anya-e0103n:1069_1: rūpaṃ. Tenāha “saṃvijjantī”ti. Akkharacintakehi sarīre kāya-saddaṃ vaṇṇantehipi asucisamudāyabhāveneva
anya-e0103n:1069_2: icchitabboti dassento “asucisañcayato”ti vatvā puna naṃ niruttinayena dassetuṃ “kucchitāna”ntiādi
anya-e0103n:1069_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha āyabhūtatoti uppattiṭṭhānabhūtattā. “Pūraṃ nānappakārassā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1069_4: “Ke pana te pakārā? Yehi nānappakāraṃ asuci vutta”nti te kesādike dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1069_5: “kesā lomā”tiādi vuttanti imamatthaṃ dīpento āha “ete kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1069_6: Ākārā pakārāti hi eko atthoti. Evaṃ sambandhoti “atthi imasmiṃ kāye nakhā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1069_7: sabbakoṭṭhāsesu “atthi imasmiṃ kāye”ti padattayena sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1070: Paritoti tiriyaṃ, samantato vā pādatalakesamūlesu ca tacassa labbhanato. Sucibhāvanti sucino sabbhāvaṃ, sucimeva vā.
anya-e0103n:1071: 180. Yena vidhinā uggahe kusalo hoti, so sattavidho vidhi “uggahakosalla”nti vuccati, tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ. Manasikārakosallepi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:1072_0: Sajjhāyantā vāti sajjhāyaṃ karontā eva. Tesaṃ kira cattāro māse sajjhāyantānaṃ sajjhāyamaggeneva
anya-e0103n:1072_1: koṭṭhāse upadhārentānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā dvattiṃsākārā vibhūtatarā hutvā khāyiṃsu, paṭikkūlasaññā
anya-e0103n:1072_2: saṇṭhāsi, te tasmiṃ nimitte jhānaṃ appetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dassanamaggaṃ
anya-e0103n:1072_3: paṭivijjhiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “sajjhāyantā va sotāpannā ahesu”nti.
anya-e0103n:1073_1: matthaluṅgassa karīsāvasāne tantiāropanamāha. Ettha ca maṃsaṃ, nhāru, aṭṭhi, aṭṭhimiñjaṃ
anya-e0103n:1073_2: vakkaṃ, vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ, aṭṭhi, nhāru, maṃsaṃ, taco, dantā, nakhā, lomā, kesāti
anya-e0103n:1073_3: evaṃ vakkapañcakādīsu anulomasajjhāyaṃ vatvā paṭilomasajjhāyo purimehi sambandho
anya-e0103n:1073_4: vutto. Svāyaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ visuṃ tipañcāhaṃ, purimehi ekato tipañcāhanti chapañcāhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1073_5: sajjhāyo vutto, tattha ādiantadassanavasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Anulomapaṭilomasajjhāyepi
anya-e0103n:1073_6: hi paṭilomasajjhāyo antimo hoti, sajjhāyappakārantaraṃ vā etampīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1075_0: Manasā sajjhāyoti cittena cintanamāha, yaṃ mānasaṃ “jappana”nti vuccati, sammadeva
anya-e0103n:1075_1: ajjhāyoti vā sajjhāyo, cintananti attho. Cirataraṃ suṭṭhu pavattanena paguṇabhūtā
anya-e0103n:1075_2: kammaṭṭhānatanti samāvajjitvā manasi karontassa ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā katthaci
anya-e0103n:1075_3: asajjamānā nirantarameva upaṭṭhāti, tadanusārena tadatthopi vibhūtataro hutvā khāyatīti
anya-e0103n:1075_4: āha “vacasā sajjhāyo hi…pe… paṭivedhassa paccayo hotī”ti. Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhassāti
anya-e0103n:1076_0: Paṭikkūlasabhāvasallakkhaṇassa kassaci vaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena koṭṭhāsā vavatthānaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0103n:1076_1: kassaci saṇṭhānaggahaṇamukhena, kassaci disāvibhāgaggahaṇamukhena, kassaci patiṭṭhitokāsaggahaṇamukhena,
anya-e0103n:1076_2: kassaci sabbaso paricchijjaggahaṇamukhenāti vaṇṇādito sallakkhaṇaṃ uggahakosallāvahaṃ
anya-e0103n:1077_0: Attano bhāgo sabhāgo, sabhāgena paricchedo sabhāgaparicchedo, heṭṭhuparitiriyapariyantehi,
anya-e0103n:1077_1: sakoṭṭhāsikakesantarādīhi ca paricchedoti attho. Amissakatāvasenāti koṭṭhāsantarehi
anya-e0103n:1077_2: avomissakatāvasena. Asabhāgo hi idha “visabhāgo”ti adhippeto, na viruddhasabhāgo.
anya-e0103n:1077_3: Svāyamattho kesādisaddato eva labbhati. Saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti
anya-e0103n:1077_4: “kesā”ti vutte “akesā na hontī”ti ayamattho viññāyati. Ke pana te akesā? Lomādayo,
anya-e0103n:1077_5: na ca ghaṭādīsu pasaṅgopakaraṇeneva tesaṃ nivattitattā.
anya-e0103n:1078_0: Paṭikkūlavaseneva kathitaṃ dhātuvibhāgassa sāmaññatopi agahitattā. Tattheva visuṃ
anya-e0103n:1078_1: dhātukammaṭṭhānassa kathitattā ca dhātuvibhaṅgo pakkusātisuttaṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇe
anya-e0103n:1078_2: dhātuvibhaṅgapāḷi ca. Yassa vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti kesādi, taṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya jhānāni
anya-e0103n:1078_3: kesādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇārammaṇāni vibhattāni. Ñatvā ācikkhitabbanti yadatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1078_4: taṃ dassetuṃ “tattha dhātuvasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ paṭikkūlamanasikārapabbe.
anya-e0103n:1078_5: Kāyagatāsatisutte hi paṭikkūlamanasikārapabbaṃ gahetvā idha kāyagatāsatibhāvanā niddisīyati.
anya-e0103n:1079_0: 181. Na ekantarikāyāti ekantarikāyapi na manasi kātabbaṃ, pageva dvantarikādināti
anya-e0103n:1079_1: adhippāyo. Na bhāvanaṃ sampādeti, lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ na pāpuṇāti ekantarikāya manasi
anya-e0103n:1080_0: Okkamanavissajjananti paṭipajjitabbavissajjetabbe magge. Pucchitvāva gantabbaṃ hoti
anya-e0103n:1080_2: ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā manasikāramattaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. Avibhūtaṃ pana
anya-e0103n:1080_3: hoti paṭikkūlākārassa suṭṭhu asallakkhaṇato. Tato eva na visesaṃ āvahati.
anya-e0103n:1081_0: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchatīti paṭipāṭiyā sabbakoṭṭhāse manasi karotoyeva
anya-e0103n:1081_1: vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Te sātisayaṃ pāṭikkūlato manasi karontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1081_2: pariyosānaṃ gaccheyya, imassa pana ativiya dandhaṃ manasi karoto vibhūtato upaṭṭhānameva
anya-e0103n:1081_3: natthi, kuto paṭikkūlatāya saṇṭhānaṃ. Tenāha “visesādhigamassa paccayo na hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1082_0: Bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇeti “asuci paṭikkūla”nti kesādīsu pavattetabbaṃ asubhānupassanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1082_1: hitvā subhādivasena gayhamānā kesādayopi idha “bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇamevā”ti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1082_2: Rūpādayo hi nīlādivasena puthusabhāvatāya puthuttārammaṇaṃ nāma, nānārammaṇanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1082_3: Asamādhānaṃ cetaso virūpo khepoti vikkhepo. So satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā sakkaccaṃ
anya-e0103n:1082_4: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontena paṭibāhitabbo. Parihāyatīti hāyati. Paridhaṃsatīti vinassati.
anya-e0103n:1083_0: Yā ayaṃ kesā lomātiādikā lokasaṅketānugatā. Paṇṇattīti aṭṭha dhamme upādāya paṇṇatti.
anya-e0103n:1083_1: Taṃ kesādipaṇṇattiṃ. Atikkamitvāti paṭikkūlabhāvanāya atikkamitvā ugghāṭetvā. Tassā
anya-e0103n:1083_2: ugghāṭitattā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāse paṭikkūlato upaṭṭhahante “paṭikkūla”nti cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1083_3: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1083_4: – manussā viya yogāvacaro. Udapānaṃ viya koṭṭhāsā. Tālapaṇṇādisaññāṇaṃ viya kesādipaññatti.
anya-e0103n:1083_5: Tena manussānaṃ udapāne nhānapivanādi viya yogāvacarassa pubbabhāge kesā lomāti paṇṇattivasena
anya-e0103n:1083_6: manasikāro. Abhiṇhasañcārena manussānaṃ saññāṇena vinā udapāne kiccakaraṇaṃ viya
anya-e0103n:1083_7: yogāvacarassa manasikārabalena paṇṇattiṃ atikkamitvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e0103n:1083_8: bhāvanānuyogo. Pubbabhāge…pe… pākaṭo hotīti “kesā lomā”tiādinā bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa
anya-e0103n:1083_9: kesādipaññattiyā saddhiṃyeva koṭṭhāsānaṃ paṭikkūlabhāvo pubbabhāge pākaṭo hoti. Athāti
anya-e0103n:1083_10: pacchā bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannakāle. Paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbanti koṭṭhāsānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1084_0: Anupubbena muñcanaṃ anupubbamuñcanaṃ, anupaṭṭhahantassa anupaṭṭhahantassa muñcananti
anya-e0103n:1084_1: attho. Kathaṃ pana anupaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti āha “ādikammikassā”tiādi. Pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva
anya-e0103n:1084_2: āhacca tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ tantianusārena ādito kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro pavattatīti
anya-e0103n:1084_3: katvā vuttaṃ. Tathā hissa manasā sajjhāyo viya manasikāro te te koṭṭhāse āmaṭṭhamatte
anya-e0103n:1084_4: katvā gacchati, na lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena. Yadā pana ne lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0103n:1084_5: suṭṭhu upadhārento manasi karoti, tadā keci upaṭṭhahanti, keci na upaṭṭhahanti. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1084_6: paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassento “athassā”tiādimāha. Tattha kammanti manasikārakammaṃ tāva
anya-e0103n:1084_7: kātabbaṃ. Kīva ciranti? Yāva dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu, tesampi dvinnaṃ eko suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati tāva.
anya-e0103n:1085_0: Ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahitvāti pubbe viya ekatthakatāya ukkuṭṭhiyā kamena
anya-e0103n:1085_1: sabbatālesu patitvā uṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhahitvā pariyantatālaṃ, āditālañca āgantvā tato
anya-e0103n:1085_2: tato tattha tattheva katāya ukkuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhahitvāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1087_0: Appanātoti appanākārato dvattiṃsākāre appanā honti. Kiṃ paccekaṃ koṭṭhāsesu hoti
anya-e0103n:1087_1: udāhu aññathāti vicāraṇāyaṃ āha “appanākoṭṭhāsato”ti, koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsatoti attho.
anya-e0103n:1089_0: Anuyuttenāti yuttappayuttena, bhāventenāti attho. Kālenakālanti kāle kāle. Samādhinimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1089_1: upalakkhitasamādhānākāro samādhi eva. Manasi kātabbanti citte kātabbaṃ, uppādetabbanti
anya-e0103n:1089_2: attho. Samādhikāraṇaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ samādhinimittaṃ, taṃ āvajjitabbanti attho. Paggahanimittaupekkhānimittesupi
anya-e0103n:1089_3: eseva nayo. Ṭhānaṃ atthīti vacanaseso. Taṃ bhāvanā cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya,
anya-e0103n:1089_4: etassa saṃvattanassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthīti attho. Taṃ vā manasikaraṇacittaṃ kosajjāya
anya-e0103n:1089_5: saṃvatteyya, etassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthīti attho. Mudunti subhāvitabhāvena mudubhūtaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1089_6: vasībhāvappattanti attho. Muduttā eva kammaññaṃ kammakkhamaṃ kammayoggaṃ. Pabhassaranti
anya-e0103n:1089_7: upakkilesavigamena parisuddhaṃ, pariyodātanti attho. Na ca pabhaṅgūti kammaniyabhāvūpagamanena
anya-e0103n:1089_8: na ca pabhijjanasabhāvaṃ suddhantaṃ viya suvaṇṇaṃ viniyogakkhamaṃ. Tenāha “sammā
anya-e0103n:1090_0: Ukkaṃ bandhatīti mūsaṃ sampādeti. Ālimpetīti ādīpeti jāleti. Tañcāti taṃ piḷandhanavikatisaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0103n:1090_1: atthaṃ payojanaṃ assa suvaṇṇakārassa anubhoti pahoti sādheti. Assa vā suvaṇṇassa
anya-e0103n:1091_1: sacchikaraṇīyassa. Yassa paccakkhaṃ atthi, so sakkhi. Sakkhino bhabbatā sakkhibhabbatā,
anya-e0103n:1091_2: sakkhibhavananti vuttaṃ hoti. Sakkhi ca so bhabbo cāti vā sakkhibhabbo. Ayañhi iddhividhādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1091_3: bhabbo, tattha ca sakkhīti sakkhibhabbo, tassa bhāvo sakkhibhabbatā, taṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n:1091_4: Sati sati āyataneti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pubbahetuādike kāraṇe sati.
anya-e0103n:1092_0: Sītibhāvanti nibbānaṃ, kilesadarathavūpasamaṃ vā. Niggaṇhātīti uddhaṭaṃ cittaṃ uddhaccapātato
anya-e0103n:1092_1: rakkhaṇavasena niggaṇhāti. Paggaṇhātīti līnaṃ cittaṃ kosajjapātato rakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0103n:1092_2: paggaṇhāti. Sampahaṃsetīti samappavattaṃ cittaṃ tathāpavattiyaṃ paññāya toseti, uttejeti
anya-e0103n:1092_3: vā. Yadā vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya na pakkhandati, tadā jātiādīni saṃvegavatthūni
anya-e0103n:1092_4: paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti. Ajjhupekkhatīti yadā pana cittaṃ alīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1092_5: anuddhataṃ sammadeva bhāvanāvīthiṃ otiṇṇaṃ hoti, tadā paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
anya-e0103n:1092_6: kañci byāpāraṃ akatvā samappavattesu yugesu sārathi viya ajjhupekkhati upekkhakova
anya-e0103n:1092_7: hoti. Paṇītādhimuttikoti paṇīte uttame maggaphale adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro.
anya-e0103n:1093_0: Suggahitaṃ katvāti yathāvuttaṃ uggahakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ suṭṭhu uggahitaṃ pariyāpuṇanādinā
anya-e0103n:1093_1: supariggahitaṃ katvā. Suṭṭhu vavatthapetvāti manasikārakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ sammadeva
anya-e0103n:1093_2: sallakkhaṇavasena upadhāretvā. Visesanti pubbenāparaṃ bhāvanāya visesaṃ. Punappunaṃ
anya-e0103n:1093_3: parivattetvāti kammaṭṭhānatantiṃ paguṇabhāvaṃ pāpento bhiyyo bhiyyo vācāya, manasā
anya-e0103n:1093_4: ca parivattetvā. Gaṇṭhiṭṭhānanti yathā rukkhassa dubbinibhedo araññassa vā gahanabhūto
anya-e0103n:1093_5: padeso “gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna”nti vuccati, evaṃ kammaṭṭhānatantiyā atthato dubbinibhedo gahanabhūto
anya-e0103n:1093_6: ca padeso “gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna”nti vuccati. Taṃ paripucchanādiladdhena ñāṇapharasunā chinditvā.
anya-e0103n:1094_0: Nimittanti kammaṭṭhānanimittaṃ, asubhākāro. Edisena payojanena luñcanampi anavajjanti
anya-e0103n:1094_1: dassetuṃ “luñcitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Chinnaṭṭhāneti muṇḍitaṭṭhāne. Vaṭṭatiyeva nissaraṇajjhāsayena
anya-e0103n:1094_2: olokanato. Ussadavasenāti aphalitānaṃ, phalitānaṃ vā bahulatāvasena. Disvāva nimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1094_3: gahetabbaṃ dassanayogyatāya tacapañcakassa, itaresu sutvā ca ñatvā ca nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1096_1: parabhāgaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā, kathaṃ? Dve kesā ekato natthīti.
anya-e0103n:1099: 185. Pattasadisattā nakhā eva nakhapattāni. Nakhā tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti visuṃ vavatthitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dve nakhā ekato natthī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1100: 186. Dantapāḷiyāti dantāvaliyā. Yānakaupatthambhinīti sakaṭassa dhuraṭṭhāne upatthambhakadaṇḍo. Dantānaṃ ādhārabhūtā aṭṭhi hanukaṭṭhi.
anya-e0103n:1101_2: Tūṇiro sarāvāso. Galakañcukaṃ kaṇṭhattāṇaṃ. Kīṭakulāvakaṃ kharamukhakuṭi.
anya-e0103n:1102_0: Anulomena paṭilomena cāti ettha aṃsapadesato paṭṭhāya bāhuno piṭṭhipadesena otaraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1102_1: anulomo, maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya bāhuno purimabhāgena ārohanaṃ paṭilomo. Teneva nayenāti
anya-e0103n:1102_2: dakkhiṇahatthe vuttena nayena anulomena paṭilomena cāti attho. Sukhumampīti yathāvuttaoḷārikacammato
anya-e0103n:1102_3: sukhumaṃ. Antomukhacammādikoṭṭhāsesu vā tacena paricchinnattā yaṃ durupalakkhaṇīyaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1102_4: taṃ “sukhuma”nti vuttaṃ. Tañhi vuttanayena ñāṇena tacaṃ vivaritvā passantassa pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0103n:1102_5: hoti. Idha chavipi tacagatikā evāti “taco upari ākāsena paricchinno”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n:1103_0: 188. Nisadapoto silāputtako. Uddhanakoṭīti mattikāpiṇḍena katauddhanassa koṭi. Tālaguḷapaṭalaṃ
anya-e0103n:1103_1: nāma pakkatālaphalalasikaṃ tālapaṭṭikādīsu limpitvā sukkhāpetvā uddharitvā gahitapaṭalaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1103_2: Sukhumanti yathāvuttamaṃsato sukhumaṃ. Paṇhikamaṃsādithūlānaṃ sakalasarīrassa kisānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1103_3: yebhuyyena maṃsena paṭicchāditattā vuttaṃ “tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinna”nti.
anya-e0103n:1104: 189. Jālākāro kañcuko jālakañcuko. Visuṃ vavatthitabhāveneva nhārū tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā.
anya-e0103n:1105_0: 190. Dantānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā “ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīnī”ti vuttaṃ. Ekaṃ jaṇṇukaṭṭhi,
anya-e0103n:1105_1: ekaṃ ūruṭṭhīti eka-ggahaṇaṃ “ekekasmiṃ pāde”ti adhikatattā. Evaṃ timattānīti evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1105_2: mattasaddehi ānisadaṭṭhiādīni idha avuttānipi dassetīti veditabbaṃ. Evañca katvā
anya-e0103n:1106_0: Kīḷāgoḷakāni suttena bandhitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭetvā kīḷanagoḷakāni. Dhanukadaṇḍo
anya-e0103n:1106_1: dārakānaṃ kīḷanakakhuddakadhanukaṃ. Tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānanti jaṇṇukaṭṭhimhi
anya-e0103n:1106_2: pavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhānanti adhippāyo. Tena ūruṭṭhinā patiṭṭhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ yaṃ kaṭiṭṭhino,
anya-e0103n:1107_0: Kumbhakārena nipphāditaṃ uddhanaṃ kumbhakārikauddhanaṃ. Sīsakapaṭṭaveṭhakaṃ veṭhetvā
anya-e0103n:1107_1: ṭhapitaṃ sīsamayaṃ paṭṭakaṃ. Yena suttaṃ kantanti, tasmiṃ takkamhi vijjhitvā ṭhapitagoḷakā
anya-e0103n:1109: 192. Vakkabhāgena paricchinnanti vakkapariyantena bhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ito paresupi evarūpesu eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:1110_0: 193. Yaṃ nissāyāti yaṃ lohitaṃ nissāya, nissayanissayopi “nissayo”tveva vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1110_1: Bhavati hi kāraṇakāraṇepi kāraṇavohāro yathā “corehi gāmo daḍḍho”ti. Atha vā yasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1110_2: rūpakalāpe hadayavatthu, tampi lohitagatikameva hutvā tiṭṭhatīti “yaṃ nissāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1113: 196. Udarajivhāmaṃsanti jivhāsaṇṭhānaṃ udarassa matthakapasse tiṭṭhanakamaṃsaṃ. “Nīla”nti vatvā nīlaṃ nāma bahudhātukanti āha “nigguṇḍipupphavaṇṇa”nti.
anya-e0103n:1114: 197. Papphāsamaṃsanti yathāṭhāne eva lambitvā thokaṃ parivattakamaṃsaṃ. Nirasanti nihīnarasaṃ. Nirojanti nippabhaṃ, ojārahitaṃ vā.
anya-e0103n:1115: 198. Obhaggāti avabhujitvā ṭhitā. Sakkharasudhāvaṇṇanti marumbehi katasudhāvaṇṇaṃ. “Setasakkharasudhāvaṇṇa”ntipi pāṭho, setasakkharavaṇṇaṃ, sudhāvaṇṇañcāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1116_0: 199. Antassa ābhujitvā ābhujitvā ṭhitappadesā antabhogaṭṭhānāni. Tesaṃ bandhanabhūtaṃ
anya-e0103n:1116_1: antaguṇaṃ nāmāti dassento āha “antaguṇanti antabhogaṭṭhānesu bandhana”nti. Kuddālapharasukammādīni
anya-e0103n:1116_2: karontānaṃ antabhoge agaḷante ekato ābandhitvā, kiṃ viya? Yantasuttakamiva yantaphalakānīti.
anya-e0103n:1116_3: Kimiva tattha ṭhitanti āha “pādapuñchana…pe… ṭhita”nti. Purimañcettha ābandhanassa,
anya-e0103n:1117: 200. Asitaṃ nāma bhuttaṃ odanādi. Pītaṃ nāma pivanavasena ajjhohaṭapānakādi. Khāyitaṃ nāma saṃkhāditaṃ piṭṭhamūlaphalakhajjādi. Sāyitaṃ nāma assāditaṃ ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi.
anya-e0103n:1118: Yatthāti yasmiṃ udare. Yanti ca udarameva paccāmasati. Yattha pānabhojanādīni patitvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. Suvānavamathu sārameyyavantaṃ. Vivekanti vibhāgaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1119: 201. Heṭṭhānābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antareti purimabhāgavasena nābhiyā heṭṭhāpadesassa pacchimabhāgavasena heṭṭhimapiṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ vemajjhe. Veḷunāḷikasadiso padesoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1121: 204. Pūtibhāvaṃ āpannaṃ kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ pūtikukkuṭaṇḍaṃ. Uddeko pittādīhi vinā kevalo uddhaṅgamavāto.
anya-e0103n:1123: 206. Vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānanti ettha yakanaṃ heṭṭhābhāgapūraṇeneva temeti, itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1124_0: 207. Utuvikāro uṇhavalāhakādihetuko. Visamacchinno bhisādikalāpo visamaṃ udakaṃ paggharati,
anya-e0103n:1124_1: evamevaṃ sarīraṃ kesakūpādivivarehi upari, heṭṭhā, tiriyañca sedaṃ visamaṃ paggharatīti
anya-e0103n:1125_1: vā. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ pana “visabhāgāhāra”ntveva vuttaṃ tadā pavattamānānaṃ dhātūnaṃ visabhāgattā.
anya-e0103n:1126_0: 209. “Nhānakāle”ti idaṃ udakassa upari sinehassa sambhavadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Paribbhamantasinehabinduvisaṭasaṇṭhānāti
anya-e0103n:1126_2: Dhātuvisabhāgo antosamuṭṭhāno. Te padesāti te hatthatalādipadesā.
anya-e0103n:1127: 210. Kiñcīti uṇhādirasānaṃ aññataraṃ āhāravatthu. Nesanti sattānaṃ. Hadayaṃ āgilāyatīti visabhāgāhārādiṃ paṭicca hadayappadeso vivattati.
anya-e0103n:1128: 211. Dadhino vissandanaaccharaso dadhimuttaṃ. Gaḷitvāti sanditvā. Tālumatthakavivarena otaritvāti matthakavivarato āgantvā tālumatthakena otaritvā.
anya-e0103n:1129_0: 212. Telaṃ viya sakaṭassa nābhiakkhasīsānaṃ aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā.
anya-e0103n:1129_1: Kaṭakaṭāyantīti “kaṭa kaṭā”ti saddaṃ karonti. Anuravadassanaṃ hetaṃ. Dukkhantīti
anya-e0103n:1130_0: 213. Samūlakūlamāsaṃ jhāpetvā chārikaṃ avassāvetvā gahitayūso māsakhāro. Ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1130_1: chaḍḍanaṭṭhānaṃ candanikā. Ravaṇaghaṭaṃ nāma pakatiyā sammukhameva hoti. Yassa pana
anya-e0103n:1130_2: āraggamattampi udakassa pavisanamukhaṃ natthi, taṃ dassetuṃ “amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe”ti
anya-e0103n:1131_0: 214. Evañhītiādi yathāvuttāya uggahakosallapaṭipattiyā nigamanaṃ. Idāni yathāvuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:1131_1: manasikārakosallapaṭipattimpi nigamanavasena gahetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
anya-e0103n:1131_3: pavattāya bhāvanāya avasāne. Apubbāpariyamivāti ekajjhamiva. Kesāti iti-saddo ādiattho,
anya-e0103n:1131_4: pakārattho vā, evamādinā iminā pakārena vāti attho. Te dhammāti vaṇṇādivasena vavatthāpitā
anya-e0103n:1132_0: Bahiddhāpīti sasantānato bahipi, parasantānakāyepīti attho. Manasikāraṃ upasaṃharatīti
anya-e0103n:1132_1: yathāvuttaṃ paṭikkūlamanasikāraṃ upaneti. Yathā idaṃ, tathā etanti. Evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu
anya-e0103n:1132_2: pākaṭībhūtesūti yathā attano kāye, evaṃ paresampi kāye sabbesu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu paṭikkūlavasena
anya-e0103n:1132_3: vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhitesūti attho. Ayamettha kasiṇesu vaḍḍhanasadiso yogino bhāvanāviseso dassito.
anya-e0103n:1133_0: Anupubbamuñcanādīti ādi-saddena suttantanayena vibhāvitaṃ vīriyasamatāyojanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1133_1: Punappunaṃ manasi karototi vuttanayena attano kāye kesādike “paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā”ti
anya-e0103n:1133_2: abhiṇhaso manasikāraṃ pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamathāni visadāni
anya-e0103n:1133_3: pavattanti, tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ balappattehi sattahi saddhammehi
anya-e0103n:1133_4: laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti. Tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya
anya-e0103n:1133_5: nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi. Upacārasamādhinā
anya-e0103n:1133_6: cittaṃ samādhiyati, so taṃyeva nimittaṃ āsevanto bhāvento bahulīkaronto appanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n:1133_7: Tena vuttaṃ “anukkamena appanā uppajjatī”ti. Sabbākāratoti vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhāpi. Sāti appanā.
anya-e0103n:1134_0: Yadi panetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ aviññāṇakāsubhakammaṭṭhānāni viya paṭhamajjhānavasena sijjhati,
anya-e0103n:1134_1: atha kasmā “kāyagatāsatī”ti vuttanti āha “evaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasenā”tiādi. Nānāvaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu
anya-e0103n:1134_2: dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu pavattamānāya satiyā kiccamettha sātisayanti āha “satibalena ijjhanato”ti.
anya-e0103n:1135_0: Pantasenāsanesu, adhikusalesu ca aratiṃ, kāmaguṇesu ca ratiṃ sahati abhibhavatīti
anya-e0103n:1135_1: aratiratisaho sarīrasabhāvacintanena anabhiratiyā pahīnattā. Tathā koṭṭhāsabhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:1135_2: attasinehassa parikkhīṇattā bhayabheravaṃ sahati, sītādīnañca adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
anya-e0103n:1135_3: Attasinehavasena hi purisassa bhayabheravaṃ hoti, dukkhassa ca anadhivāsanaṃ. Imaṃ
anya-e0103n:1135_4: pana koṭṭhāsabhāvanamanuyuttassa na kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānamattameva, uttaripi paṭivedho
anya-e0103n:1137_0: 215. Yaṃ taṃ evaṃ pasaṃsitvā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1137_1: yasmā “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādikāya pucchāpāḷiyā atthe vibhāvite thomanāpāḷiyāpi attho
anya-e0103n:1137_2: vibhāvitoyeva hoti bhedābhāvato, tasmā taṃ laṅghitvā “kathaṃ bhāvito cā”tiādinā ārabhati.
anya-e0103n:1137_3: Tattha hi ito pasaṃsābhāvo “ayampi kho”ti vacanañca viseso. Tesu pasaṃsābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1137_4: “evaṃ pasaṃsitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Pasaṃsā ca tattha abhirucijananena ussāhanatthā. Tañhi
anya-e0103n:1137_5: sutvā bhikkhū “bhagavā imaṃ samādhiṃ anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsati, santo kirāyaṃ samādhi
anya-e0103n:1137_6: paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro pāpadhamme ca ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī”ti sañjātābhirucayo
anya-e0103n:1137_7: ussāhajātā sakkaccaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ maññanti. “Ayampi kho”ti padassa
anya-e0103n:1137_8: ye ime mayā nibbānamahāsarassa otaraṇatitthabhūtā kasiṇajjhānaasubhajjhānādayo desitā,
anya-e0103n:1137_9: na kevalaṃ te eva, ayampi khoti bhagavā attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ desanānubhāvena
anya-e0103n:1137_10: tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ āsannaṃ, paccakkhañca karonto sampiṇḍanavasena evamāhāti sambandhamukhena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1138_0: Soḷasavatthukanti catūsu anupassanāsu catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbākāraparipūroti
anya-e0103n:1138_1: kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā padattho piṇḍattho upamā codanā parihāro payojananti evamādīhi
anya-e0103n:1138_2: sabbehi ākārehi paripuṇṇo. Niddesoti kammaṭṭhānassa nissesato vitthāro.
anya-e0103n:1139_0: 216. Kathanti idaṃ pucchanākāravibhāvanapadaṃ. Pucchā cettha kathetukamyatāvasena
anya-e0103n:1139_1: aññāsaṃ asambhavato. Sā ca upari desanaṃ āruḷhānaṃ sabbesaṃ pakāravisesānaṃ āmasanavasenāti
anya-e0103n:1139_2: imamatthaṃ dassento “kathanti…pe… kamyatāpucchā”ti āha. Kathaṃ bahulīkatoti etthāpi
anya-e0103n:1139_3: “ānāpānassatisamādhī”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tattha kathanti ānāpānassatisamādhibahulīkāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1139_5: imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati. Tathā santabhāvādayopi tassa yehi bhāvanābahulīkārehi
anya-e0103n:1139_6: siddhā, taggahaṇeneva gahitā hontīti dassetuṃ “kathaṃ bahulīkato…pe… vūpasametīti
anya-e0103n:1140_0: “Puna ca paraṃ, udāyi, akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ paṭipadā, yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā
anya-e0103n:1140_1: cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā vuccatīti tadubhayavasena
anya-e0103n:1140_2: atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā”ti āha. Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ
anya-e0103n:1140_3: ito gatoti bhāvito, uppādito paṭiladdhamattoti attho. Uppanno pana laddhāsevano,
anya-e0103n:1140_4: bhāvito paguṇabhāvaṃ āpādito, vaḍḍhitoti attho. Ānāpānapariggāhikāyāti dīgharassādivisesehi
anya-e0103n:1140_5: saddhiṃ assāsapassāse paricchijjagāhikāya, te ārabbha pavattāya, satiyaṃ paccayabhūtāyanti
anya-e0103n:1140_6: attho. Purimasmiñhi atthe samādhissa satiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo vutto sampayuttavacanato,
anya-e0103n:1140_7: dutiyasmiṃ pana upanissayabhāvopi. Upacārajjhānasahagatā hi sati appanāsamādhissa
anya-e0103n:1140_8: upanissayo hotīti. Bahulīkatoti bahulaṃ pavattito, tena āvajjanādivasībhāvappattimāha.
anya-e0103n:1140_9: Yo hi vasībhāvaṃ āpādito, so icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjitabbato punappunaṃ pavattīyati.
anya-e0103n:1140_10: Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ kato”ti. Yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo”ti, “vivicceva
anya-e0103n:1140_11: kāmehī”ti ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-saddo dutiyādīsupi vutto eva hoti, evamidhāpīti
anya-e0103n:1140_12: āha “ubhayattha evasaddena niyamo veditabbo”ti. Ubhayapadaniyamena laddhaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1141_0: Asubhakammaṭṭhānanti asubhārammaṇajhānamāha. Taṃ hi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato, yogino
anya-e0103n:1141_2: ārammaṇaṃ nivatteti. Paṭivedhavasenāti jhānapaṭivedhavasena. Jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena
anya-e0103n:1141_3: ijjhantaṃ attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva pavattati, yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhīyati
anya-e0103n:1141_5: jigucchitabbārammaṇattā. Pariyāyenāti kāraṇena, lesantarena vā. Ārammaṇasantatāyāti
anya-e0103n:1141_6: anukkamena vicetabbataṃ pattaṃ ārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ sandhāyāha. Sante hi
anya-e0103n:1141_7: sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno dhammo sayampi sannisinnova hoti. Tenāha “santo vūpasanto
anya-e0103n:1142_0: Nāssa santapaṇītabhāvāvahaṃ kiñci secananti asecanako. Asecanakattā anāsittako. Anāsittakattā
anya-e0103n:1142_1: eva abbokiṇṇo asammisso parikammādinā. Tato eva pāṭiyekko visuṃyeveko. Āveṇiko asādhāraṇo.
anya-e0103n:1142_2: Sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Parikammaṃ vā santabhāvanimittaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1142_3: parikammanti ca kasiṇakaraṇādīni nimittuppādapariyosānaṃ, tādisaṃ idha natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1142_4: Tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantamappaṇītaṃ siyā. Upacārena vā natthi ettha
anya-e0103n:1142_5: santatāti yojanā. Yathā upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇavigamena, aṅgapātubhāvena ca paresaṃ
anya-e0103n:1142_6: santatā hoti, na evamimassa. Ayaṃ pana ādisamannā…pe… paṇīto cāti yojanā. Kecīti
anya-e0103n:1142_7: uttaravihāravāsike sandhāyāha. Anāsittakoti upasecanena na āsittako. Tenāha “ojavanto”ti,
anya-e0103n:1142_8: ojavantasadisoti attho. Madhūroti iṭṭho, cetasikasukhapaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ tikacatukkajjhānavasena,
anya-e0103n:1142_9: upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi vasena veditabbaṃ. Jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhasarīratāvasena
anya-e0103n:1142_10: pana kāyikasukhapaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tañca kho jhānato vuṭṭhitakāle.
anya-e0103n:1142_11: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “appitappitakkhaṇe”ti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avikkhambhiteti
anya-e0103n:1142_12: jhānena sakasantānato anīhaṭe appahīne. Akosallasambhūteti akosallaṃ vuccati avijjā,
anya-e0103n:1142_13: tato sambhūte. Avijjāpubbaṅgamā hi sabbe pāpadhammā. Khaṇenevāti attano pavattikkhaṇeneva.
anya-e0103n:1142_14: Antaradhāpetīti ettha antaradhāpanaṃ vināsanaṃ, taṃ pana jhānakattukassa idhādhippetattā
anya-e0103n:1142_15: pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ hotīti āha “vikkhambhetī”ti. Vūpasametīti visesena upasameti.
anya-e0103n:1142_16: Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti āha “suṭṭhu upasametī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1143_0: Nanu ca aññopi samādhi attano pavattikkhaṇeneva paṭipakkhadhamme antaradhāpeti vūpasameti,
anya-e0103n:1143_1: atha kasmā ayameva samādhi evaṃ visesetvā vuttoti? Pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya nānāvitakkavūpasamasabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1143_3: ñāṇuttarassetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, ñāṇuttarassa ca kilesappahānaṃ itarehi sātisayaṃ, yathā
anya-e0103n:1143_4: saddhādhimuttehi diṭṭhippattassa. Tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ sandhāya “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti
anya-e0103n:1143_5: vūpasametī”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā nimittapātubhāve sati khaṇeneva aṅgapātubhāvasabbhāvato
anya-e0103n:1143_6: ayameva samādhi “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti vutto. Yathā taṃ mahato akālameghassa
anya-e0103n:1143_7: uṭṭhitassa dhārānipāte khaṇeneva pathaviyaṃ rajojallassa vūpasamo. Tenāha – “seyyathāpi,
anya-e0103n:1143_8: bhikkhave, mahāakālamegho uṭṭhito”tiādi. Sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyāva
anya-e0103n:1143_9: hotīti āha “nibbedhabhāgiyattā”ti. Buddhānaṃ pana ekaṃsena nibbedhabhāgiyāva hoti.
anya-e0103n:1143_10: Imameva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā sabbepi sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti.
anya-e0103n:1143_11: Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato
anya-e0103n:1144_0: Ayaṃ panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ vasena sammadeva yujjati. Heṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:1144_1: papañcavasena vuttamatthaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅgahetvā dassento “ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho”ti
anya-e0103n:1145_0: 217. Tamatthanti taṃ “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādinā pucchāvasena saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1145_1: “Idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī”tiādīsu idha-saddo lokaṃ upādāya vutto, “idheva tiṭṭhamānassā”tiādīsu
anya-e0103n:1145_2: okāsaṃ, “idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito”tiādīsu padapūraṇamattaṃ, “idha
anya-e0103n:1145_3: bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu pana sāsanaṃ, “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū”ti idhāpi
anya-e0103n:1145_4: sāsanamevāti dassento “bhikkhave, imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhū”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0103n:1145_6: sabbappakāraggahaṇaṃ soḷasa pakāre sandhāya. Te hi imasmiṃyeva sāsane. Bāhirakā hi
anya-e0103n:1145_7: jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti. Tenāha “aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano”ti,
anya-e0103n:1145_8: yathāvuttassa puggalassa nissayabhāvapaṭisedhanoti attho. Etena “idha bhikkhave”ti
anya-e0103n:1145_9: idaṃ antogadhevasaddanti dasseti. Santi hi ekapadānipi sāvadhāraṇāni yathā “vāyubhakkho”ti.
anya-e0103n:1145_10: Tenevāha “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo”tiādi. Paripuṇṇasamaṇakaraṇadhammo hi so, yo
anya-e0103n:1146_0: Araññādikasseva bhāvanānurūpasenāsanataṃ dassetuṃ “imassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Duddamo
anya-e0103n:1146_1: damathaṃ anupagato goṇo kūṭagoṇo. Yathā thanehi sabbaso khīraṃ na paggharati, evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1146_2: dohapaṭibandhinī kūṭadhenu. Rūpasaddādike paṭicca uppajjanako assādo rūpārammaṇādiraso.
anya-e0103n:1146_3: Pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇanti pabbajjato pubbe, anādimati vā saṃsāre paricitārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1147_0: Nibandheyyāti bandheyya. Satiyāti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇasampavattāya satiyā.
anya-e0103n:1147_1: Ārammaṇeti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe. Daḷhanti thiraṃ, yathā satokārissa upacārappanābhedo
anya-e0103n:1147_2: samādhi ijjhati, tathā thāmagataṃ katvāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1148_1: buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa ceva aññakammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa
anya-e0103n:1150_0: Bhikkhu dīpisadiso araññe ekiko viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato.
anya-e0103n:1151_0: 218. Evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇesūti abhidhammapariyāyena, suttantapariyāyena ca vuttalakkhaṇesu.
anya-e0103n:1151_1: Rukkhasamīpanti “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti,
anya-e0103n:1151_2: ettāvatā rukkhamūlanti vuccatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ rukkhassa samīpaṭṭhānaṃ. Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti
anya-e0103n:1151_3: pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1152_1: ca anukūlaṃ. Tathā hi gimhakāle ca araññaṃ anukūlaṃ, hemante rukkhamūlaṃ, vassakāle
anya-e0103n:1152_2: suññāgāraṃ, semhadhātukassa semhapakatikassa araññaṃ, pittadhātukassa rukkhamūlaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1152_3: vātadhātukassa suññāgāraṃ anukūlaṃ, mohacaritassa araññaṃ, dosacaritassa rukkhamūlaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1152_5: Sayanañhi kosajjapakkhikaṃ, ṭhānacaṅkamanāni uddhaccapakkhikāni, na evaṃ nisajjā.
anya-e0103n:1152_6: Tato evassa santatā. Nisajjāya daḷhabhāvaṃ pallaṅkābhujanena, assāsapassāsānaṃ pavattanasukhataṃ
anya-e0103n:1152_7: uparimakāyassa ujukaṭṭhapanena, ārammaṇapariggahūpāyaṃ parimukhaṃ satiyā ṭhapanena
anya-e0103n:1152_8: dassento. Ūrubaddhāsananti ūrūnamadhobandhanavasena nisajjā. Heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ
anya-e0103n:1152_9: ṭhapanaṃ nisajjā-vacaneneva bodhitanti “ujuṃ kāya”nti ettha kāya-saddo uparimakāyavisayoti
anya-e0103n:1152_10: āha “uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti. Taṃ pana ujukaṭṭhapanaṃ sarūpato, payojanato
anya-e0103n:1152_11: ca dassetuṃ “aṭṭhārasā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na paṇamantīti na onamanti. Na paripatatīti
anya-e0103n:1152_12: na vigacchati vīthiṃ na vilaṅghati, tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesuppattiyā vuddhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1152_13: phātiṃ upagacchati. Idha pari-saddo abhi-saddena samānatthoti āha “kammaṭṭhānābhimukha”nti,
anya-e0103n:1152_14: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhitvāti attho. Parīti
anya-e0103n:1152_15: pariggahaṭṭho “pariṇāyikā”tiādīsu viya. Niyyānaṭṭho paṭipakkhato niggamanaṭṭho. Tasmā
anya-e0103n:1152_16: pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā, paramaṃ
anya-e0103n:1153_0: 219. Satovāti satiyā samannāgato eva saranto eva assasati nāssa kāci sativirahitā
anya-e0103n:1153_1: assāsappavatti hotīti attho. Sato passasatīti etthāpi satova passasatīti eva-saddo
anya-e0103n:1153_2: ānetvā vattabbo. Satokārīti sato eva hutvā, satiyā eva vā kātabbassa kattā, karaṇasīlo
anya-e0103n:1153_3: vā. Yadi “satova assasati sato passasatī”ti etassa vibhaṅge vuttaṃ, atha kasmā “assasati
anya-e0103n:1153_4: passasati”cceva avatvā “satokārī”ti vuttaṃ? Ekarasaṃ desanaṃ kātukāmatāya. Paṭhamacatukke
anya-e0103n:1153_5: padadvayameva hi vattamānakālavasena āgataṃ, itarāni anāgatakālavasena. Tasmā ekarasaṃ
anya-e0103n:1154_0: Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghaassāsavasena vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso. Dīghanti vā
anya-e0103n:1154_1: bhagavatā vuttaassāsavasena. Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepanti vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato
anya-e0103n:1154_2: “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmacittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ pajānato. Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1154_3: upagantvā ṭhitā hoti. Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇenāti yathāvuttāya satiyā, yathāvuttena
anya-e0103n:1154_4: ca ñāṇena. Idaṃ vutta hoti – dīghaṃ assāsaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ avikkhittacittassa, asammohato
anya-e0103n:1154_5: vā pajānantassa tattha sati upaṭṭhitā eva hoti, taṃ sampajānantassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena,
anya-e0103n:1154_6: asammohavasena vā sampajaññaṃ, tadadhīnasatisampajaññena taṃsamaṅgī yogāvacaro satokārī
anya-e0103n:1154_7: nāma hotīti. Paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasenāti paṭinissaggānupassī hutvā assasanassa
anya-e0103n:1154_9: assāsā paṭinissaggānupassīassāsā, tesaṃ vasenāti attho. Vinayanayena anto uṭṭhitasasanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1154_10: assāso, bahi uṭṭhitasasanaṃ passāso. Suttantanayena pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato
anya-e0103n:1154_11: assāso, anto uṭṭhahitvāpi bahi sasanato passāso. Ayameva ca nayo –
anya-e0103n:1155_0: “Assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi
anya-e0103n:1155_1: cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti, “passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1155_2: satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti
anya-e0103n:1157_0: Paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto bahi nikkhamati, tasmā pavattikkamena assāso paṭhamaṃ vuttoti
anya-e0103n:1157_1: vadanti. Tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyatīti tāluṃ āhacca nirujjhati. Tena kira sampatijāto
anya-e0103n:1157_2: bāladārako khipitaṃ karoti. Evaṃ tāvātiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanaṃ. Keci
anya-e0103n:1157_3: “evaṃ tāvāti anena pavattikkamena assāso bahinikkhamanavātoti gahetabbanti adhippāyo”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:1158_0: Addhānavasenāti kāladdhānavasena. Ayaṃ hi addhāna-saddo kālassa, desassa ca vācako.
anya-e0103n:1158_1: Tattha desaddhānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā kāladdhānavasena assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ
anya-e0103n:1158_2: vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha okāsaddhānanti okāsabhūtaṃ addhānaṃ. Pharitvāti
anya-e0103n:1158_3: byāpetvā. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi anekakalāpabhāvena. Dīghaṃ addhānanti dīghaṃ padesaṃ. Tasmāti
anya-e0103n:1158_4: saṇikaṃ pavattiyā dīghasantānatāya “dīghā”ti vuccanti. Ettha ca hatthiādisarīre,
anya-e0103n:1158_5: sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ desaddhānavisiṭṭhena kāladdhānavaseneva dīgharassatā
anya-e0103n:1158_6: vuttāti veditabbā. “Saṇikaṃ pūretvā saṇikameva nikkhamanti”, “sīghaṃ pūretvā sīghameva
anya-e0103n:1158_7: nikkhamantī”ti ca vacanato. Manussesūti samānappamāṇesupi manussasarīresu. Dīghaṃ
anya-e0103n:1158_8: assasantīti dīghaṃ assāsappabandhaṃ pavattentīti attho. Passasantīti etthāpi eseva
anya-e0103n:1158_9: nayo. Sunakhasasādayo viya rassaṃ assasanti ca passasanti cāti yojanā. Idaṃ pana
anya-e0103n:1158_10: dīghaṃ, rassañca assasanaṃ, passasanañca tesaṃ sattānaṃ sarīrasabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1158_11: Tesanti sattānaṃ. Teti assāsapassāsā. Ittaramaddhānanti appakaṃ kālaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1159_0: Navahākārehīti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena
anya-e0103n:1159_1: ādito vuttā tayo ākārā, te ca kho ekacco assāsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkheti, ekacco passāsaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1159_2: ekacco tadubhayanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena. Keci pana “assasatipi passasatipīti
anya-e0103n:1159_3: ekajjhaṃ vacanaṃ bhāvanāya nirantaraṃ pavattidassanattha”nti vadanti. Chandavasena
anya-e0103n:1159_4: pubbe viya tayo, tathā pāmojjavasenāti imehi navahākārehi.
anya-e0103n:1160_0: Kāmaṃ cettha ekassa puggalassa tayo eva ākārā labbhanti, tantivasena pana sabbesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1160_1: pāḷiāruḷhattā, tesaṃ vasena parikammassa kātabbattā ca “tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu navahākārehī”ti
anya-e0103n:1160_2: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ yathāvuttehi ākārehi assāsapassāse pajānato, tattha
anya-e0103n:1160_3: manasikāraṃ pavattentassa. Ekenākārenāti dīghaṃ assāsādīsu catūsu ākāresu ekena ākārena,
anya-e0103n:1160_4: navasu tīsu vā ekena. Tathā hi vakkhati –
anya-e0103n:1161: “Dīgho rasso ca assāso, passāsopi ca tādiso;
anya-e0103n:1162: Cattāro vaṇṇā vattanti, nāsikagge va bhikkhuno”ti.
anya-e0103n:1163: Ayaṃ bhāvanā assāsapassāsakāyānupassanāti katvā vuttaṃ “kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1164_0: Idāni pāḷivaseneva te nava ākāre, bhāvanāvidhiñca dassetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1164_1: Tattha kathaṃ pajānātīti pajānanavidhiṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchati. Dīghaṃ assāsanti
anya-e0103n:1164_2: vuttalakkhaṇaṃ dīghaṃ assāsaṃ. Addhānasaṅkhāteti “addhāna”nti saṅkhaṃ gate dīghe
anya-e0103n:1164_3: kāle, dīghaṃ khaṇanti attho. Koṭṭhāsapariyāyo vā saṅkhāta-saddo “theyyasaṅkhāta”ntiādīsu
anya-e0103n:1164_4: viya, tasmā addhānasaṅkhāteti addhānakoṭṭhāse, desabhāgeti attho. Chando uppajjatīti
anya-e0103n:1164_5: bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo
anya-e0103n:1164_6: kusalacchando uppajjati. Chandavasenāti tathāpavattachandassa vasena savisesaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa
anya-e0103n:1164_7: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ phātiṃ gamentassa. Tato sukhumataranti yathāvuttachandappavattiyā
anya-e0103n:1164_8: purimato sukhumataraṃ. Bhāvanābalena hi paṭippassaddhadarathapariḷāhatāya kāyassa
anya-e0103n:1164_9: assāsapassāsā sukhumatarā hutvā pavattanti. Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti assāsapassāsānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1164_10: sukhumatarabhāvena ārammaṇassa santataratāya, kammaṭṭhānassa ca vīthipaṭipannatāya
anya-e0103n:1164_11: bhāvanācittasahagato pamodo khuddikādibhedā taruṇapīti uppajjati. Cittaṃ vivattatīti
anya-e0103n:1164_12: anukkamena assāsapassāsānaṃ ativiya sukhumatarabhāvappattiyā anupaṭṭhahane vicetabbākārappattehi
anya-e0103n:1164_13: cittaṃ vinivattatīti keci. Bhāvanābalena pana sukhumatarabhāvappattesu assāsapassāsesu
anya-e0103n:1164_14: tattha paṭibhāganimitte uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati. Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti
anya-e0103n:1164_15: tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1164_16: byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ hotīti. Sā panāyaṃ upekkhā tatramajjhattupekkhāti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1165_0: Imehi navahi ākārehīti imehi yathāvuttehi navahi pakārehi pavattā. Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā
anya-e0103n:1165_1: kāyoti dīghākārā assāsapassāsā cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi samūhaṭṭhena kāyo. Assāsapassāse nissāya
anya-e0103n:1165_2: uppannanimittampettha assāsapassāsasamaññameva vuttaṃ. Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1165_3: upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sati upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Anupassanā ñāṇanti samathavasena nimittassa
anya-e0103n:1165_4: anupassanā, vipassanāvasena assāsapassāse, tannissayañca kāyaṃ “rūpa”nti, cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1165_5: taṃsampayuttadhamme ca “arūpa”nti vavatthapetvā nāmarūpassa anupassanā ca ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1165_6: tattha yathābhūtāvabodho. Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti so kāyo ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upagantvā
anya-e0103n:1165_7: sati ettha tiṭṭhatīti upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Ettha ca “kāyo upaṭṭhāna”nti iminā itarakāyassāpi
anya-e0103n:1165_8: saṅgaho hoti yathāvuttasammasanacārassāpi idha icchitattā. No satīti so kāyo sati
anya-e0103n:1165_9: nāma na hoti. Sati upaṭṭhānañceva sati ca saraṇaṭṭhena, upatiṭṭhanaṭṭhena ca. Tāya
anya-e0103n:1165_10: satiyāti yathāvuttāya satiyā. Tena ñāṇenāti yathāvutteneva ñāṇena. Taṃ kāyanti taṃ
anya-e0103n:1165_12: ceva vipassanāñāṇena ca anu anu passati. Tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti
anya-e0103n:1165_13: tena anupassanena yathāvutte kāye ayaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1166_0: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yā ayaṃ yathāvutte assāsapassāsakāye, tassa nissayabhūte karajakāye
anya-e0103n:1166_1: ca kāyasseva anupassanā anudakabhūtāya marīciyā udakānupassanā viya na aniccādisabhāve
anya-e0103n:1166_3: Atha vā kāye “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā gahetabbassa kassaci
anya-e0103n:1166_4: abhāvato tādisaṃ ananupassitvā kāyamattasseva anupassanā kāyānupassanā, tāya kāyānupassanāya
anya-e0103n:1166_5: sampayuttā satiyeva upaṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, tassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti.
anya-e0103n:1167_0: Esa nayoti “navahi ākārehī”tiādinā vuttavidhiṃ rassa-pade atidisati. Etthāti etasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1167_1: yathādassite “kathaṃ dīghaṃ assasanto”tiādinā āgate pāḷinaye. Idhāti imasmiṃ rassapadavasena āgate pāḷinaye.
anya-e0103n:1168: Ayanti yogāvacaro. Addhānavasenāti dīghakālavasena. Ittaravasenāti parittakālavasena. Imehi ākārehīti imehi navahi ākārehi.
anya-e0103n:1169_0: Tādisoti dīgho, rasso ca. Cattāro vaṇṇāti cattāro ākārā, te ca dīghādayo eva. Nāsikagge
anya-e0103n:1169_1: va bhikkhunoti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “nāsikagge vā”ti, vā-saddo
anya-e0103n:1170_0: 220. Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedīti sabbassa kāyassa paṭi paṭi paccekaṃ sammadeva vedanasīlo
anya-e0103n:1170_1: jānanasīlo, tassa vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi, taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva
anya-e0103n:1170_2: vedamānoti attho. Tattha tattha sabba-ggahaṇena assāsādikāyassa anavasesapariyādāne
anya-e0103n:1170_3: siddhepi anekakalāpasamudāyabhāvato tassa sabbesampi bhāgānaṃ saṃvedanadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1170_5: dassento “sakalassā”tiādimāha. Tattha yathā samānepi assāsapassāsesu yogino paṭipattividhāne
anya-e0103n:1170_6: paccekaṃ sakkaccaṃyeva paṭipajjitabbanti dassetuṃ visuṃ desanā katā, evaṃ tamevatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1170_7: dīpetuṃ satipi atthassa samānatāya “sakalassā”tiādinā padadvayassa visuṃ visuṃ atthavaṇṇanā
anya-e0103n:1170_8: katāti veditabbaṃ. Pākaṭaṃ karontoti vibhūtaṃ karonto, sabbaso vibhāventoti attho.
anya-e0103n:1170_9: Pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ vibhāvanaṃ tattha asammuyhanaṃ ñāṇeneva nesaṃ pavattanena hotīti dassento
anya-e0103n:1170_10: “evaṃ viditaṃ karonto”tiādimāha. Tattha tasmāti yasmā ñāṇasampayuttacitteneva assāsapassāse
anya-e0103n:1170_11: pavatteti, na vippayuttacittena, tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi
anya-e0103n:1170_12: passasissāmīti sikkhatīti vuccati buddhādīhīti yojanā. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭeti anekakalāpatāya
anya-e0103n:1170_13: cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvena visaṭe. Ādi pākaṭo hoti satiyā, ñāṇassa ca vasena tathā pubbābhisaṅkhārassa
anya-e0103n:1170_14: pavattattā. Tādisena bhavitabbanti catutthapuggalasadisena bhavitabbaṃ, pageva satiṃ,
anya-e0103n:1170_15: ñāṇañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā tīsupi ṭhānesu ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ pavattetabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1171_0: Evanti vuttappakārena sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedanavaseneva. Ghaṭatīti ussahati. Vāyamatīti
anya-e0103n:1171_1: vāyāmaṃ karoti, manasikāraṃ pavattetīti attho. Tathābhūtassāti ānāpānassatiṃ bhāventassa.
anya-e0103n:1171_2: Saṃvaroti sati, vīriyampi vā. Tāya satiyāti yā ānāpāne ārabbha pavattā sati, tāya.
anya-e0103n:1171_3: Tena manasikārenāti yo so tattha satipubbaṅgamo bhāvanāmanasikāro, tena saddhinti
anya-e0103n:1171_4: adhippāyo. Āsevatīti “tisso sikkhāyo”ti vutte adhikusaladhamme āsevati. Tadāsevanañhettha
anya-e0103n:1172_0: Purimanayeti purimasmiṃ bhāvanānaye, paṭhamavatthudvayeti adhippāyo. Tatthāpi kāmaṃ
anya-e0103n:1172_2: tathāpi taṃ na dukkaraṃ yathāpavattānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇamattabhāvatoti tattha vattamānakālappayogo
anya-e0103n:1172_3: kato. Idaṃ pana dukkaraṃ purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ gamanasadisaṃ, tasmā sātisayenettha
anya-e0103n:1172_4: pubbābhisaṅkhārena bhavitabbanti dīpetuṃ anāgatakālappayogo katoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1173_0: Kāyasaṅkhāranti assāsapassāsaṃ. So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyappaṭibaddhavuttitāya
anya-e0103n:1173_1: tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati. Yo pana “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”ti
anya-e0103n:1173_2: evamāgato kāyasaṅkhāro cetanālakkhaṇo satipi dvārantaruppattiyaṃ yebhuyyavuttiyā,
anya-e0103n:1173_3: tabbahulavuttiyā ca kāyadvārena lakkhito, so idha nādhippeto. Passambhentotiādīsu
anya-e0103n:1173_4: pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ purimassa purimassa atthavacanaṃ, tasmā passambhanaṃ nāma
anya-e0103n:1173_5: vūpasamanaṃ, tañca tathāpayoge asati uppajjanārahassa oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa
anya-e0103n:1173_6: payogasampattiyā anuppādananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tatrāti “oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento”ti
anya-e0103n:1173_7: ettha. Apariggahitakāleti kammaṭṭhānassa anāraddhakāle, tato eva kāyacittānampi apariggahitakāle.
anya-e0103n:1173_8: “Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”ti hi iminā kāyapariggaho, “parimukhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1173_9: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti iminā cittapariggaho vutto. Tenevāha “kāyopi cittampi pariggahitā
anya-e0103n:1173_10: hontī”ti. Kāyoti karajakāyo. Sadarathāti sapariḷāhā, sā ca nesaṃ sadarathatā garubhāvena
anya-e0103n:1173_11: viya oḷārikatāya avinābhāvinīti āha “oḷārikā”ti. Balavatarāti sabalā thūlā. Santā
anya-e0103n:1173_12: hontīti cittaṃ tāvaṃ bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā
anya-e0103n:1173_13: pavattamānaṃ santaṃ hoti vūpasantaṃ, tato eva taṃsamuṭṭhānā rūpadhammā lahumudukammaññabhāvappattā,
anya-e0103n:1173_14: tadanuguṇatāya sesaṃ tisantatirūpanti evaṃ citte, kāye ca vūpasante pavattamāne tannissitā
anya-e0103n:1173_15: assāsapassāsā santasabhāvā anukkamena sukhumatarasukhumatamā hutvā pavattanti. Tena
anya-e0103n:1174_0: Ābhujanaṃ ābhogo, “passambhemī”ti paṭhamāvajjanā. Sammā anu anu āharaṇaṃ samannāhāro,
anya-e0103n:1174_1: tasmiṃyeva atthe aparāparaṃ pavattaāvajjanā. Tasseva atthassa manasi karaṇaṃ citte
anya-e0103n:1175_0: Sāraddheti sadarathe sapariḷāhe. Adhimattanti balavaṃ oḷārikaṃ. Liṅgavipallāsena
anya-e0103n:1175_1: vuttaṃ. Kāyasaṅkhāroti hi adhippeto. “Adhimattaṃ hutvā pavattatī”ti kiriyāvisesanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1175_2: vā etaṃ. Sukhumanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kāyamhīti ettha “citte cā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1176_0: 221. Paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kariyamānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa nānāvajjanaṃ parikammaṃ
anya-e0103n:1176_1: paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dūrasamussāritapaṭipakkhanti katvā taṃsamuṭṭhāno kāyasaṅkhāro
anya-e0103n:1176_2: paṭhamajjhāne ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷārikoti sadiso vutto. Esa nayo sesūpacāradvayepi.
anya-e0103n:1176_3: Atha vā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya paṭipajjato dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena kilamato
anya-e0103n:1176_5: cittappavattiyā dutiyajjhānādiupacāresu kāyasaṅkhārassa oḷārikatā veditabbā. Atisukhumoti
anya-e0103n:1176_6: aññattha labbhamāno kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne atikkantasukhumo. Sukhumabhāvopissa
anya-e0103n:1176_7: tattha natthi, kuto oḷārikatā appavattanato. Tenāha “appavattimeva pāpuṇātī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1177_0: Lābhissa sato anupubbasamāpattisamāpajjanavelaṃ, ekāsaneneva vā sabbesaṃ jhānānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1177_2: sukhumataraṃ icchanti. Tattha hi sopacārānaṃ jhānānaṃ uparūpari visesavantatā, santatā
anya-e0103n:1177_3: ca sambhaveyya, ekāvajjanūpacāraṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Evañhi heṭṭhā vuttavādena
anya-e0103n:1177_4: imassa vādassa avirodho siddho bhinnavisayattā. Sabbesaññevāti ubhayesampi. Yasmā
anya-e0103n:1177_5: te sabbepi vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhimicchantiyeva. “Apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro
anya-e0103n:1177_6: pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhatī”ti idaṃ sadisasantānatāya vuttaṃ. Na hi te eva oḷārikā
anya-e0103n:1177_7: assāsādayo sukhumā honti. Passambhanākāro pana nesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0103n:1178_0: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1178_1: Sakalarūpapariggahe sukhumo bhāvanāya uparūpari paṇītabhāvato. Tenevāha “rūpārūpapariggahe
anya-e0103n:1178_3: paṭṭhāya balavavipassanā. Tato oraṃ dubbalavipassanā. Pubbe vuttanayenāti “apariggahitakāle”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1178_4: samathanaye vuttena nayena “apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro mahābhūtapariggahe paṭippassambhatī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1179: Assāti imassa “passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti padassa. Codanāsodhanāhīti anuyogaparihārehi. Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena.
anya-e0103n:1180_0: Kathanti yaṃ idaṃ “passambhayaṃ…pe… sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena
anya-e0103n:1180_1: kāyasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ, yogino ca sikkhanaṃ hotīti kathetukamyatāya pucchitvā
anya-e0103n:1180_2: kāyasaṅkhāre sarūpato, oḷārikasukhumato, vūpasamato, anuyogaparihārato ca dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1180_3: “katame kāyasaṅkhārā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha kāyikāti rūpakāye bhavā. Kāyapaṭibaddhāti
anya-e0103n:1180_4: kāyasannissitā. Kāye sati honti, asati na honti, tato eva te akāyasamuṭṭhānāpi kāyena
anya-e0103n:1180_5: saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā. Passambhentoti oḷārikoḷārikaṃ passambhento. Sesapadadvayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1180_6: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Oḷārikañhi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ avūpasantasabhāvaṃ sannisīdāpento “passambhento”ti
anya-e0103n:1180_7: vuccati, anuppādanirodhaṃ pāpento “nirodhento”ti, suṭṭhu santasabhāvaṃ nayanto “vūpasamento”ti.
anya-e0103n:1181_0: Yathārūpehīti yādisehi. Kāyasaṅkhārehīti oḷārikehi kāyasaṅkhārehi. Ānamanāti abhimukhabhāvena
anya-e0103n:1181_1: kāyassa namanā. Vinamanāti visuṃ visuṃ passato namanā. Sannamanāti sabbato, suṭṭhu
anya-e0103n:1181_2: vā namanā. Paṇamanāti pacchato namanā. Iñjanādīni ānamanādīnaṃ vevacanāni, adhimattāni
anya-e0103n:1181_3: vā abhimukhaṃ calanādīni ānamanādayo, mandāni iñjanādayo. Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti
anya-e0103n:1181_4: tathārūpaṃ ānamanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1181_5: hi passambhite ānamanādayopi passambhitā eva honti.
anya-e0103n:1182_0: Santaṃ sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa aparipphandanahetūhi ānamanādayo
anya-e0103n:1182_1: na honti, tathārūpaṃ darathābhāvato santaṃ, anoḷārikatāya sukhumaṃ. Passambhayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1182_2: kāyasaṅkhāranti sāmaññato ekaṃ katvā vadati. Atha vā pubbe oḷārikoḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1182_3: paṭippassambhento anukkamena kāyassa aparipphandanahetubhūte sukhumasukhumatare uppādetvā
anya-e0103n:1182_4: tepi paṭippassambhetvā paramasukhumatāya koṭippattaṃ yaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambheti,
anya-e0103n:1182_5: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti.
anya-e0103n:1183_0: Itītiādi codakavacanaṃ. Tattha itīti pakāratthe nipāto. Kirāti arucisūcane, evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1183_1: ceti attho. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – vuttappakārena yadi atisukhumampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1183_2: passambhetīti. Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sati tayā vuttākāre labbhamāne. Vātūpaladdhiyāti
anya-e0103n:1183_3: vātassa upaladdhiyā. Ca-saddo samuccayattho, assāsādivātārammaṇassa cittassa pabhāvanā
anya-e0103n:1183_4: uppādanā pavattanā na hoti, te ca tena passambhetabbāti adhippāyo. Assāsapassāsānañca
anya-e0103n:1183_5: bhāvanāti oḷārike assāsapassāse bhāvanāya paṭippassambhetvā sukhumānaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvanā
anya-e0103n:1183_6: ca na hoti, ubhayesaṃ tesaṃ tena paṭippassambhetabbato. Ānāpānassatiyāti ānāpānārammaṇāya
anya-e0103n:1183_7: satiyā ca pavattanaṃ na hoti, ānāpānānaṃ abhāvato. Tato eva taṃsampayuttassa ānāpānassatisamādhissa
anya-e0103n:1183_8: ca pabhāvanā uppādanāpi na hoti. Na hi kadāci ārammaṇena vinā sārammaṇadhammā sambhavanti.
anya-e0103n:1183_9: Na ca naṃ tanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ. Taṃ vuttavidhānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā paññavanto
anya-e0103n:1183_10: na ceva samāpajjantipi tato na vuṭṭhahantipīti yojanā. Evaṃ codako sabbena sabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:1184_0: Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā. Tattha kirāti “yadī”ti etassa
anya-e0103n:1184_1: atthe nipāto. Iti kira sikkhati, mayā vuttākārena yadi sikkhatīti attho. Evaṃ santeti
anya-e0103n:1184_2: evaṃ passambhane sati. Pabhāvanā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti,
anya-e0103n:1184_3: sukhumā pana atthevāti anukkamena paramasukhumabhāvappattassa vasena nimittuppattiyā
anya-e0103n:1184_4: ānāpānassatiyā, ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā ijjhatevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1185_0: Yathā kathaṃ viyāti yathāvuttavidhānaṃ taṃ kathaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ, atthi kiñci tadatthasampaṭipādane
anya-e0103n:1185_1: opammanti adhippāyo. Idāni opammaṃ dassetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha seyyathāpīti
anya-e0103n:1185_2: opammatthe nipāto. Kaṃseti kaṃsabhājane. Nimittanti nimittassa, tesaṃ saddānaṃ pavattākārassāti
anya-e0103n:1185_3: attho. Sāmiatthe hi idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Suggahitattāti suṭṭhu gahitattā. Sumanasikatattāti
anya-e0103n:1185_4: suṭṭhu citte ṭhapitattā. Sūpadhāritattāti sammadeva upadhāritattā sallakkhitattā.
anya-e0103n:1185_5: Sukhumakā saddāti anurave āha, ye appakā. Appattho hi ayaṃ ka-saddo. Sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇatāpīti
anya-e0103n:1185_6: sukhumo saddova nimittaṃ sukhumasaddanimittaṃ, tadārammaṇatāyapi. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti?
anya-e0103n:1185_7: Kāmaṃ tadāsukhumāpi saddā niruddhā, saddanimittassa pana suggahitattā sukhumatarasaddanimittārammaṇabhāvenāpi
anya-e0103n:1185_8: cittaṃ pavattati. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi tassa tassa niruddhassa saddassa nimittaṃ avikkhittena
anya-e0103n:1185_9: cittena upadhārentassa anukkamena pariyosāne atisukhumasaddanimittampi ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1185_10: katvā cittaṃ pavattateva. Cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati tasmiṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte
anya-e0103n:1186_0: Evaṃ santetiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Tattha yassa suttapadassa
anya-e0103n:1186_1: saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi attho vutto, taṃ uddharitvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānāni vibhāgato
anya-e0103n:1186_2: dassetuṃ “passambhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayattā uttānameva.
anya-e0103n:1187_0: 222. Ādikammikassa kammaṭṭhānavasenāti samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vipassanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1187_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana itaracatukkesupi labbhateva. Etthāti paṭhamacatukke. Pañcasandhikanti
anya-e0103n:1188_0: Kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhananti kammaṭṭhānaganthassa uggaṇhanaṃ. Tadatthaparipucchā kammaṭṭhānassa
anya-e0103n:1188_1: paripucchanā. Atha vā ganthato, atthato ca kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanaṃ uggaho. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1188_2: saṃsayaparipucchanā paripucchā. Kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānanti nimittupaṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1188_3: bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa “evamidha nimittaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti upadhāraṇaṃ, tathā kammaṭṭhānappanā
anya-e0103n:1188_5: bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāya sampatti, tato parampi vā sallakkhaṇādivasena matthakappattīti
anya-e0103n:1189_0: Attanāpi na kilamati odhiso kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanato. Tato eva ācariyampi na viheseti
anya-e0103n:1189_1: dhammādhikaraṇampi bhāvanāya matthakaṃ pāpanato. Tasmāti taṃ nimittaṃ attano akilamanaācariyāvihesanahetu.
anya-e0103n:1189_2: Thokanti thokaṃ thokaṃ. Uggahetabbato uggaho, sabbopi kammaṭṭhānavidhi, na pubbe
anya-e0103n:1189_3: vuttauggahamattaṃ. Ācariyato uggaho ācariyuggaho, tato. Ekapadampīti ekakoṭṭhāsampi.
anya-e0103n:1190_0: 223. Anuvahanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anupavattanā.
anya-e0103n:1190_1: Phusanāti assāsapassāse gaṇentassa gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhantassa
anya-e0103n:1190_2: yathā appanā hoti, tathā cittaṃ ṭhapentassa ca nāsikaggādiṭṭhānassa nesaṃ phusanā.
anya-e0103n:1190_3: Yasmā pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi, phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0103n:1190_4: gaṇanādi kātabbanti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti
anya-e0103n:1190_5: āha. Ṭhapanāti samādhānaṃ. Taṃ hi sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa ādhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:1190_6: Tathā hi samādhi “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhitī”ti niddiṭṭho. Samādhippadhānā pana appanāti
anya-e0103n:1190_7: āha “ṭhapanāti appanā”ti. Aniccatādīnaṃ sallakkhaṇato sallakkhaṇā vipassanā. Pavattato,
anya-e0103n:1190_8: nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato vivaṭṭanā nāma maggo. Sakalasaṃkilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvato
anya-e0103n:1190_9: sabbaso suddhīti pārisuddhi phalaṃ. Tesanti vivaṭṭanāpārisuddhīnaṃ. Paṭipassanāti
anya-e0103n:1191_0: Khaṇḍanti ekaṃ tīṇi pañcāti evaṃ gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ. Okāseti gaṇanavidhiṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n:1191_1: Gaṇananissitova na kammaṭṭhānanissito. “Sikhāppattaṃ nu kho”ti idaṃ cirataraṃ gaṇanāya
anya-e0103n:1191_2: manasi karontassa vasena vuttaṃ. So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1191_3: maññeyya. “Assāsapassāsesu yo upaṭṭhāti, taṃ gahetvā”ti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa
anya-e0103n:1191_4: ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yassa pana ubhopi upaṭṭhahanti, tena
anya-e0103n:1191_5: ubhayampi gahetvā gaṇetabbaṃ. “Yo upaṭṭhātī”ti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭataro
anya-e0103n:1191_6: upaṭṭhāti, so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pavattamānaṃ pavattamānanti
anya-e0103n:1191_7: āmeḍitavacanena nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Evanti vuttappakārena
anya-e0103n:1191_8: upalakkhetvā vāti attho. Pākaṭā honti gaṇanāvasena bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1192_0: Palighassa parivattanaṃ, taṃ yattha nikkhipanti, so palighatthambho. Tiyāmarattinti
anya-e0103n:1192_1: accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Purimanayenāti sīghagaṇanāya, gopālakagaṇanāyāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1192_2: Eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañcāti gaṇanāvidhidassanaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhātiādīsupi ekato paṭṭhāyeva
anya-e0103n:1192_3: paccekaṃ aṭṭhādīni pāpetabbāni. Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbameva. Kasmāti tattha kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1192_4: nidassanañca dasseti “gaṇanapaṭibaddhe hī”tiādinā. Tattha arīyati tena nāvāti arittaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1192_5: pājanadaṇḍo. Arittena upatthambhanaṃ arittupatthambhanaṃ, tassa vasena.
anya-e0103n:1193_0: Nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyamevāti āha “nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1193_1: Anto pavisantaṃ vātaṃ manasi karonto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma. Bahi cittanīharaṇepi
anya-e0103n:1193_2: eseva nayo. Vātabbhāhatanti abbhantaragataṃ vātaṃ bahulaṃ manasi karontassa vātena
anya-e0103n:1193_3: taṃ ṭhānaṃ abbhāhataṃ viya, medena pūritaṃ viya ca hoti, tathā upaṭṭhāti. Nīharato
anya-e0103n:1193_4: phuṭṭhokāsaṃ muñcitvā, tathā pana nīharato vātassa gatisamannesanamukhena nānārammaṇesu
anya-e0103n:1195_1: anu anu pavattanaṃ anugacchanaṃ. Tenevāha “tañca kho na ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasenā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1195_2: Nābhi ādi tattha paṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. Paṭhamuppattivasena hi idha ādicintā, na uppattimattavasena.
anya-e0103n:1195_3: Tathā hi te nābhito paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva. Yattha yattha
anya-e0103n:1195_4: ca uppajjanti, tattha tattheva bhijjanti dhammānaṃ gamanābhāvato. Yathāpaccayaṃ pana
anya-e0103n:1195_5: desantaruppattiyaṃ gatisamaññā. Hadayaṃ majjhanti hadayasamīpaṃ tassa uparibhāgo
anya-e0103n:1195_6: majjhaṃ. Nāsikaggaṃ pariyosānanti nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ tassa pariyosānaṃ assāsapassāsasamaññāya
anya-e0103n:1195_7: tadavadhibhāvato. Tathā hete “cittasamuṭṭhānā”ti vuttā, na ca bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1195_8: sambhavo atthi. Tenāha “abbhantaraṃ pavisanavātassa nāsikaggaṃ ādī”ti. Pavisananikkhamanapariyāyo
anya-e0103n:1195_9: pana taṃsadisavasena vuttoti veditabbo. Vikkhepagatanti vikkhepaṃ upagataṃ, vikkhittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1195_10: asamāhitanti attho. Sāraddhāyāti sadarathabhāvāya. Iñjanāyāti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa calanāya.
anya-e0103n:1196: Vikkhepagatena cittenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe vā. Sāraddhāti sadarathā. Iñjitāti iñjanakā calanakā. Tathā phanditā.
anya-e0103n:1197_1: sambandho. “Anubandhanāya manasi karontena phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi
anya-e0103n:1197_2: kātabba”nti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, taṃ vivarituṃ “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viyā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1197_3: Tattha visuṃ manasikāro natthīti gaṇanāya, anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamaṃ kevalaṃ
anya-e0103n:1197_4: phusanāvasena, ṭhapanāvasena ca kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro natthi. Nanu phusanāya vinā
anya-e0103n:1197_5: ṭhapanāya viya, phusanāya vinā gaṇanāyapi manasikāro natthiyeva? Yadipi natthi, gaṇanā
anya-e0103n:1197_6: pana yathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetabbā, evaṃ anubandhanā
anya-e0103n:1197_7: ṭhapanāya, tāya vinā ṭhapanāya asambhavato. Tasmā satipi phusanāya nānantarikabhāve
anya-e0103n:1197_8: gaṇanānubandhanā eva mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetvā itarāsaṃ tadabhāvaṃ dassento
anya-e0103n:1197_9: āha “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1197_10: Yadi evaṃ tā kasmā uddese visuṃ gahitāti āha “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyevā”tiādi. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1197_11: “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento”ti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:1197_12: “gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karotī”ti. Tatthevāti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva.
anya-e0103n:1197_13: Teti assāsapassāse. Satiyā anubandhantoti gaṇanāvīthiṃ anugantvā satiyā nibandhanto,
anya-e0103n:1197_14: phuṭṭhokāseyeva te nirantaraṃ upadhārentoti attho. Appanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapentoti
anya-e0103n:1197_15: yathā appanā hoti, evaṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapento samādahanto. Anubandhanāya
anya-e0103n:1197_16: cātiādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1197_17: Svāyamatthoti yvāyaṃ “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento, tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā
anya-e0103n:1197_18: te satiyā anubandhanto”ti ca vutto, so ayamattho. Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchināti,
anya-e0103n:1197_19: sā mānassa samīpeti upamā yathā “goṇo viya gavayo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1198_0: 225. Paṅguḷoti pīṭhasappī. Dolā pekholo. Kīḷatanti kīḷantānaṃ. Mātāputtānanti attano
anya-e0103n:1198_1: bhariyāya, puttassa ca. Ubho koṭiyoti āgacchantassa purimakoṭiṃ, gacchantassa pacchimakoṭinti
anya-e0103n:1198_2: dvepi koṭiyo. Majjhanti dolāphalakasseva majjhaṃ. Upanibandhanathambho viyāti upanibandhanathambho,
anya-e0103n:1198_3: nāsikaggaṃ, mukhanimittaṃ vā, tassa mūle samīpe ṭhatvā. Kathaṃ ṭhatvā? Satiyā vasena.
anya-e0103n:1198_4: Satiñhi tattha sūpaṭṭhitaṃ karonto yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito nāma hoti, avayavadhammena
anya-e0103n:1198_5: samudāyassa apadisitabbato. Nimitteti nāsikaggādinimitte. Satiyā nisīdantoti sativasena
anya-e0103n:1198_6: nisīdanto. “Satiñhi tatthā”tiādinā ṭhāne viya vattabbaṃ. Tatthāti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāne.
anya-e0103n:1199: 226. Teti nagarassa antobahigatā manussā, tesaṃ saṅgahā ca hatthagatā.
anya-e0103n:1200_0: 227. Ādito paṭṭhāyāti upameyyatthadassanato paṭṭhāya. Gāthāyaṃ nimittanti upanibandhanānimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1200_1: Anārammaṇamekacittassāti ekassa cittassa na ārammaṇaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1200_2: Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
anya-e0103n:1200_3: avindantassa. Ca-saddo byatireke. Bhāvanāti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā. Nupalabbhatīti
anya-e0103n:1200_4: na upalabbhati na sijjhatīti ayaṃ codanāgāthāya attho, dutiyā pana parihāragāthā suviññeyyāva.
anya-e0103n:1201_0: Kathanti tāsaṃ atthaṃ vivarituṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Ime tayo dhammātiādīsu padayojanāya
anya-e0103n:1201_1: saddhiṃ ayamatthaniddeso – ime nimittādayo tayo dhammā ekacittassa kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1201_2: na honti, tathāpi na cime na ca ime tayo dhammā aviditā honti, kathaṃ na ca honti
anya-e0103n:1201_3: aviditā? Tesañhi aviditatte cittañca kathaṃ vikkhepaṃ na gacchati, padhānañca bhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:1201_4: nipphādakaṃ vīriyañca kathaṃ paññāyati, nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ sammadeva samādhānāvahaṃ
anya-e0103n:1201_5: bhāvanānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ payogañca yogī kathaṃ sādheti, uparūpari lokiyalokuttarañca
anya-e0103n:1202_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ kakacūpamāya sādhetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhūmibhāgassa visamatāya
anya-e0103n:1202_1: cañcale rukkhe chedanakiriyā na sukarā siyā, tathā ca sati kakacadantagati dubbiññeyyāti
anya-e0103n:1202_2: āha “same bhūmibhāge”ti. Kakacenāti khuddakena kharapattena. Tenāha “puriso”ti. Phuṭṭhakakacadantānanti
anya-e0103n:1202_4: purisassa satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi
anya-e0103n:1202_5: karotī”ti. Kakacassa ākaḍḍhanakāle purisābhimukhaṃ pavattā āgatā. Pellanakāle tato
anya-e0103n:1202_6: vigatā “gatā”ti vuttā. Na ca āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti sabbattha
anya-e0103n:1202_7: satiyā upaṭṭhitattā chinditabbaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā gacchantānaṃ, āgacchantānañca kakacadantānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1202_8: abhāvato. Padhānanti rukkhassa chedanavīriyaṃ. Payoganti tasseva chedanakiriyaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1202_9: Visesanti anekabhāvāpādanaṃ, tena ca sādhetabbaṃ payojanavisesaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1203_0: Yathā rukkhotiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Upanibandhati ārammaṇe cittaṃ etāyāti sati upanibandhanā
anya-e0103n:1203_1: nāma, tassā assāsapassāsānaṃ sallakkhaṇassa nimittanti upanibandhanānimittaṃ, nāsikaggaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1203_2: mukhanimittaṃ vā. Evamevāti yathāpi so puriso kakacena rukkhaṃ chindanto āgatagate
anya-e0103n:1203_3: kakacadante amanasikarontopi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva satiyā upaṭṭhapanena āgatagate
anya-e0103n:1203_4: kakacadante jānāti, suttapadañca avirajjhanto atthakiccaṃ sādheti, evameva. Nāsikagge
anya-e0103n:1203_5: mukhanimitteti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge itaro mukhaṃ dasanaṃ nimīyati chādīyati etenāti
anya-e0103n:1204_0: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena āraddhavīriyassa yogino kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1204_1: bhāvanākammakkhamaṃ bhāvanākammayoggaṃ hoti, idaṃ vīriyaṃ padhānanti phalena hetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1204_2: dasseti. Upakkilesā pahīyantīti cittassa upakkilesabhūtāni nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena
anya-e0103n:1204_3: pahīyanti. Vitakkā vūpasamantīti tato eva kāmavitakkādayo micchāvitakkā upasamaṃ
anya-e0103n:1204_4: gacchanti, nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkavūpasamāpadesena
anya-e0103n:1204_5: dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha. Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogo
anya-e0103n:1204_6: payogo. Saṃyojanā pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggapaṭipāṭiyā samucchedavasena
anya-e0103n:1204_7: pahīyanti. Anusayā byantī hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā anuppattidhammatāpādanena
anya-e0103n:1204_8: bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti. Ettha ca saṃyojanappahānaṃ nāma anusayanirodheneva
anya-e0103n:1204_9: hoti, pahīnesu ca saṃyojanesu anusayānaṃ lesopi na bhavissatīti ca dassanatthaṃ “saṃyojanā
anya-e0103n:1204_10: pahīyanti anusayā byantī hontī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena
anya-e0103n:1204_11: labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa samādhissa visesoti attho.
anya-e0103n:1205_0: Yassāti yena. Anupubbanti anukkamena. Paricitāti pariciṇṇā. Ayaṃ hettha saṅkhepattho
anya-e0103n:1205_1: – ānāpānassati yathā buddhena bhagavatā desitā, tatheva yena dīgharassapajānanādividhinā
anya-e0103n:1205_2: anupubbaṃ paricitā suṭṭhu bhāvitā, tato eva paripuṇṇā soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā
anya-e0103n:1205_3: sabbaso puṇṇā. So bhikkhu imaṃ attano khandhādilokaṃ paññobhāsena pabhāseti. Yathā
anya-e0103n:1205_4: kiṃ abbhā muttova candimā abbhupakkilesavimutto candimā tārakarājā viyāti.
anya-e0103n:1206_0: Idhāti kakacūpamāyaṃ. Assāti yogino. Idhāti vā imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Assāti upamābhūtassa
anya-e0103n:1206_1: kakacassa. Āgatagatavasena yathā tassa purisassa amanasikāro, evaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1207_1: vadanti, vicārādīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato. So hi
anya-e0103n:1207_2: pāḷiyaṃ “appanā byappanā”ti niddiṭṭho, taṃsampayogato vā yasmā jhānaṃ “appanā”ti
anya-e0103n:1207_3: aṭṭhakathāvohāro, jhānaṅgesu ca samādhi padhānaṃ, tasmā taṃ “appanā”ti dassento “avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā
anya-e0103n:1207_4: appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti āha. Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato
anya-e0103n:1207_5: pabhutīti ettha “anukkamato…pe… laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hotī”ti ettako gantho parihīno.
anya-e0103n:1208_0: Sāraddhakāyassa kassaci puggalassa. Onamati paṭṭikādīnaṃ palambanena. Vikūjatīti
anya-e0103n:1208_1: saddaṃ karoti. Gattānisadakapparādīnaṃ sandhiṭṭhānesu valiṃ gaṇhāti tattha tattha
anya-e0103n:1208_2: valitaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā sāraddhakāyo garuko hotīti kāyadarathavūpasamena saddhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1208_3: sijjhamāno oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodho byatirekamukhena tassa sādhanaṃ viya vutto.
anya-e0103n:1208_5: vūpasanteti cittajarūpānaṃ lahumudukammaññabhāvena yo sesatisantatirūpānampi lahuādibhāvo,
anya-e0103n:1208_6: so idha kāyassa lahubhāvoti adhippeto. Svāyaṃ yasmā cittassa lahuādibhāvena vinā
anya-e0103n:1208_7: natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ “kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1209: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayampi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1210: 229. Uparūpari vibhūtānīti bhāvanābalena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pākaṭāni honti. Desatoti pakatiyā phusanadesato, pubbe attanā phusanavasena upadhāritaṭṭhānato.
