anya-e0103n:1211_1: ekajjhaṃ katvā vibhāvetuṃ “antomātukucchiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā udake nimuggassa
anya-e0103n:1211_2: puggalassa niruddhokāsatāya assāsapassāsā na pavattanti, evaṃ antomātukucchiyaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1211_3: Yathā matānaṃ samuṭṭhāpakacittābhāvato, evaṃ asaññībhūtānaṃ mucchāparetānaṃ, asaññīsu
anya-e0103n:1211_4: vā jātānaṃ, tathā nirodhasamāpannānaṃ. Catutthajjhānasamāpannānaṃ pana dhammatāvaseneva
anya-e0103n:1211_5: nesaṃ anuppajjanaṃ, tathā rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ. Keci pana “anupubbato sukhumabhāvappattiyā
anya-e0103n:1211_6: catutthajjhānasamāpannassa, rūpabhave rūpānaṃ bhavaṅgassa ca sukhumabhāvato rūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1211_7: natthī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. Atthiyeva te assāsapassāsā pariyesatoti adhippāyo, yathāvuttasattaṭṭhānavinimuttassa
anya-e0103n:1211_8: assāsapassāsānaṃ anuppajjanaṭṭhānassa abhāvato. Pakatiphuṭṭhavasenāti pakatiyā phusanaṭṭhānavasena.
anya-e0103n:1211_9: Nimittaṃ ṭhapetabbanti satiyā tattha tattha sukhappavattanatthaṃ thiratarasañjānanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1211_10: pavattetabbaṃ. Thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā hi sati. Imamevāti imaṃ eva anupaṭṭhahantassa
anya-e0103n:1211_11: kāyasaṅkhārassa kaṇṭakuṭṭhāpananayena upaṭṭhāpanavidhimeva. Atthavasanti hetuṃ. Atthoti
anya-e0103n:1211_12: hi phalaṃ, so yassa vasena pavattati, so atthavasoti. Muṭṭhassatissāti vinaṭṭhassatissa.
anya-e0103n:1211_13: Asampajānassāti sampajaññarahitassa, bhāventassa anukkamena anupaṭṭhahante assāsapassāse
anya-e0103n:1211_14: vīmaṃsitvā “ime te”ti upadhāretuṃ, sammadeva pajānituñca samatthāhi satipaññāhi virahitassāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1212_0: 230. Ito aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ. Garukanti bhāriyaṃ. Sā cassa garukatā bhāvanāya sudukkarabhāvenāti
anya-e0103n:1212_2: ca satipaññā ca icchitabbā”ti vatvā sukhumassa nāma atthassa sādhanenāpi sukhumeneva
anya-e0103n:1212_3: bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idāni anupaṭṭhahantānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1212_4: pariyesanupāyaṃ dassento “tāhi ca panā”tiādimāha. Tattha gocaramukheti gocarābhimukhe.
anya-e0103n:1212_5: Anupadanti padānupadaṃ. Caritvāti gocaraṃ gahetvā. Tasmiṃyeva ṭhāneti upanibandhanānimittasaññitaṭṭhāne.
anya-e0103n:1212_6: Yojetvāti manasikārena yojetvā. Satirasmiyā bandhitvāti vā vuttamevatthamāha “tasmiṃyeva
anya-e0103n:1212_7: ṭhāne yojetvā”ti. Na hi upameyye bandhanayojanaṭṭhānāni visuṃ labbhanti.
anya-e0103n:1213: 231. Nimittanti uggahanimittaṃ, paṭibhāganimittaṃ vā. Ubhayampi hi idha ekajjhaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tūlapicuādiupamattayaṃ uggahe yujjati, sesaṃ ubhayattha. Ekacceti eke ācariyā.
anya-e0103n:1214_0: Tārakarūpaṃ viyāti tārakāya pabhārūpaṃ viya. Maṇiguḷikādiupamā paṭibhāge vaṭṭanti.
anya-e0103n:1214_1: Kathaṃ panetaṃ ekaṃyeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ anekākārato upaṭṭhātīti āha “tañca paneta”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:1214_2: Suttantanti ekaṃ suttaṃ. Paguṇappavattibhāvena avicchedaṃ, mahāvisayatañca sandhāyāha
anya-e0103n:1214_3: “mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viyā”ti. Atthabyañjanasampattiyā samantabhaddakaṃ suttaṃ
anya-e0103n:1214_4: sabbabhāgamanoharā sabbapāliphullā vanaghaṭā viyāti āha “ekā vanarāji viyā”ti. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:1214_5: bhagavā – “vanappagumbe yatha phussitagge”ti. Nānānusandhikaṃ nānāpeyyālaṃ vividhanayanipuṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1214_7: rukkho viyā”ti. Saññānānatāyāti nimittupaṭṭhānato pubbeva pavattasaññānaṃ nānāvidhabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1215_0: Ime tayo dhammāti assāso, passāso, nimittanti ime tayo dhammā. Natthīti kammaṭṭhānavasena
anya-e0103n:1215_1: manasikātabbabhāvena natthi na upalabbhanti. Na ca upacāranti upacārampi na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0103n:1215_2: pageva appananti adhippāyo. Yassa panāti vijjamānapakkho vuttanayānusārena veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1216: Idāni vuttasseva atthassa samatthanatthaṃ kakacūpamāyaṃ āgatā “nimitta”ntiādikā gāthā paccānītā.
anya-e0103n:1217_0: 232. Nimitteti yathāvutte paṭibhāganimitte. Evaṃ hotīti bhāvanamanuyuttassa eva hoti.
anya-e0103n:1217_1: Tasmā “punappunaṃ evaṃ manasi karohī”ti vattabbo. Vosānaṃ āpajjeyyāti “nimittaṃ nāma
anya-e0103n:1217_2: dukkaraṃ uppādetuṃ, tayidaṃ laddhaṃ, handāhaṃ dāni yadā vā tadā vā visesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti
anya-e0103n:1217_3: saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya. Visīdeyyāti “ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa nimittampi na
anya-e0103n:1217_4: uppannaṃ, abhabbo maññe visesassā”ti visādaṃ āpajjeyya.
anya-e0103n:1218_0: “Imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmīti paṭipannassa nimitta”nti vutte kathaṃ
anya-e0103n:1218_1: saṅkocāpatti, bhiyyoso mattāya ussāhameva kareyyāti “nimittamidaṃ…pe… vattabbo”ti
anya-e0103n:1218_2: majjhimabhāṇakā āhu. Evanti vuttappakārena paṭibhāganimitteyeva bhāvanācittassa ṭhapanena.
anya-e0103n:1218_3: Ito pabhutīti ito paṭibhāganimittuppattito paṭṭhāya. Pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ “anubandhanāya
anya-e0103n:1218_4: ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotī”ti, tattha anubandhanaṃ, phusanañca vissajjetvā
anya-e0103n:1218_5: ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanā hotīti ṭhapanāvaseneva bhāvetabbanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1219_0: Porāṇehi vuttovāyamatthoti “nimitte”ti gāthamāha. Tattha nimitteti paṭibhāganimitte.
anya-e0103n:1219_1: Ṭhapayaṃ cittanti bhāvanācittaṃ ṭhapento, ṭhapanāvasena manasi karontoti attho. Nānākāranti
anya-e0103n:1219_2: “cattāro vaṇṇā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ nānākāraṃ. Ākārasāmaññavasena hetaṃ ekavacanaṃ. Vibhāvayanti
anya-e0103n:1219_3: vibhāvento antaradhāpento. Nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikaroto antarahitā
anya-e0103n:1219_4: viya honti. Assāsapassāseti assāsapassāse yo nānākāro, taṃ vibhāvayaṃ, assāsapassāsasambhūte
anya-e0103n:1219_5: vā nimitte. Sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhatīti tāya eva ṭhapanāya attano cittaṃ upanibandhati,
anya-e0103n:1219_6: appetīti attho. Ye pana “vibhāvayanti vibhāvento viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto”ti atthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1219_7: vadanti, taṃ pubbabhāgavasena yujjeyya. Ayañhettha attho – dhitisampannattā dhīro
anya-e0103n:1219_8: yogī assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento nānākārato te pajānanto vidite pākaṭe karonto,
anya-e0103n:1219_9: nānākāraṃ vā oḷārikoḷārike passambhento vūpasamento tattha yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1219_10: tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
anya-e0103n:1220_0: Vaṇṇatoti picupiṇḍatārakarūpādīsu viya upaṭṭhitavaṇṇato. Lakkhaṇatoti kharabhāvādisabhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1220_1: aniccādilakkhaṇato vā. Rakkhitabbaṃ taṃ nimittanti sambandho. Nimittassa rakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1220_2: nāma tattha paṭiladdhassa upacārajhānassa rakkhaṇeneva hotīti āha “punappunaṃ manasikāravasena
anya-e0103n:1221_0: 233. Etthāti etissaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ. Pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmoti adhigantukāmo, samāpajjitukāmo
anya-e0103n:1221_1: ca, tattha sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena adhigantukāmo, sallakkhaṇāvasena samāpajjitukāmoti
anya-e0103n:1221_2: yojetabbaṃ. Nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1221_3: vitthārato dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā hītiādi kāyassa, cittassa
anya-e0103n:1221_4: ca assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayabhāvadassanaṃ. Kammāragaggariyāti kammārānaṃ ukkāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1221_5: aggidhamanabhastā. Dhamamānāyāti dhamayantiyā, vātaṃ gāhāpentiyāti attho. Tajjanti
anya-e0103n:1221_6: tadanurūpaṃ. Evamevāti ettha kammāragaggarī viya karajakāyo, vāyāmo viya cittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1221_7: Kiñcāpi assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānā, karajakāyaṃ pana vinā tesaṃ appavattanato
anya-e0103n:1222_0: Tassāti nāmarūpassa. Paccayaṃ pariyesatīti “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādinā avijjādikaṃ
anya-e0103n:1222_1: paccayaṃ vīmaṃsati pariggaṇhāti. Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”nti
anya-e0103n:1222_2: ādinayappavattaṃ soḷasavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ atikkamati pajahati. “Yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ
anya-e0103n:1222_4: udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge uppanne. Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi
anya-e0103n:1222_5: sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikantīti ime obhāsādayo dasa. Udayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1222_6: pahāyāti udayabbayānupassanāya gahitaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ vissajjetvā tesaṃ bhaṅgasseva
anya-e0103n:1222_7: anupassanato bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ñāṇaṃ patvā ādīnavānupassanāpubbaṅgamāya nibbidānupassanāya
anya-e0103n:1222_9: uppannagotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ uppannena maggañāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu virajjanto vimuccanto.
anya-e0103n:1222_10: Maggakkhaṇe hi ariyo virajjati vimuccatīti ca vuccati. Tenāha “yathākkamena cattāro
anya-e0103n:1222_12: pabhedena ekūnavīsatibhedassa. Arahato hi avasiṭṭhakilesābhāvena ekūnavīsatitā. Assāti
anya-e0103n:1223: 234. Visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi paṭhamacatukkavasena adhigatajhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena desitattā. Tesanti tiṇṇaṃ catukkānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1224_0: Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiyā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedanāsīlo, tassā vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva
anya-e0103n:1224_1: vedo etassa atthi, taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedayamāno. Tattha kāmaṃ saṃvedana-ggahaṇeneva
anya-e0103n:1224_2: pītiyā sakkaccaṃ viditabhāvo bodhito hoti, yehi pana pakārehi tassā saṃvedanaṃ icchitaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1224_3: taṃ dassetuṃ paṭi-saddaggahaṇaṃ “paṭi paṭi saṃvedīti paṭisaṃvedī”ti. Tenāha “dvīhākārehī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1225_0: Tattha kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti pucchāvacanaṃ. Sappītike dve jhāne
anya-e0103n:1225_1: samāpajjatīti pītisahagatāni dve paṭhamadutiyajhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati. Tassāti
anya-e0103n:1225_2: tena. “Paṭisaṃviditā”ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā kattuatthe etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Samāpattikkhaṇeti
anya-e0103n:1225_3: samāpannakkhaṇe. Jhānapaṭilābhenāti jhānena samaṅgibhāvena. Ārammaṇatoti ārammaṇamukhena,
anya-e0103n:1225_4: tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
anya-e0103n:1225_5: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite
anya-e0103n:1225_6: sopi paṭisaṃvidito gahito eva hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā, evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1225_7: pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato,
anya-e0103n:1226_0: Kathaṃ asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Vipassanākkhaṇeti
anya-e0103n:1226_2: pītiyā salakkhaṇassa, sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena. Yaṃ hi yassa visesato,
anya-e0103n:1226_3: sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ vidite so yāthāvato vidito eva hoti. Tenāha “asammohato
anya-e0103n:1227_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva vibhāvetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Tattha dīghaṃ assāsavasenātiādīsu
anya-e0103n:1227_1: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Tattha pana satokāritādassanavasena pāḷi āgatā,
anya-e0103n:1227_2: idha pītipaṭisaṃveditāvasena, pītipaṭisaṃveditā ca atthato vibhattā eva. Apica ayamettha
anya-e0103n:1227_3: saṅkhepattho – dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena pajānato
anya-e0103n:1227_4: sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti
anya-e0103n:1227_6: pajānato. Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi
anya-e0103n:1227_7: ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva hontīti. Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena
anya-e0103n:1227_8: jhānasampayuttā sati tassa ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma
anya-e0103n:1227_9: hoti. Tāya satiyāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā
anya-e0103n:1227_10: ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi
anya-e0103n:1228_0: Evaṃ paṭhamacatukkavasena dassitaṃ pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ ārammaṇato, asammohato ca vibhāgaso
anya-e0103n:1228_1: dassetuṃ “āvajjato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āvajjatoti jhānaṃ āvajjantassa. Sā pītīti
anya-e0103n:1228_2: sā jhānapariyāpannā pīti. Jānatoti samāpannakkhaṇe ārammaṇamukhena jānato. Tassa
anya-e0103n:1228_3: sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. Passatoti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n:1228_4: passantassa. Paccavekkhatoti jhānaṃ paccavekkhantassa. Cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatoti “ettakaṃ
anya-e0103n:1228_5: velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī”ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa. Evaṃ pañcannaṃ vasībhāvānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1228_6: vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.
anya-e0103n:1229_0: Idāni yehi dhammehi jhānaṃ, vipassanā ca sijjhanti; tesaṃ jhānapariyāpannānaṃ, vipassanāmaggapariyāpannānañca
anya-e0103n:1229_1: saddhādīnaṃ vasena pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhāya adhimuccato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1229_2: Tattha adhimuccatoti saddahantassa, samathavipassanāvasenāti adhippāyo. Vīriyaṃ paggaṇhatotiādīsupi
anya-e0103n:1229_3: eseva nayo. Abhiññeyyanti abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitabbaṃ. Abhijānatoti vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya
anya-e0103n:1229_4: maggapaññāya jānato. Pariññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ tīraṇapariññāya, maggapaññāya ca
anya-e0103n:1229_5: parijānato. Pahātabbanti samudayasaccaṃ pahānapariññāya, maggapaññāya ca pajahato.
anya-e0103n:1229_6: Bhāvayato sacchikaroto bhāvetabbaṃ maggasaccaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ. Keci
anya-e0103n:1229_7: panettha pītiyā eva vasena abhiññeyyādīni uddharanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ jhānādisamudāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1230_0: Ettha ca “dīghaṃ assāsavasenā”tiādinā paṭhamacatukkavasena ārammaṇato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1230_1: vuttaṃ, tathā “āvajjato”tiādīhi pañcahi padehi. “Abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānato”tiādīhi pana
anya-e0103n:1230_3: ārammaṇato, vipassanāvasena asammohato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā
anya-e0103n:1230_4: panettha vedanānupassanāyaṃ pītisīsena vedanā gahitā, na sarūpato evāti? Bhūmivibhāgādivasena
anya-e0103n:1230_5: vedanaṃ bhinditvā catudhā vedanānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ. Apica vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento
anya-e0103n:1230_6: bhagavā pītiyā oḷārikattā taṃsampayuttasukhaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pītisīsena dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1231_1: pītipaṭisaṃvedipade āgatanayeneva atthato veditabbāni. Sakkā hi “dvīhākārehi sukhapaṭisaṃveditā
anya-e0103n:1231_2: hoti, cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃveditā hoti ārammaṇato”tiādinā pītiṭṭhāne sukhādipadāni
anya-e0103n:1231_3: pakkhipitvā “sukhasahagatāni tīṇi jhānāni, cattāri vā jhānāni samāpajjatī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1231_4: atthaṃ viññātuṃ. Tenāha “tiṇṇaṃ jhānānaṃ vasenā”tiādi. Vedanādayoti ādi-saddena saññā
anya-e0103n:1231_6: vipassanāya bhūmidassanatthaṃ “sukhanti dve sukhānī”tiādi vuttaṃ samathe kāyikasukhābhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1231_7: Soti so passambhanapariyāyena vutto nirodho. “Imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1231_8: vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vutto, tasmā vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tattha kāyasaṅkhāravasena
anya-e0103n:1232_0: Evaṃ cittasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ atidesena dassetvā yadaññaṃ imasmiṃ catukke vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1232_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pītipadeti “pītipaṭisaṃvedī”tiādinā desitakoṭṭhāse.
anya-e0103n:1232_2: Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena taṃsampayuttā vedanā vuttā, na pītīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1232_3: Tattha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti “cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī
anya-e0103n:1232_5: nāmarūpa”nti vacanato cittena paṭibaddhāti cittapaṭibaddhā. Tato eva kāmaṃ cittena
anya-e0103n:1232_6: saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā, saññāvedanādayo, idha pana upalakkhaṇamattaṃ saññā
anya-e0103n:1233_0: 235. Cittapaṭisaṃvedīti ettha dvīhākārehi cittapaṭisaṃveditā hoti ārammaṇato, asammohato
anya-e0103n:1233_1: ca. Kathaṃ ārammaṇato? Cattāri jhānāni samāpajjati, tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhenātiādinā
anya-e0103n:1233_2: vuttanayānusārena sabbaṃ suviññeyyanti āha “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃveditā
anya-e0103n:1233_3: veditabbā”ti. Cittaṃ modentoti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sampayuttāya pītiyā modayamāno,
anya-e0103n:1233_4: taṃ vā pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā
anya-e0103n:1233_5: modayamāno. Pamodentotiādīni padāni tasseva vevacanāni pītipariyāyabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1234_0: Sampayuttāya pītiyā cittaṃ āmodetīti jhānacittasampayuttāya pītisambojjhaṅgabhūtāya
anya-e0103n:1234_1: odagyalakkhaṇāya jhānapītiyā tameva jhānacittaṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena ceva jhānapaccayavasena
anya-e0103n:1234_2: ca paribrūhento haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento āmodeti pamodeti ca. Ārammaṇaṃ katvāti
anya-e0103n:1234_3: uḷāraṃ jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva
anya-e0103n:1234_4: ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā yogāvacaro haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento “āmodeti pamodetī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1235_0: Samaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā īsakampi līnapakkhaṃ, uddhaccapakkhañca anupagamma anonataṃ
anya-e0103n:1235_1: anunnataṃ yathā indriyānaṃ samattapaṭipattiyā avisamaṃ, samādhissa vā ukkaṃsagamanena
anya-e0103n:1235_2: āneñjappattiyā sammadeva ṭhitaṃ hoti, evaṃ appanāvasena ṭhapento. Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhenāti
anya-e0103n:1235_3: aniccādikassa lakkhaṇassa paṭi paṭi vijjhanena khaṇe khaṇe avabodhena. Khaṇikacittekaggatāti
anya-e0103n:1235_4: khaṇamattaṭṭhitiko samādhi. Sopi hi ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ ekākārena pavattamāno paṭipakkhena
anya-e0103n:1235_5: anabhibhūto appito viya cittaṃ niccalaṃ ṭhapeti. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ uppannāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1236_0: Mocentoti vikkhambhanavimuttivasena vivecento visuṃ karonto, nīvaraṇāni pajahantoti
anya-e0103n:1236_1: attho. Vipassanākkhaṇeti bhaṅgānupassanākkhaṇe. Bhaṅgo hi nāma aniccatāya paramā
anya-e0103n:1236_2: koṭi, tasmā tāya bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro cittamukhena sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ aniccato
anya-e0103n:1236_3: passati, no niccato. Aniccassa dukkhattā, dukkhassa ca anattakattā tadeva dukkhato
anya-e0103n:1236_4: anupassati, no sukhato. Anattato anupassati, no attato. Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1236_5: anattā, na taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ. Yañca na abhinanditabbaṃ, na taṃ rañjitabbaṃ. Tasmā
anya-e0103n:1236_6: bhaṅgadassanānusārena “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti saṅkhāragate diṭṭhe tasmiṃ nibbindati,
anya-e0103n:1236_7: no nandati. Virajjati, no rajjati. So evaṃ nibbindanto virajjanto lokiyeneva tāva
anya-e0103n:1236_8: ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti, no samudeti, nāssa samudayaṃ karotīti attho. Atha vā so evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1236_9: viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ, tathā adiṭṭhaṃ attano ñāṇena nirodheti, no samudeti.
anya-e0103n:1236_10: Nirodhamevassa manasikaroti, no samudayanti attho. So evaṃ paṭipanno paṭinissajjati,
anya-e0103n:1236_11: no ādiyati. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi
anya-e0103n:1236_12: kilesānaṃ pariccajanato, saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato
anya-e0103n:1236_13: pariccāgapaṭinissaggo pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati. Tasmā tāya samannāgato
anya-e0103n:1236_14: yogāvacaro vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:1236_15: “so vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento …pe…
anya-e0103n:1236_16: paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati cā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1237_0: Tattha aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā. Tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
anya-e0103n:1237_1: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññātoti saṅkhatadhamme “niccā sassatā”ti
anya-e0103n:1237_2: pavattāya micchāsaññāya. Saññāsīsena cittadiṭṭhīnampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo
anya-e0103n:1237_3: sukhasaññādīsupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
anya-e0103n:1237_4: Nanditoti sappītikataṇhāto. Virāgānupassanāyāti tathā virajjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
anya-e0103n:1237_5: Tena vuttaṃ “rāgato mocento”ti. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya.
anya-e0103n:1237_6: Yathā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti, evaṃ vā anupassanā
anya-e0103n:1237_7: nirodhānupassanā. Muñcitukamyatā hi ayaṃ balappattā. Tenāha “samudayato mocento”ti.
anya-e0103n:1237_8: Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Ādānatoti niccādivasena
anya-e0103n:1237_9: gahaṇato, paṭisandhiggahaṇato vāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1238_0: 236. Aniccanti anupassī, aniccassa vā anupassanasīlo aniccānupassīti ettha kiṃ panetaṃ
anya-e0103n:1238_1: aniccaṃ, kathaṃ vā aniccaṃ, kā vā aniccānupassanā, kassa vā aniccānupassanāti catukkaṃ
anya-e0103n:1239_0: Tattha niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ sassataṃ yathā taṃ nibbānaṃ, na niccanti aniccaṃ, udayabbayavantaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1239_1: atthato saṅkhatā dhammāti āha “aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā”ti,
anya-e0103n:1239_2: uppādavayaññathattasabbhāvāti attho. Tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hetupaccayehi uppajjanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1239_3: ahutvā sambhavo attalābho uppādo. Uppannānaṃ tesaṃ khaṇanirodho vināso vayo. Jarāya
anya-e0103n:1239_4: aññathābhāvo aññathattaṃ. Yathā hi uppādāvatthāya bhinnāya bhaṅgāvatthāyaṃ vatthubhedo
anya-e0103n:1239_5: natthi, evaṃ ṭhitisaṅkhātāya bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthāyampi vatthubhedo natthi, yattha
anya-e0103n:1239_6: jarāvohāro. Tasmā ekassāpi dhammassa jarā yujjati, yā khaṇikajarāti vuccati. Ekaṃsena
anya-e0103n:1239_7: ca uppādabhaṅgāvatthāsu vatthuno abhedo icchitabbo, aññathā “añño uppajjati, añño
anya-e0103n:1239_8: bhijjatī”ti āpajjeyya. Tayimaṃ khaṇikajaraṃ sandhāyāha “aññathatta”nti. Yaṃ panettha
anya-e0103n:1240_0: Yassa lakkhaṇattayassa bhāvā khandhesu aniccasamaññā, tasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye aniccatāsamaññāti
anya-e0103n:1240_1: “aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathatta”nti vatvā visesato dhammānaṃ khaṇikanirodhe
anya-e0103n:1240_2: aniccatāvohāroti dassento “hutvā abhāvo vā”tiādimāha. Tattha uppādapubbakattā abhāvassa
anya-e0103n:1240_3: hutvāgahaṇaṃ. Tena pākabhāvapubbakattaṃ vināsabhāvassa dasseti. Tenevākārenāti nibbattanākāreneva.
anya-e0103n:1240_4: Khaṇabhaṅgenāti khaṇikanirodhena. Tassā aniccatāyāti khaṇikabhaṅgasaṅkhātāya aniccatāya.
anya-e0103n:1240_5: Tāya anupassanāyāti yathāvuttāya aniccānupassanāya. Samannāgatoti samaṅgibhūto yogāvacaro.
anya-e0103n:1241_0: Khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso, virajjanaṃ tesaṃyeva vilujjanaṃ virāgo, khayo eva virāgo
anya-e0103n:1241_1: khayavirāgo, khaṇikanirodho. Accantamettha etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārā virajjanti nirujjhantīti
anya-e0103n:1241_2: accantavirāgo, nibbānaṃ. Tenāha “khayavirāgo saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgo, accantavirāgo
anya-e0103n:1241_3: nibbāna”nti. Tadubhayavasena pavattāti khayavirāgānupassanāvasena vipassanāya, accantavirāgānupassanāvasena
anya-e0103n:1241_4: maggassa pavatti yojetabbā. Ārammaṇato vā vipassanāya khayavirāgānupassanāvasena
anya-e0103n:1241_5: pavatti, tanninnabhāvato accantavirāgānupassanāvasena, maggassa pana asammohato khayavirāgānupassanāvasena,
anya-e0103n:1241_6: ārammaṇato accantavirāgānupassanāvasena pavatti veditabbā. “Eseva nayo”ti iminā yasmā
anya-e0103n:1241_7: virāgānupassī-pade vuttanayānusārena “dve nirodhā khayanirodho ca accantanirodho
anya-e0103n:1241_8: cā”ti evamādiatthavaṇṇanaṃ atidisati, tasmā virāgaṭṭhāne nirodhapadaṃ pakkhipitvā
anya-e0103n:1241_9: “khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tassa atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1242_0: Paṭinissajjanaṃ pahātabbassa tadaṅgavasena vā samucchedavasena vā pariccajanaṃ pariccāgapaṭinissaggo.
anya-e0103n:1242_1: Tathā sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggabhūte visaṅkhāre attano nissajjanaṃ, tanninnatāya
anya-e0103n:1242_2: vā tadārammaṇatāya vā tattha pakkhandanaṃ pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo.
anya-e0103n:1243_0: Tadaṅgavasenāti ettha aniccānupassanā tāva tadaṅgappahānavasena niccasaññaṃ pariccajati,
anya-e0103n:1243_1: pariccajantī ca tathā appavattiyaṃ ye “nicca”nti gahaṇavasena kilesā, tammūlakā abhisaṅkhārā,
anya-e0103n:1243_2: tadubhayamūlakā ca vipākakkhandhā anāgate uppajjeyyuṃ, te sabbepi appavattikaraṇavasena
anya-e0103n:1243_3: pariccajati, tathā dukkhasaññādayo. Tenāha “vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi
anya-e0103n:1244_1: Niccādibhāvena tabbiparīte. Tanninnatāyāti tadadhimuttatāya. Pakkhandatīti anupavisati
anya-e0103n:1244_2: anupavisantaṃ viya hoti. Saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatīti maggena
anya-e0103n:1244_3: kilesesu pariccattesu avipākadhammatāpādanena abhisaṅkhārā, tammūlakā ca khandhā
anya-e0103n:1244_4: anuppattirahabhāvena pariccattā nāma hontīti sabbepi te maggo pariccajatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1244_5: Ubhayanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ, maggañāṇañca. Maggañāṇampi hi gotrabhuñāṇassa anu pacchā
anya-e0103n:1245: Soḷasavatthuvasena cāti soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasenāpi vuccamānasantabhāvādivasenāpīti samuccayattho ca-saddo. “Ānāpānassati bhāvitā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1246_1: veditabbāti sambandho. Ayanti ānāpānassatisamādhi. Uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu pavattiyeva
anya-e0103n:1247_0: Vijjā nāma maggo. Vimutti phalaṃ. Mūlabhāvo vipassanāya pādakabhāvo. Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:1247_1: paripūreti kāyānupassanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena tassā bhāvanāya pavattanato.
anya-e0103n:1247_2: Satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya vinā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāpāripūriyā
anya-e0103n:1247_3: abhāvato. Vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrenti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya tāsaṃ sikhāppattibhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1248_0: 238. Nirodhavasenāti nirujjhanavasena. Bhavacarimakāti bhavavasena carimakā nihīnabhavapavattino.
anya-e0103n:1248_1: Tathā jhānacarimakā veditabbā. Cuticarimakāti cutiyā carimakā cutikkhaṇapavattino
anya-e0103n:1248_2: sabbapariyosānakā. Tasmāti tīsu bhavesu nihīne kāmabhave pavattanato. Teti assāsapassāsā.
anya-e0103n:1248_3: Puratoti heṭṭhā. Yasmā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā
anya-e0103n:1248_4: vibhāvitā, tasmā “soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Cuticittassa puratoti
anya-e0103n:1248_5: vā cuticittaṃ avadhibhāvena gahetvā tato oraṃ soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvāti
anya-e0103n:1248_6: evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukatāva assāsapassāsānaṃ vuttā hoti.
anya-e0103n:1249_0: Ime kira imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno pākaṭā hontīti ānetvā sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1249_1: Tattha kāraṇamāha “ānāpānārammaṇassa suṭṭhu pariggahitattā”ti. Tamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1250: Tattha āyuantaraṃ nāma jīvitantaraṃ jīvanakkhaṇāvadhi. Dhammatāya evāti sabhāveneva, rucivasenevāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1251_0: Candālokaṃ oloketvāti juṇhapakkhe padosavelāyaṃ samantato āsiñcamānakhīradhāraṃ viya
anya-e0103n:1251_2: kālo, deso ca mama ajjhāsayasadiso, kīva ciraṃ nu kho ayaṃ dukkhabhāro vahitabbo”ti
anya-e0103n:1251_3: attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā parikkhīṇeti adhippāyo. Lekhaṃ katvāti caṅkame tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:1254: 239. Evanti yathāvuttena virāgādiguṇānussaraṇappakārena. Sabbadukkhūpasamasaṅkhātassāti dukkhadukkhādibhedaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ upasammati etthāti sabbadukkhūpasamoti saṅkhātabbassa.
anya-e0103n:1255_0: “Paññattidhammā”tiādīsu asabhāvopi ñāṇena dhārīyati avadhārīyatīti dhammoti vuccatīti
anya-e0103n:1255_1: tato nivattento “dhammāti sabhāvā”ti āha. Bhavanaṃ paramatthato vijjamānatā bhāvo,
anya-e0103n:1255_2: saha bhāvenāti sabhāvā, sacchikaṭṭhaparamatthato labbhamānarūpāti attho. Te hi attano
anya-e0103n:1255_3: sabhāvassa dhāraṇato dhammāti, yathāvuttenaṭṭhena sabhāvāti ca vuccanti. Saṅgammāti
anya-e0103n:1255_4: paccayasamodhānalakkhaṇena saṅgamena sannipatitvā. Samāgammāti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1255_5: Paccayehīti anurūpehi paccayehi. Katāti nibbattitā. Akatāti kehicipi paccayehi na
anya-e0103n:1255_6: katā. Asaṅkhatāti bahuvacanassa kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Aggamakkhāyatīti aggo akkhāyati,
anya-e0103n:1255_7: ma-kāro padasandhikaro. So asaṅkhatalakkhaṇo sabhāvadhammo virāgoti paccetabbo, virajjati
anya-e0103n:1255_8: ettha saṃkilesadhammoti. Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānena ariyamaggena pahīyamānā
anya-e0103n:1255_9: mānamadādayo taṃ patvā pahīyanti nāmāti āha “tamāgamma…pe… vinassantī”ti. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1255_10: “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā maññanāvasena pavatto māno eva mānamado. Purisabhāvaṃ nissāya
anya-e0103n:1255_11: uppajjanakamado purisamado. Ādi-saddena jātimadādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nimmadāti
anya-e0103n:1255_12: vigatamadabhāvā. Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “amadā”ti vuttaṃ. Madā nimmadīyanti ettha
anya-e0103n:1255_13: amadabhāvaṃ vināsaṃ gacchantīti madanimmadano. Eseva nayo sesapadesupi. Kāmapipāsāti
anya-e0103n:1255_14: kāmānaṃ pātukamyatā, kāmataṇhā. Kāmaguṇā eva āliyanti ettha sattāti kāmaguṇālayā.
anya-e0103n:1255_15: Tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭanti tīsu bhūmīsu kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ. Esa asaṅkhatadhammo. Aparāparabhāvāyāti
anya-e0103n:1255_16: aparāparaṃ yoniādito yoniādibhāvāya. Ābandhanaṃ gaṇṭhikaraṇaṃ. Saṃsibbanaṃ tunnakāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1255_17: Nikkhamanaṃ, nissaraṇañcassa taṇhāya visaṃyogo evāti āha “visaṃyutto”ti.
anya-e0103n:1256_0: Ye guṇe nimittaṃ katvā madanimmadanādināmāni nibbāne niruḷhāni, te madanimmadanatādike
anya-e0103n:1256_1: yathāvutte nibbattitanibbānaguṇe eva gahetvā āha “madanimmadanatādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ vasenā”ti,
anya-e0103n:1256_2: na pana madā nimmadīyanti etenāti evamādike. Te hi ariyamaggaguṇā. Bhagavatā upasamaguṇā
anya-e0103n:1256_3: vuttāti sambandho. Kattha pana vuttāti? Asaṅkhatasaṃyuttādīsu. Tattha saccanti avitathaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1256_4: Nibbānaṃ hi kenaci pariyāyena asantabhāvābhāvato ekaṃseneva santattā aviparītaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:1256_5: saccaṃ. Tenāha “ekaṃ hi saccaṃ, na dutiyamatthī”ti. Pāranti saṃsārassa paratīrabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1256_6: Tenevāha “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti, “appakā te manussesu, ye janā
anya-e0103n:1256_7: pāragāmino”ti ca. Sududdasanti paramagambhīratāya, atisukhumasantasabhāvatāya ca
anya-e0103n:1256_8: anupacitañāṇasambhārehi daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya suṭṭhu duddasaṃ. Natthi ettha jarā,
anya-e0103n:1256_9: etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa jarābhāvoti ajaraṃ. Tato eva jarādīhi apalokiyatāya
anya-e0103n:1256_10: thiraṭṭhena dhuvaṃ. Taṇhādipapañcābhāvato nippapañcaṃ. Natthi ettha matanti amataṃ.
anya-e0103n:1256_11: Asivabhāvakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ abhāvena sivaṃ. Catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā
anya-e0103n:1256_12: khemaṃ. Visaṅkhārabhāvena acchariyatāya, abhūtapubbatāya ca abbhutaṃ. Sabbāsaṃ ītīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1256_13: anatthānaṃ abhāvena anītikaṃ. Niddukkhatāya abyābajjhaṃ. Sabbasaṃkilesamalato accantasuddhiyā
anya-e0103n:1256_14: visesato suddhīti visuddhi. Catūhipi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyatāya dīpaṃ. Sakalavaṭṭadukkhato
anya-e0103n:1257_0: “Saccañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādikā pāḷi saṃkhittāti veditabbā. Ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n:1257_2: ca bodhitā idha avuttā guṇā saṅgayhanti, tattha natthi etassa uppādanto vā vayanto
anya-e0103n:1257_3: vāti ananto, asaṅkhatadhammo. Āsavānaṃ anārammaṇatāya anāsavo. Nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya
anya-e0103n:1257_4: nipuṇo. Saṅkhatadhammo viya jarāya ajajjaritatāya ajajjaro. Byādhiādīhi apalokiyatāya
anya-e0103n:1257_5: apalokitaṃ. Acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyatāya anidassano. Atittikaraṭṭhena paṇīto. Apacuratāya
anya-e0103n:1257_6: acchariyo. Ītīhi anabhibhavanīyasabhāvattā, anītikabhāvahetuto ca anītikadhammo.
anya-e0103n:1257_7: Vaṭṭadukkhamuttinimittatāya mutti. Saṃsāraṃ bhayato passantehi nilīyanīyato leṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1257_8: Tesaṃyeva parā gatīti parāyaṇo. Pakatiñāṇena aladdhapatiṭṭhatāya agādhaṭṭhena gambhīro.
anya-e0103n:1257_9: Katapuññehipi dukkhena kicchena anubujjhitabbato duranubodho. Sacchikiriyaṃ muñcitvā
anya-e0103n:1257_10: na takkañāṇena avacaritabboti atakkāvacaro. Buddhādīhi paṇḍiteheva veditabbato adhigantabbato
anya-e0103n:1258_1: Aṭṭhāne cāyaṃ eva-saddo vutto, ijjhati evāti yojanā. Sukhasiddhivasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:1258_3: Manasi kātabbā yathāvuttā upasamaguṇā. Sukhaṃ supatītiādīsu vattabbaṃ mettākathāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1263: 240. Mettaṃ brahmavihāraṃ. Bhāvetukāmenāti uppādetukāmena paccavekkhitabboti sambandho. Sukhanisinnenāti visamaṃ anisīditvā pallaṅkābhujanena sukhanisinnena.
anya-e0103n:1264_0: Kasmāti paccavekkhaṇāya kāraṇapucchā, aññaṃ adhigantukāmena aññattha ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā
anya-e0103n:1264_1: kimatthiyāti adhippāyo. Mettā nāma atthato adoso. Tathā hi adosaniddese “metti mettāyanā
anya-e0103n:1264_2: mettāyitatta”nti niddiṭṭhaṃ. Khantīti ca idha adhivāsanakkhanti adhippetā. Sā pana
anya-e0103n:1264_3: atthato adosappadhānā cattāro arūpakkhandhāti mettāya sijjhamānāya titikkhākhanti
anya-e0103n:1264_4: siddhā eva hotīti āha “khanti adhigantabbā”ti. Tena khantiyaṃ ānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā
anya-e0103n:1264_5: satthikāvāti dasseti. Abhibhūto pariyuṭṭhānena. Pariyādinnacitto kusaluppattiyā okāsālābhena.
anya-e0103n:1265_0: Khantī paramaṃ tapoti parāpakārasahanādikā titikkhalakkhaṇā khanti uttamaṃ tapo akattabbākaraṇakattabbakaraṇalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0103n:1265_1: sammāpaṭipattiyā mūlabhāvato. Khantibalaṃ balānīkanti paramaṃ maṅgalabhūtā khanti
anya-e0103n:1265_2: eva balaṃ etassāti khantibalaṃ. Vuttañhi “khantibalā samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti. Dosādipaṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthatāya
anya-e0103n:1265_3: anīkabhūtena teneva ca khantibalena balānīkaṃ. Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti attano
anya-e0103n:1265_4: paresañca anatthapaṭibāhano, atthāvaho ca khantito uttari apassayo natthi.
anya-e0103n:1266_0: Vivecanatthāyāti vikkhambhanatthāya. Khantiyā saṃyojanatthāya attānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1266_1: Bhāvanaṃ dūsentīti dosā, puggalāyeva dosā puggaladosā. Yesu bhāvanā na sampajjati,
anya-e0103n:1266_2: aññadatthu vipajjateva, te eva vuttā. Paṭhamanti vakkhamānena koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsantarupasaṃharaṇanayena vinā sabbapaṭhamaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1267_0: Piyāyitabbo piyo, tappaṭipakkho appiyo. So saṅkhepato duvidho atthassa akārako, anatthassa
anya-e0103n:1267_1: kārakoti. Tattha yo attano, piyassa ca anatthassa kārako, so veripuggalo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1267_2: Yo pana attano, piyassa ca atthassa akārako, appiyassa ca atthassa kārako, “atthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1267_3: me nācarī”tiādinā, “appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṃ acarī”tiādinā ca āghātavatthubhūto,
anya-e0103n:1267_4: so appiyo, ananukūlavuttiko aniṭṭhoti attho. Liṅgavisabhāgeti itthiliṅgādinā liṅgena
anya-e0103n:1267_5: visadise. Odhisoti bhāgaso. “Tissa dattā”tiādinā odhisakanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1268_0: Idāni yathāvuttesu chasu puggalesu abhāvetabbatāya kāraṇaṃ dassento “appiyaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1268_1: Tattha appiyaṃ hi piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatīti dosena bhāvanāya saparissayatamāha.
anya-e0103n:1268_2: Appiyatā hi piyabhāvassa ujupaṭipakkhā, na ca tassa piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapanena vinā bhāvanā
anya-e0103n:1268_3: sijjhati. Atippiyasahāyakaṃ majjhattaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatīti rāgena bhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:1268_5: Majjhattaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatāhi majjhasabhāvaṃ neva piyaṃ nāppiyanti attho. Garuṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:1268_6: piyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapento kilamati majjhatte sambhāvanīyapiyāyitabbatānaṃ abhāvā. Na
anya-e0103n:1268_7: hi ajjhupekkhitabbe bhāvanīyatā, manāpatā vā paccupaṭṭhāti, piyagarubhāvasampanne
anya-e0103n:1268_8: ca paṭhamaṃ mettā bhāvetabbā. Kodho uppajjati koṭṭhāsantarabhāvānupanayanato.
anya-e0103n:1269_0: Tamevāti visabhāgaliṅgameva. Liṅgasabhāgeti avisesetvā “piyapuggale”ti āha. Bhittiyuddhamakāsīti
anya-e0103n:1269_1: sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pihitadvāre gabbhe sayanapīṭhe nisīditvā mettaṃ bhāvento mettāmukhena
anya-e0103n:1269_2: uppannarāgena andhīkato bhariyāya santikaṃ gantukāmo dvāraṃ asallakkhetvā bhittiṃ
anya-e0103n:1269_3: bhinditvāpi nikkhamitukāmatāya bhittiṃ pahari. Tenāha “mettāyanāmukhena rāgo vañcetī”ti,
anya-e0103n:1269_4: “andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara”nti ca.
anya-e0103n:1270_0: Ādānanikkhepaparicchinne addhāpaccuppannabhūte dharamānatāya paccakkhato viya upalabbhamāne
anya-e0103n:1270_1: khandhappabandhe idha sattādiggahaṇaṃ, na tiyaddhagateti āha “kālakate panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1270_2: Kasmā pana kālakate mettābhāvanā na ijjhatīti? Mettābyāpārassa ayogyaṭṭhānabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1270_3: Na hi matapuggalo hitūpasaṃhārāraho. Yattha sati sambhave payogato hitūpasaṃhāro
anya-e0103n:1270_4: labbheyya, tattheva mānaso hitūpasaṃhāro yujjeyya. Dukkhāpanayanamodappavattīsupi
anya-e0103n:1270_5: eseva nayoti karuṇābhāvanādīnampi kālakate anijjhanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññattha
anya-e0103n:1270_6: paguṇamettājhāno ācariyassa kālakatabhāvaṃ ajānanto taṃ mettāya pharitukāmo “ācariyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1270_7: ārabbha mettaṃ ārabhatī”ti vutto. Tenāha “paguṇāva me mettājhānasamāpattī”ti. Nimittanti
anya-e0103n:1270_8: ārammaṇaṃ. Gavesāhīti “yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissamettaṃ ārabhasi, so jīvati na jīvatī”ti
anya-e0103n:1270_9: jānāhīti attho. Mettāyantoti mettaṃ karonto, mettaṃ bhāventoti attho.
anya-e0103n:1271_1: yaṃ attani upalabbhati, taṃ nidassento tassa vattamānatāya āha “ahaṃ sukhito homī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1271_2: Sarīrasukhaṃ nāma anekantikaṃ, īdisassa puggalassa anokāsaṃ cittadukkhanti tadabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1271_3: sandhāyāha “niddukkhoti vā”ti. Homīti sambandho. Tathā averotiādīsu, visesato ca
anya-e0103n:1271_4: dukkhābhāve sukhasaññā. Sā panāyaṃ niddukkhatā verīnaṃ puggalānaṃ verasaññitānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1271_5: pāpadhammānaṃ abhāvato, visesato byāpādavirahato īghasaññitāya ītiyā abhāvato, anavajjakāyikasukhasamaṅgitāya
anya-e0103n:1271_6: ca hotīti dassento āha “avero abyāpajjo anīgho sukhī”ti. Attānaṃ pariharāmīti evaṃbhūto
anya-e0103n:1271_7: hutvā mama attabhāvaṃ pavattemi, yāpemīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1272_0: Evaṃ sante yaṃ vibhaṅge vuttaṃ, taṃ virujjhatīti sambandho. Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sati,
anya-e0103n:1272_1: yadi attanipi mettā bhāvetabbāti attho. “Yaṃ vibhaṅge vutta”nti vatvā vibhaṅgadesanāya
anya-e0103n:1272_2: samānagatikaṃ suttapadaṃ āharanto “kathañca bhikkhū”tiādimāha. Tassattho parato āgamissati.
anya-e0103n:1273_0: Tanti vibhaṅgādīsu vacanaṃ. Appanāvasenāti appanāvahabhāvanāvasena. Idanti “ahaṃ
anya-e0103n:1273_1: sukhito homī”tiādivacanaṃ. Sakkhibhāvavasenāti ahaṃ viya sabbe sattā attano sukhakāmā,
anya-e0103n:1273_2: tasmā tesu mayā attani viya sukhūpasaṃhāro kātabboti evaṃ tattha attānaṃ sakkhibhāve
anya-e0103n:1273_3: ṭhapanavasena. Tenāha “sacepi hī”tiādi. Kasmā pana attani bhāvanā appanāvahā na hotīti?
anya-e0103n:1273_4: Attasinehavasena saparissayabhāvato. Koṭṭhāsantare pana bhāvitabhāvanassa tatthāpi
anya-e0103n:1274_0: Sabbā disāti anavasesā dasapi disā. Anuparigamma cetasāti cittena pariyesanavasena
anya-e0103n:1274_1: anugantvā. Nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvacīti sabbussāhena pariyesanto atisayena
anya-e0103n:1274_2: attato piyataraṃ aññaṃ sattaṃ katthaci disāya neva adhigaccheyya na passeyya. Evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1274_3: piyo puthu attā paresanti evaṃ kassaci attato piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena puthu
anya-e0103n:1274_4: visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo. Tasmā tena kāraṇena, attakāmo attano
anya-e0103n:1274_5: hitasukhaṃ icchanto, paraṃ sattaṃ antamaso kunthakipillikampi, na hiṃse na haneyya,
anya-e0103n:1275_0: Ayaṃ nayoti sabbehi sattehi, attano ca piyatarabhāvaṃ nidassetvā tesu karuṇāyanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1275_1: vadatā bhagavatā sukhesitāya “attānaṃ sakkhibhāve ṭhapetvā sattesu mettā bhāvetabbā”ti
anya-e0103n:1276_0: 242. Sukhapavattanatthanti sukhena akicchena mettāya pavattanatthaṃ. Yvāssāti yo
anya-e0103n:1276_1: puggalo assa yogino. Piyoti iṭṭho. Manāpoti manavaḍḍhanako. Garūti guṇavisesavasena
anya-e0103n:1276_2: garukātabbo. Bhāvanīyoti sambhāvetabbo. Ācariyamattoti sīlādinā ācariyappamāṇo. Piyavacanādīnīti
anya-e0103n:1276_3: ādi-saddena atthacariyādike saṅgaṇhāti. Sīlasutādīnīti ādi-saddena saddhādike, dhutadhammajāgariyānuyogādike ca saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1277_0: Kāmanti yuttappattakāritāsukhasiddhidīpanoyaṃ nipāto. Tenetaṃ dīpeti – tādisaṃ puggalaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_1: uddissa bhāvanaṃ ārabhanto yogī yuttappattakārī, sukhena cassa tattha bhāvanā ijjhati,
anya-e0103n:1277_2: tena pana yoginā tāvatā santoso na kātabboti. Tenāha “appanā sampajjatī”tiādi. Sīmāsambhedanti
anya-e0103n:1277_3: mariyādāpanayanaṃ, attā piyo majjhatto verīti vibhāgākaraṇanti attho. Tadanantaranti
anya-e0103n:1277_4: tato piyamanāpagarubhāvanīyato, tattha vā mettādhigamato anantaraṃ. Atippiyasahāyake
anya-e0103n:1277_5: mettā bhāvetabbāti sambandho, garuṭṭhānīye paṭiladdhaṃ mettāmanasikāraṃ atippiyasahāyake
anya-e0103n:1277_6: upasaṃharitabbanti attho. Sukhūpasaṃhārakatassa taṃ hoti pageva paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_7: vikkhambhitattā. Atippiyasahāyakato anantaraṃ majjhatte mettā bhāvetabbā majjhattaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_8: piyagaruṭṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ sukarabhāvato. “Atippiyasahāyakato”ti ca idaṃ purimāvatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_9: gahetvā vuttaṃ. Paguṇamanasikārādhigamato paṭṭhāya hissa sopi piyaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n:1277_10: Majjhattato verīpuggaleti majjhattapuggale mettāyantena tattha paguṇamanasikārādhigamena
anya-e0103n:1277_11: piyabhāvaṃ upasaṃharitvā tadanantaraṃ verīpuggalaṃ bhāvanāya majjhatte ṭhapetvā tato
anya-e0103n:1277_12: majjhattato piyabhāvūpasaṃhārena verīpuggale mettā bhāvetabbā. “Verīpuggale”ti ca
anya-e0103n:1277_13: idaṃ purimāvatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvāti
anya-e0103n:1277_14: piyagaruṭṭhānīyo, atippiyo, majjhatto, verīti catūsu puggalakoṭṭhāsesu paṭhamaṃ tāva
anya-e0103n:1277_15: piyagaruṭṭhānīye mettābhāvanaṃ adhigantvā vasībhāvappattiyā tathāpavattaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_16: koṭṭhāsantarūpasaṃhāratthaṃ muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ atippiyasahāye atippiyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_17: vikkhambhetvā piyabhāvamatte cittaṃ ṭhapentena bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā, tampi vasībhāvāpādanena
anya-e0103n:1277_18: muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ majjhatte udāsinabhāvaṃ vikkhambhetvā piyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_19: upaṭṭhapetvā bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā, puna tampi vasībhāvāpādanena muduṃ kammaniyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_20: katvā tadanantaraṃ verimhi verīsaññaṃ vikkhambhetvā majjhattabhāvūpaṭṭhapanamukhena
anya-e0103n:1277_21: piyabhāvaṃ uppādentena bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā. Tena vuttaṃ “tadanantare tadanantare
anya-e0103n:1278_0: Verīpuggalo vā natthi kammabalena vā etarahi payogasampattiyā vā sabbaso anatthakarassa
anya-e0103n:1278_2: uḷārajjhāsayattāti attho. Tādiso hi sabbasaho parāparādhaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññati. Tena
anya-e0103n:1278_3: vuttaṃ “anatthaṃ karontepi pare verīsaññāva nuppajjatī”ti. Tenāti tena yoginā. Atthi
anya-e0103n:1279_0: 243. Purimapuggalesūti piyādīsu jhānassa ārammaṇabhūtesu purimesu puggalesu. Mettaṃ
anya-e0103n:1279_1: samāpajjitvāti paṭighaṃ vikkhambhetvā uppāditaṃ mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā. Mettāyantena
anya-e0103n:1279_2: paṭighaṃ paṭivinodetabbanti ettha keci pana “upacārajjhānaṃ sampādetvā”ti atthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1279_3: vadanti, tesaṃ upacārajjhānato vuṭṭhānampi icchitabbaṃ siyā “vuṭṭhahitvā”ti vuttattā.
anya-e0103n:1279_4: Pubbe tasmiṃ puggale asatiyā amanasikārena paṭighaṃ anuppādentassa sādhāraṇato taṃ
anya-e0103n:1279_5: vikkhambhetvā jhānassa uppādanaṃ, samāpajjanañca vuttaṃ. Idāni pana taṃ anussarantassapi
anya-e0103n:1279_6: manasi karontassapi yathā paṭighaṃ na uppajjati, taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:1279_7: “taṃ puggalaṃ mettāyantena paṭighaṃ vinodetabba”nti. Mettāyanameva hi idha paṭighavinodanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1280: Anusāratoti anugamanato, paccavekkhaṇatoti attho. Ghaṭitabbanti vāyamitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1281: Tañca kho ghaṭanaṃ vāyamanaṃ. Iminā idāni vakkhamānena ākārena.
anya-e0103n:1282_0: Ubhato dvīsu ṭhānesu daṇḍo etassāti ubhatodaṇḍakaṃ, tena. Ocarakā lāmakācārā pāpapurisā.
anya-e0103n:1282_1: Tatrāpīti tesupi aṅgamaṅgāni okkantesupi. Tenāti manopadosena. Na sāsanakaro. Sabbapāpassa
anya-e0103n:1282_2: akaraṇaṃ hi sāsanaṃ. Tassevāti tatopi. Nissakke hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, samuccaye ca
anya-e0103n:1282_3: eva-saddo, paṭhamaṃ kuddhapurisatopīti attho. Tenāti kujjhanena. Pāpiyoti pāpataro.
anya-e0103n:1282_4: Sārambhādikassa kilesānubandhassa vatthubhāvato kodhassa sāvajjataṃ ñatvāpi kujjhanato
anya-e0103n:1282_5: sace kodhe anavajjasaññī kuddhassa puggalassa na paṭikujjheyyāti keci. Ubhinnanti
anya-e0103n:1282_6: dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ. Tenāha “attano ca parassa cā”ti. Atha vā ubhinnanti ubhayesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1283_0: Sapattakantāti paṭisattūhi icchitā. Sapattakaraṇāti tehi kātabbā. Kodhananti kujjhanasīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1283_1: Kodhanāyanti kodhano ayaṃ, ayanti ca nipātamattaṃ. Kodhaparetoti kodhena anugato,
anya-e0103n:1283_2: parābhibhūto vā. Dubbaṇṇova hotīti pakatiyā vaṇṇavāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattopi mukhavikārādivasena
anya-e0103n:1283_3: virūpo eva hoti etarahi, āyatiṃ cāti. Kodhābhibhavassa ekantikamidaṃ phalanti dīpetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1283_4: “dubbaṇṇo vā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ katvā puna “kodhābhibhūto”ti vuttaṃ. Na pacuratthoti
anya-e0103n:1283_5: na pahūtadhano. Na bhogavāti upabhogaparibhogavatthurahito. Na yasavāti na kittimā.
anya-e0103n:1284_0: Chavālātanti chavadahanālātaṃ, citakāyaṃ santajjanummukkantipi vadanti. Ubhatopadittanti
anya-e0103n:1284_1: ubhosu koṭīsu daḍḍhaṃ. Majjhe gūthagatanti vemajjhaṭṭhāne sunakhassa vā siṅgālassa
anya-e0103n:1284_2: vā uhadena gūthena makkhitaṃ. Kaṭṭhatthanti dārukiccaṃ. Neva pharati na sādheti.
anya-e0103n:1284_3: Tathūpamāhanti tathūpamaṃ tādisaṃ ahaṃ. Imanti “so ca hoti abhijjhālū”tiādinā heṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:1284_4: vuttaṃ sandhāya satthā vadati, tasmā kāmesu tibbasārāgatādinā sīlarahitanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1285: So dāni tvantiādi yathāvuttehi suttapadehi attano ovadanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1286_0: 244. Yo yo dhammoti kāyasamācārādīsu yo yo sucaritadhammo. Vūpasantoti saṃyato. Parisuddhoti
anya-e0103n:1286_1: kilesamalavigamena visuddho. Kilesadāhābhāvena vā upasanto, anavajjabhāvena parisuddho,
anya-e0103n:1286_2: kāyasamācārasseva upasamo cirakālaṃ saṃyatakāyakammatāya veditabbo. Evaṃ sesesupi.
anya-e0103n:1288_0: Soti upasantavacīsamācāro puggalo. Paṭisanthārakusaloti yathā parehi chiddaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1288_1: evaṃ paṭisantharaṇe kusalo. Sakhiloti adhivāsanakhantisaṅkhātena sakhilabhāvena samannāgato.
anya-e0103n:1288_2: Sukhasambhāsoti piyakatho. Sammodakoti sammodanīyakathāya sammodanasīlo. Uttānamukhoti
anya-e0103n:1288_3: vikuṇitamukho ahutvā pītisomanassavasena vikasitamukho. Pubbabhāsīti yena kenaci
anya-e0103n:1288_4: samāgato paṭisanthāravasena paṭhamaṃyeva ābhāsanasīlo. Madhurena sarena dhammaṃ osāreti
anya-e0103n:1288_5: sarabhaññavasena. Sarabhāṇaṃ pana karonto parimaṇḍalehi paripuṇṇehi padehi ca byañjanehi
anya-e0103n:1289_0: Sabbajanassa pākaṭo sakkaccakiriyāyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “yo hī”tiādi. Okappetvāti
anya-e0103n:1289_1: saddahitvā. Okappanalakkhaṇā hi saddhā. Ohitasototi avahitasoto, sussusantoti attho.
anya-e0103n:1289_2: Aṭṭhiṃkatvā atthaṃ katvā, atthiko vā hutvā.
anya-e0103n:1290_0: “Ekopi na vūpasanto hotī”ti pāṭho, evarūpo puggalo nirayato nirayaṃ upapajjanto bahukālaṃ
anya-e0103n:1290_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha sañjīvādayo aṭṭha mahānirayā. Avīcimahānirayassa dvāre dvāre cattāro
anya-e0103n:1290_3: cattāro katvā kukkuḷādayo soḷasa ussadanirayā. Kāruññaṃ upaṭṭhapetabbaṃ mahādukkhabhāgibhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1290_4: Yasmiṃ puggale avihesābhūtā dukkhāpanayanakāmatā upatiṭṭhati, tattha paṭigho anokāsovāti
anya-e0103n:1291: Imassa ca atthassāti “yo yo dhammo”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa.
anya-e0103n:1292_0: 245. Yaṃ verī dukkhāpetuṃ sakkoti, so tassa vasena “attano visaye”ti vutto bhikkhuno
anya-e0103n:1292_1: kāyo. Kinti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. Tassāti verino. Avisayeti dukkhaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
anya-e0103n:1292_2: agocare. Sacitteti attano citte. Mahānatthakaranti idhalokatthaparalokatthaparamatthānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1292_3: virādhanavasena mahato vipulassa, nānāvidhassa ca diṭṭhadhammikādibhedassa anatthassa
anya-e0103n:1292_4: kāraṇaṃ. Mūlanikantananti sīlassa mūlāni nāma hirottappakhantimettānuddayā, tesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1292_5: chindanaṃ. Kodho hi uppajjamānova pāṇātipātādivasena hirottappādīni ucchindati. Jaḷoti andhabālo.
anya-e0103n:1293_0: Anariyaṃ kammanti verinā katamahāparādhamāha. Yo sayanti yo tvaṃ sayampi. Dosetukāmoti
anya-e0103n:1293_1: kodhaṃ uppādetukāmo. Yadi kari yadi akāsi. Dosuppādenāti dosassa uppādanena. Dukkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1293_2: tassa ca nāmāti dukkhañca nāma tassa aparādhakassa. Nāmāti asambhāvane nipāto, tena
anya-e0103n:1293_3: tassa kāraṇaṃ anekantikanti dasseti. Tenāha “kāhasi vā na vā”ti, karissasi na vā
anya-e0103n:1293_4: karissasīti attho. Ahitaṃ magganti attano ahitāvahaṃ duggatimaggaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1294_0: Aṭṭhāneti doso tava appiyassa kārāpako, sattu pana tassa vasavattitāya dāsasadisoti
anya-e0103n:1294_1: aṭṭhānaṃ paccāpakiriyāya. Tasmā tameva dosaṃ chindassu ucchinda. Khaṇikattāti udayavayaparicchinno
anya-e0103n:1294_2: attano pavattikālasaṅkhāto khaṇo etesaṃ atthīti khaṇikā, tabbhāvato khaṇapabhaṅgubhāvatoti
anya-e0103n:1294_3: attho. Kassa dānīdha kujjhasīti aparādhakassa santāne yehi khandhehi te aparādho
anya-e0103n:1294_4: kato, te taṃkhaṇaṃyeva sabbaso niruddhā. Idāni pana aññe tiṭṭhantīti kassa tvaṃ idha
anya-e0103n:1294_5: kujjhasi. Na hi yuttaṃ anaparādhesu kujjhananti adhippāyo. Taṃ vinā kassa so kareti
anya-e0103n:1294_6: yo puggalo yassa dukkhaṃ karoti, taṃ dukkhakiriyāya visayabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ vinā kassa
anya-e0103n:1294_7: nāma so dukkhakārako dukkhaṃ kare kareyya. Sayampi dukkhahetu tvamitīti evaṃ sayampi
anya-e0103n:1294_8: tvaṃ etassa dukkhassa hetu, evaṃ samāne tassa tuyhañca tassa dukkhassa hetubhāve
anya-e0103n:1294_9: kiṃ kāraṇā tassa kujjhasi na tuyhanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1295_0: 246. Paralokepi anugāmibhāvato kammaṃyeva sakaṃ santakaṃ etesanti kammassakā, tesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1295_1: bhāvo kammassakatā. Paccavekkhaṇā nāma nisedhanatthā, nisedhanañca bhāvino kammassāti
anya-e0103n:1295_2: āha “yaṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti. Paṭighavasena pana pavattakammaṃ pākaṭabhāvato āsannaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1295_3: paccakkhañcāti āha “idañcā”ti. Ca-saddo byatireke, so tassa kammassa phalanissandena
anya-e0103n:1295_4: “neva sammāsambodhi”ntiādinā byatirekato vuccamānamevatthaṃ joteti. Neva samatthanti
anya-e0103n:1295_5: sambandho. Niraye niyuttaṃ, jātanti vā nerayikaṃ. Attānaṃyeva okirati dosarajenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1296: 247. Satthu pubbacariyaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā, satthu gāravenāpi paṭighaṃ vūpasameyyāti.
anya-e0103n:1297_0: Bodhisattopi samāno nanu te satthā cittaṃ nappadūsesi, pageva abhisambuddhoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1297_1: Deviyā paduṭṭhenāti deviyā saddhiṃ padubbhinā micchācāravasena aparaddhena. Yattha
anya-e0103n:1297_2: susāne chavasarīraṃ chaḍḍīyati, taṃ āmakasusānaṃ. Nikhaññamānoti nikhaṇiyamāno. Purisakāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1297_3: katvāti āvāṭato nikkhamanatthāya bāhubalena purisakāraṃ katvā. Yakkhānubhāvenāti
anya-e0103n:1297_4: aḍḍavinicchayena ārādhitacittassa yakkhassa ānubhāvena. Sirigabbhanti vāsāgāre.
anya-e0103n:1298_0: Āsīsethevāti yathādhippete atthe ñāyato anavajjato āsaṃ kareyya. Na nibbindeyyāti
anya-e0103n:1298_1: “evaṃ kicchāpannassa me kuto sotthibhāvo”ti na nibbindeyya. Vuttañhi “āpadāsu kho,
anya-e0103n:1298_2: mahārāja, thāmo veditabbo”ti. Yathā icchinti yena pakārena kassaci pīḷaṃ akatvā rajje
anya-e0103n:1298_3: patiṭṭhitaṃ attānaṃ icchiṃ, tathā ahaṃ ahunti passāmi. Voti hi nipātamattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1299: Kāsiraññāti kalābunā kāsirājena. Sakaṇṭakāhīti ayakaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭakāhi.
anya-e0103n:1301: Cittapariggaṇhanakāloti visevanaṃ kātuṃ adatvā cittassa sammadeva damanakālo.
anya-e0103n:1302_0: Puthusallenāti vipulena sallena. Nāgoti hatthināgo. Vadhīti vijjhi, māresīti vā attho.
anya-e0103n:1302_1: Imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā mayi evaṃ karaṇaṃ nāma na tava vasena hoti, tasmā kassa vā rañño,
anya-e0103n:1302_2: rājamattassa vā ayaṃ payogo uyyojanāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1303: Chabbaṇṇarasmīti nīlapītalohitādivasena chabbaṇṇamayūkhā. Chabbaṇṇakiraṇavantadantatāya hi te hatthī “chaddantā”ti vuccanti, na chaddantavantatāya.
anya-e0103n:1304_0: Chātoti jighacchito. Khādeyyāti khādeyyaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Āhitoti suhito. Sambalanti
anya-e0103n:1304_1: maggāhāraṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā upacārena pathassa hitanti vuccati, tasmā “pātheyya”ntipi
anya-e0103n:1304_2: vuttaṃ. “Mittadubbhī vatāyaṃ andhabālo”ti kāruññena assupuṇṇehi nettehi taṃ purisaṃ udikkhamāno.
anya-e0103n:1305_0: Mā ayyosi me bhadanteti ettha māti nipātamattaṃ, māti vā paṭikkhepo, tena upari tena
anya-e0103n:1305_1: kātabbaṃ vippakāraṃ paṭisedheti. Ayyo meti ayyirako tvaṃ mama atithibhāvato. Bhadanteti
anya-e0103n:1305_2: piyasamudācāro. Tvaṃ nāmetādisaṃ karīti tvampi evarūpaṃ akāsi nāma.
anya-e0103n:1306: Tiracchānabhūtopi pana mahākapi hutvā khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1307: Peḷāya pakkhipantepīti khuddakāya peḷāya pādehi koṭetvā pakkhipantepi. Maddantepīti dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ nānappakārehi maddantepi. Alampāneti evaṃnāmake ahituṇḍike.
anya-e0103n:1308_0: Pītaṃ vāti ettha vā-saddo avuttatthavikappe, tena odātamañjiṭṭhādiṃ avuttaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1308_1: Cittānuvattantoti cittaṃ anuvattanto. Homi cintitasannibho evamayaṃ bahulābhaṃ labhatūti.
anya-e0103n:1308_2: Ānubhāvena pana thalaṃ kareyya udakaṃ…pe… chārikaṃ kare. Evaṃ pana yadi cittavasī
anya-e0103n:1308_3: hessaṃ…pe… uttamattho na sijjhatīti tadā attanā tattha diṭṭhaṃ ādīnavaṃ dasseti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:1309_0: Aḷārāti yena sayaṃ tadā luddahatthato mocito, taṃ satthavāhaṃ nāmena ālapati. Atikassāti
anya-e0103n:1309_1: nāsāya āvutarajjuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā. Samparigayhāti kāḷavettalatādīhi sabbaso pariggahetvā,
anya-e0103n:1310: Ativiya ayuttaṃ appatirūpaṃ paṭighacittuppādanena kenaci appaṭisamakhantiguṇassa satthusāsanāvokkamanappasaṅgato.
anya-e0103n:1311: 248. “Anamataggoyaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃsāro”tiādinā āgatāni suttapadāni anamataggasaddo, tadattho vā etesanti anamataggiyāni.
anya-e0103n:1312_0: Ajehi gamanamaggo ajapatho. Saṅkū laggāpetvā te ālambitvā gamanamaggo saṅkupatho.
anya-e0103n:1312_1: Saṅkūti aṅkusākārena katadīghadaṇḍo vuccati. Ādi-saddena papātamaggaduggamaggādike
anya-e0103n:1312_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Ubhatobyūḷheti sampahāratthaṃ dvīhipi pakkhehi gāḷhasannāhe. Aññāni ca
anya-e0103n:1312_4: Maṃ posesi, upakāraṃ akāsi, tatra nappatirūpaṃ manaṃ padūsetunti evaṃ cittaṃ uppādetabbanti
anya-e0103n:1312_5: sambandho. Evaṃ cittuppādanañca etarahi dissamānena puttādīnaṃ posanādinā atītassa
anya-e0103n:1313_0: 249. Mettāyāti mettāsaṅkhātāya, mettāsahitāya vā. Cetovimuttiyāti cittasamādhāne.
anya-e0103n:1313_1: Āsevitāyāti ādarena sevitāya. Bhāvitāyāti vaḍḍhitāya. Bahulīkatāyāti punappunaṃ katāya.
anya-e0103n:1313_2: Yānīkatāyāti yuttayānaṃ viya katāya. Vatthukatāyāti adhiṭṭhānavatthuṃ viya katāya.
anya-e0103n:1313_3: Anuṭṭhitāyāti adhiṭṭhitāya. Paricitāyāti pariciṇṇāya ciṇṇavasībhāvāya. Susamāraddhāyāti
anya-e0103n:1313_4: suṭṭhu sampāditāya. Pāṭikaṅkhāti icchitabbā avassaṃbhāvino. Sesaṃ parato āgamissati.
anya-e0103n:1314_0: 250. Dhātuvinibbhogoti sasambhārasaṅkhepādinā dhātūnaṃ vinibbhujanaṃ. Aparādho nāma
anya-e0103n:1314_1: aparajjhantassa puggalassa rūpadhammamukhena gayhatīti katvā āha “kiṃ kesānaṃ kujjhasī”tiādi,
anya-e0103n:1314_2: kesādivinimuttassa aparajjhanakassa puggalassa abhāvato. Idāni nibbattitaparamatthadhammavaseneva
anya-e0103n:1314_3: vinibbhogavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pañcakkhandhe upādāya, dvādasāyatanāni
anya-e0103n:1314_4: upādāyāti paccekaṃ upādāya-saddo yojetabbo. Kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti
anya-e0103n:1314_5: yathā āragge sāsapassa, ākāse ca cittakammassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, evamassa
anya-e0103n:1314_6: “verī”ti parikappite puggale kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti, kesādīnaṃ akujjhitabbato,
anya-e0103n:1315_0: 251. Saṃvibhāgoti āmisasaṃvibhāgo. Parassāti paccatthikassa. Bhinnājīvoti aparisuddhājīvo.
anya-e0103n:1315_1: Tassevaṃ karototi evaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ karontassa tassa dāyakassa. Itarassāti paṭiggāhakassa.
anya-e0103n:1315_2: “Mama mātarā upāsikāya dinno”ti idaṃ “dhammiyalābho”ti etassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tena
anya-e0103n:1316_0: Sabbatthasādhakanti “attattho parattho diṭṭhadhammiko attho samparāyiko attho”ti
anya-e0103n:1316_1: evamādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ, hitānaṃ, payojanānañca nipphādakaṃ. Unnamanti dāyakā.
anya-e0103n:1317_0: 252. Evanti yathāvuttehi kakacūpamovādānussaraṇādīhi attano ovadanākārehi. Vūpasantapaṭighassāti
anya-e0103n:1317_1: paṭisaṅkhānabalena vinoditāghātassa. Tasmimpīti verīpuggalepi. Verī-gahaṇeneva cettha
anya-e0103n:1317_2: appiyapuggalassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ verimhi mettāya siddhāya tasmimpi mettāsiddhito,
anya-e0103n:1317_3: piyato pana atippiyasahāyakassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ āsannapaccatthikassa dubbinimocayabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1317_4: Mettāvasenāti mettāyanavasena. Samacittatanti hitūpasaṃhārena samānacittataṃ. Sīmāsambhedo
anya-e0103n:1317_5: sā eva samacittatā. Imasmiṃ puggaleti mettākammaṭṭhānikapuggale. Nisinneti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe bhummaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1318_0: Hitamajjhatteti piye, majjhatte ca. Catubbidheti catubbidhe jane, yattha katthacīti
anya-e0103n:1318_1: adhippāyo. Nānattanti piyamajjhattādinānākaraṇaṃ. Hitacittova pāṇinanti kevalaṃ sattesu
anya-e0103n:1318_2: hitacitto evāti pavuccati, na pana “mettāya nikāmalābhī”ti vā “kusalī”ti vā pavuccati.
anya-e0103n:1318_3: Kasmā? Yasmā attādīsu passati nānattanti. Kasmā panāyaṃ hitacitto kusalīti na vuccatīti?
anya-e0103n:1318_4: Sātisayassa kusalassa vasena kusalibhāvassa adhippetattā. Imassa ca puggalassa mettābhāvanā
anya-e0103n:1318_5: na visesavatī. Atha vā na nikāmalābhī mettāya yato attādīsu passati nānattaṃ. Kusalīti
anya-e0103n:1318_6: pavuccati, yasmā hitacittova pāṇinanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Gāmasīmādayo viya
anya-e0103n:1318_7: gāmantarādīhi sattasaṅkhāte mettāvisaye bhāvanāya pubbe aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇamariyādārūpena
anya-e0103n:1318_8: ṭhitattā attādayo idha sīmā nāmāti āha “catasso sīmāyo”ti. Sambhinnā hontīti ettha
anya-e0103n:1318_9: vuttaṃ sambhedaṃ dassetuṃ “samaṃ pharati mettāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mahāvisesoti mahanto
anya-e0103n:1318_10: bhāvanāya viseso atisayo. Purimena purimato attādinānattadassinā. Na nāyatīti na ñāyati.
anya-e0103n:1319_1: bhāvanāvasena laddhaṃ uggahanimittaṃ nissāya jhānassa gocarabhāvena paṭibhāganimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1319_2: upatiṭṭhati, na evamidha upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittaṃ nāma atthi. Yo panāyaṃ yathāvutto sīmāsambhedo
anya-e0103n:1319_3: laddho, sveva nimittaṃ viyāti nimittaṃ. Tasmiṃ hi laddhe bhāvanāya sātisayattā nīvaraṇāni
anya-e0103n:1319_4: vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva, upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samāhitameva.
anya-e0103n:1319_5: Tenāha “nimittañca upacārañca laddhaṃ hotī”ti. Tameva nimittanti sīmāsambhedavasena
anya-e0103n:1319_6: pavattasamathanimittaṃ. Appakasireneva akiccheneva, pageva paripanthassa visodhitattā.
anya-e0103n:1320: Ettāvatāti ettakena bhāvanānuyogena. Anena yoginā. Pañcaṅgavippahīnantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva.
anya-e0103n:1321_0: “Paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ aññataravasenā”ti idaṃ vakkhamānāya vikubbanāya tesaṃ sādhāraṇatāya
anya-e0103n:1321_2: vepullādivisesappattassa odhiso, anodhiso ca disāpharaṇādivasena jhānassa pavijambhanā
anya-e0103n:1322_0: 254. Mettāsahagatenāti uppādato yāva bhaṅgā mettāya saha pavattena saṃsaṭṭhena sampayuttenāti
anya-e0103n:1322_1: attho. Yasmā pana taṃ vuttanayena mettāya sahagataṃ, tāya ekuppādādividhinā sammadeva
anya-e0103n:1322_2: āgataṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “mettāya samannāgatenā”ti. Ceto-saddo “adhicetaso”tiādīsu
anya-e0103n:1322_3: samādhipariyāyopi hotīti tato visesetuṃ “cetasāti cittenā”ti vuttaṃ. Etanti etaṃ
anya-e0103n:1322_4: padaṃ. Disodhipariggaho sattodhipariggahamukheneva hotīti dassento āha “ekissā disāya
anya-e0103n:1322_5: paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāyā”ti. Disāsu hi ṭhitasattā disāgahaṇena gahitā.
anya-e0103n:1322_7: attano ārammaṇassa phassanā paccakkhato dassanaṃ gahaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇamevāti āha
anya-e0103n:1322_9: Tathāti niyamanaṃ. Taṃ aniyamāpekkhasambandhībhāvato upamākāraniyamanaṃ. Dutiyanti
anya-e0103n:1322_10: upameyyadassanaṃ, upameyyañca nāma upamaṃ, tena sambandhañca vinā natthīti tadubhayampi
anya-e0103n:1322_11: dassetuṃ “yathā puratthimādīsū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tathā dutiyanti ettha pharitvā
anya-e0103n:1322_12: viharatīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Evaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthanti etthāpi. Tadanantaranti
anya-e0103n:1322_13: ca pharaṇāpekkhaṃ anantaraggahaṇaṃ, na pharitabbadisāpekkhaṃ disānaṃ aniddiṭṭharūpattā.
anya-e0103n:1322_14: Pharaṇānukkamena hi tāsaṃ dutiyāditā, na sarūpato. Tenevāha “yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ disa”nti.
anya-e0103n:1322_15: Itīti evaṃ yathāvuttaṃ catasso, evaṃ uddhaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatīti attho. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:1322_16: “eteneva nayenā”ti. Idampi iti-saddasseva atthadassanaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ adho tiriyanti ettha
anya-e0103n:1322_17: pi-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassetuṃ “adhodisampi tiriyaṃ disampī”ti vuttaṃ. Eteneva
anya-e0103n:1322_18: “dutiya”ntiādīsupi pi-saddassa luttaniddiṭṭhatā dīpitāti veditabbaṃ. Evamevāti idampi
anya-e0103n:1322_19: iti-saddasseva atthadassanaṃ. Ettha ca “adho”ti iminā yathā nirayesu, nāgabhavanādīsu,
anya-e0103n:1322_20: yattha tattha vā attano heṭṭhimadisāya sattā gayhanti, evaṃ “uddha”nti iminā devaloke,
anya-e0103n:1322_21: yattha tattha vā attano uparimadisāyaṃ sattā gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1323_1: Īsakampi bahi avikkhipamānoti appakampi kammaṭṭhānato bahi vikkhepaṃ anāpajjanto
anya-e0103n:1323_2: hitūpasaṃhārato aññathā thokampi avattamāno. Sabbattatāyāti vā sabbena attabhāvena
anya-e0103n:1323_3: yathā sabbabhāvena attani attano attabhāve hitesitā, evaṃ sabbadhi sabbasattesu mettāya
anya-e0103n:1323_4: pharitvā viharatīti attho. Mettāya vuccamānattā sattavisayo sabba-saddo, so ca dīghaṃ
anya-e0103n:1323_5: katvā vutto, tasmā sabbasattakāyasaṅkhātā pajā etassa atthīti sabbāvantoti padatthato
anya-e0103n:1323_6: dassento “sabbāvantanti sabbasattavanta”nti āha. Ettha ca sabbadhīti disodhinā, desodhinā
anya-e0103n:1323_7: ca anodhisopharaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, sabbattatāya sabbāvantanti sattodhinā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:1323_8: “anodhiso dassanattha”nti. Ekamevatthaṃ pakārato pariyāyenti ñāpentīti pariyāyā,
anya-e0103n:1323_9: vevacanāni. Vipulādisaddā cettha tādisāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “vipulenāti evamādipariyāyadassanato”ti.
anya-e0103n:1323_10: Pariyāyadassane ca pubbe gahitapadānipi puna gayhanti, yathā “saddhā saddahanā”ti
anya-e0103n:1323_11: ettha vuttampi saddhāpadaṃ puna indriyādipariyāyadassane “saddhā saddhindriya”nti
anya-e0103n:1323_12: vuttaṃ. Tathāsaddo vā itisaddo vā na vuttoti “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā
anya-e0103n:1323_13: viharatī”ti etassa anuvattako tathā-saddo ca iti-saddo ca tesaṃ pharaṇānantarādiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1323_14: aṭṭhānanti katvā te na vuttāti puna “mettāsahagatena cetasāti vutta”nti attho. Vuttassevatthassa
anya-e0103n:1323_15: puna vacanaṃ nigamananti āha “nigamanavasena vā etaṃ vutta”nti. Nanu ca samāpanavasena
anya-e0103n:1323_16: vuttassevatthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti? Nāyaṃ doso odhisoanodhisopharaṇānaṃ samāpane
anya-e0103n:1323_17: eva vuttattā. Vipulenāti mahantena, mahattañcassa asubhakammaṭṭhānādīsu viya ārammaṇassa
anya-e0103n:1323_18: ekadesameva aggahetvā anavasesaggahaṇavasenāti āha “pharaṇavasena vipulatā daṭṭhabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1324_0: Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatādīhi mahattaṃ gataṃ, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandacittavīriyapaññehi
anya-e0103n:1324_1: gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ. Tayidaṃ yasmā ekantato rūpāvacaraṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “bhūmivasena
anya-e0103n:1324_2: mahaggata”nti. Niruḷho hi rūpārūpāvacaresu mahaggatavohāro. Paguṇavasenāti pakārato
anya-e0103n:1324_3: guṇitaṃ bahulīkataṃ paguṇaṃ, tassa vasena, subhāvitabhāvenāti attho. Taṃ hi pamāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1324_4: gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya appamāṇaṃ nāma hoti. Appamāṇasattārammaṇavasenāti aparimāṇasattārammaṇakaraṇavasena.
anya-e0103n:1324_5: Sayampi verarahitattā, taṃsamaṅgino verābhāvahetuttā ca averaṃ. Tayidaṃ dvayaṃ yato
anya-e0103n:1324_6: labhati, taṃ dassetuṃ “byāpādapaccatthikappahānenā”ti vuttaṃ. Cetaso byāpattivasena
anya-e0103n:1324_7: hananato byāpajjaṃ, cetasikaṃ asātaṃ, tadabhāvato abyāpajjaṃ. Tenāha “niddukkha”nti.
anya-e0103n:1324_8: Taṃ panassa abyāpajjattaṃ pañcaviññāṇādīnaṃ viya na sabhāvato, atha kho paccatthikavivekatoti
anya-e0103n:1324_9: dassento “domanassappahānato”ti āha. Ayanti idha yathānītaṃ appamaññāvibhaṅge, tesu
anya-e0103n:1325_1: paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttāya ca vikubbanāya majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya bhedābhāvamupasaṃharati
anya-e0103n:1325_3: paṭisambhidāmagge viya sattodhi na gahitoti ayameva viseso. Yampīti vikubbanaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n:1326: Idāni bhedābhāvadassanamukhena uddesato ānītaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ niddesato dassetvā tassā anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “tattha cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1327_0: 256. Tattha sabbe sattāti sabba-saddo kāmaṃ padesasabbavisayo, na sabbasabbavisayo
anya-e0103n:1327_1: yathā “sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti, “sattā”ti pana padena paricchinnaṃ attano
anya-e0103n:1328: Tatrāti tasmiṃ rūpe. Sattoti sajjanakiccena chandādipariyāyena lobhena āsatto laggo. Tatrāti vā karaṇe bhummaṃ, tena chandādināti attho.
anya-e0103n:1329_0: Yadi sattatāya sattā, kathaṃ vītarāgesūti āha “ruḷhīsaddenā”tiādi. Avītarāgesu ruḷhena,
anya-e0103n:1329_1: avītarāgesu vā pavattitvā indriyabaddhakhandhasantānatāya taṃsadisesu vītarāgesu
anya-e0103n:1329_2: ruḷhena saddena. Atha vā kiñci nimittaṃ gahetvā satipi aññasmiṃ tannimittayutte katthaci
anya-e0103n:1329_3: visaye sammutiyā cirakālatāya nimittavirahepi pavatti ruḷhī nāma yathā “gacchantīti
anya-e0103n:1329_4: gāvo”ti, evaṃ sattasaddassāpi ruḷhībhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Bhūtapubbagatiyā vā vītarāgesu
anya-e0103n:1329_5: sattavohāro daṭṭhabbo. Satvayogatoti ettha satvaṃ nāma buddhi, vīriyaṃ, tejo vā,
anya-e0103n:1329_6: tena yogato sattā, yathā “nīlaguṇayogato nīlo paṭo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1330_0: Pāṇanti etenāti pāṇanaṃ, assāsapassāsā, tassa kammaṃ pāṇanatā, tāya, assāsapassāsasampayogenāti
anya-e0103n:1330_1: attho. Bhūtattāti kammakilesehi jātattā. Pūraṇato, galanato ca puggalāti neruttā.
anya-e0103n:1330_2: Sattā hi nibbattantā taṃtaṃsattanikāyaṃ pūrentā viya honti, sabbāvatthanipātitāya
anya-e0103n:1330_3: ca galanti cavantīti attho. Apariññātavatthukānaṃ “attā”ti bhavati ettha abhidhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1330_4: cittañcāti attabhāvo, sarīraṃ, khandhapañcakameva vā. Tanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Upādāyāti
anya-e0103n:1330_5: gahetvā upādānaṃ nissayaṃ katvā. Paññattimattasambhavatoti paramatthato asantepi
anya-e0103n:1331_0: Yathā ca sattāti vacananti yathā satta-saddo yathāvuttenaṭṭhena nippariyāyato padesavuttipi
anya-e0103n:1331_1: ruḷhīvasena anavasesapariyādāyako. Sesānipīti pāṇādivacanānipi. Tānipi hi rūpārūpabhavūpagacatutthajjhānādisamaṅgīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1331_2: assāsapassāsābhāvato avinipātadhammānaṃ pugalanassa abhāvato padesavuttīni. Ruḷhīvasena
anya-e0103n:1331_3: āropetvā yathāvuttāya ruḷhiyā vasena katthaci visaye avijjamānampi pāṇapuggalabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1331_4: āropetvā. Yadi sādhāraṇato sattavevacanānīti gahetvā anodhisopharaṇā mettā vuccati,
anya-e0103n:1331_5: atha kasmā pañcaheva ākārehi vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “kāmañcā”tiādi. Keci panāhu
anya-e0103n:1331_6: “na kho panetāni “sattā”tiādīni padāni vevacanatāmattaṃ upādāya gahitāni, yato jantuādīnampi
anya-e0103n:1331_7: gahaṇaṃ āpajjeyya, atthavisesaṃ pana nimittabhūtaṃ upādāya gahitānī”ti, te sandhāyāha
anya-e0103n:1331_8: “ye panā”tiādi. Tattha atthatoti sajjanaṭṭhena sattā, pāṇanaṭṭhena pāṇāti evamādiatthato.
anya-e0103n:1331_9: Tesaṃ taṃ matimattanti dassento āha “anodhisopharaṇā virujjhatī”ti. Kasmā? Keci sattā,
anya-e0103n:1331_10: keci pāṇā, keci puggalāti āpajjanato. Tathā atthaṃ aggahetvāti sattādisaddā sappadesavisayāti
anya-e0103n:1331_11: evamatthaṃ aggahetvā pubbe vuttanayena nippadesavisayāti evamatthaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1331_12: Tenāha “imesū”tiādi. Pañcasu ākāresūti “sabbe sattā”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ āgatesu pañcasu
anya-e0103n:1332_0: 257. Idāni dvāvīsatiyā bhāvanākāresu appanā pariggahetvā dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1332_1: vuttaṃ. Byāpādarahitāti domanassabyāpādarahitā. Tasmāti yasmā na kevalaṃ yathāvuttaākāravibhāgamattato
anya-e0103n:1332_2: appanāvibhāgo, tasmā. Imesupi padesūti “sabbe sattā averā hontū”tiādikoṭṭhāsesupi.
anya-e0103n:1332_3: Yaṃ yaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yadipi pubbabhāge tattha tattha abhinivese anekakoṭṭhāsavaseneva
anya-e0103n:1332_4: manasikāraṃ pavatteti, bhāvanāya samijjhanakkhaṇe pana tattha yaṃ paguṇataratāya
anya-e0103n:1332_5: supākaṭaṃ hoti, tassa vasena appanā hoti, yathā taṃ dvattiṃsākāre. Tattha pana ārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1332_6: idha bhāvanākāroti ayameva viseso. Catunnanti catunnaṃ catunnaṃ. Byāpanicchālopena
anya-e0103n:1333: Liṅgavasena vuttaṃ tesaṃ pacurato labbhamānattā. Tatiyā pana pakati yadipi paṭhamadukena na saṅgahitā, dutiyadukena pana tikena ca saṅgahitā eva.
anya-e0103n:1334: Iti sabbānipīti anodhisopharaṇe vīsati, odhisopharaṇe aṭṭhavīsati, disāpharaṇe cattāri satāni, asīti cāti evaṃ sabbānipi. Sata-saddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso.
anya-e0103n:1335_0: 258. Evaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni tattha ānisaṃse vibhāvetuṃ “itī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1335_1: Tattha sesā janāti mettāya cetovimuttiyā alābhino. Samparivattamānāti dakkhiṇena
anya-e0103n:1335_2: passena asayitvā sabbaso parivattamānā. Kākacchamānāti ghurughurupassāsavasena vissaraṃ
anya-e0103n:1335_3: karontā. Sukhaṃ supatīti ettha duvidhāsupanā sayane piṭṭhippasāraṇalakkhaṇā, kiriyāmayacittehi
anya-e0103n:1335_4: avokiṇṇabhavaṅgappavattilakkhaṇā ca. Tatthāyaṃ ubhayathāpi sukhameva supati. Yasmā
anya-e0103n:1335_5: saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati, niddokkamanepi
anya-e0103n:1335_6: jhānaṃ samāpanno viya hoti. Tenāha “evaṃ asupitvā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1336_0: Niddākāle sukhaṃ alabhitvā dukkhena suttattā eva paṭibujjhanakāle sarīrakhedena nitthunanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1336_1: vijambhanaṃ, ito cito viparivattanañca hotīti āha “nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā
anya-e0103n:1336_2: dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhantī”ti. Ayaṃ pana sukhena suttattā sarīrakhedābhāvato nitthunanādirahitova
anya-e0103n:1336_3: paṭibujjhati. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ appaṭibujjhitvā”tiādi. Sukhapaṭibodho ca sarīravikārābhāvenāti
anya-e0103n:1337_1: cassa bhaddakameva supinaṃ hoti, na pāpakanti katvā vuttaṃ. Tenāha “cetiyaṃ vandanto
anya-e0103n:1337_2: viyā”tiādi. Dhātukkhobhahetukampi cassa bahulaṃ bhaddakameva siyā yebhuyyena cittajarūpānuguṇatāya utuāhārajarūpānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1338_0: Ure āmuttamuttāhāro viyāti gīvāya bandhitvā ure lambitamuttāhāro viyāti kehici vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1338_1: Taṃ ekāvalivasena vuttaṃ siyā, anekaratanāvalisamūhabhūto pana muttāhāro aṃsappadesato
anya-e0103n:1338_2: paṭṭhāya yāva kaṭippadesassa heṭṭhābhāgā palambanto ure āmukkoyeva nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:1339: Tatthevāti pāṭaliputteyeva. Sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā desassa khematāya, tassa tassa padesassa ramaṇīyatāya ca.
anya-e0103n:1341_0: Samappavattavāsanti tattha tattha vihāre samappavattavattavāsaṃ. Thero kira attanā
anya-e0103n:1341_1: paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhavihāre “ahamettha āgantuko”ti acintetvā tattha tattha yathārahaṃ
anya-e0103n:1341_2: attanā kātabbavattāni paripūrento eva vihāsi. Apare pana bhaṇanti sabbasattesu samappavattamettāvihāravāsaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1341_3: Ayaṃ hi thero arahattādhigamato pubbepi mettāvihārī ahosi.
anya-e0103n:1342_0: Vanantare ṭhitoti thero kira tathā samappavattavāsavasena caramāno ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ
anya-e0103n:1342_1: ramaṇīyaṃ vanantaraṃ disvā tattha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0103n:1342_2: yathāparicchedena tato uṭṭhito attano guṇāvajjanahetukena pītisomanassena udānento
anya-e0103n:1342_3: “yāvatā upasampanno”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi. Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “vanantare ṭhito”ti paṭhamagāthā
anya-e0103n:1342_4: ṭhapitā. Tattha gajjamānakoti sīhagajjitaṃ gajjanto. Guṇamesantoti attano guṇasamudayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1343_0: Maṇilarukkhe nivāsitāya taṃ devataṃ “maṇiliyā”ti voharanti, tasmā sā devatāpi “ahaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1343_1: bhante, maṇiliyā”ti āha. Rukkhadevatānaṃ hi yebhuyyena nivāsarukkhavasena vohāro
anya-e0103n:1344: “Balavapiyacittatāyā”ti iminā balavapiyacittatāmattenapi satthaṃ na kamati, pageva mettāya cetovimuttiyāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1345_0: Khippameva cittaṃ samādhiyati kenaci paripanthena parihīnajjhānassa byāpādassa dūrasamussāritabhāvato
anya-e0103n:1345_1: khippameva samādhiyati. Āsavānaṃ khayāyāti keci. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Ettha ca kiñcāpi
anya-e0103n:1345_2: ito aññakammaṭṭhānavasena adhigatajjhānānampi sukhasupanādayo ānisaṃsā labbhanti, yathāha –
anya-e0103n:1348_0: Ca ādi, tathāpime ānisaṃsā brahmavihāralābhino anavasesā labbhanti byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato
anya-e0103n:1348_1: brahmavihārānaṃ. Tenevāha “nissaraṇaṃ hetaṃ, āvuso, byāpādassa, yadidaṃ mettā cetovimuttī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1348_2: Byāpādādivasena ca sattānaṃ dukkhasupanādayoti tappaṭipakkhabhūtesu brahmavihāresu
anya-e0103n:1350_0: 259. Karuṇanti karuṇābrahmavihāraṃ. Nikkaruṇatāyāti vihesāya, “idhekacco pāṇinā vā
anya-e0103n:1350_1: leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā aññataraññatarena vā sattānaṃ viheṭhanajātiko hotī”ti
anya-e0103n:1350_2: evaṃ vuttaviheṭhaneti attho. Ādīnavanti dosaṃ. Yathā tathā sattānaṃ viheṭhanāya pāpako
anya-e0103n:1350_3: vipāko idha ceva samparāye ca. Tathā hi yo satte jīvitā voropanena vā aṅgapaccaṅgacchedanena
anya-e0103n:1350_4: vā dhanajāniyā vā alābhāya vā avāsāya vā anatthāya vā ayasatthāya vā parisaṃsakkanena
anya-e0103n:1350_5: vā antamaso yathāvajjadassanenapi viheṭheti, tassa so pamādavihāro diṭṭheva dhamme
anya-e0103n:1350_6: alābhāyapi hoti, laddhassa parihānāyapi hoti, tannimittaṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati,
anya-e0103n:1350_7: avisārado parisaṃ upasaṅkamati maṅkubhūto, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā duggati
anya-e0103n:1350_8: pāṭikaṅkhā, sugatiyampi manussabhūto dujjaccopi hoti nīcakuliko, dubbaṇṇopi hoti
anya-e0103n:1350_9: duddasiko, bahvābādhopi hoti rogabahulo, duggatopi hoti appannapāno, appāyukopi hoti
anya-e0103n:1350_11: karuṇāya ānisaṃsā paccavekkhitabbā. Tena vuttaṃ “nikkaruṇatāya ādīnavaṃ karuṇāya
anya-e0103n:1350_12: ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā”ti. “Piyo hī”tiādinā paṭhamaṃ piyapuggalādīsu anārambhassa
anya-e0103n:1350_13: kāraṇamāha. Piyaṃ hi puggalaṃ karuṇāyitumārabhantassa na tāva piyabhāvo vigacchati,
anya-e0103n:1350_14: avigate ca tasmiṃ kuto karuṇāyanā. Tenāha “piyaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatī”ti. Sesapuggalesupi
anya-e0103n:1350_15: eseva nayo. Liṅgavisabhāgakālakatānaṃ akhettabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0103n:1351_0: Yattha pana paṭhamaṃ ārabhitabbā, taṃ pāḷinayeneva dassetuṃ “kathañca bhikkhū”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1351_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha duggatanti daliddaṃ. So hi bhogapārijuññato sukhasādhanānaṃ abhāvena
anya-e0103n:1351_2: dukkhaṃ gato upagato duggatoti vuccati. Atha vā duggatanti dukkhena samaṅgibhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1351_3: gataṃ. Durupetanti kāyaduccaritādīhi upetaṃ. Gatikularūpādivasena vā tamabhāve ṭhito
anya-e0103n:1351_4: duggato. Kāyaduccaritādīhi upetattā tamaparāyaṇabhāve ṭhito durupetoti evamettha
anya-e0103n:1351_5: attho veditabbo. Paramakicchappattanti ativiya kicchamāpannaṃ mahābyasanaṃ nimuggaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1352: Vadhetha nanti “ghātetha naṃ cora”nti evaṃ pahitāya rañño āṇāya khādanīyampi…pe… denti “idāneva māriyamāno ettakampi sukhaṃ labhatū”ti. Susajjitoti sukhānubhavane sannaddho.
anya-e0103n:1353_0: Eteneva upāyenāti yena yena vidhinā etarahi yathāvutte paramakicchāpanne āyatiṃ vā
anya-e0103n:1353_1: dukkhabhāgimhi puggale karuṇāyituṃ karuṇā uppāditā, eteneva nayena. Piyapuggaleti
anya-e0103n:1353_2: piyāyitabbapuggale. Etarahi vā dissamānaṃ āyatiṃ vā bhāviniṃ dukkhappattiṃ gahetvā
anya-e0103n:1353_3: karuṇā pavattetabbāti sambandho. Majjhattaverīsupi eseva nayo. Yo hi so karuṇāya
anya-e0103n:1353_4: vatthubhūto duvidho puggalo vutto, kāmaṃ tattha karuṇābhāvanā sukheneva ijjhati,
anya-e0103n:1353_5: iminā pana bhikkhunā tattha bhāvanaṃ paguṇataraṃ katvā sīmāsambhedaṃ kātuṃ tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0103n:1353_6: piyapuggale, tato majjhatte, tato veripuggale karuṇā bhāvetabbā. Bhāventena ca ekekasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1353_7: koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvā tadanantare tadanantare upasaṃharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1353_8: Yassa pana veripuggalo vā natthi, mahāpurisajātikattā vā anatthaṃ karontepi verisaññāva
anya-e0103n:1353_9: nuppajjati, tena majjhatte me cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ jātaṃ, idāni verimhi upasaṃharāmīti
anya-e0103n:1353_10: byāpārova na kātabbo. Yassa pana atthi, taṃ sandhāyāha “sace panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1354_0: Tattha pubbe vuttanayenevāti mettākammaṭṭhānikassa vuttanayena. Taṃ mettāya vuttanayeneva.
anya-e0103n:1354_2: ca mettābhāvanāya vuttena nayena taṃ paṭighaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ. Evaṃ etarahi mahādukkhappatte
anya-e0103n:1354_3: sukhitepi akatakusalatāya āyatiṃ dukkhappattiyā vasena karuṇāyanavidhiṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n:1354_4: idāni katakalyāṇepi taṃ dassetuṃ “yopi cetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tesanti byasanānaṃ. Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1354_5: anatikkantattāti sammāsambuddhenāpi akkhānena pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa anāgatassa
anya-e0103n:1354_6: āpāyikassa sugatīsupi jātijarādibhedassāti aparimitassa saṃsāradukkhassa anatikkantabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1354_7: Sabbathāpi karuṇāyitvāti dukkhappattiyā, sukhappattiyā akatakusalatāya vā katākusalatāya
anya-e0103n:1354_8: vāti sabbapakārenapi karuṇāya vatthubhāvassa sallakkhaṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ puggale
anya-e0103n:1354_9: karuṇaṃ katvā karuṇābhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā. Vuttanayenevāti “athānena punappunaṃ mettāyantenā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1354_10: mettābhāvanāyaṃ vuttena nayena. Taṃ nimittanti sīmāsambhedavasena pavattaṃ samathanimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1354_12: appanā “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā tassā vaḍḍhanā ca vuttā, evamidha karuṇābhāvanāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1354_13: tikacatukkajjhānavasena appanā veditabbā ca vaḍḍhetabbā ca, tathevassā vaḍḍhanāvidhipi
anya-e0103n:1354_14: veditabbāti adhippāyo. Vuttanayenevāti avadhāraṇena “paṭhamaṃ veripuggalo karuṇāyitabbo”ti
anya-e0103n:1354_15: idaṃ yathā pāḷiviruddhaṃ, evaṃ yuttiviruddhampīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Paṭhamaṃ hi
anya-e0103n:1354_16: veriṃ samanussarato kodho uppajjeyya, na karuṇā. Attāpi sakkhibhāvena karuṇāyanavasena
anya-e0103n:1354_17: gahetabbo, so kimiti pacchā gayhatīti. “Appanā vaḍḍhetabbā”ti iminā ca appanāppattacittasseva
anya-e0103n:1354_18: “karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā vuttavikubbanā ijjhatīti ayamattho dassito.
anya-e0103n:1355_0: Karuṇāpadamattameva cassā pāḷiyā visesoti taṃ anāmasitvā paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttavikubbanā,
anya-e0103n:1355_1: mettāya vuttaānisaṃsā ca idha labbhantīti dassetuṃ “tato paraṃ…pe… veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1355_2: Tattha tato paranti “karuṇāsahagatena cetasā”ti vuttavikubbanato upari. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0103n:1357_0: 260. Piyapuggalādīsūti piyamajjhattaverīsu na ārabhitabbā. Muditābhāvanāti vibhattiṃ
anya-e0103n:1357_1: pariṇāmetvā yojanā. Na hītiādi tattha kāraṇavacanaṃ. Piyabhāvamattenāti ettha matta-saddo
anya-e0103n:1357_3: pubbabhāsitā, sukhasambhāsatā, sakhilatā, sammodakatāti evamādike muditāya padaṭṭhānabhūte
anya-e0103n:1357_4: visese ulliṅgeti, īdisehi visesehi virahitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Eva-kārena pana piyapuggalassa
anya-e0103n:1357_5: sukhasamappitatādiṃ, muditāya ca hetubhūtaṃ pamodappavattiṃ nivatteti. Piyapuggalepi
anya-e0103n:1357_6: hi paramāya sampattiyā pamudite haṭṭhatuṭṭhe bhikkhuno muditokāsaṃ labheyya. Vakkhati
anya-e0103n:1357_7: hi “piyapuggalaṃ vā”tiādi. Ādito majjhattapuggalaṃ anussarantassa udāsinatā saṇṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:1357_8: veriṃ samanussarantassa kodho uppajjati. Tenāha “pageva majjhattaverino”ti.
anya-e0103n:1358_0: Pamodappavattiyā soṇḍasadiso sahāyo soṇḍasahāyo. Muditamuditovāti pasādasommatāya
anya-e0103n:1358_1: ativiya mudito eva. Pasāde hi idaṃ āmeḍitaṃ. Evaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena ādito muditābhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:1358_2: vatthuṃ dassetvā idāni pāḷinayena dassetuṃ “piyapuggalaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1358_3: sukhitanti sañjātasukhaṃ, sukhappattanti attho. Sajjitanti sukhānubhavane sannaddhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1358_4: paṭiyattasukhasādhanaṃ. Aho sādhūti tassa sattassa sampattiyaṃ sampajaññapubbapamodanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1358_5: Puna aho suṭṭhūti tassa pamodanassa bahulīkāradassanaṃ. Piyaṃ manāpanti ettha manāpa-ggahaṇena
anya-e0103n:1359_0: Atīteti tasmiṃyeva attabhāve atīte. Anāgateti etthāpi eseva nayo. Na hi bhavantaragate
anya-e0103n:1359_1: brahmavihārabhāvanā ruhati. Yadi evaṃ, atītānāgate kathanti? Nāyaṃ doso. “So evāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1359_2: datto tisso”ti addhāpaccuppannatāya vijjamānabhāvena gahetabbato. Kathaṃ panassa
anya-e0103n:1359_3: anāgate sampatti ārammaṇaṃ hotīti? Ādesādito, paccuppannāya vā payogasampattiyā anumānato
anya-e0103n:1360_0: Piyapuggaleti soṇḍasahāyasaññite atippiyapuggale, piyapuggale ca. Duvidhopi cesa
anya-e0103n:1360_1: idha piyabhāvasāmaññato “piyapuggalo”ti vutto. Anukkamenāti atippiyapuggalo piyapuggalo
anya-e0103n:1360_2: majjhatto verīti catūsu koṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ, muduṃ, kammaniyañca
anya-e0103n:1360_3: katvā sesesu upasaṃharaṇānukkamena. Kiñcāpi catūsu janesu samacittatāva sīmāsambhedo
anya-e0103n:1360_4: sīmā sambhijjati etāyāti katvā. Bhāvanāya pana tathā bahuso pavattamānāya purimasiddhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1360_5: hetuṃ, itaraṃ phalañca katvā vuttaṃ “samacittatāya sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā”ti. Yathāvuttasīmābhāvo
anya-e0103n:1360_6: vā sīmāsambhedoti vuttaṃ “samacittatāya sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā”ti. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1362_2: subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ paguṇaṃ, tathārūpā tatiyabrahmavihārajjhānato. Appaguṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1362_3: hi uparijhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti. Catukkanayavasena cettha tatiyaggahaṇaṃ. Sukhitā
anya-e0103n:1362_4: hontūtiādivasenāti ādi-saddena “niddukkhā hontū”ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1362_5: Sattakelāyanaṃ sattesu mamāyanaṃ mamattakaraṇaṃ, tathā manasikārena yogo sattakelāyanamanasikārayuttattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1362_6: tasmā. Mettādīnaṃ rāgagehassitadomanassasomanassānaṃ āsannavuttitāya yathārahaṃ paṭighānunayasamīpacāritā
anya-e0103n:1362_7: veditabbā. Atha vā “sukhitā hontu, dukkhato muccantu modantū”ti hitesitabhāvappattiyā
