anya-e0103n:1362_8: tissannampi anunayassa āsannacāritā. Sati ca tabbipariyāye lohitappakope pubbo viya
anya-e0103n:1362_9: laddhokāsamevettha paṭighanti avisesena tāsaṃ paṭighānunayasamīpacāritā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0103n:1363_0: “Somanassayogena oḷārikattā”ti idaṃ tatiyajjhānassa vasena vuttaṃ, tato vuṭṭhitassa
anya-e0103n:1363_1: idamādīnavadassananti. Mettādivasena pana oḷārikabhāve vuccamāne vitakkavicārapītiyogeneva
anya-e0103n:1363_2: oḷārikatā vattabbā siyā, tāhipi tāsaṃ samāyogasambhavato, upekkhāya ca tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1363_3: Na vā vattabbā tatiyajjhānikānaṃyeva mettādīnaṃ idhādhippetattā, taṃtaṃjhānasamatikkameneva
anya-e0103n:1363_4: ca taṃtaṃjhānikā mettādayopi samatikkantā eva nāma honti, jhānasāmaññena viya mettādisāmaññena
anya-e0103n:1363_6: upekkhāya santabhāvato. “Santabhāvato”ti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sukhumatā
anya-e0103n:1363_7: paṇītatā vidūrakilesatā vipulaphalatāti evamādayopi upekkhāya ānisaṃsā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0103n:1363_8: Pakatimajjhattoti kiñci kāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā pakatiyā sabhāveneva imassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0103n:1363_9: udāsinapakkhe ṭhito. Ajjhupekkhitvāti attanā katakammavaseneva ayamāyasmā āgato gacchati
anya-e0103n:1363_10: ca, tvampi attanā katakammavaseneva āgato gacchasi ca, na tassa tava payogena kiñci
anya-e0103n:1363_11: sukhaṃ vā upanetuṃ, dukkhaṃ vā apanetuṃ labbhā, kevalaṃ panetaṃ cittassa anujukammaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1363_12: yadidaṃ mettāyanādinā sattesu kelāyanaṃ. Buddhādīhi ariyehi gatamaggo cesa apaṇṇakapaṭipadābhūto,
anya-e0103n:1363_13: yadidaṃ sabbasattesu majjhattatāti evaṃ paṭipakkhajigucchāmukhena majjhattatāya samupajātagāravabahumānādaro
anya-e0103n:1363_14: taṃ puggalaṃ punappunaṃ ajjhupekkhati, tattha ca savisesaṃ upekkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti,
anya-e0103n:1363_15: tassa tathā paṭipajjato pakatiyāpi udāsinattā sātisayaṃ tattha majjhattatā saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0103n:1363_16: Bhāvanābalena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnā eva honti, so
anya-e0103n:1363_17: taṃ upekkhaṃ piyapuggalādīsu upasaṃharati. Tenāha “upekkhā uppādetabbā. Tato piyapuggalādīsū”ti.
anya-e0103n:1363_18: Ekaṃ puggalanti ettha aññattho eka-saddo “ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu viya. Ekavacaneneva
anya-e0103n:1363_19: cettha saṅkhyāviseso siddho, tasmā aññaṃ ekaṃ puggalanti ayamettha attho. Tena attānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1363_20: nivatteti. “Neva manāpa”nti iminā piyapuggalaṃ, atippiyasahāyakañca nivatteti, attānampi
anya-e0103n:1363_21: vā attani amanāpatāya abhāvato. “Na amanāpa”nti iminā appiyaṃ, veripuggalañca, pārisesato
anya-e0103n:1363_22: majjhattapuggalassa gahaṇaṃ āpannaṃ. Iti “ekaṃ puggalaṃ neva manāpaṃ nāmanāpa”nti
anya-e0103n:1363_23: iminā attano, piyādīnañca paṭikkhepamukhena udāsinapuggalaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1364_0: Vuttanayenāti “yvāssa pakatimajjhatto”tiādinā anantaraṃ vuttena nayena. Attasinehassa
anya-e0103n:1364_1: balavabhāvato veritopi attani majjhattatāya durūpasaṃhārattā “imesu ca attani cā”ti
anya-e0103n:1364_2: attā pacchā vutto. Pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayenevāti “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1364_3: pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena. Yaṃ hi heṭṭhā “paguṇatatiyajjhānā vuṭṭhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1364_4: taṃ heṭṭhā tīsu brahmavihāresu, catutthabrahmavihāre ca ādīnavānisaṃsadassanavasena
anya-e0103n:1364_5: vuttaṃ. Idaṃ pana tatiyajjhāne ādīnavaṃ, catutthajjhāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā catutthādhigamāya
anya-e0103n:1364_6: yogaṃ karontassa catutthajjhānassa uppajjanākāradassanaṃ. Tasmā tattha vuttaṃ “pathavīsaddaṃ
anya-e0103n:1364_7: apanetvā tadeva nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjatī”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1365_1: Kāmaṃ kasiṇānāpānesu uppannassāpi tatiyajjhānassa upekkhābrahmavihārena rūpāvacarajjhānāditāya
anya-e0103n:1365_2: attheva sabhāgatā, taṃ pana akāraṇaṃ ārammaṇassa visadisatāyāti āha “ārammaṇavisabhāgatāyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1365_3: Nanu ca aññathāva kasiṇādibhāvanā, aññathā brahmavihārabhāvanāti bhāvanāvasenāpi
anya-e0103n:1365_4: yathāvuttajjhānānaṃ attheva visadisatāti? Saccametaṃ, bhāvanāvasena pana visadisatā
anya-e0103n:1365_5: anuppattiyā na ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Tathā hi aññathāva mettādibhāvanā, aññathā upekkhābhāvanā.
anya-e0103n:1365_6: Tathāpi sattesu yathāpavattitaṃ hitesitādiākāraṃ byatirekamukhena āmasantī, tato
anya-e0103n:1365_7: vinivattamānarūpena ajjhupekkhanākārena brahmavihārupekkhā pavattati. Tathā hi vakkhati
anya-e0103n:1365_8: “kammassakā sattā, te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissantī”tiādi. Ārammaṇasabhāgatāpi
anya-e0103n:1365_9: cettha atthīti mettādivasena paṭiladdhatatiyajjhānassa ijjhati upekkhābrahmavihāro.
anya-e0103n:1365_10: Tena vuttaṃ “mettādīsū”tiādi. Tattha mettādīsūti mettādīsu nipphādetabbesu, mettādivasenāti
anya-e0103n:1367: 262. Brahmuttamenāti ettha sammutibrahmāno upapattibrahmāno visuddhibrahmānoti tividhā brahmāno.
anya-e0103n:1369: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe. ;
anya-e0103n:1371: Ca evamādīsu hi brahmasaddena sammutibrahmāno vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1376_0: “Atha kho brahmā sahampatī”ti ca evamādīsu brahmasaddena upapattibrahmāno vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1376_1: “Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetī”tiādi vacanato “brahma”nti ariyadhammo vuccati, tato nibbattattā
anya-e0103n:1376_2: avisesena sabbepi ariyā visuddhibrahmāno nāma paramatthabrahmatāya. Visesato pana
anya-e0103n:1376_3: “brahmāti, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato sammāsambuddho uttamabrahmā
anya-e0103n:1376_4: nāma sadevake loke brahmabhūtehi guṇehi ukkaṃsapāramippattito. Iti brahmānaṃ uttamo,
anya-e0103n:1376_5: brahmā ca so uttamo cāti vā brahmuttamo, bhagavā. Tena kathite “so mettāsahagatena
anya-e0103n:1376_6: cetasā”tiādinā tattha tattha veneyyānaṃ desite. Itīti evaṃ yathāvuttena bhāvanākkamena
anya-e0103n:1376_7: ceva atthavaṇṇanākkamena ca viditvā jānitvā. Pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyāti pubbe viya
anya-e0103n:1376_8: asādhāraṇaṃ taṃtaṃbrahmavihārapaṭiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā sādhāraṇabhāvato tattha
anya-e0103n:1376_9: tattha pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattitā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.
anya-e0103n:1377_0: Mejjatīti dhammato aññassa kattunivattanatthaṃ dhammameva kattāraṃ katvā niddisati.
anya-e0103n:1377_1: Siniyhatīti ettha sattesu byāpajjanavasena lūkhabhāvassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0103n:1377_2: hitākārapavattivasena sinehanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na taṇhāyanavasena. Taṃ hi mohapubbaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0103n:1377_3: lubbhanasabhāvaṃ, idaṃ pana adussanasabhāvaṃ alobhasampayuttaṃ. Nanu ca taṇhāsinehopi
anya-e0103n:1377_4: byāpādavirodhī tena sahānavaṭṭhānato. Yadipi tena saha ekasmiṃ citte nappavattati,
anya-e0103n:1377_5: virodhī pana na hoti appahāyakato. Mejjatīti mitto, hitajjhāsayo khandhappabandho,
anya-e0103n:1377_6: tappariyāpannatāya mitte bhavā, mitte vā ārammaṇabhūte piye puggale bhavā, mittassa
anya-e0103n:1378_0: Karotīti karuṇā, kiṃ karoti, kesaṃ, kiṃ nimittanti āha “paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1378_1: hadayakampana”nti. Kampananti ca paresaṃ dukkhaṃ disvā tassa apanetukāmassa asahanākārena
anya-e0103n:1378_2: cittassa aññathattaṃ. Tayidaṃ sappurisānaṃyeva hotīti āha “sādhūna”nti. Sappurisā
anya-e0103n:1378_3: hi saparahitasādhanena “sādhū”ti vuccanti. Vināsetīti adassanaṃ gameti, apanetīti
anya-e0103n:1378_4: attho. Tenettha hiṃsanaṃ apanayananti dasseti. Paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā
anya-e0103n:1378_5: hi karuṇā. Pharaṇavasenāti phusanavasena, ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāti attho. Ārammaṇakaraṇañcettha
anya-e0103n:1379_0: Modanti tāyāti modanakiriyāya muditāya karaṇabhāvaniddeso, svāyaṃ upacārasiddho,
anya-e0103n:1379_1: muditāvinimutto natthi tattha koci kattāti tameva kattubhāvena niddisati “sayaṃ vā
anya-e0103n:1379_2: modatī”ti, ayampi upacāraniddesova. Dhammānaṃ avasavattanatoti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1380: Piyādīsu pakkhapātupacchedanamukhena udāsinabhāvasaṅkhātā upapattito ikkhā upekkhā. Tenāha “averā hontū”tiādi. Tattha upekkhatīti kattuniddese kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0103n:1381_0: 263. Hito nāma atthacaro, tasmā hitākārappavattilakkhaṇāti sattānaṃ hitacaraṇākārena
anya-e0103n:1381_1: pavattilakkhaṇā, hitākārassa vā pavattanalakkhaṇā. Hitūpasaṃhārarasāti sattesu hitassa
anya-e0103n:1381_2: upanayanakiccā, upanayanasampattikā vā. “Anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā pavattanakassa
anya-e0103n:1381_3: āghātassa vinayanākārena paccupatiṭṭhati, ñāṇassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, yattha vā
anya-e0103n:1381_4: sayaṃ uppajjati, tattha āghātavinayanaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti āghātavinayapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1381_5: Amanāpānampi sattānaṃ paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññitārūpena, pageva manāpānaṃ yaṃ manāpabhāvadassanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1381_6: tathāpavatto yonisomanasikāro, taṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ etissāti manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1381_7: Byāpādūpasamoti byāpādassa vikkhambhanavasena vūpasamo. Sampattīti sampajjanaṃ sammadeva
anya-e0103n:1381_8: nibbatti. Sinehasambhavoti taṇhāsinehassa uppatti. Vipattīti vināso. Mettāmukhena hi rāgo vañceti.
anya-e0103n:1382_0: Karuṇādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Visesamattameva vaṇṇayissāma.
anya-e0103n:1382_1: Sattānaṃ pavattadukkhassa apanayanākāro. Apanayanaṃ pana hotu vā mā vā, yo dukkhāpanayanākāro,
anya-e0103n:1382_3: dukkhassa asahanaṃ anadhivāsanaṃ paradukkhāsahanaṃ. Na vihiṃsā avihiṃsā, sattānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1382_4: aviheṭhanaṃ. Taṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti, vihiṃsāya vā paṭipakkhabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0103n:1382_5: avihiṃsāpaccupaṭṭhānā. Vihiṃsūpasamoti ettha vihiṃsanti etāya satte, vihiṃsanaṃ vā
anya-e0103n:1382_6: nesaṃ tanti vihiṃsā, sattānaṃ viheṭhanākārena pavatto karuṇāya paṭipakkhabhūto paṭighacittuppādo.
anya-e0103n:1383_1: usūyanassa paṭipakkhabhāvakiccā. Sattānaṃ sampattiyā, pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu
anya-e0103n:1383_2: ca asahanaṃ aramaṇaṃ aratiicceva saṅgahaṃ gacchati, tassā vihananākārena paccupatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:1383_3: tassa vā vighātaṃ vūpasamaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1384_0: Pahāso gehasitapītivasena pahaṭṭhabhāvo uppilāvitattaṃ. Sattesu samabhāvadassanarasāti
anya-e0103n:1384_1: piyādibhedesu sabbasattesu udāsinavuttiyā samabhāvasseva dassanakiccā, upapattito
anya-e0103n:1384_2: ikkhaṇato samabhāveneva tesaṃ gahaṇakiccāti attho. Sattesu paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlākārānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1384_3: aggahaṇato tattha paṭighānunayānaṃ vūpasamanākārena vuttiyā tesaṃ vūpasamaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1384_6: paccāmasanto mettādīnaṃ tissannaṃ pavattiākārapaṭisedhanamukhena pavattaṃ kammassakatāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1384_7: upekkhābrahmavihārassa āsannakāraṇaṃ, na yaṃ kiñcīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1385_0: 264. Vipassanāsukhañceva bhavasampatti cāti ettha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro cāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1385_1: Tampi hi nesaṃ sādhāraṇapayojanaṃ. Tathā “sukhaṃ supatī”tiādayo ekādasānisaṃsā. Te
anya-e0103n:1385_2: pana heṭṭhā vuttā evāti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n:1386_0: Nissarati apagacchati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ, pahāyakaṃ. Kāmañcetehi pañcapi nīvaraṇāni,
anya-e0103n:1386_1: tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā vikkhambhanavasena pahīyanti, ujuvipaccanīkadassanavasena
anya-e0103n:1386_2: pana byāpādādayo pāḷiyaṃ vuttā. Evañca katvā rāganissaraṇatāvacanaṃ upekkhābrahmavihārassa
anya-e0103n:1387_0: 265. Etthāti etesu brahmavihāresu. Mettā sattesu yathārahaṃ dānapiyavacanādisīlasutādiguṇagahaṇavasena
anya-e0103n:1387_1: pavattati. Tena vuttaṃ “sattānaṃ manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā”ti. Rāgopi tattha yathā
anya-e0103n:1387_3: Tasmā mittamukhasapatto viya tulyākārena dūsanato rāgo mettāya āsannapaccatthiko,
anya-e0103n:1387_4: so lahuṃ otāraṃ labhati satisammosamattenāpi mettaṃ apanīya tassā vatthusmiṃ uppajjanārahattā.
anya-e0103n:1387_5: Tatoti rāgato, rāgassa vā otāralābhato. Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti sabhāgassa, sabhāgena
anya-e0103n:1387_6: vā visabhāgatāya. Sattesu hi manāpākāragāhino mettāsabhāgassa tabbiparītasabhāvo
anya-e0103n:1387_7: byāpādo tena visabhāgo. Tasmā so otāraṃ labhamāno cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre
anya-e0103n:1387_8: ṭhitasapatto viya mettāya dūrapaccatthiko. Tatoti byāpādato. Nibbhayenāti anussaṅkanaparisaṅkanena,
anya-e0103n:1387_9: laddhapatiṭṭhāya mettāya byāpādena duppadhaṃsiyattāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “mettāyissatī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1388_0: Iṭṭhānanti piyānaṃ. Kantānanti kamanīyānaṃ. Manāpānanti manavaḍḍhanakānaṃ. Tato eva
anya-e0103n:1388_1: mano ramentīti manoramānaṃ. Lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānanti taṇhāsannissitānaṃ. Appaṭilābhato
anya-e0103n:1388_2: samanupassatoti appaṭilābhena ahamime na labhāmīti paritassato. Atītanti atikkantaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1388_3: Niruddhanti nirodhappattaṃ. Vipariṇatanti sabhāvavigamena vigataṃ. Samanussaratoti
anya-e0103n:1388_5: saddāna”nti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Vipattidassanasabhāgatāyāti yesu sattesu bhogādivipattidassanamukhena
anya-e0103n:1388_6: karuṇā pavattati, tesu tannimittameva ayoniso ābhoge sati yathāvuttadomanassamukhena
anya-e0103n:1388_7: soko uppajjeyya, so karuṇāya āsannapaccatthiko. Soko hi idha domanassasīsena vutto.
anya-e0103n:1388_9: tesu dukkhūpanayanākāro vihesāsabhāvo visabhāgoti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya sā otāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1388_10: labhamānā cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya karuṇāya dūrapaccatthikā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1389_0: Sampattidassanasabhāgatāyāti yesu sattesu bhogādisampattidassanamukhena muditā pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1389_1: tesu tannimittameva ayoniso ābhoge sati “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpāna”ntiādinā vuttasomanassamukhena
anya-e0103n:1389_2: pahāso uppajjeyya, so ca muditāya āsannapaccatthiko. Pahāso hi idha somanassasīsena
anya-e0103n:1389_3: vutto. Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti bhogādisampattīhi muditesu sattesu pamodanākārassa
anya-e0103n:1389_4: muditāsabhāgassa tattha anabhiramanākārā arati visabhāgāti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya
anya-e0103n:1389_5: sā otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya muditāya
anya-e0103n:1389_6: dūrapaccatthikā vuttā. Pamudito cātiādi muditāya siddhāya ayampi arati na hotīti
anya-e0103n:1389_8: vā aratiyā vikkhambhitāya muditāya paṭipakkhā arati suvikkhambhaneyyā hotīti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1389_9: ekadesena arati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adhikusaladhammesūti samathavipassanādhammesu.
anya-e0103n:1390_0: Bālakaradhammayogato bālassa. Attahitaparahitabyāmūḷhatāya mūḷhassa. Puthūnaṃ kilesādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1390_1: jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjanassa. Kilesodhīnaṃ maggodhīhi ajitattā anodhijinassa,
anya-e0103n:1390_2: odhijinā vā sekkhā odhisova kilesānaṃ jitattā. Tena imassa odhijitabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0103n:1390_3: Sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattanavipākassa ajitattā avipākajinassa, vipākajinā vā
anya-e0103n:1390_4: arahanto appaṭisandhikattā. Tenassa asekkhattaṃ paṭikkhipati. Anekādīnave sabbesampi
anya-e0103n:1390_5: pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhūte sammohe ādīnavānaṃ adassanasīlatāya anādīnavadassāvino. Āgamādhigamābhāvā
anya-e0103n:1390_6: assutavato. Ediso ekaṃsena andhaputhujjano nāma hotīti tassa andhaputhujjanabhāvadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1390_7: punapi “puthujjanassā”ti vuttaṃ. Evarūpāti vuttākārena sammohapubbikā. Rūpaṃ sā nātivattatīti
anya-e0103n:1390_8: rūpānaṃ samatikkamanāya kāraṇaṃ na hoti, rūpārammaṇe kilese nātivattatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1390_10: yathā brahmavihārupekkhā mettādayo viya sattesu hitūpasaṃhārādivasena guṇadose avicārentī
anya-e0103n:1390_11: kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva pavattati, evaṃ aññāṇupekkhā sattesu vijjamānampi guṇadosaṃ
anya-e0103n:1390_12: acintentī kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva pavattatīti dosaguṇāvicāraṇavasena sabhāgā.
anya-e0103n:1390_13: Tasmā sā lahuṃ otāraṃ labhatīti brahmavihārupekkhāya āsannapaccatthikā vuttā. Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti
anya-e0103n:1390_15: rāgapaṭighā visabhāgāti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya te otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyunti
anya-e0103n:1390_16: purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya upekkhābrahmavihārassa dūrapaccatthikā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1391_0: 266. Kattukāmatā chando ādi “chandamūlakā kusalā dhammā”ti vacanato, atha vā sattesu
anya-e0103n:1391_2: chando ādī”ti vuttaṃ. Upekkhābrahmavihāropi hi sattesu anirākatahitacchandoyeva “tattha
anya-e0103n:1391_3: abyāvaṭatā apaṇṇakapaṭipadā”ti ajjhupekkhanākārena pavattati mātā viya sakiccapasute
anya-e0103n:1391_4: putte. Nīvaraṇādīti ādi-saddena tadekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Katthaci sattaggahaṇampi
anya-e0103n:1391_5: saṅkhāraggahaṇameva hoti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya yathā “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti,
anya-e0103n:1391_6: na evamidhāti āha “paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto aneke vā sattā ārammaṇa”nti.
anya-e0103n:1391_8: bhāvanāyaṃ sukhādiggahaṇampi labbhati. Taṃ pana “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti vipassanāya
anya-e0103n:1391_9: aniccalakkhaṇagahaṇaṃ viya appadhānabhūtaṃ, sattapaññatti eva padhānabhāvena gayhatīti
anya-e0103n:1391_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Upacāre vā patte ārammaṇavaḍḍhanaṃ tatthāpi sīmāsambhedasiddhitoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1392_0: Ekamāvāsaṃ paricchinditvāti ettha “satte mettāya pharissāmī”ti evaṃ ñāṇena paricchedaṃ
anya-e0103n:1392_1: katvā ekā racchā paricchinditabbāti yojanā. Racchāgahaṇena racchāvāsino sattā gahitā
anya-e0103n:1393_0: 267. Kasiṇānaṃ nissandoti kasiṇajjhānānaṃ nissandaphalasadisā āruppā arūpajjhānāni,
anya-e0103n:1393_1: kasiṇajjhānānaṃ pāripūriyāva sijjhanato. Tehi vinā asijjhanatoti keci. Samādhinissandoti
anya-e0103n:1393_2: rūpajjhānasamādhīnaṃ, heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ arūpajjhānasamādhīnañca nissando paṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0103n:1393_3: te adhigantvāva paṭilabhitabbato. Vipassanānissando vipassanānubhāvena laddhabbato,
anya-e0103n:1393_6: mettādivasena tīṇi jhānāni adhigantvā ṭhitasseva upekkhābrahmavihāro, na itarassāti
anya-e0103n:1393_7: dasseti. Tamevatthaṃ upamāya pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0103n:1394_0: 268. Siyāti vuccamānākārena siyā kassaci parivitakko. Etthāti etesu mettādīsu brahmavihāratā
anya-e0103n:1394_1: veditabbā, itarakammaṭṭhānāni attahitapaṭipattimattāni. Imāni pana “sabbe sattā sukhitā
anya-e0103n:1394_2: hontū”tiādinā parahitapaṭipattibhūtāni. Tasmā sattesu sammā paṭipattibhāvena seṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:1394_3: ete vihārā. Brahmānoti upapattibrahmāno. Te hi idha jhānabhāvanāya vinīvaraṇacittā
anya-e0103n:1394_4: hutvā brahmaloke uppannā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ vinīvaraṇacittāva honti. Tasmā “niddosacittā
anya-e0103n:1394_5: viharantī”ti vadanti. Brahmānoti vā sakalabuddhaguṇahetubhūtānaṃ dānapāramitādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1394_6: buddhakaradhammānaṃ paripūraṇavasena brūhitaguṇā mahāsattā bodhisattā. Te hi sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1394_8: ca niddosacittā viharanti. Evanti yathā te upapattibrahmāno, mahābodhisattabrahmāno
anya-e0103n:1394_9: vā, evaṃ etehi brahmavihārehi sampayuttā samaṅgībhūtā.
anya-e0103n:1395_1: ettha byāpādasaṃkilesādito visujjhanupāyo visuddhimaggo. Ādi-saddena hitūpasaṃhārādimanasikāravisesā
anya-e0103n:1395_2: saṅgahitā. Āsaṃ mettādīnaṃ. Appamāṇeti pamāṇarahite. Yenāti yena kāraṇena. Tanti
anya-e0103n:1396_1: adhippāyo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Pakkhapātavasena anābhujanamanābhogo majjhattākāroti
anya-e0103n:1396_2: adhippāyo. Yvāyaṃ catubbidho sattesu manasikāro vutto, tameva upamāya dassetuṃ “yasmā
anya-e0103n:1396_3: ca yathā mātā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha vuttassāpi hitūpasaṃhārādiatthassa upameyyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1396_4: upanetvā dassetuṃ atthupanayanattho “yasmā cā”ti ca-saddo. Pariyāyeti vāre, tasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1396_5: tasmiṃ kiccavasena parivattanakkameti attho. Abyāvaṭāti anussukkā. Tathāti yathā
anya-e0103n:1396_6: mātā daharādīsu puttesu, tathā sabbasattesu mettādivasena mettāyanādivasikena bhavitabbanti
anya-e0103n:1396_7: yojanā. Tasmāti yasmā sabbepi saṃkilesadhammā yathārahaṃ dosamoharāgapakkhiyā, tehi
anya-e0103n:1396_8: ca visujjhanupāyo appamaññā, hitūpasaṃhārādivasena catubbidho ca sattesu manasikāro,
anya-e0103n:1396_9: tasmā visuddhimaggādivasā catassova appamaññā. Catassopi etā bhāvetukāmena na ekekanti
anya-e0103n:1396_10: adhippāyo. Sati hi sabbasaṅgahe kamena bhavitabbaṃ. Hitesitā mettāyananti āha “evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1396_11: patthitahitāna”nti. Sambhāvetvā vāti “imāya paṭipattiyā ayaṃ nirayādīsu nibbatteyyā”ti
anya-e0103n:1396_12: parikappetvā vā. Dukkhāpanayanākaārappavattivasena paṭipajjitabbanti sambandho. Tato
anya-e0103n:1396_13: paranti tato hitākārappavattiādito paraṃ. Kattabbābhāvatoti catutthassa pakārassa
anya-e0103n:1396_14: kattabbassa abhāvato. Ayaṃ kamoti ayaṃ imāsaṃ appamaññānaṃ yebhuyyena pavattanakkamoti
anya-e0103n:1396_15: katvā vuttaṃ, na “imināva kamena etāsaṃ pavatti, na aññathā”ti. Mettādīnaṃ hi tissannaṃ
anya-e0103n:1396_16: bhāvanānaṃ kamaniyamo natthi, yaṃ vā taṃ vā paṭhamaṃ bhāvetuṃ labbhā, desanākkamavasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1397_0: Ekasattassāpīti ekassāpi sattassa. Appaṭibhāganimittattā paricchedaggahaṇaṃ natthi,
anya-e0103n:1397_1: na ca sammutisaccavasena pavattaṃ sattaggahaṇaṃ paricchinnarūpādiggahaṇaṃ hotīti
anya-e0103n:1397_3: appamāṇagocaratā vuttā. Evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvāti yathā uddhumātakādīsu atirekuddhumātakādibhāvappatte
anya-e0103n:1397_4: padese nimittaṃ gayhati, evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvā. Sakalapharaṇavasenāti niravasesapharaṇavasena.
anya-e0103n:1398_0: 270. Nissaraṇattāti ettha yaṃ yassa nissaraṇaṃ, taṃ tassa ujupaṭipakkhabhūtameva
anya-e0103n:1398_1: hoti. Yathā kāmānaṃ nekkhammaṃ, rūpānaṃ āruppā, saṅkhārānaṃ nibbānaṃ, evaṃ domanassasahitānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1398_2: byāpādavihiṃsāratīnaṃ nissaraṇabhūtā mettākaruṇāmuditā na somanassarahitā honti.
anya-e0103n:1398_3: Nissaraṇaggahaṇeneva ca pubbabhāgiyānaṃ tāsaṃ upekkhāsampayogopi anuññātoti daṭṭhabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:1398_4: anissaraṇabhāvato. Tathā hi aṭṭhavīsatiyā cittuppādesu karuṇāmuditānaṃ pavattiṃ ācariyā
anya-e0103n:1398_5: icchanti. Na hi brahmavihārupekkhā upekkhāvedanaṃ vinā vattati pārisuddhiupekkhā
anya-e0103n:1398_6: viya. Na hi kadāci pārisuddhiupekkhā vedanupekkhaṃ vinā vattatīti.
anya-e0103n:1399_0: 271. Sātasahagatanti sukhasahagataṃ. Tasmāti yasmā “tato tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādikāya desanāya
anya-e0103n:1399_1: catunnampi appamaññānaṃ savitakkādibhāvo viya upekkhāsahagatabhāvopi viññāyati, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:1399_2: Catassopi appamaññā catukkapañcakajjhānikāti codakassa adhippāyo. Evañhi satīti yadi
anya-e0103n:1399_3: mūlasamādhimhi vuttamatthaṃ anantaraṃ vuttatāya brahmavihāresu pakkhipati, evaṃ sante
anya-e0103n:1399_4: kāyānupassanādayopi catukkapañcakajjhānikā siyuṃ, na pana honti vipassanāvasena desitattāti
anya-e0103n:1399_7: me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissatī”tiādīhi byañjanehi pakāsito eva cittasamādhi “ajjhattaṃ
anya-e0103n:1399_8: me cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissatī”tiādīhipi byañjanehi pakāsitoti byañjanato labbhamānasamādhicchāyāmattaṃ
anya-e0103n:1399_9: gahetvā ubhayattha labbhamānaṃ adhippāyaṃ aggahetvāti attho. Suttatthaṃ hi aññathā
anya-e0103n:1399_10: vadanto ayathāvāditāya satthāraṃ apavadanto nāma hoti. Tenāha “mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1400_0: 272. “Tayimaṃ dosaṃ pariharitukāmena na sabbaṃ suttaṃ nītatthameva, tasmā garukulato
anya-e0103n:1400_1: adhippāyo maggitabbo”ti dassento “gambhīraṃ hī”tiādiṃ vatvā tattha ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n:1400_2: adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādimāha. Āyācitā dhammadesanā etenāti āyācitadhammadesano,
anya-e0103n:1400_3: taṃ āyācitadhammadesanaṃ. Evamevāti garahane nipāto, mudā evāti attho. Ajjhattanti
anya-e0103n:1400_4: gocarajjhatte, kammaṭṭhānārammaṇeti attho. Yasmā cittekaggatā nāma sasantatipariyāpannā
anya-e0103n:1400_5: hoti, tasmā atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ “niyakajjhattavasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti
anya-e0103n:1400_6: bahiddhā avikkhippamānaṃ ekaggabhāve ṭhitaṃ bhavissati. Tato eva susaṇṭhitaṃ, suṭṭhu
anya-e0103n:1400_7: samāhitanti attho. Uppannāti avikkhambhitā. Pāpakāti lāmakā. Akusalā dhammāti kāmacchandādayo
anya-e0103n:1400_8: akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā dhammā. Cittaṃ pariyādāya pavattituṃ okāsādānena kusalacittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1400_9: khepetvā na ca ṭhassantīti yojanā. Iminā yathāvuttassa samādhānassa kāraṇamāha.
anya-e0103n:1401_1: Taṃ pana upari vuccamānānaṃ samādhivisesānaṃ mūlakāraṇabhāvato “mūlasamādhī”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n:1401_2: Svāyaṃ cittekaggatāmatto “ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi
anya-e0103n:1401_3: samādahāmī”tiādīsu viya khaṇikasamādhi adhippeto. Yatheva hi aññatthāpi “āraddhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1401_4: kho pana me, bhikkhave, vīriyaṃ ahosi asallīnaṃ…pe… samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagga”nti vatvā
anya-e0103n:1402_0: Assāti bhikkhuno, assa vā mūlasamādhissa. Bhāvananti vaḍḍhanaṃ. Ayaṃ samādhīti ca
anya-e0103n:1402_1: mūlasamādhiyeva adhippeto. Evaṃ bhāvitoti yathā araṇisahitena uppādito aggi gomayacuṇṇādīhi
anya-e0103n:1402_2: vaḍḍhito gomayaggiādibhāvaṃ pattopi araṇisahitena uppāditamūlaggītveva vuccati, evamidhāpi
anya-e0103n:1402_3: mūlasamādhi eva mettādivasena vaḍḍhitoti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1403_0: Aññesupi ārammaṇesu pathavīkasiṇādīsu. Tattha yathā mettābhāvanāpubbaṅgamena bhāvanānayena
anya-e0103n:1403_2: bhāvanā vuttā, evaṃ karuṇādibhāvanāpubbaṅgamaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsupi bhāvanāvidhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1403_3: dassetvā pacchā kāyānupassanādipubbaṅgamaṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ dassento āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ
anya-e0103n:1403_4: desesi. Tena vuttaṃ “karuṇā me cetovimuttī”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ dhammānupassanāpariyosānāya
anya-e0103n:1403_5: desanāya arahattādhigamāya kammaṭṭhānassa kathitattā puna “tato tvaṃ, bhikkhu, imaṃ
anya-e0103n:1403_6: samādhiṃ savitakkampī”tiādi kasmā vuttanti? Dhammānupassanāya matthakappattidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1403_7: Sā hi saṅkhārupekkhābhāvena vattamānā yathāvuttajjhānadhamme sammasantī visesato
anya-e0103n:1403_8: matthakappattā nāma hoti. Phalasamāpattibhūmidassanatthaṃ vuttanti keci.
anya-e0103n:1404_0: Puna yato kho tetiādi arahattappattito uddhaṃ laddhabbaphāsuvihāradassanaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1404_1: gagghasīti gamissasi. Tasmāti yasmā “savitakkampī”tiādikā desanā mettādīnaṃ ārammaṇato
anya-e0103n:1404_2: aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe samādhiṃ sandhāya vuttā, na appamaññā, tasmā. “Tathevā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1404_3: ganthantarenapi tamevatthaṃ samattheti. Tattha tathevāti tikacatukkajjhānavaseneva.
anya-e0103n:1404_4: Abhidhammeti cittuppādakaṇḍe, appamaññāvibhaṅgādīsu ca tattha tattha abhidhammappadesesu.
anya-e0103n:1405_0: 273. Subhaparamādivasenāti subha-saddo “subhanteva adhimutto hotī”ti evaṃ vuttasubhavimokkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1405_1: sandhāya vutto uttarapadalopena. Parama-saddo ukkaṃsattho. Subho subhavimokkho paramo
anya-e0103n:1405_2: ukkaṃso paramā koṭi etissāti subhaparamā, mettācetovimutti, tato paraṃ tāya sādhetabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:1405_3: natthīti attho. Asādhāraṇassa atthassa adhippetattā vipassanāsukhādayo idha anavasarā.
anya-e0103n:1405_4: Itaretaravisiṭṭhāpete visesā, pageva parehi. Tenāha “aññamaññaṃ asadiso ānubhāvaviseso
anya-e0103n:1406_0: Tassa tassa upanissayattāti subhavimokkhādikassa tassa tassa vimokkhassa pakatūpanissayavasena
anya-e0103n:1406_1: upanissayapaccayabhāvato. Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “mettāvihārissā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1406_2: vuttaṃ. Assa mettāvihārissa cittaṃ upasaṃharatoti sambandho. Appaṭikkūlaparicayāti
anya-e0103n:1406_3: mettābhāvanāvasena sattasaññite yattha katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭikkūlākāreneva gahaṇassa
anya-e0103n:1406_4: paricitattā. Tassa saṅkhārabhūtampi yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ appaṭikkūlākāreneva paccupatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:1406_5: pageva sabhāvato. “Appaṭikkūla”nti tatthassa cittaṃ abhirativasena nirāsaṅkaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1406_6: paccanīkadhammehi ca sukhena, suṭṭhu ca vimuccati, yatassa jhānassa vimokkhapariyāyo
anya-e0103n:1406_7: vutto. Tenāha “appaṭikkūlesū”tiādi. Yathāvutto ca attho anatthacaraṇādiadhippāyena
anya-e0103n:1406_8: sacetane ārammaṇe āghātaṃ uppādentassa paṭikkūlaparicayā acetanepi vātātapādike āghātuppattiyā
anya-e0103n:1406_9: vibhāvetabbo. Na tato paranti tato subhavimokkhato paraṃ kassaci vimokkhassa upanissayo na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1407_0: Abhihananti etenāti abhighāto, daṇḍo abhighāto yassa taṃ daṇḍābhighātaṃ, taṃ ādi
anya-e0103n:1407_1: yassa taṃ daṇḍābhighātādi, daṇḍābhighātādi rūpaṃ nimittaṃ yassa taṃ daṇḍābhighātādirūpanimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1407_2: Kiṃ pana tanti āha “sattadukkha”nti, daṇḍappahārādijanitaṃ karajarūpahetukaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1407_3: uppajjanakadukkhanti attho. Rūpe ādīnavo suparividito hoti karuṇāvihārissa rūpanimittattā,
anya-e0103n:1407_4: dukkhassa karuṇāya ca paradukkhāsahanarasattāti adhippāyo. Tattha ākāse. Cittaṃ pakkhandati
anya-e0103n:1408_0: Tena tenātiādīsu ayaṃ yojanā – tena tena bhogasampattiādinā pāmojjakāraṇena pamuditānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1408_1: sattānaṃ uppannapāmojjaviññāṇaṃ samanupassantassa yogino “sādhu vatāyaṃ satto pamodatī”ti
anya-e0103n:1408_2: muditāya pavattisambhavato pamuditaviññāṇassa dassanena viññāṇaggahaṇaparicitaṃ cittaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1409_0: Anukkamādhigatanti ākāsakasiṇavajje yattha katthaci kasiṇe rūpāvacarajjhānādhigamānukkamena
anya-e0103n:1409_1: rūpavirāgabhāvanāya adhigataṃ. Ākāsanimittaṃ gocaro etassāti ākāsanimittagocaraṃ,
anya-e0103n:1409_2: tasmiṃ ākāsanimittagocare paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe. Cittaṃ upasaṃharatoti dutiyāruppādhigamāya
anya-e0103n:1409_3: bhāvanācittaṃ nentassa, tathā bhāvayatoti attho. Tatthāti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe.
anya-e0103n:1409_4: Cittanti viññāṇañcāyatanacittaṃ. Pakkhandatīti anupavisati vimokkhabhāvena appeti.
anya-e0103n:1410_1: sukhāsīsanādivasena pavattamānā mettādibhāvanāva paramatthaggahaṇamukhena satte ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1410_2: karoti, upekkhābhāvanā pana tathā appavattitvā kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva satte
anya-e0103n:1410_4: avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhaṃ cittaṃ hotī”ti. Nanu ca “kammassakā sattā, te kassa ruciyā
anya-e0103n:1410_5: sukhitā vā bhavissantī”tiādinā paṭikkhepavasenapi paramatthaggahaṇamukheneva upekkhābrahmavihāropi
anya-e0103n:1410_6: satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana bhāvanāya pubbabhāge, matthakappattiyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1410_7: pana kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti savisesaṃ paramatthato
anya-e0103n:1410_8: avijjamāne eva visaye tassa pavatti. Avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhatā ca ajjhupekkhanavasena
anya-e0103n:1411_0: 274. Sabbāpetāti sabbāpi etā appamaññā. Dānādīnanti pāramibhāvappattānaṃ dānādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1411_2: pāramitānaṃ, tannimittānaṃ buddhayāniyānañca, sabbehi vā sundarasabhāvānaṃ. Na hi
anya-e0103n:1411_3: lokiyadhammā buddhakaradhammehi ānubhāvato ukkaṭṭhā nāma atthi, buddhadhammesu vattabbameva
anya-e0103n:1411_4: natthi. Paripūrikāti parivuddhikarā. Adhiṭṭhānāni viya hi appamaññā sabbāsaṃ pāramitānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1411_6: adhiṭṭhānabhāvadassanamukhena catūhi appamaññāhi attano santānassa pageva abhisaṅkhatattā
anya-e0103n:1411_7: mahābodhisattā dānādipāramiyo pūretuṃ samatthā honti, nāññathāti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1411_8: Imassa dātabbaṃ, imassa na dātabbanti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, “idaṃ dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1411_9: idaṃ na dātabbanti ca vibhāgaṃ akatvā”ti vattabbato. Deyyapaṭiggāhakavikapparahitā
anya-e0103n:1414_1: ca. Tena deyyadhammena viya dānadhammenāpi mahāsattānaṃ lokassa bahūpakāratā vuttā
anya-e0103n:1414_2: hoti, tathā tassa pariṇāmanato. Tadatthadīpanatthaṃ hi “vibhāgaṃ akatvā”ti vatvāpi
anya-e0103n:1414_3: “sabbasattāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tesanti sabbasattānaṃ. Upaghātanti etthāpi “vibhāgaṃ akatvā”ti
anya-e0103n:1414_4: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ hettha padayojanā – vibhāgaṃ akatvā upaghātaṃ parivajjayantā
anya-e0103n:1414_5: sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidānaṃ sīlaṃ samādiyantīti. Sattakālavikapparahitā hi sīlapāramitā,
anya-e0103n:1414_6: lokatthameva cassa phalaṃ pariṇamīyati. Nekkhammaṃ bhajantīti pabbajjaṃ upagacchanti.
anya-e0103n:1414_7: Pabbajitassa hi sabbaso sīlaṃ paripūrati, na gahaṭṭhassa. Idhāpi “vibhāgaṃ akatvā
anya-e0103n:1414_8: sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidāna”nti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Na hi bodhisattā kālavibhāgaṃ
anya-e0103n:1414_9: katvā pabbajjaṃ anutiṭṭhanti, sīlaṃ vā samādiyanti, nidassanamattañcetaṃ jhānādinekkhammabhajanassāpi
anya-e0103n:1414_10: icchitabbattā. Sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidānatā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0103n:1414_11: Hitāhitesūti atthānatthesu. Asammohatthāyāti sammohaviddhaṃsanāya. Paññaṃ pariyodapentīti
anya-e0103n:1414_12: yogavihitaṃ vijjāṭṭhānādiṃ assutaṃ suṇantā sutaṃ vodapentā ahaṃkāramamaṃkārādiṃ vidhunantā
anya-e0103n:1414_13: ñāṇaṃ visodhenti. “Ahaṃ mamā”ti vikapparahitā hi paññāpāramitā. Hitasukhatthāyāti
anya-e0103n:1414_14: sattānaṃ hitasukhādivuddhiyatthameva. Niccanti satataṃ avicchedena paṭipakkhena avokiṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1414_15: Vīriyamārabhantīti yathā sattānaṃ anuppannaṃ hitasukhaṃ uppajjati, uppannaṃ abhivaḍḍhati,
anya-e0103n:1414_16: evaṃ parakkamaṃ karonti. Saṅkocavikkheparahitā hi vīriyapāramitā. “Vīrabhāvaṃ pattāpī”ti
anya-e0103n:1414_17: iminā aparaddhānaṃ niggahasamatthataṃ dasseti. Nānappakārakaṃ aparādhaṃ khamantīti
anya-e0103n:1414_18: mammacchedanākārena attani pavattitaṃ nānāvidhaṃ aparādhaṃ sahanti. Attaparavikappavirahitā
anya-e0103n:1415_0: Paṭiññaṃ na visaṃvādentīti avisaṃvādanasāmaññena sabbassapi anariyavohārassa akaraṇamāha.
anya-e0103n:1415_1: Paṭiññāte, apaṭiññāte ca diṭṭhādike micchāvikapparahitā hi saccapāramitā. Avicalādhiṭṭhānāti
anya-e0103n:1415_3: ca buddhakaradhammesu sammadeva avaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramitā. Tesūti sattesu. Avicalāyāti
anya-e0103n:1415_4: paṭipakkhena akampanīyāya. Evanti yathāvuttena sattesu hitajjhāsayatādiākārena. Yathā
anya-e0103n:1415_5: ca brahmavihārādhiṭṭhānā pāramiyo, evaṃ adhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānāpi. Tathā hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ
anya-e0103n:1415_6: parānuggahāya pāramīnaṃ anuṭṭhānena saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tappaṭipakkhapariccāgato cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1415_7: pāramīhi sacittupasamato upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tāhi parahitūpāyakosallato paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1415_8: Evaṃ paccekampi pāramitāsu yathārahaṃ netabbaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana
anya-e0103n:1415_9: pāramitāsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthadīpaniyaṃ cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
anya-e0103n:1415_10: veditabbaṃ, ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha. Tathā dasabalañāṇādiketi. Etāva
anya-e0103n:1420_0: 275. Uddiṭṭhesūti “cattāro āruppā”ti evaṃ uddiṭṭhesu, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Tenevāha
anya-e0103n:1420_1: “catūsu āruppesū”ti. Tattha rūpavivekena arūpaṃ, arūpameva āruppaṃ jhānaṃ, idha pana
anya-e0103n:1420_2: tadatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Taṃ bhāvetukāmo catutthajjhānaṃ uppādetīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1420_3: Rūpādhikaraṇanti rūpahetu. Hetuattho hi ettha adhikaraṇa-saddo “kāmādhikaraṇa”ntiādīsu
anya-e0103n:1420_4: viya. Daṇḍanaṭṭhena daṇḍo, muggarādi. Parapīḷādhippāyena tassa ādānaṃ daṇḍādānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1420_5: Sattānaṃ sasanaṭṭhena satthaṃ, āvudhaṃ. Bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho. Virodho viggaho. Nānāvādo
anya-e0103n:1420_6: vivādo. Etanti yathāvuttaṃ daṇḍādānādikaṃ. Sabbasoti anavasesato. Āruppe arūpabhāve,
anya-e0103n:1420_7: āruppe vā bhave. Rūpānaṃyevāti diṭṭhādīnavānaṃ rūpānaṃyeva, na arūpānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1420_8: Nibbidāyāti vikkhambhanavasena nibbindanatthāya. Virāgāyāti virajjanatthāya. Nirodhāyāti
anya-e0103n:1420_9: nirujjhanatthāya. Sabbametaṃ samatikkamaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Daṇḍādānādīnanti ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n:1420_10: adinnādānādikaṃ sabbaṃ rūpahetukaṃ anatthaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, na idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatamevāti
anya-e0103n:1420_11: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Karajarūpeti yathāvuttādīnavādhikaraṇabhāvayogyaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, oḷārikarūpeti
anya-e0103n:1420_12: attho. Ādīnavanti dosaṃ. Tassāti rūpassa. Ālokoti vaṇṇaviseso evāti tattha pavattaṃ
anya-e0103n:1420_13: paṭibhāganimittaṃ ugghāṭetvā siyā ākāsanimittaṃ uggahetuṃ, na pana paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1420_14: ugghāṭetvā. Tassa hi ugghāṭanā nāma rūpanimitteneva siyāti āha “ṭhapetvā paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1420_15: navasū”ti. Keci pana “ālokakasiṇampi ṭhapetvā aṭṭhasū”ti vadanti, tassa pana ṭhapane
anya-e0103n:1420_16: kāraṇaṃ na dissati, karajarūpaṃ atikkantaṃ hoti tassa anālambanato.
anya-e0103n:1421_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “catutthajjhānavasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Nanu paṭhamajjhānādīnipi tassa anālambanavaseneva
anya-e0103n:1421_1: pavattanti paṭibhāganimittārammaṇattā? Saccametaṃ, oḷārikaṅgappahānato pana santasabhāvena
anya-e0103n:1421_2: āneñjappattena catutthajjhānena atikkantaṃ suṭṭhu atikkantaṃ nāma hotīti “catutthajjhānavasenā”ti
anya-e0103n:1421_3: vuttaṃ. Keci “assāsapassāsānaṃ nirujjhanato, kāmadhātusamatikkamanato cā”ti vadanti,
anya-e0103n:1421_4: taṃ akāraṇaṃ, itaresaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ sambhavato, heṭṭhimajjhānānañca akāmadhātusaṃvattanīyato.
anya-e0103n:1421_6: taṃ na hoti, tasmā kiṃ tassa samatikkamanenāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “kathaṃ? Yathā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1421_7: vuttaṃ. Tattha kathanti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Yathāti opammatthe nipāto. Lekhācittanti
anya-e0103n:1421_8: kāḷavaṇṇādinā kataparikammāya lekhāya cittaṃ. Phalitantaranti vivaraṃ. Disvāti dūrato
anya-e0103n:1422_0: Ārammaṇavasenāti “mama cakkhu sobhanaṃ, mama kāyo thiro, mama parikkhārā sundarā”ti
anya-e0103n:1422_1: evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena. Karajarūpasamaṅgikāloti attano attabhāvarūpena ceva ārammaṇarūpena
anya-e0103n:1422_2: ca samannāgatakālo. Tampīti kasiṇarūpassapi. Sāmiatthe hi idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Bhayasantāsaadassanakāmatā
anya-e0103n:1422_3: viya samatikkamitukāmatāti yojanā. Idañca yathāvuttānaṃ nibbidāvirāganirodhānaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1422_4: Te hi tayo apekkhitvā bhayasantāsaadassanakāmatā vuttā. Eko kira sunakho vane sūkarena
anya-e0103n:1422_5: pahaṭamatto palāto, so arūpadassanavelāya bhattapacanaukkhaliṃ dūrato disvā sūkarasaññāya
anya-e0103n:1422_6: bhīto uttasanto palāyi, pisācabhīruko puriso rattibhāge aparicite dese matthakacchinnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1422_7: tālakkhandhaṃ disvā pisācasaññāya bhīto uttasanto mucchito papati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:1423_0: 276. Evanti yathāvuttaṃ opammatthaṃ nigamento āha. Soti yogāvacaro. Tasmiṃ jhāne
anya-e0103n:1423_1: ādīnavaṃ passatīti sambandho. Rūpanti kasiṇarūpaṃ. Santavimokkhatoti arūpajjhānato.
anya-e0103n:1423_2: Tāni hi “ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā”tiādīsu santavimokkhāti āgatā.
anya-e0103n:1423_3: Santatāsiddhi cassa anussutito daṭṭhabbā. Yathevāti eva-kārena yena pakārena etaṃ
anya-e0103n:1423_5: duvaṅgikattaṃ dasseti, na tatiyajjhāne viya duvaṅgikatāmattaṃ. Nanu cetthāpi duvaṅgikatāmattameva
anya-e0103n:1424_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne. Nikantinti apekkhaṃ. Pariyādāyāti ādīnavadassanena
anya-e0103n:1424_1: tasmiṃ jhāne khepetvā, anapekkho hutvāti attho. Santato manasikaraṇeneva paṇītato,
anya-e0103n:1424_2: sukhumato ca manasikāro siddho hotīti āha “santato anantato manasi karitvā”ti. Pattharitvāti
anya-e0103n:1424_3: pageva vaḍḍhitaṃ, tadā vaḍḍhanavasena vā pattharitvā. Tenāti kasiṇarūpena. Ugghāṭeti
anya-e0103n:1424_5: Ugghāṭanavidhiṃ pana dassento “ugghāṭento hī”tiādimāha. Tattha saṃvelletīti paṭisaṃharati.
anya-e0103n:1424_6: Aññadatthūti ekaṃsena. Neva ubbaṭṭatīti neva uṭṭhahati. Na vivaṭṭatīti na vinivaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n:1424_7: Imassāti imassa kasiṇarūpassa. Amanasikāranti manasi akaraṇaṃ acintanaṃ. Manasikārañca
anya-e0103n:1424_8: paṭiccāti “ākāso ākāso”ti bhāvanāmanasikārañca nissāya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa
anya-e0103n:1424_9: ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇarūpaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ manasi karoto, tena ca phuṭṭhokāsaṃ
anya-e0103n:1424_10: “ākāso ākāso”ti manasi karoto yadā taṃ bhāvanānubhāvena ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tadā
anya-e0103n:1424_11: so kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭeti nāma, tañca tena ugghāṭitaṃ nāma hotīti. Tenāha “kasiṇugghāṭimākāsamattaṃ
anya-e0103n:1425_0: “Nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhantī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0103n:1425_1: nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāni, tato paṭṭhāya cassa na nesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Yadi siyā,
anya-e0103n:1425_2: jhānato parihāyeyya? Yaṃ paneke vadanti “attheva sukhumāni arūpajjhānavikkhambhaneyyāni
anya-e0103n:1425_3: nīvaraṇāni, tāni sandhāyetaṃ vutta”nti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Na hi mahaggatakusalesu
anya-e0103n:1425_4: lokuttarakusalesu viya odhiso pahānaṃ nāma atthi. Yo pana rūpāvacarehi āruppānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1425_5: uḷāraphalatādiviseso, so bhāvanāvisesena santatarapaṇītatarabhāvena tesuyeva purimapurimehi
anya-e0103n:1425_6: pacchimapacchimānaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Vikkhambhantī”ti pana vacanaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanavasena
anya-e0103n:1425_7: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi aññatthāpi heṭṭhā pahīnānaṃ upari pahānaṃ vuccati. Ye pana “sabbe
anya-e0103n:1425_8: kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ paṭipakkhāti katvā evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti, tehi
anya-e0103n:1425_9: dutiyajjhānūpacārādīsu nīvaraṇavikkhambhanāvacanassa kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ. Sati santiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0103n:1425_10: ākāsanimittārammaṇā sati sammā sūpaṭṭhitā hutvā tiṭṭhati. Satisīsena cettha upacārajjhānānuguṇānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1425_11: saddhāpañcamānaṃ sakiccayogaṃ dasseti. Upacārenāti upacārajjhānena. Idhāpīti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1425_12: sandhāya sampiṇḍanaṃ. Taṃ hi upekkhāvedanāsampayuttaṃ. Sesanti “sesāni kāmāvacarānī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1425_13: Yaṃ idha vattabbamavuttaṃ, taṃ pana pathavīkasiṇaniddese vuttanayānusārena veditabbanti
anya-e0103n:1426_0: Evaṃ yaṃ tattha avisiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ atidisitvā idāni visiṭṭhaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1426_1: Yānapputoḷi kumbhimukhādīnanti oguṇṭhanasivikādiyānānaṃ mukhaṃ yānamukhaṃ, putoḷiyā
anya-e0103n:1426_2: khuddakadvārassa mukhaṃ putoḷimukhaṃ, kumbhimukhanti paccekaṃ mukha-saddo sambandhitabbo.
anya-e0103n:1426_4: upacārajjhānena. Parikammaṃ anulomaṃ upacāroti ca anatthantarañhetaṃ. Pekkhamāno
anya-e0103n:1427_1: pathavīkasiṇādirūpanimittesu, tadārammaṇajjhānesu ca dosadassanākārena, tesu eva
anya-e0103n:1427_2: vā rūpādīsu nikantippahānaanāvajjitukāmatādinā. Rūpajjhānampi rūpanti vuccati uttarapadalopena
anya-e0103n:1427_3: “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”tiādīsu yathā rūpabhavo rūpaṃ. Rūpīti hi rūpajjhānalābhīti
anya-e0103n:1427_4: attho. Ārammaṇampi kasiṇarūpaṃ rūpanti vuccati purimapadalopena yathā “devadatto
anya-e0103n:1427_5: datto”ti. Rūpāni passatīti kasiṇarūpāni jhānacakkhunā passatīti attho. Tasmāti yasmā
anya-e0103n:1427_6: uttarapadalopena, purimapadalopena ca yathākkamaṃ rūpajjhānakasiṇarūpesu rūpavohāro
anya-e0103n:1427_7: dissati, tasmā. Rūpe rūpajjhāne taṃsahagatā saññā rūpasaññā. Tadārammaṇassa cāti
anya-e0103n:1427_8: ca-saddena yathāvuttaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ sampiṇḍeti, tena pāḷiyaṃ “rūpasaññāna”nti
anya-e0103n:1427_9: sarūpekasesena niddeso katoti dasseti. Virāgāti jigucchanato. Nirodhāti tappaṭibandhachandarāgavikkhambhanena
anya-e0103n:1427_10: nirodhanato. Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassa
anya-e0103n:1427_11: sabbākārena virāgā anavasesānaṃ nirodhāti evaṃ vā ettha yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0103n:1428_0: “Ārammaṇe avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hotī”ti idaṃ yasmā imāni jhānāni ārammaṇātikkamena
anya-e0103n:1428_1: pattabbāni, na aṅgātikkamenāti katvā vuttaṃ. Yasmā panettha saññāsamatikkamo ārammaṇasamatikkamena
anya-e0103n:1428_2: vinā na hoti, tasmā “samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hotī”ti
anya-e0103n:1428_3: āha. Avatvā vuttoti sambandho. Samāpannassātiādīsu kusalasaññāvasena samāpannaggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1428_5: Arahato hi jhānāni visesato diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro. Yadi saññāsamatikkamassa anunipphādiārammaṇasamatikkamo
anya-e0103n:1428_6: vibhaṅge ca avutto, atha kasmā idha gahitoti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1429_1: purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa atthavacanaṃ, tasmā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamo jhānasamaṅgikāle
anya-e0103n:1429_2: anuppattīti tassa idheva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ anuyogamukhena dassetuṃ “kāmañcetā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1429_3: vuttaṃ. Ussāhajananatthaṃ paṭipajjanakānaṃ. Etāsaṃ paṭighasaññānaṃ. Ettha paṭhamāruppakathāyaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1430_0: Kiṃ vā pasaṃsākittanena, paṭighasaññānaṃ pana atthaṅgamo idheva vattabbattā vuttoti
anya-e0103n:1430_1: dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sabhāvadhammassa abhāvo nāma paṭipakkhena
anya-e0103n:1430_2: pahīnatāya vā paccayābhāvena vā. Tesu rūpajjhānasamaṅgino paṭighasaññānaṃ abhāvo
anya-e0103n:1430_3: paccayābhāvamattena, na paṭipakkhādhigamenāti dassento āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1430_4: tāti paṭighasaññā. Rūpāvacaranti rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ. Samāpannassāti samāpajjitvā viharantassa.
anya-e0103n:1430_5: Kiñcāpi na santīti yojanā. Na pahīnattā na santīti na tadā paṭighasaññā pahīnabhāvena
anya-e0103n:1430_6: na santi nāma. Tattha kāraṇamāha “na hi rūpavirāgāya rūpāvacarabhāvanā saṃvattatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1430_7: Nanu ca paṭighasaññāpi arūpadhammā evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “rūpāyattā ca etāsaṃ
anya-e0103n:1430_8: pavattī”ti. Ayaṃ pana bhāvanāti arūpabhāvanamāha. Dhāretunti avadhāretuṃ. Idhāti
anya-e0103n:1430_9: arūpajjhāne. Āneñjābhisaṅkhāravacanādīhi āneñjatā. “Ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma
anya-e0103n:1431_1: saddena arūpasamāpattito na vuṭṭhāti. Tathā pana na suppahīnattā sabbarūpāvacarasamāpattito
anya-e0103n:1431_2: vuṭṭhānaṃ siyā, paṭhamajjhānaṃ pana appakampi saddaṃ na sahatīti taṃ samāpannassa
anya-e0103n:1431_3: saddo kaṇṭakoti vuttaṃ. Āruppabhāvanāya abhāve cutito uddhaṃ uppattirahānaṃ rūpasaññāpaṭighasaññānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1431_4: yāva attano vipākappavatti, tāva anuppattidhammatāpādanena samatikkamo, atthaṅgamo
anya-e0103n:1431_5: ca vutto. Nānattasaññāsu pana yā tasmiṃ bhave na uppajjanti ekantarūpanissitā, tā
anya-e0103n:1431_6: anokāsatāya na uppajjanti, na āruppabhāvanāya nivāritattā, anivāritattā ca kāci uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n:1431_7: Tasmā tāsaṃ amanasikāro anāvajjanaṃ apaccavekkhaṇaṃ, javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa
anya-e0103n:1432_0: Tena ca nānattasaññāmanasikārahetūnaṃ rūpānaṃ samatikkamā samādhissa thirabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1432_1: dassetuṃ “saṅkhepato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apica imehi tīhi padehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā
anya-e0103n:1432_2: vaṇṇo kathito sotūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ, palobhanatthañca. Ye hi akusalā evaṃgāhino
anya-e0103n:1432_3: “sabbassādarahite ākāse pavattitasaññāya ko ānisaṃso”ti, te tato micchāgāhato nivattetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1432_4: tīhi padehi jhānassa ānisaṃso kathito. Taṃ hi sutvā tesaṃ evaṃ bhavissati “evaṃ santā
anya-e0103n:1432_5: kirāyaṃ samāpatti evaṃ paṇītā, handassā nibbattanatthaṃ ussāhaṃ karissāmī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1433_0: 280. Assāti ākāsassa. Uppādo eva anto uppādanto, tathā vayanto. Sabhāvadhammo hi
anya-e0103n:1433_1: ahutvā sambhavato, hutvā ca vinassanato udayavayaparicchinno. Ākāso pana asabhāvadhammattā
anya-e0103n:1433_2: tadubhayābhāvato ananto vutto. Ajaṭākāsaparicchinnākāsānaṃ idha anadhippetattā “ākāsoti
anya-e0103n:1433_3: kasiṇugghāṭimākāso vuccatī”ti āha. Kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭīyati etenāti kasiṇugghāṭo, tadeva
anya-e0103n:1433_6: anantaṃ katvā parikammasamphassapubbakena jhānasamphassena phusati. Yathā bhisaggameva
anya-e0103n:1433_7: bhesajjaṃ, evaṃ ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ saṃyogaparassa ta-kārassa ca-kāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:1433_9: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhe āyatana-saddassa dassanato. Kāraṇākarasañjātidesanivāsatthepi āyatana-saddo idha yujjateva.
anya-e0103n:1435_0: 281. Ciṇṇo carito paguṇikato āvajjanādilakkhaṇo vasībhāvo etenāti ciṇṇavasībhāvo,
anya-e0103n:1435_1: tena ciṇṇavasībhāvena. Rūpāvacarasaññaṃ anatikkamitvā anadhigantabbato, taṃsahagatasaññāmanasikārasamudācārassa
anya-e0103n:1435_4: paṇītabhāvasiddhito ca paṭhamāruppato dutiyāruppaṃ santatarasabhāvanti āha “no ca
anya-e0103n:1435_5: viññāṇañcāyatanamiva santā”ti vakkhati hi “suppaṇītatarā honti, pacchimā pacchimā
anya-e0103n:1435_6: idhā”ti. Anantaṃ anantanti kevalaṃ “anantaṃ ananta”nti na manasi kātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1435_7: “anantaṃ viññāṇaṃ, anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti pana manasi kātabbaṃ, “viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa”nti vā.
anya-e0103n:1436_0: Tasmiṃ nimitteti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇasaṅkhāte viññāṇanimitte. Cittaṃ cārentassāti
anya-e0103n:1436_1: bhāvanācittaṃ pavattentassa. Ākāsaphuṭe viññāṇeti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte
anya-e0103n:1436_2: paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ārammaṇabhūte. Appetīti appanāvasena pavattati. Sabhāvadhammepi
anya-e0103n:1436_3: ārammaṇasamatikkamabhāvanābhāvato idaṃ appanāppattaṃ hoti catutthāruppaṃ viya. Appanānayo
anya-e0103n:1436_4: panettha vuttanayenevāti ettha dutiyāruppajjhāne purimabhāge tīṇi, cattāri vā javanāni
anya-e0103n:1436_5: kāmāvacarāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāneva honti. “Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā arūpāvacara”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:1436_6: paṭhamāruppajjhāne vuttena nayena, atha vā appanānayoti sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇe
anya-e0103n:1436_7: jhānassa appanānayo ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanāvasena āruppaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇāti, “appanāppattasseva
anya-e0103n:1436_8: hi jhānassa ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattaṃ tattha hotī”ti maraṇānussatiniddese vuttanayena veditabboti attho.
anya-e0103n:1437_1: evamādinā sabbena dosadassanākārena, tattha vā nikantipahānaanāvajjitukāmatādiākārena,
anya-e0103n:1437_2: sabbaṃ vā kusalavipākakiriyābhedato anavasesanti attho. Svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttanayena
anya-e0103n:1437_3: ñātuṃ sakkāti āha “sabbasoti idaṃ vuttanayamevā”ti. Jhānassa ākāsānañcāyatanatā bāhiratthasamāsavasena
anya-e0103n:1437_4: heṭṭhā vuttāti āha “pubbe vuttanayena jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatana”nti. Ārammaṇassa
anya-e0103n:1437_6: “purimanayenevā”ti idaṃ “nāssa anto”tiādinā vuttapadasiddhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0103n:1437_7: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena, evaṃ sañjātidesaṭṭhenapi āyatana-saddena idha attho yujjatīti dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1437_8: “tathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sañjāyati etthāti sañjāti, sañjāti eva deso sañjātideso.
anya-e0103n:1437_9: Jhānaṃ appavattikaraṇena. Ārammaṇaṃ amanasikaraṇena. Ubhayampi vā ubhayatā yojetabbā.
anya-e0103n:1437_10: Jhānassapi hi anāvajjanaṃ, javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ amanasikaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1437_11: ārammaṇassa ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena appavattanaṃ appavattikaraṇanti atthassa sambhavato
anya-e0103n:1438_0: Pubbe anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ attano pharaṇākāreneva
anya-e0103n:1438_2: vā ananta”nti vuttaṃ, sabbaso manasikaraṇavasenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “anavasesato
anya-e0103n:1438_3: manasi karonto ‘ananta’nti manasi karotī”ti. Jhānavibhaṅgepi ayamevattho vuttoti
anya-e0103n:1438_4: dassento “yaṃ pana vibhaṅge vutta”ntiādimāha. Tassā pāḷiyā evaṃ vā attho veditabbo
anya-e0103n:1438_5: – taṃyeva ākāsaṃ phuṭaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaviññāṇena manasi karotīti. Ayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1438_6: panattho yutto viya dissati, taṃyeva ākāsaṃ viññāṇena phuṭaṃ tena gahitākāraṃ manasi
anya-e0103n:1438_7: karoti. Evaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ pharatīti. Yaṃ hi ākāsaṃ paṭhamāruppasamaṅgī viññāṇena
anya-e0103n:1438_8: anantaṃ pharati, taṃ pharaṇākārasahitameva viññāṇaṃ manasi karonto dutiyāruppasamaṅgī
anya-e0103n:1439_0: Manasikāravasena anantapharaṇākārena idha anantatā, na ākāsassa viya uppādantādiabhāvenāti
anya-e0103n:1439_2: padassa atthe viññāṇañca-saddo niruḷhoti dasseti, yathāvuttaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ dutiyāruppajjhānena
anya-e0103n:1439_3: añcīyati vuttākārena ālambīyatīti viññāṇañcanti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1441_0: 283. Tatiyāruppakammaṭṭhāne yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ, taṃ vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1441_1: apubbameva vaṇṇayissāma. Tattha tassevāti yaṃ ārabbha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pavattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1441_2: tasseva. Kiṃ pana tanti āha “ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇassā”ti. Etena tato aññaṃ tatiyāruppajjhānassa
anya-e0103n:1441_3: ārammaṇaṃ natthīti dasseti. “Ārammaṇabhūtassā”ti iminā tassa anārammaṇabhūtaṃ dutiyāruppaviññāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1441_4: nivatteti. Abhāvoti natthitā. Suññatāti rittatā. Vivittākāroti viveko. Tīhi padehi
anya-e0103n:1441_5: paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa apagamameva vadati. “Manasi kātabbo”ti vatvā manasikāravidhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1441_6: dassetuṃ “taṃ viññāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha amanasikaritvāti sabbena sabbaṃ manasi
anya-e0103n:1441_7: akatvā acintetvā. Vā-saddo aniyamattho, tena tīsu pakāresu ekenapi atthasiddhīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1442_0: Tasmiṃ nimitteti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvasaṅkhāte jhānuppattinimitte.
anya-e0103n:1442_1: Ākāse phuṭeti ākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte. “Ākāsaphuṭe”ti vā pāṭho. Suññavivittanatthibhāveti
anya-e0103n:1442_2: suññabhāve, vivittabhāve, natthibhāve cāti yena ākārena bhāvitaṃ, tassa gahaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1442_3: vuttaṃ. Atha vā suññavivittanatthibhāveti suññavivittatāsaṅkhāte natthibhāve, tena
anya-e0103n:1443_0: Tasmiṃ hi appanācitteti ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānasampayutte appanāvasena pavatte citte,
anya-e0103n:1443_1: tasmiṃ vā paṭhamāruppassa apagamasaṅkhāte natthibhāve yathāvutte appanācitte uppanne.
anya-e0103n:1443_2: So bhikkhu abhāvameva passanto viharatīti sambandho. Puriso katthaci gantvā āgantvā
anya-e0103n:1443_3: suññameva passati, natthibhāvameva passatīti yojanā. Taṃ ṭhānanti taṃ sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1443_5: na naṭṭhattāti dasseti. Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – yathā so puriso tattha sannipatitaṃ
anya-e0103n:1443_6: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā gato, tato sabbesu bhikkhūsu kenacideva karaṇīyena apagatesu
anya-e0103n:1443_7: āgantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhikkhūhi suññameva passati, na bhikkhūnaṃ tatopi apagatakāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1443_8: evamayaṃ yogāvacaro pubbe viññāṇañcāyatanajjhānacakkhunā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ disvā
anya-e0103n:1443_9: pacchā natthīti parikammamanasikārena tasmiṃ apagate tatiyāruppajjhānacakkhunā tassa
anya-e0103n:1443_10: natthibhāvameva passanto viharati, na tassa apagamanakāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisābhogābhāvatoti.
anya-e0103n:1443_11: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1444_0: 284. Natthitā pariyāyāsuññavivittabhāvāti “natthī”ti padassa atthaṃ vadantena suññavivittapadānipi
anya-e0103n:1444_1: gahitāni. Āmeḍitavacanaṃ pana bhāvanākāradassanaṃ. Vibhaṅgepi imassa padassa ayamevattho
anya-e0103n:1444_2: vuttoti dassetuṃ “yampi vibhaṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha taññeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetīti
anya-e0103n:1444_3: yaṃ pubbe “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti manasi kataṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ, taṃyevāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1444_4: Taṃyeva hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ paṭhamena viya rūpanimittaṃ tatiyenāruppenābhāvetīti. Khayato
anya-e0103n:1444_5: sammasananti bhaṅgānupassanamāha. Sā hi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ bhaṅgābhāvameva passantī
anya-e0103n:1444_7: viya vutta”nti. Assāti pāṭhassa. Puna assāti viññāṇassa. Abhāvetīti abhāvaṃ karoti.
anya-e0103n:1444_8: Yathā ñāṇassa na upatiṭṭhati, evaṃ karoti amanasikaraṇato. Tato eva vibhāveti vigatabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1444_9: karoti, vināseti vā yathā na dissati, tathā karaṇato. Teneva antaradhāpeti tirobhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1444_10: gameti. Na aññathāti imissā pāḷiyā evamattho, na ito aññathā ayujjamānakattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1445_0: Assāti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvassa. Kiñcananti kiñcipi. Sabhāvadhammassa appāvasesatā
anya-e0103n:1445_1: nāma bhaṅgo eva siyāti āha “bhaṅgamattampi assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthī”ti. Sati hi bhaṅgamattepi
anya-e0103n:1445_2: tassa sakiñcanatā siyā. Akiñcananti ca viññāṇassa kiñci pakāraṃ aggahetvā sabbena
anya-e0103n:1447_0: 285. No ca santāti yathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā
anya-e0103n:1447_1: savisesā santā, evamayaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti no ca santā tadabhāvato. Yā ayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1447_2: khandhesu paccayayāpanīyatāya, rogamūlatāya ca rogasarikkhatā, dukkhatāsūlayogādinā
anya-e0103n:1447_3: gaṇḍasarikkhatā, pīḷājananādinā sallasarikkhatā ca, sā saññāya sati hoti, nāsatīti
anya-e0103n:1447_4: vuttaṃ “saññā rogo, saññā gaṇḍo, saññā salla”nti. Sā cettha paṭukiccā pañcavokārabhavato
anya-e0103n:1447_5: oḷārikasaññā veditabbā. Na kevalaṃ saññā eva, atha kho vedanācetanādīnampi saṅgaho
anya-e0103n:1447_6: daṭṭhabbo. Saññāsīsena pana niddeso kato. Etaṃ santanti etaṃ asantabhāvakararogādisarikkhasaññāvirahato
anya-e0103n:1447_7: santaṃ. Tato eva paṇītaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti āha “nevasaññānāsaññā”ti? Tadapadesena taṃsampayuttajjhānamāha
anya-e0103n:1447_8: “ādīnava”nti. Ettha rogādisarikkhasaññādisabbhāvopi ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo, na āsannaviññāṇañcāyatanapaccatthikatāva.
anya-e0103n:1447_9: Uparīti catutthāruppe. Sā vāti sā eva. Vattitāti pavattitā nibbattitā vaḷañjitā.
anya-e0103n:1448_0: Tasmiṃ nimitteti tasmiṃ tatiyāruppasamāpattisaṅkhāte jhānanimitte. Mānasanti cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1448_1: “mano eva mānasa”nti katvā, bhāvanāmanasikāraṃ vā. Taṃ hi manasi bhavanti mānasanti
anya-e0103n:1449_0: 286. Yathāvuttaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvato āyatanaṃ kāraṇamassāti jhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1449_1: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, ākiñcaññameva ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ jhānassa kāraṇanti ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1449_2: ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1450_0: Yāya saññāya bhāvatoti yādisāya saññāya atthibhāvena. Yā hi sā paṭusaññākiccassa
anya-e0103n:1450_1: abhāvato saññātipi na vattabbā, saññāsabhāvānātivattanato asaññātipi na vattabbā,
anya-e0103n:1450_2: tassā vijjamānattāti attho. Tanti taṃ jhānaṃ. Taṃ tāva dassetunti ettha tanti taṃ
anya-e0103n:1450_3: sasāpaṭipadaṃ, yathāvuttasaññaṃ, tassā ca adhigamupāyanti attho. Nevasaññīnāsaññīti
anya-e0103n:1450_4: hi puggalādhiṭṭhānena dhammaṃ uddharantena saññāvantamukhena saññā uddhaṭā, aññathā
anya-e0103n:1450_5: nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti uddharitabbaṃ siyā. Sā pana paṭipadā yattha pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1450_6: yathā ca pavattati, taṃ dassetuṃ “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ
anya-e0103n:1450_7: bhāvetī”ti vuttaṃ. Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ hi catutthāruppabhāvanāya pavattiṭṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti
anya-e0103n:1450_8: pavattiākāroti. Yatra hi nāmāti yā nāma. Natthibhāvampīti viññāṇassa suññatampi,
anya-e0103n:1450_9: evaṃ sukhumampīti adhippāyo. Santārammaṇatāyāti santaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etissāti santārammaṇā,
anya-e0103n:1450_10: tabbhāvo santārammaṇatā, tāya, na jhānasantatāya. Na hi tatiyāruppasamāpatti catutthāruppajjhānato santā.
anya-e0103n:1451_0: Codako “yaṃ santato manasi karoti, na tattha ādīnavadassanaṃ bhaveyya. Asati ca ādīnavadassane
anya-e0103n:1451_1: samatikkamo eva na siyā”ti dassento “santato ce manasi karoti, kathaṃ samatikkamo
anya-e0103n:1451_2: hotī”ti āha. Itaro “asamāpajjitukāmatāyā”ti parihāramāha, tena ādīnavadassanampi
anya-e0103n:1451_3: atthevāti dasseti. So hītiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Tattha yasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1451_4: jhāne abhirati, tattha āvajjanasamāpajjanādipaṭipattiyā bhavitabbaṃ. Sā panassa tatiyāruppe
anya-e0103n:1451_5: sabbaso natthi, kevalaṃ aññābhāvato ārammaṇakaraṇamattamevāti dassento “kiñcāpī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1452_0: Samatikkamitvāva gacchatīti tesaṃ sippīnaṃ jīvikaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno te vītivattatiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1452_1: Soti yogāvacaro. Tanti tatiyāruppasamāpattiṃ. Pubbe vuttanayenāti “santā vatāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1452_2: samāpattī”tiādinā vuttena nayena santato manasi karonto. Tanti yāya nevasaññīnāsaññī
anya-e0103n:1452_3: nāma hoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ bhāvetīti vuccati, taṃ saññaṃ pāpuṇātīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1452_4: Saññāsīsena hi desanā. Paramasukhumanti ukkaṃsagatasukhumabhāvaṃ. Saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattinti
anya-e0103n:1452_6: Antamaticca accantaṃ. Yato sukhumatamaṃ nāma natthi, tathāparamukkaṃsagatasukhumasaṅkhāranti
anya-e0103n:1452_7: attho. Paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya hi tacchantiyā viya pavattamānāya bhāvanāya
anya-e0103n:1452_8: anukkamena saṅkhārā tattha antimakoṭṭhāsataṃ pāpitā, tato paraṃ nirodho eva, na saṅkhārappavattīti.
anya-e0103n:1453_0: 287. Yaṃ taṃ catukkhandhaṃ. Atthatoti kusalādivisesavisiṭṭhaparamatthato. Visesato
anya-e0103n:1453_1: adhipaññāsikkhāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “idha samāpannassa cittacetasikā
anya-e0103n:1453_2: dhammā adhippetā”ti. Oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvatoti yadipi catutthāruppavipākasaññāya
anya-e0103n:1453_3: catutthāruppakusalasaññā oḷārikā, tathā vipassanāmaggaphalasaññāhi, tathāpi oḷārikasukhumatā
anya-e0103n:1453_4: nāma upādāyupādāya gahetabbāti pañcavokārabhavapariyāpannāya viya catuvokārepi heṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:1453_5: tīsu bhūmīsu saññāya viya oḷārikāya abhāvato. Sukhumāyāti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā
anya-e0103n:1453_6: sukhumāya saññāya bhāvato vijjamānattā. Nevasaññāti ettha na-kāro abhāvattho, nāsaññanti
anya-e0103n:1453_7: ettha na-kāro aññattho, a-kāro abhāvatthova, asaññaṃ anasaññañcāti attho. Pariyāpannattāti
anya-e0103n:1453_8: ekadesabhāvena antogadhattā. Etthāti catutthāruppe. Dutiye atthavikappe nevasaññāti
anya-e0103n:1453_9: ettha na-kāro aññattho. Tathā nāsaññāti ettha na-kāro, a-kāro ca aññattho evāti tena
anya-e0103n:1453_10: dvayena saññābhāvo eva dassitoti dhammāyatanapariyāpannatāya āyatanabhāvo vuttovāti
anya-e0103n:1454_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ, yenettha saññāva edisī jātāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “na kevala”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:1454_1: Saññāsīsenāyaṃ desanā katā “nānattakāyā nānattasaññino”tiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1454_2: Evaṃ esa atthoti kañci visesaṃ upādāya sabhāvato atthīti vattabbasseva dhammassa
anya-e0103n:1454_3: kañci visesaṃ upādāya natthīti vattabbatāsaṅkhāto attho.
anya-e0103n:1455: Atithokampi yaṃ telamatthi bhanteti āha akappiyabhāvaṃ upādāya, tadeva natthi, bhante, telanti āha nāḷipūraṇaṃ upādāya. Tenāha “tattha yathā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1456_0: Yadi ārammaṇasañjānanaṃ saññākiccaṃ, taṃ saññā samānā kathamayaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti
anya-e0103n:1456_2: kātuṃ na sakkoti, tato eva ca ñāṇassa sugayhāpi na hoti. Tenāha “nibbidājananampi
anya-e0103n:1456_3: kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti. Akatābhinivesoti akatavipassanābhiniveso appavattitasammasanacāro.
anya-e0103n:1456_4: Pakativipassakoti pakatiyā vipassako. Khandhādimukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā dvārālambanehi
anya-e0103n:1456_5: saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammānaṃ vipassako sakkuṇeyya tabbisayaudayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ,
anya-e0103n:1456_6: yathā pana sakkoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “sopī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kalāpasammasanavasenevāti catutthāruppacittuppādapariyāpanne
anya-e0103n:1456_7: phassādidhamme avinibbhujja ekato gahetvā kalāpato samūhato sammasanavasena nayavipassanāsaṅkhātakalāpasammasanavasena.
anya-e0103n:1456_8: Phassādidhamme vinibbhujjitvā visuṃ visuṃ sarūpato gahetvā aniccādivasena sammasanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1456_9: anupadadhammavipassanā. Evaṃ sukhumattaṃ gatā yathā dhammasenāpatināpi nāma anupadaṃ
anya-e0103n:1457_0: Therassāti aññatarassa therassa. Aññāhipīti ettha ayamaparā upamā – eko kira brāhmaṇo
anya-e0103n:1457_1: aññataraṃ purisaṃ manuññaṃ mattikabhājanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā yāci “dehi me imaṃ
anya-e0103n:1457_2: bhājana”nti. So surāsittataṃ sandhāya “nāyyo sakkā dātuṃ, surā ettha atthī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1457_3: Brāhmaṇo attano samīpe ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ uddissa āha “tena hi imassa pātuṃ dehī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1457_4: Itaro “natthayyo”ti āha. Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa ayogyabhāvaṃ upādāya “atthī”tipi
anya-e0103n:1457_5: vattabbaṃ, pātabbatāya tattha abhāvato “natthī”tipi vattabbaṃ jātaṃ, evaṃ idhāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1458_0: Kasmā panettha yathā heṭṭhā “ananto ākāso, anantaṃ viññāṇaṃ, natthi kiñcī”ti tattha
anya-e0103n:1458_1: tattha bhāvanākāro gahito, evaṃ koci bhāvanākāro na gahitoti? Keci tāva āhu – “bhāvanākāro
anya-e0103n:1458_2: nāma sopacārassa jhānassa yathāsakaṃ ārammaṇe pavattiākāro, ārammaṇañcettha ākiñcaññāyatanadhammā.
anya-e0103n:1458_3: Te pana gayhamānā ekassa vā pubbaṅgamadhammassa vasena gahetabbā siyuṃ, sabbe eva
anya-e0103n:1458_4: vā. Tattha paṭhamapakkhe viññāṇassa gahaṇaṃ āpannanti ‘viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa’nti manasikāre
anya-e0103n:1458_5: catutthāruppassa viññāṇañcāyatanabhāvo āpajjati. Dutiyapakkhe pana sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanadhammārammaṇatāya
anya-e0103n:1458_6: jhānassa ‘ākiñcaññaṃ ākiñcañña’nti manasikāre ākiñcaññāyatanatā vā siyā, abhāvārammaṇatā
anya-e0103n:1458_7: vā. Sabbathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhāvo na labbhatī”ti. Tadidamakāraṇaṃ tathā jhānassa
anya-e0103n:1458_8: appavattanato. Na hi catutthāruppabhāvanā viññāṇamākiñcaññaṃ vā āmasantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1459_0: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “santa”nti na gahitanti? Kiñcāpi na gahitataṃ sutte, vibhaṅge
anya-e0103n:1459_1: pana gahitameva. Yathāha – “taññeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ
anya-e0103n:1459_2: bhāvetī”ti. Atha kasmā vibhaṅge viya sutte bhāvanākāro na gahitoti? Veneyyajjhāsayato,
anya-e0103n:1459_3: desanāvilāsato ca. Ye hi veneyyā yathā heṭṭhā tīsu āruppesu “ananto ākāso, anantaṃ
anya-e0103n:1459_4: viññāṇaṃ, natthi kiñcī”ti bhāvanākāro gahito, evaṃ aggahite eva tasmiṃ tamatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1459_5: paṭivijjhanti, tesaṃ vasena sutte tathā desanā katā, suttantagatikāva abhidhamme
anya-e0103n:1459_6: suttantabhājanīye uddesadesanā. Ye pana veneyyā vibhajitvā vutteyeva tasmiṃ tamatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1459_7: paṭivijjhanti, tesaṃ vasena vibhaṅge bhāvanākāro vutto. Dhammissaro pana bhagavā
anya-e0103n:1459_8: sammāsambuddho dhammānaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ jānanto katthaci bhāvanākāraṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n:1459_9: katthaci bhāvanākāraṃ na gaṇhāti. Sā ca desanā yāvadeva veneyyavinayatthāti ayamettha
anya-e0103n:1459_10: desanāvilāso. Suttantadesanā vā pariyāyakathāti tattha bhāvanākāro na gahito, abhidhammadesanā
anya-e0103n:1459_11: pana nippariyāyakathāti tattha bhāvanākāro gahitoti evampettha bhāvanākārassa gahaṇe,
anya-e0103n:1460_0: Apare pana bhaṇanti – “catutthāruppe visesadassanatthaṃ sutte bhāvanākārassa aggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1460_1: svāyaṃ viseso anupubbabhāvanājanito. Sā ca anupubbabhāvanā pahānakkamopajanitā pahātabbasamatikkamena
anya-e0103n:1460_3: rūpāvacarajjhānāni desitāni, rūpasaññādisamatikkamamukhena arūpajjhānāni. Na kevalañca
anya-e0103n:1460_4: jhānāniyeva, atha kho sabbampi sīlaṃ, sabbāpi paññā paṭipakkhadhammappahānavaseneva
anya-e0103n:1460_6: “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”tiādinā sīlasaṃvaro, “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā
anya-e0103n:1460_7: na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī”tiādinā indriyasaṃvaro, “neva davāya na madāyā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1460_8: bhojane mattaññutā, “idha bhikkhu micchājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappetī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1460_9: ājīvapārisuddhi, “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā”tiādinā jāgariyānuyogo,
anya-e0103n:1460_11: saṇṭhāti, anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ gacchati, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ
anya-e0103n:1460_12: paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1460_13: paññā paṭipakkhadhammappahānavaseneva desitā. Tasmā jhānāni desento bhagavā “vivicceva
anya-e0103n:1460_16: yathā rūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvanāvisesādhigatehi vitakkādīhi viya saddhādīhipi
anya-e0103n:1460_17: tikkhavisadasūrasabhāvehi dhammehi samannāgatattā kāmacchandādīnaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ, tadekaṭṭhānañca
anya-e0103n:1460_19: santaṃ, paṇītañca hoti; dutiyajjhānādīni pana bhāvanāvisesena oḷārikaṅgappahānato
anya-e0103n:1460_23: Ārammaṇasantabhāvenāpi hi tadārammaṇadhammā santasabhāvā honti, seyyathāpi lokuttaradhammārammaṇā dhammā.
anya-e0103n:1461_0: Satipi dhammato, mahaggatabhāvenāpi ca abhede rūpāvacaracatutthato āruppaṃ aṅgatopi
anya-e0103n:1461_1: santameva, yatassa santavimokkhatā vuttā. Dutiyāruppādīni pana paṭhamāruppādito aṅgato,
anya-e0103n:1461_4: tassa tassa jhānassa santasukhumabhāvaṃ āpādento catutthāruppe saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1461_5: pāpeti. Yato catutthāruppaṃ yathā anupadadhammavipassanāvasena vipassanāya ārammaṇabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1461_6: upagantvā pakativipassakassāpi nibbiduppattiyā paccayo na hoti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattito,
anya-e0103n:1461_7: tathā sayaṃ tatiyāruppadhammesu pavattamānaṃ te yāthāvato vibhāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n:1461_8: yathā tadaññajjhānāni attano ārammaṇaṃ. Kevalaṃ pana ārabbha pavattimattamevassa
anya-e0103n:1461_9: tattha hoti, tayidaṃ ārammaṇabhāvenāpi nāma vibhūtākāratāya ṭhātuṃ appahontaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇe
anya-e0103n:1461_10: kiṃ pahoti. Tasmā tadassa avibhūtakiccataṃ disvā satthā heṭṭhā tīsu ṭhānesu bhāvanākāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1461_11: vatvā tādiso idha na labbhatīti dīpetuṃ catutthāruppadesanāyaṃ sutte bhāvanākāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1462_0: Yasmā pana sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇe pavattiākāro atthevāti atisukhumabhāvappattaṃ
anya-e0103n:1462_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “taṃyeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karotī”ti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ yathādhammasāsanabhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1462_2: pubbabhāgavasena vā vibhaṅge “santato manasi karotī”ti vuttaṃ tadā yogino tassa vibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1462_3: Appanāvasena pana sutte bhāvanākāro na gahito avibhūtabhāvato. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ hi kiñci
anya-e0103n:1462_4: ādito avibhūtaṃ hoti, yathā taṃ? Buddhānussatiādi. Kiñci majjhe, yathā taṃ? Ānāpānassati.
anya-e0103n:1462_5: Kiñci ubhayattha, yathā taṃ? Upasamānussatiādi. Catutthāruppakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana pariyosāne
anya-e0103n:1462_6: avibhūtaṃ bhāvanāya matthakappattiyaṃ ārammaṇassa avibhūtabhāvato. Tasmā catutthāruppe
anya-e0103n:1462_7: imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ satthārā sutte bhāvanākāro na gahito, na sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvatoti
anya-e0103n:1464_1: rūpaguṇehi aññehi asādhāraṇarūpakāyo, sabhāvattho vā rūpa-saddo “yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ
anya-e0103n:1464_2: sātarūpa”ntiādīsu viya. Tasmā asadisarūpoti asadisasabhāvo, tena dasabalacatuvesārajjādiguṇavisesasamāyogadīpanato
anya-e0103n:1464_3: satthu dhammakāyasampattiyāpi asadisatā dassitā hoti. Itīti evaṃ vuttappakārena.
anya-e0103n:1464_4: Tasminti āruppe. Pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyāti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ tattha tattha
anya-e0103n:1464_5: jhāne patiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā sādhāraṇabhāvato tattha tattheva pakiṇṇakaṃ
anya-e0103n:1464_6: visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.
anya-e0103n:1465_3: hi tasseva vibhāvanaṃ hoti. Dutiyāruppaviññāṇavibhāvane hi tadeva atikkantaṃ siyā,
anya-e0103n:1465_4: na tassa ārammaṇaṃ, na ca ārammaṇe dosaṃ disvā anārammaṇassa vibhāvanātikkamo yujjati.
anya-e0103n:1465_5: Pāḷiyañca “viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ sato samāpajjati…pe… sato vuṭṭhahitvā taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1465_6: abhāvetī”ti vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “taṃyeva viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ abhāvetī”ti, “taṃyeva abhāvetī”ti
anya-e0103n:1465_7: vā. “Anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajjā”ti ettha pana dvayaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n:1465_8: ārammaṇañca viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanañca. Tasmiṃ dvaye yena kenaci, yato vā vuṭṭhito,
anya-e0103n:1465_9: teneva padhānaniddiṭṭhena taṃ-saddassa sambandhe āpanne “ayañca ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanā”ti
anya-e0103n:1466_0: 290. Evaṃ santepīti aṅgātikkame asatipi. Suppaṇītatarāti suṭṭhu paṇītatarā, sundarā
anya-e0103n:1466_1: paṇītatarā cāti vā attho. Satipi catunnaṃ pāsādatalānaṃ, sāṭikānañca tabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1466_2: pamāṇato ca samabhāve uparūpari pana kāmaguṇānaṃ, sukhasamphassādīnañca visesena
anya-e0103n:1466_3: paṇītatarādibhāvo viya etāsaṃ catunnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ āruppabhāvato, aṅgato ca satipi
anya-e0103n:1466_4: samabhāve bhāvanāvisesasiddho pana sātisayo uparūpari paṇītatarādibhāvoti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1467_0: 291. Nissitoti nissāya ṭhito. Duṭṭhitāti na sammā ṭhitā, dukkhaṃ vā ṭhitā. Tannissitanti
anya-e0103n:1467_1: tena nissitaṃ, ṭhānanti attho. Tannissitanti vā taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissāya
anya-e0103n:1467_2: ṭhitaṃ purisanti attho. Maṇḍapalaggañhi anissāya tena vinābhūte vivitte bahi okāse
anya-e0103n:1467_3: ṭhānaṃ viya ākāsalaggaviññāṇassa viveke tadapagame tatiyāruppassa ṭhānanti.
anya-e0103n:1468_1: no ca santa”nti ca diṭṭhādīnavampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ idaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1468_2: aññassa tādisassa ārammaṇabhāvayogyassa abhāvena alābhena ārammaṇaṃ karoti eva. “Sabbadisampati”nti
anya-e0103n:1468_3: idaṃ janassa agatikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Vuttinti jīvikaṃ. Vattatīti jīvati.
anya-e0103n:1469_0: 293. Āruḷhotiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā koci puriso anekaporisaṃ dīghanisseṇiṃ
anya-e0103n:1469_1: āruḷho tassa uparimapade ṭhito tassā nisseṇiyā bāhumeva olubbhati aññassa alābhato,
anya-e0103n:1469_2: yathā ca paṃsupabbatassa, missakapabbatassa vā aggakoṭiṃ āruḷho tassa matthakameva
anya-e0103n:1469_3: olubbhati, yathā ca giriṃ silāpabbataṃ āruḷho paripphandamāno aññābhāvato attano
anya-e0103n:1469_4: jaṇṇukameva olubbhati, tathā etaṃ catutthāruppajjhānaṃ taṃ tatiyāruppaṃ olubbhitvā
anya-e0103n:1469_5: pavattatīti. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ uttānameva.
anya-e0103n:1474_0: 294. Uddeso nāma niddesattho mudumajjhimapaññābāhullato, āgato ca bhāro avassaṃ vahitabboti
anya-e0103n:1474_1: āha “ekā saññāti evaṃ uddiṭṭhāya āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāya bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto”ti.
anya-e0103n:1474_2: Tatthāyaṃ saññā-saddo “rūpasaññā saddasaññā”tiādīsu sañjānanalakkhaṇe dhamme āgato,
anya-e0103n:1474_4: vā ime dhammā ekatthā udāhu nānatthā”tiādīsu samathe āgato. Idha pana samathassa
anya-e0103n:1474_5: parikamme daṭṭhabbo. Āhāre hi paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇaṃ, tappabhāvitaṃ vā upacārajjhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1474_6: idha “āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā”ti adhippetaṃ. Tattha yasmiṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā bhāvetabbā,
anya-e0103n:1474_7: tattha nibbedavirāguppādanāya tappasaṅgena sabbampi āhāraṃ kiccappabhedādīnavopammehi
anya-e0103n:1475_0: Tattha āharatīti āhārapaccayasaṅkhātena uppattiyā, ṭhitiyā vā paccayabhāvena attano
anya-e0103n:1475_1: phalaṃ āneti nibbatteti pavatteti cāti attho. Kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro, vatthuvasena
anya-e0103n:1475_2: cetaṃ vuttaṃ, lakkhaṇato pana ojālakkhaṇo veditabbo, kabaḷīkāro ca so yathāvuttenatthena
anya-e0103n:1475_3: āhāro cāti kabaḷīkārāhāro. Esa nayo sesesupi. Phusatīti phasso. Ayaṃ hi arūpadhammopi
anya-e0103n:1475_4: samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattati. Tathā hi so phusanalakkhaṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1475_5: Cetayatīti cetanā, attano sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃ ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho,
anya-e0103n:1475_6: manosannissitā cetanā manosañcetanā. Upapattiparikappanavasena vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1475_7: Evamettha sāmaññatthato, visesatthato ca āhārā veditabbā. Kasmā panete cattārova
anya-e0103n:1475_8: vuttā, aññe dhammā kiṃ attano phalassa paccayā na hontīti? No na honti, ime pana
anya-e0103n:1475_9: tathā ca honti aññathā cāti samānepi paccayabhāve atirekapaccayā honti, tasmā āhārāti vuccanti.
anya-e0103n:1476_0: Kathaṃ? Etesu hi paṭhamo sayaṃ yasmiṃ kalāpe tappariyāpannānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayo
anya-e0103n:1476_1: hontova ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharati, dutiyo tisso vedanā āharati, tatiyo tīsu bhavesu
anya-e0103n:1476_2: paṭisandhiṃ āharati, catuttho paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ āharati. Tenāha “kabaḷīkārāhāro”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1476_3: Ettha ca kammajādibhedabhinnā ojā sati paccayalābhe dve tisso paveṇiyo ghaṭentī ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ
anya-e0103n:1476_4: āharati, sukhavedanīyādibhedabhinno phassāhāro yathārahaṃ tisso vedanā āharati, puññābhisaṅkhārādibhedabhinno
anya-e0103n:1476_5: manosañcetanāhāro kāmabhavādīsu tīsu bhavesu yathārahaṃ saviññāṇaṃ, aviññāṇañca paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1476_6: āharati, viññāṇāhāro yathāpaccayaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmaṃ rūpaṃ, nāmarūpañca āharatīti
anya-e0103n:1476_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā upatthambhakaṭṭhena ime eva dhammā āhārāti vuttā. Yathā hi kabaḷīkārāhāro
anya-e0103n:1476_8: rūpakāyassa upatthambhakaṭṭhena paccayo, evaṃ arūpino āhārā sampayuttadhammānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1476_9: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo, arūpino
anya-e0103n:1476_10: āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1476_11: Aparo nayo – ajjhattikasantatiyā visesapaccayattā kabaḷīkārāhāro, phassādayo ca tayo
anya-e0103n:1476_12: dhammā āhārāti vuttā. Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa
anya-e0103n:1476_13: kabaḷīkārāhāro, nāmakāye vedanāya phasso, viññāṇassa manosañcetanā, nāmarūpassa viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1476_14: Yathāha “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:1476_15: anāhāro no tiṭṭhati. Tathā phassapaccayā vedanā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti.
anya-e0103n:1477_0: Kabaḷīkārāhāreti kabaḷīkāre āhāre nikanti taṇhā, taṃ bhayaṃ anatthāvahato. Gadhitassa
anya-e0103n:1477_1: hi āhāraparibhogo anatthāya hoti. Hetuatthe bhummaṃ. Evaṃ sesesu. Nikantīti nikāmanā
anya-e0103n:1477_2: chandarāgo. Bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ, nikanti eva bhayaṃ nikantibhayaṃ. Kabaḷīkārāhārahetu
anya-e0103n:1477_3: imesaṃ sattānaṃ chandarāgo bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādibhedassa anatthassa
anya-e0103n:1477_4: sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa hetubhāvato. Tenevāha “kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre
anya-e0103n:1477_5: atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷha”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:1477_6: Upagamanaṃ appahīnavipallāsassa ārammaṇena samodhānaṃ saṅgati sukhavedanīyādiphassuppatti
anya-e0103n:1477_7: bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ tīhi dukkhatāhi aparimuccanato. Tenāha “sukhavedanīyaṃ, bhikkhave,
anya-e0103n:1477_8: phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhā vedanā, tassa vedanāpaccayā taṇhā…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa
anya-e0103n:1477_9: samudayo hotī”ti. Tattha tattha bhave upapajjati etenāti upapatti, upapajjanaṃ vā
anya-e0103n:1477_10: upapatti, khipanaṃ bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ upapattimūlakehi byasanehi aparimuttato. Tenāha
anya-e0103n:1477_11: “avidvā, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo puññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, puññupagaṃ bhavati
anya-e0103n:1477_12: viññāṇaṃ. Apuññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, apuññupagaṃ bhavati viññāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:1477_13: Paṭisandhīti bhavantarādīhi paṭisandhānaṃ, taṃ bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ paṭisandhinimittehi
anya-e0103n:1477_14: dukkhehi avimuccanato. Tenāha “viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī,
anya-e0103n:1477_15: atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷha”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:1478_0: Puttamaṃsūpamena ovādena dīpetabbo nicchandarāgaparibhogāya. Evaṃ hi tattha nikantibhayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1478_1: na hoti. Niccammā gāvī yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchati, tattha tattheva naṃ pāṇino khādantiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1478_2: Evaṃ phasse sati vedanā uppajjati, vedanā ca dukkhasallādito daṭṭhabbāti phasse ādīnavaṃ
anya-e0103n:1478_3: passantassa upagamanabhayaṃ na hotīti āha “phassāhāro niccammagāvūpamena dīpetabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1478_4: Ekādasahi aggīhi sabbaso ādittā bhavā aṅgārakāsusadisāti passato upapattibhayaṃ na
anya-e0103n:1478_5: hotīti āha “manosañcetanāhāro aṅgārakāsūpamena dīpetabbo”ti. Corasadisaṃ viññāṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1478_6: anatthapātato, pahārasadisī vedanā duradhivāsatoti sammadeva passato paṭisandhibhayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1479_0: Evaṃ kiccādimukhena āhāresu ādīnavaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni tattha yathādhippetaṃ āhāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1479_1: niddhāretvā paṭikkūlato manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “imesu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upādāyarūpaniddesepi
anya-e0103n:1479_3: bhūtakathanaṃ vā etaṃ. Tattha asitapītakhāyitasāyitappabhedoti asitabbapātabbakhāyitabbasāyitabbavibhāgo
anya-e0103n:1479_4: kālabhedavacanicchāya abhāvato yathā “duddha”nti. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro vāti avadhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1479_5: yathā phassāhārādinivattanaṃ, evaṃ ojāhāranivattanampi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Savatthuko eva
anya-e0103n:1479_6: hi āhāro idha kammaṭṭhānabhūto, tena āharīyatīti āhāroti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1479_7: Āharatīti āhāroti ayaṃ panattho nibbattitaojāvasena veditabbo. Imasmiṃ attheti imasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1479_8: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte atthe. Uppannā saññāti saññāsīsena bhāvanaṃ vadati. Tathā hi
anya-e0103n:1480_0: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyattidhammato, atthato ca suggahitaṃ sumanasikataṃ
anya-e0103n:1480_1: sūpadhāritaṃ katvā. Tenāha “uggahato ekapadampi avirajjhantenā”ti. Tattha uggahatoti
anya-e0103n:1480_2: ācariyuggahato. Ekapadampīti ekampi padaṃ, ekakoṭṭhāsampi vā, padesamattampīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1480_3: Dasahākārehīti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu antimajīvikābhāvato, piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesu
anya-e0103n:1480_5: evamādīhipi ākārehi āhāre paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā? Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “antamidaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1480_6: bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ, abhisāpoyaṃ, bhikkhave, lokasmiṃ ‘piṇḍolo
anya-e0103n:1480_7: vicarasi pattapāṇī”’ti, “aladdhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ paritassati, laddhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0103n:1480_8: gadhito mucchito ajjhosanno anādīnavadassāvī anissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatī”ti, “bhutto
anya-e0103n:1480_9: ca āhāro kassaci kadāci maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ āvahati, ukkocakādayo,
anya-e0103n:1480_10: takkoṭakādayo ca dvattiṃsa dvattiṃsa kulappabhedā kimayo ca naṃ upanissāya jīvantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1481_1: pageva manasi kātabbo “māhaṃ chavālātasadiso bhaveyya”nti. Tathā piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesupi
anya-e0103n:1481_3: tadabhāvato. Bhattasammado anekantiko, paribhogantogadho vā veditabbo. Kimikulasaṃvaddhanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1481_4: pana na saṅgahetabbaṃ, saṅgahitameva vā “dasahākārehī”ti ettha niyamassa akatattā.
anya-e0103n:1481_5: Iminā vā nayena itaresampettha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yathāsambhavamettha paṭikkūlatāpaccavekkhaṇassa
anya-e0103n:1481_6: adhippetattā. Tathā hi gharagoḷikavaccamūsikajatukavaccādikaṃ sambhavantaṃ gahitaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1481_7: na ekantikanti. Tathā pariyesanādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1482_0: Gamanatotiādīsu paccāgamanampi gamanasabhāgattā gamaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. Paṭikkamanasālādiupasaṅkamanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1482_2: Gamanatoti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. Pariyesanatoti gocaragāme
anya-e0103n:1482_3: bhikkhatthaṃ āhiṇḍanato. Paribhogatoti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. Ubhayaṃ ubhayena
anya-e0103n:1482_4: āsayati, ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0103n:1482_5: asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo, āmāsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pittādiko.
anya-e0103n:1482_6: Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro, tato āsayato. Nidadhāti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā
anya-e0103n:1482_7: tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo, tato nidhānato. Aparipakkatoti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena
anya-e0103n:1482_8: kammajatejena aparipakkato. Paripakkatoti yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipakkabhāvato.
