anya-e0103n:1482_9: Phalatoti nibbattito. Nissandatoti ito cito ca vissandanato. Sammakkhanatoti sabbaso
anya-e0103n:1482_10: makkhanato. Sabbattha āhāre paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbāti yojanā. Taṃtaṃkiriyānipphattipaṭipāṭivasena
anya-e0103n:1482_11: cāyaṃ gamanatotiādikā anupubbī ṭhapitā, sammakkhanaṃ pana paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi
anya-e0103n:1482_12: nissandavasena visesato paṭikkūlanti sabbapacchā ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1483_0: 295. Evaṃ mahānubhāveti idāni vattabbapaṭipattiyā mahānubhāveti vadanti, sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānapariharaṇādisiddhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1483_1: vā dhammasudhammataṃ purakkhatvā yogāvacarena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti dassento “evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1483_2: mahānubhāve nāma sāsane”tiādimāha. Tattha nāma-saddo sambhāvane daṭṭhabbo. Pabbajitena
anya-e0103n:1483_3: gāmābhimukhena gantabbanti yojanā. Ayañca gamanādito paccavekkhaṇā yogino na attuddesikāva,
anya-e0103n:1483_4: atha kho anuddesikāpīti dassento “sakalaratti”ntiādinā dhuradvayaṃ pariggahesi. Pariveṇanti
anya-e0103n:1483_5: pariveṇaṅgaṇaṃ. Vīsatiṃsavāreti ettha santatipaccuppannavasena vāraparicchedoti keci,
anya-e0103n:1483_6: apare pana “uṇhāsanenā”ti vadanti. Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanañhi appattā bhāvanā pharaṇapītiyā
anya-e0103n:1483_7: abhāvato nisajjāvasena kāyakilamathaṃ na vinodatiyevāti iriyāpathacalanaṃ hotiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1483_8: Vīsatiṃsaggahaṇaṃ pana yathāsallakkhitabhikkhācaraṇavelāvasena. Atha vā gamanato
anya-e0103n:1483_9: yāva sammakkhanamanasikāro eko vāro, evaṃ vīsatiṃsavāre kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā.
anya-e0103n:1483_10: Nijanasambādhānīti janasambādharahitāni, tena appākiṇṇataṃ, appasaddataṃ, appanigghosatañca
anya-e0103n:1483_11: dasseti. Tato eva pavivekasukhāni janavivekena iṭṭhāni, pavivekassa vā jhānānuyogassa
anya-e0103n:1483_12: upakārāni. Yasmā chāyūdakasampannāni, tasmā sītalāni. Yasmā sucīni, tasmā ramaṇīyabhūmibhāgānīti
anya-e0103n:1483_13: purimāni dve pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇavacanāni. Ariyanti niddosaṃ. Vivekaratinti jhānānuyogaratiṃ.
anya-e0103n:1484_0: Kiñcāpi yogāvacarānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sujaggitaṃ susammaṭṭhameva hoti, kadāci
anya-e0103n:1484_1: pana jagganato pacchā evampi siyāti paṭikkūlatāpaccavekkhaṇāya sambhavadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1484_3: bhūmiyā chavirakkhaṇatthaṃ attharitabbaṃ cimilikādiattharaṇamāha. Jatukā khuddakavagguliyo.
anya-e0103n:1484_4: Upahatattāti dūsitattā. Tatoti tato tato. Appekadā ulūkapārāvatādīhīti idhāpi “appekadā”ti
anya-e0103n:1484_5: padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Udakacikkhallādīhīti ādi-saddena kacavarādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1485_0: Vitakkamāḷaketi “kattha nu kho ajja bhikkhāya caritabba”ntiādinā vitakkanamāḷake.
anya-e0103n:1485_1: Gāmamagganti gāmagāmimaggaṃ. Khāṇukaṇṭakamaggoti khāṇukaṇṭakavanto maggo. Daṭṭhabbo
anya-e0103n:1486_0: Gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādentenātiādi evamajjhāsayena nivāsanādi kātabbanti vattadassanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1486_1: gaṇḍaroginā vātātapādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādayamānena viya. Atha
anya-e0103n:1486_2: vā gaṇḍaṃ viya gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādayamānenāti ekaṃ gaṇḍa-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:1486_3: bhavati. “Gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato
anya-e0103n:1486_4: gaṇḍoti attabhāvassa pariyāyo, visesato rūpakāyassa dukkhatāsūlayogato, asucipaggharaṇato,
anya-e0103n:1486_6: Nīharitvāti thavikato uddharitvā. Kuṇapānipīti pi-saddo garahāyaṃ evarūpānipi daṭṭhabbāni
anya-e0103n:1486_7: bhavantīti, sambhavadassane vā idampi tattha sambhavatīti. Adhivāsetabboti khamitabbo
anya-e0103n:1486_8: aññathā āhārassa anupalabbhanato. Gāmadvāreti gāmadvārasamīpe, ummārabbhantare vā.
anya-e0103n:1486_9: Gāmaracchā vinivijjhitvā ṭhitā oloketabbā honti yugamattadassināpi satāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1487_1: ettha dunnivatthaduppārutamanussasamākulānaṃ gāmaracchānaṃ olokanampi ānetvā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1487_2: Tampi hi paṭikkūlamevāti. Aho vatāti garahane nipāto. Bhoti dhammālapanaṃ. Yāvañcidaṃ
anya-e0103n:1487_3: paṭikkūlo āhāro yadatthaṃ gamanampi nāma evaṃ jegucchaṃ, duradhivāsanañcāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1488_0: 296. Gamanapaṭikkūlanti gamanameva paṭikkūlaṃ gamanapaṭikkūlaṃ. Adhivāsetvāpīti pi-saddo
anya-e0103n:1488_1: sampiṇḍanattho, tena “ettakenāpi mutti natthi, ito parampi mahantaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ sakalaṃ
anya-e0103n:1488_2: adhivāsetabbamevā”ti vakkhamānaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Saṅghāṭipārutenāti saṅghāṭiyā
anya-e0103n:1488_3: kappanapārupanena pārutasarīrena. Yatthāti yāsu vīthīsu. Yāva piṇḍikamaṃsāpīti yāva
anya-e0103n:1488_4: jaṅghapiṇḍikamaṃsappadesāpi. Udakacikkhalleti udakamisse kaddame. Ekena cīvaranti
anya-e0103n:1488_5: ekena hatthena nivatthacīvaraṃ. Macchā dhovīyanti etenāti macchadhovanaṃ, udakaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1488_6: Sammissa-saddo paccekaṃ sambandhitabbo. Oḷigallāni ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ sakaddamānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1488_7: sandanaṭṭhānāni, yāni jaṇṇumattaasucibharitānipi honti. Candanikāni kevalānaṃ ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1488_8: sandanaṭṭhānāni. Yatoti oḷigallādito. Tā makkhikāti tattha saṇḍasaṇḍacārino nīlamakkhikā.
anya-e0103n:1489_0: Dadamānāpītiādi satipi kesañci saddhānaṃ vasena sakkaccakāre paṭikkūlapaccavekkhaṇāyogyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1489_1: pana asaddhānaṃ vasena pavattanakaasakkaccakārameva dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Tuṇhī honti
anya-e0103n:1489_2: sayameva riñcitvā gacchissatīti. Gacchāti apehi. Reti ambho. Muṇḍakāti anādarālapanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1490_0: 297. Tatthāti tasmiṃ pattagate āhāre. Lajjitabbaṃ hoti “ucchiṭṭhaṃ nu kho ayaṃ mayhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1490_1: dātukāmo”ti āsaṅkeyyāti, sedo paggharamāno āhārassa vā uṇhatāya, bhikkhuno vā sapariḷāhatāyāti
anya-e0103n:1490_2: adhippāyo. Sukkhathaddhabhattampīti sukkhatāya thaddhampi bhattaṃ, pageva takkakañjikādinā
anya-e0103n:1490_3: upasittanti adhippāyo. Tena sedena kilinnatāya paṭikkūlataṃ vadati.
anya-e0103n:1491_0: Tasminti piṇḍapāte. Sambhinnasobheti sabbaso vinaṭṭhasobhe. Vemajjhato paṭṭhāyāti
anya-e0103n:1491_1: jivhāya majjhato paṭṭhāya. Dantagūthako dantamalaṃ. Vicuṇṇitamakkhitoti ubhayehi
anya-e0103n:1491_2: dantehi vicuṇṇito kheḷādīhi samupalitto. Evaṃbhūtassa cassa yāyaṃ pubbe vaṇṇasampadā,
anya-e0103n:1491_3: gandhasampadā, abhisaṅkhārasampadā ca, sā ekaṃsena vinassati, raso pana nasseyya
anya-e0103n:1491_4: vā na vāti āha “antarahitavaṇṇagandhasaṅkhāraviseso”ti. Suvānadoṇiyanti sārameyyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1491_5: bhuñjanakaambaṇe. Suvānavamathu viyāti vantasunakhachaḍḍanaṃ viya. Cakkhussa āpāthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1491_6: atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotīti ukkaṃsagataṃ tassa paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0103n:1492_0: 298. Paribhoganti ajjhoharaṇaṃ. Esa āhāro anto pavisamāno bahalamadhukatelamakkhito
anya-e0103n:1492_1: viya paramajeguccho hotīti sambandho. Antoti koṭṭhassa abbhantare. Nidhānamanupagato
anya-e0103n:1492_2: āmāsayaṃ appattoyeva āhāro pittādīhi vimissito hotīti āha “pavisamāno”ti. Āmāsayapakkāsayavinimutto
anya-e0103n:1492_3: koyamāsayo nāmāti āsaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha “yasmā”tiādi. Pittamevāsayo pittāsayo. Adhiko
anya-e0103n:1492_4: hotīti vuttaṃ mandapuññabāhullato lokassa. Evaṃ āsayatoti jeguccho hutvā anto paviṭṭho
anya-e0103n:1492_5: jegucchatarehi pittādīhi vimissito ativiya jeguccho hotīti evaṃ āsayato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0103n:1493: 299. Nidhānatoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Soti āhāro. Dasavassikenāti jātiyā dasavassena sattena. Okāseti āmāsayasaṅkhāte padese.
anya-e0103n:1494_0: 300. Evarūpeti edise, dasavassāni yāva vassasataṃ adhotavaccakūpasadiseti attho.
anya-e0103n:1494_1: Nidhānanti nidhātabbataṃ. Yathāvuttappakāreti sace pana “dasavassikenā”tiādinā yathāvutto
anya-e0103n:1494_2: pakāro etassāti yathāvuttappakāro, tasmiṃ. Paramandhakāratimiseti ativiya andhakaraṇamahātamasi.
anya-e0103n:1494_3: Atiduggandhajegucche padese paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1494_4: Kattha kiṃ viyāti āha “yathā nāmā”tiādi. Kālameghena abhivuṭṭhe āvāṭe bahuso vassanena
anya-e0103n:1494_5: ekaccaṃ asucijātaṃ uppilavitvā vigaccheyyāti akālamegha-ggahaṇaṃ. Tiṇapaṇṇakilañjakhaṇḍa-ggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1495_0: 301. Suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viyāti yathā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo vidhinā tāpiyamānā
anya-e0103n:1495_1: suvaṇṇarajatādike muñcantiyo suvaṇṇarajatādibhāvaṃ upagacchantīti vuccanti, na evamayaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1495_2: Ayaṃ pana āhāro kāyagginā paripakko pheṇapubbuḷake muñcanto saṇhaṃ karonti etthāti
anya-e0103n:1495_3: “saṇhakaraṇī”ti laddhanāmake nisade pisitvā nāḷike khuddakaveḷunāḷikāyaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānamattena
anya-e0103n:1495_4: pakkhippamānapaṇḍumattikā viya karīsabhāvaṃ upagantvā pakkāsayaṃ pūreti, muttabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1495_5: upagantvā muttavatthiṃ pūretīti yojanā. Gahaṇiyā indhanabhāgo viya kimibhakkhabhāgo
anya-e0103n:1495_6: ca apākaṭova. Rasabhāgo phalato pakāsīyati, aparipakkasabhāgā ca teti te anāmasitvā
anya-e0103n:1496_0: 302. Paṭikkūlassa nāma phalena paṭikkūleneva bhavitabbanti dassento “sammā paripaccamāno”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1496_1: Nakhadantādīnīti ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ tacādīni eva dvattiṃsākārapāḷiyaṃ āgatāni,
anya-e0103n:1497_0: 303. Nissandamānoti vissavanto, paggharantoti attho. Ādinā pakārenāti ettha ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n:1497_1: nāsikāya siṅghāṇikā, mukhena kheḷo, kadāci pittaṃ, semhaṃ, lohitaṃ vamati, vaccamaggena
anya-e0103n:1497_2: uccāro, passāvamaggena passāvo, sakalakāye lomakūpehi sedajallikāti evaṃpakāraṃ asuciṃ
anya-e0103n:1497_5: Maṅkubhūtoti vimanakajāto “imampi nāma posemī”ti. Rattoti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena
anya-e0103n:1497_6: cittassa vipariṇāmākārena chandarāgena ratto. Giddhoti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena
anya-e0103n:1497_7: giddho gedhaṃ āpanno. Gadhitoti dummocanīyabhāvena ganthito viya tattha paṭibaddho.
anya-e0103n:1497_8: Mucchitoti rasataṇhāya mucchaṃ mohaṃ āpanno. Virattoti vigatarāgo. Aṭṭīyamānoti dukkhiyamāno.
anya-e0103n:1498_0: Navadvārehīti pākaṭānaṃ mahantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, lomakūpavivarehipi sandatevāti.
anya-e0103n:1498_1: Nilīyatīti attānaṃ adassento nigūhati, saṅkucati vā. Evanti ekena dvārena pavesanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1498_2: anekehi dvārehi anekadhā nikkhāmanaṃ, pakāsanaṃ pavesanaṃ, nigūḷhaṃ nikkhāmanampīti
anya-e0103n:1498_3: somanassajātena pavesanaṃ, maṅkubhūtena nikkhāmanaṃ, sārattena pavesanaṃ, virattena
anya-e0103n:1499_0: 304. Paribhogakālepīti pi-saddena paviṭṭhamattopi nāma pavesadvāraṃ jegucchaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n:1499_1: pageva laddhaparivāso paripākappatto itaradvārānīti dasseti. Esa āhāro. Gandhaharaṇatthanti
anya-e0103n:1499_3: pheṇāni uṭṭhapetvā uṭṭhapetvā. Paccitvāti paripākaṃ gantvā. Uttaramānoti uppilavanto.
anya-e0103n:1499_4: Semhādīti ādi-saddena pittādike saṅgaṇhāti. Karīsādīti ādi-saddena sedajallikādike.
anya-e0103n:1499_5: Imāni dvārāni mukhādīni. Ekaccanti passāvamaggaṃ sandhāya vadati. Cokkhajātikā pana
anya-e0103n:1499_6: mukhādīnipi dhovitvā hatthaṃ puna dhovantiyeva. Puna ekaccanti vaccamaggaṃ. Dvattikkhattunti
anya-e0103n:1499_7: dvikkhattuṃ, tikkhattuṃ vā. Ettha ca āhāratthāya gamanapariyesanānaṃ paṭikkūlatā
anya-e0103n:1499_8: āhāre paṭikkūlatā vuttā. Paribhogassa tannissayato, āsayanidhānānaṃ taṃsambandhato,
anya-e0103n:1499_9: itaresaṃ tabbikāratoti ayampi viseso veditabbo. Kimibhakkhabhāvopi hissa vikārapakkheyeva ṭhapetabboti.
anya-e0103n:1500_0: 305. Taṃ nimittanti yathāvuttehi ākārehi punappunaṃ manasi karontassa paṭikkūlākāravasena
anya-e0103n:1500_1: upaṭṭhitaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārasaññitaṃ bhāvanāya nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, na uggahapaṭibhāganimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1500_2: Yadi hi tattha uggahanimittaṃ uppajjeyya, paṭibhāganimittenapi bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0103n:1500_3: ca sati appanāppattena jhānena bhavitabbaṃ, na ca bhavati, kasmā? Bhāvanāya nānākārato,
anya-e0103n:1500_5: sabhāvadhammatāya gambhīrattā”ti. Ettha hi yadipi paṭikkūlākāravasena bhāvanā pavattati.
anya-e0103n:1500_6: Ye pana dhamme upādāya kabaḷīkārāhārapaññatti, te eva dhammā paṭikkūlā, na paññattīti
anya-e0103n:1500_7: paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇamukhenapi sabhāvadhammeyeva ārabbha bhāvanāya pavattanato, sabhāvadhammānañca
anya-e0103n:1500_8: sabhāveneva gambhīrabhāvato na tattha jhānaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti. Gambhīrabhāvato hi
anya-e0103n:1500_9: purimasaccadvayaṃ duddasaṃ jātanti. Yadi upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samādhiyati, kathaṃ
anya-e0103n:1501_0: Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “imañca panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Rasataṇhāyāti
anya-e0103n:1501_1: madhurādirasavisayāya taṇhāya. Patilīyatīti saṅkucati anekākāraṃ tattha paṭikkūlatāya
anya-e0103n:1501_2: saṇṭhitattā. Patikuṭatīti apasakkati na visarati. Pativattatīti nivattati. Kantāranittharaṇatthikoti
anya-e0103n:1501_3: mahato dubbhikkhakantārassa nittharaṇappayojano. Vigatamadoti mānamadādīnaṃ abhāvena
anya-e0103n:1501_4: nimmado, madābhāvaggahaṇeneva cassa davamaṇḍanavibhūsanādīnampi abhāvo gahitoyevāti
anya-e0103n:1501_6: paricchijja jānanadvārena. Pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgoti anativattanaṭṭhena pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
anya-e0103n:1501_7: niyutto, tappayojano vā rāgo. Pariññaṃ samatikkamaṃ gacchati. Rasataṇhāya hi sammadeva
anya-e0103n:1501_8: vigatāya rūpataṇhādayopi vigatā eva honti bhojane mattaññutāya ukkaṃsagamanato. Sati
anya-e0103n:1501_9: ca visayisamatikkame visayo samatikkanto eva hotīti āha “so pañcakāmaguṇapariññāmukhena
anya-e0103n:1501_10: rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātī”ti. Rūpāyatanādīsu hi pariññaṃ gacchantesu tannissayabhūtāni,
anya-e0103n:1501_11: taggāhakā pasādā ca sukheneva pariññaṃ gacchantīti. Aparipakkādīti ādi-saddena āsayanidhānānampi
anya-e0103n:1501_12: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha aparipakkaṃ tāva udariyameva. Āsayaggahaṇena pittasemhapubbalohitānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1501_13: paripakkaggahaṇena karīsamuttānaṃ, phalaggahaṇena kesādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ pariggaho siddho
anya-e0103n:1501_14: hotīti āha “kāyagatāsatibhāvanāpi pāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti. Asubhasaññāyāti asubhabhāvanāya,
anya-e0103n:1501_15: aviññāṇakaasubhabhāvanānuyogassāti attho. Anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇena
anya-e0103n:1501_16: kāyassa asuciduggandhajegucchabhāvasallakkhaṇato. Imaṃ pana paṭipattinti imaṃ āhāre
anya-e0103n:1501_18: upacārajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nibbānādhigamanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1504_0: 306. “Ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhassa catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto”ti
anya-e0103n:1504_1: uddeso nāma niddesattho mudumajjhapaññābāhullato, āgato ca bhāro avassaṃ vahitabboti
anya-e0103n:1504_2: katvā vuttaṃ. Tattha satipi visayabhedena vavatthānassa bhede vavatthānabhāvasāmaññena
anya-e0103n:1504_3: pana taṃ abhinnaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti, pubbabhāge vā satipi visayabhede
anya-e0103n:1504_4: atthasiddhiyaṃ tassa ekavisayatāvāti “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttaṃ. Yathā hi dvattiṃsākāre
anya-e0103n:1504_5: kammaṃ karontassa yogino yadipi pubbabhāge visuṃ visuṃ koṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1504_6: aparabhāge pana ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse atthasiddhi hoti, na sabbesu,
anya-e0103n:1504_7: evamidhāpīti. Tattha siyā – yathā paṭikkūlabhāvasāmaññena dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n:1504_8: abhedato manasikāro pavattati, evaṃ idha dhātubhāvasāmaññena abhedato manasikāro
anya-e0103n:1504_9: pavattatīti “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttanti? Nayidamevaṃ. Tattha hi paṇṇattisamatikkamato
anya-e0103n:1504_10: paṭṭhāya paṭikkūlavaseneva sabbattha manasikāro pavattetabbo, idha pana sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇato
anya-e0103n:1504_11: dhātuyo manasi kātabbā, na dhātubhāvasāmaññato. Tenevāha “sabhāvūpalakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0103n:1504_12: sanniṭṭhāna”nti. Kiṃ vā etena papañcena, aññehi ekūnacattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1504_13: catudhātuvavatthānaṃ nāma ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti dassetuṃ “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttanti
anya-e0103n:1504_14: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu catudhātuvavatthānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1504_15: bhāvanāva? Saccaṃ bhāvanāva, sakiṃ pavattaṃ pana vavatthānaṃ, tassa bahulīkāro bhāvanāti
anya-e0103n:1504_16: vacanabhedena vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ pana bhāvanā niddisīyati tassā vacīgocarātikkantabhāvatoti?
anya-e0103n:1504_17: Nāyaṃ doso bhāvanatthe bhāvanāvohārato. Bhāvanattho hi kammaṭṭhānapariggaho idha
anya-e0103n:1505_1: hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇādikammaṭṭhānaṃ viya na paṇṇattimattasallakkhaṇavasena,
anya-e0103n:1505_2: nīlakasiṇādikammaṭṭhānaṃ viya na nīlādivaṇṇasallakkhaṇavasena, nāpi vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1505_3: viya saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena pavattati, atha kho pathavīādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1505_5: salakkhaṇassa upadhāraṇavasenāti attho. Sanniṭṭhānanti ñāṇavinicchayo veditabbo,
anya-e0103n:1505_6: na yevāpanakavinicchayo, nāpi vitakkādivinicchayo. Dhātumanasikāroti dhātūsu manasikāro,
anya-e0103n:1505_7: catasso dhātuyo ārabbha bhāvanāmanasikāroti attho. Kātabbato kammaṃ, yogino sukhavisesānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1505_8: kāraṇabhāvato ṭhānañcāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ sabhāvasallakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0103n:1505_10: atthato eka”nti. Tayidaṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ. “Dvidhā āgata”nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu
anya-e0103n:1505_11: dhātuvibhaṅge nātisaṅkhepavitthāravasena āgataṃ, tasmā “tidhā āgata”nti vattabbanti?
anya-e0103n:1505_12: Na, tatthāpi ajjhattikānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pabhedato anavasesapariyādānassa katattā, bāhirānañca
anya-e0103n:1505_13: dhātūnaṃ pariggahitattā. Atha vā dvidhā āgatanti ettha dvidhāva āgatanti na evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1505_14: niyamo gahetabbo, atha kho dvidhā āgatamevāti, tena tatiyassāpi pakārassa saṅgaho
anya-e0103n:1505_15: siddho hoti. So ca nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayo “saṅkhepato ca vitthārato cā”ti ettha
anya-e0103n:1505_16: āvuttivasena, ca-saddeneva vā saṅgahoti daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā yo nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena
anya-e0103n:1505_18: katvā vuttaṃ “dvidhā āgata”nti. Evañca katvā “nātitikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa
anya-e0103n:1505_19: vasena vitthārato āgata”nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. “Mahāsatipaṭṭhāne”ti
anya-e0103n:1505_20: ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, satipaṭṭhāna kāyagatāsatisuttādīsupi tatheva
anya-e0103n:1505_21: āgatattā. Rāhulovādeti mahārāhulovāde. Dhātuvibhaṅgeti dhātuvibhaṅgasutte, abhidhamme dhātuvibhaṅge ca.
anya-e0103n:1506_0: Kāmaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhāne atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā desanā āgatā, upamā ca nāma yāvadeva
anya-e0103n:1506_1: upameyyatthavibhāvanatthāti upamaṃ tāva dassetvā upameyyatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1506_2: pāḷi ānītā. Kasmā panettha dhātuvasena, tatthapi catumahābhūtavasena kammaṭṭhānaniddeso
anya-e0103n:1506_3: katoti? Sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ, ettha dhātuvasena, tatthāpi oḷārikabhāvena supākaṭatāya,
anya-e0103n:1506_4: ekaccaveneyyajanacaritānukulatāya ca mahābhūtavasena kammaṭṭhānaniddeso katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1506_5: Tattha pathavīdhātūtiādīsu dhātuttho nāma sabhāvattho, sabhāvattho nāma suññatattho,
anya-e0103n:1506_6: suññatattho nāma nissattattho. Evaṃ sabhāvasuññatanissattatthena pathavīyeva dhātu
anya-e0103n:1506_7: pathavīdhātu. Āpodhātuādīsupi eseva nayo. Pathavīdhātūti sahajarūpadhammānaṃ patiṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:1506_8: dhātu, tathā āpodhātūti ābandhanadhātu, tejodhātūti paripācanadhātu, vāyodhātūti
anya-e0103n:1506_9: vitthambhanadhātūti evamettha samāso, bhāvattho ca veditabbo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
anya-e0103n:1507_0: Evaṃ tikkhapaññassātiādīsu evanti yathādassitaṃ pāḷiṃ paccāmasati. Nātitikkhapaññassa
anya-e0103n:1507_1: vitthāradesanāti katvā āha “tikkhapaññassā”ti. Yathā vatthayugaṃ arahatīti vatthayugiko,
anya-e0103n:1507_2: evaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ arahati, dhātukammaṭṭhānapayojanoti vā dhātukammaṭṭhāniko,
anya-e0103n:1508_0: Chekoti taṃtaṃsamaññāya kusalo, yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye
anya-e0103n:1508_1: avibhatte gāvīsamaññā, na vibhatte, vibhatte pana aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamaññāti jānanako.
anya-e0103n:1508_2: Goghātakoti jīvikatthāya gunnaṃ ghātako. Antevāsīti kammakaraṇavasena tassa samīpavāsī
anya-e0103n:1508_3: tassa tannissāya jīvanato. Vinivijjhitvāti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne aññaṃ vinivijjhitvā. Mahāpathānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1508_4: vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāteti catunnaṃ mahāpathānaṃ tāya eva vinivijjhanaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte.
anya-e0103n:1508_5: Yasmā te cattāro mahāpathā catūhi disāhi āgantvā samohitā viya honti, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1508_6: catumahāpathānaṃ, tasmiṃ catumahāpathe. Vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhajjantīti bīlā, bhāgā,
anya-e0103n:1508_7: va-kārassa ba-kāraṃ, i-kārassa ca ī-kāraṃ katvā. Tameva hi bhāgatthaṃ dassetuṃ “koṭṭhāsaṃ
anya-e0103n:1508_8: katvā”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi ṭhita-saddo “ṭhito vā”tiādīsu viya ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya,
anya-e0103n:1508_9: gatinivattiatthatāya vā ṭhā-saddassa aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya
anya-e0103n:1508_10: bodhako, idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha “catunnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1508_11: iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhita”nti. Tattha ākārenāti ṭhānādinā
anya-e0103n:1508_12: rūpakāyassa pavattiākārena. Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāsaṅkhātāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya
anya-e0103n:1508_14: adhippetanti āha “yathāṭhitattāva yathāpaṇihita”nti. Ṭhitanti vā kāyassa ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1508_15: Paṇihitanti tadaññairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ. Ṭhitanti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1508_16: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ. Paṇihitanti paccayakiccavasena
anya-e0103n:1508_17: tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evamettha attho veditabbo. Dhātusoti
anya-e0103n:1508_18: dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā. Paccavekkhatīti pati pati avekkhati
anya-e0103n:1509_0: Yathā chekotiādinā pāḷiyā saddatthavivaraṇavasena vuttamevatthaṃ idāni bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena
anya-e0103n:1509_1: dassetuṃ “yathā goghātakassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha posentassāti maṃsūpacayaparibrūhanāya
anya-e0103n:1509_2: kuṇḍakabhattakappāsaṭṭhiādīhi saṃvaḍḍhentassa. Vadhitaṃ matanti hiṃsitaṃ hutvā mataṃ.
anya-e0103n:1509_3: Matanti ca matamattaṃ. Tenevāha “tāvadevā”ti. Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati yāni
anya-e0103n:1509_4: aṅgapaccaṅgāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā, matamattāyapi gāviyā tesaṃ sannivesassa avinaṭṭhattā.
anya-e0103n:1509_5: Bilāsoti bilaṃ bilaṃ katvā. Vibhajitvāti aṭṭhisaṅghātato maṃsaṃ vivecetvā, tato vā
anya-e0103n:1509_6: vivecitaṃ maṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā. Tenevāha “maṃsasaññā pavattatī”ti. Pabbajitassapi
anya-e0103n:1509_8: vivecanaṃ. Dhātuso paccavekkhatoti yathāvuttaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso paccavekkhantassa.
anya-e0103n:1509_9: Sattasaññāti attānudiṭṭhivasena pavattā sattasaññāti vadanti, vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi
anya-e0103n:1509_10: tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato. Evaṃ hi sati
anya-e0103n:1509_11: yathāvuttaopammatthena opameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti. Tenevāha “dhātuvaseneva
anya-e0103n:1510_0: 307. Evaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānassa saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato āgataṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1510_1: dassetuṃ “mahāhatthipadūpame panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evanti iminā rāhulovāda- dhātuvibhaṅgesu
anya-e0103n:1510_2: dhātukammaṭṭhānassa vitthārato āgamanameva upasaṃharati, na sabbaṃ desanānayaṃ aññathāpi
anya-e0103n:1511_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ yathādassite mahāhatthipadūpamapāṭhe. Ajjhattikāti sattasantānapariyāpannā.
anya-e0103n:1511_1: Ajjhattaṃ paccattanti padadvayenāpi taṃtaṃpāṭipuggalikadhammo vuccatīti āha “ubhayampi
anya-e0103n:1511_2: niyakassa adhivacana”nti. Sasantatipariyāpannatāya pana attani gahetabbabhāvūpagamanavasena
anya-e0103n:1511_3: attānaṃ adhikicca pavattaṃ ajjhattaṃ. Taṃtaṃsantatipariyāpannatāya paccattaṃ. Tenevāha
anya-e0103n:1511_4: “attani pavattattā ajjhattaṃ, attānaṃ paṭicca paṭicca pavattattā paccatta”nti. Kakkhaḷanti
anya-e0103n:1511_5: kathinaṃ. Yasmā taṃ thaddhabhāvena sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti, tasmā “thaddha”nti
anya-e0103n:1511_6: vuttaṃ. Kharigatanti kharīsu kharasabhāvesu gataṃ tappariyāpannaṃ, kharasabhāvamevāti
anya-e0103n:1511_7: attho. Yasmā pana kharasabhāvaṃ pharusākārena upaṭṭhānato pharusākāraṃ hoti, tasmā
anya-e0103n:1511_8: vuttaṃ “pharusa”nti. Tenāha “dutiyaṃ ākāravacana”nti. Upādinnaṃ nāma sarīraṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1511_9: Taṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya upādinnampi atthi anupādinnampi, taṇhādīhi ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena
anya-e0103n:1511_10: sabbampetaṃ upādinnamevāti dassetuṃ “upādinnanti daḷhaṃ ādinna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1511_12: āha “taṃ katamanti ceti attho”ti. Tatoti pacchā. Tanti taṃ ajjhattikādibhedato dassitaṃ
anya-e0103n:1511_13: pathavīdhātuṃ. Dassentoti vatthuvibhāgena dassento. Kiñcāpi matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjeneva
anya-e0103n:1511_14: saṅgahetvā idha pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ na uddhaṭaṃ, paṭisambhidāmagge pana vīsatiyā ākārehi
anya-e0103n:1511_15: paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ visuṃ gahitanti tampi saṅgaṇhanto thaddhabhāvādhikatāya
anya-e0103n:1511_17: niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā”ti āha. “Yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī”ti vā iminā pāḷiyaṃ matthaluṅgassa
anya-e0103n:1511_18: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā idha “yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī”ti idaṃ pubbāparāpekkhaṃ “matthaluṅgaṃ
anya-e0103n:1511_19: pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā, yaṃ vā panaññampi
anya-e0103n:1511_20: kiñcī”ti vacanato. Puna yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcīti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesūti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1511_21: Tīsu koṭṭhāsesūti tippakāresu koṭṭhāsesu. Na hi te tayo koṭṭhāsā.
anya-e0103n:1512_0: Vissandanabhāvenāti paggharaṇasabhāvena. Appotīti visarati. Pappotīti pāpuṇāti, sasambhāraāpavasena
anya-e0103n:1512_1: cetaṃ vuttaṃ. So hi vissandanabhāvena sasambhārapathavīsaṅkhātaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ visarati,
anya-e0103n:1512_2: pāpuṇāti ca, lakkhaṇāpavaseneva vā. Sopi hi sahajātaaññamaññanissayādipaccayatāya
anya-e0103n:1512_3: sesabhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ dravabhāvasiddhena vissandanabhāvena ābandhattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1512_4: āsattattaṃ, avippakiṇṇañca karontaṃ “appoti pappotī”ti vattabbataṃ arahatīti.
anya-e0103n:1513_1: “nānāvidhesū”ti āpodhātuyaṃ vuttanayena. Kupitenāti khubhitena. Usumajātoti usmābhibhūto.
anya-e0103n:1513_2: Jīratīti jiṇṇo hoti. Tejodhātuvasena labbhamānā imasmiṃ kāye jarāpavatti pākaṭajarāvasena
anya-e0103n:1513_3: veditabbāti dassetuṃ “indriyavekallata”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sarīre pakatiusumaṃ atikkamitvā
anya-e0103n:1513_4: uṇhabhāvo santāpo, sarīrassa dahanavasena pavatto mahādāho paridāhoti ayametesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1513_5: viseso. Yena jīrīyatīti ca ekāhikādijararogena jarīyatītipi attho yujjati. Satakkhattuṃ
anya-e0103n:1513_6: tāpetvā tāpetvā sītudake pakkhipitvā uddhaṭā sappi “satadhotasappī”ti vadanti. Asitanti
anya-e0103n:1513_7: bhuttaṃ. Khāyitanti khāditaṃ. Sāyitanti assāditaṃ. Sammā paripākaṃ gacchatīti samavepākiniyā
anya-e0103n:1513_8: gahaṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ, asammāparipākopi pana visamavepākiniyā tassā eva vasena veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1513_10: aññamaññaṃ visadisabhāvaṃ. Asitādibhedassa hi āhārassa pariṇāme raso hoti, taṃ paṭicca
anya-e0103n:1513_11: rasadhātu uppajjatīti attho. Evaṃ “rasassa pariṇāme rudhira”ntiādinā sabbaṃ netabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1514_0: Vāyanavasenāti samudīraṇavasena, savegagamanavasena vā. Uggārahikkādīti ettha ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n:1514_3: udarapariyāyo, koṭṭha-saddena pana antantarassa vuccamānattā tadavasiṭṭho udarappadeso
anya-e0103n:1514_4: idha kucchi-saddena vuccatīti āha “kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā”ti. Samiñjanapasāraṇādīti
anya-e0103n:1514_6: cittasamuṭṭhānāvā”ti etena assāsapassāsānaṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā pavatti natthīti dīpeti.
anya-e0103n:1514_7: Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānassa sambhavo atthīti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ “passāsoti bahinikkhamananāsikavāto,
anya-e0103n:1514_8: dīghanāsikassa nāsikaggaṃ, itarassa uttaroṭṭhaṃ phusanto pavattatī”ti vacanaṃ? Taṃ
anya-e0103n:1514_9: nikkhamanākārena pavattiyā cittasamuṭṭhānassa, santāne pavattautusamuṭṭhānassa ca
anya-e0103n:1514_10: vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sabbatthāti āpodhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ niddesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1514_11: sandhāyāha. Tattha āpodhātuniddese “yaṃ vā panañña”nti iminā sambhavassa, tejodhātuniddese
anya-e0103n:1514_12: sarīre pākatikausmāya, vāyodhātuniddese dhamanijālānusaṭassa tattha tattha cammakhīlapīḷakādinibbattakavāyuno
anya-e0103n:1514_13: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Samiñjanādinibbattakavātā cittasamuṭṭhānāva. Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ
anya-e0103n:1514_14: “purimā pañca catusamuṭṭhānā”ti vacanaṃ? Na hi samiñjanādinibbattakā eva aṅgamaṅgānusārino
anya-e0103n:1514_15: vātā, atha kho tadaññepīti natthi virodho.
anya-e0103n:1515_0: Itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Tenāha “vīsatiyā ākārehī”tiādi. Etthāti etasmiṃ vitthārato
anya-e0103n:1515_1: āgate dhātukammaṭṭhāneti attho. Tena ayaṃ vaṇṇanā na kevalaṃ mahāhatthipadūpamasseva,
anya-e0103n:1515_2: atha kho mahārāhulovāda- dhātuvibhaṅgasuttānampi atthasaṃvaṇṇanā hotiyevāti dassitaṃ
anya-e0103n:1515_3: hoti. Bhāvanānayepi eseva nayo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “evaṃ rāhulovādadhātuvibhaṅgesupī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1516_0: 308. Bhāvanānayeti bhāvanāya naye. Yena kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā ijjhati, tasmiṃ bhāvanāvidhimhīti
anya-e0103n:1516_1: attho. Etthāti dhātukammaṭṭhāne. Yasmā yesaṃ “tikkhapañño nātitikkhapañño”ti imesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1516_2: duvidhānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ dvidhā āgataṃ dvidhā desitaṃ, tasmā
anya-e0103n:1516_3: kammaṭṭhānābhinivesopi tesaṃ dvidhāva icchitabboti taṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tikkhapaññassa
anya-e0103n:1516_4: bhikkhuno”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Lomā pathavīdhātūtīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Evaṃ vitthārato
anya-e0103n:1516_5: dhātupariggahoti “kesā pathavīdhātu, lomā pathavīdhātū”tiādinā evaṃ dvācattālīsāya
anya-e0103n:1516_6: ākārehi vitthārato dhātukammaṭṭhānapariggaho. Papañcatoti dandhato saṇikato. Yaṃ
anya-e0103n:1516_7: thaddhalakkhaṇanti kesādīsu yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ kakkhaḷabhāvo. Yaṃ ābandhanalakkhaṇantiādīsupi
anya-e0103n:1516_8: eseva nayo. Evaṃ manasi karototi vatthuṃ anāmasitvā evaṃ lakkhaṇamattato manasikāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1516_9: pavattentassa. Assāti tikkhapaññassa. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
anya-e0103n:1516_10: tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti, tassa vā lakkhaṇassa suṭṭhu upaṭṭhānato taṃ ārabbha
anya-e0103n:1516_11: pavattamānaṃ manasikārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ visadaṃ hoti, tikkhapaññassa
anya-e0103n:1516_12: indriyapāṭavena saṃkhittarucibhāvato. Sabbaso mandapaññassa bhāvanāva na ijjhatīti
anya-e0103n:1516_13: āha “nātitikkhapaññassā”ti. Evaṃ manasi karototi vuttanayena saṅkhepato manasi karoto.
anya-e0103n:1516_14: Andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hotīti anupaṭṭhānato andhaṃ viya karontaṃ apākaṭaṃ hoti kammaṭṭhānanti
anya-e0103n:1516_15: yojanā. Purimanayenāti “kesā pathavīdhātū”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena. Vatthuāmasanena
anya-e0103n:1516_16: vitthārato manasi karontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ, nātitikkhapaññassa akhippanisantitāya
anya-e0103n:1517_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā dvīsu bhikkhūsū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1517_1: peyyālamukhanti peyyālapāḷiyā mukhabhūtaṃ dvārabhūtaṃ ādito vāraṃ, vāradvayaṃ vā.
anya-e0103n:1517_2: Vitthāretvāti anavasesato sajjhāyitvā. Ubhatokoṭivasenevāti tassa tassa vārassa ādiantaggahaṇavaseneva.
anya-e0103n:1517_3: Oṭṭhapariyāhatamattanti oṭṭhānaṃ samphusanamattaṃ. Yathā ganthaparivattane tikkhapaññassa
anya-e0103n:1517_4: bhikkhuno saṅkhepo ruccati, na vitthāro. Itarassa ca vitthāro ruccati, na saṅkhepo,
anya-e0103n:1518_0: Tasmāti yasmā tikkhapaññassa saṅkhepo, nātitikkhapaññassa ca vitthāro sappāyo, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:1518_1: Yasmā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitukāmassa sīlavisodhanādipubbakiccaṃ icchitabbaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0103n:1518_2: sabbākārasampannaṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti idha na āmaṭṭhaṃ. Yasmā pana vivekaṭṭhakāyassa,
anya-e0103n:1518_3: vivekaṭṭhacittasseva ca bhāvanā ijjhati, na itarassa, tasmā tadubhayaṃ dassento “rahogatena
anya-e0103n:1518_4: paṭisallīnenā”ti āha. Tattha rahogatenāti rahasi gatena, ekākinā bhāvanānukūlaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1518_5: upagatenāti attho. Paṭisallīnenāti pati pati puthuttārammaṇato cittaṃ nisedhetvā
anya-e0103n:1518_6: kammaṭṭhāne sallīnena, tattha saṃsiliṭṭhacittenāti attho. Sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1518_7: āvajjetvāti uddhaṃ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā, tiriyaṃ tacapariyantaṃ sabbampi attano
anya-e0103n:1518_8: karajakāyaṃ dhātuvasena manasi karonto yasmā cātumahābhūtiko ayaṃ kāyo, tasmā “atthi
anya-e0103n:1518_9: imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”ti catumahābhūtavasena samannāharitvāti
anya-e0103n:1518_10: attho. Idāni tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ lakkhaṇato, upaṭṭhānākārato ca manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1519_0: Tattha thaddhabhāvoti lakkhaṇamāha. Thaddhattalakkhaṇā hi pathavīdhātu. Kharabhāvoti
anya-e0103n:1519_1: upaṭṭhānākāraṃ, ñāṇena gahetabbākāranti attho. Dravabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātuyā paggharaṇasabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n:1519_2: Ābandhanaṃ upaṭṭhānākāro. Uṇhabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātuyā usmāsabhāvattā. Paripācanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1519_3: upaṭṭhānākāro. Vitthambhanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātuyā upatthambhanasabhāvattā. Samudīraṇaṃ
anya-e0103n:1519_4: upaṭṭhānākāro, upaṭṭhānākāro ca nāma dhātūnaṃ sakiccakaraṇavasena ñāṇassa vibhūtākāro.
anya-e0103n:1519_5: Kasmā panettha ubhayaggahaṇaṃ? Puggalajjhāsayato. Ekaccassa hi dhātuyo manasi karontassa
anya-e0103n:1519_6: tā sabhāvato gahetabbataṃ gacchanti, ekaccassa sakiccakaraṇato, yo rasoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1519_7: Tatrāyaṃ yogī dhātuyo manasi karonto ādito paccekaṃ salakkhaṇato, sarasatopi pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1519_8: Tenāha “yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā…pe… evaṃ saṃkhittena dhātuyo
anya-e0103n:1519_9: pariggahetvā”ti. Tattha pariggahetvāti pariggāhakabhūtena ñāṇena dhātuyo lakkhaṇato,
anya-e0103n:1519_10: rasato vā paricchijja gahetvā. Ayaṃ tāva saṃkhittato bhāvanānaye kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso.
anya-e0103n:1520_0: Evaṃ pana dhātuyo pariggahetvā “atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo
anya-e0103n:1520_1: vā, āpodhātu dravabhāvo vā ābandhanabhāvo vā, tejodhātu uṇhabhāvo vā paripācanabhāvo
anya-e0103n:1520_2: vā, vāyodhātu vitthambhanabhāvo vā samudīraṇabhāvo vā”ti evaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi saddhiṃyeva
anya-e0103n:1520_3: dhātuyo manasi karontena kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ manasi
anya-e0103n:1520_4: kātabbaṃ, takkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ kātabbaṃ. Tassevaṃ manasi karoto yaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu
anya-e0103n:1520_5: supākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tadeva gahetvā itaraṃ vissajjetvā tena saddhiṃ “pathavīdhātu
anya-e0103n:1520_6: āpodhātū”tiādinā manasikāro pavattetabbo. Evaṃ manasi karontena hi anupubbato, nātisīghato,
anya-e0103n:1520_8: lakkhaṇato, tayo ca suttantāti imehi dasahākārehi manasikārakosallaṃ anuṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1521_0: Tattha anupubbatoti anupaṭipāṭito ācariyassa santike uggahitapaṭipāṭito, sā ca desanāpaṭipāṭiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1521_1: Evaṃ anupubbato manasi karontenāpi nātisīghato manasi kātabbaṃ. Atisīghato manasi
anya-e0103n:1521_2: karoto hi aparāparaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro nirantaraṃ pavattati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana
anya-e0103n:1521_3: avibhūtaṃ hoti, na visesaṃ āvahati. Tasmā nātisīghato manasi kātabbaṃ. Yathā ca nātisīghato,
anya-e0103n:1521_4: evaṃ nātisaṇikatopi. Atisaṇikato manasi karoto hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati,
anya-e0103n:1521_5: visesādhigamassa paccayo na hoti. Atisīghaṃ atisaṇikañca maggaṃ gacchantā purisā
anya-e0103n:1521_6: ettha nidassetabbā. Vikkhepapaṭibāhanatoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe
anya-e0103n:1521_7: cetaso vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo. Bahiddhā vikkhepe hi sati kammaṭṭhānā parihāyati paridhaṃsati.
anya-e0103n:1521_8: Ekapadikamaggagāmī puriso cettha nidassetabbo. Paṇṇattisamatikkamanatoti “yā ayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1521_9: pathavīdhātū”tiādikā paṇṇatti, taṃ atikkamitvā lakkhaṇesu eva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1522_0: Evaṃ paṇṇattiṃ vijahitvā kakkhaḷalakkhaṇādīsu eva manasikāraṃ pavattentassa lakkhaṇāni
anya-e0103n:1522_1: supākaṭāni suvibhūtāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Tassevaṃ punappunaṃ manasikāravasena cittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1522_2: āsevanaṃ labhati. Sabbo rūpakāyo dhātumattato upaṭṭhāti suñño nissatto nijjīvo yantaṃ
anya-e0103n:1522_3: viya yantasuttena aparāparaṃ parivattamāno. Sace pana bahiddhāpi manasikāraṃ upasaṃharati,
anya-e0103n:1522_4: athassa āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā dhātusamūhavaseneva
anya-e0103n:1522_5: upaṭṭhahanti, tehi kariyamānā kiriyā dhātumayena yantena pavattiyamānā hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:1522_6: tehi ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi dhātusaṅghāte pakkhippamāno dhātusaṅghāto viya
anya-e0103n:1522_7: upaṭṭhāti. Athassa tathā laddhāsevanampi cittaṃ yadi accāraddhavīriyatāya uddhaccavasena
anya-e0103n:1522_8: vā atilīnavīriyatāya kosajjavasena vā bhāvanāvidhiṃ na otareyya, tadā adhicittasuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1522_9: anuttarasītibhāvasuttaṃ, bojjhaṅgasuttanti imesu tīsu suttesu āgatanayena vīriyasamādhiyojanā
anya-e0103n:1522_10: kātabbā. Tena vuttaṃ “tayo ca suttantā”ti. Evaṃ pana vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā tasmiṃyeva
anya-e0103n:1522_11: lakkhaṇe manasikāraṃ pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamatāni suvisadāni
anya-e0103n:1522_12: pavattanti, tadā asaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi
anya-e0103n:1522_13: laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti, tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya
anya-e0103n:1522_14: nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāniyeva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi. Ettāvatā cānena
anya-e0103n:1522_15: upacārajjhānaṃ samadhigataṃ hoti dhātulakkhaṇārammaṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ pathavīdhātu
anya-e0103n:1523_0: Tattha dhātumattatoti visesanivattiattho matta-saddo. Tena yaṃ ito bāhirakā, lokiyamahājano
anya-e0103n:1523_1: ca “satto jīvo”tiādikaṃ visesaṃ imasmiṃ attabhāve avijjamānaṃ vikappanāmatteneva
anya-e0103n:1523_2: samāropenti, taṃ nivatteti. Tenevāha “nissattato nijjīvato”ti. Āvajjitabbanti samannāharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1523_3: Manasi kātabbanti punappunaṃ bhāvanāvasena dhātumattato dhātulakkhaṇaṃ manasi ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1523_4: Paccavekkhitabbanti tadeva dhātulakkhaṇaṃ pati pati avekkhitabbaṃ, bhāvanāsiddhena
anya-e0103n:1524_0: Tassevaṃ vāyamamānassāti tassa yogino evaṃ vuttappakārena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa,
anya-e0103n:1524_1: tattha ca bhāvanāanuyoge sakkaccakāritāya, sātaccakāritāya, sappāyasevitāya, samathanimittasallakkhaṇena,
anya-e0103n:1524_2: bojjhaṅgānaṃ anupavattanena, kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhavuttitāya, antarā saṅkocaṃ
anya-e0103n:1524_3: anāpajjantena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ussoḷhiyaṃ avaṭṭhānena sammadeva vāyāmaṃ payogaṃ
anya-e0103n:1524_6: avijahanena sabbato gahito mahaggatabhāvaṃ appattatāya upacāramatto sikhāppatto kāmāvacarasamādhi
anya-e0103n:1524_7: uppajjati. Upacārasamādhīti ca ruḷhīvasena veditabbaṃ. Appanaṃ hi upecca cārī samādhi
anya-e0103n:1524_8: upacārasamādhi, appanā cettha natthi. Tādisassa pana samādhissa samānalakkhaṇatāya
anya-e0103n:1524_9: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Kasmā panettha appanā na hotīti? Tattha kāraṇamāha “sabhāvadhammārammaṇattā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1524_10: Sabhāvadhamme hi tassa gambhīrabhāvato asati bhāvanāvisese appanājhānaṃ na uppajjati,
anya-e0103n:1524_11: lokuttaraṃ pana jhānaṃ visuddhibhāvanānukkamavasena, āruppaṃ ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanāvasena
anya-e0103n:1525_0: Evaṃ rūpakāye avisesena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n:1525_1: idāni tattha aṭṭhiādīnaṃ vinibbhujanavasena saṅkhepato sutte āgataṃ dhātumanasikāravidhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1525_2: dassetuṃ “atha vā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ye ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1525_3: Yathāpaccayaṃ ṭhitā sannivesavisiṭṭhā kaṭṭhavallitiṇamattikāyo upādāya yathā agārasamaññā,
anya-e0103n:1525_4: na tattha koci agāro nāma atthi, evaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ sannivesavisiṭṭhāni pavattamānāni
anya-e0103n:1525_5: aṭṭhinhārumaṃsacammāni paṭicca sarīrasamaññā, na ettha koci attā jīvo. Kevalaṃ tehi
anya-e0103n:1525_8: paṭipāṭiyā ussitaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ atirekatisatabhedaṃ aṭṭhiṃ upādāya. Nhāruñcāti tameva
anya-e0103n:1525_9: aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitaṃ navasatappabhedaṃ nhāruṃ. Maṃsanti tameva aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ
anya-e0103n:1525_10: anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ navapesisatappabhedaṃ maṃsaṃ. Cammanti macchikapattakacchāyāya
anya-e0103n:1525_11: chaviyā sañchāditaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ bahalacammaṃ paṭicca upādāya.
anya-e0103n:1525_12: Sabbattha ca-saddo samuccayattho. Ākāso parivāritoti yathā bhittipādādivasena ṭhapitaṃ
anya-e0103n:1525_13: kaṭṭhaṃ, tasseva ābandhanavalli, anulepanamattikā, chādanatiṇanti etāni kaṭṭhādīni
anya-e0103n:1525_14: anto, bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso agārantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati, gehanti paṇṇattiṃ
anya-e0103n:1525_15: labhati, evameva yathāvuttāni aṭṭhiādīni anto, bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso tāneva
anya-e0103n:1525_16: aṭṭhiādīni upādāya rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati, sarīranti vohāraṃ labhati. Yathā
anya-e0103n:1525_17: ca kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ loke “khattiyagehaṃ, brāhmaṇageha”nti
anya-e0103n:1525_18: vuccati, evamidampi “khattiyasarīraṃ brāhmaṇasarīra”nti voharīyati, natthettha koci
anya-e0103n:1526_0: Teti te cattāro koṭṭhāse vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti yojanā. Taṃtaṃantarānusārināti
anya-e0103n:1526_1: aṭṭhinhārūnaṃ nhārumaṃsānaṃ maṃsacammānanti tesaṃ tesaṃ koṭṭhāsānaṃ vivarānupātinā
anya-e0103n:1526_2: ñāṇasaṅkhātena hatthena. Vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti anekakkhattuṃ viniveṭhetvā.
anya-e0103n:1526_3: Atha vā vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti paccekaṃ aṭṭhiādīnaṃ antarānusārinā ñāṇahatthena
anya-e0103n:1526_4: vinibbhogaṃ katvā. Etesūti sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ catudhā katvā vibhattesu yathāvuttesu
anya-e0103n:1526_5: aṭṭhiādīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu. Purimanayenevāti “yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1526_6: pubbe vuttanayeneva. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ, taṃ anantaranaye vuttākāreneva vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1527_0: 309. Vitthārato āgate pana “catudhātuvavatthāne”ti ānetvā yojanā. Evaṃ idāni vuccamānākārena
anya-e0103n:1527_1: veditabbo bhāvanānayo. “Dvācattālīsāya ākārehi dhātuyo uggaṇhitvā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1527_2: nanu ādito dvattiṃsākārā dhātuyo na hontīti? Vatthusīsena dhātūnaṃyeva uggahetabbattā
anya-e0103n:1527_3: nāyaṃ doso. Vuttappakāreti “gocaragāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahi aṅgehi
anya-e0103n:1527_5: sabbakiccaṃ etenāti katasabbakicco, tenassa sīlavisodhanādi pana kammaṭṭhānuggahaṇato
anya-e0103n:1527_6: pageva siddhaṃ hotīti dasseti. Sasambhārasaṅkhepatoti sambharīyanti etena buddhivohārāti
anya-e0103n:1527_7: sambhāro, tannimittaṃ. Kiṃ panetaṃ? Pathavīādi. Kesādīsu hi vīsatiyā ākāresu “pathavī”ti
anya-e0103n:1527_8: buddhivohārā pathavīnimittakā thaddhataṃ upādāya pavattanato. Tasmā tattha pathavīsambhāro
anya-e0103n:1527_9: nāma savisesāya tassā atthitāya kesādayo saha sambhārehīti sasambhārā. Āpokoṭṭhāsādīsupi
anya-e0103n:1527_10: eseva nayo. Sasambhārānaṃ saṅkhepo sasambhārasaṅkhepo, tato sasambhārasaṅkhepato
anya-e0103n:1527_11: bhāvetabbanti yojanā. Saṅkhepato vīsatiyā, dvādasasu, catūsu, chasu ca koṭṭhāsesu
anya-e0103n:1527_12: yathākkamaṃ pathavīādikā catasso dhātuyo pariggahetvā dhātuvavatthānaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato
anya-e0103n:1528_0: Sasambhāravibhattitoti sasambhārānaṃ kesādīnaṃ vibhāgato kesādike vīsati koṭṭhāse
anya-e0103n:1528_1: pubbe viya ekajjhaṃ aggahetvā vibhāgato pathavīdhātubhāvena vavatthāpanaṃ. Āpokoṭṭhāsādīsupi
anya-e0103n:1528_2: eseva nayo. Salakkhaṇasaṅkhepatoti lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, dhammānaṃ sabhāvo,
anya-e0103n:1528_3: idha pana thaddhatādi. Tasmā thaddhalakkhaṇādivantatāya saha lakkhaṇehīti salakkhaṇā,
anya-e0103n:1528_4: kesādayo dvācattālīsa ākārā. Tesaṃ saṅkhepato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kesādike vīsati
anya-e0103n:1528_5: koṭṭhāse ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tattha thaddhatādikaṃ catubbidhampi lakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā
anya-e0103n:1528_6: bhāvanā salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato bhāvanā. Esa nayo āpokoṭṭhāsādīsupi. Salakkhaṇavibhattitoti
anya-e0103n:1528_7: thaddhalakkhaṇādinā salakkhaṇānaṃ kesādīnaṃ vibhāgato kesādīsu dvācattālīsāya ākāresu
anya-e0103n:1528_8: paccekaṃ thaddhatādīnaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vavatthāpanavasena bhāvanā.
anya-e0103n:1529_0: Evaṃ catūhi ākārehi uddiṭṭhaṃ bhāvanānayaṃ niddisituṃ “kathaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato
anya-e0103n:1529_1: bhāvetī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Ettha ca yathā tikkhapañño puggalo tikkhatāya paropariyattasabbhāvato
anya-e0103n:1529_2: tikkhindriyamudindriyatāvasena duvidhoti. Tattha tikkhindriyassa vasena saṅkhepato
anya-e0103n:1529_3: paṭhamanayo vutto, mudindriyassa vasena dutiyo. Evaṃ nātitikkhapaññopi puggaloti.
anya-e0103n:1529_4: Tattha yo visadindriyo puggalo, tassa vasena sasambhārasaṅkhepato, salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato
anya-e0103n:1529_5: ca bhāvanānayo niddiṭṭho. Yo pana nātivisadindriyo, tassa vasena sasambhāravibhattito,
anya-e0103n:1529_6: salakkhaṇavibhattito ca bhāvanānayo niddiṭṭhoti veditabbo. Tassa evaṃ vavatthāpayato
anya-e0103n:1529_7: eva dhātuyo pākaṭā honti savisesaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggahitattā. Bhāvanāvidhānaṃ panettha
anya-e0103n:1530_0: 310. Yassāti nātivisadindriyaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya vadati. Evaṃ bhāvayatoti sasambhārasaṅkhepato
anya-e0103n:1530_1: bhāventassa. Yena vidhinā uggahetvā kusalo hoti, so sattavidho vidhi “uggahakosalla”nti
anya-e0103n:1530_2: vuccati, tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ. Evaṃ manasikārakosallampi veditabbaṃ. Dvattiṃsākāreti
anya-e0103n:1530_4: ca idaṃ tejavāyukoṭṭhāsesu vaṇṇādivasena vavatthānassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. Sabbaṃ tattha
anya-e0103n:1530_6: yāva “anupubbamuñcanādivasenā”ti padaṃ, tāva āgataṃ sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ kātabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:1531_1: kesā”ti evaṃ vohariyamānā bhūtupādāyadhammā “mayi kesā jātā, mayamettha jātā”ti evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1531_2: aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇasuññā. Iminā kāraṇassa ca phalassa ca abyāpāratāya
anya-e0103n:1531_3: dhātumattataṃ sandasseti, tena ca ābhogapaccavekkhaṇānampi evameva abyāpāratā dīpitāti
anya-e0103n:1531_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi tāni, tesaṃ kāraṇāni ca tathā tathā ābhujitvā, paccavekkhitvā ca
anya-e0103n:1531_5: uppajjanti, paccayabhāvaṃ vā gacchantīti. Itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Acetanoti
anya-e0103n:1531_6: na cetano, cetanārahito vā. Abyākatoti abyākatarāsipariyāpanno. Suññoti attasuñño.
anya-e0103n:1531_7: Tato eva nissatto. Thaddhalakkhaṇādhikatāya thaddho. Tato eva pathavīdhātūti evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1532: 312. Suññagāmaṭṭhāneti ettha suññagāmaggahaṇaṃ paramatthato vedakavirahadassanatthaṃ kāyassa.
anya-e0103n:1538_0: 318. Paṇhikaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādhārabhāvo viya gopphakaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādheyyabhāvopi asamannāhārasiddhoti
anya-e0103n:1540: 321. Uraṭṭhisaṅghāṭo pañjarasadisatāya “uraṭṭhipañjara”nti vutto. Tassa athirabhāvadassanatthaṃ jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ nidassanabhāvena gahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1542_1: vuttaṃ. Evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānātīti ettha na vakkahadayāni
anya-e0103n:1542_2: jānanti “mayaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchannānī”ti, na sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ
anya-e0103n:1544: 325. Dvinnaṃ thanānamantareti dvinnaṃ thanappadesānaṃ vemajjhe, thanappadeso ca abbhantaravasena veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1546: 328. Āmāsaye ṭhito paribhuttāhāro udariyanti adhippetanti āha “udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyita”nti.
anya-e0103n:1547_0: 331. Abaddhapittaṃ saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ viya, kāyusmā viya ca kammajarūpapaṭibaddhavuttikanti
anya-e0103n:1547_1: āha “ābaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti. Paṭibaddhatāvacanena
anya-e0103n:1547_2: cassa jīvitindriye sati sabbhāvameva dīpeti, na jīvitindriyassa viya ekantakammajatanti
anya-e0103n:1547_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pittakosaketi mahākosāṭakīkosasadise pittādhāre. Yūsabhūtoti rasabhūto.
anya-e0103n:1549: 333. Pubbāsayo mandapaññānaṃ kesañcideva hotīti katvā asabbasādhāraṇanti adhippāyenāha “pubbo anibaddhokāso”ti.
anya-e0103n:1550_0: 334. Pittaṃ viyāti abaddhapittaṃ viya. Sakalasarīranti jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0103n:1550_1: sarīrappadesaṃ. Vakkahadayayakanapapphāsāni tementanti ettha yakanaṃ heṭṭhābhāgapūraṇena,
anya-e0103n:1550_2: itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇena ca temetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni
anya-e0103n:1550_3: temayamāneti temakatemitabbānaṃ abyāpāratāsāmaññanidassanatthaṃ eva upamā daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0103n:1550_4: na ṭhānasāmaññanidassanatthaṃ. Sannicitalohitena hi temetabbānaṃ kesañci heṭṭhā,
anya-e0103n:1550_5: kassaci upari ṭhitatā kāyagatāsatiniddese dassitāti. Yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1550_6: “mayi lohitaṃ ṭhita”nti na jānāti, vakkādīni “amhe temayamānaṃ lohitaṃ ṭhita”nti
anya-e0103n:1551_0: 336. Patthinnasinehoti thinabhāvaṃ ghanabhāvaṃ gatasineho. Sakalasarīre maṃsanti
anya-e0103n:1551_1: yojanā, tañca thūlasarīraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Medassa satipi patthinnatāya ghanabhāve
anya-e0103n:1551_2: maṃsassa viya na baddhatāti vuttaṃ “patthinnayūso”ti. Tenevassa āpokoṭṭhāsatā.
anya-e0103n:1552: 337. Udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesūti nātipariṇatānaṃ sajalakānaṃ aggato chinnānaṃ tālasalāṭukānaṃ vivarāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1553: 338. Vasāya attano ādhāre abhibyāpanamukhena abyāpāratāsāmaññaṃ vibhāvetabbanti ācāmagatatelaṃ nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1555_0: 343. Kesādīsu manasikāraṃ pavattetvā tejokoṭṭhāsesu pavattetabbo manasikāroti vibhattiṃ
anya-e0103n:1555_1: pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ. Yena santappatīti yena kāyo santappati, ayaṃ santappanakicco.
anya-e0103n:1555_2: Tejoti tassa pariggaṇhanākāro eva paccāmaṭṭho. Yena jīrīyatītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:1556_1: iminā vuttākārena sasambhāravibhattito pavattakammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa. Dhātuyo pākaṭā
anya-e0103n:1556_2: hontīti vitthārato pariggahitattā dhātuyo vibhūtā honti. Idhāpi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ heṭṭhā
anya-e0103n:1557: 345. Tatthevāti tesuyeva vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu. Paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ vitthambhanalakkhaṇanti etthāpi “tatthevā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1558_0: Puna tatthevāti tesuyeva dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesūti attho. Ettha ca kesādikoṭṭhāsānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1558_1: saṃviggahatāya tattha vijjamānā āpodhātuādayo nhāniyacuṇṇādīsu udakādayo viya suviññeyyāti
anya-e0103n:1559_0: Santappanāditejokoṭṭhāsesu pana vāyodhātuādayo na tathā suviññeyyāti katvā “tena
anya-e0103n:1559_1: avinibhutta”nti vuttaṃ, na tatthevāti. Yadi evaṃ, vāyukoṭṭhāsesu kathaṃ tatthevāti?
anya-e0103n:1559_2: Vāyukoṭṭhāsāpi hi uddhaṅgamavātādayo piṇḍākāreneva pariggahetabbataṃ upagacchanti,
anya-e0103n:1559_3: na pana santappanāditejokoṭṭhāsāti nāyaṃ doso. Tattha tenāti tena tejena. Avinibhuttanti
anya-e0103n:1559_4: avinābhūtaṃ, taṃtaṃkalāpagatavasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vavatthāpayatoti vuttākārena
anya-e0103n:1559_5: salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo vavatthāpentassa. Vuttanayenāti “tassevaṃ vāyamamānassā”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena.
anya-e0103n:1560_0: 346. Evampi bhāvayatoti salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo pariggahetvā bhāventassāpi.
anya-e0103n:1560_1: Pubbe vuttanayenāti sasambhāravibhattito bhāvanāyaṃ vuttena nayena. Evanti yathā
anya-e0103n:1560_2: kese, evaṃ. Sabbakoṭṭhāsesūti ekacattālīsabhedesu sesasabbakoṭṭhāsesu evamettha aṭṭhasaṭṭhidhātusatassa
anya-e0103n:1560_3: pariggaho vutto hoti. Bhāvanāvidhānaṃ panettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
anya-e0103n:1561_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha vacanatthatoti yasmā sabbapaṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānassa uggahaṇaṃ vacanavasena
anya-e0103n:1561_2: hoti vacanadvārena tadatthassa ādito gahetabbato, tasmā vacanatthatopi dhātūnaṃ manasikātabbatā
anya-e0103n:1561_3: vuttā. Kalāpatoti vacanatthavasena visesato, sāmaññato ca dhātuyo pariggahetvā ṭhitassa
anya-e0103n:1561_4: yasmā tā piṇḍaso pavattanti, na paccekaṃ, tasmā kalāpatopi manasikātabbatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1561_5: Te pana kalāpā paramāṇuparimāṇā hontīti tappariyāpannānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ ekasmiṃ
anya-e0103n:1561_6: sarīre parimeyyaparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ cuṇṇato manasikātabbatā vuttā. So panāyaṃ tāsaṃ
anya-e0103n:1561_7: cuṇṇato manasikāro saṅghāṭavasena hotīti nibbaṭṭitasarūpameva pariggahetabbaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1561_8: lakkhaṇādito manasikāro vutto. Lakkhaṇādito dhātuyo pariggaṇhantena salakkhaṇavibhattito
anya-e0103n:1561_9: kammaṭṭhānābhinivese yasmā dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena dhātūsu pariggayhamānāsu
anya-e0103n:1561_10: “ettakā utusamuṭṭhānā, ettakā cittādisamuṭṭhānā”ti ayaṃ vibhāgo ñātabbo hoti, tasmā
anya-e0103n:1562_0: Evaṃ pariññātasamuṭṭhānānampi tāsaṃ saddānusārena vinā visesasāmaññapariggaho kātabboti
anya-e0103n:1562_1: dassetuṃ nānattekattato manasikāro vutto. Lakkhaṇavisesato vinibhuttarūpāpi etā aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya
anya-e0103n:1562_2: padesena avinibhuttāti ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ vinibbhogāvinibbhogato
anya-e0103n:1562_3: manasikāro vutto. Satipi avinibbhogavuttiyaṃ kācideva kāsañci sabhāgā, kāci visabhāgāti
anya-e0103n:1562_4: ayampi viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ sabhāgavisabhāgato manasikāro vutto. Sabhāgavisabhāgāpi
anya-e0103n:1562_5: dhātuyo ajjhattikā īdisakiccavisesayuttā, bāhirā tabbiparītāti ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti
anya-e0103n:1562_6: dassetuṃ ajjhattikabāhiravisesato manasikāro vutto. Sajātisaṅgahādiko dhātusaṅgahavisesopi
anya-e0103n:1562_7: pariggahitabboti dassetuṃ saṅgahato manasikāro vutto. Sandhāraṇādīhi yathāsakakiccehi
anya-e0103n:1562_8: aññamaññūpatthambhabhāvatopi dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ paccayato manasikāro
anya-e0103n:1562_9: vutto. Abyāpāranayato dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ asamannāhārato manasikāro
anya-e0103n:1562_10: vutto. Attano paccayadhammavisesato, paccayabhāvavisesato ca dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti
anya-e0103n:1562_11: dassetuṃ paccayavibhāgato manasikāro vuttoti evametesaṃ terasannaṃ ākārānaṃ pariggahe
anya-e0103n:1562_12: kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ākārehīti pakārehi, kāraṇehi vā.
anya-e0103n:1563_0: 347. Tattha patthaṭattāti puthuttā, tena puthubhāvato puthuvī, puthuvī eva pathavīti
anya-e0103n:1563_1: niruttinayena saddatthamāha. Patthanaṭṭhena vā pathavī, patiṭṭhābhāvena patthāyati
anya-e0103n:1563_2: upatiṭṭhatīti attho. “Appotī”ti padassa attho heṭṭhā vutto eva. Āpīyatīti sosīyati,
anya-e0103n:1563_3: pivīyatīti keci. “Ayaṃ panattho sasambhārāpe yujjatī”ti vadanti, lakkhaṇāpepi yujjateva.
anya-e0103n:1563_4: Sopi hi pharusapācanavisosanākārena sesabhūtattayena pīyamāno viya pavattatīti. Appāyatīti
anya-e0103n:1563_5: brūheti. Paribrūhanarasā hi āpodhātu. Tejatīti niseti, tikkhabhāvena sesabhūtattayaṃ
anya-e0103n:1563_6: usmāpayatīti attho. Vāyatīti samīreti, desantaruppattihetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghātaṃ gametīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1564_0: Evaṃ tāva visesato vacanatthaṃ vatvā idāni sāmaññato vattuṃ “avisesena panā”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1564_1: vuttaṃ. Salakkhaṇadhāraṇatoti yathā titthiyaparikappito “pakati attā”ti evamādiko
anya-e0103n:1564_2: sabhāvato natthi, na evametā. Etā pana salakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo. Dukkhādānatoti
anya-e0103n:1564_3: dukkhassa vidahanato. Etā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā ayalohādidhātuyo
anya-e0103n:1564_4: viya ayalohādiṃ anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti. Dukkhādhānatoti anappakassa
anya-e0103n:1564_5: dukkhassa vidhānamattato avasavattanato, taṃ vā dukkhaṃ etāhi kāraṇabhūtāhi sattehi
anya-e0103n:1564_6: anuvidhīyati, tathāvihitañca taṃ etāsveva dhīyati ṭhapīyatīti evaṃ dukkhādhānato,
anya-e0103n:1564_7: dhātuyo. Apica “nijjīvaṭṭho dhātuṭṭho”ti vuttovāyamattho. Tathā hi bhagavā “chadhāturoyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1564_8: bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti. Iti vacanatthamukhenapi
anya-e0103n:1564_9: asādhāraṇato, sādhāraṇato ca dhātūnaṃ sarasalakkhaṇameva vibhāvīyatīti āha “evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1564_10: visesasāmaññavasena vacanatthato manasi kātabbā”ti. Manasikāro pana vacanatthamukhena
anya-e0103n:1564_11: dhātuyo pariggahetvā ṭhitassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1565_0: 348. Ākārehīti pakārehi. Atha vā ākarīyanti dissanti ettha dhātuyoti ākārā, koṭṭhāsā.
anya-e0103n:1565_1: Aṭṭhadhammasamodhānāti yathāvuttānaṃ paccayavisesena visiṭṭharūpānaṃ vaṇṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
anya-e0103n:1565_2: dhammānaṃ samavadhānato sannivesavisesavasena sahāvaṭṭhānato taṃ upādāya. Kesāti
anya-e0103n:1565_3: sammuti samaññāmattaṃ hoti. Tesaṃyeva vinibbhogāti tesaṃyeva vaṇṇādīnaṃ vinibbhujanato.
anya-e0103n:1565_4: Yathā hi vaṇṇādayo aṭṭha dhammā paññāya vinibbhujjamānā aññamaññabyatirekena paramatthato
anya-e0103n:1565_5: upalabbhanti, na evaṃ vaṇṇādibyatirekena paramatthato kesā upalabbhanti. Tasmā ye
anya-e0103n:1565_6: ca dhamme samudite upādāya “kesā”ti sammuti, tesu visuṃ visuṃ katesu natthi “kesā”ti
anya-e0103n:1566_1: gahetvā vuttaṃ, na tesaṃ aṭṭhadhammamattabhāvato. Kammasamuṭṭhāno koṭṭhāsoti kesesu
anya-e0103n:1566_2: tāva kesamūlaṃ, evaṃ lomādīsupi yathārahaṃ veditabbaṃ. Dasadhammakalāpopīti ettha
anya-e0103n:1566_3: asitādiparipācako tejokoṭṭhāso navadhammakalāpopīti vattabbo. Yadime kesādikoṭṭhāsā
anya-e0103n:1566_4: yathārahaṃ aṭṭhanavadasadhammasamūhabhūtā, atha kasmā pathavīādidhātumattato manasi
anya-e0103n:1566_5: karīyantīti āha “ussadavasena panā”tiādi. Yasmā ayaṃ dhātumanasikāro yāvadeva sattasaññāsamugghāṭanattho,
anya-e0103n:1566_6: dhammavinibbhogo ca sātisayaṃ sattasaññāsamugghāṭāya saṃvattati, tasmā koṭṭhāsesu
anya-e0103n:1566_7: evaṃ dhammavibhāgo veditabbo. Ettha hi udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbo muttañca utusamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0103n:1566_8: asitādiparipācakatejo kammasamuṭṭhāno, assāsapassāsavāto cittasamuṭṭhānoti cha ekasamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0103n:1566_9: sedoassu kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti cattāro utucittavasena dvisamuṭṭhānā, sesā dvattiṃsa catusamuṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1567_0: Tesu asitādiparipācake tejokoṭṭhāse eko kalāpo jīvitanavako, aññesu ekasamuṭṭhānesu
anya-e0103n:1567_1: utusamuṭṭhāno, cittasamuṭṭhāno vā ekeko aṭṭhako, dvisamuṭṭhānesu utucittavasena dve
anya-e0103n:1567_2: dve aṭṭhakā, catusamuṭṭhānesu utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānā tayo tayo aṭṭhakā, utucittasamuṭṭhānesu
anya-e0103n:1567_3: saddanavakā, aṭṭhasu tejovāyokoṭṭhāsesu aṭṭha jīvitanavakā, sesesu catuvīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu
anya-e0103n:1567_5: cāti paripuṇṇāyatanake rūpakāye bhedaṃ anāmasitvā ekattavasena gayhamānā sattacattālīsādhikasatarūpakalāpā
anya-e0103n:1567_6: rūpavibhāgato sādhikaṃ diyaḍḍharūpasahassaṃ hoti, koṭṭhāsānaṃ pana avayavavibhāgena
anya-e0103n:1567_7: tadavayavakalāpānaṃ bhede gayhamāne rūpadhammānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyabhedatā veditabbā. Evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1567_8: dhammavibhāgato anekabhedabhinnāpi ime dvācattālīsa koṭṭhāsā ussadaggahaṇena catudhātuvaseneva
anya-e0103n:1567_9: vavatthapetabbā. Tenāha “ussadavasena pana…pe… manasi kātabbā”ti. Tattha manasikāravidhi
anya-e0103n:1568_0: 349. Majjhimena pamāṇenāti ārohapariṇāhehi majjhimasarīre labbhamānena majjhimena
anya-e0103n:1568_1: parimāṇena. Pariggayhamānāti paññāya paritakketvā gayhamānā. Paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇāti
anya-e0103n:1568_2: ettha yathā “aṅgulassa aṭṭhamo bhāgo yavo, yavassa aṭṭhamo bhāgo ūkā, ūkāya aṭṭhamo
anya-e0103n:1568_3: bhāgo likkhā, likkhāya aṭṭhamo bhāgo rathareṇu, rathareṇussa aṭṭhamo bhāgo tajjārī,
anya-e0103n:1568_4: tajjāriyā aṭṭhamo bhāgo aṇu, evaṃ aṇuno aṭṭhamo bhāgo paramāṇu nāmā”ti keci. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1568_5: pana “sattadhaññamāsappamāṇaṃ ekaṃ aṅgulaṃ, sattaūkāpamāṇo eko dhaññamāso, sattalikkhāpamāṇā
anya-e0103n:1568_6: ekā ūkā, chattiṃsarathareṇuppamāṇā ekā likkhā, chattiṃsatajjārippamāṇo eko rathareṇu,
anya-e0103n:1568_7: chattiṃsaaṇuppamāṇā ekā tajjārī, chattiṃsaparamāṇuppamāṇo eko aṇū”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā
anya-e0103n:1568_8: aṇuno chattiṃsatimabhāgamatto paramāṇu nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko maṃsacakkhussa agocaro
anya-e0103n:1568_10: cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhūtā. Sukhumarajabhūtāti tatoyeva ativiya sukhumarajabhāvaṃ gatā.
anya-e0103n:1569_0: Doṇamattā siyāti soḷasa nāḷimattā. Idhāpi “majjhimena pamāṇenā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1569_1: Tena “pakatiyā catumuṭṭhikaṃ kuḍuvaṃ, catukuḍuvaṃ nāḷi, tāya nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo
anya-e0103n:1569_2: doṇaṃ, taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontī”ti vadanti. Saṅgahitāti yathā
anya-e0103n:1569_3: na vippakirati, evaṃ ābandhanavasena sampiṇḍitvā gahitā. Anupālitāti yathā paggharaṇasabhāvāya
anya-e0103n:1569_4: āpodhātuyā vasena kilinnabhāvaṃ, picchilabhāvaṃ vā nāpajjati, evaṃ anurakkhitā. Vitthambhitāti
anya-e0103n:1569_5: saṅghātavāyunā ativiya vitthambhanaṃ pāpitā. Na vikirati na viddhaṃsatīti sukhumarajabhūtāpi
anya-e0103n:1569_7: sinehena temitā tejasā paripakkā vāyunā vitthambhanaṃ pāpitā piṭṭhacuṇṇā viya na
anya-e0103n:1569_8: ito cito ca vikirati na viddhaṃsati, atha kho piṇḍitā ghanabhūtā hutvā nānappakārena
anya-e0103n:1569_9: gahetabbataṃ āpajjati. Tenāha “avikiriyamānā”tiādi. Tattha vikappanti vibhāgaṃ. Yadipi
anya-e0103n:1569_10: tejovāyodhātuyopi saviggahā rūpadhammabhāvato, yādiso pana ghanabhāvo pathavīāpodhātūsu
anya-e0103n:1569_11: labbhati, na tādiso tejovāyodhātūsu labbhatīti meyyabhāvābhāvato tattha cuṇṇabhedo
anya-e0103n:1569_12: na uddhaṭo. Tathā hi sasambhāratejovāyūsupi meyyabhāvo na labbhateva.
anya-e0103n:1570_0: Yūsagatāti yūsabhāvaṃ dravabhāvaṃ gatā. Tato eva ābandhanākārabhūtā. Na paggharatīti
anya-e0103n:1570_1: na ogaḷati. Na parissavatīti na vissandati. Pīṇitapīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti āpodhātuyā
anya-e0103n:1571_0: Usumākārabhūtāti etena kāye pākatikausmāpi gahaṇīsaṅkhātāya tassāyeva tejodhātuyā
anya-e0103n:1571_1: vasena hotīti dasseti. Paripācetīti santejeti. Sā hi yathābhuttassa āhārassa sammā
anya-e0103n:1571_2: pariṇāmanena rasādisampattiyā hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti santejetīti
anya-e0103n:1571_3: vuccati. Tenevāha “na pūtibhāvaṃ dassetī”ti. Kammūpanissayāya, cittappasādahetukāya
anya-e0103n:1571_4: ca sarīre vaṇṇasampadāya tejodhātu visesapaccayo, pageva utuāhārasamuṭṭhānāya rūpasampattiyā
anya-e0103n:1572_0: Samudīraṇavitthambhanalakkhaṇāti ettha samudīraṇaṃ anupellanaṃ, visosananti keci.
anya-e0103n:1572_1: Vitthambhanaṃ sesabhūtattayassa thambhitattāpādanaṃ, uppīlananti eke. Tāyāti vitthambhanalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0103n:1572_2: vāyodhātuyā. Aparāyāti samudīraṇalakkhaṇāya. Sā hi pellanasabhāvā. Tenāha “samabbhāhato”ti.
anya-e0103n:1572_3: Samabbhāhanañca rūpakalāpassa desantaruppattiyā hetubhāvo. Avaghaṭṭanaṃ āsannataruppattiyā.
anya-e0103n:1572_4: Lāḷetīti parivatteti. Idāni yadatthaṃ cuṇṇato manasikāro āgato, taṃ nigamanavasena
anya-e0103n:1572_5: dassetuṃ “evameta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha dhātuyantanti suttena viya yantarūpakaṃ asatipi
anya-e0103n:1572_6: kattubhūte attani cittavasena dhātumayaṃ yantaṃ pavattati, idhāpi manasikāravidhi
anya-e0103n:1573_0: 350. Yadipi catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ lakkhaṇādayo heṭṭhā tattha tattha vuttā eva, tathāpi
anya-e0103n:1573_1: te anavasesato dassetvā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānapariggahavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “lakkhaṇādito”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1573_2: āraddhaṃ. Tattha lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, kakkhaḷattaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0103n:1573_3: Nanu ca kakkhaḷattameva pathavīdhātūti? Saccametaṃ, tathāpi viññātāviññātasaddatthatāvasena
anya-e0103n:1573_4: abhinnepi dhamme kappanāsiddhena bhedena evaṃ niddeso kato. Evaṃ hi atthavisesāvabodho
anya-e0103n:1573_5: hotīti. Atha vā lakkhīyatīti lakkhaṇaṃ, kakkhaḷattaṃ hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇāti
anya-e0103n:1573_6: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesāsupi eseva nayo. Patiṭṭhānarasāti sahajātadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1573_7: patiṭṭhābhāvakiccā. Tato eva nesaṃ sampaṭicchanākārena ñāṇassa paccupatiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0103n:1573_8: sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā. Padaṭṭhānaṃ panettha aññadhammatāya na uddhaṭaṃ, sādhāraṇabhāvasabbhāvato
anya-e0103n:1573_9: vā dūrakāraṇaṃ viya. Yathā vā dhammuddesavāravaṇṇanādīsu rasādinā aññesaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1573_10: dassetvā paccayavantatādassanatthaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṭaṃ, na evamidha. Idha pana
anya-e0103n:1573_12: na uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Brūhanarasāti sahajātadhammānaṃ vaḍḍhanakiccā. Tathā hi
anya-e0103n:1573_13: sā nesaṃ pīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti vuccati. Saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraudakaṃ viya
anya-e0103n:1573_15: bāhiraggi viya jatulohādīnaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ mudubhāvānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā. Abhinīhāro
anya-e0103n:1573_16: bhūtasaṅghāṭassa desantaruppattihetubhāvo, nīharaṇaṃ vā bījato aṅkurassa viya.
anya-e0103n:1574_0: 351. Utusamuṭṭhānāva kammādivasena anuppattito. Utucittasamuṭṭhānā kadāci ututo,
anya-e0103n:1574_1: kadāci cittato uppajjanato. Avasesāti vuttāvasesā kesādayo catuvīsati, ādito tayo
anya-e0103n:1574_2: tejokoṭṭhāsā, pañca vāyokoṭṭhāsā cāti dvattiṃsa. Sabbepīti te sabbepi kammādivasena
anya-e0103n:1574_3: uppajjanato catusamuṭṭhānā. Kesādīnampi hi maṃsato avimuttabhāgo kammāhāracittasamuṭṭhānova hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1575_0: 352. Nānattekattatoti visesasāmaññato. Dhammānaṃ hi aññamaññaṃ visadisatā nānattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1575_1: samānatā ekattaṃ. Sabbāsampīti catunnampi. Salakkhaṇāditoti sakaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1575_2: tato salakkhaṇādito. Ādi-saddena rasapaccupaṭṭhānānaṃ viya mudusaṇhapharusabhāvādīnampi
anya-e0103n:1575_3: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. “Kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena nānattabhūtāna”nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu
anya-e0103n:1575_4: kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ekattaṃ hoti sādhāraṇattāti? Na, “aññā
anya-e0103n:1575_5: eva dhātuyo kammasamuṭṭhānā, aññā utuādisamuṭṭhānā”tiādikaṃ bhedaṃ sandhāya tathā
anya-e0103n:1575_6: vacanato. Etāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ. Ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ ruppanasabhāvaṃ. Kimpanetaṃ ruppanaṃ
anya-e0103n:1575_7: nāma? Yā sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppatti, tasmiṃ vā sati yo vijjamānasseva
anya-e0103n:1575_8: visadisuppattiyā hetubhāvo, taṃ ruppanaṃ. Anatītattāti apariccajanato.
anya-e0103n:1576_0: Mahantapātubhāvo cettha sasambhāradhātuvasena veditabbo, tathā mahāvikāratā mahābhūtasāmaññalakkhaṇadhātuvasena,
anya-e0103n:1576_2: napuṃsakaniddeso. Mahantāni pātubhūtāni anekasatasahassa rūpakalāpasaṅghāṭatāya samūhavasena,
anya-e0103n:1576_4: Cattāri nahutānīti cattāri dasasahassāni. Devadānavādīnaṃ tigāvutādisarīravasena
anya-e0103n:1577_0: Tatthāyaṃ vacanattho – mahantāni bhūtāni jātāni nibbattānīti mahābhūtānīti. Anekābhūtavisesadassanena,
anya-e0103n:1577_1: anekabbhutadassanena ca anekacchariyadassanavasena mahanto abbhuto, mahantāni vā
anya-e0103n:1577_2: abhūtāni etthāti mahābhūto, māyākāro. Yakkhādayo jātivaseneva mahantā bhūtāti mahābhūtā,
anya-e0103n:1577_3: niruḷho vā ayaṃ tesu mahābhūtasaddo daṭṭhabbo. Pathavīādayo pana vañcakatāya, aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya
anya-e0103n:1577_4: ca mahābhūtā viya mahābhūtā. Bhūtasaddassa ubhayaliṅgatāya napuṃsakatā katā. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1577_5: vañcakatā sayaṃ anīlādisabhāvāni hutvā nīlādisabhāvassa upaṭṭhāpanaṃ, anitthipurisādisabhāvāneva
anya-e0103n:1577_6: ca hutvā itthipurisādiākārassa upaṭṭhāpanaṃ. Tathā aññamaññassa anto, bahi ca aṭṭhitānaṃyeva
anya-e0103n:1577_7: aññamaññaṃ nissāya avaṭṭhānato aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatā. Yadi hi imā dhātuyo aññamaññassa
anya-e0103n:1577_8: anto ṭhitā, na sakiccakarā siyuṃ aññamaññānuppavesanato, atha bahi ṭhitā vinibbhuttā
anya-e0103n:1577_9: siyuṃ. Tathā sati avinibbhuttavādo hāyeyya, tasmā na niddisitabbaṭṭhānā. Evaṃ santepi
anya-e0103n:1577_10: patiṭṭhānādinā yathāsakaṃ kiccavisesena sesānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upakārikā honti, yena
anya-e0103n:1577_11: sahajātādinā paccayena paccayā honti. Tenāha “na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1578_0: Mahāparihāratoti ettha vacanatthaṃ vadanto āha “mahantehi…pe… bhūtāni, mahāparihārāni
anya-e0103n:1578_1: vā bhūtānī”ti. Tattha pacchimatthe purimapade uttarapadassa parihāra-saddassa lopaṃ
anya-e0103n:1579_0: Tathā hīti tato eva vikārassa mahantattā evāti taṃ vikāraṃ dassetuṃ “bhūmito”tiādi
anya-e0103n:1579_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha accimatoti aggissa. Koṭisatasahassaṃ ekaṃ koṭisatasahassekaṃ cakkavāḷanti
anya-e0103n:1579_2: taṃ sabbaṃ āṇākhettabhāvena ekaṃ katvā vadati. Vilīyatīti vipattikarameghābhivuṭṭhena
anya-e0103n:1579_3: khārudakena lavaṇaṃ viya vilayaṃ gacchati viddhaṃsati. Kupitenāti khubhitena. Vikīratīti
anya-e0103n:1580_0: Anupādinnesu vikāramahattaṃ dassetvā upādinnesu dassento “patthaddho”tiādimāha. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1580_1: kaṭṭhamukhena vāti vā-saddo upamattho. Yathā kaṭṭhamukhena sappena ḍaṭṭho patthaddho
anya-e0103n:1580_2: hoti, evaṃ pathavīdhātuppakopena so kāyo kaṭṭhamukheva hoti, kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato
anya-e0103n:1580_3: viya patthaddho hotīti attho. Atha vā vā-saddo avadhāraṇattho. So “pathavīdhātuppakopena
anya-e0103n:1580_4: vā”ti evaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbo. Ayañhettha attho – kaṭṭhamukhena ḍaṭṭhopi kāyo
anya-e0103n:1580_5: pathavīdhātuppakopeneva patthaddho hoti, tasmā pathavīdhātuyā aviyutto so kāyo sabbadā
anya-e0103n:1580_6: kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hotīti. Vā-saddo vā aniyamattho, tatrāyamattho – kaṭṭhamukhena
anya-e0103n:1580_7: ḍaṭṭho kāyo patthaddho hoti vā, na vā hoti mantāgadavasena, pathavīdhātuppakopena
anya-e0103n:1580_8: pana mantāgadarahito so kāyo kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hoti ekantapatthaddhoti.
anya-e0103n:1581_0: Pūtiyoti kuthito. Santattoti sabbaso tatto samuppannadāho. Sañchinnoti samantato
anya-e0103n:1581_1: chinno paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇo āyasmato upasenattherassa sarīraṃ viya. Mahāvikārāni
anya-e0103n:1581_2: bhūtānīti mahāvikāravantāni bhūtāni mahābhūtānīti purimapade uttarapadalopena niddeso
anya-e0103n:1581_3: daṭṭhabbo. “Pathavī”tiādinā sabbalokassa pākaṭānipi vipallāsaṃ muñcitvā yathāsabhāvato
anya-e0103n:1581_4: pariggaṇhane mahantena vāyāmena vinā na pariggaṇhantīti duviññeyyasabhāvattā “mahantānī”ti
anya-e0103n:1581_5: vuccanti. Tāni hi suviññeyyāni. “Amahantānī”ti mantvā ṭhitā tesaṃ duppariggahataṃ
anya-e0103n:1581_6: disvā “aho mahantāni etānī”ti jānātīti mahābhūtekadesatādīhi vā kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0103n:1581_7: Etā hi dhātuyo mahābhūtekadesato, mahābhūtasāmaññato, mahābhūtasannissayato, mahābhūtabhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1582_0: Tattha mahābhūtekadesatoti “bhūtamidanti, bhikkhave, samanupassathā”tiādīsu hi avisesena
anya-e0103n:1582_1: khandhapañcakaṃ “bhūta”nti vuccati. Tattha yadidaṃ kāmabhave, rūpabhave, pañcavokārabhave,
anya-e0103n:1582_2: ekacce ca saññībhave pavattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ, taṃ mahāvisayatāya “mahābhūta”nti
anya-e0103n:1582_3: vattabbataṃ arahati. Pathavīādayo pana catasso dhātuyo tassa mahābhūtassa ekadesabhūtā
anya-e0103n:1582_4: “mahābhūtā”ti vuccanti. Samudāyesu hi pavattavohārā avayavesupi dissanti yathā “samuddo
anya-e0103n:1582_5: diṭṭho, paṭo daḍḍho”ti ca. Mahābhūtasamaññatoti tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavanti ettha
anya-e0103n:1582_6: upādārūpānīti bhūtāni, pathavīādayo catasso dhātuyo. Sā panāyametāsu bhūtasamaññā
anya-e0103n:1582_7: anaññatthavuttitāya upādārūpānaṃ aviparītaṭṭhā, lokassa cetā bahūpakārā, cakkhusamuddādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1582_8: nissayabhūtā cāti mahantāni bhūtānīti samaññāyiṃsu. Mahābhūtasannissayatoti mahantānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1582_9: mahānubhāvānaṃ mahāsammatamandhātuppabhutīnaṃ raññaṃ, sakkādīnaṃ devānaṃ, vepacittiādīnaṃ
anya-e0103n:1582_10: asurānaṃ, mahābrahmādīnaṃ brahmānaṃ, guṇato vā mahantānaṃ buddhānaṃ, paccekabuddhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1582_11: sāvakānaṃ upādāyupādāya vā sabbesampi bhūtānaṃ sattānaṃ nissayabhūtatāya mahantā
anya-e0103n:1582_12: bhūtā etesūti mahābhūtā. Cātumahābhūtiko hi nesaṃ kāyoti. Mahābhūtabhāvatoti bahubhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1582_13: Ayaṃ hi mahā-saddo “mahājano sannipatito”tiādīsu bahubhāve dissati. Pathavīādayo
anya-e0103n:1582_14: ca dhātuyo ekasmimpi attabhāve aparimeyyappabhedā pavattanti. Tasmā mahantā bahū
anya-e0103n:1584: Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto, sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacī”ti. –
anya-e0103n:1585_0: Hi evamādīsu khīṇāsavo “bhūto”ti vutto. So hi ucchinnabhavanettikatāya āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikattā
anya-e0103n:1585_1: ekantato “bhūto”ti vuccati, na itare, bhavissantīti vohāraṃ anatītattā. Bhūto eva
anya-e0103n:1585_2: idha pūjāvasena “mahābhūto”ti vutto yathā “mahākhīṇāsavo, mahāmoggallāno”ti ca. Imāsañca
anya-e0103n:1585_3: dhātūnaṃ anādimati saṃsāre pabandhavasena pavattamānānaṃ yathāvuttassa mahābhūtasseva
anya-e0103n:1585_4: santāne pariyosānappatti, nāññatra. Tasmā mahābhūte bhūtā pariyosānaṃ pattāti mahābhūtā
anya-e0103n:1585_5: purimapade bhūta-saddassa lopaṃ katvā. Evametā dhātuyo mahābhūtekadesatādīhi mahābhūtāti
anya-e0103n:1585_7: āha “dhātulakkhaṇaṃ anatītattā”ti. Na hi sāmaññapariccāgena viseso, visesanirapekkhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1585_8: vā sāmaññaṃ pavattati. Tathā hi vadanti –
anya-e0103n:1588_0: Salakkhaṇadhāraṇena cāti yena salakkhaṇadhāraṇena “dhātuyo”ti vuccanti, teneva “dhammā”tipi
anya-e0103n:1588_1: vuccanti ubhayathāpi nissattanijjīvatāya eva vibhāvanato. Tenevāha – “chadhāturoyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1588_2: bhikkhu puriso, dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī”ti ca. Arūpānaṃ khaṇato rūpānaṃ khaṇassa
anya-e0103n:1588_3: nātiittaratāyāha “attano khaṇānurūpa”nti. Dharaṇenāti ṭhānena, pavattanenāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1589_0: 353. Sahuppannāva etāti etā catasso dhātuyo saha uppannāva saha pavattamānāva samānakāle
anya-e0103n:1589_1: labbhamānāpi avakaṃsato sabbapariyantime utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānesu suddhaṭṭhake, kammajesu
anya-e0103n:1589_2: jīvitanavaketi ekekasmiṃ suddhaṭṭhakādikalāpepi padesena avinibbhuttā visuṃ visuṃ
anya-e0103n:1589_3: aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya. Yattha hi tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ patiṭṭhāvasena pathavī, tattheva
anya-e0103n:1589_4: tassā ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇavasena itarā. Esa nayo sesāsupi.
anya-e0103n:1590_0: 354. Purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā aññamaññanti adhippāyo. Ettha ca nanu pathaviyāpi
anya-e0103n:1590_1: lahubhāvo atthi. Tathā hi sā “kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ garukaṃ lahuka”nti
anya-e0103n:1590_2: niddiṭṭhā, āpepi lahubhāvo labbhatevāti? Na, nippariyāyagarubhāvassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n:1590_3: Garubhāvo eva hi pathavīdhātuyā garutaraṃ upādāya lahubhāvoti pariyāyena vutto sītabhāvo
anya-e0103n:1590_4: viya tejodhātuyā. Yadi evaṃ rūpassa lahutāti kathaṃ? Ayampi vuttanayā eva lahutākāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1590_5: upādāya labbhanato. Na hi paricchedavikāralakkhaṇāni paramatthato labbhanti nipphannarūpānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1590_6: avatthāvisesasabhāvato. Tasmā paramatthasiddhaṃ garubhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “purimā
anya-e0103n:1590_7: dve garukattā sabhāgā”ti. “Tathā”ti padena “sabhāgā”ti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati. “Dve”ti
anya-e0103n:1590_8: pana idaṃ yathā “purimā”ti ettha, evaṃ “pacchimā”ti etthāpi ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1590_9: Visabhāgā garukalahukabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Yathā ca garukalahukabhāvehi, evaṃ peyyabhāvāpeyyabhāvehi
anya-e0103n:1591_0: 355. Ajjhattikā heṭṭhā vuttaajjhattikā, sattasantānapariyāpannāti attho. Viññāṇavatthu
anya-e0103n:1591_1: viññattiindriyānanti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ viññāṇavatthūnaṃ, dvinnaṃ viññattīnaṃ, itthipurisindriyajīvitindriyānañca.
anya-e0103n:1591_2: Ye pana “viññāṇavatthūti hadayavatthu gahita”nti vadanti, tesaṃ indriya-ggahaṇena
anya-e0103n:1591_3: aṭṭhannampi rūpindriyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Vuttaviparītappakārā”ti idaṃ bāhirānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1591_4: dhātūnaṃ yathā sabbaso viññāṇavatthuviññattiindriyānaṃ anissayatā ca iriyāpathaviraho
anya-e0103n:1591_5: ca vuttavipariyāyo, evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānatāpīti katvā vuttaṃ, na lakkhaṇarūpassa viya
anya-e0103n:1591_6: kutocipi samuṭṭhānassa abhāvato utusamuṭṭhānatāya tāsaṃ. Lahutādinissayatāpi ajjhattikānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1591_7: dhātūnaṃ vattabbā, na vā vattabbā. Viññatti-ggahaṇaṃ hi lakkhaṇanti.
anya-e0103n:1592: 356. Itarāhīti āpotejovāyudhātūhi. Ekasaṅgahāti sajātisaṅgahena ekasaṅgahā. Samānajātiyānaṃ hi saṅgaho sahajātisaṅgaho. Tenāha “samuṭṭhānanānattābhāvato”ti.
anya-e0103n:1593_0: 357. Tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hotīti yehi mahābhūtehi sampiṇḍanavasena
anya-e0103n:1593_1: saṅgahitā, paripācanavasena anupālitā, samudīraṇavasena vitthambhitā ca, tesaṃ attanā
anya-e0103n:1593_2: sahajātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā tato eva sandhāraṇavasena avassayo
anya-e0103n:1593_3: hoti, vuttanayena vā patiṭṭhā hutvā sahajātādivasena paccayo hotīti. Esa nayo sesāsupi.
anya-e0103n:1594_0: 358. Yadipi aññamaññaābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammāti heṭṭhā dhātūnaṃ asamannāhāratā
anya-e0103n:1594_1: dassitā eva, athāpi imināva nayena visuṃ kammaṭṭhānapariggaho kātabboti dassento
anya-e0103n:1594_2: “pathavīdhātu cetthā”tiādimāha. Tattha pathavīdhātu cetthāti ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho,
anya-e0103n:1594_3: tena ayampi eko manasikārappakāroti dīpeti. Etthāti etāsu dhātūsu. Ahaṃ “pathavīdhātū”ti
anya-e0103n:1594_4: vā “paccayo homī”ti vā na jānātīti attani viya attano kicce ca ābhogābhāvaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n:1594_5: upakārakassa viya upakattabbānampi ābhogābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “itarānipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1594_6: Sabbatthāti sabbāsu dhātūsu, tatthāpi attakiccupakattabbabhedesu sabbesu.
anya-e0103n:1595_1: hi iminā pathavīādīnaṃ aññāsādhāraṇo patiṭṭhābhāvādinā sesabhūtattayassa paccayabhāvo
anya-e0103n:1595_2: vutto. Idha pana yehi dhammehi pathavīādīnaṃ uppatti, tesaṃ pathavīādīnañca anavasesato
anya-e0103n:1595_3: paccayabhāvavibhāgo vuccatīti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ākārānaṃ viseso. Kammanti kusalākusalaṃ
anya-e0103n:1595_4: rūpuppādakaṃ kammaṃ. Cittanti yaṃ kiñci rūpuppādakaṃ cittaṃ. Āhāroti ajjhattiko rūpuppādako
anya-e0103n:1595_5: āhāro. Utūti yo koci utu, atthato tejodhātu. Kammamevāti avadhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānasaṅkarābhāvadassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1595_6: tena akammajānampi kesañci kammassa pariyāyapaccayabhāvo dīpito hoti. Tathā hi vakkhati
anya-e0103n:1595_8: paccayena bhavitabbanti? Bhavitabbaṃ, so pana kammagatikovāti paṭiyogīnivattanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1595_9: avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ, tenāha “na cittādayo”ti. Cittādisamuṭṭhānānanti etthāpi ayamattho
anya-e0103n:1595_10: yathārahaṃ vattabbo. Itareti cittādito aññe. Janakapaccayoti samuṭṭhāpakataṃ sandhāya
anya-e0103n:1595_11: vuttaṃ, paccayo pana kammapaccayova. Vuttaṃ hi “kusalākusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1596_0: Sesānanti cittādisamuṭṭhānānaṃ. Pariyāyato upanissayapaccayo hotīti paṭṭhāne arūpānaṃyeva
anya-e0103n:1596_1: upanissayapaccayassa āgatattā nippariyāyena rūpadhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayo natthi.
anya-e0103n:1596_2: Sutte pana “puggalaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍaṃ upanissāyā”ti vacanato suttantikapariyāyena
anya-e0103n:1596_3: vinā abhāvo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo. Cittaṃ janakapaccayo hotīti sahajātanissayāhārādivasena
anya-e0103n:1596_4: paccayo hontaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhāpakataṃ upādāya “janakapaccayo hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Āhārautūsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:1597_0: Evaṃ kammādīnaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ vasena dhātūsu paccayavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1597_1: dhātūnampi vasena paccayavibhāgaṃ dassento paṭhamaṃ tāva “kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūta”ntiādinā
anya-e0103n:1597_2: uddisitvā puna “tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātū”tiādinā niddisati. Tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā
anya-e0103n:1597_3: pathavīdhātūti “kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūta”nti ettha sāmaññato vuttā kammajapathavīdhātu.
anya-e0103n:1597_4: Kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ itarāsanti kammajānaṃ āpodhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ sahuppattiyā
anya-e0103n:1597_5: attano upakārakānaṃ tāsaṃ upakārakato, ādhārabhāvato, uppādato yāva bhaṅgādharaṇato,
anya-e0103n:1597_7: paccayo hoti, hontī ca kammaṃ viya attano, tāsañca na janakavasena paccayo hoti asamuṭṭhāpakattā
anya-e0103n:1597_8: tāsaṃ. Kāmañcettha nissayapaccaya-ggahaṇeneva patiṭṭhābhāvo saṅgahito, pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0103n:1597_9: pana anaññasādhāraṇakiccaṃ sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvoti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “patiṭṭhāvasena
anya-e0103n:1597_10: cā”ti visuṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Ābandhanavasena cātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tisantatimahābhūtānanti
anya-e0103n:1597_11: utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ catumahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avokiṇṇānaṃ, avicchedena pavattiṃ
anya-e0103n:1597_12: upādāya santatīti santatiggahaṇaṃ. Pathavīdhātuyā patiṭṭhābhāvo nāma sahajātānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1597_13: dhammānaṃyevāti āha “na patiṭṭhāvasenā”ti. Na ābandhanavasenātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n:1597_15: itarāsa”ntiādīsu sukaro tantinayo netunti “cittaāhāra…pe… eseva nayo”ti atidisati.
anya-e0103n:1598_0: Sahajātādipaccayavasappavattāsu ca panāti ettha ca-saddo samuccayattho, pana-saddo
anya-e0103n:1598_1: visesattho, tadubhayena ca yathāvuttasahajātādipaccayehi pavattamānā dhātuyo iminā
anya-e0103n:1599_0: Idāni taṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “ekaṃ paṭiccā”tigāthamāha. Tattha ekaṃ dhātuṃ paṭicca
anya-e0103n:1599_1: tisso dhātuyo catudhā sampavattanti, tisso dhātuyo paṭicca ekāva dhātu catudhā sampavattati,
anya-e0103n:1599_2: dve dhātuyo paṭicca dve dhātuyo chadhā sampavattantīti yojanā. Attho pana pathavīādīsu
anya-e0103n:1599_3: ekekissā paccayabhāve itarāsaṃ tissannaṃ tissannaṃ paccayuppannatāti ayameko catukko,
anya-e0103n:1599_4: tissannaṃ tissannaṃ paccayabhāve itarāya ekekissā paccayuppannatāti ayamaparo catukko,
anya-e0103n:1599_5: paṭhamadutiyā, tatiyacatutthā, paṭhamatatiyā, dutiyacatutthā, paṭhamacatutthā, dutiyatatiyāti
anya-e0103n:1599_6: imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayabhāve tattha tattha itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayuppannatāti
anya-e0103n:1599_7: ayameko chakko. Evaṃ paccayabhāvena catudhā, chadhā ca pavattamānānaṃ ekakadvikatikavasena
anya-e0103n:1599_8: tikadukaekakavasena ca yathākkamaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāgo veditabbo. Ayañca
anya-e0103n:1599_10: veditabbo. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ paṭiccavāre “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā,
anya-e0103n:1599_11: tayo mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1600_1: daṭṭhabbo. Uppīḷanassa paccayo hoti ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuvasena sijjhanato.
anya-e0103n:1600_2: Sāvāti pathavīdhātuyeva. Āpodhātuyā anugatā āpodhātuyā tattha appadhānabhāvaṃ, pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0103n:1600_3: ca padhānabhāvanti patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi sātisayakiccattā tassā patiṭṭhāpanassa
anya-e0103n:1600_4: pādaṭṭhapanassa paccayo hotīti sambandho. Avakkhepanassāti adhonikkhipanassa. Tattha
anya-e0103n:1600_5: ca garutarasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā sātisayo byāpāroti āha “pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātū”ti.
anya-e0103n:1600_6: Tathā uddhaṅgatikā tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo vutto. Tiriyaṃ
anya-e0103n:1600_7: gatikāya vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo
