anya-e0103n:1600_8: gahito. Tattha ṭhitaṭṭhānato abhimukhaṃ pādassa haraṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ, purato haraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1600_9: Tato thokaṃ vītikkamma haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇaṃ, passato haraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1601_0: Ekekena mukhenāti “patthaṭattā pathavī”tiādinā vibhattesu terasasu ākāresu ekekena
anya-e0103n:1601_1: dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanamukhena. Svāyanti so ayaṃ upacārasamādhi. Kathaṃ panassa vavatthānapariyāyoti
anya-e0103n:1602_0: 360. Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “idañca panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Suññataṃ
anya-e0103n:1602_1: avagāhatīti dhātumattatādassanena rūpakāyassa anattakataṃ vavatthāpayato tadanusārena
anya-e0103n:1602_2: nāmakāyassāpi anattakatā supākaṭā hotīti sabbaso attasuññataṃ pariyogāhati tattha
anya-e0103n:1602_3: patiṭṭhahati. Sattasaññaṃ samugghātetīti tato eva “satto poso itthī puriso”ti evaṃ
anya-e0103n:1602_4: pavattaṃ ayāthāvasaññaṃ ugghāteti samūhanati. Vāḷamigayakkharakkhasādivikappaṃ anāvajjamānoti
anya-e0103n:1602_5: sasantāne viya parasantānepi dhātumattatāya sudiṭṭhattā khīṇāsavo viya “ime sīhabyagghādayo
anya-e0103n:1602_6: vāḷamigā, ime yakkharakkhasā”ti evamādivikappaṃ akaronto bhayabheravaṃ sahati abhibhavati.
anya-e0103n:1602_7: Yathāvuttavikappanāpajjanaṃ hi bhayabheravasahanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Ugghāto uppilāvitattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1602_8: Nigghāto dīnabhāvappatti. Mahāpañño ca pana hoti dhātuvasena kāye sammadeva ghanavinibbhogassa
anya-e0103n:1602_9: karaṇato. Tathā hidaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ buddhicaritassa anukūlanti vuttaṃ, sugatiparāyaṇo
anya-e0103n:1605_1: hi ñātassa pabhedo vuccamāno suviññeyyo hoti saṅkhepapubbakattā vitthārassa, vitthāravidhinā
anya-e0103n:1605_2: ca saṅkhepavidhi saṅgayhatīti “samādhissa vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1605_3: Atha vā “ko samādhī”tiādināpi samādhisseva pakārabhedo dassīyati, bhāvanānisaṃsopi
anya-e0103n:1605_4: bhāvanānayanissito evāti adhippāyena “vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1605_5: Sabbappakāratoti palibodhupacchedādikassa sabbassa bhāvanāya pubbakiccassa karaṇappakārato
anya-e0103n:1606_0: “Samattā hotī”ti vatvā tameva samattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “duvidhoyevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1606_1: Idha adhippeto samādhīti lokiyasamādhiṃ āha. Dasasu kammaṭṭhānesūti yāni heṭṭhā “upacārāvahānī”ti
anya-e0103n:1606_2: vuttāni dasa kammaṭṭhānāni, tesu. Appanāpubbabhāgacittesūti appanāya pubbabhāgacittesu
anya-e0103n:1606_3: aṭṭhannaṃ jhānānaṃ pubbabhāgacittuppādesu. Ekaggatāti ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ, nānāvajjanavīthiyañca
anya-e0103n:1608_0: 362. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto attabhāvo, tattha sukhavihāro diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro.
anya-e0103n:1608_1: Kāmaṃ “samāpajjitvā”ti etena appanāsamādhiyeva vibhāvito, “ekaggacittā”ti pana padena
anya-e0103n:1608_2: upacārasamādhinopi gahaṇaṃ hotīti tato nivattanatthaṃ “appanāsamādhibhāvanā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1608_3: Na kho paneteti ete bāhirakabhāvitā jhānadhammā cittekaggatāmattakarā. Ariyassa vinaye
anya-e0103n:1608_4: buddhassa bhagavato sāsane “sallekhā”ti na vuccanti kilesānaṃ sallekhanapaṭipadā
anya-e0103n:1608_5: na hotīti katvā, sāsane pana avihiṃsādayopi sallekhāva lokuttarapādakattā.
anya-e0103n:1609_0: Sambādheti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā saṃkiliṭṭhatāya paramasambādhe ativiya saṅkaṭaṭṭhānabhūte
anya-e0103n:1609_2: okāsassa adhigamanayena. Tassa hi dullabhatāya appanādhigamampi anadhigamayamāno
anya-e0103n:1609_3: saṃvegabahulo puggalo upacārasamādhimhiyeva ṭhatvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karoti “sīghaṃ
anya-e0103n:1610_1: ettha iti-saddo pakārattho, tena “iminā pakārena vuttanayā”ti sesābhiññānampi vuttappakāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1610_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Sati sati āyataneti purimabhavasiddhe abhiññādhigamassa kāraṇe vijjamāne.
anya-e0103n:1610_3: Abhiññādhigamassa hi adhikāro icchitabbo, yo “pubbahetū”ti vuccati. Na samāpattīsu
anya-e0103n:1610_4: vasībhāvo. Tenāha bhagavā “sati sati āyatane”ti. Abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassāti vakkhamānavibhāgāya
anya-e0103n:1610_5: abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya sacchikātabbassa. Dhammassāti bhāvetabbassa ceva vibhāvetabbassa
anya-e0103n:1610_6: ca dhammassa. Abhiññāsacchikiriyāya cittaṃ abhininnāmetīti yojanā. Tatra tatrevāti
anya-e0103n:1610_7: tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva sacchikātabbadhamme. Sakkhibhāvāya paccakkhakāritāya bhabbo sakkhibhabbo,
anya-e0103n:1611_0: Taṃ taṃ bhavagamikammaṃ ārabbha bhavapatthanāya anuppannāyapi kammassa katūpacitabhāveneva
anya-e0103n:1611_1: bhavapatthanākiccaṃ sijjhatīti dassento āha “apatthayamānā vā”ti. Saha byeti pavattatīti
anya-e0103n:1611_2: sahabyo, sahāyo, idha pana ekabhavūpago adhippeto, tassa bhāvo sahabyatā, taṃ sahabyataṃ.
anya-e0103n:1612: Kiṃ pana appanāsamādhibhāvanāyeva bhavavisesānisaṃsā, udāhu itarāpīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “upacārasamādhibhāvanāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1613_0: Nibbānanti tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ nibbutiṃ. Rūpadhamme pariyāpannā vijjamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā
anya-e0103n:1613_1: cittassa abhāvena asantasamāva. Tenāha “sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti. Soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhīti
anya-e0103n:1613_3: aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhahi ca ariyamaggaphalañāṇehīti evaṃ soḷasahi. Navahi samādhicariyāhīti
anya-e0103n:1613_4: pañcannaṃ rūpajjhānānaṃ, catunnaṃ arūpajjhānānañca vasena evaṃ navahi. Keci pana
anya-e0103n:1614: Samādhibhāvanāyogeti samādhibhāvanāya anuyoge anuyuñjane, samādhibhāvanāsaṅkhāte vā yoge. Yogoti bhāvanā vuccati. Yathāha “yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī”ti.
